chapter.verse: Hayde sleelet YASOU3 el-MASI7 2eben Daoud 2eben Ibrahim:
Ibrahim walad Is7ak. W-Is7ak walad Ya3koub. W-Ya3koub walad Yahouza w-ekhewto.
W-Yahouza walad Faris w-Zara7 min Thamar. W-Faris walad 7asroun. W-7asroun walad Aram.
W-Aram walad 3amminadab. 3amminadab walad Na7shoun. W-Na7shoun walad Salamoun.
W-Salamoun walad Bou3az min Ra7ãb. W-Bou3az walad 3oubid min Ra3outh. W-3oubid walad Yassa.
W-Yassa walad Daoud el-malik. W-Daoud walad Sulayman min zawjet Ouriya.
W-Sulayman walad Ra7ba3am. W Ra7ba3am walad Abiya. W-Abiya walad Ãsa.
W-Ãsa walad Youshafat. W-Youshafat walad Youram. W-Youram walad 3ouzziya.
W-3ouzziya walad Youtham. W-Youtham walad A7az. W-A7az walad 7azkiya.
W-7azkiya walad Manassa. W-Manassa walad Ãmoun. W-Ãmoun walad Youshiya.
W-Youshiya walad Yakouniya w-ekhewto bi zaman el-sabi la-Babel.
Min ba3d el-sabi la-Babel Yakouniya walad Sha2alta2il. W-Sha2alta2il walad Zaroubabel.
W-Zaroubabel walad Abihoud. W-Abihoud walad Aliyakim. W-Aliyakim walad 3azour.
W-3azour walad Sadouk. W-Sadouk walad Akhim. W-Akhim walad Aliyoud.
W-Aliyoud walad Ali3azar. W-Ali3azar walad Mattan. W-Mattan walad Ya3koub.
W-Ya3koub walad Youssef zawj Maryam yalle waladet YASOU3 w-esmo al MASI7.
W-majmou3 el-ajyel min Ibrahim la-Daoud arba3-ta3shar jeel. W-min Daoud la-Sabi Babel arba3-ta3shar jeel. W-min Sabi Babel lal-MASI7 arba3-ta3shar jeel.
Hayde 2ossit miled YASOU3 el-MASI7: kenit emmo Maryam makhtoube la-Youssef, tbayyan abl ma teskon ma3o enna 7eble min el-ROU7 el-2ODOS.
W-ken Youssef rejjel sale7 w-ma ken baddo yekshouf 2amra, fa-arrar enno yetreka bel-serr.
W-houe w-3am bifakker bi-hal-shi, zaharlo malèk el-RAB bel-7elm w-2allo: "ya Youssef 2eben Daoud, ma tkhaf enno tekhod Maryam zawje elak. Hiye 7eble min el-ROU7 el-2ODOS,
w-ra7 twallid 2eben w-tsammih YASOU3, li2anno bikhallis sha3bo min khatayahon.
Hayda kello sar 7atta ysir yalle 2alo el-RAB bi-wastet el-nabe:
"Ra7 te7bal el-3azra2, w-twaled 2eben w-esmo ra7 ykoun "3AMMANOU2IL", ye3ne ALLAH ma3na.
W-lamma 2am Youssef min el-nawm, 3eml bi-yalle 2amaro yeh malèk el-RAB. Jeb marto 3ala beyto,
w-ma 3erefa 7atta waladit 2ebna w-sammeh YASOU3.
Lamma welid YASOU3 bi-Beyt-La7m el-Yahoudiye, 3ala 3ahd el-malik Hirodos, ejo 3ala-Ourashalim majous min el-shar2
w-2alo: "wayno el-mawloud, malik el-Yahoud? Shefna nejemto bel-shar2, w-jeena 7atta nesjedlo."
W-sem3 el-malik Hirodos, w-edtarab houe w-kell Ourashalim.
Jama3 kell rou2asa el-kahane w-mou3allimi el-sha3b w-sa2aloun: "wayn ra7 youlad el-MASI7?"
Jewabouh: "bi-Beyt-La7m el-Yahoudiye, li2anno hek katab el-nabe:
"Ya Beyt-La7m, ard Yahouza, ente mannik el-azghar bi-moudon Yahouza, li2anno minnik ra7 yetla3 ra2is byer3a sha3be Isra2il."
Da3a Hirodos el-majous bel-serr w-t7a'2a2 minnon aymata zaharet el-nejme,
min ba3da ba3aton 3ala Beyt La7m w-2allon: "rou7o w-fattsho mni7 3an el-tofl. W-lamma bitle2ouh khabroune 7atta rou7 ana kamen w-esjedlo."
Lamma sem3o kalem el-malik fallo. W-lamma keno 3al-tari2 toli3 el-najm yalle shefouh bel-shar2, w-meshe eddemon 7atta wossil 3ala el-matra7 yalle fi el-tofl w-we2f faw2o.
W-lamma shefo el-nejme fer7o fara7 3azeem,
w-feto 3al-beyt w-le2o el-tofl ma3 emmo Maryam. Raka3o w-sajadoulo, w-min ba3da fata7o kyeson w-2addamoulo dahab w-bakhour w-morr.
W-anzaron ALLAH bel-7elm enno ma yerja3o la-3and Hirodos, w-akhado tari2 tene ta-yousalo 3ala bledon.

Min ba3d ma ra7o el-majous, zahar malèk el-RAB la-Youssef bel-7elm w-2allo: "2oum, 7mol el tofl w-emmo 3ala Masr w-skon honik, 7atta 2ellak aymata bterja3, li2anno Hirodos ra7 yfattish 3an el-tofl ta-ye2etlo."
2am Youssef w-akhad el-tofl w-emmo bel-leyl w-ra7 3ala Masr.
W-sakan fiya 7atta met Hirodos, ta-ysir yalle 2alo el-RAB bi-wastet el-nabe: "min Masr d3it 2ebne."
Lamma shef Hirodos enno el-Majous stahza2o fih, ghodib ktir w-2amar bi-2atl kell tofl bi-Beyt-La7m w-dawa7iya, min 2eben senteyn w-ella, 7asab el-wa2et yalle t7a'2a2o minno el-majous,
w-sar yalle 2alo el-nabe Ermiya:
"Sourakh nsama3 bel-Rama, beke w-na7ib ktir, Ra7eel 3am tebke 3ala wleda w-ma badda enno tet3azza, li2annon khtafo min el-woujoud."
W-lamma met Hirodos zahar malèk el-RAB la-Youssef bel-7elm, w-houe bi-Masr
w-2allo: "2oum, 7mol el-tofl w-emmo w-rja3o 3ala ard Isra2il, li2anno yalle 2arraro ye2tlouh meto."
2am w-akhad el-tofl w-emmo w-reje3 3ala ard Isra2il.
Bass lamma sem3 enno Arkhilawos sar malik 3ala el-Yahoudiye matra7 Hirodos bayyo, khaf enno yrou7 3leya. W-anzaro ALLAH bel-7elm, w-ra7 3al-Jaleel.
W-eja 3ala madine esma el-Nassira w-sakan fiya, la-ytemm yalle 2alouh el-anbiya: "ra7 ysammouh Nasireh."
W-bi-haydik el-iyem eja You7anna el-ma3maden ta-ybashir bi-barriyet el-Yahoudiye
w-sar y2oul: "toubou, li2anno malakout el-sama 2arrab!"
W-You7anna houe yalle 2asado el-nabe Ashe3ya lamma 2al: "sawt 3am yesrokh bel-barriye: 7addro tari2 el-RAB w-khallo tor2ato jelse."
W-ken You7anna yelbos tyeb min wabr el-jamal, w-3ala khasro zennar min jeled, w-byekol jarad w-3asal barri.
W-keno el-nes yetla3o la-3ando min Ourashalim w-kell el-Yahoudiye w-kell el-manta2a el-mou7ita bel-Ordon.
Ta-y3ammedon bi-nahr el-Ordon, me3terfin bi-khatayahon.
W-shef You7anna enno ktar min el-ferrisiyyin wel-saddoukiyyin 3am yejo la-3ando ta-yet3ammado, fa-2allon: "ya wled el-afa3e, meen 3allamkon enno teherbo min el-ghadab el-jeye?
3tou thamar ybarhen 3ala tawbetkon,
w-ma t2oulo la-7alkoun: bayyna houe Ibrahim. Ana b2elkoun: ALLAH edir ya3mil min hal-7jara abne2 la-Ibrahim.
Layko el-fa2s 3ala jouzou3 el-shajar, kell shajra ma bta3te thamar tayyib bten2ata3 w-btenrama bel-nar.
Ana b3ammedkon bel-may lal-tawbe, bass yalle jeye min ba3de houe a2wa minne, w-ma best7e2, 7atta, e7mol sandalo. Houe bi3ammedkon bel-ROU7 el-2ODOS wel-nar,
w-byekhod el-medraye bi-2ido w-bina2e baydaro, byejma3 el-2am7 bi-makhzano w-bye7ro2 el-tebn bi-nar ma btontofe.
W-eja YASOU3 min el-Jaleel lal-Ordon la-yet3ammad 3ala 2id You7anna.
Mana3o You7anna w-2allo: "Ana bi-7aje et3ammad 3ala 2idak enta, keef jeye enta la-3ande ta-ana 3ammdak?
Jewabo YASOU3: "khalle hal-shi ysir halla2, li2anno min khilelo mintammem mashi2it ALLAH." Se3eta wefa2 You7anna.
W-t3ammad YASOU3 w-toli3 deghre min el-may. W-nfata7etlo el-sama, w-shef ROU7 ALLAH 3am yenzal ka2anno 7amemeh w-nezl 3le.
W-nsama3 sawt min el-sama 3am bi2oul: "hayda houe 2ebne el-7abib yalle rdeet 3anno."
W-akhad el-ROU7 el-2ODOS YASOU3 3ala el-barriye ta-yjarbo eblees
sam arb3een yawm w-arb3een leyle la-7add ma je3.
2arrab minno el-moujarreb w-2allo: "eza kent 2eben ALLAH, 2oul la-hal-7jara enno tsir khebz.
Jewabo: "bi2oul el-kteb: ma bi3eesh el-2ensen bass min el-khebz, bi3eesh min kell kelme btosdor min temm ALLAH."
W-akhado eblees 3ala el-madine el-m2addase, w-we2fo 3ala sherfit el-haykal
w-2allo: "eza kent 2eben ALLAH kebb 7alak la-ta7t, li2anno el-kteb bi2oul: biwasse maleyekto fik w-bye7emlouk 3ala 2ideyon 7atta ma-tedrob ejrak bi-7ajar.
Jewabo YASOU3: "bi2oul el-kteb kamen: ma tjarrib el-RAB Ilehak."
W-akhado eblees 3ala jabal 3ale ktir, w-farjeh kell mamelek el-dene w-majda
w-2allo: "ba3tik hayda kello, eza sajadtelle w-3abadetne."
Jewabo YASOU3: "b3od 3anne ya shaytan! li2anno el-kteb bi2oul: lal-RAB Ilehak btesjod, w-bte3bado elo wa7do."
Min ba3da tarako eblees, w-ejo maleyke ta-yekhdmouh.
W-sem3 YASOU3 bi-e3ti2al Youhanna, fa-reje3 3al-Jaleel.
Min ba3da tarak el-Nassira w-sakan bi-Kfarna7oum 3ala shatt ba7r el-Jaleel bi-bled Zabouloun w-Naftali,
7atta ysir yalle 2alo el-nabe Ashe3ya:
"Ya ard Zabouloun w-ard Naftali, 3ala tari2 el-ba7r, bel-meyle el-tenye min el-Ordon, ya Jaleel el-oumam!
El-sha3b el-mawjoud bel-3atm shef nour 3azeem, wel-mawjoudin bi-dene el-mawt w-3atmto toli3 3leyon el-nour."
W-ballash YASOU3 min haydak el-wa2et ybasher w-y2oul: "toubou, li2anno malakout el-sama 2arrab."
W-ken YASOU3 3am yemshe 3ala shatt ba7r el-Jaleel, shef khayyen henne Sem3an yalle mla2bino Boutros w-khayyo Endrawos 3am yzetto el-shabake bel-ba7r, li2annon keno siyyade.
2allon: "l7a2oune, la-a3mil minkon siyyadin bashar"
tarako shbekoun deghre w-le72ouh.
W-fall min honik w-shef khayyen ghayron, henne Ya3koub 2eben Zabada w-khayyo You7anna, ma3 bayyon Zabada bi-shakhtoura 3am bisall7o shbekon, nedehon.
Tarako el-shakhtoura w-bayyon bi-se3et el-se3a w-le72ouh.
Ken YASOU3 3am yebrom bi-kell el-Jaleel, w-y3allim bel-majeme3 w-ye3lon injil el-malakout w-yeshfe el-nes min kell marad.
Sar ma3rouf bi-kell Souriya, w-saro yjeebo la-3ando kell yalle 3endon awje3 w-amrad mekhtelfe: masalan el-monsabeen bel-sar3 wel-mkarsa7een w-yalle fiyon shyateen, fa-shafehon.
W-le72o nes ktir min el-Jaleel wel-moudon el-3ashra w-Ourashalim wel-Yahoudiye w-min wara el-Ordon.
Lamma shef YASOU3 hal-jamaheer, toli3 3al-jabal w-2a3ad. W-2arrabo minno tlemizo,
w-sar y3allemon w-2al:
"niyyel el-fou2ara bel-Rou7, li2anno malakout el-sama houe elon.
"Niyyel el-ma7zouneen, li2annon byet3azzo.
"Niyyel yalle 3endon wade3a, li2annon byourato el-ard.
"Niyyel el-jou3aneen wel-3etshaneen lal-7a2i2a, li2annon byeshba3o.
"Niyyel yalle byer7amo, li2annon byenra7amo.
"Niyyel yalle 2loubon na2iye, li2annon bishoufo ALLAH.
"Niyyel yalle byezra3o el-salem, li2anno henne abne2 ALLAH.
"Niyyel el-moudtahadeen kermel el-7a2i2a, li2anno malakout el-sama houe elon.
"Niyyelkon eza sabboulkon w-edtahadoukon w-ftaro 3leykon kermele kell kelme ghalat.
Fra7o ktir, li2anno moukefa2etkon bel-sama 3azeeme. Hek edtahado el-anbiya min ablkon.
"Ento mel7 el-ard, eza el-mel7 ma ba2a ymalle7, shou yalle bireddelo ta3mto? Ma bi3oud yenfa3 la-shi, ella enno yenkabb w-yed3as 3le el-nes.
Ento nour el-3alam. Ma btetkhabba madine 3ala jabal,
w-ma byetdawwa srej w-byen7att ta7t el-mekyel, bel-3aks byen7att bi-matra7 3ale 7atta ydawwe la-kell yalle bel-beyt.
Khalle nourkon ydawwe hek lal-nes 7atta tbayyen a3melkon el-mni7a w-hek bimajjdo bayykon yalle bel-sama.
"Ma tfakkro enne jeet la-elghe el-shari3a w-ta3lim el-anbiya: ma jeet la-elghe, jeet la-kammel.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a: abl ma tenma7a el-sama wel-ard ma ra7 yenma7a 7arf wa7ad aw no2ta we7de min el-shari3a la-7add ma ykoun kell shi t7a'2a2.
Yalle bikhalef wassiye min asghar hal-wassaya w-bi3allim el-nes ya3mlo metlo, byen3add zghir bi-malakout el-sama. W-yalle bya3mil fiya w-bi3allema, byen3add 3azeem bi-malakout el-sama.
B7ebb 2elkon: eza ma kenit taharetkon akbar min taharet mou3allimi el-shari3a wel-ferrisiyyin, ma ra7 tfouto 3a-malakout el-sama.
"Sme3to enno n2al la-bayyetkon: ma te2tol, li2anno yalle bye2tol lezim yen7akam 3le.
Bass ana b2elkon: yalle byeghdab 3ala khayyo lezim ye7kom 3le el-2ade, w-yalle bi2oul la-khayyo ya jehil lezim ye7kom 3le el-majless, w-yalle bi2ello ya-ahbal byest7e2 nar jhannam.
W-eza kent 3am bit2addem 2erbenak 3al-mazba7 w-tzakkaret honik enno khayyak elo ma3ak shi,
trok 2erbenak 3al-mazba7, w-rou7 awwal shi sale7 khayyak, w-ba3den ta3a w-2addem 2erbenak.
W-eza khtalafet ma3 7ada, ma tet2akhar 7atta tordih enta w-ma3o bel-tari2, 7atta ma ysallmak lal-2ade, wel-2ade lal-shorte, w-bten7at bel-7abs.
Ra7 2ellak el-7a2: ma ra7 totla3 men honik abl ma touwfe ekher 2ersh.
"Sme3to enno n2al:" ma tezne."
Bass ana b2elkon: yalle byettalla3 bi-mara bi-shahwe, zana bi-2albo.
W-eza 3aynak el-yameen kenit sabab ta-tokhte, 2la3a w-sheela, li2anno ba3do a7sanlak ennak tef2od 3odow min a3da2ak min enno yenkabb jesmak kello bi-jhannam.
W-eza 2idak el-yameen kenit sabab ta-tokhte, 2ta3a w-sheela, li2anno ba3do a7sanlak enno tef2od 3odow min a3da2ak min enno yrou7 jesmak kello 3a-jhannam."
"W-n2al kamen: yalle bitalle2 zawjto, khallih yektebla kteb el-tala2.
Bass ana b2elkon: yalle bitalle2 zawjto mish bi-7alet el-zena bi3arreda lal-zena, w-yalle byetzawwaj mtall2a bikoun zene.
"Sme3to enno n2al la-bayyetkon: ma te7lof bel-batel, w-koun bi-7elfenak wafe lal-Rab.
Bass ana b2elkon: ma te7elfo abadan, la-bel-sama li2anna 3arsh ALLAH,
wala bel-ard li2anna m7att ejrey, wala bi-Ourashalim li2anna madinit el-malik el-3azeem.
Wala te7lof bi-rasak, li2anno ma bte2dar tkhalle sha3ra we7de minno tsir bayda aw sawda.
Khalle ykoun kalemkon: eh eza eh, w-la2 eza la2, w-kell yalle bizeed 3an hek bikoun min el-sherreer.
"Sme3to enno n2al: 3ayn bi-3ayn w-senn bi-senn.
Bass ana b2elkon: ma t2awmo el-sherreer. Yalle byedorbak 3ala khaddak el-yameen, derlo khaddak el-tene kamen.
W-yalle byekhedlak 2amissak, treklo mashla7ak kamen.
W-yalle bisakhrak 7atta temshe ma3o meel, mshi ma3o meelen.
W-yalle byetlob minnak shi 3tih yeh, w-yalle byest3eer minnak shi ma tebromlo wejjak.
"Sme3to enno n2al: 7ebb 2aribak w-bghod 3adouwwak.
Bass ana b2elkon: 7ebbo a3de2kon, w-sallo kermel yalle byedtehdoukon,
hek bitkouno wled bayykon yalle bel-sama. Li2anno houe bikhalle shamso totla3 3ala el-3atleen wel-mne7, w-bishatte 3al-abrar wel-keffar.
Eza 7abbeyto yalle bi7ebboukon, ayya moukefa2a ra7 tekhdo? Mish hek bya3mlo yalle bilemmo el-darayib?
W-eza kento bitsallmo bass 3ala ekhwetkon, shou hal-3amal el-3azeem yalle bitkouno 3am ta3mlouh? Mish hek kamen bya3mlo el-wathaniye?
Ento kouno kemleen, metl ma bayykon el-samewe houe kemil.
"Ou3a ta3mlo 3amal kheyr eddem el-nes 7atta tfarjouhon shou 3melto, wa-ella ma elkon moukefa2a 3end bayykon yalle bel-sama.
Eza 3melt 3amal kheyr la-7ada, ma ta3mil dajje metl ma bya3mlo el-mnef2een bel-majeme3 wel-shawere3 7atta yza2foulon el-nes. B2elkon el-7a2i2a: hal-ashkhas akhado moukefa2eton.
Bass enta, lamma ta3mil 3amal kheyr ma tkhalle 2idak el-shmel ta3rif shou 3emlit 2idak el-yameen,
7atta 3amalak ydall bel-serr, w-bayyak yalle bishoufak bel-serr houe ra7 ykefeek.
"W-lamma badkoun tsallo ma tkouno metl el-mnef2een, yalle bi7ebbo enno ysallo 3al-we2if bel-majeme3 w-3a-maferi2 el-tor2at ta-yshoufouwon el-nes. B2elkon el-7a2i2a: hal-ashkhas akhado moukefa2eton.
Bass enta, lamma baddak tsalle fout 3ala ghereftak el-jouwweniye w-sakker el-beb w-salle la-bayyak yalle bel-serr, w-bayyak yalle bishoufak bel-serr houe ra7 ykefeek.
Lamma tsallo ma ettametmo bi-shfefkon metl el-wathaniye, yalle bifakkro enno bel-tamtame ALLAH ra7 yestajeblon.
Ma ta3mlo metlon, li2anno bayykon bya3rif shou yalle ento bi-7aje elo abl ma tetolbouh.
W-bass tsallo 2oulo: ya-Bayyna yalle bel-sama, khalle esmak yet2addas
khalle malakoutak 7ader ma3na w-khalle iradtak tkoun 3al-ard metl ma hiye bel-sama.
3tina khebzetna kel-yawm bi-yawmo,
w-seme7na 3ala aghlatna metl ma ne7na kamen minseme7 yalle gholto bi-7a2na,
w-ma tkhallina nou2a3 bel-tajribe, w-khallesna min el-sherreer.
Eza ento sema7to el-nes 3ala aghlaton, bayykon el-samewe kamen ra7 yseme7kon 3ala aghlatkon.
W-eza ma ento ma sema7to el-nes 3ala aghlaton, bayykon el-samewe kamen ma ra7 yseme7kon 3ala aghlatkon.
Bass tsoumo, ma te3ebso wejjkon metl el-mnef2een, bikashro ta-ybayyno lal-nes ennon saymin. B2elkon el-7a2i2a: hal-ashkhas akhado moukefa2eton.
Bass enta lamma tsoum, ghassil wejjak w-7ott 3otor 3ala rasak,
7atta ma tbayyen ennak sayem. Bass bayyak yalle bel-serr bishoufak, w-bayyak yalle bishoufak bel-serr houe ra7 ykefeek.
"Ma tejma3o knouz 3ala el-ard, matra7 ma fi sous byenkhoron, w-7aramiye byeser2ouwon.
Jamm3o knouzkon bel-sama, matra7 yalle ma fi la sous yenkhoron wala 7aramiye yeser2ouwon.
Matra7 ma bikoun kanzak, honik bikoun 2albak kamen.
"El-3ayn srej el-jesm. Eza kenit 3aynak bi-7ale mni7a, bikoun jesmak kello mnawwir.
W-eza 3aynak kenit mareeda, jesmek bikoun kello m3attem. W-eza ken el-nour yalle fik 3atm, addeysh ra7 ykoun hal-3atm m3attem!
"Ma 7ada bye2dar ykoun khadim la-sayyiden, aw baddo yebghod wa7ad w-y7ebb el-tene, aw baddo yet3alla2 bi-wa7ad w-ye7te2ir el-tene. Ma bte2daro tekhedmo ALLAH wel-mel sawa.
Kermel hek b2elkon: ma te3talo hamm shou badkon teklo ta-t3eesho, wala te3talo hamm el-tyeb. El-7ayet mish ahamm min el-2akl? Wel-jesm mish ahamm min el-tyeb?
Etalla3o mni7 3ala 3safeer el-sama yalle ma byezra3o wala byo7osdo wala byetmawwano, w-bayykon el-samewe bita3miyon. Mish ento aghla min hal-3safeer bi-ktir?
W-meen minkon bye2dar, eza 7att kell 2ouwwto, enno yzeed 3ala toulo shebr?
W-leysh 3etlaneen hamm el-tyeb? T2ammalo zanba2 el-7a2l keef byekbar bidoun ma yet3ab wala yeghzol.
B7ebb 2elkon enno Sulayman bi-3ezzo ma lebs metl wala zanba2a minnon.
Eza el-7ashish, yalle hala2 hon w-boukra ra7 yenkabb bel-nar, bi-labbso ALLAH bi-hal-tari2a, keef lamma el-mawdou3 byet3alla2 fikon ento, ya alileen el-imen?
Kermel hek ma ba2a tenhammo w-t2oulo: shou badna nekol? Aw shou badna neshrab? Aw shou badna nelbos?
Hal-shi kello byetolbo el-wathaniye. Bayykon el-samewe bya3rif ennkon bi-7aje la-kell hal-eshya.
Tlebo bel-awwal malakout ALLAH w-enno tet7a'2a2 mashi2to, w-hawdik kellon byejoukon zyede.
Ma ba2a tenhammo bi-boukra, li2anno boukra byehtamm bi-7alo. W-kell yawm hammo 3a 2addo."
"Ma tdeeno 7atta ma tendeno.
Li2annkon ra7 tendeno bi-nafs el-tari2a yalle 3am tdeeno fiya, w-bel-kayl nafso yalle 3am tkayylo fih ra7 ykayyloukon.
Leysh btettalla3 3ala el-2ashe yalle bi-3ayn khayyak, wel-khashbe yalle bi-3aynak ma bitshoufa?
Aw keef bit2oul la-khayyak: khalline shillak el-2ashe min 3aynak, w-enta fi bi-3aynak khashbe?
Ya mnefe2, sheel el-khashbe min 3aynak enta bel-awwal, se3eta bisir fik tshouf keef baddak tsheel el-2ashe min 3ayn khayyak.
Ma ta3to el-shi el-m2addas lal-kleb, w-ma tkebbo moujawharatkon eddem el-khnezir, 7atta ma yed3asouwon bi-ejreyon w-yehjmo 3leykon ta-ye2zoukon.
"Tlobo w-ra7 ya3toukon, fattsho w-ra7 bitle2o, de'2o el-beb w-ra7 yefta7oulkon.
Li2anno kell meen byetlob byekhod, w-yalle bifattesh bile2e, w-yalle bide2 3al-beb byefta7oulo.
Meen minkon eza 2ebno talab minno khebz bya3tih 7ajar,
aw eza talab minno samke bya3tih 7ayye?
Eza kento ento el-3atleen bta3rfo ta3to wledkon el-eshya el-mni7a, addeysh ma bayykon el-samewe ra7 ya3te el-eshya el-mni7a la-yalle byetlbouwon minno?
3èmlo el-nes metl ma bit7ebbo enno y3emloukon. Hayde hiye el-shari3a w-ta3alim el-anbiya.
"Fouto min el-beb el-dayyi2. El-beb wesi3 wel-tari2 yalle bitwadde lal-halek kamen wes3a, w-ktar yalle byemsho 3leya.
W-shou dayyi2 el-beb w-shou sa3be el-tari2 yalle bitwadde lal-7ayet, w-2lel yalle bile2ouwa.
"Ntebho min el-anbiya el-kezzebeen, yalle byejo la-3andkon bi-tyeb el-7emlen w-henne min jouwwa dyeb mifterse.
Min tasarroufeton bta3rfouwon. Fina no2tof min el-shawk 3enab, aw min el-3ellay2 teen?
W-hek kamen kell shajra mni7a bta3te thamar tayyib, w-kell shajra 3atle bta3te thamar 3atel.
El-shajra el-mni7a mish moumkin ta3te thamar 3atel, wala el-shajra el-3atle bta3te thamar tayyib.
Kell shajra ma bte7mol thamar tayyib bten2ass w-btenkabb bel-nar.
Min tasarroufeton ra7 bta3rfouwon.
"Mish kell wa7ad bi2elle: ya RAB, ya RAB! Bifout 3a-malakout el-sama, malakout el-sama la-yalle bya3mil metl ma baddo bayye yalle bel-sama.
Ktar yawmeta ra7 y2ouloule: ya RAB, ya RAB, mish bi-esmak ne7na tnabbayna? W-bi-esmak taradna shyateen? W-bi-esmak 3melna 3ajeyeb ktire?
Se3eta ra7 2ellon: ana ma ba3rfkon abadan. B3edo 3anne ya ashrar!
"Yalle byesma3 el-kalem yalle 2elto w-bitabb2o, bikoun metl el-rejjel el-7akeem, yalle 3ammar beyto 3al-sakhr.
W-shattet el-dene w-tafet el-anhar w-habbit el-3awasef 3ala hal-beyt w-ma tehabbat, li2anno m2assas 3al-sakhr.
W-yalle byesma3 kaleme w-ma bitabb2o, bikoun metl el-rejjel el-jehil, yalle 3ammar beyto 3al-raml.
W-shattet el-dene w-tafet el-anhar w-habbit el-3awasef 3ala hal-beyt, wel-beyt tehabbat, w-ken houbouto 3azeem."
W-lamma 2al YASOU3 hal-kalem w-khallas, nbaharo el-nes min ta3limo,
li2anno ken 3am bi3allimon bi-nabrt yalle elo soultan, mish metl mou3allimi el-shari3a."
Lamma nezl YASOU3 min el-jabal, nes ktir le72ouh.
Eja la-3ando rejjel 2abras, raka3 eddemo w-2allo: "ya RAB, enta edir enno teshfine eza baddak."
Madd YASOU3 2ido w-7atta 3le w-2al: "eh, ana badde ennak teshfa, shfa!" w-deghre nshafa el-rejjel.
W-2allo YASOU3: "ou3a tkhabbir 7ada. Bass rou7 farje 7alak lal-kehen, w-2addem el-2erben yalle farado Moussa, ta-ykoun shahede elon."
Lamma wossil YASOU3 3ala Kfarna7oum, eja la-3ando dabit roumane trajjeh w-2allo:.
"Ya RAB, khedme matrou7 bel-farshe w-mawjou3 ktir ma 3am ye2dar yet7arrak"
2allo YASOU3: "ana jeye ta eshfih."
Jewabo el-dabit: "Ana ma beste7e2, ya RAB, ennak tfout ta7t sa2f beyte. Bass 2oul kelme we7de w-khadme biso7.
Li2anno ana kamen khadi3 la-soulta, w-fi ta7t 2ide 3askar, b2oul la-hayda mshih, byemshe, w-la-haydak: ta3a, byeje, w-la-khadme: 3mol hek, bya3mil."
T3ajjab YASOU3 min kalemo w-2al la-yalle le72ino:
"B2elkon el-7a2i2a: ana ba3d ma sheft 3end 7ada bi-Isra2il metl hal-imen, w-b7ebb 2elkon: ktar ra7 yejo min el-shar2 wel-gharb ye2e3do 3al-meyde ma3 Ibrahim w-Is7ak w-Ya3koub bi-malakout el-sama,
w-yalle ken elon el-malakout, ra7 yen7atto barra bel-3atm, w-honik ra7 ykoun el-beke wel-ta2ta2et el-snen."
W-reje3 2al YASOU3 lal-dabit: "rou7, ra7 yet7a'2a2 yalle 2ãmanet fih." W-nshafa el-khadim min se3it el-se3a.
W-eja YASOU3 3a-beyt Boutros, w-shef 7amet Boutros matrou7a bel-farshe w-ma7moume.
Akhadla 2ida, w-deghre 7allet 3anna el-7emme. W-2amet saret tekhdmo.
W-lamma sar 3ashiye, jeboulo nes ktir fiyon shyateen, bi-kelme sha7at el-arwe7, w-shafa kell el-marda.
Ta-ysir yalle 2alo el-nabe Ashe3ya: "houe yalle akhad dou3fna w-7eml amradna."
Lamma shef YASOU3 kell hal-nes 7awlo, 2amar tlemizo ennon ye2ta3o 3al-shatt el-tene.
2arrab minno wa7ad min mou3allimi el-shari3a w-2allo: "ya mou3allim, ana badde el7a2ak matra7 ma-bitrou7."
Jewabo YASOU3: "el-wewiyye 3endon byout, w-3safeer el-sama 3shoush, bass 2eben el-2ensen, ma 3endo matra7 yesnod raso."
W-2allo wa7ad min tlemizo: "ya RAB, sma7le bel-awwal rou7 edfon bayye."
2allo YASOU3: "L7a2ne w-khalle el-mawta yedfno mawtehon!"
Rekb YASOU3 bel-shakhtoura, w-le72ouh tlemizo.
Faj2a habbit 3asfe 2awiye bel-ba7r, w-sar el-mawj a3la min el-shakhtoura. W-YASOU3 ken neyim.
2arrabo minno ta-ywa3ouh w-2aloulo: "ya RAB, khallesna, ra7 nmout!"
Jewabon YASOU3: "leysh khayfin, ya alileen el-imen?" 2am, haddad el-ree7 wel-ba7r, w-hedyit el-3asfe.
T3ajjabo el-nes w-2alo: "meen bikoun hayda ta-el-ba7r wel-ree7 bitee3ouh?"
Lamma 2ata3 YASOU3 3al-shatt el-tene, w-wossil 3a-manta2it el-Jidariyeen, le2ouh tnen fiyon shyateen, jeyin min el-ma2aber. W-2add ma keno sherseen, ma 3ad 7ada ye2dar yemro2 min honik.
W-saro ysarrkho w-y2oulo: "shou elak 3leyna, ya 2eben ALLAH? Leysh jeye la-hon? asdak t3azzebna abl el-wa2et?"
W-ken fi atee3 khnezir 3am yer3a min el-meyle el-tenye,
Saro el-shyateen yetrajjouh la-YASOU3 w-y2oulo: "eza baddak tesh7atna, b3atna 3a-atee3 el-khnezir."
2allon: "rou7o!." Tel3o w-feto bel-khnezir, w-hajam el-atee3 kello 3al-ba7r w-gheri2 bel-may.
Se3eta harabo el-re3yen 3al-madine w-khabbaro kell yalle sar w-2ossit yalle ken fiyon shyateen.
W-kell ahl el-madine ejo la-3and YASOU3. W-lamma shefouh trajjouh ta-yfell min el-madine.
Rekb YASOU3 el-shakhtoura w-2ata3 bel-may ta-yrou7 3a-madinto.
Jeboulo mkarsa7 ma7tout 3a-ma7mal. Lamma shef YASOU3 imenon, 2al lal-mkarsa7: "wsa2 ya 2ebne, khatayak nghafaro."
Kamm wa7ad min mou3allimi el-shari3a 2alo bi-fekron: "hayda 3am bijaddef!"
3eref YASOU3 afkaron, w-2al: "leysh afkar 2albkon 3atle?
Shou el-ahouan? N2oul khatayak nghafaro, aw n2oul: "2oum w-mshi?
3rafo enno 2eben el-2ensen elo soultan 3al-ard ta-yeghfor el-khataya." Se3eta 2al lal-mkarsa7: "2oum w-7mol ma7malak w-rja3 3a-beytak."
2am w-ra7 3a-beyto.
W-lamma shefo el-nes yalle sar, khafo w-majjado ALLAH yalle 3ata el-bashar metl hal-soultan.
W-ra7 YASOU3 min honik, shef rejjel 2e3id bi-beyt el-darayib esmo Matta. 2allo: "L7a2ne." 2am w-le72o.
W-lamma ken YASOU3 3am yekol bi-beyt Matta, ktar min lammimet el-darayib wel-khatyeen ejo w-2a3ado ma3 YASOU3 w-tlemizo.
El-ferrisiyyin shefo hal-shi, w-saro y2oulo la-tlemizo: "leysh m3allimkon 3am yekol ma3 lammimet el-darayib wel-khatyeen?"
Sem3 YASOU3 w-jewabon: "yalle so7oton mni7a mish bi-7aje la-7akeem, el-7akeem houe lal-marda.
Rou7o t3allamo shou ye3ne: "ana badde ra7me mish zabi7a. Ma jeet kermel el-abrar, ana jeet kermel el-khatyeen."
Ejo tlemiz You7anna el-ma3maden la-3and YASOU3 w-2aloulo: "leysh ne7na wel-ferrisiyyin minsoum ktir, w-tlemizak ma bisoumo?
Jewabon YASOU3: "Bye2daro ahl el-3arees ye7zano, wel-3arees ma3on? Bass ra7 yeje yawm bikoun el-3arees n2akhad min baynetkon, se3eta bisoumo.
Ma 7ada bira2e3 tawb 3ati2 bi-sha2fet 2mesh jdide, li2anno el-sha2fe ra7 tenkamash 3al-tawb wel-kheze2 yousa3.
W-ma 7ada bi7ott nbeed jdid bi-wa3a min jeld 3ati2, wa-ella ra7 yenkhez2o, se3eta el-nbeed byou2a3 3al-ard wel-wa3a bisir lal-kabb. El-nbeed el-jdid bi7ottouh bi-wa3a jdid, w-hek tneynon byen7efzo.
Houe w-3am ye7ke ma3on, byeje la-3ando wa7ad min el-rou2asa, byerka3 eddemo w-bi2ello: "bente metit min shwey, ta3a 7ott 2idak 3leya, bterja3 bit3eesh."
2am YASOU3 le72o houe w-tlemizo.
W-ken fi honik mara sarla tna3shar sene 3enda nazeef damm, ejet min khalfo w-lamaset taraf tawbo.
Hiye w-3am t2oul bi-2alba: "byekfe enno elmos tawbo ta-enshafa."
Ltafat YASOU3, shèfa w-2al: "wsa2e ya bente, imenik khallasik." W-min se3eta el-mara nshafit.
Lamma wossil YASOU3 3ala-beyt el-rayyes shef nes 3am tendob wel-kell ma3jou2,
2al: "B3edo, el-sabiye ma metit, bitkoun neyme." Saro yed7ako 3le.
Min ba3d ma fallo el-nes, fet w-akhad el-benet bi-2ida fa 2amit.
W-ntasharit el-2ossa bi-kell el-manta2a.
W-min ba3da ra7 YASOU3 min honik, w-le72ouh tnen 3emyen 3am ysarrkho w-y2oulo: "r7amna, ya 2eben Daoud!"
W-bass wossil 3al-beyt, ejo el-3emyen el-tnen la-3ando. Sa2alon YASOU3: "Ento bit2ãmno enno be2dar a3mil hal-shi?" Jewabouh: "na3am, ya RAB."
Se3eta YASOU3 lamaslon 3younon w-2al: "ra7 tekhdo 3ala 2add imenkon."
W-nfata7et 3younon, se3eta nabbahon YASOU3: "ou3a tkhabbro 7ada!"
Bass henne, fallo w-saro ykhabbro 3anno bi-kell el-manta2a.
W-bass fallo min 3endo, eja nes jeybinlo rejjel akhras, sèkno shaytan.
Lamman YASOU3 sha7at el-shaytan, w-sar el-akhras ye7ke, ndahasho el-nes w-saro y2oulo: "wala marra shefna metl hal-shi bi-Isra2il!"
Bass el-ferrisiyyin 2alo: "3am yesh7at el-shyateen bi-2ouwwet rayyes el-shyateen!"
W-ra7 YASOU3 yebrom bi-kell el-moudon wel-diya3, y3allim bel-majeme3 w-ye3lon bisharet el-malakout w-yeshfe el-nes min kell marad w-3elle.
W-lamma shef hal-nes shef2 2albo 3leyon, li2annon keno ye2saneen w-day3een metl el-ghanam yalle bala ra3i.
Se3eta 2al la-tlemizo: "fi zar3 ktir baddo 2atf, bass el-3emmel 2lel.
Sallo la-RAB el-zar3 ta-yeb3at 3emmel yo7osdoulo."
Da3a YASOU3 tlemizo el-tna3sh w-3atahon soultan yesh7ato arwe7 el-sharr w-yeshfo el-nes min kell marad w-3elle.
W-hawde aseme el-tna3shar rasoul: awwalon Sem3an el-moula2ab Boutros w-Endrawos khayyo, Ya3koub 2eben Zabada w-You7anna khayyo,
Filippos, w-Bartelmawos, w-Touma, w-Matta lammim el-darayib, w-Ya3koub 2eben 7alfa w-Teddawos,
w-Sem3an el-ghayour, w-Yahouza el-Eskharyoute yalle sallam YASOU3.
Hal-tna3sh hawde, ba3aton YASOU3 w-wassahon: "la-3and el-wathaniye ma trou7o w-ma tfouto 3ala madine semiriye,
bitrou7o sawb el-khwerif el-day3a min wled Isra2il,
w-3a-tari2kon bashro enno malakout el-sama 2arrab.
Shfou el-marda, w-2awwmo el-mawta, w-tahro el-bors min barason, w-sh7ato el-shyateen. Akhadto min doun shrout, 3tou ento kamen min doun shrout.
Ma te2no dahab wala fodda wala n7as,
wala kees lal-tari2 wala tawben wala sandalen wala 3asa, li2anno el-shaghil elo ha2 yekol.
Ayya madine aw day3a bitrou7oula, s2alo 3an yalle byest7e2kon, w-dallo 3endo ta-yeje wa2et tfello.
W-bass tfouto 3ala shi beyt, sallmo 3le.
Eza hal-beyt byest7e2 salemkon, salemkon bi7ell 3le, w-eza la2, salemkon byerja3lkon.
W-eza ma 2ebloukon wala sem3o kalemkon, fello w-nfedo ghabret ejreykon.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a: Sadoum w-3amoura ra7 tkoun ekhreton bi-yawm el-deynoune ar7am min ekhret hal-madine.
"Ana be3etkon metl el-khwerif bayn el-dyeb. Kouno mentebhin metl el-7ayyet, w-haneya metl el-7amem.
W-ntebho min el-nes, ra7 ysalmoukoun lal-ma7akem, w-yejldoukon bel-majeme3,
w-ra7 yekhdoukon lal-7ekkem wel-moulouk kermele ana, w-hek bitkouno shahede elon w-lal-wathaniye.
Bass ysallmoukon ma tehtammo keef aw shou ra7 tjewbo, li2anno ra7 yen3atalkoun bi-se3eta shou t2oulo.
Ma ra7 tkouno ento yalle 3am te7ko, ROU7 bayykoun houe yalle ra7 ye7ke fikon.
El-khayy ra7 ysallem khayyo lal-mawt, wel-bayy 2ebno, wel-wled y2oumo 3ala ahlon w-ye2etlouwon,
El-kell ra7 yebghedkon kermel esme. W-yalle byethbat lal-ekher, houe yalle ra7 yetkhallas.
W-bass yedtehdoukon bi-hal-madine, hrebo 3ala madine tenye. B2elkon el-7a2i2a: abl ma tebermo kell moudon Isra2il bikoun eja 2eben el-2ensen.
Ma fi telmiz afdal min m3allmo, wala el-khadim afdal min sayyido.
Byekfih lal-telmiz enno ykoun metl m3allmo wel-khadim metl sayyido. Eza rabb el-beyt w-la'2abouh bi-ba3lzaboul, fa-shou ra7 ykoun massir ahl beyto?
"Ma tkhafo minnon. Ma fi shi mkhabba ella w-ra7 yenkashaf, w-ma fi shi mekhfe ella w-ra7 yen3araf.
Yalle 3am 2elkon yeh bel-3atm, 2oulouh ento bel-daw. W-yalle 3am tesma3ouh washwashe, nedo fih 3al-stou7.
Ma tkhafo min yalle bye2etlo el-jesm w-ma bye2daro ye2etlo el-rou7, khafo min yalle bye2dar ymawwet el-jesm wel-nafs tneynon sawa bi-jhannam.
Bi-addeysh byenbe3 3asfoureyn, bi-2ersh? W-ma3 hayda w-kello, ma byou2a3 wa7ad minnon 3al-ard bidoun 2ezn bayykon.
Bass ento, 7atta sha3r raskon kellon ma3doudin.
Ma tkhafo, ento aghla min kell el-3safeer.
"Yalle bye3terif fiyye eddem el-nes, ana kamen ra7 e3terif fih eddem bayye yalle bel-sama.
Bass yalle byenkerne eddem el-nes, ana kamen ra7 enkro eddem bayye yalle bel-sama.
"Ma tfakkroune jeet ta-7ott el-salem 3al-ard, ma jeet ta-7ott el-salem, ana ma3e seyf.
Jeye farre2 bayn el-2eben w-bayyo, wel-benet w-emma, wel-kenne w-7ameta.
Ra7 ysir el-2ensen ahl beyto min a3de2o.
Yalle bi7ebb bayyo aw emmo aktar minne, bikoun ma byest7e2ne. W-yalle bi7ebb 2ebno aw bento aktar minne, ma byest7e2ne.
W-yalle ma bye7mol salibo w-byel7a2ne, ma byest7e2ne.
W-yalle hammo ye7faz 7ayeto, ra7 yekhsara, w-yalle byekhsar 7ayeto kermele ana, byerba7a.
"Yalle bye2balkon bye2balne, w-yalle bye2balne bye2bal yalle ba3atne.
Yalle bye2bal nabe li2anno nabe, byekhod moukefa2et nabe. W-yalle bye2bal rejjel sale7 li2anno sale7, byekhod moukefa2et el-sale7.
Yalle byes2e walaw kebbeyet may berde la-7ada min hal-zghar li2anno telmize, b2elkon el-7a2i2a, enno moukafe2to ma bitrou7 di3an."
Min ba3d ma YASOU3 wassa tlemizo el-tna3sh, fall min honik w-ra7 y3allim w-ybashir bi-moudon tenye.
W-sem3 You7anna, houe w-bel-7abs, bi-a3mel YASOU3, fa-ba3atlo kamm wa7ad min tlemizo
ta-yes2alouh: "enta yalle baddo yeje, aw mnentor wa7ad tene?"
Jewabon YASOU3: "rou7o khabbro You7anna shou 3am tesma3o w-tshoufo:
El-3emyen rej3o ye2sha3o, el-3erj 3am yemsho, el-bors ettaharo min barason, el-torsh rej3o yesma3o, el-mawta 3am bi2oumo, wel-fou2ara 3am yetbasharo.
W-niyyel yalle bidall m2eman fiyye."
W-bass fallo tlemiz you7anna, sar YASOU3 ye7ke lal-nes 3an You7anna: "shou ro7to tshoufo bel-sa7ra? 2asabe 3am t'hezza el-ree7?
Aw shou ro7to tshoufo? Rejjel lebis tyeb ne3me? Bass yalle byelbso tyeb ne3me 2e3deen bel-2sour!
Shou ro7to tshoufo? Nabe? W-ana b2elkon enno You7anna aktar min nabe.
Houe yalle nkatab 3anno: ra7 eb3at rasoule eddemak, ta-y7adderlak el-tari2 eddemak.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a: bayn kell el-nes ba3d ma toli3 a3zam min You7anna el-ma3maden, bass azghar wa7ad bi-malakout el-sama a3zam minno.
Min iyem You7anna el-ma3maden la-liom, wel-nes byekhdo malakout el-sama bel-jehed, w-yalle bijehdo bye7salo 3le.
Dallo el-anbiya wel-shari3a yetnabbo, la-yawm yalle eja You7anna.
Eza badkon tsad2o, 3rafo enno You7anna houe Eliyya yalle natrino.
W-yalle 3endo dinen, khallih yesma3.
Bi-meen badde shabbeh hal-jeel? Byeshbah wled 2e3deen bel-se7at 3am bi3ayyto la-ba3don w-y2oulo:
zammarnelkon w-ma ra2asto, nadabnelkon w-ma bkito.
Eja You7anna ma byekol wala byeshrab, 2alo 3anno: hayda sèkno shaytan.
W-eja 2eben el-2ensen byekol w-byeshrab 2alo 3anno: hayda rejjel akkeel w-sakkeer w-sadee2 yalle bilemmo darayib wel-khatyeen. Bass el-7ekme btesh'hadla a3mela."
W-min ba3da, sar YASOU3 y3atib el-moudon yalle 3eml fiya aktar 3ajeybo w-ahla ma tebo,
2al: "Kourazin, Beyt-Sayda, ya weylkon! Law el-3ajeyeb yalle saro 3endkon, ysiro bi Sour w-Sayda, keno ahla tebo min zamen w-lebso el-mes7 w-2a3ado 3al-rmed.
W-ana b2elkon: Sour w-Sayda ra7 ykoun massiron ar7am minkon.
W-ente ya Kfarna7oum, baddik tousale bel-2ouwwe 3al-sama? Ra7 tou2a3e 3a-jhannam. Li2anno law el-3ajeyeb yalle saro 3endik, ysiro bi Sadoum, kenit be2yet la-liom.
W-b2elkon kamen: ard Sadoum yawm el-deynoune, ra7 ykoun massira ar7am."
Se3eta 2al YASOU3: "beshkrak ya bayye, Rab el-sama wel-ard, li2annak kashafet hal-shi lal-zghar w-khabbeyto 3an yalle byefhamo, wel-azkya.
Na3am, ya bayye, hayde iradtak.
Bayye sallamne kell shi, ma 7ada bya3rif el-2eben ella el-Ãb, w-ma 7ada bya3rif el-Ãb ella el-2eben, w-ella yalle el-2eben baddo enno yeksheflo yeh.
Ta3o kellkon la-3ande ento el-te3benin min hal-7eml el-t2il w-ana braye7kon.
7melo neere ana, w-t3allamo minne, w-ra7 terte7o, ana hane w-2albe metwadi3,
li2anno neere ana ma bita3eb, w-7emle khafif."
Bi-yawm sabt, mara2 YASOU3 bayn el-7ou2oul, w-tlemizo je3o, saro ye2otfo sanebel w-yeklo.
Shefouwon el-ferrisiyyin w-2alo la-YASOU3: "shouf tlemizak, 3am ya3mlo yalle mish masmou7 yawm el-sabt."
Jewabon YASOU3: "ma 2rito shou 3eml Daoud lamma je3, houe w-yalle keno ma3o?
Keef fet 3ala beyt Allah, w-keef akalo khebz el-ta2dime, yalle houe bass lal-kahane w-2aklo mish masmou7 la elon?
W-ma 2rito bi-shari3et Moussa enno el-kahane yawm el-sabt henne w-bel-haykal, bidannso el-sabt bidoun ma yenlemo?
W-ana b2elkon: enno hon fi 7ada a3zam min el-haykal.
Law kento fhemto shou ye3ne: ana badde ra7me mish zabi7a, ma kento 7akamto 3a-yalle ma 3leyon khatiyye.
Li2anno 2eben el-2ensen houe Rab el-sabt."
W-ba3den fall YASOU3 min honik w-ra7 3al-majma3,
Shef rejjel 2ido yebse, fa-sa2alouh el-ferrisiyyin ta ywa2'3ouh: "masmou7 neshfe el-marda yawm el-sabt?"
Jewabon YASOU3: "eza hada minkon 3endo kharouf wa7ad w-hal-kharouf wa2a3 bel joura yawm el-sabt, ma birou7 bisheelo?
Keef bel-a7ra el-2ensen yalle houe afdal min el-kharouf? Mbala, masmou7 na3mil mni7 yawm el-sabt."
W-se3eta 2al lal-rejjel: "medd 2idak!" Madda, w-rej3et tabi3iye metl el-2id el-tenye.
W-min ba3da ra7o el-ferrisiyyin w-tshewaro ta-yshoufo keef baddon ye2tlouh.
Lamma 3eref YASOU3 bi-hal-shi, fall min honik. Le7'2ouh nes ktir, w-shafehon kellon,
w-wassahon ma ykhabbro 3anno,
ta-ysir yalle 2alo el-nabe Ashe3ya:
"Hayda khadme yalle ana na2'ayto, 7abibe yalle fre7et fih. Ra7 khalle Rou7e tenzal 3le, ta-ykhabber el-3alam 3an iradte.
Ma bi3ade 7ada wala byesrokh, wala byensama3 sawto bel-tor2at.
Ma byeksor el-2asbe el-d3ife, wala byetfe el-fteele yalle 3am tdakhen, 7atta ykhalle iradte tontosir,
w-ysir raja lal-3alam."
Min ba3da jeboulo rejjel fih shaytan, a3ma w-akhras. Shafeh, w-sar el-akhras ye7ke w-ye2sha3.
Se3eta kell el-nes ndahasho w-saro y2oulo: "mish hayda 2eben Daoud?"
Lamma sem3o el-ferrisiyyin hal-shi 2alo: "3am yesh7at el-shyateen bi-2ouwwet Ba3lzaboul rayyes el-shyateen."
3eref YASOU3 afkaron, 2allon: "kell mamlake bten2esem 3a-7ala btekhrab, w-kell madine aw beyt byen2esem 3a-7alo ma byesmod.
Eza el-shaytan byesh7at el-shaytan, bikoun n2asam 3a-7alo. Se3eta keef mamlakto badda tesmod?
Eza ana 3am esh7at el-shyateen bi-2ouwwet Ba3lzaboul, wledkon bi-2ouwwet meen 3am yesh7atouh? Wledkon henne yalle ra7 ye7kmo 3leykon.
Bass eza ana 3am esh7at el-shyateen bi-2ouwwet ROU7 ALLAH, bikoun malakout ALLAH sar baynetkon.
Keef bye2dar el-wa7ad yfout 3ala beyt rejjel 2awe w-yesre2lo ghrado, eza bel-awwal ma birabbit el-rejjel el-2awe, w-ba3den byesre2lo beyto?
Yalle ma bikoun ma3e houe dodde, w-yalle ma byejma3 ma3e bikoun 3am bifarri2.
Kermel hek ana b2elkon: kell khatiyye w-kell tejdeef ra7 yenghafar, bass el-tejdeef 3ala el-ROU7 el-2ODOS ma byenghafar.
Yalle bi2oul kelme dodd 2eben el-2ensen byenghafarlo, bas yalle bi2oul kelme dodd el-ROU7 el-2ODOS, ma byenghafarlo, la bi-hal dene wala bel-ekhra."
"El-shajra el-mni7a bte7mol thamar mni7. El-shajra el-3atle bte7mol thamar 3atel. El-shajra bten3araf min thimara.
Ya wled el-7ayyet, keef ra7 fikon t2oulo eshya mni7a w-ento ashrar? El-temm bi2oul shou fi bel-2alb.
El-2ensen el-sale7 min kanzo el-sale7 bisheel eshya sal7a, wel-2ensen el-3atel min kanzo el-3atel bisheel eshya 3atle.
W-ana b2elkon, enno kell kelme tefha bi2oulouwa el-nes, ra7 yet7asabo 3leya bi-yawm el-deynoune.
Li2anno bi-kalemak ra7 tetbarrar w-bi-kalemak ra7 yen7akam 3lek."
Se3eta kamm wa7ad min mou3allimi el-shari3a wel-ferrisiyyin 2aloulo: "ya mou3allim, badna nshouf minnak shi 3ajibe."
Jewabon: "Jeel sherreer w-3atel, 3am bitaleb bi-3ajibe, w-ma ra7 yen3atalo ella 3alemet Younen.
Metl ma Younen be2e tlet tiyem w-tlet layele bi-batn el-7out, hek ra7 yeb2a 2eben el-2ensen tlet tiyem w-tlet layele bi-2alb el-ard.
Ahl Ninawa, yawm el-deynoune, ra7 y2oumo ma3 hal-jeel w-ye7kmo 3le, li2annon tebo lamma anzaronYounen, w-hon fi a3zam min Younen.
Maliket el-jnoub ra7 t2oum yawm el-deynoune ma3 hal-jeel w-te7kom 3le, li2anna ejet min ekher el-dene ta-tesma3 7ekmet Sulayman, w-hon fi a3zam min Sulayman."
"Eza el-rou7 el-nejes dahar min 2ensen, bisir yebrom bel-sa7ra ta-yfattesh 3an el-ra7a w-ma bile2iya,
bi2oul: ra7 erja3 3ala beyte yalle falleyt minno. W-byerja3 bile2ih fade w-mkannas w-mrattab.
Se3eta birou7 yjeeb sab3 arwe7 al3an minno, bifouto bi-hal-2ensen, w-bitkoun 7alto aswa2 min el-awwal. Hek ra7 ykoun massir hal-jeel el-3atel."
Houe w-YASOU3 3am ye7ke ma3 el-nes, ejet emmo w-ekhewto, we2fo barra, w-talabo enno ye7ko ma3o.
7ada min el-mawjoudin honik 2allo: "emmak w-ekhewtak we2fin barra baddoun ye7kouk."
Jewabo YASOU3: "meen emme, w-meen ekhewte?"
W-dall bi-2ido 3ala tlemizo w-2al: "hawde henne emme w-ekhewte.
Li2anno kell yalle bya3mil iradet bayye yalle bel-sama houe khayye w-ekhte w-emme."
Yawmeta fall YASOU3 min el-beyt w-ra7 a3ad 3a-shatt el-ba7r.
W-tjamma3 7awlo ktir nes, w-toli3 3al-shakhtoura, 2a3ad fiya, wel-nes ba3da 3al-shatt.
Sar ye7kyon bel-amtel 3an eshya ktire, 2al: "ra7 el-mzeri3 ta-yezra3.
Houe w-3am yezra3, fi kamm 7abbe wa2a3o 3ala 7affit el-tari2, fa-ejo el-3safeer w-akalouwon.
W-ghayron wa2a3o 3ala ard 7ajar, ma-fiya ktir trab, farrakho bi-ser3a, li2anno terbeton mish ghami2a.
W-lamma tol3it el-shams deblo, w-li2anno ba3don bala shloush yebso.
W-wa2a3 ghayron bel-shawk, toli3 el-shawk w-khana2on.
W-ghayron wa2a3 bi-ard taybe, w-athmaro, fi thamara 7emlit miyye, w-thamara sitteen, w-thamara tleteen.
W-yalle 3endo dineyn, khallih yesma3!."
2arrabo minno tlemizo w-2aloulo: "leysh 3am te7kyon bel-amtel?"
Jewabon: "ento n3atalkon ta3rfo asrar malakout el-sama, bass henne ma n3atalon.
Li2anno yalle ma3o shi, byen3atalo ta-yzeed, w-yalle ma ma3o shi, byekhdoulo 7atta yalle houe elo.
3am e7kyon bel-amtel, li2annon byettalla3o w-ma bishoufo, byesma3o bidoun ma yesma3o, wala yefhamo.
Fiyon t7a'2a2et noubouwet Ashe3ya yalle bit2oul: "btesma3o w-ma btefhamo, btettalla3o w-ma bitshoufo.
Li2anno hal-sha3b sar 2albo 2ase, w-sama3o t2eel, ghammad 3youno, 7atta ma yshouf bi-3youno wala yesma3 bi-diney, wala yefham bi-2albo wala ytoub ta-eshfih."
Bass ento niyyelkon li2anno 3younkon bishoufo w-dinaykon byesma3o.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a: "enno ktar min el-anbiya wel-2eddissin tmanno yshoufo yalle ento 3am tshoufouh w-ma shefouh, w-yesma3o yalle ento 3am tesma3ouh w-ma sem3o.
"Sma3o tefsir matal el-mzeri3:
Yalle byesma3 kelmet el-malakout w-ma byefhama, houe metl yalle nzara3 3a-7affit el-tari2, byeje el-sherreer w-byesro2 yalle nzara3 bi-2albo.
W-yalle nzara3 bi-ard 7ajar, metl yalle byesma3 el-kelme, w-bye2bala bi-se3et el-se3a w-byefra7 fiya,
w-li2anno nafso mish mrassakha w-houe 2eben se3to, bass ysir fi di2a aw edtihad bi-sabab el-kelme, deghre byen2elib 3a-zeto.
W-yalle nzara3 bel-shawk, metl yalle byesma3 el-kelme, bass hmoum el-dene w-moughrayet el-ghena, byekhen2o el-kelme w-ma bya3te wala thamar.
W-yalle nzara3 bel-ard el-taybe, metl yalle byesma3 el-kelme w-byefhama, w-bye7mol shi miyye, shi sitteen, w-minnon bye7mlo tleteen."
Reje3 3atahon matal tene, 2al: "malakout el-sama byetshabbah la-rejjel zara3 bi-7a2lo zar3 mni7.
W-wa2et keno el-nes neymin, eja 3adouwo w-zara3 zou2an bayn el-2am7 w-ra7.
W-lamma farrakh el-zar3 2am7, bayyan el-zou2an kamen.
Ejo kheddem sa7ib el-7a2l w-2aloulo: "ya Rab enta zara3et bi-7a2lak zar3 mni7, min wayn eja el-zou2an?"
Jewabon: "baddo ykoun fi wa7ad 3adouw 3eml hal-shi." 2aloulo: "baddak nrou7 nejma3 el-zou2an?"
2allon: "la2, bkhaf ento w-3am tejma3o el-zou2an, te2la3o el-2am7 ma3o.
Khallouwon yekbaro sawa la-yawm el-2atf, w-bass yeje wa2et el-2atf b2oul lal-7assadeen: jma3o el-zou2an bel-awwal w-rbotouh ta-ne7er2o, wel-2am7 jibouh la-3ande 3a-beyt el-moune."
Reje3 3atahon matal ghayro, 2al: "malakout el-sama byetshabbah la-7abbit khardal zara3a rejjel bi-7a2lo.
Ma3 enna azghar bezre bayn el-7boub, lamma tfarrikh btekbar aktar min ghayra w-bitsir shajra, w-bisiro 3safeer el-sama ya3mlo 3shoush bayn aghsana."
Reje3 3atahon matal ghayro kamen: "malakout el-sama byetshabbah la-khameere akhadeta mara w-7atteta bi-tlet kaylet t7in, w-khammar el-3ajeen kello."
Kell hal-eshya 7ekehon hiye YASOU3 bel-amtel. W-ma ken ye7kiyon ella bel-amtel.
Ta ysir metl ma 2al el-nabe: "befta7 temme ta-e7ke bel-amtel, w-e3lon yalle ken makhfe min bideyet el-3alam."
W-min ba3da tarak YASOU3 el-nes w-eja 3al-beyt, 2arrabo la-7addo tlemizo w-2aloulo: "fasserelna matal zou2an el-7a2l."
Jewabon: "yalle zara3 zar3 mni7 houe 2eben el-2ensen,
el-7a2l houe el-3alam, el-zar3 el-mni7 henne wled el-malakout, el-zou2an henne wled el-sherreer.
El-3adouw yalle zara3 el-zou2an houe el-shaytan, 2atf el-zar3 niheyet el-3alam, wel-7assadeen henne el-maleyke.
W-metl ma mnejma3 el-zou2an ta-ne7er2o bel-nar, hek ra7 ysir bi-niheyet el-3alam:
2eben el-2ensen ra7 yeb3at maleykto yejma3o kell yalle keno sabab shakk, wel-ashrar
w-bikebbouwon bi-atoun el-nar, w-honik bikoun el-beke wel-ta2ta2et el-snen.
Wel-abrar, byesher2o metl el-shams bi-malakout bayyon. W-yalle 3endo dineyn, khallih yesma3!
"Malakout el-sama byetshabbah la-kanz madfoun bi-7a2l, ktashafo rejjel w-khabbah, w-min fare7to ra7 be3 kell shi 3endo w-shtara hal-7a2l.
W-malakout el-sama byetshabbah la-tejir ken 3am bifattesh 3ala a7la 7abbit loulou,
w-lamma le2a we7de ghalye, ra7 be3 kell shi 3endo w-shtareha.
W-malakout el-sama byetshabbah kamen la-shabake zattouwa bel-ba7r, jama3et samak min kell el-anwe3.
W-lamma ntalet talla3ouwa 3al-shatt, w-jama3o el-samak el-mni7 bi-slel w-yalle manno mni7 kabbouh.
W-hek ra7 ysir bi-niheyet el-3alam: ra7 yejo el-maleyke, w-yfarr2o el-ashrar min el-abrar,
w-yzettouwon bi-atoun el-nar. W-honik bikoun el-beke wel-ta2ta2et el-snen."
W-sa2al YASOU3 tlemizo: "fhemto kell hal-shi?" Jewabouh: "na3am"
2allon: "kermel hek, kell wa7ad min mou3allimi el-shari3a bisir telmiz bi-malakout el-sama, byetshabbah la-rab beyt bitalle3 min kanzo eshya jdide w-3ati2a."
Lamma khallas YASOU3 el-7ake bel-amtel,
ra7 min honik w-reje3 3a-balado, w-sar y3allim bel-majma3, fa-ndahasho w-sa2alo ba3don: "min wayn jeyib hal-7ekme w-hal-3ajeyeb?
Hayda mish 2eben el-najjar? Emmo mish esma Maryam, w-ekhewto esmon Ya3koub w-Youssef w-Sem3an w-Yahouza?
Mish kell ekhewto min 3enna? Min wayn jeyib kell hal-shi?
W-rafadouh. Se3eta 2allon YASOU3: "ma fi nabe mkarram bi-balado w-bi-beyto."
W-li2annon ma 2ãmano fih ma 3eml ktir 3ajeyeb honik.
Bi-wa2ta sem3 el-malik Hirodos bi-akhbar YASOU3,
w-2al lal-7ashye taba3o: "hayda You7anna el-ma3maden 2am min el-mawt, kermel hek 3am bisiro hal-3ajeyeb 3a-2ido."
W-ken Hirodos kamash You7anna w-7abaso kermel Hirodiyya mart khayyo Filippos,
li2anno You7anna ken y2ello: "ma bi7e2ellak tetzawwaja."
W-ken baddo ye2tlo, bass khaf min el-nes li2annon keno ye3tebrouh nabe.
W-bi-zekra 3id miled Hirodos, ra2aset benet Hirodiyya bel-7afle, w-3ajabeto la-Hirodos,
w-7alafla enno ra7 ya3tiya shou ma badda.
2aletla emma ta-t2ello: "2addemle 3a-taba2 ras You7anna el-Ma3maden."
Ze3l el-malik, bass bi-ma enno 7alaf eddem el-kell, 2amar ya3touha yeh.
Ba3at jende, 2ata3 ras You7anna bel-7abs,
w-jebo 3a-taba2. W-3atah lal-benet, wel-benet 3ateto la-emma.
W-ejo tlemiz You7anna, w-7emlo el-jette w-dafanouh, w-ra7o ykhabbro YASOU3.
Lamma 3eref YASOU3 bel-khabar, rekb bel-shakhtoura w-ra7 3a-matra7 ye2dar fih ykoun wa7do. Bass el-nes 3erfo wayno, w-le72ouh min el-moudon mashe.
W-lamma nezl min el-shakhtoura w-shef kell hal-nes, shef2 3leyon w-shafa el-marda baynetoun.
W-3ashiye, 2arrabo minno tlemizo w-2aloulo: "t2akhar el-wa2et, w-ne7na b3ad 3an el-day3a, 2oul lal-nes yrou7o yeshtero la-elon 2akl."
Jewabon YASOU3: "ma fi lzoum yrou7o, 3touwon ento shi yeklouh."
2aloulo: "ma 3enna hon ella khams tereghfe w-samakten."
2allon YASOU3: "heto yalle ma3kon."
2amar el-nes ye2e3do 3al-7ashish, akhad el-khams tereghfe wel-samakten, w-rafa3 3youno sawb el-sama w-berak w-kasar el-khebz w-3ata tlemizo, wel-tlemiz 3ato el-nes.
Akalo kellon 7atta sheb3o, w-jama3o tna3shar sallé melyene min el-khebz yalle faddal.
W-ken yalle akalo shi khams-talef rejjel, ma 3ada el-neswen wel-wled.
Ba3den 2amar YASOU3 tlemizo yerkabo el-shakhtoura w-yesba2ouh 3al-shatt el-tene ta-keno fallo el-nes.
Lamma fallo toli3 3al-jabal ta-ysalle la-wa7do. W-be2e wa7do la-3ashiye.
W-kenit ba3adet el-shakhtoura ktir 3an el-shatt wel-mawj 2ewe, li2anno el-hawa ken bi-3aksa.
W-abl tlou3 el-daw, eja YASOU3 la-3and tlemizo meshe 3al-may.
Lamma shefouh meshe 3al-may nra3abo w-2alo: "hayda shaba7!" w-min khawfon sarakho.
Bi-se3eta 2allon YASOU3: "wsa2o, ana houe, ma tkhafo!"
2allo Boutros: "eza hayda enta, ya RAB, 2merne enne eje la-3andak 3al-may."
Jewabo YASOU3: "ta3a." Nezl Boutros min el-shakhtoura w-meshe 3al-may sawb YASOU3.
Bass khaf wa2et yalle shef el-3asfe 2awiye w-ballash yeghra2, w-sarrakh: "khallesne, ya RAB!"
Deghre madd YASOU3 2ido w-masako w-2allo: "ya alil el-imen leysh shakkeyt."
W-lamma tel3o 3al-shakhtoura hedyet el-3asfe.
W-yalle keno bel-shakhtoura raka3o eddemo w-2alo: "mazbout ennak 2eben Allah!"
Wossil YASOU3 w-tlemizo 3ala Jennisarat.
3erfouh ahl el-day3a, w-nasharo el-khabar bel-manta2a kella, w-jebo kell el-marda.
W-talabo minno yesma7lon yelmso 3al-alile taraf tawbo, w-kell yalle lamasouh nshafo.
Ejo la-3and YASOU3 el-ferrisiyyin w-mou3allimi el-shari3a min Ourashalim, w-sa2alouh:
"Leysh tlemizak 3am bikhelfo ta2leed el-2edama, w-ma bighasslo 2ideyon abl el-2akl?"
Jewabon YASOU3: "leysh ento 3am bitkhelfo wassiyet el-RAB kermel ta2aleedkon?
2al el-RAB: "karrem bayyak w-emmak, w-yalle byel3an bayyo aw emmo bimout.
W-ento bit2oulo: "yalle bi2oul la-bayyo aw emmo: el-mouse3ade yalle natrina minne ana 2addamta la-ALLAH,
ma bi3oud meltezim enno ykarrem bayyo aw emmo. W-hek bitkouno lghito kalem ALLAH kermel ta2aleedkon.
Ya mnef2een, Ashe3ya ken ma3o ha2 lamma tnabba 3ankon w-2al:
"Hal-sha3b bikarremne bi-shfefo, bass 2albo b3id 3anne.
3ibedto ele batle w-ta3alimo min el-bashar."
Min ba3da neda YASOU3 el-joumou3 w-2allon: "sma3o w-fhamo:
Yalle bifout bel-temm ma-binajjes el-2ensen, yalle byedhar min el-temm houe yalle binajjso."
2arrabo tlemizo w-2aloulo: "bta3rif enno el-ferrisiyyin nsadamo lamma sem3o kalemak?
Jewabon: "kell shatle mish zere3a bayye el-samewe bten2ala3.
Trekouwon! Henne 3emyen 3am bi2oudo 3emyen. W-eza ken el-a3ma bi2oud el-a3ma, ra7 you2a3o tnayneton bel-joura."
2allo Boutros: "fasserelna hal-matal."
Jewab YASOU3: "ba3dkon la-halla2 ma fhemto?
Ma bta3erfo enno yalle bifout bel-temm, byenzal 3al-batn, w-ba3den byedhar min el-jesm?
Bass yalle byetla3 min el-temm, byeje min el-2alb, w-houe yalle binajjis el-2ensen.
Li2anno min el-2alb btotla3 el-afkar el-3atle: el-2atl wel-zena wel-fe7sh wel-ser2a w-shahedet el-zour wel-namime.
W-hawde henne yalle binajjso el-2ensen. Bass el-akl bi-2iden mish mghassalin, ma binajjis el-2ensen."
Fall YASOU3 min honik w-ra7 3ala manta2et Sour w-Sayda.
2arrabit sawbo mara ken3aniye min haydik el-manta2a w-sarakhet, 2aletlo: "r7amne ya Rab, ya 2eben Daoud! Bente fiya shaytan, 3am bi3azzeba ktir."
Ma jewaba YASOU3 bi-wala kelme. 2arrabo minno tlemizo w-trajjouh, 2aloulo: "shouf shou badda, 7aj le7'2etna bi-sarikha!."
Jewabon YASOU3: "ma ba3atne ALLAH ella lal-khwerif el-day3in min beyt Isra2il."
Bass el-mara ejet la-3ando w-raka3etlo w-2alet: "se3edne, ya Rab!"
2alla YASOU3: "ma bijouz nekhod khebz el-wled w-nzetto lal-kleb."
2aletlo el-mara: "sa7i7, ya Rab! bass el-kleb byeklo min el-ftafit yalle btou2a3 3an tawlet asyedon."
2alla YASOU3: "ma a3zam imenik! Ra7 yet7a'2a2 yalle baddik yeh." W-deghre nshafet benta.
Fall YASOU3 min honik w-eja 3a-shatt ba7r el-Jaleel, w-toli3 3al-jabal w-2a3ad.
Eja la-3ando nes ktir jeybin ma3on 3erj w-3emyen w-mashlouleen w-khers w-ghayron ktar, w-7attouwon eddemo ta-yeshfiyon.
Ndahasho el-nes lamma shefo el-khers 3am ye7ko, wel-3erej wel-mashlouleen 3am yemsho, wel-3emyen 3am ye2sha3o. W-majjado Ileh Isra2il.
Neda YASOU3 tlemizo w-2allon: "ana shef2an 3ala hal-nes, li2anno sarlon tlet tiyyem ma3e, w-ma 3endon shi yeklouh. W-ma badde eb3aton min hon saymin, ta-ma yet3abo 3al-tari2."
2aloulo el-tlemiz: "min wayn badna njeeb khebz yta3me kell hal-nes, w-ne7na bi-matra7 b3id?"
2allon YASOU3: "kam rghif ma3kon?" jewabouh: "sab3 tereghfe w-kamm samke zghar."
Wassa YASOU3 el-nes enno ye2e3do 3al-ard,
akhad el-sab3 tereghfe wel-samket, shakar w-sha2af el-khebz w-3ata tlemizo, wel-tlemiz 3ato el-nes.
Akalo kellon ta-sheb3o, w-jama3o tna3shar sallé melyene min el-khebz yalle faddal.
W-ken yalle akalo shi arba3-talef rejjel, ma 3ada el-neswen wel-wled.
W-ba3at YASOU3 el-nes 3a-byouta w-rekb el-shakhtoura w-ra7 sawb manta2it Majdal.
Eja la-3and YASOU3 el-ferrisiyyin wel-saddoukiyyin ta-ye7erjouh, w-talabo minno yfarjiyon 3ajibe min el-sama.
Jewabon: "3a ghroub el-shams bit2oulo: fi sa7ou, li2anno el-sama 7amra metl el-nar.
Wel-sob7 bit2oulo: liom fi shete, li2anno el-sama sawda. Bta3rfo tmayyzo wejj el-sama, bass 3alemet el-azmineh ma bta3rfo tmayyzouwon.
Jeel 3atel w-sherreer 3am yetlob 3ajibe, w-ma ra7 yen3atalo ella 3alemet Younen." Min ba3da tarakon w-ra7.
Lamma 2ata3o el-tlemiz 3al-shatt el-tene, nesyo yekhdo ma3on khebz,
2allon YASOU3: "ntebho min-khameeret el-ferrisiyyin wel-saddoukiyyin."
Saro y2oulo bi-2albon: "3am bi2oul hal-shi li2anno nsina njeeb ma3na khebz."
3eref YASOU3 yalle bi-2albon w-2allon: "ya alileen el-imen, keef bit2oulo la-7alkon: ma fi ma3na khebz?
Ba3dkon la-halla2 ma fhemto? Nsito el-khams tereghfe lal-khams-talef shakhs w-kamm sallé be2e?
Wel-sab3 tereghfe lal-arba3-talef shakhs w-kamm sallé be2e?
Keef ma fhemto enno ma 3am e7ke 3an el-khebz? Eltelkon ntebho min-khameeret el-ferrisiyyin wel-saddoukiyyin!"
Se3eta fehmo el-tlemiz enno 2allon lezim yentebho min ta3alim el-ferrisiyyin wel-saddoukiyyin mish min khameeret el-khebz.
Lamma wossil YASOU3 3ala dawa7e kaysariyyet Filippos sa2al tlemizo: "meen bikoun 2eben el-2ensen bennesbe lal-nes?"
Jewabouh: "fi nes bi2oulo: You7anna el-ma3maden, w-fi minnon bi2oulo: Eliyya, w-ghayron bi2oul: Ermiya aw-wa7ad min el-anbiya."
2allon: "w-meen ana bi-ra2eykon ento?"
Jewab Sem3an Boutros: "enta el-MASI7 2eben ALLAH el-7ayy."
2allo YASOU3: "niyyelak ya Sem3an 2eben Youna! Li2anno mish el-la7m wel-damm kashafoulak hal-shi, hayda bayye yalle bel-sama.
W-ana b2ellak: enta sakhr, w-3ala hal-sakhr ra7 3ammir kniste, w-bweb el-ja7eem ma ra7 ye2daro 3leya.
Ra7 a3tik mfati7 malakout el-sama. Yalle bterebto 3al-ard bikoun marbout bel-sama, w-yalle bit7ello 3al-ard bikoun ma7loul bel-sama."
W-wassa YASOU3 tlemizo enno ma ykhabro 7ada enno houe el-MASI7.

Min haydak el-wa2et ballash YASOU3 y2oul la-tlemizo enno lezim yrou7 3ala Ourashalim w-yet2allam ktir 3a-2id el-shyoukh w-rou2asa el-kahane w-mou3allimi el-shari3a, w-ra7 ye2tlouh, w-telit yawm ra7 y2oum.
Akhado Boutros 3a-janab w-sar y3atbo w-y2oul: "la sama7 ALLAH, ya RAB! Mish ra7 ysir fik hek!"
Fa-ettala3 YASOU3 bi-Boutros w-2al: "fell min wejje ya shaytan! Enta we2if bi-tari2e, li2anno afkarak hiye afkar el-bashar mish afkar ALLAH."
w-2al YASOU3 la-tlemizo: "yalle baddo yel7a2ne, baddo yenkor nafso w-ye7mol salibo w-yel7a2ne,
li2anno yalle baddo ykhallis nafso ra7 yekhsara, w-yalle ra7 yekhsar 7ayeto kermele ana, ra7 yle2iya.
Shou byestafeed el-2ensen eza reb7 el-3alam kello w-khesr nafso? Aw shou ra7 ya3te el-2ensen badal 3an nafso?
Ra7 yeje 2eben el-2ensen bi-majd bayyo ma3 maleyekto, w-yawmeta ra7 y7aseb kell wa7ad 7asab a3melo.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a: bayn el-mawjoudin hon fi ashkhas ma ra7 ydou2o el-mawt 7atta yshoufo 2eben el-2ensen jeye bi-malakouto."
Min ba3d sitt tiyem akhad YASOU3 Boutros w-Ya3koub w-You7anna khayyo, w-toli3 fiyon la-wa7don 3a-jabal 3ale,
w-tjalla eddemon, w-sar wejjo msha3sha3 metl el-shams w-saro tyebo beed metl el-nour.
Faj2a shefo Moussa w-Eliyya 3am ye7ko ma3 YASOU3.
2al Boutros la-YASOU3: "ya RAB, shou 7elo nkoun hon: eza baddak, ba3mil hon tlet khiyam: we7de elak w-we7de la-Moussa w-we7de la-Eliyya."
W-houe w-3am ye7ke, bteje ghayme msha3sh3a w-bitghattiyon, w-byesma3o sawt min el-ghayme 3am bi2oul: "hayda houe 2ebne el-7abib yalle rdeet 3anno, sma3oulo!"
W-lamma sem3o el-tlemiz el-sawt wa2a3o 3ala wejjon bel-ard w-khafo ktir.
2arrab minnon YASOU3, 7att 2ido 3leyon w-2allon: "2oumo, ma-tkhafo."
Rafa3o 3younon, w-ma shefo ella YASOU3 wa7do.
W-henne w-nezleen min el-jabal, wassahon YASOU3 w-2al: "ma tkhabro 7ada 3an yalle sheftouh ta-ken 2am 2eben el-2ensen min el-mawt"
Sa2alouh el-tlemiz: "leysh bi2oulo mou3allimi el-shari3a: lezim yeje Eliyya bel-awwal?"
Jewabon: "mbala, lezim Eliyya yeje w-ysalle7 kell shi.
Bass ana b2elkon: eja Eliyya w-ma 3erfouh, w-3emlo fih metl ma baddoun. W-nafs el-shi 2eben el-2ensen ra7 yet2allam 3ala 2ideyon."
Se3eta fehmo el-tlemiz enno ken 3am ye7kiyon 3an You7anna el-ma3maden.
Lamma rej3o la-3and el-nes, 2arrab sawbo rejjel w-raka3 eddemo
w-2allo: "r7am 2ebne ya Rab, li2anno byou2a3 bel-no2ta w-byet3azzab ktir. W-aw2at ktir byou2a3 bel-nar aw bel-may.
W-jebto la-3and tlemizak, w-ma edro yeshfouh."
Jewab YASOU3: "ya hal-jeel el-3atel yalle ma bi2ãmen! La-aymata ra7 eb2a ma3kon? W-la-aymata ra7 et7ammalkon? Jibo el-sabe la-hon!"
W-haddad YASOU3 el-shaytan, w-dahar min el-sabe, fa-nshafa deghre.
Se3eta akhadouh el-tlemiz 3a-janab w-sa2alouh: "leysh ne7na ma ederna ndahhro?"
Jewabon: "min 2ellit imenkon! B2elkon el-7a2i2a: law ken 3endkon imen 2add 7abbit el-khardal, kento 2elto la-hal-jabal: zee7 min hon la-honik, bizee7, w-ma bikoun fi shi mousta7il bennesbe elkon.
[Bass hal-naw3 min el-shyateen ma byedhar ella bel-sala wel-sawm]."
Keno el-tlemiz mejtem3in bel-Jaleel, 2allon YASOU3: "ra7 yetsallam 2eben el-2ensen la-2iden el-nes,
w-ra7 ye2tlouh, w-telit yawm ra7 y2oum min el-mawt. Ze3lo el-tlemiz ktir.
W-lamma reje3 YASOU3 w-tlemizo 3ala Kfarna7oum, ejo yalle bilemmo daribet el-haykal la-3and Boutros w-sa2alouh: "m3allemkon ma byedfa3 daribet el-haykal?"
Jewab: "mbala." W-lamma fet Boutros 3al-beyt, sa2alo YASOU3: "Shou ra2yak, ya Sem3an? Min meen byekhdo moulouk el-ard el-daribe aw el-jezye? Min wledon aw min el-ghouraba?"
2allo Boutros: "min el-ghouraba." 2allo YASOU3: "fa-ezan, el-wled ma3fiyyin.
Bass ne7na ma badna ne7roj 7ada, kermel hek rou7 3al-ba7r w-zett el-sennara, w-msok awwal samke bte3la2 w-fta7la temma, ra7 tle2e fi arba3 darahem, khedon w-dfa3lon yehon 3anne w-3annak."
Bi-haydak el-wa2et 2arrabo el-tlemiz la-3and YASOU3 w-sa2alouh: "meen houe el-a3zam bi-malakout el-sama?"
Jeb YASOU3 tofl la-3ando w-wa'2afo bayneton
w-2al: "b2elkon el-7a2i2a, eza ma ra7 tetghayyaro w-tsiro metl hal-atfal, ma ra7 tfouto 3a-malakout el-sama.
Yalle byetwada3 w-bisir metl hal-tofl, bikoun houe el-a3zam bi-malakout el-sama.
W-yalle bye2bal bi-esme tofl metlo, bikoun 2ebelne ana.
Yalle bishakkek 7ada min hal-zghar, yalle bi2ãmno fiyye, a7sanlo enno y3al2oulo bi-ra2ebto 7ajar el-ta7oun w-yzettouh bel-ba7r.
Ya weyl el-3alam yalle bishakkeko el-nes! La-bodd enno yetshakkako, bass ya weyl yalle bikoun houe el-sabab.

Eza 2idak aw ejrak kenit sabab lal-khatiyye, 2ta3a w-sheela 3annak, li2anno ba3do a7sanlak enno tfout 3al-7ayet el-abadiyye bi-2id we7de aw bi-ejer we7de, min enno ykoun 3endak 2idten w-ejerten w-tenkab bel-nar el-abadiyye.
W-eza 3aynak kenit sabab lal-khatiyye, 2la3a w-sheela, li2anno ba3do a7sanlak enno tfout 3al-7ayet el-abadiyye w-3endak 3eyn we7de, min enno ykoun 3endak 3eynten w-tenkab bi-nar jhannam.
2ou3a te7te2ro 7ada min hal-zghar. B7ebb 2elkon: enno maleyketon bel-sama 3am bishoufo kell el-wa2et wejj bayye yalle bel-sama.
[Fa-2eben el-2ensen eja ta-ykhallis yalle ray7in 3al-halek].
"W-shou awlkon? Eza ken rejjel 3endo miyyet kharouf w-da3 wa7ad minnon, ma byetrok el-tes3a w-tes3een bel-7rash, w-birou7 yfattesh 3an el-kharouf el-daye3?
W-eza le2eh, ma byefra7 fih? B2elkon el-7a2i2a: enno byefra7 fih aktar min fara7o bel-tes3a-w-tes3een yalle ma da3o.
W-hek bayykon yalle bel-sama ma baddo enno 7ada min hal-zghar ymout.
"Eza khote khayyak, rou7 la-3ando w-3atbo minnak elo, w-eza seme3lak bitkoun rbe7et khayyak.
W-eza rafad yesma3lak, khod ma3ak wa7ad aw tnen, 7atta tsabbit kell shi bi-shahedit tnen aw tlete.
W-eza rafad yesma3lon, 2oul lal-knise, w-eza kamen rafad yesma3 lal-knise, 3tebro wathane aw bilemm darayib.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a: kell yalle bterebtouh 3al-ard bikoun marbout bel-sama, w-yalle bit7ellouh 3al-ard bikoun ma7loul bel-sama.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a: eza ettafa2o tnen minkon 3al-ard enno yetolbo shi min bayye yalle bel-sama, ra7 ya3tyon yeh.
Li2anno matra7 ma byejtem3o tnen aw tlete bi-esme, bkoun ana bayneton.
Se3eta 2arrab Boutros w-2al la-YASOU3: "ya RAB, kamm marra badde oghfor la-khayye lamma byokhte bi-7a'2e? Sab3 marrat?"
Jewabo YASOU3: "mish sab3 marrat, ghferlo sab3een marra sab3 marrat.
Malakout el-sama byetshabbah la-malik baddo y7aseb 3abeedo.
W-lamma ballash y7asebon, jeboulo wa7ad minnon elo 3le 3ashr-talef derham min el-fodda.
W-ken ma ma3o yedfa3, fa-2amar el-malik enno yenbe3 houe w-marto w-wledo w-kell shi ma3o, 7atta youwfe dayno.
Raka3 hal-3abd eddemo w-2allo: 3tine wa2et w-boufik kell shi 3leyye.
Shef2 3le el-malik w-falato w-3afeh min el-dayn.
W-lamma dahar el-rejjel lta2a bi-wa7ad min ref2ato el-3abeed yalle ken elo 3le miyyet dinar, kamasho bi-khweni2o w-2allo: reddele yalle ele 3lek!
Raka3 rfi2o w-sar yetrajjeh w-y2oul: 3tine wa2et, w-ra7 reddelak kell shi.
Bass ma 2ebel ma3o, akhado, 7atto bel-7abs 7atta youwfe dayno.
W-shefo ref2ato el-3abeed yalle sar, ze3lo ktir w-ra7o khabbaro el-malik bi-kell shi sar.
Se3eta ba3at el-malik wara el-3abd w-2allo: ya hal-3abd el-sherreer! Ana 3afaytak min kell daynak, li2annak trajjaytne.
Ma ken lezim enta kamen ter7am rfi2ak metl ma ana ra7amtak?
Ghodib el-malik ktir, w-sallamo lal-jelledeen 7atta youwfe kell dayno.
W-hek bya3mil bayye el-samewe fikon eza mish kell wa7ad minkon ghafar la-khayyo min kell 2albo."
Lamma 2al YASOU3 hal-kalem w-khallas, tarak el-Jaleel w-eja 3ala dawa7e el-Yahoudiyye min wara el-Ordon.
W-le7'2ouh nes ktir, w-shafehon honik.
Eja la-3ando kamm wa7ad min el-ferrisiyyin wel-saddoukiyyin ta-ye7erjouh, 2aloulo: "masmou7 lal-rejjel enno ytalle2 marto la-ayya sabab?"
Jewabon YASOU3: "ma 2rito enno el-khale2 min el-bideye khala2on mara w-rejjel
w-2al: kermel hek byetrok el-rejjel bayyo w-emmo w-byette7ed bi-marto, w-bisiro el-tnen jesm wa7ad?
Ma bi3oudo tnen, bisiro jesm wa7ad. W-yalle byejma3o ALLAH ma bifarr2o 2ensen."
Sa2alouh el-ferrisiyyin: "leysh Moussa wassa enno ya3te el-rejjel marto kteb el-tala2 w-se3eta bitalle2a?
Jewabon YASOU3: "bi-sabab 2asewet 2loubkon sama7elkon Moussa enno ettal2o neswenkon. W-ma kenit el-eshya hek min abl.
W-ana b2elkon: yalle bitalle2 marto ella bi-7alet el-zena w-byetzawwaj ghayra byezne."
2aloulo tlemizo: "eza ken hek 7alet el-rejjel ma3 el-mara, a7sanlo enno ma yetzawwaj."
Jewabon YASOU3: "ma bye2bal hal-kalem ella yalle n3atalon ennon yefhamouh.
Fi nes khallafeton emmeton 3ejzeen 3an el-zawej, w-fi minnon el-nes khallouhon ysiro hek, w-fi nes ghayron ma byetzawwajo kermel malakout el-sama. Yefham yalle bye2dar yefham."
W-jeboulo atfal 7atta y7ott 2idey 3leyon w-ysalle, bass el-tlemiz ba3adouwon.
Se3eta 2al YASOU3: "khallo el-atfal yejo la-3ande w-ma temna3ouwon, li2anno malakout el-sama la-yalle metlon."
W-7att 2idey 3leyon w-fall min honik.
Eja la-3ando shabb w-2allo: "ya hal-mou3allim el-sale7, shou lezim a3mil shi sale7 ta-le2e el-7ayet el-abadiyye?"
Jewabo YASOU3: "leysh 3am tes2alne 3an shou houe sale7? Ma fi sale7 ella wa7ad. Eza baddak tle2e el-7ayet mshi 3al-wassaya."
2allo: "ayya wassaya?" 2allo YASOU3: "ma te2tol, ma tezne, ma tesro2, ma tesh'had bel-zour,
karrem bayyak w-emmak, 7ebb 2aribak metl ma bit7ebb nafsak."
2allo el-shabb: "hawde kellon meshe 3leyon, shou ba3d na2esne?"
Jewabo YASOU3: "eza baddak tkoun kemil, rou7 bi3 kell shi btemelko w-3tyon lal-fou2ara, bisir 3endak kanz bel-sama, w-ta3a l7a2ne!"
Lamma sem3 el-shabb hal-kalem, fall 7azeen li2anno ken 3endo amlek ktire.
Se3eta 2al YASOU3 la-tlemizo: "b2elkon el-7a2i2a, sa3be ktir 3al-ghane enno yfout 3a-malakout el-sama.
W-b2elkon kamen ahwan 3al-jamal enno yfout bi-kherm el-2ebre min enno yfout el-ghane 3a-malakout el-sama."
T3ajjabo el-tlemiz ktir min hal-kalem w-2alo: "eza hek, meen bye2dar yle2e el-khalãs?"
Ettalla3 fiyon YASOU3 w-2allon: "hayda mousta7il 3end el-nes, bass kell shi moumkin 3end ALLAH."
Se3eta 2allo Boutros: "ne7na tarakna kell shi w-l7e2nek, shou ra7 ykoun massirna?"

Jewab YASOU3: "b2elkon el-7a2i2a: boukra lamma bye2'3od 2eben el-2ensen 3ala 3arsh majdo ta-yjadded kell shi, ra7 te2e3do ento kamen 3ala tna3shar 3arsh ta-etdeeno 2abeyel Isra2il el-tna3sh, li2anno l7e2toune.
Kell meen byetrok byout, aw ekhwe aw khayyet, aw bayy, aw emm, aw wled, aw 72oul, kermel esme, ra7 yekhod 2addon miyyet marra w-yourat el-7ayet el-abadiyye.
Ktar min el-ouwal ra7 ysiro awekher, w-yalle henne awekher ra7 ysiro ouwal.
"Malakout el-sama byetshabbah la-sa7ib karm ra7 el-sob7 bakkir ta-yjeeb 3emmel la-karmo.
Ettafa2 ma3 el-3emmel 3ala dinar bel-yawm w-ba3aton 3a-karmo.
W-min ba3da ra7 el-se3a tes3a, w-shef 3emmel ghayron 2e3deen bel-se7a bala sheghl.
2allon: rou7o ento kamen 3a-karme, ba3tikon 2add ma-bi7e2elkon,
w-ra7o. W-reje3 ra7 kamen el-dohr, sawb el-se3a tlete, w-3eml nafs el-shi.
W-ekher shi ra7 sawb el-se3a khamse el-masa, w-le2a 3emmel ghayron 2e3deen honik, 2allon: shou bekon 2e3deen hon kell el-nhar bala sheghl?
2aloulo: ma 7ada shaghalna. 2allon: rou7o ento kamen 3ala karme.
W-lamma sar 3ashiye, 2al sa7ib el-karm la-wakeelo: b3at wara el-3emmel kellon w-dfa3lon 2ejreton, ballesh yalle ejo bel-ekher ta-tousal la-yalle ejo bel-awwal.
Ejo yalle shtaghalo min el-se3a khamse el-masa w-akhad kell wa7ad minnon dinar.
W-lamma ejo el-ouwal, fakkaro enno ra7 yekhdo aktar, bass akhado henne kamen kell wa7ad dinar.
Henne w-3am ye2bado saro ysher3o sa7ib el-karm,
w-saro y2oulo: yalle ejo ekher shi shtaghalo se3a we7de, w-enta sewayton fina ne7na yalle t3ebna kell el-nhar bel-shawb.
Radd w-2al la-wa7ad minnon: ya sadee2e, ana ma ettafa2et ma3ak 3ala dinar?
Khod 7a2ak w-rou7. Badde a3te yalle eja bel-ekher metlak,
ma bi7e2elle etsarraf bi-mesriyyete metl ma badde? Aw enta 7asoud li2anno ana karim?"
W-2al YASOU3: "w-hek bisiro el-awekher ouwal wel-ouwal awekher."
W-ken YASOU3 tali3 3ala Ourashalim, jtama3 bi-tlemizo el-tna3sh la-wa7don, w-bel-tari2 2allon:
"Ne7na halla2 tal3in 3ala Ourashalim, w-2eben el-2ensen ra7 yetsallam la-rou2asa el-kahane w-mou3allimi el-shari3a, w-ra7 ye7ekmo 3le bel-mawt
w-ra7 ysalmouh lal-ghouraba, ta-yetmaskharo 3le w-yejeldouh w-yoselbouh, w-telit yawm ra7 y2oum."
Ejet la-3ando emm Ya3koub w-You7anna wled Zabada w-ma3a wleda el-tnen, w-n7anet eddemo ta-tetlob minno shi.
2alla: "shou baddik?" 2alet: "2mor enno ye2e3do wlede el-tnen, wa7ad 3ala yameenak w-wa7ad 3ala shmelak bi-mamlaktak."
Jewab YASOU3: "ento ma bta3erfo shou 3am tetolbo. Bte2daro teshrabo el-kes yalle ra7 eshrabo?" 2aloulo: "mne2dar!"
2allon: "kese ra7 teshrabouh, bass ennkon te2e3do 3ala yameene aw 3ala shmele, hal-shi mish ana yalle ba3tih, li2anno hal-matra7 houe la-yalle m7addaro elon bayye."
W-lamma sem3o el-tlemiz el-3ashra hal-shi, ghodbo 3al-khayyen.
Se3eta jama3on YASOU3 w-2allon: "bta3erfo enno el-rou2asa 7ekmeen el-oumam, w-enno el-3ouzama metsalltin 3leyon,
bass ento ma tkhallo hal-shi ykoun baynetkon. Yalle baddo ykoun kbir, ykoun khadimkon.
W-yalle baddo ysir el-awwal fikon, ykoun 3abd 3endkon:
Hek 2eben el-2ensen ma eja 7atta yenkhadam, eja ta-yekhdom w-yefde bi-7ayeto nes ktar."
Henne w-tal3in min Ari7a, nes ktir le7'2o YASOU3.
W-sem3o tnen 3emyen 2e3deen 3ala 7affit el-tari2 enno YASOU3 meri2 min honik, saro ysarkho: "r7amna ya Rab, ya 2eben Daoud!"
Saro el-nes ysakktouwon. Bass saro ysarrkho aktar: "r7amna, ya Rab, ya 2eben Daoud!"
We2f YASOU3 w-nedehon, 2allon: "shou badkon a3mellkon?"
Jewabouh: "fta7elna 3younna, ya Rab!"
Fa-shef2 YASOU3 3leyon w-lamas 3younon, w-deghre saro ye2sha3o w-le72ouh.
Lamma 2arrabo min Ourashalim w-woslo 3a-beyt Faji bi-jabal el-zeytoun, ba3at YASOU3 tnen min tlemizo,
w-2allon: "rou7o 3al-day3a yalle bi-wejjkon, bitle2o 7mara marbouta w-ma3a el-ja7sh, fekkouwon w-jiboule yehon.
W-eza 7ada 2alkon shi, 2ouloulo: "el-RAB 3ayezon, w-ra7 yreddon bi-ser3a."
W-hal-shi ken ta-ysir yalle 2alo el-nabe:
"2oulo la-benet Sehyoun: hayda malikik jeye la-3andik metwadi3 rekib 3ala 7mara w-ja7sh 2eben 7mara."
Ra7o el-telmizen w-3emlo metl ma 2amaron YASOU3
jebo el-7mara wel-ja7sh, 7atto 3a-dahron mashale7on, w-toli3 YASOU3 2a3ad 3leyon.
W-farasho nes ktar tyebon 3al-tari2, w-minnon 2ata3o ghsoun el-shajar w-farasho fiya el-ard.
W-kenit el-nes el-meshye eddemo w-yalle le7'2ouh 3am bihayyso w-y2oulo: "el-majd la-2eben Daoud! Yetberak el-jeye bi-esm el-RAB! El-majd bel-a3ali!"
W-lamma fet YASOU3 3a-Ourashalim dajjet el-madine kella w-sa2alet: "meen hayda?"
Wel-nes tjewib: "hayda el-nabe YASOU3 min el-Nassira bel-Jaleel."
Fet YASOU3 3al-haykal w-sha7at kell yalle 3am bibee3o w-yeshtero bel-haykal, w-2alab tawlet el-serrafeh w-karase biyye3in el-7amem,
w-2allon: "maktoub, beyte beyt sala, w-ento 3meltouh mgharet lsous!"
W-ejo la-3ando el-3erj wel-3emyen 3al-haykal w-shafehon.
Bass rou2asa el-kahane w-mou3allimi el-shari3a wa2et shefo el-3ajeyeb yalle 3emla, wel-wled bel-haykal 3am bi-hayyso: "el-majd la-2eben Daoud!" akhad 3a-khateron.
W-2aloulo: "3am tesma3 shou 3am bi2oulo?" Jewabon: "eh, ma 2rito shou maktoub, min temm el-zghar wel-atfal 3melt nashid?"
Min ba3da tarakon w-fall min el-madine 3a-Beyt-3anya w-nem honik.
Wel-sob7 houe w-reji3 3al-madine, je3.
Shef shajret teen 3a-janb el-tari2, ma le2a fiya gher el-wara2. 2alla: "ma ra7 ta3te teen lal-abad!" W-yebset el-teene deghre.
Shefo el-tlemiz yalle sar, t3ajjabo w-2alo: "keef yebset el-teene deghre?"

Jewabon YASOU3: "b2elkon el-7a2i2a, law ken 3endkon imen w-ma bitshekko, kento 3melto bi-hal-teene metl ma ana 3melt, mish bas hek, kento 2elto la-hal-jabal: 2oum w-zett 7alak bel-ba7r, w-ken hal-shi sar.
Kell shi btetolbouh bi-imen, ra7 tekhdouh."
Fet YASOU3 3al-haykal w-houe w-3am bi3allim, ejo la-3ando rou2asa el-haykal w-shyoukh el-sha3b w-2aloulo: "bi-ayya soultan 3am ta3mil hal-eshya? W-meen 3atak hal-soultan?"
Jewabon YASOU3: "w-ana bes2alkon sou2al wa7ad, eza jewabtoune 3le, b2elkon bi-ayya soultan ba3mil hal-shi:
min wayn jeye soultet ma3moudiyyet You7anna? Min el-sama aw min el-nes?" 2alo bi-2albon: "eza 2elna min ALLAH, ra7 yjewebna: leysh ma 2ãmanto fih?
W-eza 2elna min el-nes, menkhaf min el-sha3b, li2anno kellon bye3tebro You7anna nabe."
Fa-jewabo YASOU3: "ma mna3rif." 2allon: "w-ana ma-ra7 2elkon bi-ayya soultan ba3mil hal-a3mel."
2al YASOU3: "shou ra2eykon? Ken la-rejjel waladen. Eja la-3and el-awwal w-2allo: ya 2ebne, rou7 liom w-shteghel bi-karme.
Jewabo: ma badde. Bass ba3den nedm w-ra7 3al-karm.
W-eja el-2eben el-tene w-talab minno bayyo zet el-shi, fa-jewabo: ana raye7, ya Rab! Bass ma reje3 ra7.
Fa-ayya wa7ad minnon 3eml metl ma baddo bayyo?" 2alo: "el-awwal." 2allon YASOU3: "B7ebb 2elkon, yalle bilemmo el-darayib w-yalle byezno byesba2oukon 3ala malakout ALLAH.
Eja la-3andkon You7anna meshe bi-tari2 el-7a2i2a w-ma sadda2touh w-sadda2ouh yalle bilemmo el-darayib w-yalle byezno. W-ento 7atta min ba3d ma shefto hal-shi, la ndemto wala sadda2touh."
"Sma3o matal tene: zara3 rejjel karm, w-sayyajo w-7afar fih ma3sara w-3ammar berj w-sallamo la-kerramin w-sefar.
W-lamma eja yawm el-2atf, ba3at kheddemo la-3andon ta-yekhdo el-ghallé.
Ejo el-kerramin w-kamasho el-kheddem w-darabo wa7ad minnon, w-2atalo wa7ad, w-rajamo wa7ad ghayron bel-7jara.
Ba3at kheddem ghayron 3adadon aktar min yalle ba3aton bel-awwal, w-sar fiyon metl ma sar bel-hawdik.
W-ekher shi ba3atlon 2ebno w-2al: ra7 ykhafo min 2ebne.
W-lamma shefo el-kerramin el-2eben 2alo bayn ba3don: hayda houe yalle ra7 yourat! Ta3o ne2etlo w-nekhod el-werte!
Masakouh w-zattouh barrat el-karm w-2atalouh.
Shou bya3mil rabb el-karm bi-hal-kerramin bass yerja3?"
2aloulo: "bye2tol el-ashrar w-bisallem el-karm la-kerramin ghayron bya3touh el-ghallé bi-wa2ta."
Fa-2allon YASOU3: "ma 2rito bel-ketob el-m2addase: el-7ajar yalle rafadouh el-me3marjiyye sar ras el-zewye? Hayda yalle 3emlo el-RAB, shi 3ajib!
Kermel hek b2elkon: ra7 yettekhad malakout ALLAH minkon w-yen3ata la-sha3b tene bikhallih yethmor.
W-yalle byou2a3 3al-7ajar byetkassar. W-yalle byou2a3 el-7ajar 3le byeherso.
W-lamma sem3o rou2asa el-kahane wel-ferrisiyyin hal-matalen min YASOU3, fehmo enno 2asadon bi-kalemo.
Ken baddon yel2atouh, bass khafo min el-nes li2anno keno ye3tebrouh nabe.
Reje3 YASOU3 ye7ke el-nes bel-amtel,
w-2al: "byeshbah malakout el-sama malik 3eml 3azeeme la-3ers 2ebno.
Ba3at kheddemo y2oulo lal-ma3zoumin yejo 3al-3ers, rafado ennon yejo.
Ba3at kheddem ghayron la-y2oulo lal-mad3ouwwin: 7addaret walime daba7et el-ba2ar w-3joule el-nas7een w-kell shi sar jehiz, ta3o 3al-3ers!
Bass el-ma3zoumin ma ktaraso, minnon meen toli3 3ala 7a2lo, w-minnon meen ra7 3ala tijarto,
wel-be2yin mesko kheddemo sabbouwon w-2atalouwon.
Ghodib el-malik w-ba3at jeysho, w-mawwat hal-mejrmeen w-7ara2 madineton.
W-min ba3da 2al la-kheddemo: el-walime jehze bass el-ma3zoumin ma-byest7e2o,
tla3o 3al-tor2at w-3zemo lal-walime kell meen btetle2o fih.
Ra7o el-kheddem bel-tor2at w-jama3o kell yalle lta2o fiyon min 3atleen w-mne7, w-ntala el-3ers bel-ma3zoumin.
W-lamma fet el-malik la-yshouf el-ma3zoumin, le2a rejjel mish lebis tyeb el-3ers. 2allo:
Keef fetet la hon, ya sadee2e, w-enta mish lebis tyeb el-3ers? Sakat el-rejjel.
Se3eta 2al el-malik lal-kheddem: "rbetoulo 2idey w-ejrey w-7ottouh barra bel-3atme, li2anno honik bikoun el-beke wel-ta2ta2et el-snen.
Li2anno el-ma3zoumeen ktar, bass el-moukhtarin 2lel."
Ra7o el-ferrisiyyin w-tshewaro keef baddon yel2ato YASOU3 3ala shi kelme.
Fa-ba3ato la-3ando kamm wa7ad min tlemizon wel-hirodosiyyin ta-y2oulo: "ya mou3allim, mna3rif ennak sade2, bit3allim tari2 ALLAH bel-7a2, w-ma 7ada bi2asser 3lek, li2anno ma bihemmak mazaher el-nes.
2elna: shou ra2yak? Bi7e2elna nedfa3 el-jezye la-2aysar aw la2?"
3eref YASOU3 khabsaneton, w-2allon: "ya mnef2een! Leysh 3am bitjarrboune?
Farjoune 3emlit el-jezye!" 3atouh dinar.
2allon: "la-meen hal-soura w-hal-esm?"
2alo: "la-2aysar!" 2allon: "dfa3o, fa-ezan, la-2aysar yalle houe la-2aysar, w-la-ALLAH yalle houe la-ALLAH!"
Fa-t3ajjabo min yalle sem3ouh, w-tarakouh w-fallo.
Bi-haydak el-yawm eja la-3and YASOU3 kamm wa7ad min el-saddou2iyyin, w-henne yalle ma bi2ãmno bel-2iyeme, w-sa2alouh:
"Ya mou3allim, 2al Moussa: eza met rejjel ma 3endo walad, khayyo byetzawwajlo marto 7atta yjeeb minna wled 3a esm khayyo.
Ken fi sab3 ekhwe, tzawwaj el-awwal w-met bidoun ma yjeeb wled, w-tarak marto la-khayyo.
W-metlo el-tene wel-telit lal-sebi3.
Min ba3d ma meto kellon, metit el-mara.
La-ayya wa7ad minnon bitkoun hal-zawje bel-2iyeme? Li2anna kenit la-elon kellon."
Jewabon YASOU3: "ento gheltanin, li2annkon ma bta3erfo el-ketob el-m2addase w-2ouwwet ALLAH.
Li2anno bel-2iyeme el-nes ma byetzawajo, bikouno metl maleyke bel-sama.
W-bennesbe la-2iyemet el-mawta, ma 2rito shou 2allkon ALLAH:
ana Ileh Ibrahim, Is7ak, w-Ya3koub? W-ma ken ALLAH Ileh el-mawta, houe Ileh el-3ayshin."
W-sem3o el-nes hal-haki, w-t3ajjabo min ta3limo.
W-3erfo el-ferrisiyyin enno YASOU3 balkam el-saddou2iyyin, fa-jtama3o sawa.
Wa7ad minnon sa2alo, w-houe min 3oulama el-shari3a, ta-yjarrbo:
"Ya mou3allim, shou hiye a3zam wasiyye bel-shari3a?"
Jewabo YASOU3: "7ebb el-RAB Ilehak min kell 2albak, w-min kell nafsak, w-min kell 3a2lak.
Hayde awwal wassiye w-ahamma we7de.
Wel-wassiye el-tenye bteshbaha: 7ebb 2aribak metl ma bit7eb 7alak.
Hal-wassiyten henne ases el-shari3a kella w-ta3alim el-anbiya."
W-fi yawm keno el-ferrisiyyin mejtem3in, sa2alon YASOU3:
"Shou ra2ykon bel-MASI7? 2eben meen houe?" 2alo: "2eben Daoud!"
2allon: "fa-ezan, keef bisammih Daoud Rabbo, lamma bi2oul bi-wa7e min el-ROU7 EL-2ODOS:
2al el-RAB la-Rabbe: 23od 3an yameene 7atta khalle a3de2ak ta7t ejrek?
Eza ken Daoud bisamme el-MASI7 RAB, fa-keef bikoun el-MASI7 2ebno?"
Ma edr 7adan yjewbo bi-kelme, min haydak el-yawm ma 3ad 7ada tjarra2 yes2alo shi.
W-7eke YASOU3 el-nes w-tlemizo,
2allon: "mou3allimi el-shari3a wel-ferrisiyyin 2e3deen 3ala 3arsh Moussa,
3melo kell shi bi2ouloulkon yeh. Bass ma ta3emlo metlon, li2annon yalle bi2oulouh ma bya3emlouh:
byerebto 7moule t2ile w-bi7ettouwon 3ala ktef el-nes, bass ma bi7arrko 2esba3on ta-yse3do el-nes.
Henne ma bya3emlo shi ella lal-mazaher: biwass3o el-7ijeb 3ala jbinon, w-bitawwlo shrarib tyebon,
bi7ebbo karase el-sharaf bel-waleyem w-enno ye2e3do eddem bel-majeme3
wel-salemet bel-se7at, w-bi7ebbo ysammouwon el-nes mou3allimin.
Bass ento ma tkhallo 7ada ysammikon mou3allim, li2annkon kellkon ekhwe w-3endkon mou3allim wa7ad.
W-ma t2oulo la-7adan 3al-ard ya bayyna, li2anno elkon bayy wa7ad houe yalle bel-sama.
W-ma tkhallo 7ada y2elkon: ya Rab, li2anno elkon sayyid wa7ad w-houe el-MASI7.
Khalle ykoun akbar wa7ad fikon khadim elkon.
Li2anno yalle bi3alle 7alo byetwatta, w-yalle biwatte 7alo byet3alla.
Ya weylkon ya mou3allimi el-shari3a wel-ferrisiyyin el-mnef2een! 3am tsakkro malakout el-sama bi-wejj el-nes, la ento ra7 tfouto, wala ra7 tkhallo ghayrkon yfout.
[Ya weylkon ya mou3allimi el-shari3a wel-ferrisiyyin el-mnef2een! 3am tiser2o byout el-araml w-ento 3am ta3emlo 7alkon 3am tsallo, ra7 tkoun deynounetkon 2assye].

Ya weylkon ya mou3allimi el-shari3a wel-ferrisiyyin el-mnef2een! Bitsefro bel-ba7r wel-barr ta-terba7o shakhs wa7ad w-ysir Yahoude metlkon, w-eza zabatit ma3kon, bitkhallouh ysir 2eben jhannam, 2addkon 3a-marteyn!
Ya weylkon ento ya hal-kouwwed el-3emyen! Bit2oulo: yalle bye7lof bel-haykal ma byeltezim bi-shi, bass yalle bye7lof bi-dahab el-haykal sar moulzam bi-7elfeno.
Shou yalle a3zam, ya 3emyen 3an el-7a2i2a? El-dahab aw el-haykal yalle bi2addes el-dahab?
Bit2oulo: yalle bye7lof bel-mazba7 ma byeltezim bi-shi, bass yalle bye7lof bel-2erben yalle 3al-mazba7 sar moulzam bi-7elfeno.
Shou yalle a3zam, ya 3emyen? El-2erben aw el-mazba7 yalle bi2addes el-2erben?
Mish sheyfin enno yalle bye7lof bel-mazba7 bye7lof fih w-bi-kell shi 3le,
w-yalle bye7lof bel-haykal bye7lof fih w-bi-ALLAH el-seken fih,
w-yalle bye7lof bel-sama bye7lof bi-3arsh ALLAH w-bel-2e3id 3al-3arsh?

Ya weylkon ya mou3allimi el-shari3a wel-ferrisiyyin el-moura2in! Btedfa3o daribet el-na3na3 wel-za3tar wel-kammoun, w-btehemlo ahamma shi bel-shari3a: el-3adl wel-ra7me wel-amene, w-ken lezim ta3emlo hayde bidoun ma tehemlo haydik.
Ya hal-kouwwed el-3emyen! Bitsaffo el-may min el-7asharat, w-btebla3o el-jamal.
Ya weylkon ya mou3allimi el-shari3a wel-ferrisiyyin el-mnef2een! Bitnaddfo el-kes wel-sa7n min barra, w-henne min jouwwa melyenin nahb w-tama3.
Ya hal-ferrise el-a3ma! Naddef awwal shi el-kes min jouwwa, se3eta byendaf min barra kamen.
Ya weylkon ya mou3allimi el-shari3a wel-ferrisiyyin el-mnef2een! ento metl el-2bour el-mkallase, min barra 7elwe w-min jouwwa melyene 3dam mawta w-fased.
W-ento kamen, bitbayyno lal-nes ennkon mne7 w-jouwwetkon kello kezb w-sharr.
Ya weylkon ya mou3allimi el-shari3a wel-ferrisiyyin el-mnef2een! Bit3ammro 2bour el-anbiya w-bitzayno madefen el-abrar,
w-bit2oulo: law 3eshna bi-wa2et bayyetna, ma kenna sheraknehon bi-damm el-anbiya.
W-hek bitkouno 3am tesh'hado 3ala 7alkon ennkon wled yalle 2atalo el-anbiya.
Kammlo ento yalle ballasho fih bayyetkon ta-yetfa7 el-kayl.
Ya 7ayyet! keef ra7 teherbo min deynounet jhannam?
Kermel hek ra7 eb3atelkon anbiya w-rjel 7ekme w-mou3allimin, ra7 te2etlouwon w-teselbouwon, w-tejeldouwon bi-majeme3kon w-ra7 tel7a2ouwon min madine la madine,
7atta you2a3 3leykon kell damm bari2 nhadar 3al-ard, min damm Habeel el-bari2 la-damm Zakariyya 2eben Barakhiyya yalle 2ataltouh bayn el-mazba7 w-beyt ALLAH.
B7ebb 2elkon: hayda kello ra7 you2a3 3ala hayda el-jeel!
"Ourashalim, Ourashalim! Ente yalle bte2etle el-anbiya w-bterjme el-moursalin la-3andik. Kamm marra 7abbet ejma3 wledik, metl ma btejma3 el-djeje wleda ta7t jne7a, w-ma 2belte.
Hayda houe beytkon matrouk elkon metl el-kherbe.
B7ebb 2elkon: mish ra7 tshoufoune ella yawm yalle bit2oulo: yetberak yalle jeye bi-esm el-RAB."
W-fall YASOU3 min el-haykal. W-houe w-3am yeb3od, 2arrabo sawbo tlemizo w-lafatoulo nazaro 3ala 3amar el-haykal.
2allon YASOU3: "sheyfin hayda kello? B2elkon el-7a2i2a: mish ra7 yentarak 7ajar 3ala 7ajar, kello ra7 yet'haddam."
W-houe w-2a3ed bi-jabal el-Zeytoun, sa2alouh tlemizo minnon elo: "khabberna aymata ra7 ysir hal-shi, w-shou hiye 3alemet maji2ak w-niheyet el-3alam?"
Jewabon YASOU3: "ou3a 7ada yekhda3kon.
Ra7 yejo ktar min el-nes ta7t esme, w-ra7 y2oulo: ana houe el-masi7! W-ra7 yekhda3o ktar min el-nes.
Ra7 tesma3o bel-7roub w-bi-akhbar el-7roub, ou3a tkhafo. Hal-shi la-bodd min enno ysir, bass mish hayde hiye el-niheye.
Ra7 t2oum oumme 3ala oumme, w-mamlake 3ala mamlake, w-ra7 ysir fi maje3a w-zalezil bi-matare7 ktire.
W-hayda kello bikoun awwal el-makhãd.
W-bi-haydak el-wa2et ra7 ysalmoukon lal-3azèb w-ye2etloukon. W-btebghedkon kell el-oumam kermel esme.
W-ktar min el-nes ra7 yerja3o lal-imen, w-ra7 ysir fi khyene w-yekraho el-nes ba3don.
W-yeje ktar min el-anbiya el-kezzebin w-yekhda3o ktar min el-nes.
Wel-sharr ra7 yektar, w-tebrod bi-2loubon el-ma7abbe.
W-yalle byethbat lal-akhir bile2e el-khalãs.
W-bteje el-niheye min ba3d ma yetbashar bi-malakout ALLAH bel-3alam kello, w-yesh'hado ele bel-oumam kella.
"Eza shefto bashe3it el-moukharreb, yalle 7eke 3anno el-nabe Daniel, 2e3id bel-matra7 el-m2addas [w-yalle 3am yo2ra khallih yefham],
yalle bikouno bel-Yahoudiye khallyon yeherbo 3al-jbel.
W-yalle 3al-sat7, ma yenzal 3al-beyt ta-yekhod ghrado
w-yalle bel-7a2l, ma yerja3 ta-yekhod tyebo.
W-ya weylkon hal-7abela w-yalle 3am biradd3o bi-haydik el-iyem.
Sallo ta-ma ykoun wa2ta fi shete aw nhar sabt.
Bi-haydak el-wa2et ra7 tenzal msibe ma sar metla min bideyet el-3alam la-liom, w-ma ra7 ysir metla.
Law ma ALLAH khalla haydik el-iyem 2asira, ma ken tkhallas 7ada. Bass kermel yalle na'2ehon khalla hal-iyem 2asira.
Fa-eza 2alkon 7ada: el-MASI7 houe hon, aw honik! Ma tsad2ouh,
ra7 yeje mousa7a w-anbiya kezzebin, bya3emlo 3ajeyeb 3azeeme la-yekhda3o, eza edro, 7atta yalle ALLAH na'2ehon.
Ana 3am 7azzerkon.
Eza 2aloulkon: leyk wayno bel-sa7ra! Ma trou7o la-honik aw leyk wayno bel-byout! Ma tsad2o,
li2anno maji2 2eben el-2ensen bikoun metl el-bar2 yalle byelma3 min el-shar2 w-bidawwe bel-gharb.
W-matra7 ma bitkoun el-jette btetjamma3 el-nsoura.
"W-min ba3d msayeb hadik el-iyem, deghre ra7 t3attem el-shams w-ybattel el-2amar ydawwe. W-ra7 tou2a3 el-njoum min el-sama, w-ra7 tetza3za3 kawekib el-sama.
W-deghre ra7 tbayyen bel-sama 3alemet 2eben el-2ensen, w-kell shou3oub el-ard ra7 ykhabbto 3a-sadron, w-ra7 yshoufo el-nes 2eben el-2ensen jeye 3ala ghyoum el-sama bel-majd wel-edra.
W-ra7 yeb3at maleyekto yenefkho bel-bou2 7atta yejma3o yalle na'2ehon, min matra7 ma bithebb el-ree7 bi-arba3 zaweya, min ekher el-sama la-ekhera.
Khedo 3ebra min el-teene: eza lenit aghsana w-3etyet wra2, 3rafo enno el-sayf 2arib.
W-kamen eza shefto kell hal-shi, 3rafo enno el-maji2 2arib, w-sar 3al-bweb.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a: ma-ra7 yekhlas hal-jeel 7atta ykoun sar hayda kello.
El-sama wel-ard bitzoul w-kaleme ma bizoul.
"Hayda el-nhar w-hayde el-se3a ma 7ada ra7 ya3rif aymata ra7 ysiro, la maleyket el-sama wala el-2eben, wa7do el-Ãb bya3rif.
W-yalle sar 3a-iyem Nou7 ra7 ysir metlo wa2et yalle byeje 2eben el-2ensen.
Bel-iyem yalle abl el-toufan keno el-nes yeklo w-yeshrabo w-yetzawwajo, la-yawm yalle fet Nou7 3al-safine.
W-ma keno natrin shi, 7atta eja el-toufan w-gher2o kellon. W-hek ra7 ysir wa2et yalle byeje 2eben el-2ensen:
ra7 ykouno rejjelen bel-7a2l, byettekhad wa7ad minnon w-byentarak el-tene.
W-bikouno tnen neswen 3ala 7ajar el-ta7n, btettekhad mara w-btentarak el-tenye.
S'haro, li2annkon ma bta3erfo ayya yawm byeje el-RAB.
W-3rafo enno rabb el-beyt law 3eref bi-ayya se3a min el-leyl byeje el-7arame, ken sohir w-ma tarak beyto yensara2.
