Kouno ento kamen 7adreen, li2anno 2eben el-2ensen byeje bi-se3a ma bitkouno mitwa2'3ina.
"Min houe el-khadim el-ameen el-3a2el yalle wakkalo m3allmo enno ya3te kheddemo 2akl 3al-wa2et?
Niyyel hal-khadim yalle wa2et byerja3 m3allmo, bishoufo 3am yeshteghil.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a: ra7 ywakklo 3ala kell amwelo.
Bass eza ken hal-khadim 3atel w-2al bi-2albo: ra7 yet2akhar mou3allime,
w-sar yedrob ref2ato w-yekol w-yeshrab w-yeskar ma3 yalle byeskaro,
ra7 yeje m3allmo la-hal-khadim, bi-yawm mish khater 3a-belo, w-bi-se3a mish mitwa2a3a,
w-ra7 yesh7ato w-ykhalle nasibo ma3 el-mnef2een. W-honik bikoun el-beke wel-ta2ta2et el-snen.
W-2al YASOU3: "Byeshbah malakout el-sama 3ashr 3azara 7emlo 2nadilon w-ra7o ta-yle2o el-3arees.
Khamse minnon taysheen w-khamse 3a2leen.
El-taysheen 7emlo 2nadilon, w-ma akhado ma3on zeyt.
El-3a2leen akhado zeyt bi-wa3a.
W-t2akhar el-3arees, w-nemo kellon.
W-bi-noss el-leyl tol3it el-say7a: eja el 3arees, ta3o le2ouh!
2amit el-3ashr 3azara w-7addaro 2nadilon.
W-2alo el-taysheen lal-3a2leen: 3touna min zeytkon, li2anno 2nadila ntafet.
Jewabo el-3a2leen: yemken ma ykaffe el-zeyt la-elna w-la elkon, rou7o 3al-sou2 w-shtero.
Henne w-ray7in la-yeshtero, wossil el-3arees. W-feto ma3o yalle keno 7adreen lal-3ers w-tsakkar el-beb.
W-ba3d shwey rej3o el-3azara el-be2yin w-saro y2oulo: ya Rab, ya Rab, fta7elna!
Jewabon el-3arees: b2elkon el-7a2i2a, ana ma ba3rifkon.
Kermel hek s'haro, li2annkon ma bta3erfo la el-yawm wala el-se3a.
"Byeshbah malakout el-sama rejjel ken baddo ysefir, w-ba3at wara kheddemo w-sallamon amwelo.
Kell wa7ad minnon 7asab ederto. 3ata el-awwal khams waznet fodda, wel-tene wazenten, wel-telit wazne we7de w-sefar.
Yalle akhad el-khams waznet ra7 tejar fiyon, w-rebe7 khams waznet.
W-kamen yalle akhad el-wazenten, rebe7 wazenten tenyin.
Bass yalle akhad wazne we7de, ra7 w-7afar bel-ard w-dafan el-wazne.
Ba3d wa2et tawil, reje3 sayyid hal-kheddem w-7esabon.
Eja yalle akhad el-khams waznet, w-2addam khams waznet tenyin w-2al: ya Rab, 3ataytne khams waznet, hayde khams waznet faw2a.
2allo sayyido: 3afek, enta sale7 w-ameen! Kent ameen 3al-alil, ra7 7ottak ameen 3al-ktir: fout 3a-fara7 sayyidak.
W-eja yalle akhad el-wazenten w-2al: ya sayyide, 3ataytne wazenten, hawde wazenten rbe7ton zyede.
2allo sayyido: 3afek, enta sale7 w-ameen! Kent ameen 3al-alil, ra7 7ottak ameen 3ala el-ktir: fout 3a-fara7 sayyidak.
W-eja yalle akhad el-wazne el-we7de, w-2al: ya sayyid, 3reftak rejjel 2ase, bte7sod min matra7 yalle ma-btezra3, w-btejma3 min matra7 yalle mish mwazzi3,
khefet. Ro7t w-dafanet wazentak bel-ard, w-hayda houe yalle elak.
Jewabo sayyido: enta khadim 3atel w-keslen! 3refetne be7sod min matra7 yalle ma-btezra3 w-bejma3 min matra7 yalle mish mwazzi3,
ken lezim t7ott amwele 3end el-serrafin, w-wa2et berja3 bekhedon ma3 el-feyde.
W-2al la-kheddemo: khedo minno el-wazne w-3touha la-yalle ma3o 3ashr waznet,
li2anno yalle 3endo shi, byenzed w-bifeed. W-yalle ma ma3o, byettekhad minno 7atta yalle ma3o.
W-hayda el khadim yalle ma ken 2elo naf3, zettouh barra bel-3atme. W-honik el-beke wel-ta2ta2et el-snen.
2al YASOU3: "lamma byeje 2eben el-2ensen bi-majdo, w-ma3o maleykto bye2'3od 3a-3arsh majdo,
w-byetjamma3o eddemo kell el-shou3oub, w-bisir yefsolon 3an ba3don, metl ma byefsol el-ra3i el-khwerif 3an el-me3ze,
w-bi7ott el-khwerif 3an yameeno wel-me3ze 3an shmelo.
W-bi2oul el-malik la-yalle 3an yameeno: ta3o, ento yalle berakon bayye, wrato el-malakout yalle 7addarlkon yeh min bideyet el-3alam,
li2anno je3t w-ta3maytoune, w-3tesht w-sa2aytoune, w-kent gharib w-sta2baltoune,
3eryen w-labbastoune, w-mareed w-zertoune, w-ma7bous w-jeeto la-3ande.
W-bijewbouh el-mne7: ya RAB aymata shefnek jou3an w-ta3maynek? Aw-3atshan w-sa2aynek?
W-aymata shefnek gharib w-sta2balnek? Aw 3eryen w-labbasnek?
W-aymata shefnek mareed aw ma7bous w-zernek?
Bijewebon el-malik: b2elkon el-7a2i2a, kell marra 3melto hal-shi la-7ada min hal-zghar, bitkouno 3meltouh ele!
Ba3den bi2oul la-yalle 3an shmelo: ba3do 3anne, ya mla3in, 3al-nar el-abadiyye el-m7addara la-eblees w-as7abo:
li2anno je3t w-ma ta3maytoune, w-3tesht w-ma sa2aytoune,
w-kent gharib w-ma sta2baltoune, w-3eryen w-ma labbastoune, w-mareed w-ma7bous w-ma zertoune.
Bijewbouh: ya RAB, aymata shefnek jou3an aw 3atshan, gharib aw 3eryen, mareed aw ma7bous, w-ma se3adnek?
Bijewebon el-malik: b2elkon el-7a2i2a, kell marra ma bta3emlo hal-shi la-7ada min ekhewte el-zghar, bitkouno ele ana ma 3meltouh!
W-birou7o hal-ashkhas lal-3azèb el-abade, wel-mne7 lal-7ayet el-abadiyye."
Lamma khallas YASOU3 kalemo, 2al la-tlemizo:
"Bta3erfo enno ba3d yawmen 3id el-fos7, w-2eben el-2ensen ra7 yetsallam ta-yensalab."
W-jtama3 bi-haydak el-wa2et rou2asa el-kahane w-shyoukh el-sha3b bi-dar Kayafa ra2is el-kahane,
w-tshewaro la-yel2ato YASOU3 bi-shi w-ye2etlouh.
Bass 2alo: "ma ra7 na3mil hal-shi bel-3id, ta-ma ysir fi balbale bayn el-sha3b."
W-lamma ken YASOU3 bi-Beyt-3anya 3end Sem3an el-abras,
2arrabit minno mara 7emle 2anninet 3otr ghale ktir, w-sakabito 3a-raso houe w-3am yekol.
W-lamma shefo el-tlemiz shou 3emlit, akhad 3a-khateron w-2alo: "shou hal-ba3za2a?
Ken fina nbi3o ghale, w-yetwazza3 7a'2o 3al-fou2ara!"
3eref YASOU3 w-2allon: "Leysh 3am teze3jo hal-mara? Hiye 3emlit shi mni7.
El-fou2ara 3endkon kell el-wa2et, bass ana ma ra7 koun kell el-wa2et ma3kon.
W-eza kenit sakabit hal-3otr 3a-jesme, ma sakabeto ella 7atta t7addro lal-dafn.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a: wayn ma ra7 yetbashar bel-injil bel-3alam kello, ra7 yen7aka bi-yalle 3emleto, w-yetzakkarouha."
Bi-haydak el-wa2et ra7 wa7ad min el-tlemiz el-tna3sh, w-houe Yahouza el-eskharyoute, la-3and rou2asa el-kahane
w-2allon: "Shou bta3toune eza sallamtkon YASOU3?" Wa3adouh bi-tleteen 2at3it fodda.
Min haydik el-se3a sar Yahouza nater el-fersa la-ysallem fiya YASOU3.
Bi-awwal yawm min 3id el-fateer, ejo el-tlemiz la-3and YASOU3 w-2aloulo: "wayn baddak n7adderlak 3asha el-fos7?"
Jewabon: "rou7o la-3and flen bel-madine w-2ouloulo: bi2oul el mou3allim: eja el-wa2et, w-ra7 et3asha el-fos7 bi-beytak ma3 tlemize."
3emlo el-tlemiz yalle 2amaron yeh YASOU3 w-7addaro 3asha el-fos7.
3ashiye, 2a3ad YASOU3 3al-2akl ma3 tlemizo el-tna3sh.
W-henne w-3am yeklo, 2al YASOU3: "b2elkon el-7a2i2a: wa7ad minkon ra7 ysallemne."
Ze3lo el-tlemiz ktir, sar wa7ad wara el-tene yes2alo: "awlak ana, ya RAB?"
Jewabon: "yalle bighott le2emto bel-sa7n ma3e houe yalle ra7 ysallemne.
Li2anno 2eben el-2ensen ra7 ymout metl ma n7aka 3anno bel-kteb, ya weylo yalle baddo ysallim 2eben el-2ensen! Ken a7sanlo enno ma yekhla2."
Sa2alo Yahouza yalle ken newe ysalmo: "awlak ana, ya RAB?" Jewabo YASOU3: "enta 2elt."
Henne w-3am yeklo, akhad YASOU3 khebz w-shakar Allah w-sha2af el-khebz w-newal tlemizo w-2al: "khedo w-kelo, hayda jesme ana."
W-akhad kes w-shakar w-newalon, 2al: "shrabo kellkon.
Hayda damme ana, damm el-3ahd el-jdid yalle ra7 yet2addam kermel nes ktar. La-ghofran el-khataya.
B7ebb 2elkon: ma ra7 eshrab min ba3d liom min 3asir el-karme, ta-yeje yawm w-eshrabo ma3kon min jdid bi-malakout bayye."
Min ba3da rattalo w-tol3o 3a-jabal el-Zeytoun.
W-2allon YASOU3: "bi-hal-leyle ra7 teterkoune kellkon, li2anno maktoub: ra7 edrob el-ra3i, w-btetshattat khwerif el-atee3.
Bass min ba3d 2iyemte min el-mawt ra7 esba2kon 3al-Jaleel."
2allo Boutros: "law tarakouk kellon, ana ma ra7 eterkak."
2allo YASOU3: "b2ellak el-7a2i2a: bi-hal-leyle, abl ma ysi7 el-deek, ra7 tenkerne tlet marrat."
Jewabo Boutros: "ma benkrak 7atta law njabaret mout ma3ak." W-hek 2alo kamen el-tlemiz kellon.
Min ba3da eja YASOU3 ma3 tlemizo 3ala matra7 esmo Jetsemani, w-2allon: "23ado hon, 7atta rou7 salle honik."
W-akhad ma3o Boutros w-wled Zabada, w-ballash y7ess bel-7ezn w-yenhamm.
2allon: "nafse 7azine la-7add el-mawt. Ntero hon w-s'haro ma3e."
W-ba3ad 3annon shwey w-tabb 3a-wejjo w-salla, 2al: "eza moumkin ya bayye, tba3ed 3anne hal-kes. Bass mish metl ma ana badde, metl ma enta baddak."
W-reje3 la-3and el-tlemiz w-le2ehon neymin, fa-2al la-Boutros: "hek ma bte2edro tes'haro ma3e se3a we7de?
S'haro w-sallo ta-ma tou2a3o bel-tajribe. El-rou7 mist3edde, bass el-jesm d3if."
W-ba3ad marra tenye w-salla, 2al: "ya bayye, eza hal-kes ma btemro2 bidoun ma eshraba, khalle ysir metl ma enta baddak."
Min ba3da reje3 w-le2ehon neymin, li2anno te2lo 3younon min el-na3as.
Tarakon w-reje3 lal-sala marra telte, w-reje3 2al nafs el-kalem.
Min ba3da reje3 la-3and el-tlemiz w-2allon: "ba3dkon neymin w-merte7in? Ejet el-se3a yalle fiya byetsallam 2eben el-2ensen la-2iden el-khatyeen.
2oumo nfell! Yalle baddo ysallimne wossil."
Houe w-YASOU3 3am ye7ke wossil Yahouza, yalle houe wa7ad min tlemizo el-tna3sh, 3a-ras 3isabe kbire bte7mol el-syouf wel-3ese, ba3atouha rou2asa el-kahane w-shyoukh el-sha3b.
W-ken yalle baddo ysallmo 3atiyon 3aleme, 2allon: "yalle badde bouso bikoun hayda houe, kmeshouh!"
W-deghre 2arrab Yahouza min YASOU3 w-2allo: "Salem, ya mou3allim!" W-beso.
Fa-2allo YASOU3: "3mol yalle jeet kermelo, ya sadee2e!" 2arrabo, w-kamashouh.
W-madd wa7ad min rfe2 YASOU3 2ido 3ala seyfo w-sa7abo w-darab khadim ra2is el-kahane, w-2ata3lo daynto.
2allo YASOU3: "redd seyfak 3a-matra7o. Kell yalle byes7abo el-seyf, bimouto bel-seyf.
Fekrak enno ma be2dar etlob min bayye yeb3atle halla2 aktar min tna3shar jeysh min el-maleyke?
Bass keef ma badda tet7a'2a2 el-ketob el-m2addase yalle bit2oul enno hayda lezim ysir?"
W-2al YASOU3 lal-nes: "tekhmin jeyin tekemshoulkon shi 7arame ta-hejmeen bel-syouf w-bel-3ese? Kent kell yawm e2'3od ma3kon bel-haykal w-3allim, w-ma kamashtoune.
Bass kell hal-shi sar ta-tet7a'2a2 ketob el-anbiya." W-tarakouh kell el-tlemiz w-harabo.
El-ashkhas yalle kamasho YASOU3 akhadouh la-3and Kayafa ra2is el-kahane, w-keno mou3allimi el-shari3a wel-shyoukh mejtem3in 3endo.
W-le7'2o Boutros min b3id 3ala dar ra2is el-kahane. W-fet 2a3ad ma3 el-7aras ta-yshouf shou baddo ysir.
W-keno rou2asa el-kahane w-kell el-majles 3am bifattsho 3an shahedet zour dodd YASOU3 ta-ye2etlouh,
w-ma le2o, ma3 enno ktar min shouhoud el-zour 3etyo shahedeton. Min ba3da eja shehden.
W-2alo: "Hal-rejjel 2al: be2dar haddem haykal ALLAH w-3ammro bi-tlet tiyem."
2am ra2is el-kahane w-2al la-YASOU3: "ma baddak tjeweb bi-shi? Shou hayda yalle 3am bi2oulouh 3annak?"
W-dall YASOU3 sekit. 2allo ra2is el-kahane: "B7allfak bi-ALLAH el-7ayy enno t2elna: enta el-MASSI7 2eben ALLAH?"
Jewab YASOU3: "enta 2elt. W-ana b2elkon: ra7 tshoufo min ba3d liom 2eben el-2ensen 2e3id 3an yameen ALLAH el-2adeer w-jeye 3ala ghyoum el-sama!"
Se3eta khazza2 ra2is el-kahane tyebo w-2al: "hayda tejdeef! Me7tejin ba3d la-shouhoud? Sme3to tejdeefo.
Shou ra2eykon?" Jewabouh: "byest7e2 el-mawt!"
W-baza2o bi-wejj YASOU3 w-naka3ouh, w-darabouh kfouf
w-2alo: "7zar, ya MASSI7, meen darabak!"
W-ken Boutros 2e3id bi-se7it el-dar, 2arrabit minno khãdme w-2alet: "enta kamen kent ma3 YASOU3 el-Jaleele!"
Nakar Boutros eddem kell el-mawjoudin honik, 2al: "mish 3am befham shou 3am bit2oule."
W-toli3 3ala madkhal el-se7a, w-shefeto khãdme tenye. W-2alet la-yalle ken honik: "hayda el-rejjel ken ma3 YASOU3 el-Nassire!"
Nakar Boutros marra tenye w-7alaf, 2al: "ma ba3rif hal-rejjel!"
Ba3d shwey ejo el-mawjoudin honik w-2alo la-Boutros: "bidoun shakk enta kamen wa7ad minnon, lahjtak bitdell 3lek!"
W-sar yel3an w-ye7lof: "ana ma ba3rif hal-rejjel." Se3eta sa7 el-deek,
w-tzakkar Boutros shou 2al YASOU3: "abl ma ysi7 el-deek ra7 tenkerne tlet marrat." W-toli3 w-beke dmou3 morra.
W-lamma toli3 el-daw, tshewaro kell rou2asa el-kahane w-shyoukh el-sha3b 3ala YASOU3 la-ye2etlouh.
Min ba3da kalbajouh w-akhadouh w-sallamouh lal-7akem Bilatos.
Lamma shef Yahouza, yalle sallam YASOU3, ennon 7akamo 3le, nedm w-radd el-fodda la-rou2asa el-kahane wel-shyoukh,
w-2allon: "ghlotit li2anno sallamet damm bari2." 2aloulo: "ma khasna? Dabbir 7alak bi-7alak."
Se3eta zatt Yahouza el-fodda bel-haykal w-fall, w-ba3den ra7 w-shana2 7alo.
Akhado rou2asa el-kahane el-fodda w-2alo: "hayda taman damm, ma-bi7e2elna n7otta bi-sandou2 el-haykal."
W-etafa2o ennon yeshtero fiya 7a2l el-fekhar ta-ysir ma2bara lal-ghouraba.
Kermel hek bisammouh el-nes la-7add el-yawm 7a2l el-damm.
W-sar yalle 2alo el-nabe Ermiya: "akhado el-tleteen fodda, taman yalle etafa2o 3le wled Isra2il.
W-dafa3ouha taman la-7a2l el-fekhar. Metl ma 2amarne el-RAB."
We2f YASOU3 eddem el-7akem w-sa2alo el-7akem: "enta malik el-Yahoud?" jewabo YASOU3: "enta 2elt."
W-ken rou2asa el-kahane wel-shyoukh 3am yettehmouh, w-YASOU3 ma 3am bijeweb.
2allo Bilatos: "3am tesma3 yalle 3am bi2oulouh 3annak?"
Ma jewabo YASOU3 bi-shi, w-t3ajjab el-7akem ktir.
W-ken min 3adet el-7akem bi-kell 3id enno ye3fe 3an ma7bous wa7ad, bina'2ih el-sha3b.
W-ken 3endon bi-haydak el-wa2et ma7bous mash'hour esmo Yashou3 Barabas.
W-lamma tjamma3o el-nes sa2alon Bilatos: "meen badkon e3fe 3anno: Yashou3 Barabas aw YASOU3 yalle bi2oulo 3anno el-MASI7?"
W-ken Bilatos 3erif enno min 7asadon sallamo YASOU3.
W-lamma ken Bilatos ba3do 2e3id 3a-kerse el-7ekm, ba3atit marto 7ada y2ello: "Ou3a t3alli2 7alak bi-hal-rejjel el-bari2, li2anno el-leyle t3azzabit ktir bi-maneme kermelo."
Bass rou2asa el-kahane wel-shyoukh tabba2o el-nes 3ala enno yetolbo Barabas w-ye2etlo YASOU3.
W-lamma sa2alon el-7akem: "ayya wa7ad badkon enno ne3fe 3anno?" Jewabouh: "Barabas, Barabas!."
2allon Bilatos: "w-shou ba3mil bi-YASOU3 yalle bi2oulo 3anno el-MASI7?" Jewabouh kellon "slebo, slebo!"
2allon: "w-shou 3eml?" Saro ysarrkho bel-3ale: "slebo, slebo!"
W-lamma shef Bilatos enno ma fi feyde, w-enno el-balbale zedit, akhad may w-ghassal 2idey eddem el-nes w-2al: "ana bari2 min damm hal-rejjel! Halla2 sar sheghlkon ento."
Jewabo el-kell: "dammo 3leyna w-3a-wledna!"
W-3afelon 3an Barabas, w-jalado YASOU3 w-sallamouh la-yensalab.
Akhado 3askar el-7akem YASOU3 3ala 2asr el-7akem w-jama3o el-katibe kella.
W-shalla7ouh tyebo w-labbasouh tawb a7mar,
w-gharaso eklil min shawk 3a-raso, w-7ammalouh bi-2ido el-yameen 2asbe, w-raka3o eddemo w-tmaskharo 3le w-2alo: "Salem, ya malik el-Yahoud!"
W-akhado el-2asbe w-saro yederbouh fiya 3a-raso w-henne 3am ybaz2o 3le.
W-min ba3d ma tmaskharo 3le, shalla7ouh el-tawb el-a7mar, w-labbasouh tyebo w-akhadouh ta-yensalab.
W-henne w-fellin min el-madine lta2o bi-rejjel min Kayrin esmo Sem3an, sakharouh ta-ye7mol salib YASOU3.
W-lamma woslo lal-matra7 yalle esmo el-Jouljoutha, ye3ne "el-joumjoume"
3atouh nbeed makhlout bel-morr, w-lamma de2a rafad enno yeshraba.
W-salabouh w-t2asamo tyebo bel-2or3a.
W-2a3ado honik ta-ye7ersouh.
W-3alla2o fo2 raso 2meshe maktoub 3leya sabab el-7ekm: "hayda YASOU3, malik el-Yahoud."
W-salabo ma3o lossen, wa7ad 3an yameeno w-wa7ad 3an shmelo.
W-keno yalle mer2in min honik 3am bihezzo bi-rason w-ysebbouh w-y2oulo:
"Ya hal-hedim el-haykal w-m3ammro bi-tlet tiyyem, eza kent 2eben ALLAH, khallis 7alak w-nzal 3an el-salib."
W-keno rou2asa el-kahane w-mou3allimi el-shari3a wel-shyoukh 3am yetmaskharo 3le, w-y2oulo:
"Khallas ghayro, w-ma bye2dar ykhallis 7alo! Eza houe malik Isra2il, khallih yenzal 3an el-salib ta-n2ãmin fih!
Ettakal 3ala ALLAH w-2al: ana 2eben ALLAH, khalle ALLAH ykhallso halla2, eza ken rade 3le."
W-kamen 3ayyarouh el-lossen el-masloubin ma3o, w-2alo nafs el-shi.
Wel-dohr 3attamit el-dene kella lal-se3a tlete.
W-3al-se3a tlete sarakh YASOU3 bi-sawt 3ale: "ELI, ELI, lima shabaqtani?" ye3ne "ILAHI, ILAHI, leysh taraketne?"
W-sem3ouh yalle keno honik, w-2alo: "haye2to 3am yendah Eliyya!"
W-rakad wa7ad minnon w-akhad sfenje, ghattasa bel-khall w-7atta 3a-taraf 2asbe w-rafa3lo yeha ta-yeshrab.
Wel-be2yin 2aloulo: "tanshouf eza ra7 yeje Eliyya ta-ykhallso!"
W-sarakh YASOU3 marra tenye sarkha 2awiye w-sallam rou7o.
W-bnafs el-la7za, nkhaza2 7ijeb el-haykal sha2ften min fo2 la-ta7t. W-sar fi zelzel w-tsha2a2et el-skhour.
Wel-2bour nfata7o, w-ajsem ktar min el-2eddissin el-neymin 2amo.
W-ba3d 2iyemet YASOU3, tel3o min el-2bour w-feto 3al-madine el-m2addase w-zaharo 3a-nes ktar.
W-lamma shef ra2is el-7aras wel-3askar yalle 3am ye7erso YASOU3 el-zelzel w-kell shi sar, khafo w-2alo: "Mbala, hal-rejjel ken 7a2i2atan 2eben ALLAH!"
W-ken fi honik ktar min el-neswen 3am bira2bo min b3id, w-henne yalle le7'2o YASOU3 min el-Jaleel ta-yekhedmouh,
min bayneton Maryam el-Majdaliyye, w-Maryam emm Ya3koub w-Youssef, w-emm wled Zabada.
3ashiye eja rejjel ghane min el-Rama esmo Youssef, w-ken min tlemiz YASOU3.
Fet la-3and Bilatos w-talab minno jesm YASOU3. Fa-2amar Bilatos ennon ysalmouh yeh.
Akhad Youssef jesm YASOU3 w-laffo bi-kafan ndif,
w-7atto bi-2abr jdid w-houe yalle ken 7afaro la-elo bel-sakhr, w-da7raj 7ajar kbir 3ala beb el-2abr w-ra7.
W-kenit Maryam el-Majdaliyye, w-Maryam el-tenye, 2e3deen m2abil el-2abr.
W-tene yawm, ye3ne min ba3d yawm el-te7dir lal-sabt, ra7o rou2asa el-kahane wel-ferrisiyyin la-3and Bilatos
w-2aloulo: "tzakkarna, ya sayyid, enno hayda el-rejjel 2al, wa2et ken 3ayish, ra7 2oum min ba3d tlet tiyem.
2mor bi-7irasit el-2abr lal-yawm el-telit, a7san ma yejo tlemizo w-yeser2ouh w-y2oulo lal-nes: 2am min el-mawt, w-bitkoun ekher tedjile al3an min el-awle."
2allon Bilatos: "3endkon 7aras, rou7o w-7reso metl ma badkon."
Ra7o sakkaro el-2abr mni7, w-khatamo el-7ajar w-7atto 3le 7aras.
W-lamma kholis el-sabt w-toli3 el-daw el-a7ad, ra7o Maryam el-Majdaliyye w-Maryam el-tenye ta yestafe2do el-2abr.
W-faj2a sar fi zelzel kbir, w-nezl malèk el-RAB min el-sama w-da7raj el-7ajar 3an beb el-2abr w-2a3ad 3le.
W-ken manzaro metl el-bar2 w-tawbo abyad metl el-talj.
W-nra3abo el-7aras lamma shefouh w-saro metl el-mawta.
2al el-malèk lal-neswen el-tnen: "ma tkhafo. Ana ba3rif enno badkon YASOU3 el-masloub.
Manno hon, li2anno 2am metl ma 2al. 2arrbo w-shoufo matra7 ma ken ma7tout.
W-rou7o deghre la-3and el-tlemiz w-2oulouloun: 2am min el-mawt, w-ra7 yesba2kon 3al-Jaleel, w-honik ra7 tshoufouh. Hayda yalle badde 2elkon yeh."
Fallo el-neswen el-tnen min el-2abr bi-ser3a w-henne khayfin w-mabsoutin ktir, w-ra7o 7amleen el-khabar lal-tlemiz.
Le2ehon YASOU3 w-2al: "mar7aba." 2arrabo w-ghamaro ejrey w-sajadoulo.
2allon YASOU3: "ma tkhafo! Rou7o w-2oulo la-ekhewte yrou7o 3al-Jaleel, w-honik ra7 yshoufoune."
W-henne w-3al-tari2 eja kamm wa7ad min el-7aras 3al-madine w-khabbaro rou2asa el-kahane bi-kell shi sar.
W-jtama3o rou2asa el-kahane wel-shyoukh, tshewaro w-3ato el-3askar masare ktir,
w-2aloulon: "rou7o khabbro enno tlemiz YASOU3 ejo bel-leyl w-sara2ouh ne7na w-neymin.
W-eza sem3 el-7akem bi-hal-khabar, ne7na mentayyeblo khatro, ento bi-amen."
Akhado el-7aras el-masare w-3emlo metl ma-2aloulon. W-ntasharet hal-khabriye bayn el-Yahoud la-liom.
W-ra7o el-tlemiz el-7da3sh 3al-Jaleel, 3al-jabal, metl ma 2amaron YASOU3.
W-lamma shefouh sajadoulo, bass fi minnon ken 3endon shakk.
2arrab minnon YASOU3 w-2allon: "n3atale kell soultan bel-sama wel-ard.
Rou7o bi-kell el-oumam w-3melouhon rousl, w-3amdouwon bi-esem el-ÃB wel-2EBEN wel-ROU7 el-2ODOS,
w-3almouwon ya3emlo bi-kell shi wassaytkon fih, w-ana be2e ma3kon toul el-iyem, la-niheyet el-3alam."
Bideyet injil YASOU3 el-MASI7 2eben ALLAH,
metl ma katab el-nabe Ashe3ya: "ra7 eb3at rasoule eddemak ta-y7addir el-tari2
sawt 3am binede bel-barriye: 7addro tari2 el-RAB, w-khallo tor2ato jelse."
W-zahar Youhanna el-Ma3maden bel-barriye 3am binede la-ma3moudiyyet el-tawbe la-ghofran el-khataya.
W-keno yejo la-3ando min kell manate2 el-Yahoudiye w-Ourashalim w-y3ammedon bi-nahr el-Ordon, w-ye3terfo bi-khatayahon.
W-ken You7anna yelbos tyeb min wabr el-jamal, w-3ala khasro zennar min jeled, w-byekol jarad w-3asal barri.
W-ken ybasher w-y2oul: "ra7 yeje min ba3de 7ada a2wa minne. Ma bets7e2 en7ene w-fekk shrit sandalo.
Ana 3ammadetkon bel-may, bass houe bi3ammedkon bel-ROU7 el-2ODOS."
Bi-haydik el-iyem eja YASOU3 min el-Nassira lal-Jaleel, w-t3ammad 3a-2id You7anna bi-nahr el-Ordon.
W-lamma toli3 YASOU3 min el-may shef el-sama maftou7a w-ROU7 el-2ODOS 3am yenzal 3le bi-shakl 7amemeh.
W-2al sawt min el-sama: "enta 2ebne el-7abib, yalle rdeet 3anno."
W-akhado el ROU7 el-2ODOS 3al-barriye,
w-be2e fiya arb3een yawm 3am bijarrbo el-shaytan. W-ken honik ma3 el-7ayawenet el-barriye. W-kenit el-maleyke 3am tekhedmo.
Min ba3d ma n7abas You7anna, eja YASOU3 3al-Jaleel ta-ybasher bi-ALLAH,
w-y2oul: "el-wa2et eja w-2arrab malakout ALLAH. Toubo w-2ãmno bel-injil."
W-houe w-meshe 3ala shatt ba7r el-Jaleel, shef sayyadin, henne Sem3an w-khayyo Endrawos 3am bizetto el-shabake bel-ba7r,
2allon YASOU3: "l7a2oune ra7 a3mil minkon siyyadin bashar."
Tarako shbekon deghre w-le7'2ouh.
W-meshe shwey, w-shef Ya3koub 2eben Zabada w-khayyo You7anna, w-keno bel-shakhtoura 3am bi-sall7o shabaketon.
W-shi enno 2allon ta3o, tarako bayyon Zabada bel-shakhtoura ma3 yalle 3am bise3douh w-le7'2ouh.
W-ejo 3a-Kfarna7oum, w-fet YASOU3 3al-majma3 nhar el-sabt w-sar y3allim.
W-t3ajjabo min ta3limo, li2anno ken y3allimon metl yalle 3endo soultan, mish metl be2e mou3allimi el-shari3a.
W-ken fi bel-majma3 rejjel fiyo rou7 sharr, sar ysarrekh:
"Shou elak 3leyna, ya YASOU3 el-Nassire? Jeet la-tmawwetna? Ana ba3rif enta meen: enta 2ouddous ALLAH!"
Haddado YASOU3, w-2al: "khras w-dhar min hal-rejjel!"
Sar el-rou7 el-sharr ykhalle el-rejjel yerjof, w-sarakh sarkha 2awiye w-dahar minno.
W-t3ajjabo el-nes kellon w-sa2alo 7alon: "shou hayda? El-hay2a fi ta3lim jdid 3am yen3ata bi-soultan? 7atta arwe7 el-sharr bye2mera w-bitee3ouh!."
W-shtahar esm YASOU3 bi-kell manate2 el-Jaleel.
W-lamma fall min el-majma3, eja YASOU3 ma3 Ya3koub w-You7anna 3a-beyt Sem3an w-Endrawos.
W-kenit 7amet Sem3an neyme bel-farshe ma7moume, w-khabbarouh 3anna.
2arrab minna YASOU3 w-masakla 2ida w-khalleha t2oum. Se3eta 7allet 3anna el-7emme w-saret tekhdemon.
W-lamma sar 3ashiye, min ba3d ghroub el-shams, jeboulo kell el-marda w-yalle fiyon shyateen.
W-jtama3o ahl el-madine kellon 3al-beb,
w-shafa ktar min nes ktir mensabe bi-3eddit amrad, w-sha7at ktar min el-shyaten, w-mana3 el-shyateen enno ye7ko 3anno li2annon 3erfo meen houe.
W-2am YASOU3 abl tlou3 el-daw, w-ra7 3a-matra7 ye2dar fih ykoun wa7do, w-sar ysalle honik.
Fattasho 3le Sem3an w-rfe2o,
w-lamma le2ouh 2aloulo: "kell el-nes 3am tfattish 3lek!"
2allon: "ta3o nrou7 3al-diya3 el-2aribe 7atta kamen basher fiya, li2anno kermel hal-shi jeet."
W-baram bi-kell manate2 el-Jaleel, ybasher bel-majeme3 w-yesh7at el-shyateen.
W-eja la-3ando abras raka3lo w-sar yetrajje w-y2ello: "eza baddak fik teshfine."
Shef2 3le YASOU3 w-madd 2ido w-lamaso w-2allo: "Ana badde, shfa!"
W-deghre nshafa el-abras.
7azzaro YASOU3 w-fallalo,
min ba3d ma 2allo: "ou3a tkhabbir 7ada bi-shi. Bass rou7 3end el-kehen w-farjih 7alak, w-2addem el-shi yalle farado Moussa, ta-ykoun shahede elon."
Bass el-rejjel ra7 w-sar ynede w-yenshor el-khabar. La-daraje enno ma ba2a edr YASOU3 yfout 3ala ayy madine. W-2a3ad bel-matare7 el-mahjoura. W-keno el-nes yejo la-3ando min wayn ma ken.
W-reje3 YASOU3 ba3d kamm yawm 3ala Kfarna7oum, w-sem3o el-nes enno mawjoud bel-beyt.
W-ntala el-beyt min el-nes w-ma be2e matra7 7atta eddem el-beb, w-basharon bi-kelmet ALLAH.
W-ejo la-3ando arba3 rjel 7amleen mkarsa7.
Bass ma edro yousalo la-3ando kermel el-3aj2a, se3eta nabasho el-sa2f w-kashafouh fo2 YASOU3 w-dandalo el-ma7mal el-mal2ou7 3le el-mkarsa7.
W-lamma shef YASOU3 imenon 2al lal-mkarsa7: "ya 2ebne, khatayak nghafaro!"
W-ken fi min bayn el-mawjoudin kamm wa7ad min mou3allimi el-shari3a, 2alo bi-2albon:
"keef 3am ye7ke hal-rejjel hek 7ake? 3am bijaddef! Meen bye2dar yeghfor el-khataya ghayr ALLAH wa7do?"
W-3eref YASOU3 bi-2albo afkaron, w-2allon: "shou hal-afkar yalle bi-2loubkon?
Shou el-ahouan? N2oul khatayak nghafaro, aw n2oul: "2oum, 7mol ma7malak w-mshi?
Ra7 farjikon enno 2eben el-2ensen 3endo soultan 3al-ard ta-yeghfor el-khataya." W-2al lal-mkarsa7:
"B7ebb 2ellak: 2oum w-7mol ma7malak w-rou7 3a-beytak!"
2am el-rejjel w-dehgre 7eml ma7malo w-fall eddem kell el-mawjoudin. W-t3ajjabo kellon w-majjado ALLAH w-2alo: "ma shefna metl hal-shi bi-kell 7ayetna!"
W-reje3 YASOU3 3ala shatt ba7r el-Jaleel, w-eja la-3ando nes, sar y3allimon.
W-houe w-meshe shef 2eben 7alfa 2e3id bi-beyt el-darayib. 2allo YASOU3: "l7a2ne!" 2am w-le72o.
W-ken YASOU3 3am yekol bi-beyt Lawi, w-ktar min yalle bilemmo el-darayib wel-khatyeen 2a3ado ma3o w-ma3 tlemizo.

W-lamma shefo mou3allimi el-shari3a min el-ferrisiyyin enno 3am yekol ma3 yalle bilemmo el-darayib wel-khatyeen, 2alo la-tlemizo: "Shou 2ossto 3am yekol w-yeshrab ma3 yalle bilemmo el-darayib wel-khatyeen!"
W-sem3 YASOU3 kalemon, 2allon: "yalle so7oton mni7a mish bi-7aje la-7akeem, el-7akeem houe lal marda. Ma jeet kermel el-abrar, ana jeet kermel el-khatyeen."
Keno tlemiz You7anna wel-ferrisiyyin saymin, w-ejo nes la-3and YASOU3 w-2aloulo: "leysh tlemiz You7anna w-tlemiz el-ferrisiyyin bisoumo w-tlemizak ma bisoumo?"
2allon: "ma32oul ahl el-3arees ysoumo wel-3arees ma3on? Kell shi wel-3arees ma3on, ma bye2daro ysoumo.
Bass byeje wa2et birou7 fih el-3arees min bayneton w-se3eta bisoumo.
Ma fi 7ada bira2e3 tawb 3ati2 bi-sha2fet 2mesh jdide, 7atta ma tenkamash 3al-tawb wel-khez2 yousa3.
W-ma fi 7ada bi7ott nbeed jdid bi-wa3a min jeld 3ati2, wa-ella ra7 yenkhez2o, wel-nbeed wel-wa3a bisiro lal-kabb tneyneton. Bass el-nbeed el-jdid elo wa3a jdid!"
W-mara2 YASOU3 nhar el-sabt bel-7a2l, w-saro tlezimo ye2otfo sanebel henne w-meshyin.
2aloulo el-ferrisiyyin: "shouf tlemizak, leysh 3am ya3mlo yalle mish masmou7 yawm el-sabt?"
2allon YASOU3: "ma 2rito shou 3eml Daoud lamma je3, houe w-yalle keno ma3o?
Keef fet 3ala beyt Allah bi-iyem Abiatar ra2is el-kahane, w-akal khebz el-ta2dime w-3ata minno la-yalle ma3o, w-akalo yalle ma bi7e2 ella lal-kahane."
W-2al YASOU3: "ALLAH khala2 el-sabt lal-2ensen, w-ma khala2 el-2ensen lal-sabt.
W-2eben el-2ensen houe kamen sayyid el-sabt."
Reje3 YASOU3 3al-majma3, w-shef fi rejjel 2ido yebse.
W-ken fi honik jame3a 3am bitra2bo ta-tshouf eza ra7 yeshfe nhar el-sabt, ta-yettehmouh.
2al lal-rejjel yalle 2ido yebse: "2oum w2af bel-noss!"
W-2al lal-mawjoudin: "masmou7 3amal el-kheyr nhar el-sabt aw 3amal el-sharr? Masmou7 enno nkhallis nafs aw nmawweta?" Sakato.
Ettalla3 fiyon YASOU3 ghodben w-7azeen la-2asewet 2loubon, w-2al lal-rejjel: "medd 2idak!" Madda, w-rej3et tabi3iye metl el-2id el-tenye.
Se3eta ra7o el-ferrisiyyin w-tshewaro ma3 el-hirodosiyyin 7atta ye2etlouh.
W-ra7 YASOU3 ma3 tlemizo 3a-ba7r el-Jaleel, w-le7'2ouh nes ktir min el-Jaleel wel-Yahoudiye,
w-min Ourashalim w-Adoum min wara el-Ordon w-manate2 Sour w-Sayda. W-kellon sem3o bi-a3melo w-ejo la-3ando.
W-2amar YASOU3 tlemizo enno y7adroulo shakhtoura 7atta ma ye3j2o el-nes 3le,
li2anno shafa ktar min el-nes, 7atta sar kell mareed yeje la-3ando 7atta yelemso.
W-keno yalle fiyon arwe7 sharr yesejdoulo lamma yshoufouh w-yserkho: "enta 2eben Allah!"
W-ken y7azzeron bi-2ouwwe ennon ma y2oulo meen houe.
Toli3 YASOU3 3al-jabal w-ba3at wara yalle baddo henne fa-ejo la-3ando.
3ayyan minnon tna3sh, sammehon rousl, 7atta yref2ouh w-yeb3aton ybashro,
w-3atahon soultan ta-yesh7ato el-shyateen.
W-hal-tna3sh henne: Sem3an w-sammeh YASOU3 Boutros,
w-Ya3koub w-You7anna wled Zabada w-sammehon Bouwanarjes, ye3ne wled el-ra3d,
w-Endrawos w-Filippos w-Bartelmawos, w-Matta w-Touma, w-Ya3koub 2eben 7alfa w-Teddawos w-Sem3an el-watane el-ghayour,
w-Yahouza el-Eskharyoute yalle sallam YASOU3.
Eja YASOU3 3al-beyt, w-rej3it te3jo2 3le, la-daraje enno ma 3ed YASOU3 w-tlemizo edrin yeklo.
W-sem3o 2raybino bi-hal-shi, w-ejo la-yekhdouh li2anno fi nes 2alo 3anno: "fa2ad tawezno."
W-mou3allimi el-shari3a yalle nezlo min Ourashalim, 2alo: "hal-shakhs fih ba3lzaboul, w-3am yesh7at el-shyateen bi-2ouwwet ra2is el-shyateen."
W-nadehon YASOU3 w-7ekehon bel-amtel, 2al: "keef bye2dar el-shaytan enno yesh7at el-shaytan?
Eza n2asamet mamlake ma btethbat,
aw eza n2asam beyt 3a-7alo ma byethbat.
W-eza tmarrad el-shaytan 3ala 7alo w-n2asam ma byethbat, w-bizoul.
Ma-bye2dar 7ada yfout 3a-beyt rejjel 2awe w-yesro2 ghrado ella eza rabbat hal-rejjel el-2awe awwal shi, w-ba3den byesro2 beyto.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a: ALLAH byeghfor lal-nes kell khatiyye aw tejdeef.
Bass el-tejdeef 3al-ROU7 el-2ODOS, ma byenghafaro abadan, bidall khate lel-abad."
Hek radd 3ala yalle 2alo: "fiyo rou7 sharr!."
Ejet emmo w-ekhewto, w-we2fo barrat el-beyt w-talabo yshoufouh.
W-ken YASOU3 2e3id w-7awlo nes ktir, 2aloulo: "emmak w-ekhewtak w-ekhwetak barra 3am yetolbo ye7kouk."
Jewabon: "meen emme w-meen ekhewte?"
W-ettalla3 bel-2e3deen 7awlo w-2al: "hawde henne emme w-ekhewte!
Li2anno yalle bya3mil iradet ALLAH houe khayye w-ekhte w-emme."
Reje3 YASOU3 y3allim 7add el-ba7r, w-tjamma3o 7awlo nes ktir, la-daraje enno toli3 3al-shakhtoura bel-ba7r w-2a3ad fiya, wel-nes kella 3al-shatt.
Sar ye7kyon bel-amtel 3an eshya ktire. W-2allon:
"Sma3o! Ra7 el-mzeri3 ta-yezra3.
Houe w-3am yezra3, fi kamm 7abbe wa2a3o 3ala 7affit el-tari2, w-ejo el-3safeer w-akalouwon.
W-ghayron wa2a3o 3ala ard 7ajar, ma-fiya ktir trab, farrakho bi-ser3a, li2anno terbeton mish ghami2a.
W-lamma tol3it el-shams deblo, w-li2anno ba3don bala shloush, yebso.
W-wa2a3 ghayron bel-shawk, toli3 el-shawk w-khana2on w-ma 3ato thamar.
W-ghayron wa2a3 bi-ard taybe, w-athmaro, fi thamara 7emlit tleteen, w-thamara sitteen, w-thamara miyye."
W-2al YASOU3: "yalle 3endo dineyn, khallih yesma3!."
Lamma sar YASOU3 wa7do ma3 yalle bidallo 7addo w-ma3 tlemizo el-tna3sh, sa2alouh 3an ma3na el-amtel,
2allon: "ento n3atalkon serr malakout ALLAH. Bass yalle ba3don barra byesma3o kell shi bel-amtel,
li2annon: byettalla3o w-ma bishoufo, byesma3o w-ma byefhamo, 7atta ma ysir baddon ytoubo, w-khatayahon yenghafaro."
Min ba3da 2al la-tlemizo: "ma fhemto hal-matal? Keef, fa-ezan, 3am tefhamo amtel tenye?
El-mzeri3 byezra3 kalem ALLAH,
w-fi nes metl hal-zar3 yalle nzara3 3a-7affit el-tari2, byesma3o kalem ALLAH, byeje el-shaytan w-byesro2 yalle nzara3 fiyon.
W-fi nes metl el-zar3 yalle nzara3 bi-ard 7ajar, bass yesma3o kalem ALLAH bye2balouh bi-se3et el-se3a w-byefra7o,
bass li2anno nfouson mish mrassakha, ma byethbato 3ala ra2y. W-eza mara2o bi-di2a aw edtihad bi-sabab kelmet ALLAH, byenkro imenon.
W-fi nes metl el-zar3 yalle nzara3 bel-shawk, byesma3o kelmet ALLAH,
bass hmoum el-dene w-moughrayet el-ghena wel-shahawet el-be2ye bitfout 3al-2loubon w-btekhno2 kelmet ALLAH w-ma btethmor.
W-fi nes metl el zar3 yalle nzara3 bel-ard el-taybe, byesma3o kelmet ALLAH w-bye2balouwa fa-bye7mlo shi tleteen, shi sitteen, w-minnon bye7mlo miyye."
2allon YASOU3: "fi 7ada bijeeb el-srej w-bi7otto ta7t el-mekyel aw ta7t el-takht? Amma bi7otto bi-matra7 3ale?
Ma fi shi mekhfe ella ma ra7 ybayyin, w-ma fi shi serr ella ra7 yen3araf.
Yalle 3endo dineyn, khallih yesma3!"
W-2allon: "ntebho shou 3am tesma3o! Bel-kayl yalle bitkayylo fih ra7 ykayyloulkon w-zyede,
li2anno yalle ma3o shi bya3touh aktar. W-yalle ma ma3o shi, byettekhad minno 7atta yalle ma3o."
2al YASOU3: "byeshbah malakout ALLAH rejjel byezra3 bi-7a2lo.
Bel-leyl w-bel-nhar, eza ken neyim aw we3e, el-zar3 bifarrikh w-byekbar, w-houe ma bya3rif keef sar hal-shi.
El-ard bta3te minna la-7ala el-3eshbe awwal shi, w-ba3den el-senble, w-ba3den el-2am7 yalle bimalle el-senble.
W-lamma yendaj el-2am7, w-yeje wa2et el-2atf, byekhod el-mzeri3 el-manjal w-byo7sod."
W-2al YASOU3: "bi-shou badna nshabbih malakout ALLAH? W-bi-ayya matal menmattlo?
Houe metl 7abbit khardal, wa2et mnezra3a bel-ard bitkoun azghar min kell el-7boub bel-ard,
bass lamma tfarrikh, bte3la w-bitsir akbar min kell el-mazrou3at, w-ghsouna bimeddo ktir, la-daraje enno tyour el-sama bteje w-bta3mil 3shoush bi-fayyeta."
W-ken YASOU3 ye7ke ktir min hal-amtel ta-ywassellon kelmet ALLAH 3ala 2add ma bye2daro yefhamo.
W-ma 7ekehon ella bel-amtel, bass wa2et yalle bye23od ma3 tlemizo la-7alon ken yfasserlon kell shi.
Haydak el-yawm, 3ashiye, 2allon: "ta3o ne2ta3 3al-shatt el-tene."
Tarako el-nes w-ra7o bel-shakhtoura, w-ken fi ma3on shkhatir tenye.
W-habbet 3asfe 2awiye w-sar el-mawj a3la min el-shakhtoura la-daraje kenit ra7 tentele may.
W-ken YASOU3 neyim bi-ekher el-shakhtoura, w-teke raso 3al-mkhadde. Wa3ouh w-2aloulo: "ya mou3allim, mish sheyif enno ra7 neghra2 w-nmout?"
Se3eta 2am w-sakkat el-ree7 w-2al lal-ba7r: "skot! hda!" W-hedyit el-3asfe w-sar fi houdou2 3al-ekher.
W-2al YASOU3 la-tlemizo: "shou bekon khayfin? Ba3d ma 2ãmanto?."
Saytar 3leyon el-khawf, w-2alo la-ba3don: "meen hayda? Ta-el-ree7 wel-ba7r bitee3ouh!."
Woslo 3al-shatt el-tene min ba7r el-Jaleel, min meylit el-Jarasiyyin.
W-lamma nezl min el-shakhtoura sta2balo rejjel tali3 min el-ma2abir, w-sekno rou7 sharr.
W-ken 2e3id honik, w-ma 7ada bye2dar enno yedbato 7atta bel-jnazeer.
Aktar min marra jarrabo yerebtouh bel-jnazeer, bass ken ykasseron, w-ma 7ada ye2dar yedbato.
W-ken ydall 3a-toul, leyl nhar, bel-ma2aber wel-jbel, ysarrikh w-yjarri7 jesmo bel-7jar.
W-lamma shef YASOU3 min b3id, rakad sawbo w-raka3lo
w-sarakh bi-sawt 3ale: "shou elak 3leyye, ya YASOU3 2eben ALLAH yalle bel-sama el-3aliye? B7allfak bi-ALLAH, ma t3azzebne!"
Li2anno YASOU3 ken 2allo: "ya rou7 el-sharr tla3 min hal-rejjel!"
Sa2alo YASOU3: "shou esmak?" Jewab: "esme jeysh, li2anna ktar."
W-trajja YASOU3 enno ma yeb3at arwe7 el-sharr la-barrat el-manta2a.
W-ken honik atee3 kbir min el-khnezir 3am yer3a 7add el-jabal.
Saret arwe7 el-sharr tetrajja YASOU3 w-t2ello: "b3atna 3al-khnezir ta-neskon fiya."
Sama7lon. Tol3o w-sakano bel-khnezir. W-hajam el-atee3 kello 3al-ba7r, w-keno te2riban alfen, w-gher2o bel-ba7r.
W-harabo el-re3yen w-nasharo el-khabar bel-madine wel-diya3, w-ejo el-nes 7atta yshoufo shou sar.
Lamma woslo la-3and YASOU3, shefo el-rejjel yalle ken fih jeysh min el-shyateen 2e3id honik lebis tyebo w-3a2lo bi-wa3e kemil. Khafo ktir.
W-khabbarouwon el-shouhoud bi-yalle sar lal-rejjel yalle kenit fih el-shyateen w-shou sar bel-khnezir.
Se3eta talabo min YASOU3 enno yebte3id min byouton.
W-houe w-3am yerkab el-shakhtoura, talab minno yalle ken fih el-shyateen enno yekhdo ma3o.
Ma sama7lo bi-hal shi, bass 2allo: "rja3 3a-beytak w-la-3and ahlak w-khabberon bi-yalle 3emlo el-RAB ma3ak w-keef ra7amak."
Ra7 el-rejjel w-sar ykhabbir bel-moudon el-3ashra bi-yalle 3emello yeh YASOU3, w-keno kell el-nes 3am yet3ajjabo.
W-2ata3 YASOU3 bel-shakhtoura 3al-shatt el-tene, tjamma3o 7awlo 3al-shatt nes ktir.
W-eja rejjel min rou2asa el-majma3 esmo Yayros. W-lamma shef YASOU3 raka3 3a-ejrey,
w-sar yetrajjeh w-y2ello: "bente el-zghire ra7 tmout! Ta3a w-7ot 2idak 3leya, btenshafa w-bit3eesh!"
Ra7 ma3o w-le7'2ouh nes ktir w-saro yeltaffo 7awlo.
W-ken fi honik mara 3enda nazeef damm min tna3shar sene,
shefit 7ekama ktar, w-sarafit kell shi btemelko, w-mish bass ma stafedet bi-shi, saret 7aleta aswa2.
W-lamma sem3t bi-akhbar YASOU3, ejet bayn el-nes min khalfo w-lamaset tawbo,
li2anno 2alet bi-2alba: "byekfe enno elmos tawbo ta-enshafa."
W-deghre n2ata3 nazeef el-damm, w-7assit bi-jesma enna nshafit min marada.
W-7ass YASOU3 deghre bi-2ouwwe tol3it minno. Ltafat sawb el-nes w-2al: "meen lamas tyebe?"
2aloulo tlemizo: "sheyif el-nes m7awtinak w-3am tes2al: meen lamasne?"
Sar yettalla3 7awlo ta-yshouf meen 3eml hal-shi.
W-khafet el-mara w-rta3abit li2anna 3arfe shou sar ma3a, ejet w-raka3et eddemo w-khabbareto bel-7a2i2a kella.
2alla: "ya bente imenik shafeke. Rou7e bi-salem, w-shfi min maradik."
Houe w-3am ye7ke, woslo rjel min beyt ra2is el-majma3 w-2aloulo: "metit bentak, ma fi de3e t3azzib el-mou3allim."
Tjehal YASOU3 kalemon, w-2al la-ra2is el-majma3: "ma tkhaf, byekfe ennak t2ãmen."
Ma 2ebl YASOU3 enno 7ada yref2o ella Boutros w-Ya3koub w-You7anna khayyo la-Ya3koub.
Lamma woslo 3a-beyt ra2is el-majma3, shef YASOU3 el-dajje w-beke el-nes w-sarikhon.
Fet 3al-beyt w-2allon: "leysh 3am tebko? Ma metit el-sabiye, bitkoun neyme!"
De7ko 3le. Talla3on kellon, w-khalla bayy el-sabiye w-emma w-yalle keno ma3o yfouto matra7 ma kenit el-sabiye.
Masakla 2ida w-2alla: "talitha koum!" ye3ne "ya sabiye b2ellik: 2oume!"
2amit el-benet deghre w-saret temshe, w-ken 3omra tna3shar sene, w-t3ajjabo el-nes ktir.
W-wassahon YASOU3 bi-2ouwwe enno ma ykhabro 7ada bi-yalle sar, w-2allon ya3touha ta-tekol.
W-toli3 YASOU3 min honik w-eja 3a-balado w-le7'2ouh tlemizo.
W-lamma eja yawm el-sabt sar y3allim bel-majma3. W-t3ajjabou el-nes lamma sem3ouh w-2alo: "shou hal-7ekme yalle n3atetlo w-hal-3ajeyeb yalle 3am ten3amal 3ala 2idey?
Mish hayda 2eben el-najjar 2eben Maryam, khayyo la-Ya3koub w-Yousi w-Yahouza w-Sem3an? Mish ekhweto 3enna hon?" 2alo hek w-rafadouh.
2allon YASOU3: "ma fi nabe bidoun karame ella bi-watano w-bayn 2raybino w-ahl beyto."
W-ma edr enno ya3mil 3ajeyeb honik, bass 7att 2idey 3ala kamm mareed w-shafehon.
W-staghrab 3adam imenon. Min ba3da meshe bel-diya3 el-2aribe w-sar y3allim fiya.
W-ba3at wara el tlemiz el-tna3sh w-sar ywaddiyon tnen tnen ta-ybashro, w-3atahon soultan 3a-arwe7 el-sharr.
W-wassahon: "ma tekhdo ma3kon shi bel-tari2 ella 3asa: ma tekhdo la-khebz, wala kees, wala masare bi-jyoubkon,
bass lbeso sandal, w-ma telebso tawben."
W-2allon: "wa2et yalle bitfouto 3ala beyt, khallikon fih la-wa2et ma badkon tfello.
W-eza re7to 3a-matra7 w-ma 2ebloukon ahl hal-beyt w-ma sem3o la-kalemkon, fello w-nfedo el-ghabra 3an ejreykon shahede 3leyon!"
Ra7o el-tlemiz w-ballasho ynedo bel-tawbe,
w-sha7ato shyateen ktire, w-dahano bel-zeyt ktar min el-marda w-shafouhon.
W-sem3 el-malik Hirodos bi-akhbar YASOU3, li2anno esmo sar mash'hour. W-ken fi nes 3am bi2oulo: "2am You7anna el-ma3maden min el-mawt, kermel hek 3am bitsir hal-3ajeyeb 3ala 2ido."
W-ghayron 2alo: "Houe Eliyya", w-ghayron 2alo: "Houe nabe metl kell el-anbiya."
W-lamma sem3 Hirodos 2al: "Hayda You7anna yalle 2ata3tello ana raso, 2am min el-mawt!"
W-ken Hirodos kamash You7anna w-7atto bel-7abs, bi-sabab Hirodiyya yalle tzawwaja w-hiye mart khayyo Filippos.
W-ken You7anna 3am bi2ello: "ma bi7e2ellak tekhod mart khayyak."
W-kenit Hirodiyya ne2me 3le badda te2etlo w-ma 3am te2dar,
li2anno Hirodos ken ye7termo w-ye7mih li2anno ken 3erif enno rejjel sale7 w-2eddis. W-ken y7ebb yesma3lo, ma3 enno ken me7tar bi-2amro ktir.
W-eja el-yawm el-mounesib la-Hirodiyya lamma 3eml Hirodos bi-zekra 3id miledo walime lal-noubala taba3o wel-debbat w-woujaha el-Jaleel.
W-fetit benet Hirodiyya w-ra2aset, w-3ajabeto la-Hirodos w-lal-ma3zoumin. 2al el-malik lal-benet: "tlobe yalle baddik yeh w-ba3tike."
W-7alafla yameen w-2al: "ba3tike kell shi btetolbih, w-law ken noss mamlakte!"
Tol3it el-benet w-sa2alet emma: "shou betlob?" Jewabeta: "ras You7anna el-ma3maden!"
Rakadet la-3and el-malik w-2aletlo: "badde halla2 ta3tine 3a-taba2 ras You7anna el-ma3maden!"
Ze3l el-malik ktir, bass kermel el-7elfen yalle 7alafo eddem el-ma3zoumin, ma ken baddo yerfodla talaba.
Ba3at jende w-2amaro yjeeb ras You7anna. Ra7 w-2ata3 raso bel-7abs,
w-jebo 3a-taba2 w-sallamo lal-benet w-7emleto la-emma.
W-wossil el-khabar la-3and tlemiz You7anna, ejo w-akhado jesmo w-7attouh bi-2abr.
Jtama3o el-rousl ma3 YASOU3, w-khabbarouh kell yalle 3emlouh w-3allamouh.
W-ken fi ktir nes 3am yejo la-3andon, w-ma keno yeterkoulon el-wa2et ta-yeklo, 2allon YASOU3: "ta3o ento bass, 3a-matra7 b3id ta-terte7o shwey."
Ra7o bel-shakhtoura wa7don 3a-matra7 b3id 3an el-3alam.
Shefouwon el-nes ray7in, w-3erfo ktar minnon la-wayn ray7in, w-rakado min kell el-medon mashe 3ala ejreyon w-saba2ouwon la-honik.
W-lamma nezl YASOU3 min el-shakhtoura shef nes ktir, shef2 3leyon, li2annon keno metl el-ghanam yalle bala ra3i, w-sar y3allemon eshya ktire.
W-mara2 el-wa2et, w-2arrabo minno tlemizo w-2aloulo: "t2akhar el-wa2et, w-ne7na b3ad 3an el-day3a,
2oul lal-nes yrou7o yeshtero la-elon 2akl."
Jewabon YASOU3: "3touwon ento shi yeklouh." 2aloulo: "baddak minna nrou7 w-neshtere khebz bi-miteyn dinar w-nta3tiyon ta-yeklo?"
2allon YASOU3: "kam rghif 3endkon? Rou7o shoufo." Lamma 3erfo addesyh 3endon, 2aloulouh: "khams tereghfe w-samakten."
2amaron enno y2a3do el-nes fwej fwej 3al-7ashish el-akhdar.
2a3ado bi-shakl majmou3at, majmou3a miyye w-majmou3a khamseen.
W-akhad YASOU3 el-khams tereghfe w-samakten w-rafa3 3youno sawb el-sama w-berak w-kasar el-khebz w-3ata tlemizo, wel-tlemiz 3ato el-nes, w-2asam el-samakten 3leyon kellon.
Akalo kellon 7atta sheb3o.
W-jama3o tna3shar sallé melyene min el-khebz wel-samak yalle faddal.
W-keno yalle akalo shi khams-talef rejjel.
W-2amar YASOU3 tlemizo enno yetla3o 3al-shakhtoura w-yesba2ouh 3ala Beyt-Sayda, 3al-shatt el-tene, 7atta yfallel el-nes.
W-lamma fallo ra7 3al-jabal la-ysalle.
W-lamma sar 3ashiye, kenit el-shakhtoura bi-noss el-ba7r, w-YASOU3 wa7do 3al-barr.
W-shef YASOU3 enno tlemizo 3am yet3azzabo bel-te2deef, li2anno el-ree7 kenit bi-3akson. Eja la-3andon abl ma yetla3 el-daw meshe 3al-ba7r, w-ken ra7 yousal la-3andon.
W-lamma shefouh meshe 3al-ba7r fakkarouh shaba7 fa-sarakho,
li2annon khafo ktir. 7ekehon deghre, w-2al: "wsa2o. Ana houe, ma tkhafo."
W-toli3 la-3andon 3al-shakhtoura, w-hedyet el-3asfe. W-t3ajjabo ktir,
li2anno ma fehmo shi min 3ajibet el-khams tereghfe, kenit 2loubon msakkara.
W-woslo 3a-ard Jennisarat w-rabato el-shakhtoura honik 3al-shatt.
W-shi enno nezlo, 3erfouh el-nes la-YASOU3.
W-meshyo bi-haydik el-manta2a kella w-saro ye7emlo el-marda 3ala farsheton la-matra7 ma bya3erfo enno YASOU3 mawjoud.
W-ken wayn ma fet, bel-diya3 aw bel-moudon aw bel-mazeri3, y7otto el-marda bel-se7at w-yetolbo minno enno yelmso walaw taraf tawbo. W-kell yalle yelmsouh yenshafo.
W-jtama3o el-ferrisiyyin w-mou3allimi el-shari3a el-jeyeen min Ourashalim.
W-shefo kamm wa7ad min tlemizo 3am yeklo bidoun ma yghasslo 2ideyon, fa-3tarado.
Li2anno el-ferrisiyyin wel-Yahoud 3adatan metmasskeen bi-ta2aleed el-2edama, w-ma byeklo ella min ba3d ma yghasslo 2idayon mni7.
W-eza rej3o min el-sou2 ma byeklo shi ella eza ghassalo. W-fi eshya ktir wertouwa w-bya3emlo fiya, metl ghassil el-keset wel-jrar w-aweyil el-n7as.
Sa2alo el-ferrisiyyin w-mou3allimi el-shari3a YASOU3: "leysh tlemizak 3am bikhelfo ta2leed el-2edama, w-ma bighasslo 2ideyon abl el-2akl?"
Jewabon: "ya mnef2een! Ashe3ya ken ma3o 7a2 lamma tnabba 3ankon w-2al: hal-sha3b bikarremne bi-shfefo, bass 2albo b3id 3anne.
3ibedeton ele batle, li2anno ta3alimon sheghl el-bashar.
Ento btehemlo wassiyet ALLAH w-btetmassako bi-ta2aleed el-nes."
W-2allon: "ma ashtarkon bi-moukhelafet wassaya ALLAH kermel t7afzo 3ala ta2aleedkon!
2al Moussa: karrem bayyak w-emmak, w-yalle la3an bayyo aw emmo bimout.
Bass ento bit2oulo: eza ken 7ada baddo ya3te ahlo w-yse3edon, w-ra7 2allon: el-mouse3ade yalle natrina minne ana 2addamta la-ALLAH,
byen3afa min mouse3adet bayyo aw emmo.
Ento 3am telgho kalem ALLAH bi-ta2aleed min 3endkon btouratouwa w-ba3d fi eshya ktir tenye metl hayde 3am ta3mlouwa."
Jama3 YASOU3 el-nes w-2allon: "sma3oule kellkon w-fhamo:
Ma fi shi byekhdo el-2ensen min barra moumkin ynajjso. Bass yalle byetla3 min el-2ensen houe yalle binajjis el-2ensen.
[Yalle 3endo dinen byesma3o, khallih yesma3!"].
Lamma tarak el-nes w-reje3 3al-beyt, sa2alouh tlemizo 3an el-matal,
2allon: "hek ento kamen ma 3am tefhamo? Ma bta3erfo enno yalle byekhdo el-2ensen min barra ma binajjso,
li2anno ma bifout 3ala 2albo, 3al-batn, w-ba3den byedhar min el-jesm" w-bi-hal-7ake hayda YASOU3 bye3lon enno kell el-2akl na2e.
W-2allon: "yalle byedhar min el-2ensen houe yalle binajjso,
li2anno min jouwwa, min 2loub el-nes, btotla3 el-afkar el-sherreera: el-fe7sh wel-ser2a wel-2atl
wel-zena wel-tama3 wel-khebth wel-ghish wel-foujour wel-7asad wel-namime wel-kebriya wel-jahl.
Hal-eshya el-3atle kella btotla3 min jouwwet el-2ensen w-bitnajjso."
W-fall YASOU3 min honik w-ra7 3a-dawa7e Sour. W-fet 3ala honik beyt, w-ken ma baddo 7ada ya3rif fih, bass ma edr enno yekhfe 7alo.
W-shi enno sem3it fih mara ken bi-benta fi rou7 sharr, 7atta rakadet la-3ando w-kabbit 7ala 3end ejrey,
w-talabet minno ytalle3 el-shaytan min benta. W-kenit el-mara mish Yahoudiye, w-min 2asl Soure Fini2e.
Jewaba YASOU3: "khalle el-wled yeshba3o awwal shi, li2anno ma bijouz nekhod khebz el-wled w-nzetto lal-kleb."
2alet el-mara: "ya Rab, bass el-kleb byeklo ta7t el-meyde min ftafit el-wled!"
2alla: "rou7e, kermel yalle 2eltih halla2 dahar el-shaytan min bentik."
Rej3it el-mara 3ala beyta, w-le2et benta bel-farshe, wel-shaytan dahar minna.
W-tarak YASOU3 dawa7e Sour, w-eja sawb ba7r el-Jaleel 3an tari2 Sayda, w-mara2 bi-ard el-moudon el-3ashra.
W-jeboulo atrash lseno ma3'2oud w-trajjouh enno y7ot 2ido 3le.
Akhado YASOU3 b3id 3an el-nes, w-7att asabi3o bi-dinen el-rejjel w-baza2 w-lamas lseno.
W-rafa3 3youno sawb el-sama w-tnahhad w-2al lal-rejjel: "effata, ye3ne nfeti7!"
W-deghre nfata7it dinen el-rejjel w-n7allit 3e2dit lseno, w-sar ye7ke tabi3e.
W-wassahon YASOU3 enno ma ykhabro 7ada. W-ken kell ma wassahon kell ma ykhabro 3anno aktar.
W-keno y2oulo met3ajjbin: "ma arwa3 yalle 3am ya3mlo! Khalla el-tersh yesma3o wel-khers ye7ko."
Bi-haydik el-iyem tjamma3 nes ktir, w-ma ken ma3on shi ta-yeklouh. Ba3at YASOU3 wara tlemizo w-2allon:
"Beshfa2 3ala hal-nes li2anno sarlon tlet tiyem ma3e, w-ma ma3on 2akl.
W-eza ba3atton saymin 3ala byouton, ma ra7 ykoun 3endon 2ouwwe ta-ykaffo el-tari2, w-fi minnon jeyin min b3id."
Jewabouh tlemizo: "keef badna nta3me kell hal-nes khebz hon bel-barriye?"
Sa2alon: "kam rghif 3endkon?" 2alo: "sab3a."
2amar YASOU3 el-nes enno ye2e3do 3al-ard, w-akhad el-sab3 tereghfe, shakar w-sha2af el-khebz w-3ata tlemizo, wel-tlemiz 3ato el-nes.
W-ken fi ma3 el-tlemiz kamm samke zghar, beraka YASOU3 w-talab min tlemizo enno kamen ywazz3ouha.
Akalo el-nes 7atta sheb3o, w-jama3o sab3 slel melyene min el-khebz yalle faddal.
W-keno el-nes shi arba3-talef. W-ba3at YASOU3 el-nes 3a-byouta.
W-rekb el-shakhtoura ma3 tlemizo w-eja 3ala dawa7e Dalmanoutha.
2arrabo la-3ando kamm wa7ad min el-ferrisiyyin w-saro ysher3ouh w-yetolbo minno shi 3ajibe min el-sama, ta-yjarbouh,
tnahhad YASOU3 min samim 2albo w-2al: "shou 2ossit hal-jeel 3am yetlob 3aleme? B2elkon el-7a2i2a: ma ra7 yen3atalo 3aleme!"
W-tarakon w-reje3 bel-shakhtoura 3al-shatt el-tene.
W-nesyo el-tlemiz enno yjeebo ma3on khebz, w-ma ken ma3on bel-shakhtoura ella rghif wa7ad.
Wassahon YASOU3 w-2al: "ntebho min khameeret el-ferrisiyyin w-khameeret Hirodos!"
Sa2alo 7alon: "awlkon 3am bi2oul hek li2anno ma ma3na khebz?."
3eref YASOU3 w-2allon: "leysh 3am bitfakro enno 2eltelkon hal-shi li2anno ma ma3kon khebz? Ba3d ma fhemto? La-hal-daraje n3amit 2loubkon?
Aw 3endkon 3youn w-ma 3am te2sha3o, dinen w-ma 3am tesma3o? Ma btetzakkaro
lamma sha2afit el-khams tereghfe lal-khams-talef shakhs, kam sallé melyene min el-kasr jama3to? 2alo: "tna3shar 2effe!"
2al: "wa2et yalle kasaret el-sab3 tereghfe lal-arba3 talef shakhs, kam sallé melyene be2e? 2alo: "sab3 slel!"
2allon: "ba3d ma fhemto?"
W-woslo 3ala Beyt-Sayda, w-jebo la-3ando a3ma w-trajjouh enno yelemso.
Akhad bi-2id el-a3ma w-talla3o la-barrat el-day3a, w-honik baza2 bi-3youno, w-7att 2idey 3le w-sa2alo: "3am te2sha3 shi?"
Etalla3 w-2al: "2eshi3 el-nes w-sheyefon ka2annon ashjar 3am temshe."
7att YASOU3 2idey marra tenye 3ala 3youn el-rejjel, fa-2eshi3 mni7 w-nshafa w-sar ye2sha3 kell shi wade7.
Ba3ato 3a-beyto w-2allo: "ma tfout 3al-day3a."
W-meshe YASOU3 w-tlemizo 3ala diya3 kaysariyyet Filippos, w-bel-tari2 sa2al tlemizo: "meen ana bennesbe lal-nes?"
Jewabouh: "You7anna el-ma3maden, w-fi nes bi2oulo: Eliyya, w-minnon bi2oulo: wa7ad min el-anbiya."
Sa2alon: "w-meen ana bennesbe elkon ento?" Jewab Boutros: "enta el-MASI7!"
W-2amaron enno ma ykhabro 7ada.
W-ballash YASOU3 y3allemon enno 2eben el-ensen lezim yet2allam ktir, w-ra7 yerefdouh el-shyoukh w-rou2asa el-kahane w-mou3allimi el-shari3a, w-ye2tlouh, w-telit yawm ra7 y2oum.
W-ken y2oul hal-kalem eddem el-kell. Se3eta akhado Boutros 3a-janab w-sar y3atbo.
Ltafat w-shef tlemizo, w-sakkat Boutros w-2allo: "fell min wejje ya shaytan, li2anno afkarak hiye afkar el-bashar, mish afkar ALLAH."
W-ba3at YASOU3 wara el-nes w-tlemizo w-2allon: "yalle baddo yel7a2ne, baddo yenkor nafso w-ye7mol salibo w-yel7a2ne.
Li2anno yalle baddo ykhallis nafso ra7 yekhsara, w-yalle ra7 yekhsar 7ayeto kermele ana w-kermel el-injil, ra7 ykhallisa.
Shou byestafeed el-2ensen eza reb7 el-3alam kello w-khesr nafso?
Aw shou ra7 ya3te el-2ensen badal 3an nafso?
Li2anno yalle byeste7e fiye w-bi-kaleme bi-hayda el-jeel el-kheyin el-sherreer, byeste7e fih 2eben el-2ensen lamma ra7 yeje bi-majd bayyo ma3 el-maleyke el-2eddissin."
W-2allon: "b2elkon el-7a2i2a: bayn el-mawjoudin hon fi meen ma ra7 ydou2 el-mawt, 7atta yshouf malakout ALLAH jeye bi-majdo el-3azeem."
Ba3d sett tiyyem akhad YASOU3 Boutros w-Ya3koub w-You7anna, w-toli3 fiyon la-wa7don 3a-jabal 3ale, w-tjalla eddemon.
W-saret tyebo telma3 bi-bayad ma bye2dar 7ada 3al-ard ya3mil metla.
W-zaharlon Eliyya w-Moussa, w-keno 3am ye7ko ma3 YASOU3.
2al Boutros la-YASOU3: "ya mou3allim, shou 7elo nkoun hon. Khallina na3mil hon tlet khiyam: we7de elak, w-we7de la-Moussa, w-we7de la-Eliyya."
W-ken mish 3arif shou 3am ye7ke min ketrit el-khawf yalle saytar 3le houe w-ref2ato.
W-ejet ghayme w-ghatteton, w-2al sawt min el-ghayme: "hayda houe 2ebne el-7abib, sma3oulo!"
W-ettala3o faj2a 7awlon, w-ma shefo ma3on ella YASOU3 wa7do.
W-henne w-nezlin min el-jabal, wassahon YASOU3 enno ma ykhabro 7ada bi-yalle shefouh, ella lamma bi2oum 2eben el-2ensen min el-mawt.
7efzo el-wassiye, bass saro yes2alo 7alon: "shou ye3ne el-2iyeme min el-mawt?"
Min ba3da sa2alouh: "leysh bi2oulo mou3allimi el-shari3a: lezim yeje Eliyya awwal shi?"
Jewabon: "mazbout, byeje Eliyya awwal shi w-bisalle7 kell shi. Wa-ella keef bi2oul el-kteb enno 2eben el-2ensen ra7 yet2allam ktir w-yerfdouh el-nes?
Bass b7ebb 2elkon: Eliyya eja, w-3emlo fih yalle baddon yeh, metl ma nzakar 3anno bel-kteb."
W-lamma rej3o la-3and el-tlemiz, shefo nes ktir 7awlon w-kamm wa7ad min mou3allimi el-shari3a 3am bisher3ouwon.
Lamma shefouh el-nes tfeja2o w-rakado sawbo ta-ysallmo 3le.
Sa2alon: "3ala shou 3am tetshera3o?"
Jewabo rejjel min el-nes: "ya mou3allim, jebtellak 2ebne, li2anno fiyo rou7 sharr bikhallih ysir akhras,
byetla'2at fih w-bisir ykebbo 3al-ard, w-bisir yerghe w-ykezz 3a-sneno w-yetyabbas. W-jebto la-3and tlemizak, w-ma edro yeshfouh."
Jewabon: "ya hal-jeel yalle ma bi2ãmen, la-aymata ra7 eb2a ma3kon? W-la-aymata ra7 et7ammalkon? Jeebo el-sabe la-hon!"
Jebouh. Lamma shefo rou7 el-sharr, kabb el-sabe 3al-ard w-sar yetmarmagh w-yerghe.
Sa2al YASOU3 bayy el-sabe: "aymata ballash ysir ma3o hal-shi?" 2al: "min houe w-zghir.
W-ktir aw2at ken yermih rou7 el-sharr bel-nar aw bel-may ta-ye2etlo. Eza kent edir ta3mil shi shfa2 3leyna w-se3edna."
2allo YASOU3: "eza kent enta bit2ãmen, li2anno kell shi moumkin la-yalle bi2ãmen."
Sarakh el-bayy deghre: "bi2ãmen! Se3edne 7atta yzeed imene."
W-shef YASOU3 enno el-nes 3am yetjamma3o, haddad rou7 el-sharr w-2allo: "ya hal-rou7 el-atrash wel-akhras! Ana be2emrak, dhar min hal-sabe w-ma ba2a terja3!"
Sarakh el-rou7 w-hazzo lal-sabe hazze 2awiye w-toli3 minno. W-sar el-sabe metl el-mayyit, 7atta 2alo ktar min el-nes enno met.
Masako YASOU3 bi-2ido w-wa2afo w-2am el-sabe.
W-lamma fet 3al-beyt, sa2alouh el-tlemiz baynon w-bayno: "leysh ma 2derna ne7na nesh7at rou7 el-sharr?"
Jewabon: "hayda el-naw3 ma byensha7at ella bel-sala."
Tol3o min honik w-mara2o bel-Jaleel. W-ken YASOU3 ma baddo ya3rif fih 7adan,
li2anno ken y3allim tlemizo, w-y2ellon: "ra7 yetsallam 2eben el-2ensen la-2iden el-nes, ra7 ye2etlouh w-min ba3d ma ymout, telit yawm ra7 y2oum."
W-ma fehmo hal-kalem, w-khafo ennon yes2alouh.
Woslo 3ala Kfarna7oum. W-lamma feto 3al-beyt sa2alon: "shou kento 3am tetjedalo 3al-tari2?"
Sakato, li2annon keno 3am yetjedalo 3al-tari2 meen houe el-a3zam bayneton.
2a3ad w-akhad el-tlemiz el-tna3sh w-2allon: "yalle baddo ykoun awwal el-nes, khallih ykoun ekheron kellon w-khadim elon kamen."
W-akhad tofl, w-7atto bel-noss w-ghamaro w-2allon:
"Yalle bye2bal wa7ad min hal-atfal bi-esme bikoun 2ebelne, w-yalle bye2balne ma bikoun 2ebelne ana, bikoun 2ebl yalle ba3atne."
2allo You7anna: "ya mou3allim, shefna rejjel 3am yesh7at el-shyateen bi-esmak fa-mana3neh, li2anno ma byenteme elna."
2allo YASOU3: "ma temna3ouh! Ma fi 7ada bya3mil mou3jize bi-esme w-byerja3 bye7ke 3anne bel-3atel.
Yalle ma bikoun doddna bikoun ma3na.
Yalle bya3tikon kebbeyet may bi-esme li2annkon lal-MASI7, b2elkon el-7a2i2a, moukafe2to ma bitrou7 di3an."
W-2al YASOU3: "yalle biwa2e3 wa7ad min hal-zghar, yalle 2ãmano fiye, bel-khatiyye, a7sanlo enno y3al2oulo bi-ra2ebto 7ajar el-ta7oun w-yzettouh bel-ba7r.
W-eza wa2a3etak 2idak bel-khatiyye 2ta3a, li2anno a7sanlak enno tfout 3al-7ayet el-abadiyye bi-2id we7de min enno ykoun 3endak 2idten w-ejerten w-trou7 3a-jhannam, 3al-nar yalle ma btontofe,
[ma7al ma el-doud ma-bimout wel-nar ma btontofe].
W-eza wa2a3etak ejrak bel-khatiyye 2ta3a, li2anno a7sanlak enno tfout 3al-7ayet el-abadiyye bi-ejer we7de min enno ykoun 3endak ejerten w-trou7 3a-jhannam,
[ma7al ma el-doud ma-bimout wel-nar ma btontofe].
W-eza wa2a3etak 3aynak bel-khatiyye 2la3a, li2anno a7sanlak enno tfout 3a-malakout ALLAH bi-3ayn we7de min enno ykoun 3endak 3aynten w-trou7 3a-jhannam,
ma7al ma el-doud ma-bimout wel-nar ma btontefe.
Li2anno kell wa7ad ra7 yetmalla7 bel-nar.
El-mel7 shi tayyib bass eza sar bala ta3me, shou yalle ba3d bimall7o? Khalle ykoun fikon mel7. W-ykoun fih baynetkon salem."
2am YASOU3 min honik w-eja 3al-Yahoudiye 7add el-Ordon, w-ejo la-3ando el-nes w-sar y3allimon metl el-3ade.
2arrabo minno kamm wa7ad min el-ferrisiyyin w-sa2alouh la-ye7erjouh: "masmou7 lal-rejjel enno ytalle2 marto?"
Jewabon: "shou wassakon Moussa?"
2alo: "sama7 Moussa lal-rejjel enno ya3te marto kteb el-tala2 w-se3eta bitalle2a."
2allon YASOU3: "bi-sabab 2asewet 2loubkon katabelkon Moussa hal-wassiye.
Li2anno min bideyet el-khali2a ALLAH 3emelon mara w-rejjel.
Kermel hek byetrok el-rejjel bayyo w-emmo w-byette7id bi-marto,
w-bisiro el-tnen jesm wa7ad. W-ma bi3oudo tnen, bisiro jesm wa7ad.
Yalle byejma3o ALLAH ma bifar2o 2ensen."
W-lamma feto 3al-beyt, sa2alouh el-tlemiz 3an hal-shi,
2allon: "yalle bitalle2 marto w-byetzawwaj ghayra byezne,
w-eza talla2et mara zawja w-tzawwajet ghayro bitkoun zenyet."
Jeboulo atfal 7atta y7ott 2idey 3leyon, bass el-tlemiz ba3adouwon.
W-shef YASOU3 hal-shi fa-ghodib w-2allon: "khallo el-atfal yejo la-3ande w-ma temna3ouwon, li2anno la-yalle metlon malakout ALLAH.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a: yalle ma bye2bal malakout ALLAH metl el-tofl, ma ra7 yfout 3le."
W-ghamaron w-7att 2idey 3leyon w-berakon.
W-toli3 YASOU3 3al-tari2, rakad sawbo rejjel w-raka3 eddemo w-sa2alo: "ya hal-mou3allim el-sale7, shou ba3mil ta-le2e el-7ayet el-abadiyye?"
2allo YASOU3: "leysh 3am tsammine sale7? Ma 7ada sale7 ella ALLAH wa7do.
Enta bta3rif el-wassaya: ma te2tol, ma tezne, ma tesro2, ma tesh'had bel-zour, ma tezlom, karrem bayyak w-emmak."
Jewabo el-rejjel: "ya mou3allim, min ana w-zghir 3am a3mil bi-hal-wassaya kella."
Ettalla3 fih YASOU3 bi-ma7abbe w-2allo: "enta bi-7aje la-shaghle we7de: rou7 bi3 kell shi btemelko w-3tyon lal-fou2ara, bisir 3endak kanz bel-sama, w-ta3a l7a2ne."
Ze3l el-rejjel la-hal-kalem w-fall 7azeen li2anno ken 3endo amlek ktire.
Ettalla3 YASOU3 7awlo w-2al la-tlemizo: "shou sa3be fawtit el-aghniya 3a-malakout ALLAH!."
Staghrabo el-tlemiz min kalemo, w-reje3 2allon lal-marra el-tenye: "ya wlede, shou sa3be el-fawte 3a-malakout ALLAH.
Ahwan 3al-jamal enno yfout bi-kherm el-2ebre min enno yfout el-ghane 3a-malakout el-sama."
W-zed esteghrabon w-sa2alo 7alon: "eza hek, min bye2dar yle2e el-khalãs?"
Ettalla3 YASOU3 fiyon w-2al: "hal-shi mish moumkin 3end el-nes, bas 3end ALLAH kell shi moumkin."
2allo Boutros: "ne7na tarakna kell shi w-l7e2nek."
Jewabo YASOU3: "b2elkon el-7a2i2a: Kell meen byetrok byout, aw ekhwe aw khayyet, aw bayy, aw emm, aw wled, aw 72oul, kermele w-kermel el-injil,
ra7 yekhod 2addon miyyet marra, bi-hal dene, byout w-ekhwe w-khayyet w-emmet w-wled w-72oul, ma3 el-edtihadet, w-ra7 yourat el-7ayet el-abadiyye.
Ktar min el-ouwal ra7 ysiro awekher, w-yalle henne awekher ra7 ysiro ouwal."
w-keno 3al-tari2 tal3in 3ala Ourashalim w-YASOU3 eddemon. W-keno el-tlemiz me7tarin, w-yalle le7'2ino keno khayfin. W-jtama3 bi-tlemizo el-tna3sh la-wa7don w-sar ye7kihon bi-yalle ra7 yisir ma3o,
w-2al: "halla2 ne7na tal3in 3ala Ourashalim, w-ra7 yetsallam 2eben el-2ensen la-rou2asa el-kahane w-mou3allimi el-shari3a, w-ra7 ye7ekmo 3le bel-mawt w-ra7 ysalmouh la-7ekkem ghouraba,
w-yetmaskharo 3le, w-yebez2o bi-wejjo w-yejeldouh w-ye2etlouh, w-telit yawm ra7 y2oum."
2arrab sawbo Ya3koub w-You7anna, wled Zabada, w-2aloulo: "ya mou3allim, badna tlabbilna talabna."
2allon: "shou badkon a3mellkon?"
Jewabouh: "3tina enno ne2'3od, wa7ad 3an yameenak w-wa7ad 3an shmelak bi-majdak."
2allon YASOU3: "ento ma bta3erfo shou 3am tetolbo: bte2daro teshrabo el-kes yalle ra7 eshrabo, aw tet3ammado el-ma3moudiyye yalle ra7 et3ammada?"
Jewabou: "mne2dar." 2allon: "mazbout, el-kes yalle ra7 eshraba ra7 teshrabouha, wel-ma3moudiyye yalle ra7 et3ammada ento kamen ra7 tet3ammadouha.
Bass ennkon te2e3do 3ala yameene aw 3ala shmele, hal-shi mish ana yalle ba3tih, li2anno hal-matra7 houe la-yalle m7addaro elon bayye."
W-sem3o el-tlemiz el-3ashra hal-kalem, w-ghodbo 3ala Ya3koub w-You7anna.
Se3eta jama3on YASOU3 w-2allon: "bta3erfo enno el-rou2asa 7ekmeen el-oumam, w-enno el-3ouzama metsalltin 3leyon.
Bass ento ma tkhallo hal-shi ykoun baynetkon. Yalle baddo ykoun 3azeem, ykoun khadimkon.
W-yalle baddo ysir el-awwal fikon, ykoun 3abd 3endkon.
Li2anno 2eben el-2ensen ma eja 7atta yenkhadam, eja ta-yekhdom w-yefde bi-7ayeto nes ktar."
Woslo 3ala Ari7a. W-houe w-felil min Ari7a, w-ma3o tlemizo w-nes ktir, ken Bartimawos, ye3ne 2eben Timawos, w-houe she7ad a3ma, 2e3id 3ala 7affit el-tari2.
W-lamma sem3 bi-enno yalle meri2 min honik houe YASOU3 el-Nassire, sar yesrokh: "ya YASOU3 2eben Daoud, r7amne!"
Saro el-nes ysakktouh, bass houe sar y3alle sawto aktar: "ya 2eben Daoud, r7amne!"
We2f YASOU3 w-2al: "nedouh!" nedo el-a3ma w-2aloulo: "tshajja3 w-2oum! 3am binedik!"
Shel 3anno 3abeyto w-2am w-eja la-3and YASOU3.
2allo YASOU3: "shou baddak a3mellak?" 2al: "ya mou3allim, badde e2sha3!" 2allo YASOU3:
"Rou7! Imenak shafek." W-eshi3 deghre w-le7i2 YASOU3 bel-tari2.
Lamma 2arrabo min Ourashalim woslo 3ala beyt Faji w-Beyt-3anya, 3end jabal el-zeytoun, ba3at YASOU3 tnen min tlemizo
w-2allon: "rou7o 3al-day3a yalle bi-wejjkon, bitle2o ja7sh marbout ba3d ma rekb 3le 7ada, fekkouh w-jiboule yeh.
W-eza sa2alkon 7ada: leysh 3am ta3emlo hek, 2oulo: el-mou3allim 3ayzo, w-ra7 yreddo bi-ser3a."
Ra7o el-telmizen w-le2o ja7sh marbout eddem el-beb 3al-tari2, fakkouh.
Sa2alouwon el-ba3d min yalle keno honik: "Leysh 3am bitfekko el-ja7sh?"
2aloulon metl ma wassahon YASOU3, fa-tarakouwon.
Jebo el-telmizen el-ja7sh la-3and YASOU3, 7atto 3a-dahro mashale7on, w-toli3 YASOU3 2a3ad 3le.
W-farasho nes ktar tyebon 3al-tari2, w-minnon 2ata3o ghsoun el-shajar.
W-kenit el-nes el-meshye eddemo w-yalle le7'2ouh 3am bihayyso w-y2oulo: "el-majd la-ALLAH! Yetberak el-jeye bi-esm el-RAB!
Tetberak el-mamlake el-jeye, mamlaket bayyna Daoud. El-majd bel-a3ali!"
W-fet YASOU3 3a-Ourashalim w-3al-haykal, w-re2ab kell shi jouwwa. W-ken mara2 el-wa2et, fa-toli3 3ala Beyt-3anya ma3 el-tlemiz el-tna3sh.
W-lamma fallo tene yawm min Beyt-3anya 7ass YASOU3 bel-jou3.
Shef min b3id shajret teen mwarr2a, 2asada barke bile2e fiya shi. W-lamma wossil, ma le2a 3leya gher el-wara2, li2anno mawsam el-teen ma ken eja ba3d.
2alla: "ma 7ada ra7 yekol minnek teen lal-abad." W-sem3o tlemizo yalle 2alo.
W-ejo 3ala Ourashalim, w-fet 3al-haykal w-sar yesh7at el-biyye3in w-yalle 3am yeshtero fih. W-2alab tawlet el-serrafeh w-karase biyye3in el-7amem.
W-mana3 kell wa7ad bye7mol bda3a enno yemro2 bel-haykal.
W-sar y3allimon w-y2oul: "mish maktoub bel-kteb: enno beyte beyt sala la-kell el-nes, w-ento khallaytouh ysir mgharet lsous?"
W-sem3o rou2asa el-kahane w-mou3allimi el-shari3a hal-kalem, w-tshewaro keef baddon ye2etlouh, w-keno khayfin minno li2anno el-sha3b kello ken mou3jab bi-ta3alimo.
W-lamma sar 3ashiye tel3o min el-madine.
Wel-sob7 henne w-rej3in, shefo shajret el-teen yebse min jouzoura.
W-tzakkar Boutros kalem YASOU3 w-2allo: "ettalla3, ya mou3allim! El-teene yalle la3anta yebsit."
2allon YASOU3: "2ãmno bi-ALLAH.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a: yalle bi2oul la-hal-jabal, 2oum w-zett 7alak bel-ba7r, w-houe ma 3endo shakk bi-2albo, w-eza ken 3endo imen enno yalle bi2oulo ra7 ysir, hal-shi bisir.
Kermel hek b2elkon: Kell shi btetolbouh bi-imen, ra7 tekhdouh.
W-eza 2emto la-tsallo w-ken elkon shi 3ala 7ada, ghferoulo, 7atta yeghfor elkon bayykon yalle bel-sama.
[W-eza kento ma 3am teghefro lal-nes, ma byeghfor elkon bayykon yalle bel-sama"].
W-rej3o 3ala Ourashalim. W-houe w-3am yetmasha bel-haykal, ejo la-3ando rou2asa el-kahane w-mou3allimi el-shari3a w-shyoukh el-sha3b.
W-2aloulo: "bi-ayya soultan 3am ta3mil hal-eshya? W-meen 3atak hal-soultan?"
Jewabon YASOU3: "w-ana bes2alkon sou2al wa7ad, eza jewabtoune 3le, b2elkon bi-ayya soultan ba3mil hal-shi:
min wayn jeye soultet ma3moudiyyet You7anna? Min el-sama aw min el-nes?"
2alo bi-2albon: "eza 2elna min ALLAH, ra7 yjewebna: leysh ma 2ãmanto fih?
W-eza 2elna min el-nes, menkhaf min el-sha3b, li2anno kellon bye3tebro You7anna nabe."
Se3eta jewabo YASOU3: "ma mna3rif!" 2allon YASOU3: "w-ana ma-ra7 2elkon bi-ayya soultan ba3mil hal-a3mel."
W-sar ye7kiyon bel-amtel, 2al: "zara3 rejjel karm, w-sayyajo w-7afar fih ma3sara w-3ammar berj w-sallamo la-kerramin w-sefar.
W-lamma eja yawm el-2atf, ba3at kheddemo la-3andon ta-yekhod el-ghallé.
Fa-kamashouh w-darabouh w-rajja3ouh bi-2iden fadyin.
W-ba3at khadim tene, w-kamen rajamouh el-kerramin w-darabouh 3ala raso w-henouh w-rajja3ouh.
W-ba3at ghayro, 2atalouh. W-min ba3da ba3at ghayron ktir, minnon darabouhon, w-minnon 2atalouhon.
W-ma be2e 3end el-rejjel ella 2ebno el-7abib, ba3ato la-3andon ekher shi w-2al: ra7 ykhafo min 2ebne.
Bass el-kerramin 2alo bayn ba3don: hayda houe yalle ra7 yourat! Ta3o ne2etlo w-nekhod el-werte!
kamshouh w-2atalouh w-zattouh barrat el-karm.
Shou bya3mil rabb el-karm? Byeje w-bye2tol el-kerramin w-bisallim el-karm la-ghayron.
Ma 2rito hal-ãye: el-7ajar yalle rafadouh el-me3marjiyye sar ras el-zewye.
Hayda yalle 3emlo el-RAB, shi 3ajeeb!"
Ken baddon yekemshouh, li2annon fehmo enno 2asadon bi-kalemo. Bass khafo min el-nes, se3eta tarakouh w-fallo.
W-ba3atoulo jame3a min el-ferrisiyyin wel-hirodosiyyin la-yel2atouh 3ala shi kelme:
ejo w-2aloulo: "ya mou3allim, mna3rif ennak sade2, bit3allim tari2 ALLAH bel-7a2, w-ma 7ada bi2asser 3lek, li2anno ma bihemmak mazaher el-nes. Bi7e'2elna nedfa3 el-jezye la-2aysar aw la2?
3eref YASOU3 khabsaneton, 2allon: "leysh 3am bitjarrboune? 3toune dinar ta-shoufo."
3atouh dinar, w-2al: la-meen hal-soura w-hal-esm?" 2alo: "la-2aysar!"
2allon: "dfa3o la-2aysar yalle houe la-2aysar, w-la-ALLAH yalle houe la-ALLAH." Fa-t3ajjabo min yalle sem3ouh.
Eja la-3ando kamm wa7ad min el-saddou2iyyin, w-henne yalle ma bi2ãmno bel-2iyeme,
w-sa2alouh: "ya mou3allim, katabelna Moussa: eza met rejjel w-ma ken 3endo walad min marto, lezim khayyo yetzawwaja 7atta yjeeb minna wled 3a esm khayyo.
Ken fi sab3 ekhwe: tzawwaj el-awwal mara, w-met bidoun wled.
Tzawwaja el-tene, w-met kamen bidoun wled. W-nafs el-shi ma3 el-telit wel-be2yin,
w-ma 7ada min el-sab3a jeb wled. Min ba3da metit el-mara.
Zawjet meen bitkoun hal-mara bel-2iyeme? Li2anna kenit zawjet el-sab3a."
Jewabon YASOU3: "ento gholtanin, li2annkon ma bta3erfo el-ketob el-m2addase w-2ouwwet ALLAH.
Bel-2iyeme el-nes ma byetzawajo, bikouno metl maleyke bel-sama.
W-bennesbe la-2iyemet el-mawta, ma 2rito shou katab Moussa lamma khabbar 3an el-3ellay2a, keef 7ekeh ALLAH w-2allo: ana Ileh Ibrahim, Is7ak, w-Ya3koub?
W-ma ken ALLAH Ileh el-mawta, houe Ileh el-3ayshin. Ento gholtanin ktir!"
W-ken wa7ad min mou3allimi el-shari3a honik. Seme3on 3am yetjedalo. W-shef enno YASOU3 3eref yredd 3ala el-saddou2iyyin, 2arrab minno w-sa2alo: "shou hiye ahamma wassiye?"
Jewab YASOU3: "awwal wassiye hiye: sma3 ya Isra2il, el-RAB Ilehna houe el-RAB el-wa7eed.
7ebb el-RAB Ilehak min kell 2albak, w-min kell nafsak, w-min kell 3a2lak w-min kell 2ouwwtak.
El-wassiye el-tenye: 7ebb 2aribak metl ma bit7ebb 7alak. W-ma fi wassiye a3zam min hal-wassiyten."
2allo mou3allim el-shari3a: "ma3ak ha2, ya mou3allim! ALLAH wa7eed w-ma fi 7ada ghayro,
w-lezim n7ebbo min kell 2albna w-min kell 3a2lna w-min kell 2ouwwetna, w-n7ebb 2aribna metl ma mn7ebb 7alna, hawde afdal min kell shi fi zabeye7 w-2arabin."
W-shef YASOU3 enno el-rejjel jewab bi-7ekme, 2allo: "enta mish b3id 3an malakout ALLAH." W-min ba3da ma starja 7ada yes2alo shi.
W-houe w-3am bi3allim bel-haykal 2al: "keef bi2oulo mou3allimi el-shari3a enno el-MASI7 houe 2eben Daoud?
W-Daoud nafso 2al bi-wa7e min el-ROU7 EL-2ODOS: 2al el-RAB la-Rabbe: 23od 3an yameene 7atta khalle a3de2ak ta7t ejrek?
Eza ken Daoud bisamme el-MASI7 RAB, fa-keef bikoun el-MASI7 2ebno?" W-kenit el-nes kella 3am tesma3lo w-mabsouta.
W-2allon bi-ta3limo: "ntebho min mou3allimi el-shari3a, bi7ebbo el-mashe bel-tyeb el-tawile wel-salemet bel-se7at
w-enno ye2e3do eddem bel-majemi3 w-bi7ebbo karase el-sharaf bel-waleyem.
Byeklo bi-byout el-araml, w-bya3mlo 7alon 3am bisallo ktir. Hal-ashkas ra7 yendeno el-deynoune el-2a2sa."
Ken YASOU3 2e3id bel-haykal, eddem sandou2 el-tabarrou3at, ken 3am bishouf el-nes keef 3am bi7otto masare. W-7atto ktar min el-aghniya masare ktir.
W-ejet mara armale fa2ira, 7attit bel-sandou2 felsen.
Se3eta ba3at wara tlemizo w-2allon: "b2elkon el-7a2i2a: hal-armale el-fa2ira 7attit bel-sandou2 aktar min ma 7atto el-be2yin.
Henne 7atto min yalle byefdal 3annon. Bass hiye, 7attit kell shi ma3a."
W-lamma fall min el-haykal, 2allo wa7ad min tlemizo: "ya mou3allim, ettalla3 shou raw3a hal-7jara w-hal-3amar!"
Jewabo YASOU3: "sheyfin hal-3amarat el-3azeeme? mish ra7 yentarak 7ajar 3ala 7ajar, kello ra7 yet'haddam."
W-lamma ken bi-jabal el-zeytoun, eddem el-haykal, sa2alo Boutros w-Ya3koub w-You7anna w-Endrawos minnon elo:
"khabberna aymata ra7 ysir hal-shi, w-shou hiye el-3aleme yalle bitdell enno hal-shi 2arrab ysir?"
Jewabon YASOU3: "ou3a 7ada yekhda3kon.
Ra7 yejo ktar min el-nes ta7t esme, w-ra7 y2oulo: ana houe el-masi7! W-ra7 yekhda3o ktar min el-nes.
Ra7 tesma3o bel-7roub w-bi-akhbar el-7roub, ou3a tkhafo, Hal-shi la-bodd min enno ysir, bass mish hayde hiye el-niheye.
Ra7 t2oum oumme 3ala oumme, w-mamlake 3ala mamlake, w-ra7 ysir fi maje3a w-zalezil bi-matare7 ktire, W-hayda kello bikoun awwal el-makhãd.
Bass ento, ntebho. Ra7 ysalmoukon lal-ma7akem, w-yederboukon bel-majeme3, w-ra7 yekhdoukon lal-7ekkem wel-moulouk kermel tesh'hado 3endon,
li2anno lezim abl hek ykoun tbashar bel-injil 3end kell el-shou3oub.
W-lamma yekhdoukon w-ysallmoukon, ma tehtammo abl el-wa2et shou badkon te7ko, 2oulo shou byeje 3a-belkon bi wa2ta, li2anno el-ROU7 el-2ODOS houe ra7 ye7ke fikon mish ento.
Ra7 ysallim el-khay khayyo lal-mawt, wel-bayy 2ebno, wel-wled ra7 y2oumo 3a-ahlon ye2etlouwon,
w-ra7 yeboghdoukon kell el-nes kermel esme. W-yalle byethbat lal-akhir bile2e el-khalãs.
"Eza shefto bashe3it el-kharab mawjoude matra7 yalle mish lezim tkoun, [w-yalle 3am yo2ra khallih yefham], yalle bikouno bel-Yahoudiye khallyon yeherbo 3al-jbel.
W-yalle 3al-sat7, ma yenzal 3al-beyt ta-yekhod ghrado.
W-yalle bel-7a2l, ma yerja3 ta-yekhod tyebo.
W-ya weylkon hal-7abela w-yalle 3am biradd3o bi-haydik el-iyem.
Sallo ta-ma ykoun wa2ta fi shete,
bi-haydak el-wa2et ra7 tenzal msibe ma sar metla min bideyet el-3alam la-liom, w-ma ra7 ysir metla.
Law ma ALLAH khalla haydik el-iyem 2asira, ma ken tkhallas 7ada. Bass kermel yalle na'2ehon khalla hal-iyem 2asira.
W-eza 2alkon 7ada: el-MASI7 houe hon, aw honik! Ma tsad2ouh.
Ra7 yeje mousa7a w-anbiya kezzebin, bya3emlo 3ajeyeb 3azeeme la-yekhda3o, eza edro, yalle ALLAH na'2ehon.
Fa-ntebho ktir. Li2anno 3am khabberkon bi-kell shi abl ma ysir.
"W-min ba3d msayeb hadik el-iyem, deghre ra7 t3attem el-shams w-ybattel el-2amar ydawwe.
W-ra7 tou2a3 el-njoum min el-sama, w-ra7 tetza3za3 kawekib el-sama.
W-ra7 yshoufo el-nes 2eben el-2ensen jeye 3ala ghyoum el-sama bel-majd wel-edra.
W-ra7 yeb3at maleyekto, min matra7 ma bit'hebb el-ree7 bi-arba3 zaweya, 7atta yejma3o yalle na'2ehon, min ekher el-ard la-ekher el-sama.
Khedo 3ebra min el-teene: eza lenit aghsana w-3etyet wra2, 3rafo enno el-sayf 2arib.
W-kamen eza shefto kell hal-shi, 3rafo enno el-maji2 2arib, w-sar 3al-bweb.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a: ma-ra7 yekhlas hal-jeel 7atta ykoun sar hayda kello.
El-sama wel-ard bitzoul w-kaleme ma bizoul.
"Hayda el-nhar w-hayde el-se3a ma 7ada ra7 ya3rif aymata ra7 ysiro, la maleyket el-sama wala el-2eben, wa7do el-Ãb bya3rif.
Ntebho w-s'haro, li2annkon ma bta3erfo aymata byeje el-wa2et.
W-hal-shi metl rejjel sefar w-tarak beyto w-sallamo la-kheddemo, kell wa7ad 3atah sheghlo, w-wassa el-bouwweb ydall sohran.
S'haro, li2annkon ma bta3erfo ayya yawm byeje el-RAB, 3ashiye aw bi-noss el-leyl aw lamma ysi7 el-deek aw el-sob7,
7atta ma yeje faj2a w-yle2ikon neymin.
W-yalle 2elto elkon b2oulo la-kell el-nes: s'haro!"
W-abl el-fos7 w-3id el-fateer bi-yawmen, keno rou2asa el-kahane w-mou3allimi el-shari3a 3am bifakkro keef baddon yel2ato YASOU3 bi-shi ta-ye2etlouh.
Bass 2alo: "ma ra7 na3mil hal-shi bel-3id, ta-ma ysir fi balbale bayn el-sha3b."
W-lamma ken YASOU3 bi-Beyt-3anya, 3end Sem3an el-abras, 3am yekol, 2arrabit minno mara 7emle 2anninet 3otr ghale ktir, min el-nardin el-m2attar, kasaret el-2annine w-sakabit el-3otr 3a-raso.
El-mawjoudin akhad 3a-khateron w-2alo bayn ba3don: "shou hal-ba3za2a?
Ken fina nbi3o bi-aktar min tlet-miyyet dinar w-yetwazza3 7a'2o 3al-fou2ara!" W-saro yloumo el-mara.
2al YASOU3: "trekouwa, leysh 3am teze3jouwa? Hiye 3emlit shi mni7.
El-fou2ara 3endkon kell el-wa2et, wa2et yalle badkon bte2daro tse3douwon. Bass ana ma ra7 koun kell el-wa2et ma3kon.
W-hal-mara 3emlt yalle fiya ta3mlo, w-sakabit hal-3otr 3a-jesme, 7atta t7addro lal-dafn.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a: wayn ma ra7 yetbashar bel-injil bel-3alam kello, ra7 yen7aka bi-yalle 3emleto, w-yetzakkarouha."
Ra7 Yahouza el-eskharyoute, wa7ad min el-tlemiz el-tna3sh, la-3and rou2asa el-kahane la-ysallemon YASOU3.
Fer7o la-kalemo, w-wa3adouh enno ya3touh masare. W-sar nater el-fersa la-ysallmo.
Bi-awwal yawm min 3id el-fateer, wa2et yalle btendaba7 el-khwerif la-3asha el-fos7, sa2alouh el-tlemiz: "wayn baddak n7adderlak 3asha el-fos7?"
Ba3at tnen min tlemizo w-2allon: "rou7o 3al-madine, ra7 tshoufo rejjel 7amel jarret may, l7a2ouh.
W-lamma bifout 3al-beyt 2oulo la-sa7ib el-beyt: bi2oul el-mou3allim: wayn gherefte yalle ra7 ekol fiya 3asha el-fos7 ma3 tlemize?
Ra7 yfarjikon bi-a3la el-beyt gherfe wes3a mafroushe mjahhaze, 7addro el-3asha honik."
Ra7o el-telmizen w-feto 3al-madine, le2o metl ma-2allon w-7addaro 3asha el-fos7.
Lamma sar 3ashiye, eja ma3 tlemizo el-tna3sh.
W-henne w-2e3deen 3am yeklo, 2al YASOU3: "b2elkon el-7a2i2a: wa7ad minkon ra7 ysallimne, w-houe 3am yekol ma3e.
Ze3lo el-tlemiz w-saro yes2alouh, wa7ad wara el-tene: "awlak ana?"
2allon: "houe wa7ad min el-tna3sh, w-houe yalle bighott le2emto bel-sa7n ma3e.
W-2eben el-2ensen ra7 ymout metl ma nkatab 3anno bel-ketob el-m2addase, bass ya weylo yalle baddo ysallim 2eben el-2ensen! Ken a7sanlo enno ma yekhla2."
Henne w-3am yeklo, akhad khebz w-shakar Allah w-sha2af el-khebz w-newalon w-2al: "khedo, hayda jesme ana."
W-akhad kes w-shakar w-newalon, w-sherbo minna kellon,
w-2allon: "Hayda damme ana, damm el-3ahd el-jdid yalle ra7 yet2addam kermel nes ktar.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a: ma ra7 eshrab min ba3d liom min 3asir el-karme, 7atta yeje yawm w-eshrab nbeed jdid bi-malakout ALLAH."
Min ba3da rattalo w-tol3o 3a-jabal el-Zeytoun.
2allon YASOU3: "ra7 teterkoune kellkon, li2anno el-kteb bi2oul: ra7 edrob el-ra3i, w-btetshattat el-khwerif.
Bass min ba3d 2iyemte ra7 esba2kon 3al-Jaleel."
2allo Boutros: "law tarakouk kellon, ana ma ra7 eterkak."
Jewabo YASOU3: "b2ellak el-7a2i2a, ya Boutros: liom, bi-hal-leyle, abl ma ysi7 el-deek marteyn, ra7 tenkerne tlet marrat."
Asarr Boutros 3ala 2awlo: "ma benkrak 7atta law njabaret mout ma3ak!" w-hek 2alo kamen el-tlemiz kellon.
Ejo 3ala matra7 esmo Jetsemani, w-2al YASOU3 la-tlemizo: "23ado hon, 7atta ana salle."
Akhad ma3o Boutros w-Ya3koub w-You7anna, w-ballash y7ess bel-7ezn w-yenhamm.
2allon: "nafse 7azine la-7add el-mawt. Ntero hon w-s'haro ma3e."
W-ba3ad 3annon shwey w-raka3 3al-ard w-sar ysalle 7atta teb3od 3anno hal-se3a, eza ken hal-shi moumkin.
2al: "bayye, ya bayye! Enta edir 3ala kell shi, b3od 3anne hal-kes. Bass mish metl ma ana badde, metl ma baddak enta."
W-reje3 w-le2ehon neymin, 2al la-Boutros: "enta neyim ya Boutros? Ma edrt ennak tes'har ma3e walaw se3a we7de?
S'haro w-sallo, 7atta ma tou2a3o bel-tajribe. El-rou7 mist3edde, bass el-jesm d3if."
W-ba3ad marra tenye w-salla, w-raddad el-kalem zeto.
W-reje3 kamen la-3andon w-le2ehon neymin, li2anno te2lo 3younon min el-na3as w-7taro shou baddon yjewbouh.
W-reje3 lal-marra el-telte w-2allon: "ento ba3dkon neymin w-merte7in? Bikaffe! Ejet el-se3a enno yetsallam 2eben el-2ensen la-2iden el-khatyeen.
2oumo nfell! Yalle baddo ysallimne wossil."
Houe w-YASOU3 3am ye7ke wossil Yahouza, yalle houe wa7ad min tlemizo el-tna3sh, 3a-ras 3isabe kbire bte7mol el-syouf wel-3ese, ba3atouha rou2asa el-kahane w-mou3allimi el-shari3a wel-shyoukh.
W-ken yalle baddo ysallmo 3atiyon 3aleme, 2allon: "yalle badde bouso bikoun hayda houe, kmeshouh w-khedouh bi-7irase 2awiye."
W-lamma wossil Yahouza, 2arrab deghre sawb YASOU3 w-2allo: "ya mou3allim!" W-beso.
W-hajamo 3le w-kamashouh.
W-sa7ab wa7ad min el-mawjoudin seyfo, w-darab khadim ra2is el-kahane w-2ata3lo daynto.
2allon YASOU3: "tekhmin jeyin tekemshoulkon shi 7arame ta-hejmeen 3leyye bel-syouf w-bel-3ese?
Kent kell yawm e23od ma3kon bel-haykal w-3allim, w-ma kamashtoune, bass kell hal-shi sar ta-tet7a'2a2 el-ketob el-m2addase."
W-tarakouh kellon w-harabo.
W-le7'2o shabb mish lebis ghayr 3abeye 3ala jesmo, w-kamashouh kamen.
Fa-tarak 3abeyto w-harab bel-zolt.
Akhado YASOU3 la-3and ra2is el-kahane, w-jtama3o rou2asa el-kahane wel-shyoukh w-mou3allimi el-shari3a kellon.
W-le72o Boutros min b3id 3ala dar ra2is el-kahane, fet w-2a3ad ma3 el-7aras 3am yetdaffa 7add el-nar.
W-keno rou2asa el-kahane w-kell a3da2 el-majles 3am yetolbo shahede 3ala YASOU3 la-ye2etlouh w-ma 3am bile2o,
li2anno nes ktar shehdo 3le bel-zour w-tna2adit shahedeton.
2amo nes ghayron w-shehdo 3le bel-zour, w-2alo:
"Ne7na sme3neh 3am bi2oul: ra7 habbit hayda el-haykal el-ma3moul min 2iden el-nes, w-ra7 3ammir bi-tlet tiyem haykal ghayro mish ma3moul min 2iden el-nes."
W-bi-hal-shi tna2adit shahedeton.
2am ra2is el-kahane bi-noss el-majles w-sa2al YASOU3: "ma baddak tjewib bi-shi? Shou hayda li-3am bi2oulouh 3annak?"
W-dall YASOU3 sekit, ma 3am bi2oul kelme. W-sa2alo ra2is el-kahane marra tenye: "2elna, enta el-MASI7 2eben ALLAH el-moubarak?"
Jewabo YASOU3: "ana houe. W-ra7 tshoufo min ba3d liom 2eben el-2ensen 2e3id 3an yameen ALLAH el-2adeer w-jeye 3ala ghyoum el-sama."
S3eta khazza2 ra2is el-kahane tyebo w-2al: "ma 3edna bi-7aje la-shouhoud?
Sme3to tejdeefo, shou ra2eykon?" 7akamo 3le kellon enno byest7e2 el-mawt.
W-fi minnon baza2o bi-wejjo, w-saro yghattoulo wejjo w-yederbouh w-y2ouloulo: "7zar." W-saro el-7erras yederbouh.
Ken Boutros, ta7t, bi-se7it el-dar, ejet khãdme min kheddem ra2is el-kahane.
Lamma shefit Boutros 3am yetdaffa, ettalla3et fih w-2aletlo: "enta kamen kent ma3 YASOU3 el-Nassire!"
Nakar Boutros w-2al: "ma ba3rif w-ma 3am befham shou 3am bit2oule!" w-toli3 3ala el-dahliz, shwey sa7 el-deek.
Shefeto el-khãdme, w-saret t2oul lal-mawjoudin: "hayda wa7ad minnon!"
W-kamen nakar Boutros. W-ba3d shwey, 2alo el-mawjoudin la-Boutros: "akid enta wa7ad minnon, li2annak min el-Jaleel."
Sar yel3an w-ye7lof: "ana ma ba3rif hal-rejjel yalle 3am te7ko 3anno."
W-deghre sa7 el-deek marra tenye, w-tzakkar Boutros lamma 2al YASOU3: "abl ma ysi7 el-deek marteyn, ra7 tenkerne tlet marrat." W-sar yebke.
W-lamma toli3 el-daw, tshewaro rou2asa el-kahane wel-shyoukh w-mou3allimi el-shari3a w-kell a3da2 el-majles, min ba3da kalbajo YASOU3 w-akhadouh w-sallamouh la-Bilatos.
Sa2alo Bilatos: "enta malik el-Yahoud?" jewabo: "enta 2elt."
W-ettahamouh rou2asa el-kahane ettihemet ktire.
W-sa2alo Bilatos marra tenye: "ma ra7 tjeweb bi-shi? Sma3 addeysh 3am biwajhoulak teham!."
Ma jewab YASOU3 bi-shi, w-t3ajjab Bilatos.
W-ken Bilatos bi-kell 3id ye3fe 3an ma7bous, bina'2ih el-sha3b.
W-ken fi rejjel esmo Barabas ma7bous ma3 jame3a min el-msheghbeen rtakabo jarimet 2atl bi-wa2et el-fetne.
Tjamma3o el-nes w-saro ytalbo Bilatos bi-yalle wa3adon fih,
2allon: "badkon e3filkon 3an malik el-Yahoud?"
Li2anno ken 3arif enno rou2asa el-kahane min 7asadon sallamo YASOU3.
Bass rou2asa el-kahane tabba2o el-nes 3ala enno yetolbo enno Barabas yen3afa.
2allon Bilatos marra tenye: "w-shou ba3mil bi-yalle 3am bitsammouh malik el-Yahoud?"
W-rej3o saro ysarrkho: "slebo!"
2allon: "shou 3eml shi mish mni7?" Saro ysarrkho aktar: "slebo!"
W-ken Bilatos baddo yorde el-nes, kermel hek 3efelon 3an Barabas. W-min ba3d ma jalad YASOU3 sallamo ta-yensalab.
Akhado el-3askar YASOU3 la-jouwwet el-dar yalle hiye 2asr el-7akem w-jama3o el-katibe kella.
W-labbasouh a7mar, w-7addaro eklil min shawk w-7attouh 3a-raso,
w-saro ysallmo 3le w-y2oulo: "Salem, ya malik el-Yahoud!"
W-yederbouh bi-2asbe 3ala raso w-ybaz2o 3le, w-yesejdoulo 3a-rekbeton.
W-min ba3d ma tmaskharo 3le, shelo 3anno el-tawb el-a7mar w-labbasouh tyebo w-talla3ouh la-yesolbouh.
W-sakharo Sem3an el-Kayrine, bayy Eskandar w-Roufos, la-ye7mol salib YASOU3, w-ken 3al-tari2 reji3 min el-7a2l.
W-jebo YASOU3 lal-matra7 yalle esmo el-Jouljoutha, ye3ne "el-joumjoume",
w-3atouh nbeed makhlout bel-morr, rafad enno yeshraba.
Min ba3da salabouh w-2assamo tyebo bayneton bel-2or3a.
W-kenit el-se3a tes3a el-sob7 wa2et salabouh.
W-3anwano el-7ekm 3le ketbin: "malik el-Yahoud."
W-salabo ma3o lossen, wa7ad 3an yameeno w-wa7ad 3an shmelo.
[W tamm yalle n2al bel-kteb: "n3add ma3 el-mejrmeen"].
W-keno el-mer2in min honik 3am bihezzo bi-rason w-ysebbouh w-y2oulo: "Ya hal-hedim el-haykal w-m3ammro bi-tlet tiyyem,
khallis 7alak w-nzal 3an el-salib."
W-keno rou2asa el-kahane w-mou3allimi el-shari3a 3am yetmaskharo kamen, w-saro y2oulo la-ba3don: "Khallas ghayro, w-ma bye2dar ykhallis 7alo!
Khallih yenzal halla2 el-MASI7 malik Isra2il 3an el-salib, 7atta nshouf w-n2ãmin fih!" w-keno el-lossen el-masloubin ma3o 3am yetmaskharo 3le kamen.
W-3al-dohr 3attamit el-dene kella lal-se3a tlete.
Sarakh YASOU3 bi-sawt 3ale: "Ilou2i, Ilou2i, lima shabaqtani?" Ye3ne "ILAHI, ILAHI, leysh taraketne?"
W-sem3ouh yalle keno honik, 2alo: "haye2to 3am yendah Eliyya!"
W-rakad wa7ad w-akhad sfenje w-ghattasa bel-khall w-7atta 3a-taraf 2asbe w-rafa3lo yeha ta-yeshrab, houe w-3am bi2oul: "tanshouf eza ra7 yeje Eliyya ta-ykhallso!"
W-sarakh YASOU3 sarkha 2awiye w-sallam rou7o.
W-nkhaza2 7ijeb el-haykal sha2ften min fo2 la-ta7t.
W-ken ra2is el-7aras we2if eddem el-salib, w-lamma shef keef sallam rou7o, 2al: "Mbala, hal-rejjel ken 7a2i2atan 2eben ALLAH!"
W-ken fi honik neswen 3am yettalla3o min b3id, bayneton Maryam el-Majdaliyye w-Maryam emm Ya3koub el-zghir w-Youssi, w-Saloma,
w-henne yalle le72o YASOU3 w-khadamouh wa2et ken bel-Jaleel, w-ghayron ktar tel3o ma3o 3ala Ourashalim.
W-eja 3achiye, w-ken wa2et el-te7dir lal-sabt.
W-eja Youssef el-Rami, w-ken min majles el-Yahoud el-mhemmin, w-min yalle natrin malakout ALLAH, tshajja3 w-fet la-3and Bilatos w-talab jesm YASOU3.
T3ajjab Bilatos enno ykoun met. Ba3at ra2is el-7aras w-sa2alo: "min zamen met?"
W-lamma sem3 el-khabar min ra2is el-7aras, sama7 la-Youssef yekhod jesm YASOU3.
Shtara kafan, w-min ba3da nazzal el-jesm 3an el-salib w-kaffano w-7atto bi-2abr ma7four bel-sakhr, w-da7raj 7ajar 3ala beb el-2abr.
W-shefit Maryam el-Majdaliyye w-Maryam emm Youssi wayn 7attouh.
W-lamma kholis el-sabt, shtaret Maryam el-Majdaliyye, w-Maryam emm Ya3koub, w-Saloma, 7nout la-yejo y7annto jesm YASOU3.
Yawm el-a7ad, el-sob7, 3a tlou3 el-daw, ejo 3al-2abr.
W-keno 3am bi2oulo la-ba3don: "min ra7 yda7rejelna el-7ajar 3an beb el-2abr?"
W-lamma ettalla3o le2o el-7ajar mda7raj, w-ken ktir kbir.
Feto 3al-2abr, w-shefo shabb 2e3id 3al-yameen, lebis tawb abyad, fa-khafo.
2allon: "ma tkhafo! Ento badkon YASOU3 el-Nassire el-masloub. Manno hon, li2anno 2am. W-hayda matra7 ma 7attouh.
Rou7o w-2oulo la-tlemizo w-la-Boutros: Ra7 yesba2kon 3al-Jaleel, w-honik bitshoufouh metl ma 2allkon."
Tel3o min el-2abr herbenin min ketrit el-7ire wel-khawf. W-ma khabbaro 7ada shi li2annon keno khayfin.
[Min ba3d ma 2am YASOU3 el-a7ad el-sob7, zahar awwal shi 3ala Maryam el-Majdaliyye yalle sha7at minna sab3 shyateen.
Ra7et w-khabbarit tlemizo, yalle keno 3am yebko,
wa2et yalle sem3o enno 3ayish w-enna shefeto ma sadda2ouwa.
W-min ba3da zahar YASOU3 bi-shakl tene la-tnen min tlemizo henne w-3al-tari2 ray7in sawb el-reef.
Rej3o khabbaro el-be2yin, w-ma sadda2ouwon.
