W-zahar ekher marra la-tlemizo el-7da3sh, henne w-3am yeklo, se3eta lemon 3ala 2ellit imenon w-2asewet 2loubon, li2annon ma sadda2o el-ashkhas yalle shefouh min ba3d ma 2am.
W-2allon: "rou7o 3al-3alam, w-bashro bel-injil la-kell el-nes.
Yalle bi2ãmen w-byet3ammad ra7 yle2e el-khalãs, w-yalle ma bi2ãmen bitrou7 3le.
W-yalle bi2ãmno ra7 ykoun 3endon 3alemet: byesh7ato el-shyateen bi-esme, w-bye7ko bi-loughat jdide,
w-byel2ato bi-2ideyon el-7ayyet. W-eza sherbo el-samm ma bimouto, w-bi7otto 2ideyon 3al-marda w-byeshfouwon."
W-min ba3d ma 7eke el-RAB YASOU3 tlemizo, toli3 3al-sama w-2a3ad 3an yameen ALLAH.
Wel-tlemiz, ra7o ta-ybashro wayn ma ken, wel-RAB ken 3am bise3edon w-ythabbet kalemon bel-3ajeyeb].
Li2anno ktar min el-nes saro yeketbo 2ossit el-a7des yalle saret 3enna,
metl ma na2alna yeha yalle keno min el-bideye shouhoud 3ayen w-kheddem lal-kelme,
sheft ana kamen, min ba3d ma le7a2et kell shi min awwalo w-da2a2et fih, enno ekteblak henne wara ba3d, ya sa7ib el-sharaf Tawfilos,
7atta tet2akkad min 7a2i2et el-ta3lim yalle sme3to.
Ken 3ala iyem Hirodos malik el-Yahoudiye kehen min fer2et Abiyya esmo Zakariyya, 3endo zawje min sleelet Haroun esma Elisabat.
W-keno Zakariyya w-Elisabat sal7in eddem ALLAH, 3ayshin 7asab a7kemo w-wassayah, bidoun lawm.
W-ma ken 3endon walad, li2anno Elisabat kenit ma tjeeb wled, w-kenit hiye w-Zakariyya kbar bel-3omr.
W-lamma Zakariyya ken 3am bimeres khedmto el-kahnoutiye eddem ALLAH, wel-dawr dawr fere2to,
wa2a3et el-2or3a 3le, 7asab el-3ade bel-kahnout, enno yfout 3a-2ods a2des haykal el-RAB w-ye7ro2 el-bakhour.
W-ken el-sha3b 3am bisalle barra lamma ken 3am ye7ro2 el-bakhour.
Zaharlo malèk el-RAB w-we2f 3ala yameen mazba7 el-bakhour.
W-lamma shefo Zakariyya edtarab w-khaf.
2allo el-malèk: "ma tkhaf ya Zakariyya, li2anno ALLAH sem3 salatak w-ra7 twallid martak Elisabat 2eben w-bitsammih You7anna.
W-ra7 tefra7 fih w-t'hallel, w-byefra7 bi-miledo ktar min el-nes,
li2anno bikoun 3azeem 3end el-RAB, ma ra7 yeshrab nbeed wala mashroub bisakker, byentele min el-ROU7 el-2ODOS houe w-bi-batn emmo,
w-ra7 yredd ktar min wled Isra2il lal-RAB Ilehon,
w-ra7 yemshe eddem ALLAH bi-rou7 Eliyya w-2ouwwto, la-ysale7 el-bayyet ma3 wledon wel-metmarrdin yreddon la-7ekmet el-abrar, w-y7addir lal-RAB sha3b ykoun mist3edd."
2al Zakariyya lal-malèk: "keef ra7 ysir hal-shi w-ana sheykh kbir w-marte kbire bel-3omr?"
Jewabo el-malek: "Ana Gebra2il el-we2if eddem ALLAH, w-houe ba3atne ta-e7kik w-e7mellak hal-boushra"
bass li2annak ma 2ãmanet bi-kaleme, ra7 tsir akhras, w-ma ra7 te2dar te7ke la-yawm ma ysir hal-shi, w-kaleme ra7 ysir bi-wa2to."
W-ken el-sha3b nater Zakariyya w-met3ajjab leysh t2akhar jouwwa.
W-lamma dahar, ma ken 3am ye2dar ye7kiyon, w-fehmo enno shef rou2ya jouwwet el-haykal. W-ken 3am ye7ke bel-ishara, w-be2e akhras.
W-lamma kholis min iyem khedemto reje3 3ala beyto.
W-min ba3d medde 7eblet marto Elisabat, w-dallet khams tesh'hor mkhabbiyye 7abala. W-kenit t2oul:
"Hayda yalle 3atane yeh el-RAB yawm ettalla3 fiyye ta-ysheel 3anne el-3ar min bayn el-nes."
Lamma kenit Elisabat bi-shahra el-sedis, ba3at ALLAH el-malèk Gebra2il 3ala balde bel-Jaleel esma el-Nassira,
la-3and 3adra esma Maryam, kenit makhtoube la-rejjel min beyt Daoud esmo Youssef.
Fet la-3anda el-malèk w-2alla: "el-salem 3leyke, ente yalle an3am ALLAH 3leya. ALLAH ma3ik."
Tlabbakit Maryam la-kalem el-malek w-2alet la-7ala: "shou ma3na hal-salem?"
2al el-malèk: "ma tkhafe ya Maryam, li2anno ALLAH an3am 3leyke:
ra7 te7bale w-twalde 2eben w-tsammih YASOU3.
W-ra7 ykoun 3azeem w-yetsamma 2eben ALLAH, w-ra7 ya3tih el-RAB el-Ileh 3arsh bayyo Daoud,
w-byemlok 3ala beyt Ya3koub lal-abad, w-ma bikoun la-melko niheye!"
2alet Maryam lal-malèk: "keef baddo ysir hal-shi w-ana 3adra ma ba3rif rejjel?"
Jewaba el-malèk: "el-ROU7 el-2ODOS bi7ell 3leyke, w-edrit ALLAH bteghemrik, kermel hek el-2ouddous yalle ra7 youlad minnik byetsamma 2eben ALLAH.
Hayde 2arabtik Elisabat 7eblit 3a-kabar, w-3a7 tjeeb sabe, w-saret bi-shahra el-sedis, w-hiye yalle keno ysammouha el-nes 3aker.
Ma fi shi mousta7il 3end ALLAH."
2alet Maryam: "Ana khãdmet el-RAB: nshalla ysirle metl ma 3am bit2oul." W-ra7 min 3enda el-malek.
W-bi-haydik el-iyem, 2amet Maryam bi-ser3a w-ra7it 3ala madinet Yahouza bi-jbel el-Yahoudiye.
W-fetit 3a-beyt Zakariyya w-sallamet 3ala Elisabat.
Lamma sem3it Elisabat salem Maryam, t7arrak el-janin bi-batna, w-ntalet min el-ROU7 el-2ODOS,
w-sarakhit bi-a3la sawta: "moubaraka ente bayn el-neswen w-moubarak 2ebnik yalle 7ameltih bi-batnik!
Meen ana 7atta teje la-3ande emm RABBE?
Shi enne sme3t sawt salemik 7atta t7arrak el-janin min el-fara7 bi-batne.
Niyyelik, ente yalle 2ãmante enno yalle 2alo el-malèk min 2ebal el-RAB ra7 yet7a'2a2."
2alet Maryam: "nafse bit3azzim el-RAB
w-rou7e btefra7 bi-ALLAH yalle khallasne
li2anno ettalla3 fiyye, ana khadmeto el-metwad3a! Kell el-ajyel ra7 ettawwebne
li2anno el-2adeer 3eml kermele eshya 3azeeme. W-esmo 2ouddous
w-ra7emto min jeel la-jeel la-yalle bikhafouh.
Bayyan kell ederto w-shattat el-mitkabreen bi-2loubon.
Nazzal el-mitsalltin 3an 3roushon w-3alla el-metwad3in.
Shabba3 el-jou3aneen min khayrato w-radd el-aghniya fadyin.
Se3ad khadmo Isra2il w-tzakkar ra7emto,
tijeh Ibrahim w-sleelto lal-abad, metl ma wa3ad bayyetna."
W-be2yit Maryam 3end Elisabat shi tlet tesh'hor, w-ba3den rej3it 3ala beyta.
W-eja el-wa2et yalle ra7 twalled fih Elisabat 2ebna.
W-sem3o jirana w-2raybina enno ALLAH ghamara bi-ra7emto, fa-fer7o ma3a.
W-lamma sar 3omr el-tofl tmen tiyyem, ejo la-yekhetnouh. W-ken baddon ysammouh Zakariyya 3a-esm bayyo,
2alet emmo: "la2, badna nsammih You7anna."
2aloula: "ma 7ada min 2raybinik esmo hek."
W-sa2alo bayyo bel-ishara shou baddo ysamme el-tofl,
talab law7 w-katab 3le: "esmo You7anna." T3ajjabo kellon.
W-deghre nfata7 temmo w-ntala2 lseno w-sar ye7ke w-ymajjed ALLAH.
W-khafo kell el-jiran. W-7ekyo el-nes bi-kell hal-eshya bi-jbel el-Yahoudiye kella.
W-ken kell meen yesma3 fiya ye7faza bi-2albo w-y2oul: "shou ra7 yetla3 min hal-tofl?" li2anno 2id el-RAB kenit ma3o.
W-ntala Zakariyya min el-ROU7 el-2ODOS, tnabba w-2al:
yetberak el-RAB, Ileh Isra2il li2anno staf2ad sha3bo w-khallaso,
w-3ayyanelna moukhallis 2adeer bi-beyt khadmo Daoud
metl ma wa3ad min zamen 3a-lsen anbiye2o el-2eddissin
enno ykhallisna min a3de2na, w-min 2iden kell yalle byekrahouna,
w-bayyan ra7emto la-bayyetna w-tzakkar 3ahdo el-m2addas
wel-7elfen yalle 7alafo la-Ibrahim bayyna
bi-enno ykhallisna min a3de2na, 7atta ne3bado bidoun khawf,
bi-2adese w-ta2wa kell iyem 7ayetna.
W-enta, ya hal-tofl, bisammouk nabe ALLAH, li2annak ra7 temshe eddem wejj el-RAB ta-t7adderlo el-tari2
w-t3allim sha3bo enno el-khalãs houe bi-ghofran khatayahon.
Li2anno Ilehna ra7oum 7anoun byestaf2edna houe w-3am yeshro2 3leyna min fo2
la-ydawwe lal-2e3deen bel-3atme w-bimashina 3a-tari2 el-salem."
W-ken el-tofl 3am yekbar w-rou7o te2wa. W-sakan bel-barriye la-yawm yalle a3lan 7alo la-Isra2il.
W-bi haydik el-iyem 2amar el-2aysar Aughostos bi-i7sa2 kell sekken el-Embratoriyye.
W-hal-i7sa2 el-awwal sar lamma ken Kirinyos 7akem bi-Souriya.
W-ra7 kell wa7ad 3ala madinto la-yetsajjal fiya.
Ra7 Youssef min el-Jaleel min madinet el-Nassira 3al-Yahoudiye 3ala Beyt-La7m madinet Daoud, li2anno ken min beyt Daoud w-sleelto,
la-yetsajjal ma3 Maryam khatibto, w-kenit 7eble.
Henne w-bi-Beyt-La7m, eja wa2ta ta-twalled,
fa-waladet 2ebna el-bekr w-2ammateto w-nayyameto bel-ma3laf, li2anno ma le2yo matra7 ynemo fih.
W-ken bi-haydik el-manta2a re3yen neymin bel-barriye, 3am yetnewabo el-sahar bel-leyl 3ala r3iyyeton.
Zaharlon malèk el-RAB, w-sha3sha3 majd el-RAB 7awlon w-khafo ktir.
2allon el-malèk: "ma tkhafo! Ana 3am basherkon bi-fara7 3azeem ra7 y3emm el-sha3b kello:
woulidelkon liom bi-madinet Daoud moukhallis houe el-MASI7 el-RAB.
W-khedo hal-3aleme: betle2o tofl m2ammat neyim bi-ma3laf."
W-faj2a ndamm lal-malèk joumhour min 3askar el-sama, 3am bisabb7o ALLAH w-y2oulo:
"el-majd la-ALLAH bel-sama, wel-salem 3al-ard, bayn el-nes yalle ALLAH rade 3leyon."
W-lamma fallo el-maleyke min 3endon lal-sama, 2alo el-re3yen la-ba3don: "ta3o nrou7 3ala Beyt-La7m ta-nshouf hal-7adath yalle khabbarna 3anno el-RAB."
W-ejo bi-ser3a, w-le2o Maryam w-Youssef, wel-tofl neyim bel-ma3laf.
W-lamma shefouh khabbaro el-nes shou 2allon el-malèk 3an el-tofl,
w-kell yalle sem3o bi-hal-shi ndahasho min yalle 2aloulon yeh el-re3yen.
W-kenit Maryam 3am t7ott kell hal-eshya bi-2alba w-tfakker fiyon.
W-rej3o el-re3yen w-henne 3am bimajjdo ALLAH w-ysabb7ouh 3ala kell shi sem3ouh w-shefouh metl ma khabbaron el-malèk.
Lamma sar el-tofl 3omro tmen tiyem, eja el-waet ta-yenkhatan, sammouh YASOU3, metl ma sammeh el-malèk abl ma te7bal fih Maryam.
W-lamma eja yawm tot'hiron bi-7asab shari3et Moussa, tel3o bel-tofl YASOU3 3ala Ourashalim ta-y2admouh la-ALLAH,
metl ma maktoub bi-shari3et el-RAB: "kell bekr byefta7 ra7m byendrouh la-ALLAH",
bi2addmo el-zabi7a yalle btefroda shari3et el-RAB: jawz yamem aw ferkhen 7amem.
W-ken fi bi-Ourashalim rejjel sale7 w-ta2e esmo Sem3an, nater el-khalãs la-Isra2il, w-ken el-ROU7 nezil 3le.
W-ken el-ROU7 el-2ODOS alhamo enno ma ra7 ymout abl ma yshouf MASI7 el-RAB.
Eja 3al-haykal bi-elhem min el-rou7. W-lamma feto Youssef w-Maryam w-ma3on el-tofl YASOU3 ta-y2addmo yalle bteferdo el-shari3a,
7emlo Sem3an 3ala 2idey w-berak ALLAH w-2al:
"ya RAB, halla2 7a'2a2et wa3dak ele, khalle khadmak yrou7 bi-salem.
3youne shefit el-khalãs
yalle 7addarto lal-shou3oub kella
nour ydawwe 3al-oumam w-majd la-sha3bak Isra2il."
T3ajjabo bayyo w-emmo min yalle 2alo Sem3an 3anno.
W-berakon Sem3an w-2al la-Maryam emmo: "hayda el-tofl eja ta-ysa'2et w-y3alle ktar min el-nes bi-Isra2il. W-houe 3aleme min ALLAH ra7 yekhtelfo 3leya,
ra7 tenkeshif naweya el-2loub. W-7atta ente, ra7 yekhro2 bi-nafsik seyf."
W-ken fi honik nabiyye kbire bel-3omr esma 7anne benet Fanou2il, min sobt Ãshir, w-3ashit ma3 zawja sab3 snin,
min ba3da be2yet armale 7atta sar 3omra arb3a-w-tmeneen, ma tarakit el-haykal tsoum w-tsalle leyl nhar.
Ejet bi-haydik el-se3a w-shakarit ALLAH w-7ekyet 3an el-tofl YASOU3 ma3 kell yalle keno natrin el-khalãs min ALLAH.
W-lamma 3emlo Youssef w-Maryam kell yalle bteferdo 3leyon shari3et el-RAB, rej3o 3al-Jaleel, 3ala-madineton el-Nassira.
W-ken el-tofl YASOU3 3am yekbar w-yet2awwa w-yentele bel-7ekme, w-kenit ne3met ALLAH 3le.
W-keno ahlo la-YASOU3 yrou7o kell sene 3ala Ourashalim bi-3id el-fos7.
W-lamma YASOU3 sar 3omro tna3sh, tel3o 3ala Ourashalim metl 3adeton bel-3id.
W-min ba3d ma mara2et iyem el-3id akhado tari2 el-raj3a, be2e el-sabe YASOU3 bi-Ourashalim, w-ahlo mish 3arfin,
keno mfakrino ma3 el-msefrin. W-min ba3d yawm mashe saro ynabsho 3le 3end el-2rayib wel-ma3aref,
bass ma le2ouh. W-rej3o 3ala Ourashalim 7atta yfattsho 3le,
w-le2ouh min ba3d tlet tiyem bel-haykal, 2e3id ma3 mou3allimi el-shari3a, 3am yetsamma3 3leyon w-yes2alon.
W-keno kell yalle 3am yesma3ouh madhoushin min zakeh w-ajwebto.
W-lamma shefouh ahlo t3ajjabo. W-2aletlo emmo: "ya 2ebne, leysh 3melt fina hek? Bayyak w-ana kenna 3am nfattesh 3lek w-net3azzab."
Jewabon: "leysh 3am bitfattsho 3leyye? Mish 3arfin enno lezim koun bi-beyt bayye?"
W-ma fehmo ma3na kalemo.
W-reje3 YASOU3 ma3on 3ala el-Nassira, w-ken moutee3 elon. W-kenit emmo t7ott kell hal-shi bi-2alba.
W-ken YASOU3 3am yekbar bel-2ame wel-7ekme wel-ne3me 3end ALLAH wel-nes.

W bel-sene el-khams-ta3sh min 7ekm el-2aysar Tibarios, lamma ken Bilatos el-Bounti 7akem bel-Yahoudiye, w-Hirodos wele 3al-Jaleel, w-khayyo Filippos wele 3ala Etorya w-Trakhonitos, w-Lisanios wele 3ala Ebilinya,
w-7annan w-kayafa rou2asa lal-kahane, kenit kelmet ALLAH la-You7anna 2eben Zakariyya bel-barriye,
eja 3a-kell manate2 el-Ordon, 7atta ynede el-nes bi-ma3moudiyyet el-tawbe la-tenghafar khatayahon,
metl ma katab el-nabe Ashe3ya: "sawt 3am yesrokh bel-barriye: 7addro tari2 el-RAB, w-khallo tor2ato jelse.
Kell wede ra7 yenradam w-kell jabal w-talle ra7 youto wel-tor2at el-m3aw3aje bitsir jelse wel-wo3ra bitsir sahle
w-bishouf kell 2ensen khalãs ALLAH!"
W-ken You7anna y2oul lal-nes yalle ejo la-yet3ammado 3ala 2ido: "ya wled el-7ayyet, meen 3allamkon enno teherbo min el-ghadab el-jeye?
3tou thamar ybarhen 3ala tawbetkon, w-ma t2oulo la-7alkon: enno bayna houe Ibrahim! B7ebb 2elkon: enno ALLAH edir ya3mil min hal-7jara wled la-Ibrahim!
Layko el-fa2s 3ala jouzou3 el-shajar, kell shajra ma bta3te thamar tayyib bten2ata3 w-btenrama bel-nar."
W-sa2alouh el-nes: "shou mna3mil?"
Jewabon: "yalle 3endo tawben, ya3te yalle ma 3endo tyeb. W-yalle ma3o 2akl, yet2asamo ma3 el-be2yin."
W-eja kamm wa7ad min yalle bilemmo el-darayib, baddon yet3ammado, 2aloulo: "ya mou3allim, shou mna3mil?"
2allon: "ma tejma3o min el-darayib aktar min el-mafroud 3leykon."
W-sa2alo kamm wa7ad min el-3askar: "w-ne7na, shou mna3mil?" 2allon: "ma tezolmo 7ada, w-ma teftero 3ala 7ada, w-2na3o bi-ejretkon."
W-keno el-nes natrin el-MASI7, w-henne 3am yes2alo 7alon 3an You7anna: "awlkon hayda houe el-MASI7?"
2allon You7anna: "Ana b3ammedkon bel-may, bass yalle jeye halla2 houe a2wa minne, w-ma best7e2 fekk shrit sandalo. Bi3ammedkon bel-ROU7 el-2ODOS wel-nar,
w-byekhod el-medraye bi-2ido, w-bina2e baydaro, w-byejma3 el-2am7 bi-makhzano, w-bye7ro2 el-tebn bi-nar ma btontofe."
W-ken You7anna 3am you3az el-nes w-ybasheron bi-eshya ktire ghayra.
Bass wabbakh el-7akem Hirodos li2anno tzawwaj Hirodiyya mart khayyo w-3eml ktir eshya 3atle,
w-zed Hirodos 3ala kell hal-shi enno kamash You7anna w-7atto bel-7abs.
W-lamma t3ammad el-sha3b kello, t3ammad YASOU3 kamen. W-lamma ken 3am bisalle nfata7et el-sama,
w-nezl el ROU7 el-2ODOS 3le bi-shakl 7amemeh, w-nsama3 sawt min el-sama 3am bi2oul: "enta 2ebne el-7abib yalle rdeet 3anno."
W-ken YASOU3 3omro shi tleteen sene lamma ballash riselto. W-keno el-nes ye7esbouh 2eben Youssef, 2eben 3ale,
2eben Mat'thath, 2eben Lawi, 2eben Malki, 2eben Yanna, 2eben Youssef,
2eben Matathia, 2eben 3amous, 2eben Na7oum, 2eben 7asli, 2eben Najjay,
2eben Maãt, 2eben Matathia, 2eben Sham3i, 2eben Youssef, 2eben Yahouza,
2eben You7anna, 2eben Risa, 2eben Zaroubabel, 2eben Sha2alta2il, 2eben Niri,
2eben Malki, 2eben Addi, 2eben Kousam, 2eben el-Moudam, 2eben 3ir,
2eben Yashou3, 2eben Ali3azar, 2eben Yourim, 2eben Mat'thath, 2eben Lawi,
2eben Sham3oun, 2eben Yahouza, 2eben Youssef, 2eben Younen, 2eben Aliyakim,
2eben Malya, 2eben Maynan, 2eben Mattatha, 2eben Nathan, 2eben Daoud,
2eben Yassa, 2eben 3oubid, 2eben Bou3az, 2eben Shale7, 2eben Na7shoun,
2eben 3amminadab, 2eben Admi, 2eben 3arni, 2eben 7asroun, 2eben Faris, 2eben Yahouza,
2eben Ya3koub, 2eben Is7ak, 2eben Ibrahim, 2eben Tare7, 2eben Na7our,
2eben Sarrouj, 2eben Ra3ou, 2eben Falaj, 2eben 3aber, 2eben Shale7,
2eben Kaynan, 2eben Arfakshad, 2eben Sam, 2eben Nou7, 2eben Lamik,
2eben Matoushale7, 2eben Akhnoukh, 2eben Yared, 2eben Mahlal2il, 2eben Kaynan,
2eben Anoush, 2eben Sheet, 2eben Ãdam, 2eben ALLAH.
W-reje3 YASOU3 min nahr el-Ordon, w-houe melyen min el-ROU7 el-2ODOS, w-akhado el-ROU7 3al-barriye.
Arb3een yawm, w-eblees ken 3am bijarbo, w-ma akal shi toul haydik el-iyem fa-je3.
2allo eblees: "eza kent 2eben ALLAH, 2oul la-hal-7jara enno tsir khebz.
Jewabo YASOU3: "bi2oul el-kteb: ma bi3ish el-2ensen bass min el-khebz."
W-talla3o eblees 3ala jabal 3ale w-farjeh bi-la7za kell mamelik el-ard,
w-2allo: "ba3tik hal-soultan kello w-majd hal-mamelik li2annon ele w-ana ba3tiyon la-yalle badde yeh.
Eza bterka3le bikouno kellon elak."
Jewabo YASOU3: "bi2oul el-kteb: lal-RAB Ilehak btesjod, w-bte3bado elo wa7do."
W-akhado eblees 3ala Ourashalim, w-wa2afo 3ala sherfit el-haykal w-2allo: "eza kent 2eben ALLAH, kebb 7alak min hon la-ta7t,
li2anno el-kteb bi2oul: biwasse maleyekto fik la-ye7fazouk.
Bye7emlouk 3ala 2ideyon 7atta ma-tedrob ejrak bi-7ajar."
Bijewbo YASOU3: "bi2oulo: ma tjarrib el-RAB Ilehak."
W-min ba3d ma stanfad eblees kell tajerbo, tarako la-wa2et tene.
Reje3 YASOU3 3al-Jaleel, w-houe melyen bi-2ouwwet el-ROU7 el-2ODOS, w-sem3o fih bi-kell el-manta2a.
W-ken y3allim bi-majeme3on, wel-kell ymajjdo.
W-eja YASOU3 3al-Nassira matra7 ma-trabba, w-fet 3al-majma3 yawm el-sabt metl 3adto, w-2am la-yo2ra.
3atouh kteb el-nabe Ashe3ya, w-lamma fata7 el-kteb shef el-ma2ta3 yalle maktoub fih:
"ROU7 el-RAB 3leyye li2anno masa7ne ta-basher el-fou2ara, ba3atne ta-nede bel-7orriyye lal-ma7bousin, w-khalle el-3emyen yerja3o ye2sha3o, ta-7arrer el-mazloumin
w-e3lon el-wa2et yalle fih bye2bal el-RAB sha3bo."
W-sakkar YASOU3 el-kteb w-rajja3o la-khadim el-majma3 w-2a3ad. W-kenit 3youn el-mawjoudin kella 3le.
2allon: "liom t7a'2a2et hal-kelmet yalle sme3touwon."
Shahadoulo kellon, w-t3ajjabo min kalem el-ne3me yalle 3am yetla3o min temmo, w-2alo: "mish hayda 2eben Youssef?"
2allon YASOU3: "ra7 t2ouloule hal-matal: ya tabib shfi 7alak, w-3mol hon bi-watanak yalle sme3na ennak 3melto bi-Kfarna7oum."
W-2allon: "b2elkon el-7a2i2a: ma byen2abal nabe bi-watano.
W-b2elkon 3an 7a2: ken fi bi-Isra2il araml ktir 3a-iyem Eliyya, lamma twa2af el-shete tlet snin w-sitt tesh'hor, w-sar fi maje3a 2awiye bel-bled kella,
w-ma ba3at ALLAH Eliyya la-3and wala we7de minnon, bass ba3ato la-3and armale bi-Serfet Sayda.
W-ken fi bi-Isra2il ktir bors 3a-iyem el-nabe Alisha3, w-ma shafa ALLAH wala 7ada minnon ella Ne3man el-Soure."
W-lamma sem3o el-mawjoudin bel-majma3 hal-kalem ghodbo ktir.
2amo, w-talla3ouh la-barrat el-madine, w-akhadouh 3ala 7affit el-jabal yalle kenit madineton m3ammara 3le ta-ykebbouh minna.
Bass houe sa7ab 7alo min bayneton w-ra7.
W-nezl YASOU3 3ala Kfarna7oum, w-hiye madine bel-Jaleel, w-sar y3allim el-nes yawm el-sabt.
W-t3ajjabo kellon min ta3limo, li2anno ken 3am ye7ke bi-soultan.
W-bel-majma3 ken fi rejjel fiyo rou7 shaytan, sarakh bi-a3la sawto:
"shou elak 3leyye, ya-YASOU3 el-Nassire? Jeet ta-tmawwetna? Ana ba3rif enta meen: enta 2ouddous ALLAH!"
Haddado YASOU3, w-2al: "khras w-dhar min hal-rejjel!" Kabb el-shaytan el-rejjel bi-noss el-majma3 w-dahar minno, bidoun ma ye2zih.
Staghrabo kellon, w-2alo la-ba3don: shou hal-7ake? Bye2mor arwe7 el-sharr bi-soultan w-edra w-byedharo."
W-ntashar sito bi-haydik el-manta2a kella.
Min ba3da tarak YASOU3 el-majma3 w-fet 3a-beyt Sem3an. W-kenit 7amet Boutros ma7moume ktir, fa-khabbarouh 3anna.
2arrab YASOU3 minna, w-haddad el-7emme fa-taraketa, w-2amet deghre w-saret tekhdemon.
W-lamma ghabit el-shams, ejo el-nes w-jeboulo el-marda, min kell el-anwe3, 7att 2idey 3ala kell wa7ad minnon w-shafehon.
W-daharet el-shyateen min ktir min el-marda hiye w-3am teshrokh: "enta 2eben ALLAH!" w-ken YASOU3 3am yhaddedon w-yemna3on ye7ko, li2anno 3erfo enno houe el-MASI7.
W-toli3 YASOU3 el-sob7, w-ra7 3ala matra7 b3id. W-fattasho 3anno el-nes, w-lamma le2ouh tmassako fih la-7atta ma yfell min 3endon.
2allon: "lezim basher be2e el-moudon bi-malakout ALLAH, li2anno jeet kermel hal-shi."
W-ra7 ybasher bi-majeme3 el-Yahoudiye.
Ken YASOU3 3ala shatt bou7ayrit Jennisarat, tjmma3o el-nes 7awlo la-yesma3o kelmet ALLAH.
W-shef shakhtourten resyin 3al-shatt, tel3o minnon el-siyyade la-yghaslo el-shbek.
W-toli3 3ala wa7ad minnon, w-ken la-Sem3an, w-talab minno enno yba3ed shwey 3an el-yebse. W-2a3ad YASOU3 bel-shakhtoura w-sar y3allim el-nes.
W-lamma khallas 7ake, 2al la-Sem3an: "rou7o 3al-ghami2 w-kebbo el-shbek lal-sayd."
Jewabo Sem3an: "t3ebna kell el-leyl, ya mou3allim, w-ma tsayyadna shi. Bass ra7 kebb el-shbek ma zel enta talabit."
W-3emlo hal-shi w-min ketrit el-samak yalle talla3ouh, shbekon kenit ra7 tetkhazza2.
Nedo el-shouraka taba3on bel-shakhtoura el-tenye ta-yejo w-yse3douwon. Ejo w-mallo el-shakhtourten w-3a shwey keno ra7 yeghra2o.
W-lamma shef Sem3an yalle sar raka3 eddem ejren YASOU3 w-2al: "bay3ed 3anne, ya Rab! Ana rejjel khate."
W-ken madhoush houe w-rfe2o kellon la-ketrit el-samak yalle stadouh.
W-metlon Ya3koub w-You7anna, wled Zabada w-henne shouraka Sem3an. 2al YASOU3 la-Sem3an: "ma tkhaf! Ra7 tkoun min liom w-rayi7 siyyad bashar."
W-lamma rej3o bel-shakhtourten 3al-yebse, tarako kell shi w-le7'2o YASOU3.
W-ken bi-madine min el-moudon, eja rejjel kello baras, lamma shef YASOU3 raka3 eddemo, wejjo bel-ard w-trajjeh, 2allo: "ya Rab, enta edir teshfine eza baddak!"
Madd YASOU3 2ido w-lamaso w-2allo: "eh, ana badde teshfa, shfa!" w-deghre sa7 min el-baras.
Wassah YASOU3 enno ma ykhabbir 7ada, w-2allo: "rou7 la-3and el-kehen w-farjih 7alak, w-rja3 2addem el-2erben yalle farado Moussa, ta-ykoun shahede elon."
W-akhbar YASOU3 ntasharit wayn ma ken, w-eja la-3ando nes ktir ta-yesma3ouh w-tenshafa amradon.
W-houe ken yense7ib 3al-barriye ta-ysalle.

Yawm min el-iyem ken YASOU3 3am bi3allim, w-min bayn el-mawjoudin ken fi min el-ferrisiyyin w-mou3allimi el-shari3a ejo min kell diya3 el-Jaleel wel-Yahoudiye w-min Ourashalim. W-kenet 2ouwwet el-RAB teshfe el-marda 3ala 2ido.
W-ejo nes 7amleen mkarsa7 3a-ma7mal, w-jarrabo yfawtouh la-y7ottouh eddemo.
W-lamma ma edro yfawtouh la-ketrit el-3aj2a, tol3o fih 3al-sat7 w-nabasho el-sa2f w-dandalo el-ma7mal 3al-noss eddem YASOU3.
W-lamma shef YASOU3 imenon, 2al lal-mkarsa7: "ya hal-rejjel, khatayak nghafaro."
Saro mou3allimi el-shari3a wel-ferrisiyyin y2oulo bi-2albon: "meen hayda yalle 3am bijaddef? Meen bye2dar yeghfor el-khataya ghayr ALLAH wa7do?"
3eref YASOU3 afkaron, jewabon: "shou hal-afkar yalle bi-2loubkon?
Shou el-ahouan? N2oul khatayak nghafaro, aw n2oul: "2oum, 7mol ma7malak w-mshi?
Ra7 farjikon enno 2eben el-2ensen 3endo soultan 3al-ard ta-yeghfor el-khataya." W-2al lal-mkarsa7: "b7ebb 2ellak: 2oum w-7mol ma7malak w-rou7 3a-beytak!"
2am el-rejjel w-dehgre 7eml ma7malo w-fall eddem kell el-mawjoudin w-ra7 3ala beyto houe w-3am yeshkor ALLAH.
W-t3ajjabo kellon w-majjado ALLAH. W-saytar el-khawf 3leyon, w-2alo: "liom shefna 3ajeyeb!"
W-toli3 YASOU3 min ba3da, w-shef wa7ad bilemm darayib esmo Lawi, 2e3id bi-beyt el-darayib, 2allo YASOU3: "l7a2ne!"
2am w-tarak kell shi w-le7'2o.
W-3emello Lawi walime kbire bi-beyto, w-ktar min lammimet el-darayib w-nes ghayron keno mawjoudin kamen.
2alo el-ferrisiyyin w-mou3allimi el-shari3a la-tlemizo henne w-3am ysher3o: "leysh 3am teklo w-teshrabo ma3 lammimet el-darayib wel-khatyeen?"
Jewab YASOU3: "yalle so7oton mni7a mish bi-7aje la-7akeem, el-7akeem houe lal marda.
Ma jeet kermel el-abrar, ana jeet kermel el-khatyeen."
2aloulo: "tlemiz You7anna bisoumo w-bisallo ktir, w-kamen tlemiz el-ferrisiyyin, bass tlemizak byeklo w-byeshrabo!"
Jewabon YASOU3: "Bye2daro ahl el-3arees ysoumo, wel-3arees ma3on?
Bass byeje wa2et birou7 fih el-3arees min bayneton w-se3eta bisoumo."
W-2allon hal-matal: "Ma 7ada byekhzo2 tawb 3ati2 w-bira2e3 fiya tawb jdid, 7atta ma yetkhazza2 el-tawb el-jdid wel-re2'3a yalle shela minno tekhod 3al-tawb el-3ati2.
Ma 7ada bi7ott nbeed jdid bi-wa3a min jeld 3ati2, wa-ella ra7 yenkhez2o, se3eta el-nbeed byou2a3 3al-ard wel-wa3a bisir lal-kabb.
El-nbeed el-jdid bi7ottouh bi-wa3a jdid,
w-ma fi 7ada byeshrab nbeed m3atta2 w-min ba3da byetlob nbeed jdid, li2anno ra7 y2oul: "el-nbeed el-m3atta2 tayyib!"
Mara2 YASOU3 bel-7ou2oul nhar el-sabt, w-saro tlemizo saro ye2otfo sanebel w-yeklo.
2aloulon el-ferrisiyyin: "leysh 3am ta3mlo yalle mish masmou7 yawm el-sabt?"
Jewabon YASOU3: "ma 2rito shou 3eml Daoud lamma je3, houe w-yalle keno ma3o?
Keef fet 3ala beyt Allah, w-keef akal, houe w-yalle ma3o, khebz el-ta2dime, ma3 enno 2aklo mish masmou7 ella lal-kahane."
W-2allon YASOU3: "2eben el-2ensen houe Rab el-sabt."
W-bi-yawm sabt tene, fet YASOU3 3al-majma3 w-sar y3allimon. W-ken fi honik rejjel 2ido el-yameen yebse.
Saro mou3allimi el-shari3a wel-ferrisiyyin yra2bo YASOU3 ta-yshoufo eza ra7 yeshfe nhar el-sabt, ta-yettehmouh bi-shi.
W-3eref YASOU3 afkaron, w-2al lal-rejjel yalle 2ido yebse: "2oum w2af bel-noss." 2am el-rejjel w-we2f bel-noss.
2allon YASOU3: "badde es2alkon: masmou7 3amal el-kheyr nhar el-sabt aw 3amal el-sharr? Nkhallis nafs aw nmawweta?"
W-ettalla3 fiyon kellon w-2al lal-rejjel: "medd 2idak!" Madda, w-rej3et tabi3iye.
Se3eta jann jnounon w-tshewaro shou bya3emlo bi-YASOU3.
Bi-haydik el-iyem toli3 3al-jabal ta-ysalle, be2e kell el-leyl 3am bisalle la-ALLAH.
W-lamma toli3 el-sob7, da3a tlemizo w-na'2a minnon tna3sh sammehon rousl, w-henne:
Sem3an yalle sammeh Boutros, w-khayyo Endrawos, Ya3koub w-You7anna, w-Filippos w-Bartelmawos,
w-Matta w-Touma, w-Ya3koub 2eben 7alfa w-Sem3an yalle bila2bouh bel-watane el-ghayour,
w-Yahouza 2eben Ya3koub w-Yahouza el-Eskharyoute yalle khano.
Min ba3da nezl YASOU3 ma3 tlemizo w-we2f bi-matra7 sahl, w-ken fi honik jame3a min tlemizo w-nes ktir min kell el-Yahoudiye w-Ourashalim w-se7il Sour w-Sayda,
ejo ta-yesma3ouh w-ta-yeshfiyon min amradon. Wel-m3azzabin bi-sabab el-arwe7 el-sherreera shafehon kamen.
W-jarrabo kell el-nes enno yelemsouh, li2anno ken fi 2ouwwe 3am totla3 minno w-teshfiyon kellon.
Rafa3 YASOU3 3youno sawb el-tlemiz w-2al: "niyyelkon ya hal-fou2ara bel-Rou7, li2anno malakout el-sama houe elkon!
"Niyyelkon ento el-jou3aneen, li2annkon ra7 teshba3o. Niyyelkon ento yalle halla2 3am tebko, li2annkon ra7 tetda7ako.
"Niyyelkon eza kerhoukon el-nes w-sha7atoukon w-sabboulkon w-rafadoukon ka2annkon ashrar kermel 2eben el-2ensen.
Bi-hayda el-yawm fra7o w-hallelo, li2anno moukefa2etkon bel-sama 3azeeme. Hek 3emlo bayyeton bel-anbiya.
Bass ya weylkon ya aghniya, li2annkon akhadto 3aze2kon.
Ya weylkon ento yalle halla2 3am teshba3o, li2annkon ra7 tjou3o. Ya weylkon ento yalle 3am tetda7ako, li2annkon ra7 tez3alo w-tebko.
Ya weylkon eza mada7oukon kell el-nes, li2anno hek 3emlo bayyeton bel-anbiya el-kezzebin.
"Bass ana b2elkon ento ya hal-3am tesma3o: 7ebbo a3de2kon, w-se3do yalle byekrahoukon,
w-berko yalle byel3anoukon, w-sallo kermel yalle bye2zoukon.
Yalle byedorbak 3ala khaddak, 3tih el-khadd el-tene. W-yalle byekhedlak 2amissak, treklo mashla7ak kamen.
Yalle byetlob minnak shi 3tih yeh, w-yalle byekhedlak shi ma tetolbo minno.
W-3èmlo el-nes metl ma bit7ebbo enno y3emloukon.
W-eza 7abbeyto yalle bi7ebboukon, shou houe fadlkon? Li2anno el-khatyeen kamen bi7ebbo yalle bi7ebbouwon.
W-eza se3adto yalle bise3doukon, shou houe fadlkon? Li2anno el-khatyeen kamen bya3emlo hal-shi.
W-eza 3erto yalle mit2ammlin enno testawfo minnon, shou bikoun fadlkon? Li2anno el-khatyeen kamen bi3eero el-khatyeen ta-yestawfo minnon bel-metl.
Bel-3aks 7ebbo a3de2kon, w-se3do w-3eero bidoun mou2abel, 7atta tkoun moukefa2etkon 3azeeme, w-tkouno wled ALLAH, li2anno bye3tof 3a-nekrin el-jmil wel-ashrar.
Kouno rou7ama metl ma ALLAH bayykon ra7eem.
"Ma tdeeno 7atta-ma tendeno. Ma te7ekmo 3ala 7ada, ta-ma yen7akam 3leykon. Ghfero, byenghafarelkon.
3tou, byen3atalkon: w-bi7ottoulkon bi-7erjkon kayl melyen, mlabbad, mahzouz w-tafe7, li2anno bel-kayl yalle 3am tkeyylo fih ra7 ykayyloukon."
W-2allon YASOU3 hal-matal: "bye2dar a3ma y2oud a3ma? Mish byou2a3o el-tnen sawa bel-joura?
Ma fi telmiz a3zam min m3allmo. Kell telmiz kammal 3elmo bikoun metl m3allmo.
Leysh 3am bitshouf el-2ashe bi-3ayn khayyak, w-ma bitshouf el-khashbe bi-3aynak?

W-keef bte2dar t2oul la-khayyak: "ya khayye, trekne talle3 el-2ashe min 3aynak, wel-khashbe yalle bi-3aynak enta mish sheyefa? Ya mnefi2, talle3 el-khashbe min 3aynak bel-awwal, 7atta te2dar te2sha3 mni7 w-hek bte2dar tsheel el-2ashe min 3ayn khayyak!
"El-shajra el-mni7a ma-bte7mol thamar 3atel, wel-shajra el-3atle ma bte7mol thamar mni7.
Kell shajra bidell 3leya thamara. Enta ma bto2tof min el-shawk teen, w-ma bto2tof min el-3ellay2 3enab.
El-2ensen el-sale7 min el-kanz el-sale7 bi-2albo byetla3 yalle houe sale7, wel-2ensen el-sherreer min el-kanz el-sherreer bi-2albo byetla3 kell shi sherreer, li2anno min fayd el-2alb bye7ke el-temm.
"Keef bit2ouloule: ya RAB, ya RAB, w-ma bta3emlo yalle 3am 2oulo?
Kell meen byeje la-3ande w-byesma3 kaleme w-bya3mil fih bshabbho
bi-rejjel 3ammar beyt, w-7afar w-ghamma2 w-7att el-ases 3al-sakhr. W-lamma taf el-nahr 3al-beyt, ma edr yza3ez3o li2anno aseso mateen.
Bass yalle byesma3 kaleme w-ma bya3mil fih, byeshbah rejjel 3ammar beyto 3al-trab bidoun ases, w-lamma taf 3le el-nahr, tehabbat el-beyt deghre, w-kenit wa2'3et hal-beyt 3azeeme."
W-min ba3d ma 2al YASOU3 hal-kalem eddem el-nes, fet 3a-Kfarna7oum.
W-ken fi dabit 3endo khadim mareed ktir w-ra7 ymout, w-ken el-dabit y7ebbo ktir.
Lamma sem3 bi-YASOU3, ba3atlo kamm wa7ad min shyoukh el-Yahoud ta-yetolbo minno yeje yeshfe khadmo.
Ejo la-3and YASOU3, w-saro yetrajjouh: "hal-rejjel byest7e2 enno tse3do,
li2anno bi7ebb sha3bna, w-houe yalle 3ammarelna el-majma3."
Ra7 YASOU3 ma3on. W-lamma 2arrab min el-beyt ba3atlo el-dabit 7ada min as7abo ta-y2ouloulo: "ya Rab, ma tez3oj 7alak. Ana ma best7e2, ennak tfout ta7t sa2f beyte,
w-ma be3tebir nafse enno best7e2 eje la-3andak, bass 2oul kelme we7de w-khadme biso7.
Ana khadi3 la-solta, w-fi ta7t 2ide 3askar, b2oul la-hayda mshi, byemshe, w-la-haydak: ta3a, byeje, w-la-khadme: 3mol hek, bya3mil."
Lamma sem3 YASOU3 hal-kalem, t3ajjab minno w-ltafat sawb yalle le7'2ino w-2allon: "b7ebb 2elkon: ana ba3d ma sheft metl hal-imen 7atta bi-Isra2il!"
W-rej3o el-mab3outin min 2ebal el-dabit 3al-beyt, w-le2o el-khadim nshafa.
W-tene yawm ra7 YASOU3 3ala madine esma Nayeen, w-ma3o tlemizo w-nes ktir.
Lamma wossil 3ala beb el-madine, le2a mayyit ma7moul, houe el-2eben el-wa7eed la-emmo w-hiye armale. W-ken mrefa2a nes ktir min ahl el-madine.
W-lamma shefa el-RAB shef2 3leya w-2alla: "ma tebke!"
W-2arrab min el-tabout w-lamaso, we2fo yalle 7amleeno. 2al: "ya shab, ana 3am 2ellak, 2oum!"
2am 2a3ad el-mayyit w-sar ye7ke, w-sallamouh la emmo.
Saytar el-khawf 3al-kell, w-2alo henne w-3am bimajjdo ALLAH: "zahar nabe 3azeem baynetna, ALLAH staf2ad sha3bo!"
Ntashar el-khabar 3an YASOU3 bel-Yahoudiye kella w-bi-kell el-manate2 el-2aribe minna.
W-3eref You7anna min tlemizo kell hal-akhbar,
fa-ba3at tnen minnon la-3and el-RAB la-yes2alouh: "enta yalle baddo yeje, aw mnentor wa7ad tene?"
Ejo el-rejjelen la-3and YASOU3 w-2aloulo: "ba3atna You7anna el-ma3maden ta-nes2alak: eza enta yalle baddo yeje, aw mnentor wa7ad tene?"
Bi-haydik el-se3a shafa YASOU3 ktar min el-marda w-yalle fiyon arwe7 sherreera, w-ktar min el-3emyen khallehon ye2sha3o,

w-min ba3da 2al lal-telmizen: "rja3o w-khabbro You7anna bi-yalle sheftouh w-sme3touh: El-3emyen rej3o ye2sha3o, wel-3erj 3am yemsho, wel-bors ettaharo min barason, wel-torsh rej3o yesma3o, wel-mawta 3am bi2oumo, wel-fou2ara 3am yetbasharo.
W-niyyel yalle bidall m2ãman fiyye."
Lamma fallo tlemiz You7anna, 7eke YASOU3 lal-nes 3an You7anna, w-2al: "shou ro7to tshoufo bel-sa7ra? 2asabe 3am t'hezza el-ree7?
Aw shou ro7to tshoufo? Rejjel lebis tyeb ne3me? Bass yalle byelbso tyeb ne3me 2e3deen bel-2sour!
2ouloule: shou ro7to tshoufo? Nabe? Ana b2elkon enno You7anna aktar min nabe.
Houe yalle bi2oul 3anno el-kteb: ra7 eb3at rasoule eddemak, ta-y7adder el-tari2 eddemak.
B7ebb 2elkon: bayn yalle khallafouwon el-neswen, ma fi a3zam min You7anna, bass azghar wa7ad bi-malakout ALLAH a3zam minno.
W-kell yalle sem3o You7anna, 7atta yalle bilemmo el-darayib, 3tarafo bi-sod2 ALLAH, w-2eblo ma3moudiyyet You7anna.
Bass el-ferrisiyyin w-3oulama el-shari3a, rafado iradet ALLAH 3leyon, w-ma t3ammado 3ala 2ido."
W-2al el-RAB YASOU3: "bi-meen bshabbeh wled hal-jeel? Shou byeshbaho?
Byeshbaho wled 2e3deen bel-se7at 3am bi3ayyto la-ba3don w-y2oulo: zammarnelkon w-ma ra2asto, nadabnelkon w-ma bkito.
Eja You7anna ma byekol khebz wala byeshrab nbeed, 2elto 3anno: hayda sèkno shaytan!
W-eja 2eben el-2ensen byekol w-byeshrab, 2elto 3anno: hayda rejjel akkeel w-sakkeer w-sadee2 yalle bilemmo darayib wel-khatyeen.
Bass el-7ekme tbarrarit bi-kell wleda."
Wa7ad min el-ferrisiyyin 3azam YASOU3 3al-2akl, eja YASOU3 3a-beyt el-ferrise w-2a3ad 3al-meyde.
W-ken fi bel-madine mara khatye, w-3erfit enno YASOU3 3am yekol bi-beyt el-ferrise, ejet w-ma3a 2anninet 3otr,
w-we2fit khalfo 7add ejrey w-hiye 3am tebke, w-saret tballil ejrey bi-dmou3a, w-temsa7on bi-sha3ra, w-tbawesson, w-tedhanon bel-3otr.
W-lamma shef el-ferrise, yalle ken 3ezim, shou sar, 2al bi-2albo: "law ken hal-rejjel nabe, ken 3erf meen hiye hal-mara yalle 3am telemso w-shou 2ossita. Hayde mara khatye!"
2allo YASOU3: "ya Sem3an, badde ellak shi." 2allo Sem3an: "2oul, ya mou3allim."
2allo YASOU3: "ken fi rejjel mdayyen rejjelen: wa7ad 3atah khams miyyet dinar. Wel-tene khamseen dinar.
W-ma edro el-rejjelen youwfo dyounon, fa-3afehon minnon. Ayya wa7ad minnon ra7 y7ebbo aktar?"
Jewabo Sem3an: "be3te2id yalle 3afeh min el-aktar." 2allo YASOU3: "mazbout."
Ltafat sawb el-mara w-2al la-Sem3an: "sheyif hal-mara? Ana jeet 3ala beytak, w-ma sakabet may 3ala ejreyye bass hiye ghassaleton bi-dmou3a w-masa7eton bi-sha3ra.
Enta ma besetne, bass hiye, min wa2et ma fetit, w-hiye tbawwes ejreyye.
Enta ma dahanet rase bi-zeyt, bass hiye dahanet ejreyye bel-3otr.
Kermel hek b2ellak: nghafaret khatayaha el-ktire, li2anno 7abbit ktir. Bass yalle byenghafarlo alil, bikoun bi7ebb alil."
Min ba3da 2al lal-mara: "khatayake maghfoura!"
Saro yalle 2e3deen 3al-meyde yes2alo 7alon: "meen hayda 7atta yeghfor el-khataya?"
2al YASOU3 lal-mara: "imenik khallasik, rou7e bi-salem!"
Min ba3da meshe YASOU3 bel-moudon w-bel-diya3, w-sar you3az w-ybasher bi-malakout ALLAH. W-ken 3am biref2ouh el-tlemiz el-tna3sh
Wel-neswen yalle shafehon min el-arwe7 el-sherreera wel-amrad, w-henne Maryam el-ma3roufe bel-Majdaliyye, w-ken dahar minna sab3 shyateen,
w-7anne mart Khouzi wakeel Hirodos, w-Sousanna, w-ktar ghayron keno yse3do YASOU3 min mesriyyeton.
W-2asadouh el-nes min kell madine, w-lamma tjamma3o nes ktir, 7ekehon bi-matal, w-2al:
"Ra7 el-mzeri3 ta-yezra3. Houe w-3am yezra3, fi kamm 7abbe wa2a3o 3ala 7affit el-tari2, da3aso 3leyon el-nes w-ejo el-3safeer w-akalouwon.
W-ghayron wa2a3o 3ala ard 7ajar, w-lamma farrakho yebso li2anno na2eson rtoube.
W-wa2a3 ghayron bel-shawk, toli3 el-shawk ma3on w-khana2on.
W-ghayron wa2a3 bi-ard taybe, farrakho w-athmaro, miyye bel-miyye." W-2al YASOU3 bi-sawt 3ale: "yalle 3endo dinen, khallih yesma3!"
W-sa2alouh tlemizo shou bye3ne hal-matal,
jewabon: "ento n3atalkon ta3erfo asrar malakout ALLAH. Bass el-be2yin, be7kyon bel-amtel: 7atta eza ettalla3o ma yshoufo, w-eza sem3o ma yefhamo.
"Hayda houe maghza el-matal: el-zar3 houe kalem ALLAH:
yalle wa2a3 3a-7affit el-tari2 henne yalle byesma3o kalem ALLAH, byeje el-sherreer w-byesro2 yalle nzara3 bi-2albon 7atta ma ykhalliyon y2ãmno w-yle2o el-khalãs.
Yalle wa2a3 bi-ard 7ajar henne yalle byesma3o kalem ALLAH w-bye2balouh fer7anin, bass li2anno ma elon 2asl, bi2ãmno la-wa2et 2asir, w-wa2et el-tajribe byertaddo.
Yalle wa2a3 bayn el-shawk henne yalle byesma3o kalem ALLAH, bass hmoum el-dene w-khayrata w-malazzeta byekhen2o kalem ALLAH fiyon, w-ma bye7emlo thamar nadej.
W-yalle wa2a3 bel-ard el-taybe, henne yalle byesma3o kalem ALLAH w-bye7fazouh bi-2alb tayyib sale7, w-byethemro bi-thabeton.
Ma-fi 7ada bidawwe srej w-bighattih bi-wa3a aw bi7otto ta7t el-takht, bel-3aks bi7otto bi-matra7 3ale ta-yalle feytin ydawwe 3leyon.
Ma fi shi makhfe ella ma ra7 ybayyin, w-ma fi shi serr ella ra7 yen3araf.
Ntebho keef btesma3o kalem ALLAH, li2anno yalle ma3o shi, byen3atalo ta-yzeed, w-yalle ma ma3o shi, byekhdoulo 7atta yalle mfakkar enno houe elo."
W-eja la-3and YASOU3 emmo w-ekhewto, bass ma edro yousalo li2anno ken fi ktir nes.
2aloulo el-nes: "emmak w-ekhewtak we2fin barra baddoun yshoufouk."
Jewabon: "emme w-ekhewte henne yalle byesma3o kalem ALLAH w-bya3emlo fih."
Bi-yawm min el-iyem rekb YASOU3 shakhtoura houe w-tlemizo, w-2allon: "ta3o no2ta3 3al-shatt el-tene lal-bou7ayra." 3emlo metl ma 2allon.
Henne w-meshyin nem YASOU3. Habbet 3asfe 3al-bou7ayra, la-daraje kenit el-may ra7 tmalle el-shakhtoura, w-saro bi-khatar.
2arrabo el-tlemiz min YASOU3 w-wa3ouh w-2aloulo: "ya mou3allim, ya mou3allim! Ra7 nmout!" 2am w-haddad el-ree7 wel-mawj, w-hedyit el-3asfe w-sar fi houdou2.
2allon YASOU3: "wayn imenkon?" khafo w-t3ajjabo, w-2alo la-ba3don: "meen bikoun hayda ta-el-ree7 wel-mawj bitee3ouh."
W-woslo sawb el-Jarasiyyin, m2abeel shatt el-Jaleel.
W-lamma nezl YASOU3 3al-yebse sta2balo rejjel min el-madine fiyo shyateen, w-ken sarlo zamen mish lebis tyeb, w-ma byeskon bi-beyt, ken 3ayish bel-ma2aber.
W-lamma shef YASOU3, sarakh w-kabb 7alo 3a-ejrey w-sarakh bi-sawt 3ale: "shou elak 3leyye, ya YASOU3 2eben ALLAH! Dakhilak ma t3azzebne."

2al hek li2anno YASOU3 2amar rou7 el-sharr enno tedhar min el-rejjel. W-ken bi-ktir min el-aw2at tsayter rou7 el-sharr 3le, w-keno el-nes yjarrabo yerebtouh bel-jnazeer. Bass ken ykasseron, w-yekhdo el-shaytan 3al-barriye.
Sa2alo YASOU3: "shou esmak?" jewab: "jeysh", li2anno el-shyateen yalle fih keno ktar.
Se3eta trajjouh la-YASOU3 enno ma ye2meron yrou7o 3al-houwwe.
W-ken fi honik atee3 kbir min el-khnezir 3am yer3a 3al-jabal, talabo minno enno yesma7lon yeskno bel-khnezir, fa-sama7lon.
Daharo el-shyateen min el-rejjel w-feto bel-khnezir, w-hajam el-atee3 kello 3al-bou7ayra w-gheri2 bel-may.
W-lamma shefo el-re3yen yalle sar, harabo w-nasharo el-khabar bel-madine wel-diya3.
W-tel3o el-nes ta-yshoufo yalle sar. Ejo la-3and YASOU3, w-le2o el-rejjel yalle daharo minno el-shyateen 2e3id 3a-ejren YASOU3, lebis tyebo, w-3a2lo tabi3e, fa-khafo ktir.
W-khabbarouwon el-shouhoud keef shafeh YASOU3,
fa-talabo minno kell ahele el-Jarasiyyin enno yba3ed 3annon, li2anno keno khayfin ktir. W-rekb el-shakhtoura w-fall min honik.
Bass el-rejjel yalle daharo minno el-shyateen, trajja YASOU3 yekhdo ma3o. Bass YASOU3 ba3ato, w-2allo:
"Rja3 3ala beytak w-khabbir bi-yalle 3emlo ALLAH elak." Ra7 el-rejjel w-sar ynede bel-madine kella bi-yalle 3emello yeh YASOU3.
W-lamma reje3 YASOU3 ra7abo fih el-nes li2anno keno kellon natrino.
W-eja la-3ando rejjel esmo Yayros, w-houe ra2is el-majma3, w-kabb 7alo 3end ejren YASOU3 w-trajjeh yfout 3a-beyto,
li2anno 3endo benet wa7eede 3omra te2riban tna3sh, kenit ra7 tmout. Houe w-raye7, ltaffo el-nes 7awlo.
W-ken fi honik mara sarla tna3shar sene 3enda nazeef damm. Sarafit kell shi btemelko 3al-7ekama, w-ma edr 7ada enno yeshfiya.
2arrabit min khalf YASOU3 w-lamaset taraf tawbo, w-deghre n2ata3 nazeef el-damm.
2al YASOU3: "meen lamasne?" nakaro kellon, w-2al Boutros: "ya mou3allim, el-nes kella m7awtinak w-3am yezerkouk w-3am tes2al meen lamasak?"
2al YASOU3: "fi 7ada lamasne, li2anno 7asseyt bi-2ouwwe tol3it minne."
W-lamma shefit el-mara enna nkashafit 3ala YASOU3, ejet hiye w-3am terjof w-raka3et 3ala ejrey w-khabbareto eddem kell el-nes leysh lamaseto w-keef nshafet deghre.
2alla: "ya bente, imenik khallasik, rou7e bi-salem."
Bi-hal-wa2et, houe w-3am ye7ke, eja 7ada min 3end ra2is el-majma3 w-2al: "metit bentak, ma fi de3e t3azzib el-mou3allim."
Sem3 YASOU3, w-2al la-Yayros: "ma tkhaf! Byekfe ennak t2ãmen, ta-teshfa bentak."
W-lamma wossil 3al-beyt, mana3 el-nes yfouto, ma 3ada Boutros w-You7anna w-Ya3koub w-bayy el-sabiye w-emma.
W-keno el-nes 3am yebko w-yenedbo el-sabiye. 2allon: "ma tebko, ma metit, bitkoun neyme."
De7ko 3le, li2anno keno 3arfin enna metit.
Bass akhad 2id el-sabiye w-2alla bi-sawt 3ale. "ya sabiye, 2oume!"
W-rej3etla rou7a w-2amet deghre, w-2amar YASOU3 ennon ya3touwa ta-tekol.
T3ajjabo ahla, w-wassahon enno ma ykhabro 7ada bi-yalle sar.
W-da3a YASOU3 tlemizo el-tna3sh w-3atahon soultan 3ala kell el-shyateen w-edra 3ala shife2 el-amrad,
min ba3da ba3aton la-ybashro bi-malakout ALLAH w-yeshfo el-marda.
W-2allon: "ma tekhdo ma3kon shi bel-tari2: la-3asa, wala kis, wala khebz, wala masare, ma ykoun la-7ada minkon tawben.
Wa2et yalle bitfouto 3ala beyt, khallikon fih la-wa2et ma badkon tfello.
W-kell madine ma bye2balkon ahla, tla3o minna w-nfedo el-ghabra 3an ejreykon shahede 3leyon."
Ra7o el-tlemiz w-meshyo bel-diya3, w-saro ybashro w-yeshfo el-marda bi-kell el-matare7.
W-sem3 el-wele Hirodos bi-kell shi ken 3am bisir, w-t7ayyar li2anno fi nes keno 3am bi2oulo: "You7anna 2am min el-mawt",
w-fi nes 2alo: "Eliyya zahar!" w-ghayron 2alo: "nabe min el-anbiya el-2dem 2am."
Bass Hirodos 2al: "You7anna ana 2ata3tello raso. Meen hayda yalle besma3 3anno metl hal-akhbar?" W-ken 3am yetlob enno yshoufo.
W-lamma rej3o el-rousl khabbaro YASOU3 bi-kell shi 3emlouh, w-akhadon w-ra7 fiyon la-wa7don 3a-madine esma Beyt Sayda.
W-3erfo el-nes fa-le7'2ouh, sta2balon w-7ekehon 3an malakout ALLAH, w-shafa yalle keno bi-7aje yeshfiyon.

W-ken ballash yekhlas el-nhar, 2arrabo tlemizo el-tna3sh minno w-2aloulo: "b3at hal-nes min hon la-yrou7o 3ala el-diya3 wel-mazeri3 el-2aribe, 7atta ynemo fiya w-yle2o la-elon 2akl, li2anna ne7na bi-matra7 b3id."
2allon YASOU3: "3touwon ento shi yeklouh." 2alo: "ma 3enna hon ella khams tereghfe w-samakten, ella eza re7na w-shtarayna 2akl la-kell hal-nes."
W-keno shi khams-talef rejjel. 2al la-tlemizo: "2a3douwon fwej fwej, kell khamseen ma3 ba3d."
2a3adouwon kellon metl ma 2allon.
Akhad el-khams tereghfe wel-samakten w-rafa3 3youno sawb el-sama w-berak w-kasar el-khebz w-3ata tlemizo, wel-tlemiz 3ato el-nes.
W-akalo kellon 7atta sheb3o, w-jama3o el-tlemiz tna3shar salle min el-khebz yalle faddal.
W-ken YASOU3 marra 3am bisalle wa7do wel-tlemiz ma3o, sa2alon. "meen ana bennesbe lal-nes?"
Jewabouh: "You7anna el-ma3maden." W-fi nes bi2oulo: "Eliyya." W-ghayron: "nabe min el-anbiya el-2dem 2am."
2allon YASOU3: "w-meen ana, bi-ra2eykon ento?" Jewabo Boutros: "enta el-MASI7 el-Ileh!"
W-2amaron bi-nabra 2assye enno ma y2oulo hal-shi la-7ada.
2al YASOU3 la-tlemizo: "lezim 2eben el-2ensen yet2allam ktir, w-yerefdouh el-shyoukh w-rou2asa el-kahane w-mou3allimi el-shari3a, w-yen2atal w-telit yawm ra7 y2oum min el-mawt."
W-2al lal-nes kellon: "yalle baddo yel7a2ne, baddo yenkor nafso w-ye7mol salibo kell yawm w-yel7a2ne.
W-yalle baddo ykhallis nafso ra7 yekhsara, w-yalle ra7 yekhsar 7ayeto kermele, ra7 ykhallisa.
Shou byestafeed el-2ensen eza reb7 el-3alam kello w-khesr nafso?
W-yalle byeste7e fiye w-bi-kaleme, byeste7e fih 2eben el-2ensen lamma ra7 yeje bi-majdo w-majd el-Ãb wel-maleyke el-2eddissin.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a: min bayn el-mawjoudin hon fi askhas ma ra7 ydou2o el-mawt 7atta yshoufo malakout ALLAH."
W-min ba3d hal-kalem bi-shi tmen tiyyem, akhad YASOU3 Boutros w-You7anna w-Ya3koub w-toli3 3al-jabal ta-ysalle.
Houe w-3am bisalle, tghayyar wejjo w-saret tyebo bayda 3am bitlamme3.
W-byejo rejjelen w-bye7ko YASOU3, w-henne Moussa w-Eliyya,
w-zaharo bi-majd samewe w-saro ye7ko 3an mawto yalle ken lezim ysir bi-Ourashalim.
Boutros w-rfe2o el-tnen, ma3 enno te2lo 3younon min el-na3as dallo sohranin w-shefo majdo wel-rejjelen el-we2fin ma3o.

Bass ejo el-rejjelen baddon yfello, 2allo Boutros: "ya mou3allim, shou 7elo nkoun hon: khallina na3mil hon tlet khiyam: we7de elak w-we7de la-Moussa w-we7de la-Eliyya." W-keno mish 3arfin shou 3am bi2oulo.
Bi-hal wa2et, w-ken Boutros ba3do 3am ye7ke, ejet ghayme w-ghatteton, w-khafo el-tlemiz lamma saro bi-2alb el-ghayme.
W-nsama3 sawt min el-ghayme: "hayda houe 2ebne yalle na'2eyto, sma3oulo!"
Min ba3d ma sem3o el-sawt, shefo YASOU3 wa7do. Sakato w-ma khabbaro 7ada bi-shi min yalle shefouh.
Tene nhar nezlo min el-Jabal, w-sta2balouh nes kbir.
W-sarakh rejjel min bayn el-nes: "ya mou3allim, dakhilak ettalla3 bi-2ebne, hayda 2ebne el-wa7eed,
fiyo rou7 sharr byeje 3le, w-faj2a byesrokh w-bidall y3azzbo ta ysir yerghe, w-ma byeterko ella min ba3d ma yraderdo.
Talabit min tlemizak enno yse3doune, ma edro."
Jewab YASOU3: "ya hal-jeel el-kefir yalle ma bi2ãmen! La-aymata ra7 eb2a ma3kon? W-et7ammalkon?" Ba3den 2al lal-rejjel: "2arreb 2ebnak la-hon!"

W-lamma ken el-sabe 3am bi2arreb min YASOU3, kabbo el-shaytan 3al-ard w-sar y3azzbo. Haddad YASOU3 rou7 el-sharr, w-shafa el-sabe w-sallamo la-bayyo. W-t3ajjabo el-mawjoudin kellon min edrit ALLAH el-3azeeme.
W-lamma keno kellon met3ajbin min yalle 3emlo YASOU3, 2al la-tlemizo:
"Sma3o mni7 yalle 3am 2elkon yeh. Ra7 yetsallam 2eben el-2ensen la-2iden el-nes."
Ma fehmo el-tlemiz hal-kalem w-ken ma7joub 3annon enno yefhamo, w-khafo enno yes2alouh.
Saro yetjedalo meen houe el-a3zam bayneton.
W-3eref YASOU3 shou fi bi-2loubon, akhad bi-2id tofl w-7atto 7addo,
w-2allon: "yalle bye2bal hal-tofl bi-esme bikoun 2ebelne. W-yalle 2ebelne bye2bal yalle ba3atne, li2anno azghar wa7ad fikon houe a3zamkon."
2al You7anna: "ya mou3allim, shefna rejjel 3am yesh7at el-shyateen bi-esmak w-mana3neh, li2anno manno min jame3tak."
2allo YASOU3: "ma temna3ouh, li2anno yalle ma bikoun doddkon houe ma3kon."
W-lamma eja el-wa2et yalle byenrafa3 fih YASOU3 3al-sama, 2arrar yrou7 3ala Ourashalim.
W-ba3at rousl eddemo, ra7o w-feto 3ala day3a semiriye la-y7adroulo beyt.
Rafado ahele el-day3a enno ye2balouh li2anno ken rayi7 3ala Ourashalim.
W-lamma shefo tlemizo Ya3koub w-You7anna hal-shi 2aloulo: "ya Rab, baddak ne2mor el-nar tenzal min el-sama w-tekelon?"
Ettalla3 fiyon YASOU3 w-wabbakhon,
fa-meshyo 3ala day3a tenye.
W-baynama henne meshyin, 2allo rejjel 3al-tari2: "ya Rab, ana badde el7a2ak matra7 ma-bitrou7."
Jewabo YASOU3: "el-wewiyye 3endon byout, w-3safeer el-sama 3shoush, bass 2eben el-2ensen, ma 3endo matra7 yesnod raso."
W-2al YASOU3 la-rejjel tene: "l7a2ne!" Jewabo el-rejjel: "ya Rab trekne rou7 edfon bayye bel-awwal."
2allo YASOU3: "trok el-mawta yedfno mawtehon. Bass enta, rou7 w-basher bi-malakout ALLAH."
W-2allo wa7ad tene: "bel7a2ak ya Rab, bass khalline bel-awwal waddi3 ahle."
2allo YASOU3: "kell wa7ad bi7ott 2ido 3a-sekkit el-fle7a w-byeltefit la-wara, ma byeslo7 ykoun la-malakout ALLAH."
Min ba3da 3ayyan el-RAB YASOU3 tneyna-w-sab3een telmiz ghayr hawdik, w-ba3aton tnen tnen ta-yesba2ouh 3a-kell madine aw day3a 2arrar enno yrou7 3leya.
W-2allon: "fi zar3 ktir baddo 2atf, bass el-3emmel 2lel. Sallo la-RAB el-zar3 ta-yeb3at 3emmel yo7osdoulo.
Rou7o, ana be3etkon metl el-khwerif bayn el-dyeb.
Ma te7emlo kees, wala zouwwede, wala sobbat, wala tsallmo 3ala 7ada bel-tari2.
El-beyt yalle bitfouto 3le, 2oulo awwal shi: el-salem 3a-hal-beyt.
W-eza ken fi honik 2eben salem, salemkon bi7ell fih, wa-ella byerja3 el-salem elkon.
23edo bi-hal-beyt, kelo w-shrabo min yalle 3endon yeh, li2anno el-fe3il byest7e2 ejerto, w-ma tene2lo min beyt la-beyt.
El-madine yalle bitfouto 3leya w-ahla bye2baloukon, kelo min yalle bi2admoulkon yeh.
Shfou mardahon w-2oulo: malakout ALLAH 2arrab.
Wel-madine yalle bitfouto 3leya w-ahla ma bye2baloukon, tla3o 3ala tor2ata w-2oulo:
7atta el-ghabra yalle 3el2a bi-ejreyna min madinetkon mnenfeda. Bass 3rafo enno malakout ALLAH 2arrab.
B7ebb 2elkon: Sour w-Sayda ra7 ykoun massiron bi-yawm el-deynoune ar7am min massir hal-madine.
2al YASOU3: "ya weylik ya Kourazin! Ya weylik ya Beyt-Sayda! Law el-3ajeyeb yalle saro 3endkon, ysiro bi Sour w-Sayda, keno ahla tebo min zamen w-lebso el-mes7 w-2a3ado 3al-rmed.
Bass Sour w-Sayda ra7 ykoun massiron bi-yawm el-deynoune ar7am minkon.
W-ente ya Kfarna7oum, baddik tousale bel-2ouwwe 3al-sama? Ra7 tou2a3e 3a-jhannam."
W-2al YASOU3 la-tlemizo: "yalle byesma3elkon byesma3le. W-yalle rafadkon rafadne, w-yalle rafadne rafad yalle ba3atne."
W-rej3o el-tneyna-w-sab3een rasoul mabsoutin w-2alo la-YASOU3: "ya RAB, 7atta el-shyateen khada3oulna bi-esmak."
2allon: "ana kent sheyif el-shaytan we2i3 min el-sama metl el-bar2.
3titkon soultan ted3aso el-7ayyet wel-3a2areb w-kell 2ouwwe lal-3adouw, bidoun ma yserelkon shi.
Bass ma tefra7o bi-enno el-arwe7 3am yokhda3oulkon, bel-3aks, fra7o bi-enno asamikon maktoube bel-sama."

W-bi-haydik el-se3a feri7 YASOU3 bel-ROU7 el-2ODOS, w-2al: "bishekrak ya Bayye, ya RAB el-sama wel-ard, li2annak khfit hal-eshya 3an ahl el-7ekme wel-azkiya, w-bayyanta lal-zghar. Eh, ya bayye, enta hek baddak.
Bayye sallamne kell shi. Ma 7ada bya3rif meen bikoun el-2eben ella el-ãb, wala meen bikoun el-ãb ella el-2eben w-yalle baddo el-2eben enno yenkashaf la-elo."
W-ltafat sawb tlemizo, w-2allon minnon elo: "niyyel yalle bi-shouf yalle ento 3am bitshoufouh!
B7ebb 2elkon: ktar min el-anbiya wel-moulouk tmanno yshoufo yalle ento 3am bitshoufouh w-ma shefouh, w-enno yesma3o yalle ento 3am tesma3ouh w-ma sem3ouh."
W-2am wa7ad min 3oulama el-shari3a, w-2al la-YASOU3 ta-ye7erjo: "ya mou3allim, shou badde a3mil ta-ourat el-7ayet el-abadiyye?"
Jewabo YASOU3: "shou bit2oul el-shari3a? W-keef btefhama?"
2al el-rejjel: "7ebb el-RAB Ilehak min kell 2albak, w-min kell nafsak, w-min kell 2ouwwtak, w-min kell fekrak, w-7ebb 2aribak metl ma bit7ebb 7alak."
2allo YASOU3: "jawebak mazbout. 3mol hal-shi bitle2e el-7ayet."
Bass mou3allim el-shari3a sar baddo ybarrir 7alo, 2al la-YASOU3: "w-meen houe 2aribe?"
Jewabo YASOU3: "ken fi rejjel nezil min Ourashalim la-Ari7a, wa2a3 bayn 2iden lsous, shalla7ouh tyebo w-darabouh, w-min ba3da tarakouh bayn mayyit w-3ayish.
W-se2abet enno meri2 kehen nezil min haydik el-tari2, lamma shefo bay3ad 3anno w-kaffa tari2o.
W-nafs el-shi sar ma3 wa7ad lawi, eja w-shef el-rejjel bay3ad 3anno w-meshe bi-tari2o.
Bass ken fi Semiri msefar mara2 min honik, w-lamma shefo shef2 3le.
2arrab minno w-sakab zeyt w-nbeed 3ala jrou7ato, w-7emlo 3ala 7maro w-jebo 3ala hotel w-htamm fih.
W-tene nhar talla3 el-Semiri dinaren, w-dafa3on la-sa7ib el-hotel w-2allo: htamm fih, w-shou ma sarafet zyede breddellak yehon wa2et berja3.
Ayya wa7ad min hal-tlete ken bi-ra2yak 2arib yalle wa2a3 bi-2iden el-lsous?"
Jewabo mou3allim el-shari3a: "yalle ra7amo." 2allo YASOU3: "rou7 w-3mol enta metlo."
W-henne w-meshyin, fet YASOU3 day3a, w-sta2baleto bi-beyta mara esma Marta.
W-ken 3enda ekht esma Maryam, 2a3adet 3end ejren el-RAB YASOU3 ta-tesma3 kalemo.
W-kenit Marta mashghoule bel-khedme wel-diyafe, ejet w-2alet la-YASOU3: "ya RAB, mish sheyif enno ekhte terketne ekhdom wa7de? 2ella tse3edne!"
Jewaba el-RAB: "Marta, Marta, ente 3am tehtamme w-te3ej2e 7alik bi-eshya ktire,
ma3 enno el-matloub shaghle we7de. Maryam na'2et el-shi el-afdal, w-ma 7ada ra7 yekhdo minna."
W-ken YASOU3 3am bisalle bi-matra7 min el-matare7, w-lamma khallas el-sala 2allo wa7ad min tlemizo: "ya RAB, 3allemna nsalle, metl ma 3allam You7anna tlemizo."
2allon YASOU3: "wa2et yalle bitsallo 2oulo: ya Bayyna, khalle esmak yet2addas w-malakoutak yeje
3tina khebzna el-yawme
w-seme7na 3an khatayana, metl ma ne7na mnsemi7 la-kell yalle byeghlato ma3na. W-ma tkhallina nou2a3 bel-tajribe",
min ba3da 2allon YASOU3: "meen minkon 3endo sadee2 w-birou7 la-3ando bi-noss el-leyl, w-bi2ello: ya sadee2e, 3irne tlet tereghfe,
li2anno 3ende sadee2 eja min el-safar w-ma 3ende khebz ta-2addemlo,
bijewbo sadee2o min jouwwa: ma tez3ejne! El-beb msakkar, wlede ma3e bel-farshe, ma be2dar 2oum ta-a3tik.
B7ebb 2elkon: eza ma 2am w-3atah li2anno sadee2o, lezim y2oum ya3tih kell shi 3ayzo ta-y7ell 3anno.
Kermel hek b2elkon: tlobo w-ra7 ya3toukon, fattsho w-ra7 bitle2o, de'2o el-beb w-ra7 yefta7oulkon.
Yalle byetlob bya3touh, w-yalle bifattesh bile2e, w-yalle bide2 el-beb byefta7oulo.
Aya bayy eza talab minno 2ebno samke bya3tih 7ayye?
Aw talab minno bayda bya3tih 3a2rab?
Eza kento ento el-ashrar bta3erfo keef tse3do wledkon, keef bel-a7ra bayykon el-samewe yalle bya3te el-ROU7 el-2ODOS la-yalle byetolbouh?"
W-ken 3am yesh7at shaytan akhras. W-lamma dahar el-shaytan 7eke el-rejjel, w-t3ajjabo el-nes.
Bass fi minnon 2alo: "3am yesh7at el-shyateen bi-2ouwwet Ba3lzaboul rayyes el-shyateen."
W-fi ghayron talabo 3ajibe min el-sama ta-yjarbouh.
3eref YASOU3 afkaron, w-2allon: "kell mamlake bten2osem 3a-7ala btekhrab w-bisiro byouta yehbto 3a-ba3don.
W-eza n2asam el-shaytan, keef btesmod mamlakto? 3am bit2oulo enno bi-Ba3lzaboul 3am besh7at el-shyateen,
eza kent bi-2ouwwet Ba3lzaboul besh7at el-shyateen, wledkon bi-2ouwwet meen 3am yesh7atouh? Kermel hek wledkon ra7 ye7kmo 3leykon.
Bass eza ana 3am esh7at el-shyateen bi-esba3 ALLAH, bikoun malakout ALLAH sar baynetkon.
Lamma bye7ros el-rejjel el-2awe el-msalla7 beyto bitkoun amwelo bi-amen.
Bass eza hejam 3le rejjel a2wa minno w-ghalabo, ra7 yekhod minno sle7o yalle ken mettekil 3le w-ywazzi3 el-ghaneyem.
Yalle ma bikoun ma3e houe dodde, w-yalle ma byejma3 ma3e bikoun 3am bifarri2.
2al YASOU3: "Eza dahar rou7 el-sharr min 2ensen, birou7 yfattesh 3al-ra7a. Wa2et yalle ma bile2iya bi2oul: ra7 erja3 3ala beyte yalle daharet minno.
Byerja3 w-bile2ih mkannas w-mrattab.
Birou7 w-bijeeb ma3o sab3 arwe7 al3an minno, bifouto bi-hal-2ensen, w-bitkoun 7alto aswa2 min el-awwal."
Houe w-3am ye7ke, sarakhet mara min bayn el-nes w-2aletlo: "niyyel el-mara yalle walladetak w-radda3etak."
2al YASOU3: "niyyel yalle byesma3 kalem ALLAH w-bya3mil fih."
W-tjamma3o el-nes 7awl YASOU3, sar y2ellon: "hayda el-jeel jeel 3atel 3am bitaleb bi-3ajibe, w-ma ra7 yen3atalo ella 3alemet Younen el-nabe.
W-metl ma ken Younen 3aleme la-ahl Ninawa, hek kamen ra7 ykoun 2eben el-2ensen 3aleme la-hal-jeel.
Maliket el-jnoub ra7 t2oum yawm el-deynoune ma3 hal-jeel w-te7kom 3le, li2anna ejet min ekher el-dene ta-tesma3 7ekmet Sulayman, w-hon fi a3zam min Sulayman.
W-ahl Ninawa, yawm el-deynoune, ra7 y2oumo ma3 hal-jeel w-ye7kmo 3le, li2annon tebo lamma anzaron Younen, w-hon fi a3zam min Younen!
"Ma byetdawwa srej w-byen7att ta7t el-mekyel aw bi-matra7 mkhabba, bel-3aks byen7att bi-matra7 3ale 7atta yalle feytin yshoufo el-daw.
El-3ayn srej el-jesm. Eza kenit 3aynak bi-7ale mni7a, bikoun jesmak kello mnawwir. W-eza 3aynak kenit mareeda, jesmek bikoun kello m3attim.
Ntebeh, ma ysir el-nour yalle fik 3atme.
Eza ken jesmak kello mnawwir, w-ma fiyo abadan 3atme, bikoun kello sawa mnawwir, metl wa2et bikoun el-srej mnawwir 3lek."
Houe w-3am ye7ke, 3azamo wa7ad min el-ferrisiyyin 3al-ghada la-3ando. Fet 3a-beyto w-2a3ad 3al-2akl.
T3ajjab el-ferrise lamma shef YASOU3 3am ye2'3od bidoun ma yghassel 2idey abl el-ghada.
2allo el-RAB YASOU3: "ento ya ferrisiyyin bitnaddfo el-kes wel-sa7n min barra, w-ento min jouwwa melyenin tama3 w-khabsane.
Ya aghbiya, hayda yalle 3eml el-zaher, mish houe yalle 3eml el-dekhil kamen?
3tou el-fou2ara min yalle bi-kesetkon w-s7ounkon, bisir kell shi elkon ndeef.
Bass ya weylkon, ya ferrisiyyin! Btedfa3o daribet el-na3na3 wel-za3tar w-be2e el-mazrou3at, w-btehemlo el-3adl w-ma7abbet ALLAH. W-ken lezim ta3emlo hayde bidoun ma tehemlo haydik.
Ya weylkon, ya ferrisiyyin! Bit7ebbo te2e3do eddem bel-majeme3 wel-salemet bel-se7at.
Ya weylkon, ento metl el-2bour el-mkhabbeye, byemsho el-nes 3leya w-henne mish 3arfin."
2allo wa7ad min 3oulama el-shari3a: "ya mou3allim, hal-7ake yalle 3am bit2oulo bibahdelna ne7na kamen!"
Jewabo YASOU3: "ya weylkon ento kamen ya 3oulama el-shari3a, bit7ammlo el-nes a7mel t2ile w-ma bitmeddo esba3 wa7ad la-tse3douwon ta-ye7emlouwa.
Ya weylkon, bit3ammro 2bour el-anbiya, w-bayyetkon henne yalle 2atalouwon.
W-hek bitkouno 3am tesh'hado 3ala bayyetkon w-twef2o 3ala a3melon: henne 2atalo el-anbiya, w-ento 3ammartoulon el-2bour.
Kermel hek bit2oul 7ekmet ALLAH: ra7 eb3atlon el-anbiya wel-rousl, shi bye2etlouwon w-shi byedtehdouwon
w-ra7 taleb hal-jeel bi-damm kell el-anbiya el-mahdour min yawm te2sis el-3alam,
min damm Habeel la-damm Zakariyya yalle n2atal bayn el-mazba7 w-beyt ALLAH. B7ebb 2elkon: hal-jeel ra7 ytalbouh bi-hayda el-damm!
Ya weylkon, ya 3oulama el-shari3a! Akahdto mefte7 el-ma3rife, la ento fetto, wala tarakto 7ada yfout."
W-lamma fall min honik, w-keno 3oulama el-shari3a wel-ferrisiyyin ne2meen 3le, saro yestaderjouh ta-ye7ke 3an mwadi3 ktire,
w-yjarrbo yenosboulo fkhoukh ta-yel2atouh bi-shi kelme.
Tjamma3 3asharat el-oulouf min el-nes, la-daraje saro yda3wso 3a-ejren ba3don, 2al YASOU3 la-tlemizo bel-awwal: "ntebho min-khameeret el-ferrisiyyin, ye3ne el-khabsane.
Ma fi shi mkhabba ella w-ra7 yenkashaf, w-ma fi shi mekhfe ella w-ra7 yen3araf.
Yalle 2eltouh bel-3atm, ra7 yensama3 bel-daw, w-yalle 2eltouh washwashe bel-2ouwad jouwwa, ra7 ynedo fih 3al-stou7.
B7ebb 2elkon, ya as7abe: ma tkhafo min yalle bye2etlo el-jesm w-min ba3da ma bye2daro ennon ya3emlo shi.
Ra7 2elkon min meen lezim tkhafo: khafo min yalle eza 2atal, edir enno yzett bi-jhannam. B2elkon: min hayda khafo.
Ma byenbe3o khams 3safeer bi-2ershen? Ma3 hayda w-kello ALLAH ma byensa wala wa7ad minnon.
W-aktar min hek, sha3r raskon kello ma3doud. Ma tkhafo. Ento aghla min kell el-3safeer!"
W-b2elkon: yalle bye3terif fiyye eddem el-nes, bye3terif fih 2eben el-2ensen eddem maleyket ALLAH.
W-yalle byenkerne eddem el-nes, byenekro 2eben el-2ensen eddem maleyket ALLAH.
W-yalle bi2oul kelme 3ala 2eben el-2ensen byenghafarlo, bass yalle bijaddef 3al-ROU7 el-2ODOS, ma ra7 yenghafarlo.
Lamma byekhdoukon 3al-majeme3 wel-7ekkem w-as7ab el-soulta, ma tehtammo keef bitdef3o 3an 7alkon aw-shou ra7 tjewbo,
li2anno el-ROU7 el-2ODOS byelhemkon bi-haydik el-se3a yalle lezim t2oulouh."
2allo rejjel min el-joumou3 la-YASOU3: "ya mou3allim, 2oul la-khayye y2asemne el-werte."
Jewabo: "ya rejjel, meen 7attne 2ãde 3leykon aw mou2assim 7osas?"
W-2al lal-nes: "ntebho min el-tama3, li2anno 7ayet el-2ensen ma btejih min amwelo."
W-2allon hal-matal: "rejjel ghane ardo ghallit 3le ktir,
Sa2al 7alo: ma fi 3ende matra7 khazzen fih ghallte, shou ba3mil?
Min ba3da 2al, ra7 a3mil hek: bohdom makhazne w-b3ammir akbar minna, w-b7ott fiya kell 2am7e w-khayrate.
W-b2oul la-nafse: ya nafse, elik khayrat ktire w-moune la-snin ktire, rte7e w-kele w-shrabe w-tna3ame!
2allo ALLAH: ya ghabe, bi-hal-leyle nafsak btentalab minnak. W-hayda yalle 7addarto la-meen bikoun?
Hek bikoun massir yalle byejma3 la-nafso w-ma byeghtene bi-ALLAH
W-2al la-tlemizo: "kermel hek b2elkon: ma te3talo hamm shou badkon teklo, wala te3talo hamm el-tyeb.
Li2anno el-7ayet ahamm min el-2akl, wel-jesm ahamm min el-tyeb.
T2amallo el-gherben. Ma byezra3o wala byo7osdo, w-ma bikhazzno wala byetmawwano, w-ALLAH bita3miyon! Ento aghla min hal-3safeer bi-ktir.
Meen minkon bye2dar, eza 7att kell 2ouwwto, enno yzeed 3ala toulo shebr?
Eza azghar el-eshya mish edrin ta3mlouwa, leysh 3am tehtammo bel-be2e?
T2amallo bi-zanba2 el-7a2l keef byekbar: ma byeghzol w-ma bi7ayyek. B7ebb 2elkon: Sulayman bi-3ezzo ma lebs metl wala we7de minnon.
Eza el-7ashish yalle hala2 hon w-boukra ra7 yenkabb bel-tannour, bi-labbso ALLAH bi-hal-tari2a, keef lamma el-mawdou3 byet3alla2 fikon ento, ya alileen el-imen?
Kermel hek ma ba2a te3talo hamm shou bteklo aw shou bteshrabo,
hayda kello byetolbouh wled hal-3alam, w-bayykon el-samewe bya3rif ennkon bi-7aje la-kell hal-eshya.
Tlebo malakout ALLAH, w-hawdik kellon byejoukon zyede.
Ma tkhaf, ya hal-atee3 el-zghir! Bayykon el-samewe baddo ya3tikon el-malakout.
Bi3o yalle btemelkouh w-se3do fih el-fou2ara, w-3abbo kyes ma btebla, w-kanz bel-sama ma byekhlas, matra7 yalle ma fi-loss bi2arrib, wala el-sous byenkhro.
Matra7 ma bikoun kanzkon, honik bikoun 2albkon.
"Kouno mest3eddin, znanirkon mashdoude 3a-khasrkon w-2nadilkon mdawwaye,
metl el-rjel el-natrin yerja3 sayyidon min el-3ers, 7atta eza eja w-da2 3al-beb byefta7oulo deghre.
Niyyel hal-kheddem yalle wa2et byerja3 sayyidon bile2iyon sohranin. B2elkon el-7a2i2a: enno bishammir 3an 2idey w-bi2a3edon 3al-2akl w-bisir yekhdemon.
Bass niyyelon eza eja abl aw ba3d noss el-leyl w-la2ehon hek 3amlin.
W-3rafo enno rab el-beyt law 3eref bi-ayya se3a byeje el-loss ma ken tarak beyto yensara2.
Kermel hek kouno mest3eddin, li2anno 2eben el-2ensen byeje bi-se3a mish natrina."
2allo Boutros: "ya RAB, la-elna 3am t2oul hal-matal aw la-kell el-nes?"
Jewabo el-RAB YASOU3: "meen houe el-wakeel el-ameen el-we3e yalle biwakklo sayyido enno ya3te kheddemo 2akl 3al-wa2et?
Niyyel hal-khadim yalle wa2et byerja3 sayyido bile2ih 3am ya3mil sheghlo.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a: enno biwakklo 3ala kell amwelo.
Bass eza 2al hal-khadim bi-2albo: ra7 yet2akhar sayyide ta yerja3, w-sar yedrob el-kheddem, rjel w-neswen, w-yekol w-yeshrab w-yeskar,
byerja3 sayyido bi-yawm mish natro w-bi-se3a ma bya3refa, w-byesh7ato w-bijezih jaza el-kefrin.
Hal khadim yalle bya3rif yalle baddo yeh sayyido w-ma bikoun jehiz enno ya3mil yalle baddo yeh sayyido, byendarab ktir.
W-yalle ma bya3rif shou baddo sayyido w-bya3mil shi byest7e2 el-darb, byendarab shwey. W-yalle n3atalo ktir byentalab minno el-ktir, w-yalle byet2amman 3al-ktir byentalab minno aktar.
"Jeet ta-khalle el-nar toula3 bel-ard, w-shou bitmanna enno tkoun wel3it!
W-lezim e2bal ma3moudiyyet el-ãlem, w-shou bitmanna enna tet7a'2a2.
Fekrkon jeet ta-y7ell el-salem 3al-ard? B7ebb 2elkon: la2, jeet ta-a3mil in2isam.
W-min liom w-raye7 bel-beyt yalle bikoun fih khams ashkhas, byekhtelfo tlete minnon ma3 tnen, w-tnen ma3 tlete.
Byekhtelif el-bayy ma3 2ebno wel-2eben ma3 bayyo, wel-emm ma3 benta wel-benet ma3 emma, wel-7ama ma3 el-kenne wel-kenne ma3 7ameta."
W-2al kamen lal-nes: "eza shefto ghayme tal3a min el-gharb, bit2oulo deghre: fi shete, w-fe3lan bitshatte.
W-eza habbet ree7 el-jnoub bit2oulo: ra7 koun shawb, w-bikoun mazbout.
Ya-mnef2een! Btefhamo manzar el-ard wel-sama, keef ma btefhamo 3alemet hal-zaman?
Leysh ma bte7ekmo bel-7a2 minkon la-7alkon?
Eza ro7t ma3 khasmak 3end el-7akem, shouf keef baddak tetsala7 ma3o enta w-ma3o bel-tari2, 7atta ma yekhdak 3end el-2ãde, w-ysallmak el-2ãde lal-shorte, w-ten7at bel-7abs.
B7ebb 2ellak: ma ra7 totla3 min honik abl ma touwfe ekher 2ersh."
W-bi-haydak el-wa2et ejo nes w-khabbaro YASOU3 3an el-Jaleeliyyin yalle 2atalon Bilatos bel-haykal w-khalat dammon bi-damm zabeyi7on,
jewabon YASOU3: "ento mfakkrin enno khatiyyet hal-Jaleeliyyin akbar min khatiyyet el-be2yin 7atta sar fiyon hek?
B7ebb 2elkon: la2, eza ma ra7 ettoubo, ra7 tmouto kellkon metlon.
W-hawdik el-tmen-ta3sh yalle wa2a3 el-berj 3leyon bi-Silwem w-2atalon, ento mfakkrin enno ghalteton akbar min ghaltet ahl Ourashalim?
B7ebb 2elkon: la2, w-eza ma ra7 ettoubo, ra7 tmouto kellkon metlon.
2al YASOU3 hal-matal: "ken la-rejjel shajret teen mazrou3a bi-karmo, eja ta-yfattesh 3ala thamar, w-ma le2a.
2al lal-kerrram: 2ele tlet snin beje 3ala hal-teene la-ekhod thamar, w-ma 3am le2e, 2ta3a! Leysh ta-netreka t3attil el-ard?
Jewabo el-kerram: treka, ya Rab, ba3d sene, 7atta enkosh 7awla w-7ottella sawed.
W-hek barke bte7mol el-sene el-jeye wa-ella bte2ta3a."
W-ken YASOU3 3am bi3allim bi-majma3 nhar el-sabt,
w-honik ken fi mara sèkena rou7 khalleha temrad tmen-ta3shar sene, w-3emella 7erdabbe ma fiya abadan tjallis.
Lamma shefa YASOU3 nadeha w-2alla: "nshafayte min maradik!"
W-7att 2ido 3leya, w-jallasit deghre dahra w-majjadit ALLAH.
Ghodib ra2is el-majma3, li2anno YASOU3 shafa el-mara nhar el-sabt, w-2al lal-mawjoudin: "3endkon sitt tiyyem masmou7 teshteghlo fiyon, teb2o ta3o bi-hal-iyem ta-teshfo, mish nhar el-sabt!"
Jewabo el-RAB YASOU3: "ya mnef2een! Mish kell wa7ad minkon bifekk rbat tawro aw 7maro min el-ma3laf nhar el-sabt w-byekhdo ta-yes2ih?
W-hal-mara min wled Ibrahim rabata el-shaytan min tmen-ta3shar sene, mish ken lezim enna tenfakk min rbata yawm el-sabt?"
W-lamma 2al hal-kalem, sta7o min 7alon kell yalle ejo doddo, w-kell el-nes fer7o bel-a3mel el-majide yalle ken 3am ya3mela.
W-2al YASOU3: "shou byeshbah malakout ALLAH? Bi-shou bshabbho?
Houe metl 7abbit khardal zara3a rejjel bi-7a2lo, w-kebrit w-saret shajra, w-saro 3safeer el-sama ya3mlo 3shoush bayn aghsana."
W-2al kamen: "bi-shou bshabbih malakout ALLAH?
Houe metl khameere akhadeta mara w-7atteta bi-tlet kaylet t7in, w-hek el-3ajeen khammar kello."
W-meshe YASOU3 bel-moudon wel-diya3, 3am bi3allim w-houe bi-tari2o 3ala Ourashalim.
2allo rejjel: "ya Rab, awlak ra7 ykouno 2lel yalle bile2o el-khalãs?" Jewab YASOU3:
"3melo jehdkon enno tfouto min el-beb el-dayyi2. B7ebb 2elkon: ktar min el-nes ra7 yjarrbo yfouto w-ma ra7 ye2daro.
W-eza 2am rab el-beyt w-sakkar el-beb, w-w2efto ento barra w-serto etde'2o 3al-beb w-t2oulo: ya rab! Fta7elna, ra7 yjewebkon: ma ba3refkon!
W-bit2oulo: akalna w-shrebna ma3ak, w-3allamit bi-tor2atna!
Bi2elkon: ma ba3rif min wayn ento. B3edo 3anne kellkon ya ashrar!
W-bikoun el-beke wel-ta2ta2et el-snen, wa2et yalle bitshoufo Ibrahim w-Is7ak w-Ya3koub wel-anbiya kellon bi-malakout ALLAH, w-ento barra mash7outin!
W-ra7 yejo el-nes min el-shar2 wel-gharb, w-min el-shmel wel-jnoub, w-bye2e3do 3al-meyde bi-malakout ALLAH.
El-ouwal ra7 ysiro awekher, w-yalle henne awekher ra7 ysiro ouwal."
W-bi-haydik el-se3a 2arrabo kamm wa7ad min el-ferrisiyyin min YASOU3 w-2aloulo: "b3od min hon, li2anno Hirodos baddo ye2etlak!"
2allon: "rou7o 2oulo la-hal-ta3lab: ana 3am besh7at el-shyateen w-3am beshfe el-marda liom w-boukra, w-bel-yawm el-telit bkhallis kell shi.
Bass lezim kammil tari2e liom w-boukra w-ba3d boukra, li2anno ma bijouz enno ymout nabe barrat Ourashalim.
Ourashalim, Ourashalim! Ya 2attilet el-anbiya w-rajjimet el-moursalin yalle nba3ato la-3andik! Kamm marra ken badde ejma3 wledik, metl ma btejma3 el-djeje wleda ta7t jwene7a, w-ma 2belto.
Hayda beytkon matrouk elkon. B7ebb 2elkon: ma ra7 tshoufoune 7atta yeje yawm bit2oulo fih: yetberak el-jeye bi-esm el-RAB!"
Fet YASOU3 yawm el-sabt 3a-beyt wa7ad min el-ferrisiyyin la-yekol 3endo, w-keno 3am bi-ra2bouh.
W-ken fi eddemo rejjel ma3o marad el-este2sa,
2al YASOU3 la-mou3allimi el-shari3a wel-ferrisiyyin: "masmou7 el-shife2 nhar el-sabt aw la2"
Sakato. W-masak YASOU3 el-rejjel bi-2ido w-shafeh w-ba3ato.
Min ba3da 2allon: "meen minkon byou2a3 2ebno aw tawro bi-beer nhar el-sabt w-ma bisheelo deghre?"
W-ma edro yjewbouh.
W-la7az enno bayn el-ma3zoumin fi nes 3am bina'2o el-ma2e3ed el-eddem, se3eta 2al hal-matal:
"Eza 3azamak 7ada 3ala walimet 3ers, ma te2'3od bel-ma2'3ad el-awwal. Li2anno yemken ykoun fi bayn el-ma3zoumin 7ada ahamm minnak,
W-byeje yalle 3azamkon w-bi2ellak: 3tina matra7ak! Ra7 teste7e, w-t2oum ta-te2'3od wara.
Bass eza n3azamit 23od wara, 7atta eza eja yalle 3azmak 2allak: ta3a la-eddem, ya sadee2e. Btekbar 2imtak bi-nazar kell el-ma3zoumin,
Li2anno yalle bi3alle 7alo byetwatta, w-yalle biwatte 7alo byet3alla."

W-2al YASOU3 la-yalle 3azem: "eza 3melt walimet ghada aw 3asha, ma te3zom asdika2ak wala ekhwetak wala 2raybinak wala jiranak el-aghniya, ta-ma yerja3o ye3zmouk bi-dawron, w-bitkoun akhadet moukafe2tak.
Bel-3aks, eza 3melt walime, 3zom el-fou2ara wel-moushawwahin wel-3erj wel-3emyen.
W-niyyelak eza 3melt hek li2anno ma bye2dar 7ada ykefik, fa-ra7 tetkefa2 yawm 2iyemet el-abrar."
W-lamma sem3 wa7ad min el-ma3zoumin hal-kalem 2al la-YASOU3: "niyyel yalle bye2'3od 3ala meydet malakout ALLAH!"
Jewabo YASOU3: "3eml rejjel walime kbire, w-3azam ktar min el-nes.
W-lamma sar wa2et el-3asha ba3at khadmo la-y2oul lal-ma3zoumin: ta3o, kell shi m7addar!
E3tazaro kellon. 2allo el-awwal: eshtareyt 7a2l w-lezim rou7 shoufo, bitrajjak te3zerne.
W-2allo wa7ad tene: eshtareyt khams fdadeen, w-ana halla2 rayi7 la-jarrebon, bitrajjek te3zerne.
W-2allo wa7ad ghayro: etzawwajet mara, ma be2dar eje.
Reje3 el-khadim la-3and sayyido w-khabbaro bi-yalle sar, ghodib rabb el-beyt w-2al la-khadmo: tla3 bi-ser3a 3ala el-tor2at bel-madine w-3zom el-fou2ara wel-moushawwahin wel-3erj wel-3emyen.
2allo el-khadim: 3melt metl ma 2eltelle ya Rab, w-ba3d fi matare7 fadye.
Jewabo el-sayyid: "tla3 3ala el-tor2at w-jbor el-nes tfout 7atta yentele el-beyt.
B7ebb 2elkon: ma 7ada min hal-ma3zoumin ra7 ydou2 min el-3asha taba3e!"
Keno nes ktir le7'2in YASOU3, eltafat YASOU3 w-2allon:
"Yalle byeje la-3ande w-ma bi7ebbne aktar min bayyo w-emmo w-marto w-wledo w-ekhewto w-khayyeto, w-aktar min 7alo, ma bye2dar enno ykoun telmize.
W-yalle ma bye7mol salibo w-byel7a2ne ma bye2dar enno ykoun telmize.
Meen minkon, eza baddo y3ammir berj, ma bye2'3od awwal shi w-bye7sob addeysh bikallfo ta-yshouf eza bye2dar enno ykammlo,
7atta ma y7ott el-ases w-min ba3da ma ye2dar ykammel, w-yetmaskharo 3le yalle 3am yettalla3o.
Ra7 y2oulo: hal-rejjel ballash y3ammir w-ma edr ykammil.
W-ayya malik byetla3 ta-y7areb malik tene, w-ma bikoun min abl 2a3ad w-fakkar la-7alo eza bye2dar bi-3ashr-talef shakhs ywejih yalle ze7if 3le bi-3eshreen-alf?
Wa-ella byeb3at wafd la-hal-malik, ma zel ba3do b3id 3anno, w-byetlob minno el-sol7a.
W-hek ma 7ada minkon bye2dar ykoun telmize, ella eza tkhalla 3an kell shi elo.
"El-mel7 mni7, bass eza ma ba2a ymalle7, shou yalle bireddelo ta3mto?
Ma bi3oud yenfa3 la lal-terbe wala lal-sawed, byenkabb barra. Yalle 3endo dinen, khallih yesma3."
Keno yalle bilemmo el-darayib wel-khatyeen 3am bi2arbo min YASOU3 ta-yesma3ouh.
2alo el-ferrisiyyin w-mou3allimi el-shari3a henne w-3am bisher3o: "hal-rejjel 3am yesta2bil el-khatyeen w-3am yekol ma3on!"
Se3eta bye7kiyon YASOU3 bi-hal-matal:
"Meen minkon eza ken 3endo miyyet kharouf, w-dayya3 wa7ad minnon, ma byetrok el-tes3a w-tes3een bel-barriye la-yfattish 3an el-kharouf el-daye3 7atta yle2ih?
W-eza le2eh bye7emlo 3ala ktefo houe w-fer7an,
w-byerja3 3al-beyt w-bye3zom asdika2o w-jirano w-bi2ellon: fra7o ma3e, li2anno l2it kharoufe el-daye3!
B7ebb 2elkon: hek bikoun el-fara7 bel-sama bi-khate wa7ad bitoub aktar min el-fara7 bel-tes3a w-tes3een min el-abrar yalle mish bi-7aje lal-tawbe.
W-2al YASOU3: "ayya mara eza ken ma3a 3ashr 2roush, w-dayya3et 2ersh wa7ad, ma bitdawwe sreja w-bitkannes el-beyt w-bitfattesh 3an hal-2ersh mni7 7atta tle2ih?
W-eza le2eto, bte3zom sadi2ata w-jarata w-bit2ellon: fra7o ma3e li2anno l2it el-2ersh yalle dayya3to.
B7ebb 2elkon: hek byefra7o maleyket ALLAH bi-khate wa7ad bitoub."
W-2al YASOU3: "ken fi rejjel 3endo 2ebnen,
2allo el-azghar: "ya bayye 3tine 7osste min el-amlek. Fa-2asamlon amleko.
W-min ba3d kamm yawm, jama3 el-2eben el-azghar kell shi byemlok, w-sefar 3ala bled b3ide, w-honik saraf mesriyyeto bidoun 7seb.
W-lamma saraf kell shi, sar fi bi-haydik el-bled maje3a kbire, w-ballash y7ess bel-2elle.
Ra7 la-3and rejjel min ahl haydik el-bled, w-ba3ato el-rejjel 3ala 72oulo ta-yer3a el-khnezir.
W-ken byeshtehe enno yeshba3 min el-khournoub yalle kenit el-khnezir tekol minno, w-ma ya3tih 7ada.
Reje3 la-zeto w-2al: kamm fi shaghil 3end bayye byefdal 3anno el-khebz, w-ana hon 3am mout min el-jou3.
Ra7 2oum w-erja3 la-3and bayye w-2ello: ya bayye, khtit eddem el-sama w-eddemak,
ma best7e2 ba3d enno koun 2ebnak, 3amelne metl shi khadim 3endak.
2am w-reje3 la-3and bayyo. Shefo bayyo jeye min b3id, shefe2 3le w-rakad sawbo sar yeghemro w-ybouso.
2allo el-2eben: ya bayye, ana khtit eddem el-sama w-eddemak, w ma best7e2 ba3d enno koun 2ebnak.
2al el-bayy la-kheddemo: bser3a! Jeebo a7san tyeb w-labbsouh henne, w-7otto khatim bi-esba3o w-sandal bi ejrey.
W-jeebo el-3ejl el-nase7 w-dba7ouh, 7atta-nekol w-nefra7,
li2anno 2ebne hayda ken mayyit w-3ash, w-ken daye3 w-l2ineh. W-fer7o ktir.
W-ken el-2eben el-kbir bel-7a2l, w-lamma reje3 w-2arrab min el-beyt, sem3 sawt el-aghane wel-ra2s.
Neda wa7ad min el-kheddem w-sa2alo: shou fi?
Jewabo: reje3 khayyak bi-kheyr, w-daba7 bayyak el-3ejl el-nase7.
Ghodib w-rafad enno yfout. Toli3 la-3ando bayyo w-sar yetrajjeh yfout,
2al la-bayyo: khadamtak kell hal-snin w-ma khelafet 2amrak, w-ma 3titne jadi wa7ad 7atta efra7 fih ana w-as7abe.
Bass lamma reje3 2ebnak hayda, ba3d ma saraf melak ma3 banet el-zena, daba7et el-3ejl el-nase7!"
Jewabo bayyo: ya 2ebne, enta ma3e bi-kell el-aw2at, w-kell shi ele houe elak.
Bass ken lezim nefra7, li2anno khayyak hayda ken mayyit w-3ash, w-ken daye3 w-l2ineh."
2al YASOU3 la-tlemizo: "ken fi rejjel ghane w-ken 3endo wakeel, ejo ykhabrouh enno 3am biba3ze2 mesriyyeto,
ba3at warah w-2allo: shou hayda yalle 3am besma3o 3annak? 3tine 7seb wikeltak, enta ma btest7e2 ba3d liom ennak tkoun wakeel ele.
2al el-wakeel bi-2albo: ra7 yekhod sayyide el-wikele minne, shou ba3mil? Ma fiyye efla7, w-ma ele 3ayn rou7 esh7ad.
Ba3den 2al: 3reft shou badde a3mil, 7atta eza 3azalne sayyide 3an el-wikele, bye2baloune el-nes bi-byouton.
Neda kell yalle 3leyon dayn la-sayyido, w-2al la-wa7ad minnon: addeysh 3lek la-sayyide?
Jewabo: miyyet kayl min el-zeyt. 2allo el-wakeel: khod wra2ak w-23od deghre w-ktob khamseen!
W-2al lal-tene: w-enta, addeysh 3lek la-sayyide? Jewabo: miyyet kayl min el-2am7. 2allo el-wakeel: khod wra2ak w-ktob tmeneen!
W-mada7 el-sayyid wakeelo el-khayen 3ala 7ekmto, li2anno ahl hal-3alam, bass yet3amalo ma3 ba3don, azka min ahl el-nour.
W-ana b2elkon: 3melo la-elkon asdika2 bi-mel el-ghesh, 7atta eza kholis, 2ebloukon bel-matare7 el-abadiyye.
Yalle bikoun ameen 3al-alil, bikoun ameen 3al-ktir. W-yalle ma bikoun ameen 3al-alil, ma bikoun ameen 3al-ktir.
W-eza kento mish oumana bi-mel el-ghesh, fa-meen ra7 ye2temenkon 3a-mel el-7a2?
W-eza kento mish oumana bi-yalle houe la-ghayrkon, meen ra7 ya3tikon yalle houe elkon?
Ma 7ada bye2dar ykoun khadim la-sayyiden, li2anno aw baddo yebghod wa7ad w-y7ebb el-tene, aw baddo yet3alla2 bi-wa7ad w-ye7te2ir el-tene. Ma bte2daro tekhedmo ALLAH wel-mel sawa."
Keno el-ferrisiyyin, w-henne aslan bi7ebbo el-masare, 3am yesma3o kell hal-shi w-yestkheffo bi-YASOU3.
2allon YASOU3: "Ento 3am bitbarrero 7alkon eddem el-nes, bass ALLAH bya3rif shou fi bi-2loubkon. W-yalle el-nes bye3tebrouh elo 2ime bikoun sharr bi-3ayn ALLAH.
Be2yet el-shari3a w-ta3alim el-anbiya 7atta eja You7anna, min ba3da ballash el-tebshir bi-malakout ALLAH, sar kell 2ensen yjarreb yfout bel-2ouwwe.
Bass zawel el-sama wel-ard as'hal min enno tenma7a no2ta we7de min el-shari3a.
Yalle bitalle2 marto w-byetzawwaj ghayra bikoun zene, w-yalle byetzawwaj mara talla2a zawja bikoun zene."
2al YASOU3: "ken fi rejjel ghane byelbos el-ourjouwen wel-tyeb el-fekhra w-bya3mil waleyem kell yawm.
W-ken fi rejjel fa2ir esmo Li3azar, bi-jesmo fi jrou7. W-ken ynem eddem beb el-rejjel el-ghane,
w-yeshtehe enno yeshba3 min fadalet 2aklo, w-kenit el-kleb teje w-tel7as jrou7o.
W-met el-fa2ir w-7emleto el-maleyke la-3and Ibrahim. W-met el-ghane w-ndafan.
W-rafa3 el-ghane 3youno w-houe bi-jhannam 3am yet3azzab, w-bishouf Ibrahim min b3id w-Li3azar 7addo.
Binedih: r7amne, ya bayye Ibrahim, w-b3at Li3azar ta-ybell taraf esba3o bel-may w-ybarred lsene, li2anno 3am bit3azzab ktir bel-nar.
2allo Ibrahim: tzakkar, ya 2ebne, ennak akhadet nasibak min el-kheyrat bi-7ayetak, w-akhad Li3azar nasibo min el-msayeb. W-halla2 houe 3am yet3azza hon, w-enta 3am tet3azzab honik.
W-aktar min hek, baynna w-baynkon fi houwwe ghami2a ma bye2dar 7ada enno ye2ta3 min 3enna la-3andkon wala min 3endak la-3enna.
2al el-ghane: bitrajjek, ya bayye Ibrahim, b3at Li3azar 3ala beyt bayye,
ta-ynabbeh ekhwete el-khamse honik ta-ma ysiro henne kamen bi-matra7 el-3azèb hayda.
2allo Ibrahim: 3endon Moussa wel-anbiya, khalliyon yesma3oulon.
Jewabo el-ghane: la2, ya bayye Ibrahim! Eza 2am wa7ad min el-mawt w-ra7 la-3andon bitoubo.
2allo Ibrahim: eza ma sem3o la-Moussa wel-anbiya, ma ra7 ye2ten3o 7atta law 2am wa7ad min el-mawt."
2al YASOU3 la-tlemizo: "la-bodd min enno ykoun fi asbeb lal-shoukouk, bass ya weylo yalle ra7 ykoun houe el-sabab.
A7sanlo enno y3al2oulo bi-ra2ebto 7ajar el-ta7oun w-yzettouh bel-ba7r min enno ywa2e3 wa7ad min hal-zghar bel-khatiyye.
Ntebho. Eza khote khayyak wabbkho, w-eza teb ghferlo.
Eza khote sab3 marrat bel-yawm, w-reje3 la-3andak bi-kell marra w-2al: "ana teyib, ghferlo."
W-2alo el-rousl lal-RAB: "zeed imenna",
jewabo el-RAB: "law ken 3endkon imen add 7abbit el-khardal w-2elto la-hal-jemmayze: n2el3e w-nzer3e bel-ba7r, kenit bittee3kon.
"Meen minkon 3endo khadim byefla7 el-ard w-byer3a el-ghanam, w-eza reje3 min el-7a2l, bi2ello: 3ajjil w-23od kol.
Ma bi2ello: 7adderle el-3asha, w-shammir 3an 2idek w-khdemne 7atta ekol w-eshrab, w-min ba3da btekol w-bteshrab?
Awlkon hal-khadim elo fadl eza sem3 kelmet sayyido? Ma bi3te2ed.
W-hek ento, eza 3melto kell shi 2amartkon yeh 2oulo, ne7na kheddem bousata, w-ma 3melna ella yalle ken lezim na3emlo."
Ken YASOU3 tali3 3ala Ourashalim, w-mara2 bel-Samira wel-Jaleel.
W-lamma fet 3ala day3a min el-diya3 sta2balouh 3ashr bors, w-we2fo b3ad 3anno
w-saro ysarkho: "ya YASOU3, ya mou3allim, r7amna!"
Ettalla3 w-2allon: "rou7o la-3and el-kahane w-farjouwon 7alkon!" w-henne w-ray7in nshafo.
W-lamma shef wa7ad minnon 7alo enno nshafa, reje3 houe w-3am bimajjed ALLAH bi-sawt 3ale,
w-kabb 7alo 3end ejren YASOU3 w-wejjo 3al-ard w-sar yeshekro, w-ken Semiri.
2allo YASOU3: "mish yalle nshafo henne 3ashra, wayn el-tes3a el-be2yin?
Ma lta2a bayneton meen yerja3 w-ymajjed ALLAH ella hal-gharib?"
Min ba3da 2allo: "2oum w-rou7, imenak khallasak."
Lamma sa2alouh el-ferrisiyyin: "aymata ra7 yeje malakout ALLAH?" Jewabon: "ma byeje malakout ALLAH bi-tari2a este3radiyye.
Wala ra7 yen2al: hayda houe hon, aw hayda houe honik, li2anno malakout ALLAH houe fikon."
W-2al la-tlemizo: "byeje wa2et btetmanno fih enno tshoufo yawm wa7ad min iyem 2eben el-2ensen w-ma ra7 tshoufouh.
W-ra7 y2ouloulkon: hayda houe hon, aw honik! Ma trou7o w-tel7a2o 7ada,
li2anno el-yawm yalle byeje fih 2eben el-2ensen bikoun metl el-bar2 yalle byelma3 bel-sama min meyl la-meyl.
Bass lezim abl kell shi enno yet2allam ktir, w-yerefdo hal-jeel.
W-metl ma sar 3ala iyem Nou7, kamen ra7 ysir bi-iyem 2eben el-2ensen:
Keno el-nes yeklo w-yeshrabo w-yetzawwajo, lal-yawm yalle fet fih Nou7 3al-safine, w-eja el-toufan w-meto kellon.
Aw metl bi-iyyem Lout: keno el-nes yeklo w-yeshrabo, w-ybi3o w-yeshtero, w-yezra3o w-y3ammro,
bass yawm yalle toli3 Lout min Sadoum nazzal ALLAH nar w-kabrit min el-sama w-meto kellon.
W-hek ra7 ysir yawm yalle byezhar 2eben el-2ensen.
W-yalle bi-haydak el-yawm bikoun 3al-sat7, ma yenzal 3al-beyt ta-yekhod ghrado. W-yalle bikoun bel-7a2l ma yerja3 la-wara.
Tzakkaro marto la-Lout!
Yalle hammo ye7faz 7ayeto, ra7 yekhsara, w-yalle byekhsar 7ayeto, byerba7a.
B7ebb 2elkon: ra7 ykoun bi-haydik el-leyle tnen 3ala takht wa7ad, byettekhad wa7ad w-byentarak el-tene.
Bikouno tnen neswen 3ala 7ajar el-ta7n sawa, btettekhad mara w-btentarak el-tenye.
W-bikouno rejjelen bel-7a2l, byettekhad wa7ad minnon w-byentarak el-tene."
Sa2alouh el-tlemiz: "la-wayn, ya RAB?" Jewabon: "matra7 ma bitkoun el-jette btetjamma3 el-gherben."
7ekehon YASOU3 bi-matal 3an darouret ydallo ysallo bidoun ma yedjaro,
2al: "ken fi bi-madine el-moudon 2ãde ma bikhaf ALLAH w-ma bi7ebb el-nes.
W-ken fi bi-haydik el-madine armale bteje deyman la-3ando w-bit2ello: khedle 7a2e min khasme!
W-ken yerfod talaba, bass min ba3d medde tawile 2al bi-2albo: ma3 enno ma bkhaf ALLAH w-ma b7ebb el-nes,
ra7 a3te hal-armale 7a2a li2anna 3am tez3ejne, wa-ella ra7 tdall teje w-tez3ejne."
W-2al el-RAB YASOU3: "sma3o mni7 yalle 2alo hal-2ãde el-zalem,
fa-keef ma bya3te ALLAH moukhtarino yalle 3am yesorkhoulo leyl w-nhar? Awlkon ra7 yet2akhar 3leyon?
B7ebb 2elkon: enno ra7 yesra3 w-ya3tiyon shou baddon. Bass awlkon ra7 yle2e 2eben el-2ensen imen 3al-ard lamma ra7 yeje?"
W-2al hal-matal la-nes keno mfakkrin 7alon mne7, w-3am ye7te2ro ghayron:
"Tel3o rejjelen 3al-haykal ta-ysallo, wa7ad ferrise wel-tene bilemm el-darayib.
We2f el-ferrise 3am bisalle bi-2albo w-y2oul: beshkrak ya ALLAH, ana mish metl be2e el-nes el-tammi3in el-zalmin el-zounet, wala metl hayda yalle bilemm darayib!
Ana bsoum bel-jem3a marteyn, w-b2addim el-3eshr 3an kell madakhile.
Bass yalle bilemm darayib we2f b3id mish mestarje yerfa3 3youno sawb el-sama, w-ken 3am bide2 3ala sadro w-y2oul: r7amne ya ALLAH, ana el-khate!
B7ebb 2elkon: hayda yalle bilemm darayib, w-mish el-ferrise, houe yalle nezl 3ala beyto ma2boul 3end ALLAH. Yalle bi3alle 7alo byetwatta, w-yalle biwatte 7alo byet3alla."
W-eja la-3ando nes ma3on atfal la-y7ott 2idey 3leyon. W-lamma shefouwon el-tlemiz bay3adouwon.
Bass YASOU3 neda el-atfal la-3ando w-2al: "khallo el-atfal yejo la-3ande w-ma temna3ouwon, li2anno la-yalle metlon malakout ALLAH.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a: yalle ma bye2bal malakout ALLAH metl el-tofl, ma ra7 yfout 3le."
W-sa2alo wa7ad min el-rou2asa: "ya hal-mou3allim el-sale7, shou ba3mil ta-ourat el-7ayet el-abadiyye?"
Jewabo YASOU3: "leysh 3am tsammine sale7? Ma fi sale7 ella wa7ad w-houe ALLAH.
Enta bta3rif el-wassaya: ma tezne, ma te2tol, ma tesro2, ma tesh'had bel-zour, karrem bayyak w-emmak."
2allo el-rejjel: "min ana w-zghir w-ana 3am ba3mil bi-hal-wassaya kella."
W-lamma sem3 YASOU3 kalemo hayda, 2allo: "ba3d na2sak shaghle we7de, rou7 bi3 kell shi btemelko w-3tiyon lal-fou2ara, bisir 3endak kanz bel-sama, w-ta3a l7a2ne."
Ze3l el-rejjel lamma sem3 hal-kalem, li2anno ken ghane ktir.
W-shef YASOU3 enno el-rejjel ze3l, 2al: "sa3be ktir 3al-aghniya enno yfouto 3a-malakout ALLAH!
Ahwan 3al-jamal enno yfout bi-kherm el-2ebre min enno yfout el-ghane 3a-malakout ALLAH."
2alo yalle sem3o: "eza hek, meen bye2dar yle2e el-khalãs?"
Jewab YASOU3: "yalle mousta7il 3end el-nes, moumkin 3end ALLAH."
2allo Boutros: "ne7na tarakna kell shi w-l7e2nek!"
Jewabo YASOU3: "b2elkon el-7a2i2a: ma fi 7ada byetrok beyt aw mara aw ekhwe aw bayy aw emm aw wled kermel malakout ALLAH,
ella w-ra7 yekhod 2addon miyyet marra w-yourath el-7ayet el-abadiyye."
W-jtama3 YASOU3 bel-tlemiz el-tna3sh la-wa7don w-2allon: "ne7na halla2 tal3in 3ala Ourashalim, w-ra7 ysir kell yalle katabouh el-anbiya 3an 2eben el-2ensen,
ra7 yetsallam 2eben el-2ensen lal-wathaniye, w-ra7 yetmaskharo 3le w-ysebboulo w-yebez2o 3le,
min ba3da byejeldouh w-bye2etlouh, w-telit yawm ra7 y2oum."
Ma fehmo el-tlemiz shi min yalle 2alo, w-ken hal-kalem ma7joub 3annon, w-ma fehmouh.
2arrab YASOU3 min Ari7a, w-ken fi rejjel a3ma 2e3id 3ala 7affit el-tari2 3am yesh7ad.
Lamma 7ass enno el-nes 3am temro2 min 7addo sa2al: "shou hayda?"
Khabbarouh enno YASOU3 el-Nassire meri2 min honik.
