Sarakh: "ya YASOU3 2eben Daoud, r7amne!"
Saro el-nes el-meshyin eddem ysakktouh. Bass houe sar y3alle sawto aktar: "ya 2eben Daoud, r7amne!"
We2f YASOU3 w-2amar enno yjeebo la-3ando. Lamma 2arrab sa2alo:
Shou baddak a3mellak?" Jewabo: "enno e2sha3, ya Rab!"
2allo YASOU3: "2sha3, imenak shafek!"
Bi-se3et el-se3a reje3 ye2sha3 w-le7e2 YASOU3 houe w-3am yeshkor ALLAH. W-lamma shef el-sha3b yalle sar, kellon majjado ALLAH.
Fet YASOU3 3a-Ari7a w-sar yebrom fiya.
W-ken fi rejjel ghane min lammimet el-darayib esmo Zakka,
eja la-yshouf meen houe YASOU3. Bass ken 2asir, w-ma edr enno yshoufo la-ketrit el-3aj2a.
Rakad sawb jemmayze w-toli3 3leya ta-yshoufo, w-ken YASOU3 ra7 yemro2 min hal-tari2.
W-lamma wossil YASOU3 la-honik, ettalla3 fih w-2allo: "nzal bi-se3ra ya Zakka, li2anno ra7 zour liom beytak."
Nezl bi-ser3a w-sta2balo bi-fara7.
W-lamma shefo el-nes yalle sar, 2alo: "fet 3a-beyt rejjel khate la-ye2'3od 3endo."
We2f Zakka w-2al lal-RAB YASOU3: "ya, RAB, ra7 a3te el-fou2ara noss amwele, w-eza kent zalamet 7ada bi-shi, breddello yeh arba3 marrat."
2allo YASOU3: "liom 7all el-khalãs bi-hal-beyt, li2anno hal-rejjel houe kamen min wled Ibrahim.
W-2eben el-2ensen eja ta-yfattesh 3an el-khatyeen w-ykhallison."
W-2arrab YASOU3 min Ourashalim, w-keno yalle 3am yesma3o hal-kalem mfakkrin enno malakout ALLAH ra7 yeje deghre, 2am 3atahon hal-matal,
2al: "sefar wa7ad min el-oumara 3ala balad b3id ta-yestelim el-melk w-min ba3da byerja3.
Ba3at wara 3ashr kheddem elo w-3ata kell wa7ad minnon dinar dahabe w-2allon: tèjro bi-hal-masare la-wa2et ma erja3.
Keno ahl balado yekrahouh, ba3ato wafd wara minno ta-y2oulo: ma badna hal-rejjel malik 3leyna.
W-lamma reje3 el-amir, min ba3d ma stalam el-melk, 2amar yeb3ato wara el-kheddem yalle 3atahon el-masare, ta-yshouf addeysh reb7 kell wa7ad minnon.
2arrab el-awwal w-2al: ya Rab, reb7 dinarak 3ashra ghayron.
2allo: 3afek ya hal-khadim el-sale7! Kent ameen 3al-alil, fa-ra7 tkoun wele 3ala 3ashr moudon.
W-eja el-tene w-2al: ya Rab, reb7 dinarak khamse ghayron.
2allo: w-enta koun wele 3ala khams moudon.
W-eja el-telit w-2al: ya Rab, hayda houe dinarak: khabbayto,
li2anno kheft minnak. Enta rejjel 2ase btekhod yalle mish enta jem3o.
2allo: bi-kalemak ra7 deenak, ya hal-khadim el-sherreer. 3reft enno ana rejjel 2ase bekhod yalle mish ana jem3o, w-bo7sod yalle mish zer3o,
leysh ma 7atteyt mesriyyete 3end el-serrafin? W-kent lamma rje3t bekhedon ma3 el-feyde.
W-2al lal-mawjoudin: khedo el-dinar minno w-dfa3ouh la-sa7ib el-waznet el-3ashra.
2aloulo: ya Rab, 3endo 3ashra ghayron! Jewabon:
B7ebb 2elkon: yalle ma3o shi, byen3atalo ta-yzeed. W-yalle ma ma3o shi, byekhdoulo 7atta yalle houe elo.
W-a3de2e yalle ma baddon emlok 3leyon, jeebouwon la-hon w-2telouwon eddeme."
2al hal-kalem w-toli3 3ala Ourashalim.
W-lamma 2arrab min Beyt-Faji w-Beyt-3anya, 3end el-jabal yalle bisammouh jabal el-Zeytoun, ba3at tnen min tlemizo,
w-2allon: "rou7o 3ala el-day3a yalle bi-wejjkon, lamma bitfouto bitle2o ja7sh marbout, ma rekb 3le 7ada min abl, fekko rbato w-jeebouh.
W-eza sa2alkon 7ada: leysh 3am bitfekko rbato? 2oulo: el-Rab bi-7aje elo."
Ra7o el-telmizen w-le2o metl ma 2allon YASOU3.
W-henne 3am bifekko rbat el-ja7sh, 2aloulon as7abo: "leysh 3am bitfekko rbato?"
Jewabo: "el-Rab bi-7aje elo."
Jebo el-ja7sh la-3and YASOU3, w-7atto 3le mashale7on, w-toli3 YASOU3 2a3ad 3le.
Meshe wel-nes 3am tefrosh tyeba 3al-tari2.
W-lamma 2arrab min nazlit jabal el-Zeytoun, saro el-tlemiz yhallelo w-ysabb7o ALLAH bi-sawt 3ale 3an kell el-3ajeyeb yalle shefouha.
W-keno 3am bi2oulo: "yetberak el-malik el-jeye bi-esm el-RAB. El-salem bel-sama, wel-majd bel-a3ali!"
2aloulo el-ferrisiyyin yalle keno bayn el-nes: "ya mou3allim, 2oul la-tlemizak ennon yesekto!"
Jewabon YASOU3: "b7ebb 2elkon: eza henne sakato, el-7jara ra7 te7ke!"
W-lamma 2arrab min Ourashalim ettalla3 3al-madine w-beke 3leya,
w-2al: "ya raytik 3refte liom tari2 el-salem! Bass halla2 houe ma7joub 3an 3younik.
Ra7 yeje wa2et bisayjouke a3de2ik bel-mteris, w-bi7asrouke, w-bisakkro 3leyke min kell el-meylet,
w-ra7 ydammrouke 3ala wledik, w-ma ra7 yeterko fike 7ajar 3ala 7ajar, li2annik ma 3refte zaman ALLAH lamma eja ykhallsik."
Min ba3da fet 3al-haykal w-sar yesh7at el-biyye3in
w-y2ellon: "maktoub: beyte beyt sala, w-ento 7awwaltouh mgharet lsous!"
W-sar y3allim kell yawm bel-haykal, w-keno rou2asa el-kahane w-mou3allimi el-shari3a w-zou3ama el-sha3b baddon ye2etlouh,
w-ma 3am bile2o tari2a, li2anno el-sha3b kello ken 3am yetsamma3lo w-3am yet3alla2 fih.
Ken YASOU3 yawm min el-iyem 3am bi3allim el-sha3b bel-haykal w-ybashro, eja la-3ando rou2asa el-kahane w-mou3allimi el-shari3a w-shyoukh el-sha3b
w-2aloulo: "2elna, bi-ayya soultan 3am ta3mil hal-eshya? W-meen 3atak hal-soultan?"
Jewabon YASOU3: "w-ana bes2alkon sou2al wa7ad, 2ouloule:
min wayn jeye soultet ma3moudiyyet You7anna? Min el-sama aw min el-nes?"
2alo bi-2albon: "eza 2elna min el-sama, ra7 yjewebna: leysh ma 2ãmanto fih?
W-eza 2elna min el-nes, el-sha3b kello ra7 yerjemna, li2anno me3tebrin You7anna nabe."
Jewabouh enno ma bya3erfo min wayn hiye.
2allon YASOU3: "w-ana ma-ra7 2elkon bi-ayya soultan ba3mil hal-a3mel."
W-sar y2oul lal-sha3b hal-matal: "zara3 rejjel karm, w-sallamo la-kerramin w-sefar medde tawile.
W-lamma eja yawm el-2atf, ba3at kheddemo la-3andon ta-yekhdo el-ghallé, fa-darabouh w-rajja3ouh 2idey fadyin.
Ba3at khadim tene, w-kamen hayda darabouh, sabboulo w-reje3 2idey fadyin.
Ba3at khadim telit, w-kamen rajja3ouh w-kabbouh barrat el-karm.
2al sa7ib el-karm: shou mna3mil? Ra7 eb3atlon 2ebne el-7abib barke bikhafo minno eza shefouh.
Bass lamma shefouh, 2alo bayn ba3don: hayda houe yalle ra7 yourat! Ta3o ne2etlo w-nekhod el-werte!
Kabbouh barrat el-karm w-2atalouh. Shou bya3mil fiyon sa7ib el-karm?
Ra7 yeje w-ye2tol hal-kerramin w-ysallim el-karm la-ghayron." 2aloulo yalle 3am yesma3o: "la sama7 ALLAH!"
Ettalla3 fiyon w-2al: "fa-ezan, shou ela ma3na hal-ãye: el-7ajar yalle rafadouh el-me3marjiyye sar ras el-zewye?
Yalle byou2a3 3al-7ajar byetkassar, W-yalle byou2a3 el-7ajar 3le byeherso!"
W-ken mou3allimi el-shari3a w-rou2asa el-kahane baddon yekemshouh bi-haydik el-se3a, li2annon 3erfo enno 2al hal-matal 3annon, bass khafo min el-sha3b.
Ra2abo el-ferrisiyyin w-mou3allimi el-shari3a YASOU3 w-ba3ato jwasis 3amlin 7alon abrar 7atta yel2atouh 3ala shi kelme. W-ysalmouh lal-7akem wel-ma7kame.
Sa2alouh: "ya mou3allim, ne7na mna3rif ennak sade2 bi-kalemak w-bi-ta3limak, ma bitseyer 7ada, w-bit3allim tari2 ALLAH bel-7a2.
Shou ra2yak? Bi7e'2elna nedfa3 el-jezye la-2aysar aw la2?"
3eref YASOU3 khabsaneton, fa-2allon: "Leysh 3am bitjarrboune?
Farjoune 3emlit el-jezye! La-meen hal-soura w-hal-esm?" 2aloulo: "la-2aysar."
2allon YASOU3: "dfa3o la-2aysar yalle houe la-2aysar, w-la-ALLAH yalle houe la-ALLAH!"
W-ma edro ennon yel2atouh 3ala shi kelme eddem el-sha3b, w-t3ajjabo min jawebo w-sakato.
Ejo kamm wa7ad min el-saddou2iyyin la-3and YASOU3, w-henne yalle ma bi2ãmno bel-2iyeme, w-sa2alouh:
"Ya mou3allim, 2al Moussa: eza met rejjel 3endo mara bass ma 3endo wled, khayyo byetzawwajlo marto 7atta yjeeb minna wled 3a esm khayyo.
Ken fi sab3 ekhwe, tzawwaj el-awwal w-met bidoun ma yjeeb wled.
Wel-tene.
Wel-telit lal-sebi3 3emlo nafs el-shi, meto kellon w-ma jebo wled.
Ba3den metit el-mara.
La-ayya wa7ad minnon bitkoun hal-zawje bel-2iyeme, li2anno el-sab3a tzawwajouwa?"
Jewabon YASOU3: "wled hal-dene byetzawwajo.
Bass yalle byest7e'2o ykoun elon nassib bel-7ayet el-abadiyye wel-2iyeme min bayn el-mawta, ma byetzawwajo.
Bikouno metl maleyke, ma bimouto, w-henne wled ALLAH, li2annon wled el-2iyeme.
W-Moussa nafso 2al hal-kalem 3al-3ellay2a enno el-mawta bi2oumo, lamma samma el-RAB Ileh Ibrahim w-Ileh Is7ak w-Ileh Ya3koub.
W-ma ken ALLAH Ileh el-mawta, houe Ileh el-3ayshin, w-kellon 3ayshin 3endo."
2al kamm wa7ad min mou3allimi el-shari3a: "sa7i7, ya mou3allim!"
W-min ba3da ma 7ada starja yes2alo 3an shi.
W-2allon YASOU3: "keef bi2oulo enno el-MASI7 2eben Daoud,
w-Daoud nafso bi2oul bi-kteb el-Mazamir: "2al el-RAB la-Rabbe: 23od 3an yameene
7atta khalle a3de2ak ta7t ejrek."
Eza Daoud bisamme el-MASI7 RAB, fa-keef bikoun el-MASI7 2ebno?"
W-2al YASOU3 la-tlemizo eddem kell el-sha3b yalle 3am yesma3o:
"ntebho min mou3allimi el-shari3a, bi7ebbo el-mashe bel-tyeb el-tawile wel-salemet bel-se7at w-enno ye2e3do eddem bel-majemi3 w-bi7ebbo karase el-sharaf bel-waleyem.
Byeklo bi-byout el-araml, w-bya3mlo 7alon 3am bisallo ktir. Hal-ashkas ra7 yendeno el-deynoune el-2a2sa."
Ettalla3 YASOU3 w-shef el-aghniya 3am bi7otto tabarrou3aton bi-sandou2 el-haykal.
W-shef kamen mara armale fa2ira 3am bit7ott felsen,
2al: "b2elkon el-7a2i2a: hal-armale el-fa2ira 7attit bel-sandou2 aktar min ma 7atto el-be2yin.
Henne 7atto min yalle byefdal 3annon. Bass hiye, 7attit kell shi ma3a."
W-ken fi nes 3am ye7ko bayn ba3don keef el-haykal mzayyan bel-7jara el-ra2i3a w-ti7af el-ndourat, fa-2al YASOU3:
"Ra7 teje iyem mish ra7 yentarak 7ajar 3ala 7ajar min yalle 3am tshoufouh, kello ra7 yet'haddam"
Sa2alouh: "khabberna aymata ra7 ysir hal-shi, ya mou3allim? W-shou hiye el-3aleme enno ra7 ysir hal-shi 3an 2arib?"
Jewabon: "ou3a 7ada yekhda3kon. Ra7 yejo ktar min el-nes ta7t esme, w-ra7 y2oulo: ana houe! W-sar el-wa2et! Ma tel7a2ouwon.
W-eza sme3to bi-akhbar el-7roub wel-thawrat ma tkhafo, li2anno hal-shi la-bodd enno ysir bel-awwal bass ma bitkoun el-niheye."
W-2al YASOU3: ra7 t2oum oumme 3ala oumme, w-mamlake 3ala mamlake,
w-ra7 ysir fi maje3a w-zalezil bi-matare7 ktire w-bisir fi a7deth bitkhawwif, w-btezhar 3alemet 3azeeme bel-sama.
W-abl kell shi, ra7 yekemshoukon el-nes w-yedtehdoukon w-ysalmoukon lal-majeme3 wel-7abs w-byekhdoukon la-3and el-moulouk wel-7ekkem kermel esme.
W-bitkoun hayde fersa elkon, la-tesh'hado fiya lal-injil.
W-ma tehtammo keef ra7 etdef3o 3an 7alkon,
li2anno ra7 a3tikon kalem w-7ekme ykhallo a3de2kon 3ejzin enno yreddo 3leyon aw yna2douwon.
W-ra7 ysallmoukon bayyetkon w-ekhwetkon w-2raybinkon w-asdika2kon la-3and el-7ekkem w-ra7 ye2etlo kamm wa7ad minkon,
w-yebghedkon kell el-nes kermel esme.
Bass sha3ra we7de min raskon ma ra7 tou2a3.
W-bi-thabetkon bitkhallso 7alkon.
"Eza shefto Ourashalim m7asara bel-jyoush, 3rafo enno kharaba 2arib.
W-yalle bikoun bel-Yahoudiye khallih yehrob 3al-jbel, w-yalle bikoun bel-madine khallih yetla3 minna, w-yalle bel-72oul ma yfout 3al-madine,
li2anno hayde iyem na2me byet7a'2a2 fiya kell shi n2al bel-ketob el-m2addase.
W-ya weylkon hal-7abela w-yalle 3am biradd3o bi-haydik el-iyem! Ra7 tenzal msibe 3ala hal-balad w-ghadab ALLAH 3ala hal-sha3b,
w-ra7 yese2to bi-7add el-seyf, ra7 yettekhado asra bi-kell el-oumam, w-ra7 yed3aso el-wathaniye 3a-Ourashalim ta ken eja wa2ton.
W-ra7 tezhar 3alemet bel-shams wel-2amar wel-njoum, w-ra7 yensabo el-oumam bel-ard bi-2ala2 kbir w-ro3b min hadir el-ba7r w-hayajen el-mawj.
W-ra7 yghott 3a-2alb ktar min el-nes min el-khawf w-min tawa2ou3aton 3an yalle ra7 ysir bel-3alam, li2anno 2ouwwet el-sama ra7 tetza3za3.
W-bi-haydak el-wa2et ra7 yshoufo el-nes 2eben el-2ensen jeye 3al-ghaym bel-majd wel-edra.
W-lamma tsir hal-eshya, w2afo w-3allo raskon li2anno khalãskon sar 2arib.
W-2al YASOU3 hal-matal: "ettalla3o bi-shajret el-teen w-be2e el-ashjar.
Eza sar fiya wara2, bit2oulo el-sayf 2arib.
W-nafs el-shi eza shefto hal-eshya saret, 3rafo enno malakout ALLAH 2arib.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a: ma-ra7 yekhlas hal-jeel 7atta ykoun sar hayda kello.
El-sama wel-ard bitzoul w-kaleme ma bizoul.
"Ntebho ma tensheghil 2loubkon bel-khamr wel-sekr w-hmoum el-dene, w-yfeje2kon haydak el-yawm,
li2anno ra7 yetbo2 metl el-fakh 3ala kell sekken el-ard.
S'haro w-sallo bi-kell wa2et, 7atta te2daro tetkhatto kell shi ra7 ysir, w-tou2afo eddem 2eben el-2ensen."
W-ken YASOU3 bel-nhar wel-leyl 3am bi3allim bel-haykal, w-lamma ysir 3ashiye yetla3 ta-ynem bi-jabal el-Zeytoun.
W-ken el-sha3b kello ybakkir la-3ando 3al-haykal la-yesma3 kalemo.
Ken 3id el-Fateer ye3ne 3id el-fos7 2arrab.
Keno rou2asa el-kahane w-mou3allimi el-shari3a 3am bifattsho 3an tari2a ta-ye2etlo fiya YASOU3, li2annon keno khayfin min el-sha3b.
W-fet el-shaytan bi-Yahouza el-moula2ab bel-Eskharyoute, w-houe min el-tlemiz el-tna3sh,
ra7 w-fãwad rou2asa el-kahane w-2ouwwet 7aras el-haykal keef bisallimon yeh.
Fer7o w-ettafa2o enno ya3touh masare.
2ebl w-sar yetra2ab el-fersa la-ysallimon yeh bi-matra7 b3id 3an el-sha3b.
Eja yawm el-Fateer, yalle btendaba7 fih el-khwerif la-3asha el-fos7.
Ba3at YASOU3 Boutros w-You7anna w-2allon: "rou7o 7addroulna 3asha el-fos7 ta-neklo."
2aloulo: "wayn baddak n7adderlak yeh?"
Jewabon: "lamma tfouto 3al-madine ra7 tshoufo rejjel 7amel jarret may, l7a2ouh 3al-beyt yalle bifout 3le,
w-2oulo la-RAB el-beyt: "bi2ellak el-mou3allim: wayn gherefte yalle ra7 ekol fiya 3asha el-fos7 ma3 tlemize?
Ra7 yfarjikon bi-a3la el-beyt gherfe wes3a mafroushe, 7adro el-3asha honik."
Ra7o w-le2o metl ma-2allon, w-ballasho y7adro 3asha el-fos7.
W-lamma eja el-wa2et, 2a3ad YASOU3 ma3 el-rousl 3al-2akl.
2allon: "addeysh shtahet enno ekol 3asha el-fos7 ma3kon abl ma et2allam.
B7ebb 2elkon: ma ra7 eklo ba3d liom 7atta yet7a'2a2 bi-malakout ALLAH."
W-akhad YASOU3 kes w-shakar w-2al: "khedo hal-kes w-t2asamouwa baynetkon.
B7ebb 2elkon: ma ra7 eshrab ba3d liom min 3asir el-karme 7atta yeje malakout ALLAH."
W-akhad khebz w-shakar Allah w-sha2af el-khebz w-newalon w-2al: "hayda jesme ana, 3am yet2addam kermelkon. 3melo hek w-zkouroune."
W-akhad el-kes min ba3d el-3asha, w-2al: "hayda el-kes houe el-3ahd el-jdid bi-damme ana, yalle ra7 yet2addam kermelkon.
Bass yalle ra7 ysallimne, 2ido 3al-meyde ma3e.
2eben el-2ensen ra7 ymout metl ma nkatab, bass ya weylo yalle bisallmo!"
W-saro el-tlemiz yes2alo 7alon meen min bayneton ra7 ya3mil hal-shi.
W-saro yetjedalo meen bikoun el-akbar fiyon,
2allon YASOU3: "el-moulouk 7ekmeen el-oumam w-as7ab el-soulta bisammo 7alon mou7sinin.
Bass ento, ma tkhallo hal-shi ykoun baynetkon, yalle baddo ykoun el-akbar fikon ykoun el-azghar, wel-rayyes khadim.
Meen el-akbar: yalle 2e3id 3al-2akl aw yalle 3am yekhdom? Mish yalle 2e3id 3al-2akl? W-ana baynetkon metl yalle 3am yekhdom.
W-ento yalle b2ito ma3e bi-wa2et me7ente,
ana ba3tikon el-malakout metl ma 3atane yeh bayye,
bteklo w-bteshrabo 3ala meyedte bi-malakoute, w-bte2e3do 3ala el-3roush ta-etdeeno 2abeyel Isra2il el-tna3sh."
2al el-RAB YASOU3: "Sem3an, Sem3an! Hayda el-shaytan 3am yetlob ygharbelkon metl ma bigharbel el-mzeri3 el-2am7.
Bass ana salleytellak ta-ma tef2od imenak. W-enta lamma btestarje3 7alak, thabbet ekhwetak."
Jewabo Sem3an: "ya RAB, ana mist3ed enno rou7 ma3ak 3al-7abs wel-mawt."
2allo YASOU3: "b7ebb 2ellak ya Boutros: abl ma ysi7 el-deek liom, ra7 tenkerne tlet marrat."
Min ba3da 2al la-tlemizo: "lamma ba3atetkon bidoun masare wala kees wala sandal, 3ezto shi?" 2alo: "la2."
2allon: "bass halla2, yalle ma3o masare yekhedon, aw kees, ye7emlo. W-yalle ma 3endo seyf, ybi3 tawbo w-yeshtere seyf.
B7ebb 2elkon: lezim tet7a'2a2 fiyye hal-ãye: w-3addouh ma3 el-mejrmeen. W-yalle nkatab 3anne lezim ysir."
2alo: "ya RAB! Ma3na hon seyfen." Jewabon: "bikaffe!"
Min ba3da toli3 metl 3adto 3ala jabal el-zeytoun w-le7'2ouh tlemizo.
W-lamma wossil la-honik 2allon: "sallo ta-ma tou2a3o bel-tajribe."
W-bay3ad 3annon kamm fashkha w-raka3 w-salla,
2al: "ya bayye, eza moumkin tba3ed 3anne hal-kes! Bass mish metl ma ana badde, metl ma enta baddak."
W-zaharlo malèk min el-sama w-sar y2awwih.
W-ballash yet2allam, w-sar ysalle w-ysalle, w-ken 3ara2o metl no2at damm 3am tou2a3 3al-ard.
W-2am 3an el-sala w-reje3 la-3and tlemizo, w-le2ehon neymin min el-za3al.
2allon: "shou bekon neymin? 2oumo sallo ma3e ta-ma tou2a3o bel-tajribe."
Houe w-3am ye7ke, wosslit 3isabe meshe eddema Yahouza, wa7ad min el-tlemiz el-tna3sh, w-2arrab min YASOU3 w-beso.
2allo YASOU3: "bi-bawse, ya Yahouza, 3am bitsallim 2eben el-2ensen?"
W-lamma shefo el-tlemiz shou 3am bisir 2alo: "baddak nedrob bel-seyf, ya RAB?"
W-darab wa7ad minnon khadim ra2is el-kahane w-2ata3lo dayneto el-yameen.
Jewab YASOU3: "bikaffé!" W-lamas daynet el-rejjel w-shafeha.
W-2al YASOU3 la-yalle jeyin 3le min rou2asa el-kahane w-2ouwwed 7aras el-haykal wel-shyoukh: "tekhmin hejmeen 3ala shi harame bel-syouf wel-3ese?
Kent kell yawm baynetkon bel-haykal, w-ma maddayto 2idkon 3leyye. Bass halla2 hayde se3etkon, w-hayda soultan el-3atme."
Kamashouh w-akhadouh w-fawwatouh 3ala dar ra2is el-kahane. W-ken Boutros le7'2o min b3id.
Walla3o el-7aras nar bi-se7it el-dar w-2a3ado 7awla, w-2a3ad Boutros bayneton.
Shefeto khãdme 7add el-nar, ettalla3et fih mni7 w-2alet: "hayda el-rejjel ken ma3 YASOU3!"
Nakar w-2al: "ana ma ba3erfo, ya mara!"
W-ba3d shwey shefo rejjel w-2al: "enta minnon!" Jewabo Boutros: "la2, ya 2ensen!"
W-mara2 shi se3a, w-2allon wa7ad w-houe m2akkad: "hayda 3anjad ken ma3on, li2anno min el-Jaleel!"
Jewabo Boutros: "ya 2ensen, ma 3am befham shou 3am bit2oul!" w-houe w-3am ye7ke sa7 el-deek.
Ltafat el-RAB w-ettalla3 bi-Boutros, tzakkar Boutros shou 2allo el-RAB: "abl ma ysi7 el-deek liom, btenkerne tlet marrat."
Toli3 w-beke dmou3 morra.
W-saro yalle 3am ye7erso YASOU3 yetmaskharo 3le w-yedorbouh
w-yghatto wejjo w-yes2alouh: "meen darabak? 7zar!"
W-fo2 hayda kello saro ysebbouh.
W-lamma toli3 el-sob7 jtama3o majles shyoukh el-sha3b henne w-rou2asa el-kahane w-mou3allimi el-shari3a, w-ba3ato wara YASOU3 3al-majles
w-2aloulo: "2elna eza kent enta el-MASI7" Jewabon: "eza 2eltelkon ma ra7 tsad2oune,
w-eza sa2altkon ma ra7 tjewbo.
Bass 2eben el-2ensen ra7 ye2'3od min ba3d liom 3an yameen ALLAH el-2adeer."
2alo kellon: "ye3ne enta 2eben ALLAH!" Jewabon "ento 2elto, ana houe."
2alo: "me7tejin ba3d la-shouhoud? Sme3neha min temmo."
W-2amo jame3et el-majles kellon w-jebouh la-3and Bilatos,
w-saro yettehmouh w-y2oulo: "l2ina hal-rejjel 3am yezra3 el-fetne bayn sha3bna, w-3am yemna3o yedfa3 el-daribe la-2aysar, w-3am bi2oul enno houe el-MASI7 el-malik."
Sa2alo Bilatos: "enta malik el-Yahoud?" Jewabo: "enta 2elt."
2al Bilatos la-rou2asa el-kahane wel-nes: "ma 3am le2e jerm 3ala hal-rejjel!"
Bass henne dallo y2oulo: "3am yezra3 el-fetne bayn el-sha3b bi-ta3limo bel-Yahoudiye kella, min el-Jaleel la-hon."
Lamma sem3 Bilatos hal-kalem sa2alon: "hal-rejjel min el-Jaleel?"
W-lamma 3eref enno min wileyet Hirodos ba3ato la-3ando, w-houe bi-haydak el-wa2et ken bi-Ourashalim.
W-lamma shef Hirodos YASOU3 fer7 ktir, li2anno ken 7abeb min zamen yshoufo la-ketrit ma sem3 3anno, w-ken byetmanna enno yshouf shi 3ajibe 3am bitsir 3ala 2ido.
Sa2alo aktar min sou2al, bass YASOU3 ma jewabo 3an shi.
W-saro rou2asa el-kahane w-mou3allimi el-shari3a yettehmouh w-yzeedo el-teham.
Hirodos w-3askaro 7ta2arouh. W-tmaskharo 3le, w-labbasouh tawb byelma3 w-raddouh la-3and Bilatos.
W-bi-haydak el-yawm tsala7o Hirodos w-Bilatos, li2anno keno abl a3de2.
Ba3at Bilatos wara rou2asa el-kahane wel-zou3ama wel-sha3b
w-2allon: "jebtoule hal-rejjel w-2elto enno 3am yekhda3 el-sha3b. Fa7asto eddemkon, ma l2it enno rtakab shi min yalle 3am tettehmouh fih,
wala 7atta Hirodos le2a shi, li2anno raddo la-3ande. Ma fi shi 3emlo hal-rejjel byest7e2 el-mawt.
Ra7 ejeldo w-efelto."
W-ken Bilatos bi-kell 3id ye3fe 3an ma7bous wa7ad.
Sarakho kellon sawa: "2tol hal-rejjel w-3fih 3an Barabas!"
W-ken Barabas bel-7abs li2anno shtarak bi-fetne bel-madine, w-rtakab jarimet 2atl.
W-7ekehon Bilatos marra tenye li2anno ken baddo yeflot YASOU3,
saro ysarrkho: "slebo! slebo!"
W-2allon lal-marra el-telte: "shou 3eml? Ma 3am le2e 3le shi bikhallih yest7e2 el-mawt. Ra7 ejeldo w-efelto!."
Dallo ysarrkho bel-3ale w-y2ouloulo slebo, w-kermelon yzeedo sarikh,
se3eta 7akam Bilatos enno yet7a'2a2 talabon,
w-falat el-rejjel yalle talabouh, w-ken bel-7abs kermel jarimet 2atl, w-3eml fetne, w-sallam YASOU3 lal-sha3b.
Henne w-ekhdino, tla'2at el-3askar bi-Sem3an, w-houe Kayrine ken reji3 min el-7a2l, 7ammalouh el-salib w-mashshouh wara YASOU3.
W-le7'2ouh nes ktir min el-sha3b, w-neswen keno 3am bide'2o 3ala sdouron w-yenedbouh.
Ltafat YASOU3 sawbon w-2al: "ma tebko 3leyye ya banet Ourashalim, bkou 3ala 7alkon w-3ala wledkon.
Ra7 teje iyem byen2al fiya: niyyel yalle ma 7eblo wala wallado wala radda3o.
W-byen2al lal-jbel w2a3e 3leyna, w-lal-tlel ghattina.
W-eza keno 3emlo hek bel-ghosn el-akhdar, fa-shou ra7 ysir bel-ghosn el-yebis?"
W-jarro ma3o tnen min el-mejrmeen.
W-lamma wosslo lal-matra7 yalle esmo el-Joumjoume, salabouh honik ma3 el-mejrmeen, wa7ad 3an yameeno wel-tene 3an shmelo.
2al YASOU3: "ghferlon ya bayye, li2annon ma 3am ya3erfo shou 3am ya3emlo." W-t2asamo tyebo bel-2or3a.
W-we2f el-sha3b honik 3am yettalla3, wel-rou2asa 3am yetmaskharo 3le w-y2oulo: "khallas ghayro, ykhallis 7alo, eza ken el-MASI7 el-mekhtar!"
W-tmaskharo 3le el-3askar kamen, saro y2arbo minno w-ya3touh khall
w-y2oulo: "khallis 7alak, eza kent malik el-Yahoud!"
W-ken fo2 raso law7a maktoub 3leya: "hayda malik el-Yahoud!"
W-sar wa7ad min el-mejrmen el-m3alla2in 3al-salib yjaddef 3le w-y2ello: "mish enta el-MASI7? Khallis 7alak w-khallisna!"
Bass el-tene sakkato w-2al: "ma bitkhaf ALLAH w-enta 3am tet7ammal nafs el-2asãs?
Ne7na 2asãsna 3adel, hayda jaza a3melna, bas houe, ma 3eml shi 3atel."
W-2al: "zkerne ya YASOU3, bass teje bi-malakoutak."
Jewabo YASOU3: "B2ellak el-7a2i2a: ra7 tkoun liom ma3e bel-ferdaws."
Wel-dohr 3attamit el-dene kella lal-se3a tlete.
W-nkasafit el-shams, w-nkhaza2 7ijeb el-haykal bel-noss.
W-sarakh YASOU3 sarkha 2awiye: "ya bayye, bayn 2idek bsallim rou7e." 2al hal-shi w-sallam rou7o.
W-lamma shef ra2is el-7aras yalle sar, majjad ALLAH w-2al: "mbala, hal-rejjel ken 7a2i2atan sale7."
Wel-nes yalle 7edro hal-mash'had, w-shefo yalle sar, rej3o henne w-3am bide'2o 3ala sdouron.
W-keno kell asdika2 YASOU3, wel-neswen yalle le7'2ino min el-Jaleel, 3am bishoufo hal-eshya min b3id.
Eja wa7ad min majles el-Yahoud esmo Youssef, w-houe rejjel ta2e sale7,
Ken dodd el-majles w-keef tsarrafo, w-ken min el-Rama w-hiye madine Yahoudiye, w-ken natir malakout ALLAH,
eja la-3and Bilatos w-talab jesm YASOU3.
W-min ba3da nazzalo 3an el-salib w-laffo bi-kafan min ketten, w-7atto bi-2abr ma7four bel-sakhr, ma ndafan fih 7ada min abl.
W-ken hal-nhar houe yawm el-te7dir lal-sabt, w-ken ra7 yeje yawm el-sabt.
W-keno el-neswen yalle ejo ma3 YASOU3 min el-Jaleel le7'2in Youssef, shefo el-2abr w-keef 7atto fih jesm YASOU3.
Min ba3da rej3o 7addaro 3otr w-7nout, w-rte7o nhar el-sabt metl ma bit2oul el-shari3a.
Ejo el-neswen el-a7ad abl el-daw 7amleen el-3otr yalle 7addarouh.
Le2o el-7ajar mda7raj 3an el-2abr.
Lamma feto, ma shefo jesm el-RAB YASOU3.
Bi-hal-wa2et, w-keno mish 3erfin shou baddon ya3emlo, zaharoulon rejjelen lebsin tyeb btelma3,
fa-khafo ktir w-7atto wejjon bel-ard, 2aloulon el-rejjelen: "leysh 3am tfattsho 3an el-7ayy bayn el-mawta?
Manno hon, 2am. Tzakkaro shou 2alkon lamma ken bel-Jaleel,
"lezim enno yetsallam 2eben el-2ensen 3a-2iden el-khatyeen w-yensalab, w-telit yawm ra7 y2oum."
Se3eta tzakkaro el-neswen kalemo.
W-rej3o min el-2abr w-khabbaro el-tlemiz el-7da3sh wel-be2yin bi-yalle sar,
w-henne Maryam el-Majdaliyye w-7anne w-Maryam emm Ya3koub, w-kamen be2e el-neswen yalle refa2ouh.
W-fakkaro el-rousl ennon 3am yetwahhamo, w-ma sadda2ouwon.
Bass Boutros 2am w-rakad 3al-2abr, w-lamma n7ana shef el-akfen wa7da. Reje3 mazhoul min yalle sar.
W-bel-yawm zeto, keno tnen min el-tlemiz bi-tari2on 3ala day3a esma 3emwas, b3ide 3an Ourashalim shi sab3 amyel (ye3ne shi se3teyn mashe).
W-keno 3am yetshera3o bi-hal-eshya kella.
Henne w-3am yetshera3o w-yetjedalo, 2arrab minnon YASOU3 bi-zeto w-meshe ma3on,
bass 3younon ma 3erfeto.
2allon: "bi-shou 3am tetshera3o ento w-meshyin?" We2fo ze3lenin.
Jewabo wa7ad minnon, w-esmo Kalyopas: "enta wa7dak gharib 3an Ourashalim ma bta3rif shou sar bi-hal-iyem!"
2al YASOU3: "shou sar?" 2aloulo: "shou sar bi-YASOU3 el-Nassire, w-ken nabe 2adeer bel-2awl w-bel-fe3l 3end ALLAH wel-sha3b,
keef sallamouh rou2asa kahanetna w-zou3ame2na lal-mawt, w-keef salabouh.
W-kenna mnet2ammal enno ykoun houe yalle bikhallis Isra2il. W-ma3 hayda w-kello, liom houe el-yawm el-telit la-hal-a7deth yalle saret.
Bass fi neswen min jame3etna 7ayyarouna, li2annon zaro el-2abr abl el-daw,
w-ma le2o jesmo, rej3o w-2alo ennon shefo maleyke zaharoulon w-khabbarouwon enno 3ayish.
Ra7o kamm wa7ad min yalle ma3na 3al-2abr, w-le2o metl ma 2alo el-neswen. Bass houe, ma shefouh."
2allon YASOU3: "ya alileen el-fehm w-bati2in el-imen bi-kell shi 2alouh el-anbiya!
Mish ken lezim el-MASI7 yet2allam, 7atta yetmajjad?"
W-shara7lon shou nkatab 3anno bi-kell el-ketob el-m2addase, min Moussa 7atta be2e el-anbiya.
W-lamma 2arrabo min el-day3a el-ray7in 3leya, 3eml 7alo raye7 3ala matra7 b3id.
Tmassako fih w-2aloulo: "khallik ma3na, li2anno sar 3ashiye wel-nhar kholis!" Fet w-be2e ma3on.
W-lamma 2a3ado 3al-2akl, akhad YASOU3 khebz w-berak w-sha2afo w-newalon.
Se3eta nfata7et 3younon w-3erfouh, bass houe khtafa.
2al el-awwal lal-tene: "ma 7asseyt 2albna 3am ye7tere2 bi-sadrna, wa2et yalle 7ekena 3al-tari2 w-shara7elna el-ketob el-m2addase?"
W-2amo deghre w-rej3o 3ala Ourashalim, w-le2o el-rousl el-7da3sh w-yalle ma3on mejtem3in,
w-keno 3am bi2oulo: "2am el-RAB 7a2i2atan w-zahar la-Sem3an!"
W-khabbarouwon bi-yalle sar 3al-tari2, w-keef 3erfo el-RAB wa2et yalle sha2af el-khebz.
Bi-hal-wa2et, w-keno ba3don el-telmizen 3am ye7ko, zahar YASOU3 bi-zeto bayneton w-2allon: "el-salem ma3kon!"
Khafo w-nra3abo, w-fakkaro 7alon 3am bishoufo shaba7.
2allon: "shou bekon khayfin, w-leysh fet el-shakk 3a-2loubkon?
Ettalla3o 3ala 2ideyye w-ejreyye, ana houe. Lmesoune w-t2akkado. El-shaba7 ma bikoun 3endo la7m w-3adm metl yalle sheyfino 3ende."
2al hal-shi w-farjehon 2idey w-ejrey.
Bass dallo mish msad2in min ketrit el-fara7 wel-dahshe. 2allon: "3endkon 2akl hon?"
Newalouh samak meshwe,
akhad w-akal eddem 3younon.
Min ba3da 2allon: "lamma kent ba3dne ma3kon 2eltelkon: la-bodd enno ysir ma3e kell yalle nkatab bi-shari3et Moussa w-ketob el-anbiya wel-mazamir."
Min ba3da fata7lon 3a2lon ta-yefhamo el-ketob el-m2addase,
w-2allon: "maktoub enno el-MASI7 ra7 yet2allam w-y2oum min el-mawt bel-yawm el-telit,
w-bten3alan bi-esmo el-tawbe w-ghofran el-khataya la-kell el-shou3oub, w-bitkoun el-bideye min Ourashalim.
W-ento shouhoud 3ala hal-shi.
W-ra7 eb3atlkon yalle bayye wa3ad fih. Khallikon bi-madinet Ourashalim 7atta tenzal 3leykon el-2ouwwe min fo2."
W-min ba3da talla3on 3ala Beyt-3anya, w-3alla 2idey w-berakon.
W-houe w-3am biberekon, nfasal 3annon w-toli3 3al-sama,
fa-sajadoulo, w-rej3o 3ala Ourashalim fer7anin.
W-keno kell el-wa2et bel-haykal 3am biberko ALLAH.
Bel-bideye ken el-kelme, wel-kelme ken 3end ALLAH, wel-kelme houe ALLAH.
Houe bel-bideye ken 3end ALLAH.
Bi-wasteto sar kell shi, bidouno ma ken sar shi min yalle sar.
Minno ejet el-7ayet, w-7ayeto nour lal-nes.
Wel-nour dawwa bel-3atme, wel-3atme ma edrit 3le.
Zahar rasoul min ALLAH esmo You7anna.
Eja yesh'had lal-nour 7atta y2ãmno el-nes 3ala 2ido.
Ma ken houe el-nour, bass eja ta-yesh'had lal-nour.
El-kelme houe el-nour el-7a2i2e, eja 3al-3alam la-ynawwir kell 2ensen.
W-ken bel-3alam, w-bi-wasteto sar el-3alam, bass el-3alam ma 3erfo.
Eja 3ala beyto, w-ma 2eblouh ahl beyto.
Bass yalle 2eblouh, ye3ne el-mou2minin bi-esmo, 3atahon soultan enno ysiro wled ALLAH,
w-henne yalle khel2o mish min la7m w-damm wala min shahwet el-jesm wala min iradet 2ensen, khel2o min ALLAH.
Wel-kelme sar bashar w-sakan baynetna, w-shefna majdo majd melyen ne3me w-7a2, akhado el-2eben el-wa7eed min el-Ãb.
Shehedlo You7anna w-neda: "hayda houe yalle 2elt 3anno: byeje min ba3de w-houe a3zam minne, li2anno ken abl ma enwejid."
Min fayd ne3amo akhadna kellna ne3me fo2 ne3me,
li2anno ALLAH bi-Moussa 3atana el-shari3a, bass bi-YASOU3 el-MASI7 3atana el-ne3me wel-7a2.
Ma 7ada shef ALLAH. El-Ileh el-wa7eed yalle bi-7odn el-Ãb houe yalle khabbar 3anno.
Hayde shahedet You7anna, lamma ba3atoulo el-Yahoud min Ourashalim kahane w-lawiyyin ta-yes2alouh: "meen enta?"
3taraf w-ma nakar, 2al: "ana mish el-MASI7."
2alo: "meen enta, fa-ezan? Enta Eliyya?" 2al: "ana mish Eliyya." 2alo: "enta el-nabe?" Jewab "la2."
2aloulo: "meen enta, 7atta nekhod el-jaweb la-yalle ba3atouna. Shou bit2oul 3an 7alak?"
2al: "ana, metl ma 2al el-nabe Ashe3ya: "sawt 3am yesrokh bel-barriye: jallso tari2 el-RAB."
W-ken bayneton ferrisiyyin,
2alo la-You7anna: "keef 3am bit3ammed w-enta mish el-MASI7 wala Eliyya wala el-nabe?"
Jewabon: "Ana b3ammed bel-may, bass fi baynetkon wa7ad ma bta3erfouh.
Houe yalle byeje min ba3de, bikoun a3zam minne, w-ana ma best7e2 fekk shrit sandalo."
Sar kell hal-shi bi-Beyt-3anya, wara Nahr el-Ordon, matra7 ma ken You7anna 3am bi3ammed.
W-tene nhar shef You7anna YASOU3 jeye sawbo, 2al: "hayda houe 7amal ALLAH yalle bisheel khatiyyet el-3alam.
Hayda houe yalle 2elt 3anno: byeje min ba3de rejjel a3zam minne, li2anno ken able.
W-ma kent ba3erfo, jeet 3ammed bel-may 7atta yezhar la-Isra2il."
W-shehed You7anna, 2al: "sheft el-rou7 nezil min el-sama bi-shakl 7ameme w-hede 3le.
W-ma kent ba3erfo, bass yalle ba3atne la-3ammed bel-may 2alle: "yalle bitshouf el-rou7 byenzal w-byehda 3le houe yalle ra7 y3ammed bel-ROU7 el-2ODOS.
W-ana sheft w-sh'hedet enno houe 2eben ALLAH."
W-bel-yawm el-tene ken You7anna we2if honik, w-ma3o tnen min tlemizo.
Ettalla3 3a-YASOU3 yalle ken meri2 w-2al: "hayda houe 7amal ALLAH."
Sem3ouh el-telmizen, w-le7'2o YASOU3.
Ltafat YASOU3 w-shefon le7'2ino, 2allon: "shou badkon?" 2alo: "Rabbi (ye3ne ya mou3allim) wayn sèkin?"
2al: "ta3o shoufo." Ra7o w-shefo wayn sèkin, w-be2yo ma3o bi-haydak el-yawm, w-kenit el-se3a shi arb3a ba3d el-dohr.
W-ken Endrawos khayy Sem3an Boutros wa7ad min el-telmizen yalle sem3o kalem You7anna w-le7'2o YASOU3.
W-lta2a Endrawos bi-khayyo Sem3an, w-2allo: "l2ina el-Messiya", ye3ne el-MASI7.
W-jebo la-3and YASOU3, ettalla3 fih YASOU3 w-2al: "enta Sem3an 2eben You7anna, w-ra7 sammik "Kifa" (ye3ne sakhr)."
W-tene nhar ken YASOU3 baddo yrou7 3al-Jaleel. Lta2a bi-Filippos, w-2allo: "l7a2ne."
W-ken Filippos min Beyt-Sayda, madinet Endrawos w-Boutros.
W-lta2a Filippos bi-Nathana2il, 2allo: "l2ina yalle zakaro Moussa bel-shari3a, wel-anbiya bel-ketob, w-houe YASOU3 2eben Youssef min el-Nassira."
2allo Nathana2il: "leysh el-Nassira byetla3 minna shi mni7?" Jewabo Filippos: "ta3a w-shouf."
W-shef YASOU3 Nathana2il jeye sawbo, 2al: "hayda Isra2ile 7a2i2e ma fiyo ghesh!"
2allo Nathana2il: "keef 3refetne?" Jewabo YASOU3: "sheftak ta7t el-teene abl ma ynedik Filippos."
2al Nathana2il: "enta ya mou3allim 2eben ALLAH. Enta malik Isra2il!"
Jewabo YASOU3: "2ãmanet li2anno 2eltellak: sheftak ta7t el-teene? Ra7 tshouf a3zam min hek."
W-2allo: "b2elkon el-7a2i2a, ra7 tshoufo el-sama maftou7a w-maleyket ALLAH tal3in w-nezleen fo2 2eben el-2ensen."
Bel-yawm el-telit ken fi bi-Kana el-Jaleel 3ers, w-kenit emm YASOU3 honik.
W-n3azam YASOU3 w-tlemizo 3al-3ers.
W-kholis el-nbeed, 2aletlo emmo: "ma ba2a 3endon nbeed."
Jewaba: "3mele sheghlik w-ana ba3mil sheghle, ba3d ma eja el-wa2et."
2alet emmo lal-kheddem: "3melo metl ma bi2ellkon."
W-ken honik fi sitt jran min 7ajar byesta3mlouwon el-Yahoud lal-tot'hir, bise3 kell wa7ad minnon kaylen aw tlete (ye3ne min tmeneen la-miyye w-3eshreen litre).
2al YASOU3 lal-kheddem: "mallo el-jran may." Mallouwa lal-sheffe.
2allon: "s2ou el-nes halla2 w-3touh ra2is el-walime." Fa-newalouh.
W-lamma de2 el-may yalle sar nbeed, ken ma bya3rif min wayn eja, bass el-kheddem yalle 2addamouh keno bya3erfo, neda el-3arees
w-2allo: "kell el-nes bi2addmo el-nbeed el-tayyib bel-awwal, w-bass yeskaro el-dyouf, bi2addmo yalle a2all tibe. Bass enta khalleyt el-nbeed el-tayyib la-halla2!"
Hayde awwal 3ajibe 3emela YASOU3, bi-Kana el-Jaleel. W-azhar majdo, w-2ãmano fih tlemizo.
W-nezl YASOU3 min ba3da 3ala Kfarna7oum w-ma3o emmo w-ekhweto w-tlemizo, w-sakano honik kamm yawm.
2arrab 3id el-fos7 3end el-Yahoud, w-toli3 YASOU3 3ala Ourashalim.
W-shef bel-haykal biyye3in el-ba2ar wel-ghanam wel-7amem, wel-serrafin 2e3deen 3ala tawleton,
jeb 7abl w-3emlo kerbej w-sha7aton kellon min el-haykal ma3 el-ghanam wel-ba2ar, w-zatt amwel el-serrafin w-2alab tawleton,
w-2al la-biyye3in el-7amem: "sheelo hal-shi min hon, w-ma ta3emlo min beyt bayye beyt lal-tijara.
W-tzakkaro tlemizo enno maktoub: "el-ghire 3ala beytak, ya ALLAH, ra7 tekelne."
2aloulo el-Yahoud: "farjina shi 3ajibe bitsabbet enno ma3ak 7a2 ta3mil hal-shi?"
Jewabon YASOU3: "hdemo hal-haykal, w-ana b3ammro bi-tlet tiyem."
2alo el-Yahoud: "t3ammar hal-haykal bi sitta-w-arb3een sene, keef enta baddak t3ammro bi-tlet tiyem?"
W-ken YASOU3 bye2sod haykal jesmo.
W-lamma 2am min el-mawt, tzakkaro tlemizo hal-kalem, w-2ãmano bel-kteb wel-kalem yalle 2alo YASOU3.
W-lamma ken bi-Ourashalim bi-fatrit 3id el-fos7, 2ãmano fih ktar min el-nes lamma shefo el-3ajeyeb yalle 3emela.
Bass YASOU3 ma ken y2ammenlon, li2anno ken bya3refon kellon,
w-mish bi-7aje la-meen ykhabro 3annon, li2anno ken bya3rif shou fi bi-2alb el-2ensen.
W-ken fi rejjel ferrise min rou2asa el-Yahoud esmo Nikodimos.
Eja la-3and YASOU3 bel-leyl w-2allo: "ya mou3allim, ne7na mna3rif enno ALLAH ba3atak mou3allim, w-ma 7ada bye2dar ya3mil yalle 3am ta3mlo ella eza ken ALLAH ma3o."
Jewabo YASOU3: "b2ellak el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: ma fi 7ada bye2dar yshouf malakout ALLAH ella eza welid min jdid."
2allo Nikodimos: "keef byoulad el-2ensen w-houe kbir bel-3omr? Ba3d bye2dar yfout 3a-batn emmo marra tenye w-yerja3 youlad?"
Jewabo YASOU3: "b2ellak el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: ma fi 7ada bye2dar yfout 3a-malakout ALLAH ella eza welid min el-may wel-rou7,
li2anno mawloud el-jesm bikoun jesm w-mawloud el-rou7 bikoun rou7.
Ma tet3ajjab min kaleme hayda: lezim toulado min jdid.
El-ree7 bit'heb matra7 ma badda, btesma3 sawta w-ma bta3rif min wayn jeye wala la-wayn ray7a: hek kell wa7ad byoulad min el-rou7."
2allo Nikodimos: "keef bikoun hal-shi?"
Jewabo YASOU3: "Enta mou3allim bi-Isra2il w-ma bta3rif?
B2ellak el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: ne7na 3am ne7ke bi-yalle mna3erfo, w-mnesh'had bi-yalle shefneh bass ento ma bte2balo shahedetna.
Eza kento ma bitsad2o yalle 3am khabberkon yeh 3an oumour el-dene, keef bitsad2o eza khabbaretkon 3an oumour el-sama?
Ma fi 7ada toli3 3al-sama ella 2eben el-2ensen yalle nezl min el-sama.
W-metl ma rafa3 Moussa el-7ayye bel-barriye, hek lezim yenrafa3 2eben el-2ensen.
7atta ya3te el-7ayet el-abadiyye la-kell yalle bi2ãmno fih.
Hek 7abb ALLAH el-3alam 7atta enno 2addamelna 2ebno el-wa7eed, la-ma yehlako kell yalle bi2ãmno fih, w-tkoun elon el-7ayet el-abadiyye.
W-ALLAH ba3at 2ebno lal-3alam mish la-ydeen el-3alam, ba3ato la-ykhallis el-3alam.
Yalle bi2ãmen bel-2eben ma byenden. W-yalle ma bi2ãmen fih byenden, li2anno ma bi2ãmen bi-2eben ALLAH el-wa7eed.
W-hal-deynoune hiye enno el-nour eja 3al-3alam, wel-nes faddalo el-3atme ma7al el-nour li2annon bya3emlo el-sharr.
W-yalle bya3mil el-sharr byekrah el-nour, w-ma byeje la-3ando ta-ma tenfada7 a3melo.
Bass yalle meshe 3al-7a2, bye2bal bel-nour, 7atta yshoufo el-nes enno a3melo kenit bi-7asab iradet ALLAH."
Min ba3da eja YASOU3 w-tlemizo 3ala bled el-Yahoudiye, w-2a3ado fiya w-sar y3ammed.
W-ken You7anna y3ammed kamen bi-3ayn Noun, 7add Salim, la-ketrit el-may yalle fiya. W-keno el-nes yejo w-yet3ammado,
w-hal-shi abl ma n7abas You7anna.
W-sar fi jidel bayn tlemiz You7anna w-wa7ad min el-Yahoud bennesbe lal-tahara.
Ejo la-3and You7anna w-2aloulo: "ya mou3allim, hayda houe el-rejjel yalle ken ma3ak 3al-meyle el-tenye min el-Ordon w-shahadet elo, 3am bi3ammed hon, w-kell el-nes 3am teje la-3ando."
Jewabon You7anna: "ma fi shi byettekhad ella eza el-sama 3ateto yeh.
Ento bi-zetkon btesh'hado enno 2elt: ana mish el-MASI7, ana rasoul eddemo.
Yalle el-3arous elo, houe el-3arees. W-sadee2 el-3arees, byou2af 7addo yetsamma3 3le w-byefra7 enno yesma3 sawt el-3arees. W-hal-fara7 houe fara7e ana, w-fara7e halla2 ktamal.
Houe elo enno yzeed, w-ana enne en2as.
Yalle eja min fo2, houe fo2 kell el-nes. W-yalle ken min el-ard, houe ardé w-bi-kalem ahl el-ard bye7ke. W-yalle eja min el-sama, houe fo2 kell el-nes,
byesh'had bi-yalle shefo w-sem3o w-ma 7ada bye2bal shahedto.
Yalle 2ebl shahedto shehed enno ALLAH sade2.
Yalle ba3ato ALLAH bye7ke kalem ALLAH, li2anno ALLAH bya3te el-ROU7 bidoun 7seb.
El-Ãb bi7ebb el-2eben w-7att kell shi bi-2ido.
Yalle bi2ãmen bel-2eben, elo el-7ayet el-abadiyye. W-yalle ma bi2ãmen bel-2eben, ma bishouf el-7ayet, bel-3aks byenzal 3le ghadab ALLAH."
W-3eref el-RAB YASOU3 enno el-ferrisiyyin sem3o enno talmaz w-3ammad aktar min ma talmaz You7anna w-3ammad,
ma3 enno YASOU3 nafso ma ken y3ammed, tlemizo henne yalle keno y3ammdo,
fa-tarak el-Yahoudiye w-reje3 3al-Jaleel.
W-ken lezim yemro2 bel-Samira,
wossil 3ala madine semiriye esma Soukhar, 2aribe min el-ard yalle 3ataha Ya3koub la-2ebno Youssef,
w-fiya beer Ya3koub. W-ken YASOU3 te3ben min el-safar, 2a3ad 3ala 7affit el-beer. W-ken el-wa2et 2arib lal-dohr.
Ejet mara Semiriye la-t3abbe min may el-beer, 2alla YASOU3: "3tine ta-eshrab."
W-keno tlemizo bel-madine 3am yeshtero 2akl.
Jewabet el-mara: "enta Yahoude w-ana Semiriye, keef btetlob minne enno sharrbak?" 2alet hal-shi li2anno el-Yahoud ma bye7ko ma3 el-Semiriyyin.
2alla YASOU3: "law kente bta3erfe 3atiyyet ALLAH, w-meen houe yalle 3am bi2ellik 3tine ta-eshrab, kente talabte ente minno ya3tike may el-7ayet."
2aletlo el-mara: "ma ma3ak satl, ya Rab, wel-beer ghami2a, min wayn 3endak may el-7ayet?
Bayyna Ya3koub 3atana hal-beer, w-sherb minna houe w-wledo w-atee3o, tekhmin enta a3zam min Ya3koub?"
Jewaba YASOU3: "yalle byeshrab min hal-may bye3tash marra tenye,
bass yalle byeshrab min el-may yalle ana ba3tiya, ma ra7 ye3tash abadan. El-may yalle ba3tiya bitsir nab3 byetfajjar 7ayet abadiyye."
2aletlo el-mara: "3tine min hal-may ya Rab, ta-ma e3tash w-ma eje la-hon la-eshrab."
2alla: "rou7e jeebe zawjik, w-rja3e la-hon."
Jewabet el-mara: "ma 3ende zawj." 2alla YASOU3: "mazbout, ma 3endik zawj,
li2anno ken 3endik khamse, w-yalle ma3ik halla2 manno zawjik. W-bi-hal-shi ma kazzabte."
2alet el-mara: "haye2tak nabe, ya Rab!
Bayyetna 3abado ALLAH 3ala hayda el-jabal, w-ento el-Yahoud bit2oulo enno Ourashalim hiye el-matra7 yalle lezim enno ne3bad fih ALLAH."
2alla YASOU3: "sad2ine, byeje wa2et bye3bado fih el-nes el-Ãb, la bi-hal-jabal wala bi-Ourashalim.
W-ento el-Semiriyyin bte3bado yalle ma bta3erfouh, w-ne7na el-Yahoud mne3bad yalle mna3erfo, li2anno el-khalãs byeje min el-Yahoud.
Bass ra7 teje se3a, w-ejet halla2, bye3bad fiya el-mou2minin el-sad2in el-Ãb bel-rou7 wel-7a2. Hawde henne el-mou2minin yalle baddo henne el-Ãb.
ALLAH rou7, w-lezim el-mou2minin ye3badouh bel-rou7 wel-7a2."
2aletlo el-mara: "ba3rif enno el-Messiya, (ye3ne el-MASI7) ra7 yeje. W-lamma yeje bikhabberna bi-kell shi."
2alla YASOU3: "Ana houe, yalle 3am ye7kike."
Bi-hal-wa2et keno rej3o tlemizo. W-t3ajjabo wa2ta shefouh 3am ye7ke ma3 mara. Bass ma 7ada minnon 2al: "shou baddak minna?" Aw "leysh 3am te7kiya?"
W-taraket el-mara jarreta w-rej3et 3al-madine. W-2alet lal-nes honik:
"Ta3o shoufo rejjel 2alle kell shi 3melto. Awlkon hayda el-MASI7?"
Se3eta kellon tarako el-madine w-ejo la-3and YASOU3.
W-keno el-tlemiz bi-hal-wa2et 3am bi2oulo la-YASOU3: "kol, ya mou3allim"
2allon: "3ende 2akl beklo ento ma bta3erfouh."
W-saro el-tlemiz yes2alo 7alon: "7ada jablo shi la-yeklo?"
2allon YASOU3: "2akle ana houe enno a3mil iradet yalle ba3atne w-kammil 3amalo.
Mish bit2oulo: min ba3d arba3 tesh'hor byeje wa2et 2atf el-zar3? W-ana b2elkon: ettalla3o shoufo el-72oul keef byaddit w-nodjit lal-2atf.
W-yalle bye7sod byekhod 2ejerto, w-byejma3 ghallé lal-7ayet el-abadiyye. W-hek byefra7 el-mzeri3 ma3 yalle bye7sod,
w-byesdo2 el-matal yalle bi2oul: wa7ad byezra3 wel-tene bye7sod.
W-ana ba3attkon la-te7osdo 7a2l ma t3ebto fih. Ghayrkon te3b w-ento btekhdo ghallet at3abo."
W-2ãmano fih ktar min el-semiriyyin bi-haydik el-madine, li2anno el-mara shahadet w-2alet: "zakarle kell shi 3melto."
W-lamma ejo la-3ando el-semiriyyin trajjouh enno yeb2a 3endon, fa-2a3ad yawmen.
W-zed ktir 3adad yalle 2ãmano fih wa2et yalle sem3o kalemo,
w-2alo lal-mara: "ne7na halla2 min2ãmin, mish la-kalemik, bass li2anno ne7na sme3na w-3refna enno 7a2i2atan houe moukhallis el-3alam."
Min ba3d yawmen ra7 YASOU3 3al-Jaleel,
ma3 enno houe bi-zeto ken 2al: "ma fi nabe tkarram bi-watano."
W-lamma wossil 3al-Jaleel, ra7abo fih ahlo, li2annon keno bi-Ourashalim bi-3id el-fos7, w-shefo kell shi 3emlo bel-3id.
W-eja kamen 3ala Kana el-Jaleel, matra7 ma 7awwal el-may la-nbeed. W-ken fi bi-Kfarna7oum rejjel min 7eshiyet el-malik, 3endo 2eben mareed.
W-lamma sem3 enno YASOU3 wossil min el-Yahoudiye 3al-Jaleel, eja la-3ando yetrajjeh enno yenzal 3ala Kfarna7oum ta-yeshfilo 2ebno yalle ra7 ymout.
2allo YASOU3: "ento ma bit2ãmno ella eza shefto el-3ajeyeb."
2allo el-rejjel: "nzal ya Rab, abl ma ymout 2ebne."
2allo YASOU3: "rou7! 2ebnak ba3do tayyib." W-2ãman el-rejjel bi-kalem YASOU3 w-ra7 3ala Kfarna7oum.
W-houe w-raye7 bel-tari2, le2ouh kheddemo w-khabbarouh enno 2ebno ma met.
Sa2alon: "aymata nshafa?" Jewabouh: "mbere7, el-se3a we7de ba3d el-dohr, 7allit 3anno el-7emma."
W-tzakkar el-bayy enno bi-hayde el-se3a 2allo YASOU3: "2ebnak ba3do tayyib." W-2ãman houe w-kell ahl beyto.
Hayde tene 3ajibe 3emela YASOU3, min ba3d ma eja min el-Yahoudiye 3al-Jaleel.
W-ken fi 3id lal-Yahoud, fa-toli3 YASOU3 3ala Ourashalim.
W-bi-Ourashalim, 7add beb el-ghanam, fi berke ela khams se7at, bisammouwa bel-3ebrane Beyt-Zata.
W-ken fi honik ktir marda, minnon 3emyen w-3erj w-mafloujin, [natrin la-tet7arrak el-may,
li2anno malèk el-RAB ken yenzal min wa2et lal-tene bel-berke w-y7arrek el-may. W-ken yalle byenzal awwal wa7ad bel-berke min ba3d ma tet7arrak el-may byenshafa min marado].
W-ken fi honik rejjel mareed min tmena w-tleteen sene.
Lamma shefo YASOU3 mal2ou7, 3eref enno sarlo zamen hek, 2allo: "baddak teshfa?"
Jewabo el-mareed: "ma 3ende 7ada, ya Rab, la-ynazzelne bel-berke lamma btet7arrak el-may. W-kell ma jarreb enzal byesba2ne 7ada tene."
2allo YASOU3: "2oum, 7mol ma7malak w-mshi."
Nshafa el-rejjel bi-se3et el-se3a, w-7eml ma7malo w-meshe. W-ken yawmeta nhar sabt.
2alo el-Yahoud la-yalle nshafa: "liom el-sabt, mish masmou7 te7mol ma7malak."
Jewabon: "yalle shafene 2alle: 7mol ma7malak w-mshi."
Sa2alouh: "meen yalle 2allak 7mol ma7malak w-mshi?"
W-ken el-rejjel ma bya3rif meen houe, li2anno YASOU3 ba3ad 3an 3aj2et el-nes honik.
W-lta2a fih YASOU3 min ba3da bel-haykal, 2allo: "enta halla2 nshafet, ma terja3 lal-khatiyye, ta-ma tou2a3 bi-msibe akbar."
W-ra7 el-rejjel la-3and el-Yahoud w-khabbaron enno YASOU3 houe yalle shafeh.
W-saro el-Yahoud yedtehdo YASOU3, li2anno ken 3am ya3mil hal-shi yawm el-sabt.
Fa-2allon YASOU3: "bayye byeshteghel bi-kell el-aw2at, w-ana beshteghel metlo."
W-ma 3ado el-Yahoud yfakkro ella keef baddon ye2etlouh, mish bass li2anno khelaf el-shari3a nhar el-sabt, kamen li2anno 2al enno ALLAH bayyo, w-7att 7alo bi-mestawa ALLAH.
2allon YASOU3: "b2elkon el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: ma bye2dar el-2eben ya3mil shi min 3endo, bass bya3mil yalle shef el-Ãb 3am ya3emlo. Yalle bya3emlo el-Ãb bya3mil metlo el-2eben.
El-Ãb bi7ebb el-2eben w-bifarjih kell shi 3am ya3emlo, w-ra7 yfarjih a3zam min hek, w-ra7 tet3ajjabo
metl ma bi2awwem el-Ãb el-mawta w-bya3tiyon el-7ayet min jdid, hek el-2eben bya3te el-7ayet la-yalle baddo yeh.
Wel-Ãb ma bideen 7ada, li2anno sallam el-deynoune kella lal-2eben,
7atta kell el-nes ymajjdo el-2eben, metl ma bimajjdo el-Ãb. W-yalle ma bimajjed el-2eben, ma bimajjed el-Ãb yalle ba3ato.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: yalle byesma3le w-bi2ãmen bi-yalle ba3atne elo el-7ayet el-abadiyye, w-ma byenden bel-yawm el-akhir, li2anno bikoun nta2al min el-mawt lal-7ayet.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: ra7 teje se3a, w-ejet halla2, byesma3o fiya el-mawta sawt 2eben ALLAH, w-kell yalle byesma3oulo byen3atalon el-7ayet.
Metl ma el-Ãb houe bi-zeto masdar el-7ayet, hek 3ata el-2eben enno ykoun bi-zeto masdar el-7ayet
w-3atah enno ydeen kamen li2anno houe 2eben el-2ensen.
Ma tet3ajjabo min hal-shi. Ra7 teje se3a byesma3 sawto kell yalle bel-2bour,
w-byetla3o minna kell yalle 3emlo a3mel mni7a w-bi2oumo lal-7ayet, w-yalle 3emlo a3mel 3atle bi2oumo lal-deynoune.
Ana ma be2dar a3mil shi min 3ende. Metl ma besma3 min el-Ãb be7kom, w-7ekme 3adel li2anno ma badde ysir metl ana badde, badde tet7a'2a2 iradet yalle ba3atne.
Law kent 3am besh'had la-7ale, kenit shahedte batle.
Bass ghayre byesh'hadle, w-ana ba3rif enno shahedto mazbouta.
Ba3atto rousl la-You7anna, w-shehed You7anna lal-7a2i2a.
Mish mettekel 3ala shahedet 2ensen, bass 3am 2oul hal-shi kermel khalãskon.
Ken You7anna srej mnawwar msha3sha3, w-ento 7abbeyto testamt3o bi-nouro se3a.
3ende shahede a3zam min shahedet You7anna: 3ende a3mele yalle 3atane el-Ãb enne a3mela, w-hal-a3mel yalle ba3mela hiye btesh'hadle bi-enno el-Ãb ba3atne.
Wel-Ãb yalle ba3atne houe byesh'hadle. Ma sme3to sawto min abl, wala shefto wejjo,
w-kalemo ma bye3la2 fikon, li2annkon ma bit2ãmno bi-yalle ba3ato.
Bte2ro el-ketob el-m2addase, mfakkrin enno ra7 tle2o fiya el-7ayet el-abadiyye, hiye btesh'hadle,
bass ma badkon tejo la-3ande la-tkoun elkon el-7ayet.
Ana ma betlob majd min 3end el-nes,
li2anne 3refetkon w-3refet enno ma7abbet ALLAH ma ela matra7 bi-2loubkon.
Jeet bi-esm bayye, w-ma 2beltoune. W-law eja wa7ad ghayre bi-esmo kento 2beltouh.
W-keef bit2ãmno ma zelkon 3am tetolbo el-majd min 7alkon, wel-majd yalle houe min ALLAH wa7do ma 3am tetolbouh?
Ma tfakro enno 3am bshakkikon lal-Ãb, li2anno 3endkon meen yshakkikon: Moussa yalle 7attayto fih kell rajekon.
W-law kento 3am bitsadd2o Moussa kento sadda2toune, li2anno katab w-khabbar 3anne.
W-eza ma kento bitsadd2o yalle katabo Moussa, fa-keef badkon tsadd2o kaleme?"
Min ba3da 2ata3 YASOU3 ba7r el-Jaleel ye3ne bou7ayrit Tabarayya,
w-le7'2o nes ktir, li2anno shefo el-3ajeyeb yalle 3emela lamma shafa el-marda.
Toli3 YASOU3 3al-jabal w-2a3ad ma3 tlemizo.
W-ken 2arrab 3id el-fos7 3end el-Yahoud.
Rafa3 YASOU3 3youno w-shef el-nes jeye sawbo, 2al la-Filippos: "min wayn mneshtere el-khebz la-nta3miyon?"
2al hal-shi la-yemte7en Filippos, li2anno ken 3arif shou baddo ya3mil.
Jewabo Filippos: "law shtarayna khebz bi-miteyn dinar, ma bikaffé ta-na3te la-kell wa7ad minnon sha2fet khebz zghire."
W-2allo wa7ad min tlemizo, w-houe Endrawos khayyo la-Sem3an Boutros:
"Hon fi sabe ma3o khams tereghfe min sh3ir w-samakten, bass shou bya3mlo la-kell hal-nes?"
2al YASOU3: "2a3do el-nes." W-ken fi honik 7ashish ktir fa-2a3ado. W-keno shi khams-talef rejjel.
Akhad YASOU3 el-khams tereghfe w-shakar ALLAH, min ba3da wazza3 3ala el-mawjoudin 2add ma baddon. W-3eml nafs el-shi bel-samakten.
W-lamma sheb3o, 2al la-tlemizo: "jma3o yalle faddal min el-khebz ta-ma yrou7o di3an."
Jama3o tna3shar sallé melyene min el-khebz yalle faddal min el-khams tereghfe sh3ir.
W-lamma shefo el-nes hal-3ajibe yalle 3emela YASOU3 2alo: "7a2i2atan, hayda houe el-nabe el-jeye 3al-3alam!"
W-3eref YASOU3 enno ra7 yejo yekhtfouh w-ya3mlouh malik, kermel hek bay3ad 3annon w-reje3 la-wa7do 3al-jabal.
Lamma sar 3ashiye, nezlo tlemizo 3ala ba7r el-Jaleel.
Rekbo shakhtoura w-ra7o fiya 3ala Kfarna7oum. W-eja el-leyl abl ma yel7a2on YASOU3.
W-habbet 3asfe 2awiye, w-hej el-ba7r.
Min ba3d ma 2ata3o tlet amyel aw arb3a (ye3ne arb3a aw khamse kilometre), shefo YASOU3 3am bi2arrib min el-shakhtoura meshe 3al-ba7r w-khafo.
2allon: "Ana houe, ma tkhafo!"
W-ken baddon ytal3ouh 3al-shakhtoura, bass el-shakhtoura kenit wosslit 3a-matra7 ma keno ray7in.
W-tene yawm, shefo el-nes yalle be2yo 3al-shatt el-tene enno ma fi honik ella shakhtoura we7de, w-enno YASOU3 ma toli3 3leya ma3 tlemizo, w-enno el-tlemiz ra7o la-wa7don.
Bi-hal-wa2et ejet kamm shakhtoura min Tabarayya w-resyo 3al-shatt el-2arib min matra7 ma akalo el-khebz, min ba3d ma shakar el-RAB.
W-lamma shefo el-nes enno YASOU3 ma ken honik wala tlemizo, rekbo bel-shakhtoura w-ra7o 3ala Kfarna7oum ta-yfattsho 3le.
Lamma le2ouh 3al-shatt el-tene 2aloulo: "aymata wsolt la-hon, ya mou3allim?"
Jewabon YASOU3: "b2elkon el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: ento 3am tetolboune mish li2anno shefto el-3ajeyeb, bass li2anno akalto el-khebz w-shbe3to.
Ma teshteghlo kermel el-2akl yalle byefna, shteghlo lal-2akl el-be2e lal-7ayet el-abadiyye. Hal-2akl bya3tikon yeh 2eben el-2ensen, li2anno ALLAH el-Ãb 7att khatmo 3le."
2aloulo: "keef fina na3mil yalle baddo yeh ALLAH?"
Jewabon: "enno t2ãmno bel-shakhs yalle ba3ato: hayda baddo yeh ALLAH."
2aloulo: "farjina 3ajibe 7atta n2ãmen fik! Shou bte2dar ta3mil?
Bayyetna akalo el-mann bel-barriye, metl ma maktoub bel-kteb: "3atahon khebz min el-sama 7atta yeklo."
Jewabon YASOU3: "b2elkon el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: ma 3atakon Moussa el-khebz min el-sama. Bayye wa7do bya3tikon el-khebz el-7a2i2e min el-sama.
Li2anno khebz ALLAH houe yalle byenzal min el-sama w-bya3te el-3alam el-7ayet."
2aloulo: "ya Rab, 3tina deyman min hal-khebz."
2allon YASOU3: "ana houe khebz el-7ayet. Yalle byeje la-3ande ma bijou3, w-yalle bi2ãmen fiyye ma bye3tash abadan.
Bass ana 2eltelkon: sheftoune w-ma 2ãmanto.
Kell yalle bya3tine henne el-Ãb byejo la-3ande, w-yalle byeje la-3ande ma beb3edo 3anne.
Ana ma nzelt min el-sama ta-a3mil yalle ana badde yeh, nzelt ta-a3mil iradet yalle ba3atne.
W-iradet yalle ba3atne hiye enno ma ekhsar 7ada min yalle 3atane yehon, bel-3aks 2awwemon kellon bel-yawm el-akhir.
W-bayye baddo hal-shi: enno kell meen shef el-2eben w-2ãman fih yekhod el-7ayet el-abadiyye, w-ana b2awwmo bel-yawm el-akhir."
Saro el-Yahoud ybarebro 3ala YASOU3 li2anno 2al: "ana el-khebz yalle nezil min el-sama",
w-2alo: "mish hayda YASOU3 2eben Youssef? Ne7na mna3rif bayyo w-emmo, keef 3am bi2oul enno nezl min el-sama?"
Jewabon YASOU3: "ma tbarebro bayn ba3dkon.
Ma 7ada byeje la-3ande ella eza jazabo el-Ãb yalle ba3atne, w-ana b2awwmo bel-yawm el-akhir.
W-bikouno kellon tlemiz ALLAH, metl ma katabo el-anbiya. Yalle byesma3 el-Ãb w-byet3allam minno byeje la-3ande,
ma 7ada shef el-Ãb ella yalle eja min 3end ALLAH: houe yalle shef el-Ãb.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: yalle bi2ãmen fiyye, elo el-7ayet el-abadiyye.
Ana khebz el-7ayet.
Bayyetkon akalo el-mann bel-barriye w-meto,
bass yalle byekol min hal-khebz el-nezil min el-sama ma bimout.
Ana el khebz el-7ayy yalle nezil min el-sama. Yalle byekol min hal-khebz bi3ish lal-abad. Wel-khebz yalle ba3tih houe jesme, b2addmo kermel 7ayet el-3alam."
Se3eta sar fi jidel 3aneef bayn el-Yahoud w-sa2alo ba3don: "keef bye2dar hal-rejjel ya3tina jesmo ta-neklo?"
2allon YASOU3: "b2elkon el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: eza ma ra7 teklo jesm 2eben el-2ensen w-ma ra7 teshrabo dammo, ma ra7 tkoun fikon el-7ayet.
Bass yalle byekol jesme w-byeshrab damme elo el-7ayet el-abadiyye, w-ana b2awwmo bel-yawm el-akhir.
Jesme houe el-2akl el-7a2i2e, w-damme houe el-sharab el-7a2i2e.
Yalle byekol jesme w-byeshrab damme byethbat fiyye, w-ana bethbat fih.
W-metl ma ana bekhod el-7ayet min el-Ãb el-7ayy yalle ba3atne, kamen yalle byeklo jesme byekhdo el-7ayet minne.
Hayda houe el khebz el-nezil min el-sama, mish el-mann yalle akalouh bayyetkon w-min ba3da meto. Yalle byekol hal-khebz bi3ish lal-abad."
2al YASOU3 hal-kalem lamma ken bi-majma3 Kfarna7oum.
W-2alo ktar min tlemizo lamma sem3ouh: "hal-kalem sa3b, meen bye2dar yesma3o?"
W-3eref YASOU3 enno tlemizo 3tarado, 2allon: "kaleme khallekon tshekko?
Keef law shefto 2eben el-2ensen tali3 la-matra7 ma ken abl?
El-rou7 houe yalle bya3te el-7ayet, el-jesm ma elo naf3. Wel-kalem yalle eltelkon yeh houe rou7 w-7ayet.
Bass fi baynetkon nes ma bi2ãmno." 2al YASOU3 hal-shi li2anno ken 3arif min el-awwal meen henne yalle ma bi2ãmno fih w-meen yalle ra7 ysallmo.
Min ba3da 2al: "kermel hek 2eltelkon: ma 7ada byeje la-3ande ella bi-ne3me min el-Ãb."
W-tkhalla 3anno min haydik el-se3a ktar min tlemizo w-battalo as7ab ma3o.
2al YASOU3 la-tlemizo el-tna3sh: "w-ento, ma badkon teterkoune metlon?"
Jewabo Sem3an Boutros: "la wayn badna nrou7 ya Rab, w-kalem el-7ayet el-abadiyye 3endak?
Ne7na 2ãmanna fik w-3refna ennak enta 2ouddous ALLAH."
2allon YASOU3: "mish ana yalle na'2eytkon, ento el-tna3sh? Bass wa7ad minkon shaytan!"
W-2asad bi-hal-shi Yahouza 2eben Sem3an Eskharyout, w-houe yalle ra7 ysallmo, ma3 enno houe wa7ad min el-tna3sh.
Min ba3da meshe YASOU3 bel-Jaleel, w-ma 2ebl yemshe bel-Yahoudiye, li2anno el-Yahoud keno baddon ye2etlouh.
W-lamma 2arrab 3id el-khyem 3end el-Yahoud,
2aloulo ekhweto: "trok hal-matra7 w-rou7 3al-Yahoudiye 7atta yshoufo el-tlemiz a3melak,
ma 7ada byeshteghil bel-mekhfe eza baddo enno el-nes ya3erfouh. W-ma zelak 3am ta3mil hal-a3mel, kshof 7alak lal-3alam."
W-keno ekhweto nafson ma bi2ãmno fih.
2allon YASOU3: "ma eja wa2te ba3d. Baynama ento, el-wa2et 3atoul houe wa2etkon.
Ento ma byobghedkon el-3alam, bass byobghedne ele li2anno 3am besh'had 3ala fased a3melo.
Tla3o ento, w-ana ma ra7 etla3 3al-3id, li2anno wa2te ma eja ba3d."
2allon hal-shi w-be2e bel-Jaleel.
W-lamma tel3o ekhweto 3al-3id, toli3 min ba3don bel-mekhfe bidoun ma yshoufouh.
W-keno el-Yahoud 3am bifattsho 3le bel-3id w-3am yes2alo: "wayno?"
W-sar jidel ktir 7awlo, nes y2oulo: "hayda rejjel sale7." W-ghayron y2oulo: "la2, hayda 3am yekhda3 el-sha3b."
W-ma 7ada 7eke 3anno bi-sawt 3ale li2anno khafo min rou2asa el-Yahoud.
W-ken el-3id sar bi-nosso, toli3 YASOU3 3al-haykal w-sar y3allim.
T3ajjabo el-Yahoud w-2alo: "keef bya3rif el-ketob el-m2addase, w-ma t3allam?"
Jewabon YASOU3: "ta3lime mish min 3ende, ta3lime min 3end yalle ba3atne.
Yalle bya3mil iradet ALLAH, byar3if eza hal-ta3lim min 3end ALLAH w-enno ma 3am be7ke min 3ende.
Yalle bye7ke min zeto byetlob el-majd la-7alo, bass yalle byetlob el-majd la-yalle ba3ato, houe sade2 w-ma fiyo ayya ghesh.
Mish Moussa houe yalle 3atakon el-shari3a? W-ma 7ada minkon 3eml fiya. Leysh badkon te2etloune?"
Jewabo el-nes: "enta fik shaytan, meen baddo ye2etlak?"
2al YASOU3: "ma 3melt ella 3amal wa7ad, w-t3ajjabto kellkon.
2amarkon Moussa bel-khatn, w-ma ken el-khatn min Moussa, ken min el-bayyet, fa-serto tekhetno el-2ensen yawm el-sabt.
Eza kento btekhetno el-2ensen yawm el-sabt ta-ma tkhelfo shari3et Moussa, keef bteghdabo 3leyye li2anno shafet 2ensen kello sawa yawm el-sabt?
Ma te7ekmo 3al-mazaher, 7kemo bel-3adl."
2alo nes min ahl Ourashalim: "mish hayda houe yalle baddon ye2etlouh?
Shoufo keef 3am ye7ke bi-sawt 3ale eddem kell el-nes w-ma 3am bi2ouloulo shi. Awlkon 2tana3o el-rou2asa enno houe el-MASI7?
Bas ne7na mna3rif min wayn eja hal-rejjel. Baynama el-MASI7, ma 7ada bya3rif lamma byeje min wayn jeye."
2al YASOU3 bi-sawt 3ale houe w-3am bi3allim bel-haykal: "ento bta3erfoune w-bta3erfo min wayn ana, bass ana ma jeet min 3ende. Yalle ba3atne houe 7a2i2a, w-ento ma bta3erfouh.
Bass ana ba3erfo, li2anno min 3endo jeet, w-houe yalle ba3atne."
W-ken baddon yekemshouh, bass ma madd 7ada 2ido 3le, li2anno se3to kenit ma ejet ba3d.
Bass ktar min el-nes 2ãmano fih w-2alo: "awlkon ra7 ya3mil el-MASI7, lamma yeje, 3ajeyeb aktar min ma 3eml hal-rejjel?"
W-sem3o el-ferrisiyyin enno el-nes 3am ye7ko 3al-wate bi-hal-eshya 3an YASOU3, fa-ba3ato henne w-rou2asa el-kahane 7aras ta-yekemshouh.
2al YASOU3: "ra7 eb2a ma3kon wa2et alil, w-min ba3da ra7 rou7 la-3and yalle ba3atne.
Ra7 tetolboune w-ma ra7 tle2oune, w-matra7 ma bkoun ana ma bte2daro ento tejo."
2alo el-Yahoud bayn ba3don: "la-wayn raye7 hayda, w-ma mne2dar enno nle2ih? Awlkon baddo yrou7 la-3and el-Yahoud el-mshattatin bayn el-Youneniyyin la-y3allim el-Youneniyyin?
Shou 2asdo lamma 2al: ra7 tetolboune w-ma ra7 tle2oune, w-matra7 ma bkoun ana ma bte2daro ento enno tejo?"
We2f YASOU3 bi-ekher yawm min el-3id w-houe ahamma yawm, w-2al bi-sawt 3ale: "eza 7ada 3otsh, yeje la-3ande ta-yeshrab.
W-yalle bi2ãmen fiyye, metl ma 2al el-kteb, byetfajjar min sadro anhar may 7ayy."
W-2asad bi-kalemo el-rou7 yalle ra7 yekhdo el-mou2minin fih, li2anno el-rou7 ma ken n3ata la-7ada ba3d, li2anno YASOU3 ma ken ba3d tmajjad.
W-2alo ktar min yalle sem3o kalem YASOU3: "7a2i2atan hayda houe el-nabe."
W-fi ghayron 2alo: "hayda houe el-MASI7!" w-2alo ghayron: "awlkon min el-Jaleel ra7 yeje el-MASI7?
Mish el-kteb 2al enno el-MASI7 byeje min sleelet Daoud, w-min Beyt-La7m madinet Daoud?"
W-n2asam ra2y el-nes fih.
W-ken fi nes baddon yekemshouh, bass ma 7ada madd 2ido 3le.
W-rej3o el-7aras la-3and rou2asa el-kahane wel-ferrisiyyin, yalle 2aloulon: "leysh ma jebtouh la-hon?"
Jewabo el-7aras: "wala 2ensen min abl 7eke metl hal-rejjel!"
2aloulon el-ferrisiyyin: "khada3kon kamen elkon?
Shefto shi wa7ad min el-rou2asa aw el-ferrisiyyin 2ãman fih?
W-kell el-be2yin yalle ma bya3erfo el-shari3a, el-la3ne 3leyon."
2al Nikodimos, w-ken min el-ferrisiyyin, w-houe yalle eja min abl la-3and YASOU3:
"shari3etna bte7kom 3ala 7ada abl ma tesma3o w-ta3rif shou yalle 3emlo?"
Jewabouh: "ma tkoun enta kamen min el-Jaleel? Fattesh bitle2e enno ma fi nabe byetla3 min el-Jaleel."
[Min ba3da fallo kellon 3ala byouton].
W-toli3 YASOU3 3ala jabal el-Zeytoun.
W-3a tlou3 el-daw reje3 3al-haykal, w-eja la-3ando el-sha3b kello. 2a3ad w-sar y3allimon.
Jeboulo mou3allimi el-shari3a wel-ferrisiyyin mara nkamshet 3am tezne, wa'2afouwa bel-noss,
w-2aloulo: "ya mou3allim, hal-mara nkamashet 3am tezne.
W-Moussa wassa bi-shari3to bi-rajm yalle metla, enta shou bit2oul?"
W-keno bi-hal-shi 3am bi7awlo ye7erjouh ta-yettehmouh. N7ana YASOU3 3al-ard w-sar yektob bi-esba3o.
W-lamma ala7o 3le bel-sou2al, rafa3 raso w-2allon: "yalle minkon bidoun khatiyye, khalli ykeb 3leya awwal 7ajar."
W-n7ana marra tenye w-sar yektob 3al-ard.
Lamma sem3o hal-kalem, sar dameeron y2annebon, w-nsa7abo wa7ad wara el-tene, min kbiron la-zghiron, w-be2e YASOU3 wa7do, wel-mara ba3da matra7a.
2a3ad YASOU3 w-2alla: "waynon? Ma 7ada minnon 7akam 3leyke?"
Jewabet: "la2, ya Rab!" 2alla YASOU3: "w-ana ma be7kom 3leyke. Rou7e w-ma ba2a tokhte ba3d liom."
Reje3 YASOU3 ye7ke el-nes, 2allon: "ana nour el-3alam. Yalle byel7a2ne ma byemshe bel-3atme, bel-3aks bikoun elo nour el-7ayet."
2aloulo el-ferrisiyyin: "enta btesh'had la-nafsak, w-shahedtak batle."
Jewabon YASOU3: "mazbout, ana besh'had la-nafse, bass shahedte mazbouta, li2anno ba3rif min wayn jeet w-la-wayn raye7. Bass ento, ma bta3erfo min wayn jeet wala la-wayn raye7.
Ento bte7ekmo metl el-bashar, w-ana ma be7kom 3ala 7ada.
W-eza 7akamet, 7ekme mazbout li2anne mish wa7de be7kom, ana wel-Ãb yalle ba3atne.
Bi-shari3etkon bitso7 shahedet tnen:
Ana besh'had la-nafse, wel-Ãb yalle ba3atne byesh'had ele.
2aloulo: "wayn bayyak?" Jewabon: "ento ma bta3erfoune wala bta3erfo bayye. W-law bta3erfoune kento 3refto bayye."
2al YASOU3 hal-kalem 3end sandou2 el-tabarrou3at w-houe 3am bi3allim bel-haykal, w-ma kamasho 7ada li2anno se3to kenit ba3d ma ejet.
Min ba3da 2allon YASOU3: "Ana raye7 w-ra7 tetolboune, w-bi-khatiyyetkon ra7 tmouto. W-matra7 ma ana raye7 ma bte2daro ento tejo."
2alo el-Yahoud: "yemken ra7 ye2tol 7alo, li2anno 2al: matra7 ma ana raye7 ma bte2daro ento tejo."
W-2allon: "ento ta7t, w-ana jeye min fo2. Ento min hal-3alam, w-ana mish min hal-3alam.
Kermel hek 2eltelkon: ra7 tmouto bi-khatiyyetkon. Na3am, ra7 tmouto bi-khatayakon, eza ma bit2ãmno enno ana houe."
2aloulo: "meen enta?" 2al YASOU3: min el-awwal khabbaretkon.
3ende eshya ktire 2oula 3ankon, w-eshya ktire e7kom fiya 3leykon. Bass yalle ba3atne sade2, w-yalle sme3to minno b2oulo lal-3alam."
Ma fehmo enno 3am ye7kiyon 3an el-Ãb,
2allon: "wa2et yalle bterfa3o 2eben el-2ensen ra7 ta3erfo enno ana houe, w-enno ma ba3mil shi min 3ende w-ma b2oul ella yalle 3allamne yeh el-Ãb.
Wel-Ãb yalle ba3atne houe ma3e w-ma tarakne la-wa7de, li2anno ana bi-kell wa2et 3am ba3mil yalle byordih."
W-lamma 2al hal-kalem, 2ãmano fih ktar min el-nes.
2al YASOU3 lal-Yahoud yalle bi2ãmno fih: "eza btethbato bi-kaleme, bitsiro 7a2i2atan tlemize:
bta3erfo el-7a2i2a, wel-7a2i2a bit7arrerkon."
2aloulo: "ne7na min sleelet Ibrahim, w-ma kenna 3abeed la-7ada! Keef bit2elna: ra7 tsiro a7rar?"
Jewabon YASOU3: "b2elkon el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: yalle byokhte bikoun 3abd lal-khatiyye,
wel-3abd ma byeskon bel-beyt 3atoul, bass el-2eben byeskon fih 3atoul.
Eza 7arrarkon el-2eben, sorto 7a2i2atan a7rar.
Ana ba3rif ennkon min sleelet Ibrahim. Bass badkon tet2etloune, li2anno kaleme ma elo matra7 bi-2albkon.
Ana 3am be7ke 3an yalle shefto 3end bayye, w-ento bta3emlo bi-yalle sme3touh min bayykon."
2aloulo: "bayyna houe Ibrahim." Jewabon YASOU3: "law kento wled Ibrahim, kento 3melto a3mel Ibrahim.
Bass halla2 badkon tet2etloune, ana yalle eltelkon el-7a2i2a metl ma sme3ta min ALLAH, w-hal 3amal ma 3emlo Ibrahim.
Ento bta3emlo a3mel bayykon." 2aloulo: "ne7na mish wled zena, w-3enna bayy wa7ad houe ALLAH!"
2allon YASOU3: "law ken ALLAH bayykon kento 7abbaytoune. Li2anno jeet min 3end ALLAH, w-ma jeet minne la-7ale, houe yalle ba3atne.
Leysh ma btefhamo yalle 3am 2elkon yeh? Li2annkon ma badkon tesma3o la-kaleme.

Ento wled bayykon eblees, w-badkon tel7a2o shahawet bayykon, hayda yalle ken min el-bideye ye2tol. W-ma thabat 3al-7a2, li2anno ma fiyo 7a2. W-houe bikazzib, wel-kezb bi-tab3o, li2anno kezzeb w-abou el-kezb.
W-ana, ma 3am bitsad2oune li2anno b2oul el-7a2i2a.
Meen bye2dar fikon enno ythabbet khatiyye 3leyye? W-eza kent 3am 2oul el-7a2i2a, leysh ma-3am bitsadd2oune?
Yalle bikoun min ALLAH byesma3 kalem ALLAH. W-ento mish min ALLAH, kermel hek ma btesma3ouh."
2alo el-Yahoud: "ma ma3na 7a2 eza 2elna ennak semire w-fik shaytan?"
Jewabon YASOU3: "ma fiyye shaytan, bass ana bmajjed bayye, w-ento 3am bit'hinoune.
Ana ma betlob majd ele. Fi meen byetloble w-bye7kom.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: yalle bya3mil bi-kaleme ma bishouf el-mawt abadan."
2aloulo el-Yahoud: "halla2 t2akkadna enno fik shaytan. Ibrahim met wel-anbiya meto, bass enta 3am bit2oul: yalle bya3mil bi-kaleme ma bimout abadan.
Tekhmin enta a3zam min bayyna Ibrahim yalle met? Wel-anbiya kamen meto, enta, meen mfakkar 7alak?"
Jewabon YASOU3: "law majjadet 7ale, ken majde batel. Bayye houe yalle bimajjedne. W-houe yalle bit2oulo 3anno enno Ilehna.
Ento ma bta3erfouh, bass ana ba3erfo. Eza 2elt enno ma ba3erfo, kent metlkon kezzeb. Bass ana ba3erfo w-ba3mil bi-kalemo.
W-addeysh tshawwa2 bayykon Ibrahim enno yshouf yawme, shefo w-hallal."
2aloulo el-Yahoud: "keef sheft Ibrahim w-ba3d ma sar 3omrak khamseen?"
Jewabon YASOU3: "b2elkon el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: abl ma ykoun Ibrahim ana kent."
Se3eta akhado 7jara ta-yerejmouh, w-khtafa 3annon w-toli3 min el-haykal.
Houe w-bel-tari2, shef rejjel khel2 a3ma.
Sa2alouh tlemizo: "ya mou3allim, meen yalle khote? Hal-rejjel aw ahlo, 7atta khel2 a3ma?"
Jewab YASOU3: "la-houe khote wala ahlo. Bass khel2 a3ma 7atta tezhar fih edrit w-a3mel ALLAH.
Lezim, ma zel el-wa2et nhar, enno na3mil a3mel yalle ba3atne. Wa2et byeje el-leyl ma bye2dar 7ada enno yeshteghil.
Ana nour el-3alam, ma zel ana bel-3alam."
2al hal-shi w-baza2 bel-trab, w-jabal trab bi-ri2o w-dahan fiyon 3youn el-a3ma
w-2allo: "rou7 ghassil bi-berket Selwem" (ye3ne el-rasoul). Ra7 w-ghassal, w-sar ye2sha3.
Sa2alo el-jiran w-yalle keno yshoufouh min abl byesh7ad: "mish houe yalle ken ye2'3od yesh7ad?"
W-nes ghayron 2alo: "hayda houe." W-ghayron 2alo: "la2, hayda wa7ad byeshbaho." W-ken houe bi-zeto 3am bi2oul: "ana houe!"
2aloulo: "w-keef nfata7o 3younak?"
Jewab: "hayda yalle esmo YASOU3 jabal trab w-7atton 3ala 3youne w-2alle: rou7 ghassil bi-berket Selwem. Ro7t w-ghassalet, w-sert e2sha3."
2aloulo: "wayno?" 2al: "ma ba3rif."
Akhado el-rejjel yalle ken a3ma la-3and el-ferrisiyyin,
w-ken el-yawm yalle jabal fih YASOU3 el-trab w-fata7 3youn el-a3ma yawm sabt.
Sa2alo el-ferrisiyyin el-rejjel keef sar ye2sha3, jewabon: "7att haydak el-rejjel trab 3ala 3youne, w-lamma ghassalton sert e2sha3."
2alo el-ferrisiyyin: "hal-rejjel mish min ALLAH, li2anno ma bye7terim el-sabt." W-fi ghayron 2alo: "keef bye2dar rejjel khate enno ya3mil metl hal-3ajeyeb?" W-sar fi khilef bayneton.
W-2alo kamen lal-a3ma: "enta bit2oul enno fata7 3younak, shou ra2yak fih?" Jewab: "houe nabe!"
Ma sadda2o el-Yahoud enno el-rejjel ken a3ma w-sar ye2sha3, kermel hek nedo ahlo
w-sa2alouwon: "hayda houe 2ebenkon yalle khel2 a3ma metl ma 3am bit2oulo? Keef 3am ye2sha3 halla2?"
Jewabo ahlo: "ne7na mna3rif enno hayda 2ebenna, w-enno khel2 a3ma.
Bass keef sar ye2sha3, ma mna3rif, w-ma mna3rif meen fata7lo 3youno. S2alouh w-houe bijewebkon 3an 7alo, houe reshed."
2alo ahlo hal-shi li2annon keno khayfin min el-Yahoud, li2annon keno mettef2in ennon yesh7ato min el-majma3 kell wa7ad bye3terif enno YASOU3 houe el-MASI7.
Kermel hek 2alo ahlo: "s2alouh, houe reshed."
W-rej3o el-ferrisiyyin w-nedo el-rejjel yalle ken a3ma w-2aloulo: "majjed ALLAH! Ne7na mna3rif enno hal-rejjel khate."
Jewab: "Ana ma ba3rif eza ken hal-rejjel khate, bass yalle ba3erfo enno kent a3ma w-halla2 3am e2sha3."
2aloulo: "shou 3emellak? W-keef fata7 3younak?"
Jewabon: "2eltelkon w-ma sme3toune, leysh badkon tesma3o marra tenye? Badkon ento kamen tsiro min tlemizo?"
Saro ysebbouh w-2aloulo: "enta telmizo, ne7na tlemiz Moussa.
Ne7na mna3rif enno ALLAH 7eke Moussa, bass hayda ma mna3rif min wayn jeye."
Jewabon el-rejjel: "shi bi7ayyer keef byefta7le 3youne w-ma bta3erfo meen houe!
Ne7na mna3rif enno ALLAH ma byesma3 lal-khatyeen, bass byesma3 la-yalle meshe bi-7asab iradto.
W-ma 7ada sem3 bi-7ayeto enno 2ensen fata7 3youn wa7ad khel2 a3ma.
W-law ma ken hal-rejjel min ALLAH, ma ken bye2dar ya3mil shi."
2aloulo: "3am bit3allimna w-enta kellak khel2an bel-khatiyye?" w-sha7atouh min el-majma3.
Sem3 YASOU3 enno sha7atouh, 2allo lamma lta2a fih: "bit2ãmen bi-2eben el-2ensen?"
Jewab: "w-meen houe, ya Rab, ta-2ãmen fih!"
2allo YASOU3: "enta shefto, w-houe yalle 3am ye7kik!"
2al: "2ãmanet, ya Rab!" W-sajadlo.
2allo YASOU3: "jeet 3ala hal-3alam lal-deynoune, 7atta ye2sha3o yalle ma bye2sha3o, w-yen3emo yalle bye2sha3o."
Sem3ouh el-mawjoudin min el-ferrisiyyin, w-2aloulo: "asdak ne7na kamen 3emyen?"
Jewabon YASOU3: "law kento 3emyen, ma ken 3leykon khatiyye, bass li2annkon 3am bit2oulo ennkon 3am te2sha3o, khatiyyetkon sebte."
"B2elkon el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: yalle ma bifout 3a-zribet el-khwerif min el-beb, w-bi3arbesh 3leya min matra7 tene, houe serre2 w-loss.
Bass yalle bifout min el-beb houe ra3i el-khwerif.
El-bouwweb byefta7lo, wel-khwerif btesma3lo sawto. Binede kell wa7ad min khwerifo bi-esmon w-bitall3o.
Lamma bitalli3 el-khwerif byemshe eddema, w-hiye btel7a2o li2anno bta3rif sawto.
Bass btehrob min el-gharib w-ma btel7a2o, li2anno ma bta3rif sawt el-ghouraba."
2al YASOU3 hal-matal, w-ma fehmo ma3na kalemo,
2allon: "b2elkon el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: ana beb el-khwerif.
Kell yalle ejo min able serre2in w-lsous, ma sem3oulon el-khwerif.
Ana el-beb, yalle byemro2 minne bile2e el-khalãs: bisir ye2dar yfout w-yedhar w-yle2e shi yeklo.
Ma byeje el-serre2 ella ta-yesro2 w-ye2tol w-ykharrib. Bass ana jeet ta-tkoun elon el-7ayet, kell el-7ayet.
Ana el-ra3i el-sale7, wel-ra3i el-sale7 bida77e bi-7ayeto kermel el-khwerif.
Wel-2ajir mish metl el-ra3i, li2anno el-khwerif mish elo. Eza shef el-deeb jeye, byetrok el-khwerif w-byehrob, w-byekhtof el-deeb el-khwerif w-bifar3eton.
W-houe byehrob li2anno 2ajir ma bit'hemmo el-khwerif.
Ana el-ra3i el-sale7, ba3rif khwerife w-khwerife bta3refne,
metl ma bya3refne el-Ãb w-ba3rif ana el-Ãb, w-bda77e bi-7ayete kermel khwerife.
W-3ende ghayr khwerif min ghayr zribe, w-lezim 2oudon henne kamen. Ra7 yesma3o sawte, w-ysir fi r3iyye we7de la-ra3i wa7ad.
Wel-Ãb bi7ebbne li2anne bda77e bi-7ayete 7atta estarje3a.
Ma 7ada byekhod 7ayete minne, ana ba3tiya minne la-7ale. Be2dar a3tiya, w-be2dar estarje3a. W-hal-wassiye ejetne min bayye."
W-sar fi khilef tene bayn el-Yahoud 3ala hal-kalem,
w-2alo ktar minnon: "hal-rejjel fiyo shaytan, 3am ye7ke shou ma ken. Leysh 3am tesma3oulo?"
W-fi ghayron 2alo: "hayda el-kalem mish min 7ada fiyo shaytan. Leysh el-shaytan bye2dar yefta7 3youn el-3emyen?"
W-eja 3id el-tejdid bi-Ourashalim, wel-dene 3am bitshatte.
W-ken YASOU3 3am yetmasha bel-haykal bi-se7et Sulayman,
w-tjamma3o el-Yahoud 7awlo w-2aloulo: "la-aymata baddak tkhallina me7tarin? 2elna bi-sara7a: enta el-MASI7?"
Jewabon YASOU3: "2eltelkon, bass ma 3am bitsadd2o. El-a3mel yalle 3melta bi-esm bayye btesh'hadle.
W-keef bitsadd2o w-ento mish min khwerife.
Khwerife btesma3 sawte, w-ana ba3refa, w-hiye btel7a2ne.
Ba3tiya el-7ayet el-abadiyye, w-ma bitmout abadan w-ma byekhtofa 7ada minne.
El-Ãb yalle 3atane yeha houe a3zam min kell el-woujoud, w-ma fi 7ada bye2dar yekhtof min 2id el-Ãb shi,
ana wel-Ãb wa7ad."
Jebo el-Yahoud 7jara 7atta yerejmouh.
2allon YASOU3: "farjaytkon ktir a3mel sal7a min 3end el-Ãb, la-ayya 3amal minna badkon terejmoune?"
Jewabouh el-Yahoud: "ma mnerejmak wala la-aya 3amal sale7 3melto, mnerejmak li2annak 3am bitjaddef. Enta 2ensen, w-3melt 7alak ileh."
2allon YASOU3: "mish maktoub bi-shari3etkon enno ALLAH 2al: ento aliha?
Eza kenit el-shari3a bitsamme, yalle nezlit 3leyon kelmet ALLAH, aliha, wel-shari3a mish moumkin tebtol,
keef bit2ouloule, ana yalle 2addaso el-Ãb w-ba3ato lal-3alam: enta 3am bitjaddef, li2anno 2elt ana 2eben ALLAH?
Eza kent ma 3am a3mil a3mel bayye, ma tsadd2oune.
W-eza kent 3am ba3mila, sadd2o hal-a3mel eza kento ma bitsadd2oune ele, 7atta ta3erfo w-t2ãmno enno el-Ãb fiyye w-ana bel-Ãb."
W-jarrabo yekemshouh, bass falat min 2ideyon.
W-reje3 3al-meyle el-tenye min nahr el-Ordon matra7 ma ken You7anna y3ammed min abl, w-be2e honik.
W-ejo la-3ando ktar min el-nes w-2alo: "ma 3eml You7anna 3ajibe we7de, bass yalle 2alo 3an hal-rejjel ken kello mazbout."
W-2ãmano bi-YASOU3 ktar min el-nes honik.
Ken fi rejjel mareed esmo Li3azar min Beyt 3anya, min da3yet Maryam w-ekhta Marta.
W-Maryam hiye yalle sakabet el-3otr 3ala ejren YASOU3 w-masa7eton bi-sha3ra. W-Li3azar el-mareed ken khayya.
El-ekhten ba3ato y2oulo la-YASOU3: "ya Rab, yalle bit7ebbo mareed."
Lamma sem3 YASOU3 2al: "hal-marad ma bimawwet, houe la-majd ALLAH. Ra7 yetmajjad fih 2eben ALLAH."
W-ken YASOU3 bi7ebb Marta w-ekhta w-Li3azar,
bass be2e matra7o yawmen, min ba3d ma 3eref enno Li3azar mareed.
Min ba3da 2al lal-tlemiz: "ta3o nerja3 3al-Yahoudiye."
Jewabouh el-tlemiz: "ya mou3allim, ra7 terja3 la-honik, w-mish min zamen keno el-Yahoud baddon yerejmouk?"
2al YASOU3: "mish el-nhar tna3shar se3a? Yalle byemshe bel-nhar ma byetfarkash, li2anno bishouf nour el-3alam.
W-yalle byemshe bel-leyl byetfarkash, li2anno ma fiyo nour."
Min ba3da 2allon: "7abibna Li3azar neyim, w-ana raye7 wa33ih."
2aloulo el-tlemiz: "eza ken neyim ya Rab, ra7 yso7."
W-ken YASOU3 3am ye7ke 3an mawto, w-fakkaro enno 3am ye7ke 3an el-nawm.
2allon YASOU3 bi-kell sara7a: "Li3azar met.
W-ana befra7 enno ma kent honik, kermelkon ento 7atta t2ãmno. 2oumo nrou7 la-3ando!"
2al Touma el-moula2ab bel-tawm la-be2e el-tlemiz: "ta3o nrou7 ne7na kamen nmout ma3o!"
Lamma wossil YASOU3 le2a Li3azar bel-2abr min arba3 tiyem.
W-Beyt-3anya b3ide 3an Ourashalim shi mileyn (ye3ne shi tlete kilometre).
Keno ktar min el-Yahoud ejo la-3and Marta w-Maryam 7atta y3azzouwon bi-khayyon.
Lamma sem3it Marta enno YASOU3 jeye tol3it la-testa2eblo, w-be2yet Maryam bel-beyt.
2alet Marta la-YASOU3: "law kent hon, ya Rab, ma ken met khayye!
Bass kellne thi2a enno ALLAH bya3tik kell yalle btetolbo minno."
2alla YASOU3: "ra7 y2oum khayyik."
Jewabet: "ba3rif enno ra7 y2oum bel-2iyeme, bel-yawm el-akhir."
2alla YASOU3: "ana houe el-2iyeme wel-7ayet. Yalle bi2ãmen fiyye bi3ish 7atta law met.
W-kell meen bi3ish w-houe m2ãmen fiyye ma bimout abadan. Bit2ãmne bi-hal shi?"
Jewabet: "na3am, ya Rab. Ana b2ãmen kell el-imen bi-ennak enta el-MASI7 2eben ALLAH el-jeye 3al-3alam."
W-rej3et Marta, min ba3d ma 2alet hal-kalem, la-3and ekhta Maryam 7atta tnedya, washwasheta w-2aletla: "el-mou3allim hon, w-houe 3am yetolbik."
2amet Maryam lamma sem3it hal-khabar w-rakadet la-3and YASOU3.
W-ma ken YASOU3 wossil 3al-day3a, ken ba3do matra7 ma sta2baleto Marta.
W-lamma shefo el-Yahoud yalle keno bel-beyt ma3 Maryam 3am bi3azzouwa enna 2amet w-tol3it bi-ser3a, le7'2ouwa w-henne mfakkrina enno ray7a 3al-2abr la-tebke.
W-wosslit Maryam la-3and YASOU3, w-shi enna shefeto, raka3et 3end ejrey w-2aletlo: "law kent hon, ya Rab, ma ken met khayye!"
Lamma shefa YASOU3 3am tebke w-3am yebko ma3a el-Yahoud yalle mref2ina, wej3o 2albo w-t2assar ktir,
w-2al: "wayn dafantouh?" 2alo: "ta3a, ya Rab, w-shouf."
W-beke YASOU3,
2alo el-Yahoud: "ettalla3o, addeysh ken y7ebbo!"
Bass fi minnon 2alo: "hayda yalle fata7 3youn el-a3ma, ma ken bye2dar yredd el-mawt 3an Li3azar?"
W-YASOU3 wej3o 2albo marra tenye w-eja 3al-2abr. W-ken el-2abr mghara w-fi 7ajar 3al-madkhal,
2al YASOU3: "zee7o el-7ajar!" jewabet Marta, ekhet el-mayyit: "tol3it ree7to ya Rab, sarlo bel-2abr arba3 tiyem."
2alla YASOU3: "ma 2eltellik eza 2ãmante ra7 tshoufe majd ALLAH?"
Ze7o el-7ajar, w-rafa3 YASOU3 3youno w-2al: "beshekrak ya bayye, li2annak sme3telle.
W-ana ba3rif ennak btesma3le bi-kell wa2et. Bass 3am 2oul hal-shi kermel hal-nes 7awle, 7atta y2ãmno ennak enta ba3attne."
W-sarakh bi-sawt 3ale: "Li3azar, tla3!"
Toli3 el-mayyit 2idey w-ejrey mashdoudin bel-kafan, w-wejjo malfouf bi-mandil. 2allon YASOU3: "fekkouh w-khallouh yrou7."
W-lamma shefo el-Yahoud yalle ejo la-3and Maryam yalle 3emlo YASOU3, 2ãmano fih ktar minnon.
Bass fi jame3a minnon ra7o la-3and el-ferrisiyyin w-khabbarouwon bi-yalle 3emlo.
W-jtama3o rou2asa el-kahane wel-ferrisiyyin w-2alo: "shou mna3mil? Hayda el-rejjel 3am ya3mil ktir 3ajeyeb.
Eza tarakneh 2ãmano fih kell el-nes, w-byejo el-Rouman w-bikharbo haykalna w-sha3bna."
2al wa7ad minnon, w-houe Kayafa yalle ken ra2is el-kahane bi-haydik el-sene: "ento ma bta3erfo shi,
w-ma btefhamo enno mawt rejjel wa7ad kermel el-sha3b a7sanelkon min enno ymout el-sha3b kello?"
W-ma 2al Kayafa hal-kalem min 3endo, 2alo li2anno ken ra2is el-kahane bi-haydik el-sene, w-hek tnabba enno YASOU3 ra7 ymout kermel el-sha3b.
Mish bass kermel el-sha3b, bimout ta-yejma3 wled ALLAH.
W-2arraro min haydak el-yawm ye2etlo YASOU3.
W-ma ba2a bayyan YASOU3 bayn el-Yahoud, ra7 min honik 3a-matra7 2arib min el-sa7ra, la-madine esma Efrayem, w-be2e fiya ma3 tlemizo.
W-2arrab 3id el-fos7 3end el-Yahoud, w-tel3o ktar min ahl el-diya3 3ala Ourashalim 7atta yettaharo abl el-fos7.
W-keno 3am bifattsho 3an YASOU3 w-yes2alo ba3don bel-haykal: "shou awlkon? Ra7 yeje 3al-3id aw la2?"
W-keno rou2asa el-kahane wel-ferrisiyyin 2amaro enno kell meen bya3rif wayno enno ykhabbir 3anno ta-yekemshouh.
Abl el-fos7 bi-sitt tiyem, eja YASOU3 3ala Beyt-3anya w-nezl 3end Li3azar yalle 2awwamo min el-mawt.
W-7addarlo 3asha, w-saret Marta tekhdom, w-ken Li3azar wa7ad min el-2e3deen ma3o 3al-2akl.
W-akhadet Maryam 2anninet 3otr ghale ktir min el-nardin el-m2attar, w-sakabeto 3ala ejren YASOU3 w-masa7eton bi-sha3ra. W-ntala el-beyt min ree7et el-3otr,
2al Yahouza el-Eskharyoute, wa7ad min tlemizo, w-houe yalle ra7 ysallmo:
"Ma ken a7san law nbe3 hal-3otr bi-tlet miyyet dinar ta-yetwazza3 3al-fou2ara?"
2al hal-shi mish li2anno bi7ebb el-fou2ara, 2al hek li2anno ken loss w-ken ameen el-sandou2, 3am yesro2 kell shi byen7att fih.
2al YASOU3: "troukouwa! Hal-3otr 7afazeto la-yawm dafne.
El-fou2ara 3endkon bi-kell wa2et, bass ana ma bkoun 3endkon bi-kell wa2et."
3erfo nes ktir min el-Yahoud enno YASOU3 bi-Beyt-3anya fa-ejo, mish kermelo wa7do bass, bass ejo ta-yshoufo Li3azar yalle 2awwamo min el-mawt.
W-tshewaro rou2asa el-kahane ta-ye2etlo Li3azar kamen,
li2anno, bi-sababo, ktar min el-Yahoud saro yeterkouwon w-y2ãmno bi-YASOU3.
W-tene yawm, sem3o el-nes yalle ejo 3al-3id enno YASOU3 jeye 3ala Ourashalim.
7emlo aghsan el-nakhl w-tel3o ta-yesta2blouh w-henne 3am bihayyso: "el-majd la-ALLAH! Yetberak el-jeye bi-esm el-RAB! Yetberak malik Isra2il!"
W-le2a YASOU3 ja7sh, rekb 3le, metl ma nkatab bel-kteb:
"Ma tkhafe ya benet Sehyoun: hayda malikik jeye la-3andik, rekib 3ala ja7sh 2eben 7mar."
W-ma fehmo el-tlemiz bi-haydak el-wa2et shou ma3na hayda kello. Bass tzakkaro, min ba3d ma tmajjad YASOU3, enno nkatab 3anno hal-shi, w-enno el-nes 3emlo hal-eshya kermelo.
W-keno el-nes yalle refa2o YASOU3 lamma talla3 Li3azar min el-2abr w-2awwamo min el-mawt, 3am yesh'hadoulo bi-hal-shi.
W-tol3o el-nes yesta2eblouh li2anno sem3o enno 3eml haydik el-3ajibe.
W-2alo el-ferrisiyyin bayn ba3don: "shefto keef ento ma btenfa3o la-shi. El-3alam kello 3am yel7a2o!"
W-ken fi, bayn el-nes yalle tel3o 3ala Ourashalim lal-3ibede bi-iyem el-3id, kamm Younene.
Ejo la-3and Filippos, yalle ken min Beyt-Sayda bel-Jaleel. W-2aloulo: "ya Rab, badna nshouf YASOU3."
Ra7 Filippos w-khabbar Endrawos, w-ra7o Filippos w-Endrawos w-khabbaro YASOU3.
Jewabon YASOU3: "ejet el-se3a yalle byetmajjad fiya 2eben el-2ensen.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: eza am wa2a3it 7abbit el-2am7 bel-ard w-metit, bteb2a wa7eede. W-eza metit talla3et 7boub ktir.
Yalle bi7ebb nafso byekhsara, w-yalle byenkor nafso bi-hal-3alam bye7faza lal-7ayet el-abadiyye.
Yalle baddo yekhdemne, yel7a2ne, w-matra7 ma bkoun ana bikoun khadime. W-yalle byekhdemne bikarrmo el-Ãb.
Halla2 nafse medterbe, shou badde 2oul? Ya bayye, najjine min hal-se3a? Bass ana kermel hayde hal-se3a jeet.
Ya bayye, majjid esmak!" 2al sawt min el-sama: "majjadto w-ra7 majjdo!"
W-sem3ouh el-mawjoudin, w-2alo: "hayda ra3d!" W-fi ghayron 2alo: "7ekeh malèk!"
2al YASOU3: "ma ken hal-sawt kermele, ken kermelkon.
Liom deynounet hayda el-3alam. W-liom byensha7at sayyid hayda el-3alam.
W-ana lamma ra7 enrefe3 3an hal-ard, ra7 ejzob ele el-nes kellon."
2al hal-shi ta-ydell 3ala el-mawte yalle ra7 ymouta.
Jewabo el-nes: "3allametna el-shari3a enno el-MASI7 bidall lal-abad. Fa-keef 3am t2oul: la-bodd min enno 2eben el-2ensen yenrafa3? Meen houe 2eben el-2ensen hayda?"

2allon YASOU3: "el-nour be2e ma3kon wa2et alil, mshou ma zel el-nour 3am bidawwilkon, 7atta ma tfeje2kon el-3atme. W-yalle byemshe bel-3atme ma bya3rif la-wayn raye7. 2ãmno bel-nour, ma zel el-nour ma3kon, w-bitkouno wled el-nour."
Min ba3d ma 2allon YASOU3 hal-kalem, ma 3edo shefouh.
W-ma3 enno 3emellon kell hal-3ajeyeb, ma 2ãmano fih,
w-hek bikoun t7a'2a2 yalle 2alo el-nabe Ashe3ya: "ya RAB, meen yalle ãman bi-kalemna? W-la meen zaharet 2id el-RAB?"
W-ma edro y2ãmno fih, li2anno Ashe3ya 2al kamen:
"3amelon ALLAH 3younon w-2asselon 2loubon, 7atta ma yshoufo bi-3younon w-yefhamo bi-2loubon w-ytoubo ta-yeshfiyon."
2al Ashe3ya hal-kalem li2anno shef majdo w-3anno houe ken 3am ye7ke.
Bass ktar min rou2asa el-Yahoud 2ãmano bi-YASOU3, bidoun ma ye3elno imenon bi-sabab el-ferrisiyyin, 7atta ma yentsha7ato min el-majma3.
Faddalo rida el-nes 3ala rida ALLAH.
W-3alla YASOU3 sawto, w-2al: "yalle bi2ãmen fiyye ma bi2ãmen fiyye ana, bi2ãmen bi-yalle ba3atne.
W-yalle shefne shef yalle ba3atne.
Jeet ta-koun nour lal-3alam, yalle bi2ãmen fiyye ma bikoun bel-3atme,
w-yalle byesma3 kaleme w-ma bi2ãmen fih ma bdeeno, li2anno ma jeet ta-deen el-3alam, jeet ta-khallis el-3alam.
Yalle byerfodne w-ma bye2bal kaleme, elo meen bideeno. El-kalem yalle 2elto bideeno bel-yawm el-akhir,
li2anno ma 7kit bi-shi min 3ende, bass el-Ãb yalle ba3atne wassane shou 2oul w-shou e7ke.
Ana ba3rif enno wassiyto 7ayet abadiyye. El-kalem yalle 3am 2oulo, b2oulo metl ma 2alle yeh el-Ãb."
Ken YASOU3 bya3rif, abl 3id el-fos7, enno se3to ejet ta-yente2el min hal-3alam lal-Ãb, w-houe yalle 7abb jame3to yalle bel-3alam, 7abbon el-7obb kello.
W-2a3ad 3al-3asha ma3 tlemizo. W-ken eblees 7att el-weswes bi-Yahouza 2eben Sem3an el-Eskharyoute enno ysallim YASOU3.
W-ken YASOU3 bya3rif enno el-Ãb 7att kell shi bayn 2idey, w-enno eja min 3end ALLAH w-la-3and ALLAH ra7 yerja3.
2am 3an el-3asha w-shel mashla7o w-akhad manshafe w-7atta 3a-khasro,
min ba3da sabb may bel-tosht w-ballash yghassil ejren el-tlemiz w-yemsa7on bel-manshafe yalle 7atta 3a-khasro.
W-lamma 2arrab min Sem3an Boutros, 2allo Sem3an: "ya Rab, enta 3am bitghasselle ejreyye?"
Jewabo YASOU3: "enta halla2 ma 3am tefham yalle 3am ba3emlo, bass ra7 tefham ba3den."
2allo Boutros: "mish ra7 tghasselle ejrayye abadan." Jewabo YASOU3: "eza kent ma ra7 ghassellak ejrek, ma ra7 ykoun elak nasib ma3e."
2allo Sem3an Boutros: "fa-ezan ya Rab, mish bass ejreyye, ghasselle 2ideyye w-rase."
2allo YASOU3: "yalle t7ammam bikoun kello ndeef, ma bi3ouz yghassil ella ejrey. Ento ndaf, bass mish kellkon."
2al YASOU3: "mish kellkon ndaf", li2anno ken bya3rif meen ra7 ysallmo.
W-lamma ghassal ejreyon w-lebs mashla7o w-reje3 3al-meyde 2allon: "fhemto shou 3meltelkon?
Ento bitsammoune mou3allim w-sayyid, w-hayda shi mazbout li2anno ana hek.
W-eza kent ana el-sayyid wel-mou3allim ghassalit ejreykon, ento kamen ghasslo ejren ba3dkon.
W-ana 3titkon matal ta-ta3mlo metl ma ana 3melt.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: ma fi khadim a3zam min sayyido, wala rasoul a3zam min yalle ba3ato.
W-halla2 3refto hal-7a2i2a, niyyelkon eza 3melto fiya.
Ma 3am 2oul hal-shi 3annkon kellkon, Ana ba3rif yalle na'2ayton. Bass yalle nkatab bel-ketob el-m2addase lezim ysir, w-houe: enno yalle akal min khebzete tmarrad 3leyye.
3am khabberkon bi-hal-shi halla2 abl ma ysir, 7atta lamma ysir t2ãmno enno ana houe.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: yalle bye2bal yalle beb3aton bye2balne. W-yalle bye2balne bye2bal yalle ba3atne."
