Lamma 2al hal-kalem, edtarabet nafs YASOU3 w-2al bi-woudou7 lal-kell: "b2elkon el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: wa7ad minkon ra7 ysallimne!"
W-ettalla3o el-tlemiz bi-ba3don met7ayyrin mish 3arfin meen 3am ye2sod bi-kalemo.
W-ken wa7ad min el-tlemiz, w-houe yalle bi7ebbo YASOU3, 2e3id 7addo.
Wemelo Sem3an Boutros w-2allo: "s2alo meen bye3ne bi-kalemo."
Mel el-telmiz 3ala sadr YASOU3 w-sa2alo: "meen houe ya Rab?"
Jewabo YASOU3: "houe yalle ra7 newlo el-le2me yalle ra7 eghmesa bel-jat!" W-ghamas YASOU3 le2me w-rafa3a w-newal Yahouza 2eben Sem3an el-Eskharyoute.
W-lamma tnewala fet el-shaytan fih. W-2allo YASOU3: "3mol yalle enta jeye ta3emlo w-ma tet2akhar."
W-ma fehem 7ada min el-2e3deen 3al-meyde leysh 2al hal-kalem.
W-ken Yahouza ameen el-sandou2, w-fakkaro enno YASOU3 wassah enno yeshtere shi 3ayzino lal-3id, aw wassah enno ya3te el-fou2ara shi.
W-tnewal Yahouza el-le2me w-dahar deghre. W-ken leyl.
W-lamma dahar Yahouza 2al YASOU3: "halla2 tmajjad 2eben el-2ensen w-tmajjad ALLAH fih.
W-eza ken ALLAH tmajjad fih, ALLAH ra7 ymajjdo bi-zeto, w-ba3d shwey ra7 ymajjdo.
Ya wlede, ra7 eb2a ma3kon wa2et alil. Ra7 tetolboune, bass yalle 2elto lal-Yahoud b2oulo halla2 elkon: matra7 ma ana raye7 ma bte2daro ento tejo.
Ba3tikon wassiye jdide: 7ebbo ba3dkon. W-metl ma ana 7abbaytkon 7ebbo ento ba3dkon.
Eza 7abbayto ba3dkon, bya3erfo kell el-nes ennkon tlemize."
2allo Sem3an Boutros: "la-wayn raye7 ya Rab?" Jewabo YASOU3: "matra7 ma ana raye7 ma bte2dar halla2 ennak tel7a2ne, bass ra7 tel7a2ne bi-yawm min el-iyem."
2allo Boutros: "leysh ma be2dar el7a2ak halla2, ya Rab? Ana mist3ed enno mout kermelak!"
Jewabo YASOU3: "enta mist3ed enno tmout kermele? B2elkon el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: abl ma ysi7 el-deek bitkoun nakaretne tlet marrat."
Ma tkhallo 2loubkon te2la2. Ento bit2ãmno bi-ALLAH, 2ãmno fiyye kamen.
Bi-beyt bayye matare7 ktire, wa-ella ma kent 2eltelkon: ana raye7 ta-7adderelkon matra7.
W-lamma ra7 rou7 w-7adderelkon matra7, berja3 w-bekhedkon la-3ande ta-tkouno matra7 ma bkoun.
Ento bta3erfo el-tari2 la-wayn ana raye7."
2allo Touma: "ya Rab, ne7na ma mna3rif la-wayn raye7, keef badna na3rif el-tari2?"
Jewabo YASOU3: "ana houe el-tari2 wel-7a2 wel-7ayet, ma byeje 7ada lal-Ãb ella min khilele.
Law kento 3reftoune kento 3refto bayye kamen. W-min halla2 ento bta3erfouh, w-sheftouh."
2allo Filippos: "ya Rab, farjina el-Ãb w-byekfina."
2allo YASOU3: "ana ma3kon kell hal-wa2et, w-ba3d ma 3refetne ya Filippos? Yalle shefne shef el-Ãb, keef bit2oul: farjina el-Ãb?
Ma bit2ãmen enno ana bel-Ãb w-enno el-Ãb fiyye? El-kalem yalle 3am 2oulo ma 3am 2oulo min 3ende, wel-a3mel yalle ba3mela bya3mela el-Ãb yalle houe fiyye.
Sadd2oune eza 2elt: ana bel-Ãb wel-Ãb fiyye, aw-sadd2oune kermel a3mele.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: yalle bi2ãmen fiyye bya3mil el-a3mel yalle ba3mela, w-bya3mil a3zam minna, li2anno ana raye7 la-3and el-Ãb,
kell shi btetolbouh bi-esme ba3emlo, 7atta yetmajjad el-Ãb bel-2eben.
Eza talabto minne shi bi-esme ba3emlo.
Eza kento bit7ebboune bta3emlo metl ma wassaytkon.
W-ra7 etlob min el-Ãb enno ya3tikon mou3azze tene byeb2a ma3kon lal-abad.
W-houe ROU7 el-7a2 yalle ma bye2dar el-3alam enno ye2balo, li2anno ma bishoufo w-ma bya3erfo. Bass ento bta3erfouh, li2anno houe ma3kon w-fikon.
Ma ra7 etrekkon yatema, ra7 erja3 la-3andkon.
Ba3d shwey ma ra7 yshoufne el-3alam, bass ento ra7 tshoufoune. W-li2anno ana 7ayy, ento kamen ra7 t3isho.
W-bi-haydak el-yawm bta3erfo enno ana bi-bayye, w-ennkon ento fiyye metl ma ana fikon.
Yalle bye2bal el-wassaya taba3e w-bya3mil fiya bi7ebbne. W-yalle bi7ebbne bi7ebbo bayye, w-ana b7ebbo w-beksheflo 3an 7ale."
2allo Yahouza, mish Yahouza el-Eskharyoute: "ya Rab, keef btekshof 3an 7alak elna w-ma btekshof lal-3alam?"
Jewabo YASOU3: "yalle bi7ebbne byesma3 kaleme w-bi7ebbo bayye, w-mneje la-3ando w-mneskon 3endo.
W-yalle ma bi7ebbne ma byesma3 kaleme. W-kaleme mish min 3ende, kaleme min 3end el-Ãb yalle ba3atne.
2eltelkon hayda kello w-ana ma3kon.
Bass el-mou3azze, w-houe el-ROU7 el-2ODOS yalle byeb3ato el-Ãb bi-esme, ra7 y3allimkon kell shi w-bikhallikon tetzakkaro kell shi 2eltelkon yeh.
Betrekelkon el-salem, w-ba3tikon saleme, mish metl ma bya3tih el-3alam ba3tikon yeh ana. Ma tkhallo 2loubkon te2la2 w-ma tkhafo.
2eltelkon: Ana raye7 w-ra7 erja3 la-3andkon, eza kento bit7ebboune fre7to bi-enno raye7 la-3and el-Ãb, li2anno el-Ãb a3zam minne.
Khabbaretkon bi-hayda kello abl ma ysir, 7atta wa2et ysir t2ãmno.
Ma ra7 e7kikon ba3d ktir, li2anno sayyid hal-3alam ra7 yeje. W-ma elo soultan 3leyye,
bass lezim ya3rif el-3alam enno ana b7ebb el-Ãb w-enno ba3mil bi-yalle wassane yeh el-Ãb. 2oumo nfell min hon.
"Ana el-karme el-7a2i2iyye w-bayye el-kerram.
Kell ghosn ma bye7mol thamar bye2ta3o, wel-ghosn yalle bye7mol thamar bina'2ih ta-ye7mol ba3d aktar.
Ento halla2 an2iya bi-fadl el-kalem yalle 2eltelkon yeh.
Thbato fiyye w-ana fikon. W-metl ma el-ghosn ma bye7mol thamar minno la-7alo ella eza thabat bel-karme, hek ento kamen: ma ra7 te7emlo thamar ella eza thabatto fiyye.
Ana el-karme w-ento el-aghsan: yalle byethbat fiyye w-ana fih bye7mol thamar ktir. Bass bidoune ma bte2daro 3ala shi.
Yalle ma byethbat fiyye byenkabb metl el-ghosn w-byibas. Wel-aghsan el-yebse btenjama3 w-btenkabb bel-nar ta-te7tere2.
Eza thabatto fiyye w-thabat kaleme fikon, btetolbo yalle badkon yeh w-btekhdouh.
Hek bayye byetmajjad: lamm te7emlo thamar ktir w-tkouno tlemize.
Ana b7ebkon metl ma 7abbne el-Ãb, thbato bi-ma7abbte.
Eza 3melto bel-wassaya taba3e btethbato bi-ma7abbte, metl ma ana 3melt bi-wassaya bayye w-thabatet bi-ma7abbto.
2eltelkon hayda ta-yddall fara7e fikon, w-ykoun fara7kon kemil.
Hayde hiye wassiyte: 7ebbo ba3dkon metl ma ana 7abbeytkon.
Ma fi 7obb a3zam min hayda: enno yda77e el-2ensen bi-nafso kermel yalle bi7ebbon.
W-ana b7ebbkon eza 3melto bi-yalle bwassikon fih.
Ana ma bsammikon 3abeed min ba3d liom, li2anno el-3abd ma bya3rif shou bya3mil sayyido, bsammikon a7ebbe2e, li2anno khabbaretkon bi-kell shi sme3to min bayye.
Ento ma na'2aytoune, ana na'2aytkon w-3ayyantkon ta-trou7o w-te7emlo thamar w-ydall thamarkon, fa-bya3tikon el-Ãb kell yalle btetolbouh bi-esme.
W-hayda yalle bwassikon fih: enkon t7ebbo ba3dkon.
Eza baghadkon el-3alam, tzakkaro enno baghadne ele abl ma yobghedkon.
Law kento min hal-3alam, ken el-3alam 7abkon metl ahlo. W-li2anno na'2aytkon min hal-3alam w-ento mish minno, kermel hek baghadkon el-3alam.
Tzakkaro yalle 2eltelkon yeh: ma fi khadim a3zam min sayyido. Eza edtahadoune ra7 yedtehdoukon, w-eza sem3o kaleme byesma3o kalemkon.
Henne bya3emlo fikon kell hal-shi kermel esme, li2anno ma bya3erfo yalle ba3atne.
Law ma jeet w-7kitkon, ken ma fi 3leyon khatiyye. Bass halla2, ma ba2a 3endon 3ezr 3an khatiyyeton.
Yalle byobghedne byobghod bayye.
Law ma 3melt bayneton hal-a3mel yalle ma 3eml metla 7ada, ma ken 3leyon khatiyye. Bass henne halla2 shefo, w-ma3 hayda w-kello baghadoune w-baghado bayye.
W-hal-shi sar la-yet7a'2a2 yalle nkatab bi-shari3eton: baghadoune bidoun sabab.
W-lamma ra7 yeje el-mou3azze yalle ra7 eb3atelkon yeh min el-Ãb, ROU7 el-7a2 el-jeye min el-Ãb, houe ra7 yesh'hadle.
W-ento kamen ra7 tesh'hado, li2annkon min el-awwal ma3e.
"2eltelkon hal-kalem 7atta ma yetza3za3 imenkon.
Ra7 yesh7atoukon min el-majeme3, w-ra7 teje se3a bifakkir fiya yalle bye2telkon enno 3am ye3bad ALLAH.
W-ra7 3am ya3emlo hek li2anno ma bya3erfo bayye w-ma bya3erfoune.
B2elkon hal-shi, 7atta eza ejet el-se3a btetzakkaro enno 2eltelkon yeh. Ma 2eltelkon hek min el-awwal li2anno kent ma3kon.
Bass halla2 ana raye7 la-3and yalle ba3atne, w-ma 7ada minkon ra7 yes2alne: la-wayn raye7?
W-lamma 2eltelkon hal-shi, el-7ezn malla 2loubkon.
Sadd2oune, a7sanlkon enno rou7, eza kent ma ra7 rou7 ma ra7 yeje el-mou3azze. Bass eza ro7t beb3atelkon yeh.
W-lamma ra7 yeje ra7 ykhajjil el-3alam 3al-khatiyye wel-berr wel-deynoune:
3al-khatiyye li2annon ma 2ãmano fiyye,
3al-berr li2anno raye7 la-3and el-Ãb w-ma ra7 tshoufoune,
w-3al-deynoune li2anno sayyid hal-3alam t7ekam w-n7akam 3le.
3ende 7ake ktir ba3d badde 2elkon yeh, bass ma bte2daro halla2 enno tet7ammalouh.
W-lamma ra7 yeje ROU7 el-7a2 ra7 yershedkon 3al-7a2 kello, li2anno ma bye7ke bi-shi min 3endo, bye7ke bi-yalle byesma3o, bikhabberkon bi-yalle 3am bisir.
Ra7 ymajjedne li2anno byekhod kaleme w-bi2elkon yeh.
Kell shi 3endo yeh el-Ãb houe ele kamen, kermel hek 2eltelkon: byekhod kaleme w-bi2elkon yeh.
Ba3d shwey ma ra7 tshoufoune, w-min ba3da ra7 tshoufoune."
2alo el-tlemiz la-ba3don: "shou hayda yalle 3am bi2elna yeh: ba3d shwey ma ra7 tshoufoune, w-min ba3da ra7 tshoufoune. Ana raye7 la-3and el-Ãb?"
Sa2alo ba3don: "shou ye3ne ba3d shwey? Ma 3am nefham shou 3am bi2oul."
W-3eref YASOU3 ennon baddon yes2alouh, 2allon: "3am tes2alo 7alkon 3an ma3na kaleme: ba3d shwey ma bitshoufoune, w-min ba3da ra7 tshoufoune.
B2elkon el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: ra7 tebko w-tenedbo, bass el-3alam ra7 yefra7. Ra7 te7zano, bass 7ezenkon ra7 yet7awwal fara7.
El-mara bte7zan hiye w-3am bitwallid, li2anno se3eta ejet. Bass lamma twallid btensa awje3a, li2anno btefra7 bi-wiledit 2ensen bel-3alam.
Kermel hek ento halla2 ra7 te7zano, bass ra7 erja3 shoufkon, w-se3eta btefra7 2loubkon fara7 ma 7ada byekhdo minkon.
W-bi-haydak el-yawm ma ra7 tetolbo minne shi. B2elkon el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: kell shi btetolbouh min el-Ãb bi-esme ra7 ya3tikon yeh.
W-ma talabto shi bi-esme la-7add halla2. Tlobo byen3atalkon, w-byektemil fara7kon.
"2eltelkon hayda kello bel-amtel. W-bteje se3a ma be7kikon fiya bel-amtel, be7kikon 3an el-Ãb bi-kalem wade7.
W-bi-haydak el-yawm ento btetolbo min el-Ãb bi-esme, w-ma b2elkon enno ana betlob min el-Ãb 3annkon.
El-Ãb bi-nafso bi7ebbkon, li2annkon 7abbeytoune w-2ãmanto bi-enno tlo3t min 3end ALLAH.
Tlo3t min 3end el-Ãb w-jeet 3al-3alam w-ra7 erja3 la-3and el-Ãb."
2aloulo tlemizo: "enta halla2 3am te7kina kalem wade7, mish bel-amtel.
W-3am nshouf halla2 ennak bta3rif kell shi, w-ennak mish bi-7aje enno yes2alak 7ada 3an shi. Kermel hek min2ãmin bi-ennak jeet min 3end ALLAH."
Jewabon YASOU3: "halla2 ento 3am bit2ãmno.
Bteje se3a, w-ejet halla2, btetfarra2o fiya, birou7 kell wa7ad bi-tari2o w-bteterkoune wa7de. Bass ma bkoun wa7de, li2anno el-Ãb ma3e.
2eltelkon hayda kello ta-fiyye ana tle2o el-salem. Ra7 t3ano ktir bi-hal-3alam, bass tshajja3o. Ana ghalabt el-3alam."
Min ba3d hal-kalem, rafa3 YASOU3 3youno lal-sama w-2al: "ya bayye ejet el-se3a: majjid 2ebnak ta-ymajjdak 2ebnak
bel-soultan yalle 3tito yeh 3ala kell el-bashar 7atta ya3te el-7ayet el-abadiyye la-kell yalle 3tito henne.
Wel-7ayet el-abadiyye hiye ennon ya3erfouk enta el-Ileh el-7a2 wa7dak w-ya3erfo YASOU3 el-MASI7 yalle ba3atto.
Ana majjadtak 3al-ard lamma 3melt el-3amal yalle kallaftne fih w-khallasto.
Majjedne enta 3endak halla2 ya bayye bel-majd yalle ken ele 3endak abl ma ykoun el-3alam.
Ana bayyanet esmak la-yalle 3titne henne min el-3alam. Keno elak, w-3titne henne w-3emlo bi-kalemak.
Halla2 henne bya3erfo enno kell shi 3titne yeh houe minnak.
Wassaltellon el-kalem yalle 2eltelle yeh, w-2eblouh w-3erfo mazbout enno ana jeet min 3endak w-2ãmano enno enta ba3attne.
W-ana bsalle kermelon, ma bsalle kermel el-3alam, bsalle kermel yalle 3titne henne li2annon elak.
Kell shi ele houe elak, w-kell shi elak houe ele, w-ana bitmajjad fiyon.
Ma ra7 eb2a bel-3alam bass henne be2yin bel-3alam, w-ana raye7 la-3andak. Ya bayye el-2ouddous, 7fazon bi-esmak yalle 3titne yeh, 7atta ykouno wa7ad metl ma enta w-ana wa7ad.
Lamma kent ana ma3on 7afazton bi-esmak yalle 3titne yeh. 7araston, w-ma khseret minnon wa7ad ella 2eben el-halek ta-yet7a'2a2 el-maktoub bel-kteb.
W-halla2 ana raye7 la-3andak. 3am 2oul hal-kalem w-ana bel-3alam ta-ykoun kell fara7e fiyon.
Wassaltellon kalemak fa-abghadon el-3alam li2anno henne mish min el-3alam metl ma ana mish min el-3alam.
Ma betlob minnak ennak tsheelon min el-3alam, bass betlob enno te7fazon min el-sherreer.
Henne mish min el-3alam. W-ana mish min el-3alam.
2addeson bel-7a2 li2anno kalemak 7a2.
Ana ba3atton 3al-3alam metl ma ba3attne enta 3al-3alam.
Kermelon b2addis nafse 7atta yet2addaso henne kamen bel-7a2.
Ma bsalle kermelon wa7don, bsalle kamen kermel yalle 2eblo kalemon w-2ãmano fiyye.
Khalliyon ykouno kellon wa7ad ta-ykouno wa7ad fina, ya bayye, metl ma enta fiyye w-ana fik, 7atta y2ãmen el-3alam ennak enta ba3attne.
W-ana 3titon el-majd yalle 3titne yeh ta-ykouno wa7ad metl ma enta w-ana wa7ad:
ana fiyon w-enta fiyye ta-tkoun wi7deton kemle w-ya3rif el-3alam ennak ba3attne w-ennak bit7ebbon metl ma bit7ebbne.
Enta 3titne henne, ya bayye, w-badde enno ykouno ma3e matra7 ma bkoun ta-yshoufo shou 3titne min el-majd li2annak 7abbeytne abl ma ykoun el-3alam.
Ma 3erfak el-3alam, ya bayye el-sale7, bass ana 3reftak w-3erfo hal-ashkhas enno enta ba3attne.
Bayyantellon esmak, w-ra7 bayyenlon yeh ta-tkoun fiyon el-ma7abbe yalle 7abbeytne hiye w-koun ana fiyon."
2al YASOU3 hal-kalem w-toli3 ma3 tlemizo, 2ata3 wede Kadroun w-ken fi honik besten, fet 3le houe w-tlemizo.
W-ken Yahouza yalle sallamo bya3rif hal-matra7, li2anno YASOU3 ken yejtemi3 fi ktir ma3 tlemizo.
Eja Yahouza la-honik ma3 3askar w-7aras mab3outin min rou2asa el-kahane wel-ferrisiyyin, w-keno 7amleen el-2nadil wel-mashe3el wel-sle7.
2arrab YASOU3 sawbon w-ken 3arif shou ra7 ysir ma3o w-2allon: "meen badkon?"
Jewabouh: "YASOU3 el-Nassire." 2allon: "ana houe." W-ken Yahouza yalle sallamo we2if ma3on.
W-lamma 2allon YASOU3: "ana houe", rej3o la-wara w-wa2a3o 3al-ard.
Sa2alon YASOU3 marra tenye: "meen badkon?" Jewabouh: "YASOU3 el-Nassire."
2allon YASOU3: "2eltelkon: ana houe. Eza yalle badkon yeh houe ana, khallo hal-ashkhas yfello."
W-hek t7a'2a2 yalle 2alo YASOU3: "ma khsert 7ada min yalle 3titne henne."
W-ken Sem3an Boutros 7amel seyf, akhado w-darab khadim ra2is el-kahane w-2ata3lo daynto el-yameen, w-ken esm el-khadim Malkhas.
2al YASOU3 la-Boutros: "redd seyfak 3a-matra7o! Ma baddak eshrab el-kes yalle 3atane hiye el-Ãb?"
Kamasho el-3askar wel-ka2ed w-7aras el-haykal YASOU3 w-rabbatouh
w-akhadouh awwal shi la-3and 7annan, w-houe 3ammo la-Kayafa ra2is el-kahane bi-haydik el-sene.
W-Kayafa houe yalle nasa7 el-Yahoud w-2al: "enno ymout rejjel wa7ad kermel el-sha3b a7sanelkon."
W-ken Sem3an Boutros w-telmiz tene le7'2in YASOU3. W-ken ra2is el-kahane bya3rif hal-telmiz, fa-fet 3a-dar ra2is el-kahane ma3 YASOU3.
Bass Boutros we2f barra 3al-beb. W-reje3 el-telmiz el-tene yalle bya3erfo ra2is el-kahane la-barra w-7eke ma3 el-benet yalle 3am te7ros el-beb w-fawwat Boutros.
2alet el-benet la-Boutros: "mish enta kamen min tlemiz hal-rejjel?" Jewaba Boutros: "ana mish minnon."
W-ken fi ktir bard, fa-walla3o el-kheddem wel-7aras nar w-saro yetdaffo, w-we2f Boutros yetdaffa ma3on.
W-sa2al ra2is el-kahane YASOU3 3an tlemizo w-ta3limo,
jewabo YASOU3: "ana 7kit eddem kell el-nes, w-3allamit deyman bel-majeme3 w-bel-haykal matra7 ma byejtem3o kell el-Yahoud, w-ma 2elt shi bel-serr.
Leysh 3am tes2alne? S2al yalle sem3oune 3an yalle 7kiton 3anno, henne bya3erfo shou 2elt."
Lamma 2al YASOU3 hal-kalem, darabo wa7ad min el-7aras ken 7addo kaff w-2allo: "hek 3am bitjewib ra2is el-kahane?"
Jewabo YASOU3: "eza kent ghlotit bel-7ake, 2elle wayn el-ghalat? W-eza kent 7kit mazbout, leysh 3am tedrobne?"
W-ba3ato 7annan mrabbat la-3and Kayafa ra2is el-kahane.
W-lamma ken Sem3an Boutros we2if honik 3am yetdaffa 2aloulo: "mish enta min tlemizo?" nakar w-2al: "ana mish minnon!"
W-2allo wa7ad min kheddem ra2is el-kahane, w-ken min 2raybin el-rejjel yalle 2ata3 Boutros daynto: "mish ana sheftak ma3o bel-besten?"
W-nakar kamen w-deghre sa7 el-deek.
Akhado YASOU3 min 3end Kayafa 3ala 2asr el-7akem. W-ken sob7. Bass el-Yahoud ma feto 3al-2asr 7atta ma yetnajjaso, li2anno ma bi3oud fiyon yeklo 3asha el-fos7.
W-toli3 la-3andon Bilatos w-sa2alon: "bi-shou btettehmo hal-rejjel?"
Jewabouh: "law mish mejrem, ma kenna sallamnek yeh."
2allon Bilatos: "khedouh ento w-7ekmouh bi-7asab shari3etkon." Jewabouh: "mish masmou7 3enna ne7kom 3ala 7ada bel-2atl."
W-t7a'2a2 yalle 2alo YASOU3 lamma 7eke 3al-mawte yalle ra7 ymouta.
W-reje3 Bilatos 3ala 2asr el-7akem w-neda YASOU3 w-2allo: "enta malik el-Yahoud?"
Jewabo YASOU3: "3am bit2oul hal-shi min 3endak, aw 2aloulak yeh el-be2yin?"
2al Bilatos: "shou ana Yahoude? Sha3bak w-rou2asa el-kahane sallamouk ele. Shou 3melt?"
Jewabo YASOU3: "mamlakte mish min hal-3alam. Law kenit mamlekte min hal-3alam, ken defa3 3anne 7errase 7atta ma etsallam lal-Yahoud. La2! mamlakte mish min hon."
2allo Bilatos: "fa-ezan, enta malik?" Jewabo YASOU3: "enta bit2oul enne malik. Ana wledet w-jeet 3ala hal-3alam 7atta esh'had lal-7a2. Yalle ken min wled el-7a2 byesma3 sawte."
2allo Bilatos: "shou houe el-7a2?" 2al hal-shi w-toli3 marra tenye la-3and el-Yahoud w-2allon: "ma 3am le2e sabab lal-7ekm 3le.
Bass el-3ade 3endkon bit2oul enno e3fe 3an ma7bous bi-3id el-fos7. Badkon e3fe 3an malik el-Yahoud?"
Sarakho: "ma te3fe 3an hayda, 3fih 3an Barabas." W-ken Barabas loss.
Akhad Bilatos YASOU3 w-2amar bi-jaldo.
W-gharaso el-3askar eklil min shawk 3a-raso, w-labbasouh tawb a7mar,
w-ltaffo 7awlo w-saro yedorbouh w-y2oulo: "Salem, ya malik el-Yahoud!"
W-reje3 Bilatos la-3and el-joumou3 w-2allon: "ana ra7 jeebo la-barra w-7otto eddemkon ta-ta3erfo enno ma l2it sabab lal-7ekm 3le."
W-toli3 YASOU3 w-eklil el-shawk 3a-raso w-lebis el-tawb el-a7mar, fa-2allon Bilatos: "hayda houe el-rejjel!"
W-lamma shefouh rou2asa el-kahane wel-7aras sarakho: "slebo! slebo!" 2allon Bilatos: "khedouh ento w-slebouh, ana ma 3am le2e sabab lal-7ekm 3le."
Jewabo el-Yahoud: "3enna shari3a, w-hal-shari3a bte7kom 3le bel-mawt li2anno 2al enno houe 2eben ALLAH."
W-lamma sem3 Bilatos kalemon hayda zed khawfo.
Fet 3al-2asr w-2al la-YASOU3: "min wayn enta?" Ma jewabo YASOU3 bi-shi.
2allo Bilatos: "ma ra7 tjewebne? Ma bta3rif enno 3ende soulta enno efeltak, w-soulta enno esolbak?"
Jewabo YASOU3: "ma fi elak soulta 3leyye, law ma akhadta min ALLAH. Bass yalle sallamne elak, khatiyyto a3zam min khatiyytak."
Jarrab Bilatos min ba3da enno yefelto, bass el-Yahoud saro ysarrkho: "eza falatto, ma bitkoun min asdika2 el-2aysar, li2anno yalle bi2oul enno houe malik bikoun 3adouw lal-2aysar!"
W-lamma sem3 Bilatos hal-kalem talla3 YASOU3 w-2a3ad 3ala kerse el-7ekm bi-matra7 esmo "el-balat", bel-3ebrane, Jabbatha.
W-ken hal-shi yawm el-jem3a, yawm el-to7dir lal-fos7, w-ken el-dohr. Fa-2al lal-Yahoud: "hayda houe malikkon!"
Sarakho: "2telo! 2telo! slebo!" 2allon Bilatos: "badkon eslob malikkon?" Jewabouh rou2asa el-kahane: "ma fi malik 3leyna ella el-2aysar!" W-sallamo elon ta-yesolbouh.
W-akhado YASOU3
toli3 houe w-7amel salibo 3ala-matra7 esmo el-Joumjouma, bel-3ebrane Jouljoutha.
W-salabouh honik w-salabo ma3o rejjelen, kell wa7ad min meyle, w-bayneton YASOU3.
W-3alla2 Bilatos 3al-salib law7a maktoub 3leya: "YASOU3 el-Nassire malik el-Yahoud."
W-2eryo ktar min el-Yahoud hal-law7a, li2anno el-matra7 yalle salabo fih YASOU3 ken 2arib min el-madine. W-kenit maktoube bel-3ebrane wel-Latine wel-Younene.
2alo rou2asa kahanet el-Yahoud la-Bilatos: "ma tektob: malik el-Yahoud, ktob: hal-rejjal 2al: ana malik el-Yahoud!"
Jewabon Bilatos: "yalle nkatab nkatab."
W-lamma salabo el-3askar YASOU3 akhado tyebo w-2asamouwa arba3 7osas, la-kell 3askare 7ossa. W-akhado 2amiso kamen w-ken sha2fe we7de w-mish mkhayyat khyata, maghzoul kello min fo2 la-ta7t.

Fa-2alo la-ba3don: "ma ra7 nkhazzi2 el-2amis, mna3mil 3le 2or3a, w-minshouf la-meen bikoun." W-t7a'2a2 el-maktoub bel-kteb: "t2asamo tyebe, w-3ala 2amise 3emlo 2or3a." W-hayda yalle 3emlouh el-3askar.
W-honik, 3a-salib YASOU3, we2fit emmo, w-ekhet emmo Maryam zawjet Kaloppa, w-Maryam el-Majdaliyye.
W-shef YASOU3 emmo w-7adda el-telmiz yalle YASOU3 bi7ebbo, 2al la-emmo: "ya hal-mara, hayda 2ebnik."
W-2al lal-telmiz: "hayde emmak." W-akhada el-telmiz 3ala beyto min haydik el-se3a.
W-shef YASOU3 enno kell shi t7a'2a2, w-2al: "ana 3etshan", 7atta ysir metl ma nkatab bel-kteb.
W-ken honik fi wa3a melyen khall, ghamaso fih sfenje w-7attouwa 3ala 2adib zoufa w-rafa3ouwa 3ala temmo.
W-lamma de2 YASOU3 el-khall 2al: "tamm kell shi." W-7ene raso w-sallam rou7o.

W-ken hal-shi yawm el-to7dir lal-sabt, talabo el-Yahoud min Bilatos enno ye2mor bi-kasr ejren el-masloubin w-enno ynazzil jesmon 3an el-salib 7atta ma yeb2o la-yawm el-sabt, w-khsouse enno hal-sabet houe yawm 3azeem.
Ejo el-3askar w-kasaro ejren el-masloubin ma3 YASOU3.
W-lamma weslo la-3and YASOU3 le2ouh mayyit, fa-ma kasaro ejrey.
Bass wa7ad min el-3askar ta3ano bi-7arbe bi-janbo, w-toli3 minno damm w-may.
W-yalle shef hal-shi byesh'had w-shahedto sa7i7a, w-bya3rif enno 3am bi2oul el-7a2 7atta t2ãmno metlo.
W-sar hayda ta-yet7a'2a2 shou 2al el-kteb: "ma ra7 yenkeser elo 3adm."
W-maktoub kamen: "ra7 yettalla3o 3ala yalle ta3anouh."
Min ba3d hal-shi eja Youssef el-Rami, w-ken telmiz YASOU3 bel-serr li2anno ken ykhaf min el-Yahoud, w-talab min Bilatos enno yekhod jesm YASOU3, w-sama7lo. Eja w-akhad jesm YASOU3.
W-eja Nikodimos, w-houe yalle ra7 la-3and YASOU3 bel-leyl min abl, w-ken jeyib ma3o khalta min el-morr wel-3oud.
Akhado jesm YASOU3 w-dahano 3le el-3otr w-laffouh bi-kafan, 7asab 3adet el-Yahoud bi-dafn mawtehon.
W-ken matra7 ma salabo YASOU3 fi besten, w-bel-besten 2abr jdid ma ndafan fih 7ada.
W-7atto YASOU3 fih li2anno el-2abr ken 2arib w-nhareta ken yawm el-to7dir 3end el-Yahoud.
W-yawm el-a7ad ejet Maryam el-Majdaliyye 3al-2abr bakkir, w-ken ba3do 3atme, shefit el-7ajar marfou3 3an el-2abr.
W-rakadet bi-ser3a la-3and Sem3an Boutros wel-telmiz el-tene yalle 7abbo YASOU3, w-2aletlon: "akhado el-RAB min el-2abr, w-ma mna3rif wayn 7attouh."
Toli3 Boutros wel-telmiz el-tene 3al-2abr,
w-meshyo bi-ser3a sawa. Bass el-telmiz el-tene saba2 Boutros, w-wossil ablo 3al-2abr.
W-n7ana bidoun ma yfout, w-shef el-kafan 3al-ard.
Le7'2o Sem3an Boutros, w-fet 3al-2abr. W-shef el-kafan 3al-ard,
wel-mandil yalle ken 3ala ras YASOU3 malfouf bi-matra7 3ala janab, mish ma7tout ma3 el-kafan.
W-fet el-telmiz el-tene yalle saba2 Boutros 3al-2abr, shef w-2ãman,
li2anno keno ba3d ma 3am yefhamo shou n2al bel-kteb w-houe enno YASOU3 lezim y2oum min el-mawt.
Min ba3da rej3o el-telmizen 3ala beyton.
Bass Maryam el-Majdaliyye, we2fit 3al-2abr 3am tebke. W-n7anet sawb el-2abr w-hiye 3am tebke.
W-shefit malèken bi-tyeb bayda 2e3deen matra7 ma ken jesm YASOU3, wa7ad minnon 3al-ras wel-tene 3al-ejren.
2aloula el-malèken: "leysh 3am tebke?" Jewabet: "akhado rabbe w-ma ba3rif wayn 7attouh!"
2alet hal-shi w-ltafatet waraha w-shefet YASOU3 we2if, w-ma 3erfit enno YASOU3.
2alla YASOU3: "leysh 3am tebke? W-meen baddik?" Fakkarit enno hayda el-jneynete, 2aletlo: "eza kent enta akhadto ya Rab, 2elle wayn 7attayto 7atta ekhdo."
2alla YASOU3: "ya Maryam." 3erfeto w-2aletlo bel-3ebrane: "rabbouni!" (ye3ne "ya mou3allim").
2alla YASOU3: "ma ted2arine, li2anno ma tlo3it ba3d la-3and el-Ãb, rou7e la-3and ekhewte w-2oulilon: ana tali3 la-3and bayye w-bayykon, Ilehe w-Ilehkon."
Rej3it Maryam el-Majdaliyye w-khabbarit el-tlemiz enno shefit el-RAB w-enno 2alla hal-kalem.
El-a7ad 3ashiye, keno el-tlemiz mejtem3in wel-bweb msakkara khayfin min el-Yahoud. Eja YASOU3 w-we2f bayneton w-2al: "ALLAH ma3kon."
W-farjehon 2idey w-janbo, w-fer7o el-tlemiz lamma shefo el-RAB.
2allon YASOU3 marra tenye: "ALLAH ma3kon! Metl ma ba3atne el-Ãb beb3atkon ana."
2al hal-shi w-nafakh bi-wejjon w-2allon: "khedo el-ROU7 el-2ODOS.
Yalle bteghefroulon khatayahon btenghafarlon, w-yalle btemna3o 3annon el-ghoufran byenmana3 3annon."
W-ken Touma, wa7ad min el-tlemiz el-tna3sh el-moula2ab bel-tawm, ghayib lamma eja YASOU3.
2aloulo el-tlemiz: "shefna el-RAB!" Jewabon: "ma bsaddi2 ella eza sheft athar el-msemir bi 2idey, w-7atteyt esba3e matra7 el-msemir w-2ideyye bi-janbo."
W-min ba3d tmen tiyem jtama3o el-tlemiz bel-beyt marra tenye, w-Touma ma3on, eja YASOU3 wel-bweb msakkara, we2f bayneton w-2al: "ALLAH ma3kon."
Min ba3da 2al la-Touma: "het esba3ak la-hon w-ettalla3 3ala 2ideyye, w-het 2idak w-7otta bi-janbe. W-ma tshekk min ba3d liom, bel-3aks 2ãmen!"
Jewabo Touma: "Rabbi w-Ilehe!"
2allo YASOU3: "2ãmanet ya Touma, li2annak shefetne. Niyyel yalle bi2ãmen bidoun ma yshouf."
W-3eml YASOU3 eddem tlemizo 3ajeyeb tenye mish mazkoura bi-hal-kteb.
Basss el-3ajeyeb el-mazkoura hon, hiye kermel t2ãmno bi-enno YASOU3 houe el-MASI7 2eben ALLAH. W-la-7atta eza 2ãmanto tekhdo bi-esmo el-7ayet.
W-zahar YASOU3 la-tlemizo marra tenye 3ala shatt bou7ayrit Tabarayya.
W-ken hal-shi wa2et yalle jtama3 Sem3an Boutros, w-Touma el-moula2ab bel-tawm, w-Nathana2il yalle houe min Kana el-Jaleel, w-wled Zabadi, w-telmizen ghayron min tlemiz YASOU3.
2allon Sem3an Boutros: "ana raye7 3al-sayd." 2aloulo: "w-ne7na ray7in ma3ak." Tel3o w-rekbo el-shakhtoura, bass bi-haydik el-leyle ma stado wala samke.
Wel-sob7 we2f YASOU3 3al-shatt, w-ma 3erfo el-tlemiz enno houe YASOU3.
2allon: "ya shabeb, ma3kon shi byettekal?" Jewabouh: "la2."
2allon: "kebbo el-shabake 3ala yameen el-shakhtoura w-betle2o samak." Kabbo el-shabake w-ma edro enno ytall3ouwa, la-ketrit el-samak yalle fiya.
2al el-telmiz yalle ken y7ebbo YASOU3 la-Boutros: "hayda el-RAB!" W-lamma sem3 Sem3an Boutros enno hayda el-RAB, lebs tawbo yalle ken shel7o, w-kabb 7alo bel-may.
W-ejo el-tlemiz el-be2yin bel-shakhtoura, 3am bijerro el-shabake wel-samak yalle fiya, w-keno b3ad 3an el-barr shi miteyn dre3 (ye3ne shi miyyet mitr).
W-lamma nezlo 3al-barr shefo jamr 3le samak, w-khebz.
2allon YASOU3: "heto min el-samak yalle tsayyadtouwon halla2."
Toli3 Sem3an Boutros 3al-shakhtoura w-jazab el-shabake 3al-barr w-kenit ntalet bi-miyye w-tleta-w-khamseen samke kbire, bidoun ma tetkhazza2 ma3 hal-3adad el-kbir.
2allon YASOU3: "ta3o kelo!" w-ma 7ada min el-tlemiz starja yes2alo meen enta, li2annon 3erfo enno el-RAB.
W-2arrab YASOU3, w-akhad el-khebz w-newalon, w-kamen newalon min el-samak.
Hayde marra telte zahar fiya YASOU3 la-tlemizo min ba3d 2iyemto min el-mawt.
W-min ba3d ma akalo, 2al YASOU3 la-Sem3an Boutros: "ya Sem3an 2eben Youna, bit7ebbne aktar min ma bi7ebboune el-kell?" Jewabo: "na3am, ya RAB. Enta bta3rif enno b7ebbak." 2allo: "r3a khwerife."
W-sa2alo marra tenye: "ya Sem3an 2eben Youna, bit7ebbne?" Jewabo: "na3am, ya RAB. Enta bta3rif enno b7ebbak." 2allo: "r3a khwerife."

W-sa2alo marra telte: "ya Sem3an 2eben Youna, bit7ebbne?" Ze3l Boutros li2anno YASOU3 sa2alo marra telte: bit7ebbne? 2allo: "ya RAB, enta bta3rif kell shi, w-bta3rif enno b7ebbak." 2allo YASOU3: "r3a khwerife."

B2elkon el-7a2i2a el-7a2i2a: kent, enta w-shabb, bitshedd zennarak bi-2idak w-trou7 matra7 ma baddak. Bass lamma betkhatyer ra7 tmedd 2idak w-ghayrak ysheddellak zennarak w-yekhdak matra7 yalle ma badak trou7."
Bi-hal-kalem lamma7 YASOU3 3al-mawte yalle ra7 ymouta Boutros, w-keef ra7 yetmajjad fiya ALLAH. Min ba3da 2allo: "l7a2ne."
W-ltafat Boutros, w-shef el-telmiz yalle ken y7ebbo YASOU3 meshe warahon, w-houe yalle mel 3ala sadr YASOU3 wa2et el-3asha w-2allo: "ya Rab, meen yalle ra7 ysallmak?"
W-lamma shefo Boutros 2al la-YASOU3: "ya RAB, w-hayda shou massiro?"
Jewabo YASOU3: "law ken badde enno ydall ta-kent rje3t, shou bye3nik? Enta l7a2ne!"
W-ntashar bayn el-ekhwe enno hal-telmiz ma ra7 ymout, ma3 enno YASOU3 ma 2al la-Boutros enno ma ra7 ymout, 2allo: "law ken badde enno ydall ta-kent rje3t, shou bye3nik?"
W-hayda el-telmiz houe yalle 3am shehed bi-hal-eshya w-kataba, w-ne7na mna3rif enno shahedto sa7i7a.
W-fi kamen eshya ktire 3emela YASOU3, law kataba 7ada bel-tofsil, be3te2id enno ma ken se3 el-3alam kello el-ketob yalle ra7 yenkatabo 3annon.
Katabet bi-ktebe el-awwal, ya Tawfilos, kell shi 3emlo YASOU3 w-3allamo min bideyet riselto
lal-yawm yalle toli3 fih 3al-sama, min ba3d ma 3ata bel-ROU7 el-2ODOS wassaya la-yalle khtaron rousl.
W-farjehon enno houe 7ayy bi-esbetet ktire, w-zaharlon 3ala mada arb3een yawm min ba3d ãlemo, w-7ekehon 3an malakout ALLAH.
W-lamma ken 3am yekol ma3on 2al: "ma tfello min Ourashalim, khallikon fiya natrin yalle wa3ad fih el-Ãb w-sme3touh minne:
You7anna 3ammad bel-may, bass ento ra7 tet3ammado bel-ROU7 el-2ODOS ba3d kamm yawm."
Sa2alo el-rousl YASOU3 lamma keno mejtem3in ma3o: "ya RAB, bi-hayda el-wa2et ra7 tredd el-melk la-Isra2il?"
Jewabon: "ma elkon ta3erfo el-aw2at wel-azmine yalle 7addada el-Ãb bi-soultano.
Bass el-ROU7 el-2ODOS byenzal 3leykon w-bya3tikon el-2ouwwe, w-bitkouno shouhoud ele bi-Ourashalim wel-Yahoudiye kella wel-Samira, w-kell el-ard."
W-lamma 2al YASOU3 hal-kalem toli3 3al-sama henne w-3am bishoufouh, w-ba3den ejet ghayme ghatteto w-ma ba2a edro yshoufouh.
Henne w-3am yettalla3o 3al-sama bayn ma ken 3am ybay3ed 3annon, zaharoulon rejjelen bi-tyeb bayda
w-2aloulon: "ya hal-Jaleeliyyin, shou bekon we2fin 3am tettalla3o 3al-sama? YASOU3 hayda yalle toli3 3al-sama ra7 yerja3 metl ma sheftouh raye7 3al-sama."
Rej3o el-rousl 3ala Ourashalim min el-jabal yalle esmo jabal el-Zeytoun, w-houe 2arib min Ourashalim, b3id kamm da2i2a mashe.

W-lamma feto 3al-madine tel3o 3ala gherfe fo2 el-beyt keno seknin fiya, w-henne Boutros w-You7anna, w-Ya3koub w-Endrawos, w-Filippos w-Touma, w-Bartelmawos w-Matta, w-Ya3koub 2eben 7alfa, w-Sem3an el-watane el-ghayour, w-Yahouza 2eben Ya3koub.
W-keno ydewmo kellon 3al-sala bi-2alb wa7ad, ma3 ba3d el-neswen w-Maryam emm YASOU3 w-ekhweto.
Bi-haydik el-iyem we2f Boutros bayn el-ekhwe, w-ken 3adad el-mawjoudin shi miyye w-3eshreen, w-2al:
"ya ekhwete, ken la-bodd enno ysir yalle tnabba 3anno el-ROU7 el-2ODOS bel-kteb men abl 3a-temm Daoud, enno Yahouza khalla 7alo ykoun dalil la-yalle kamasho YASOU3.
Ken wa7ad minna w-ken elo nasib ma3na bi-hal-khedme,
w-min ba3da shtara bi-taman el-jarime 7a2l, w-wa2a3 3ala raso w-nsha2 bel-noss, w-tol3it msarino kella la-barra.
W-3erfo bi-hal-shi sekken Ourashalim kellon, w-tsamma hal-7a2l bi-lougheton "7a2l Dama" ye3ne "7a2l el-damm."
Kteb el-Mazamir bi2oul: "khalle beyto ysir kharab, w-ma 7ada yeskon fih." W-bi2oul kamen: "w-khalle wazifto yekheda wa7ad tene."
"W-ne7na fi baynetna rjel refa2ouna kell el-medde yalle be2e fiya el-RAB YASOU3 ma3na,
min wa2et ma 3ammado You7anna lal-yawm yalle toli3 3al-sama, kermel hek lezim enna'2e wa7ad minnon ta-ykoun shehid ma3na 3ala 2iyemet YASOU3."
2addam el-ekhwe tnen minnon henne Youssef yalle bi2ouloulo Barsaba el-moula2ab Biyostos, w-Mattiyas.
Min ba3da sallo w-2alo: "ya RAB, enta bta3rif shou fi bel-2loub, kshefelna meen na'2eyt min bayn hal-rejjelen
la-y2oum bel-khedme wel-risele matra7 Yahouza yalle tarakon w-ra7 ta-yle2e massiro."
Min ba3da 3emlo 2or3a w-ejet el-2or3a 3ala Mattiyas, w-ndamm lal-rousl el-7da3sh.
W-lamma mara2 khamseen yawm, keno mejtem3in kellon bi-matra7 wa7ad,
w-toli3 min el-sama faj2a sawt metl ka2anna ree7 la-3asfe, w-malla el-beyt yalle keno fih.
W-zaharetlon lsenet ka2anna min nar, w-n2asamet 3an ba3da w-we2f 3ala kell wa7ad minnon lsen.
W-ntalo kellon min el-ROU7 el-2ODOS, w-saro ye7ko bi-loughat ghayr lougheton, 3ala 2add ma 3atahon el-ROU7 el-2ODOS ennon ye7ko.
W-ken fi bi-Ourashalim nes ta2eya min el-Yahoud ejo min kell belden el-ard.
W-lamma sar hayda el-sawt, jtama3o el-nes w-henne me7tarin, li2anno kell wa7ad minnon ken 3am yesma3on 3am ye7ko bi-loughto.
7taro w-t3ajjabo w-2alo: "mish hawde yalle 3am ye7ko henne kellon min el-Jaleel?
Keef 3am yesma3on kell wa7ad minna bi-loughet balado?
Ne7na min Barthiya w-Madiya w-3ilam w-Ma-Bayn-el-Nahren wel-Yahoudiye w-Kabadokya w-Bentos w-Ãsia
w-Farijiyya w-Bamfiliyya w-Masr w-nawe7e Libya yalle 7add Kayrin, w-Roumaniyyin seknin hon
w-Kretiyyin w-3arab, Yahoud w-ghayr Yahoud, w-ma3 hayda w-kello 3am nesma3on 3am ye7ko bi-loughetna 3an a3mel ALLAH el-3azeeme!"
W-keno kellon me7tarin madhoushin 3am bi2oulo la-ba3don: "shou ma3na hal-shi?"
Bass ghayron keno 3am yetmaskharo w-y2oulo: "sekro min el-nbeed."
We2f Boutros ma3 el-tlemiz el-7da3sh, w-3alla sawto w-2allon: "ya hal-Yahoud, w-ya kell el-seknin bi-Ourashalim, sma3o kaleme w-3rafo hal-shi:
hal-ashkhas mish sekranin metl ma ento mfakkrin, ba3da el-se3a tes3a el-sob7.
W-hal-shi manno ella yalle zakaro el-nabe You2il:
2al ALLAH: "bi-ekher el-iyem bfeed min ROU7E 3ala kell el-bashar, w-byetnabbo wledkon w-banetkon w-bishoufo shabebkon rou2a w-bye7lamo shyoukhkon a7lem.
W-3ala kheddeme, rjel w-newsen, bfeed min ROU7E bi-haydik el-iyem w-byetnabbo kellon.
W-ba3mil 3ajeyeb fo2 bel-sama w-ta7t 3al-ard: bitshoufo damm w-nar w-dekhan ktir,
w-bit3attim el-shams wel-2amar bisir damm abl ma yeje el-yawm el-7elo el-3azeem, yawm el-RAB.
W-yalle byed3e bi-esm el-RAB bile2e el-khalãs."
Ya wled Isra2il sma3o hal-kalem: ken YASOU3 el-Nassire rejjel zawwado ALLAH baynetkon bel-3ajeyeb yalle saret 3ala 2ido metl ma ento bta3erfo.
W-lamma tsallam elkon bi-iradet ALLAH w-bi-3elmo, salabtouh w-2ataltouh 3ala 2iden el-kefrin.
Bass ALLAH 2awwamo w-kassar jnazeer el-mawt, li2anno el-mawt mish moumkin ydall kèmsho,
w-bi2oul 3anno Daoud: "sheft el-RAB ma3e bi-kell wa2et w-houe 3an yameene ta-ma khaf,
kermel hek fer7 2albe w-hallal lsene, w-jesme ra7 ynem 3ala raja,
li2annak ma btetrekne bi-3alam el-mawta w-ma btetrok 2ouddousak yshouf el-fased.
Masheytne 3ala tari2 el-7ayet, w-ra7 tmalline fara7 lamma shouf wejjak."
Ya ekhwe: khalloune 2elkon bi-sawt 3ale: met bayyna Daoud w-ndafan, w-2abro hon 3enna la-7add liom.
W-ken nabe, w-3eref enno ALLAH 7alaflo yameen enno bye2'3od 3ala 3arsho wa7ad min sleelto.
W-shef Daoud 2iyemet el-MASI7 min abl w-7eke 3anna w-2al: ma tarako ALLAH bi-3alam el-mawta, w-ma sar jesmo fesid.
YASOU3 hayda 2awwamo ALLAH, w-ne7na kellna shouhoud 3ala hal-shi.
W-lamma talla3o ALLAH bi-edrto 3al-sama, n3atalo min el-Ãb el-ROU7 el-2ODOS yalle wa3ad ALLAH fih w-afado 3leyna, w-hayda houe yalle 3am bitshoufouh w-tesma3ouh.
Daoud ma toli3 3al-sama, w-houe nafso bi2oul: "2al el-RAB la-Rabbe: 23od 3an yameene
7atta khalle a3de2ak ta7t ejrek."
W-khalliyon ya3erfo wled Isra2il kellon w-yet2akkado enno ALLAH 3eml min YASOU3 hayda, yalle ento salabtouh, RAB w-MASI7."
W-lamma sem3o el-mawjoudin hal-kalem, 7asso ka2anno tsha'2afit 2loubon, w-2alo la-Boutros w-be2e el-rousl: "shou lezim na3mil, ya ekhwe?"
2allon Boutros: "toubo w-khalle kell wa7ad minkon yet3ammad bi-esm YASOU3 el-MASI7, btenghafar khatayakon w-byen3atalkon el-ROU7 el-2ODOS,
li2anno el-wa3d houe elkon w-la-wledkon w-kell el-b3ad, 3a-2add ma byed3iyon el-RAB Ilehna."
W-ken Boutros ye7kiyon w-you3azon bi-kalem tene w-y2oul: "tkhallaso min hal-jeel el-fesid!"
W-yalle 2eblo kalemo t3ammado, w-zed 3adad el-rousl bi-haydak el-yawm shi tlet-talef.
W-keno deyman yesma3o ta3lim el-rousl w-ysherko ba3don bi-kell shi w-ye7teflo bi-3asha el-RAB w-ysallo sawa.
Wel-rousl 3emlo 3ajeyeb ktire, khallet kell el-nes ykhafo.
W-keno el-mou2minin kellon mitte7din, kell shi 3endon yeh yesherko fih bayn ba3d,
ybi3o kell shi 3endon w-kheyraton w-yet2asamo tamana 7asab 7ajet kell wa7ad minnon.
W-keno yejtem3o kell yawm bel-haykal bi-2alb wa7ad, w-ye7teflo bi-3asha el-RAB bel-byout, w-yeklo sawa bi-fara7 w-basata,
w-ysabb7o ALLAH, wel-nes kellon fer7anin fiyon. W-ken el-RAB kell yawm yzeed 3adad el-nes yalle 3am yle2o el-khalãs.
Tel3o Boutros w-You7anna 3al-haykal ta-ysallo el-se3a tlete ba3d el-dohr,
w-ejo nes 7amleen rejjel khel2 mkarsa7. W-keno y7ottouh kell yawm 3ala beb el-haykal el-ma3rouf bel-beb el-Jamil ta-yesh7ad min el-feytin.
W-lamma shef Boutros w-You7anna feytin 3al-haykal talab minnon masare.
Ettalla3o fih mni7, w-ba3den 2allo Boutros: "ettalla3 fina!"
Ettalla3 fiyon w-ken nater enno yetla3lo shi.
2allo Boutros: "ma ma3e la-fodda wala dahab, bass ra7 a3tik shou ma3e, bi-esm YASOU3 el-MASI7 el-Nassire 2oum w-mshi."
W-masak bi-2ido el-yameen w-2awwamo, w-faj2a ejrey w-ka3b ejrey saro 2weya,
natt w-2am w-sar yemshe. W-fet 3al-haykal ma3on, houe w-3am binott w-yemshe w-ymajjed ALLAH.
W-shefouh el-nes kellon 3am yemshe w-ymajjed ALLAH,
3erfo enno houe el-she77ad yalle ken ye2'3od 3al-"beb el-Jamil", t7ayyaro ktir w-ndahasho min yalle sar ma3o.
W-lamma ken el-rejjel mrefa2 Boutros w-You7anna saro kell el-nes yerekdo madhoushin sawb el-se7a yalle esma se7it Sulayman.
Wa2et shefon Boutros keef 3amlin 2allon: "ya wled Isra2il, leysh met3ajbin min yalle sar? W-leysh 3am tettalla3o 3leyna ka2anno bi-edritna aw ta2wena khallayna hal-rejjel yemshe?
Ileh Ibrahim w-Is7ak w-Ya3koub, Ileh bayyetna, houe yalle majjad 2ebno YASOU3 yalle ento sallamtouh la-a3de2o w-nakartouh eddem Bilatos, ma3 enno Bilatos ken m2arrar yefelto.
Eh, nakarto el-2ouddous el-barr w-talabto enno ye3fe 3an el-mejrem.
2atalto nab3 el-7ayet, bass ALLAH 2awwamo min el-mawt, w-ne7na shouhoud 3ala hal-shi.
W-bi-fadl el-imen bi-esmo rej3et el-2ouwwe la-hal-rejjel yalle sheyfino w-bta3erfouh. El-imen bi-YASOU3 houe yalle khalleh ykoun salim eddemkon kellkon.
Ana ba3rif, ya ekhwe, enno yalle 3meltouh ento w-rou2ase2kon bi-YASOU3 ken 3an jahl.
W-ALLAH 7a'2a2 yalle aw7eh la-kell anbiye2o, w-houe enno MASI7O ra7 yet2allam.
Kermel hek toubo w-rja3oulo btenghafar khatayakon.
El-RAB ra7 y3azzikon, lamma ra7 yeb3atelkon el-MASI7 yalle saba2 w-ba3atelkon yeh, ye3ne YASOU3
yalle lezim enno yeb2a bel-sama la-7add ma yeje wa2et tejdid kell shi, metl ma a3lan ALLAH min zamen 3a-lsen anbiye2o el-at'har.
Li2anno Moussa 2al: ra7 yeb3at el-RAB Ilehkon min bayn ekhwetkon nabe metle, sma3oulo bi-kell shi 3am bi2elkon yeh,
w-yalle ma byesma3 la-hal-nabe, byenshel min bayn el-sha3b.
Wel-anbiya kellon, min Samou2il la-yalle ejo min ba3do 7ekyo w-tnabbo henne kamen enno hal-iyem ra7 teje.
Ento wled el-anbiya w-wled el-3ahd yalle 3emlo ALLAH ma3 bayyetkon, lamma 2al la-Ibrahim: bi-wastet sleeltak ra7 berik kell shou3oub el-ard.
La-elkon awwal shi 2awwam ALLAH 2ebno w-ba3ato ka-barake la-elkon ta-yredd kell wa7ad minkon 3an sharro."
W-lamma keno Boutros w-You7anna 3am ye7ko el-sha3b, ejo la-3andon el-kahane w-ra2is 7aras el-haykal wel-Saddoukiyyin,
w-ken ekhid 3a-khateron li2annon keno 3am y3allmo el-sha3b w-ye3elno 2iyemet el-mawta bi-2iyemet YASOU3.
W-kamashouwon w-7abasouwon la-tene yawm, li2anno ken sar 3ashiye.
W-2ãmano ktar min yalle sem3o el-kelme, w-wossil 3adad el-mou2minin el-rjel shi khams-talef.
W-tene yawm jtama3o bi-Ourasahalim rou2asa el-Yahoud wel-shyoukh w-mou3allimi el-shari3a
w-7annan ra2is el-kahane w-Kayafa w-You7anna w-Eskandar w-wled rou2asa el-kahane kellon.
Min ba3da nedo Boutros w-You7anna w-sa2alouwon: "bi-ayya soulta aw bi-esm meen 3melto hal-shi?"
Jewabon Boutros w-houe melyen min el-ROU7 el-2ODOS: "ya rou2asa el-sha3b, w-ya shyoukh,
eza kento 3am tes2alouna liom 3an el-mni7 yalle 3melneh la-mareed w-badkon ta3erfo keef nshafa,
3rafo kellkon, w-khalle sha3b Isra2il kello ya3rif, enno hal-rejjel we2if hon eddemkon salim w-m3afa bi-esm YASOU3 el-MASI7 el-Nassire yalle ento salabtouh w-2awwamo ALLAH min el-mawt.
Hayda houe "el-7ajar yalle rafadtouh ya me3marjiyye, w-sar ras el-zewye."
Ma fi khalãs ella bi-YASOU3, w-ma fi esm tene ta7t el-sama 3atah ALLAH lal-nes mne2dar bi-wasteto nle2e el-khalãs."
W-lamma shef el-majles jer2et Boutros w-You7anna, t3ajjabo li2annon bya3erfo ennon mish m3allamin w-min taba2a bassita. Bass 3erfo ennon keno abl ma3 YASOU3.
W-bi-ma enno keno 2esh3in el-rejjel yalle nshafa we2if 7addon, w-ma ken 3endon shi ta-yjedlo fih.
2amarouwon ennon yfello min el-majles, w-min ba3da tshewaro
w-2alo: "shou mna3mil bi-hal-rejjelen?" Kell sekken Ourashalim bya3erfo enno hal-3ajibe el-mbayyne henne 3emlouwa, w-ma mne2dar nenkera.
Bass ta-ma yenteshir hal-khabar ba3d aktar bayn el-sha3b, khallina n7azzeron ma y3oudo ba2a yezekro esm YASOU3 eddem 7ada."
Min ba3da nedouwon w-2amarouwon ma yezekro aw y3allmo bi-esm YASOU3.
2allon Boutros w-You7anna: "ento 7kemo bi-zetkon: hayda 3adl eddem ALLAH enno ntee3kon aw ntee3 ALLAH?
Bass ne7na ma mne2dar ella enno ne7ke bi-yalle shefneh w-sme3neh."
7azzarouwon marra tenye, w-7taro keef baddon y2asesouwon, w-rej3o fallatouwon li2anno khafo min el-sha3b. Wel-nes kellon keno 3am bimajjdo ALLAH 3ala yalle sar,
li2anno el-rejjel yalle nshafa bi-tari2a 3ajibe sar 3omro aktar min arb3een.
W-lamma fallat el-majles Boutros w-You7anna, rej3o la-3and rfe2on w-khabbarouwon bi-kell shi 2aloulon yeh rou2asa el-kahane wel-shyoukh.
Lamma sem3o hal-shi, sallo la-ALLAH bi-2alb wa7ad, w-2alo: "ya RAB, ya khale2 el-sama wel-ard wel-ba7r w-kell shi fiya,
enta 2elet 3a-lsen bayyna Daoud khadmak bi-wa7e min el-ROU7 el-2ODOS: leysh hejet el-oumam w-t2ãmaret el-shou3oub 3al-fade?
2amo moulouk el-ard w-t7alafo el-rou2asa kellon 3ala el-RAB w-MASI7O.
Eh, t7alafo bi-hal-madine Hirodos, w-Bountyos Bilatos w-wled Isra2il wel-ghouraba 3ala 2ebnak el-2ouddous YASOU3 yalle 3melto MASI7,
w-3emlo yalle saba2 w-2arrarit enno ykoun.
Ettalla3 halla2, ya RAB 3ala tehdideton w-3tina ne7na 3abeedak enno ne3lon kelmtak bi-kell jer2a.
Medd 2idak yalle bteshfe w-bta3mil 3ajeyeb bi-esm 2ebnak el-2ouddous YASOU3."
Henne w-3am bisallo sar fi hazze matra7 ma keno mejtem3in. W-ntalo kellon min el-ROU7 el-2ODOS, w-saro ye3elno kelmet ALLAH bi-jer2a.
W-keno jame3et el-mou2minin 2alb wa7ad w-rou7 we7de, ma byedde3e wala wa7ad minnon enno byemlok shi elo, bel-3aks keno yetsherako bi-kell shi elon.
W-keno el-rousl 3am yesh'hado bi-2iyemet el-RAB YASOU3, w-edrit ALLAH el-3azeeme ma3on. W-kenit el-ne3me ma3on kellon
w-ma ken 7ada minnon bi-7aje la-shi, li2anno yalle ken 3endon 72oul aw byout keno ybi3ouwa w-yjeebo el-masare,
w-y7ottouwa eddem ejren el-rousl ta-ywazz3ouwa 7asab 7ajet kell wa7ad min el-jame3a.
W-hek 3eml Youssef, w-houe Lawi 2aslo 2oberse la'2abouh el-rousl bi-Barnaba, ye3ne 2eben el-ta3ziye,
be3 7a2l byemelko w-jeb el-masare w-7atton eddem ejren el-rousl.
Bass fi rejjel esmo 7ananiyya be3 melk elo bi-mouwefa2et marto Safira,
w-7tafaz bi-2osm min el-masare w-hiye kenit 3arfe, w-jeb el-2osm el-tene min el-masare w-7atto eddem ejren el-rousl.
2allo Boutros: "ya 7ananiyya, leysh sara2 el-shaytan 2albak ta-kazzabet 3ala el-ROU7 el-2ODOS w-7tafazet bi-2osm min masare el-7a2l?
Mish kell el-7a2l ken be2ilak law khallayto? W-lamma be3to, mish ken lezim te7tefiz bel-masare? Keef 2arraret bi-2albak ta3mil hek? Enta kazzabet 3a-ALLAH, mish 3al-nes."
W-lamma sem3 7ananiyya hal-kalem wa2a3 w-met, w-khafo ktir kell yalle sem3o bi-hal-shi.
W-2am kamm wa7ad min el-shabeb, w-kaffanouh w-akhadouh la-barra w-dafanouh.
W-ba3d shi tlet se3at, ejet marto w-hiye mish 3arfe shou sar.
Sa2ala Boutros: "2oulile: bi-hal-2add be3to el-7a2l?" Jewabet: "mazbout, bi-hal-2add!"
2alla Boutros: "leysh ettafa2to enno tjarrbo ROU7 el-RAB? Shoufe ejren yalle dafano zawjik 3al-beb. W-ra7 ye7emlouke ente kamen!"
Wa2a3et deghre eddem ejren Boutros w-metit. Feto el-shabeb w-shefouwa mayte, akhadouwa w-dafanouwa 7add zawja.
W-khafet el-knise kella ktir w-kell yalle 3erfo hal-akhbar.
Sar fi ktir 3ajeyeb bayn el-sha3b w-3ala 2iden el-rousl, w-keno yejtem3o bi-2alb wa7ad bi-se7it Sulayman.
W-ma 7ada min el-tenyin starja yendamm elon, bass el-sha3b ken 3am yemda7on.
W-ketir 3adad el-mou2minin bel-RAB min el-rjel wel-neswen,
w-keno ye7emlo mardahon bel-tour2at w-y7ottouwon 3al-ma7emil wel-fersh, 7atta eza mara2 Boutros yeje walaw khyelo 3ala wa7ad minnon.
W-keno el-nes yejo min el-moudon yalle 7add Ourashalim 7amleen el-marda w-yalle fiyon arwe7 sherreera, w-yenshafo kellon.
W-zedit na2met ra2is el-kahane w-atbe3o yalle henne min el-Saddoukiyyin,
kamasho el-rousl w-7attouwon bel-7abs.
Bass malèk el-RAB fata7 bweb el-7abs bel-leyl w-talla3 el-rousl w-2allon:
"Rou7o 3al-haykal w-bashro el-sha3b bi-ta3alim el-7ayet el-jdide."
Sem3oulo w-feto 3al-haykal abl el-daw w-saro y3allmo. Eja ra2is el-kahane w-atbe3o w-jama3o el-majles w-shyoukh el-sha3b w-2amaro enno yjeeboulon el-rousl min el-7abs.
Ra7o el-7aras 3al-7abs w-ma le2ouwon honik, rej3o 3al-majles
w-2alo: "l2ina el-7abs msakkar mni7 wel-7aras we2fin 3al-bweb w-lamma fata7neh ma l2ina fiyo 7ada."
7tar ra2is 7aras el-haykal w-rou2asa el-kahane lamma sem3o hal-7ake w-saro yes2alo ba3don: keef sar hal-shi?
Fet la-3andon rejjel w-2allon: "Layko el-rjel yalle 7attaytouwon bel-7abs keef 3am bi3allmo el-sha3b bel-haykal!"
Ra7 ra2is el-7aras houe w-rjelo w-jebo el-rousl bidoun 3enf, li2annon khafo enno el-sha3b yerjemon.
W-lamma feto el-rousl 3al-majles, 2allon ra2is el-kahane:
"2amarnekon bi-2ouwwe enno ma t3allmo bi-hal-esm, w-ento mallayto Ourashalim bi-ta3alimkon, w-badkon t7otto el-mas2ouliyye 3leyna bi-damm hal-rejjel."
Jewabouwon Boutros wel-rousl: "lezim ntee3 ALLAH mish el-nes.
Ileh bayyetna 2awwam YASOU3 yalle 3alla2touh 3ala khashbe w-2ataltouh.
Houe yalle talla3o ALLAH bi-edrto w-3emlo ra2is w-moukhallis ta-ytoub sha3b Isra2il w-tenghafar khatayah,
w-ne7na shouhoud 3a-kell hal-shi. W-hek byesh'had el-ROU7 el-2ODOS yalle 3atah ALLAH la-yalle bitee3ouh."
W-lamma sem3 el-majles hal-7ake, ghodbo ktir w-2arraro ye2etlouwon.
Bass fi wa7ad minnon esmo Gamla2il, w-houe ferrise min mou3allimi el-shari3a, bye7termo el-sha3b kello, 2amar yedharo el-nes shwey la-barra,
w-2al lal-majles: "ya wled Isra2il, ou3a ta3emlo shou m2arrerin ta3emlouh bi-hal-rjel.
2am Thoudas abl hal-iyem, w-2al 3an 7alo enno houe rejjel 3azeem, w-le7'2o shi arba3-miyyet rejjel. Bass ba3den n2atal w-tfarra2o kell yalle keno le7'2ino w-ma be2e elon athar.
W-min ba3do eja Yahouza el-Jaleele bi-wa2et el-e7sa2, w-jarr warah jame3a min el-nes, w-kamen met w-tshattato kell yalle bitee3ouh.
W-halla2 b2elkon: treko hal-rjel bi-7alon w-ma tehtammo fiyon, li2anno yalle 3am bibashro fih w-ya3elmouh birou7 eza ken min el-bashar.
Bass eza ken min ALLAH, ma bte2daro telghouh ta-ma tsiro a3de2 ALLAH."
2ebl kell el-majles bi-ra2yo w-tarako el-rousl, w-jaladouwon w-2amarouwon ma ye7ko bi-esm YASOU3, w-rej3o fallatouwon.
Tol3o el-rousl min el-majles fer7anin, li2anno ALLAH shefon byest7e'2o enno ye2balo el-ihene kermel esm YASOU3.
W-keno y3allmo kell yawm bel-haykal w-bel-byout w-ybashro bi-enno YASOU3 houe el-MASI7.

W-bi-haydik el-iyem ketr 3adad el-tlemiz, w-saro el-Yahoud el-Youneniyyin el-meghterbin ybarebro 3al-Yahoud el-3ebraniyyin yalle bi-Ourashalim, li2anno aramelon ma 3am yekhdo nasibon min el-mouse3adet el-yawmiyye.
Se3eta el-rousl el-tna3sh nedo jame3et el-tlemiz w-2aloulon: "ma bili2 fina enno nehmol kalem ALLAH ta-nehtamm bi-oumour el-mouse3adet.
Kermel hek, na'2o, ya ekhwe, sab3 rjel minkon seeton 7elo w-melyenin min el-ROU7 el-2ODOS w-min el-7ekme 7atta nkallefon bi-hal-3amal,
w-ne7na mindewim 3al-sala wel-tebshir bi-kalem ALLAH."

7abbet el-jame3a kella ra2y el-rousl, w-na'2o Estefanos, w-houe rejjel melyen min el-imen wel-ROU7 el-2ODOS, w-Filippos w-Baroukhouros w-Nikanoros w-Timon w-Barminas w-Nikolawos w-ken Entake w-sar Yahoude.
Min ba3da jebouwon eddem el-rousl, sallo w-7atto 2ideyon 3leyon.
W-ken kalem ALLAH 3am yenteshir, w-3adad el-tlemiz 3am yzeed ktir bi-Ourashalim. W-ktar min el-kahane keno 3am yesma3o el-tebshir w-y2ãmno.
W-ken Estefanos melyen min el-ne3me wel-edra, w-sar ya3mil el-3ajeyeb el-3azeeme bayn el-sha3b.
Eja kamm wa7ad min el-majma3 el-ma3rouf bi-majma3 el-3abeed el-Mou7arrarin, w-Yahoud min Kayrin wel-Eskandariyya, w-ghayron min Kilikya w-Ãsia, w-saro yjedlo Estefanos,
bass el-ROU7 3ata Estefanos 7ekme khalleto enno ma ye2daroulo,
w-dafa3o lal-nes masare kermel y2oulo: "sme3na hayda el-rejjel 3am bijaddef 3ala Moussa w-3ala ALLAH!"
2awwamo 3le el-sha3b wel-shyoukh w-mou3allimi el-shari3a. Min ba3da feja2ouh w-khatafouh w-jebouh 3al-majles.
W-jebo shouhoud zour y2oulo: "hayda el-rejjel kell el-wa2et bisebb el-haykal el-m2addas wel-shari3a.
W-ne7na sme3neh 3am bi2oul: ra7 yehdom YASOU3 el-Nassire hal-matra7 w-yghayyir el-ta2aleed yalle wretneha 3an Moussa!"
Ettalla3o fih kell el-mawjoudin bel-majles, w-shefo wejjo ka2anno wejj malèk.
2al ra2is el-kahane la-Estefanos: "mazbout hal-shi?"
Jewabo: "sma3o, ya hal-ekhwe wel-bayyet: "zahar Ileh el-majd la-bayyna Ibrahim lamma ken bi-bled Ma-Bayn-el-Nahren, abl ma yeskon bi-7arran,
w-2allo: trok ardak w-2abiltak w-rou7 3al-ard yalle ra7 farjik yeha.
Tarak bled el-Keldeniyyin w-sakan bi-7arran. Min ba3d ma met bayyo, na2alo ALLAH min honik la-hal-ard yalle ento seknin fiya halla2,
bidoun ma ywarrto hiye aw ya3tih mitr wa7ad minna. Bass ALLAH wa3ado enno tsir melk elo w-la-sleelto min ba3do, ma3 enno ma kan 3endo wled.
W-2al ALLAH: ra7 teskon sleeltak bi-bled gharibe, w-ra7 ykouno 3abeed w-yenzallo meddit arba3-miyyet sene." W-2al ALLAH:
"bass ra7 deen el-sha3b yalle byesta3bedkon, ba3den byetla3o min haydik el-bled w-bye3badoune hon bi-hal-matra7."
W-3ata ALLAH Ibrahim 3ahd el-khatn, w-walad Ibrahim 2ebno Is7ak w-khatano bel-yawm el-temin. W-khatan Is7ak Ya3koub, w-Ya3koub khatan el-bayyet el-tna3sh.
W-n7asado el-bayyet el-ouwal min Youssef w-be3ouh, w-sar bi-Masr. W-ken ALLAH ma3o,
w-khallaso min kell msaybo, w-3atah ne3me w-7ekme eddem Fer3on malik Masr, w-Fer3on 7atto 7akem 3ala Masr w-3ala 2asro.
W-sar fi bi-Masr kella w-ard Ken3an maje3a w-di2a kbire, w-saro bayyetna bi-7aje yeklo.
W-sem3 Ya3koub enno bi-Maser fi 2am7, ba3at bayyetna la-honik awwal marra,
w-bel marra el-tenye t3arraf Youssef 3ala ekhweto, w-se3eta Fer3on 3eref 2aslo la Youssef,
w-ba3at Youssef wara bayyo Ya3koub w-kell 2abilto, w-keno khamsa-w-sab3een shakhs.
Nezl Ya3koub 3ala Masr w-met honik houe w-bayyetna.
W-na2alouwon 3ala Shakim w-dafanouwon bel-2abr yalle shtareh Ibrahim min wled 7amour bi-Shakim w-dafa3 7a'2o masare.
W-lamma ken wa3d ALLAH la-Ibrahim 2arrab enno yet7a'2a2, ken sha3bna 3am yektar w-yzeed bi-Masr,
la-7add ma eja malik tene bi-Masr ma bya3rif Youssef,
7tel 3a-sha3bna w-zall bayyetna, w-khallehon yetkhallo 3an atfalon w-khallehon ysallmo atfalon lal-mawt.
W bi-haydik el-iyem khel2 Moussa. W-ken 7elo ktir. W-trabba tlet tesh'hor bi-beyt bayyo.
W-lamma tarakouh ahlo tbanneto benet Fer3on w-rabbeto,
w-t3allam 7ekmet el-Masriyyin kella, w-ken 2awe bi-7akiyo w-bi-3amalo.
W-lamma sar 3omro arb3een, toli3 3a-belo yerja3 yshouf ekhweto wled Isra2il.
Shef Masre 3am yet3adda 3ala wa7ad minnon, defa3 3an el-mazloum w-2atal el-Masre ta-yente2im minno.
W-Moussa ken mfakkir enno ekhweto ra7 yefhamo enno ALLAH bikhallison bi-wasteto, bass ma fehmo.
W-shef tene yawm tnen minnon 3am yet2atalo, talab minnon yetsala7o. W-2al: "ya rjel, ento ekhwe, leysh 3am te2zo ba3dkon?"
Eja el-shakhs yalle t3adda 3al-tene w-dafash Moussa w-2al: "meen 3emlak rayyes w-2ãde 3leyna?
Tekhmin baddak te2telne metl ma 2atalt el-Masre mberi7?"
W-lamma sem3 Moussa hal-7ake harab w-2a3ad bi-ard Medyan. W-honik jeb waladen.
Min ba3d arb3een sene, zaharlo malèk bi-barriyet jabal Sina, bi-3ellay2a bteshte3il fiya el-nar.
Ndahash Moussa lamma shef hal-rou2ya, w-2arrab ta-yshouf 3an 2arib, se3eta nedeh sawt el-RAB:
"ana Ileh bayyetak, Ileh Ibrahim w-Is7ak w-Ya3koub." Khaf Moussa w-ma starja y3alle raso.
2allo el-RAB: "shla7 min ejrek, li2anno el-matra7 yalle enta we2if fih ard m2addase.
Ana ettalla3et 3ala zell sha3be bi-Masr w-sme3t waja3o, w-nzelt ta-khallso. Ta3a, ra7 eb3atak 3ala Masr."
W-kaffa Estefanos y2oul: "Moussa yalle nakaro sha3bo w-2aloulo: meen 3emlak rayyes w-2ãde 3leyna, houe yalle ba3ato ALLAH ra2is w-moukhallis bi-mouse3adet el-malèk yalle zaharlo bel-3ellay2a,
dahhar sha3bo min Masr w-3eml kell shi fi 3ajeyeb bi-ard Masr w bel-ba7r el-a7mar w-bel-barriye meddit arb3een sene,
w-houe nafso yalle 2al la-wled Isra2il: "ra7 yeb3at ALLAH elkon min bayn sha3bkon nabe metle."
W-Moussa houe yalle ken ma3 jame3et wled Isra2il bel-barriye wãsta bayn bayyetna w-bayn el-malèk yalle 7ekeh 3ala jabal Sina, w-sem3 kelmet el-7ayet w-na2ala elna.
Bass bayyetna rafado ennon ytee3ouh, bay3adouh 3annon w-7ann 2albon 3ala Masr,
w-2alo la-Haroun: "3melelna Ãliha temshe eddemna, li2anno ma mna3rif shou sarlo Moussa hayda yalle talla3na min Masr."
W-3emlo bi-haydak el-wa2et sanam bi-souret 3ejl, w-2addamoulo el-zabeye7, w-fer7o bi-yalle 3emlouh bi-2ideyon.
W-bay3ad ALLAH 3annon w-tarakon ye3bado el-njoum, metl ma eja bi-ketob el-anbiya: "ya wled Isra2il! Tekhmin 2addamtoule el-zabeye7 wel-2arabin khilel arb3een sene bel-barriye?
La2, bel-3aks, faddalto khaymet Mouloukh w-nejmet Ilehkon Ramfan: asnam 3meltouwa ta-te3badouwa. Ra7 enfikon la-ab3ad min Babel."
W-keno bayyetna bel-barriyye fi 3endon khaymet el-lika2 yalle 3emela Moussa, metl ma 2amaro ALLAH, w-metl ma farjeh keef ya3mela.
Tsallamouwa bayyetna w-akhadouwa ma3on lamma stawlo 3a-bled el-oumam yalle ze7a ALLAH min eddemon bi-2iyedit Yashou3. W-be2yet honik la-iyem Daoud.
W-rode ALLAH 3an Daoud, w-talab minno y3ammir beyt la-Ileh Ya3koub,
bass Sulayman houe yalle 3ammaro.
Bass ALLAH el-2adeer ma byeskon byout 3emleta 2iden 2ensen, metl ma 2al el-nabe:
"bi2oul el-RAB: el-sama 3arshe, wel-ard ta7t ejreyye. Ayya beyt badkon t3ammroule? Wayn ana berte7?
Mish 2ideyye 3emlet kell hal-shi?"
Ya hal-2loub el-2assye w-ya hal-dineykon msakkarin! Ento metl bayyetkon, ba3dkon 3am bit2awmo el-ROU7 el-2ODOS.
Mish edtahado kell nabe, w-2atalo yalle tnabbo bi-majyet el-barr yalle sallamtouh w-2ataltouh?
Ento tsallamto shari3et ALLAH min 2iden el-maleyke w-ma tabba2touwa."
W-lamma sem3 el-majles kalem Estefanos malla el-ghadab 2loubon w-kashsharo 3an snenon.
Ettalla3 Estefanos 3al-sama, houe w-melyen min el-ROU7 el-2ODOS, w-shef majd ALLAH w-YASOU3 we2if 3an yameen ALLAH.
2al: "sheyif el-sama maftou7a w-2eben el-2ensen we2if 3an yameen ALLAH!"
Sarakho bi-sawt 3ale, w-saddo dineyon, w-hajamo 3le kellon fard marra,
w-talla3ouh min el-madine ta-yerejmouh. W-shala7o el-shouhoud tyebon w-7attouwa amene 3end ejren shabb esmo Shawol.
W-saro yerejmo Estefanos w-houe 3am ysalle, w-y2oul: "ya RAB YASOU3, 2bal rou7e!"
W-raka3 w-sarakh bi-sawt 3ale: "ya RAB, ma t7asebon 3a-hal-khatiyye!" 2al hal-shi w-met.
W-ken Shawol mwefa2 3ala 2atl Estefanos. W-ballashet kniset Ourashalim t3ene edtihad kbir, w-tshattato el-mou2minin kellon, ma 3ada el-rousl, bi-nawe7e el-Yahoudiye wel-Samira.
W-dafano kamm wa7ad el-mou2minin Estefanos w-bekyo 3le ktir.
W-ken Shawol 3am yjarrib ykharrib el-knise, w-ken yrou7 min beyt la-beyt w-ytalli3 minno el-rjel wel-neswen w-y7otton bel-7abs.
W-saro el-mou2minin yalle tshattato yente2lo min matra7 la-matra7 henne w-3am bibashro bi-kalem ALLAH.
Nezl Filippos 3ala madine bel-Samira w-ballash ybashir fiya bel-MASI7.
W-keno el-nes 3am yesma3o bi-2alb wa7ad la-kalemo, li2anna sem3o bi-3ajeybo w-shefouwa.
W-kenit el-arwe7 el-sherreera tedhar min nes ktar hiye w-3am tesrokh bi-sawt 3ale. W-ktar min el-mafloujin wel-3erj nshafo,
w-sar fi bel-madine fara7 kbir.
W-ken fi bel-madine se7ir esmo Sem3an, adhash el-Samiriyyin min abl bi-a3mel el-se7r w-2al 3an 7alo enno houe rejjel mhemm.
W-keno kellon yel7a2ouh, min zghiron la-kbiron, w-y2oulo: "hal-rejjal houe edrit ALLAH yalle min2oul 3anna: 3azeeme."
W-keno yel7a2ouh li2anno sa7aron bi-se7ro min zamen.
W-lamma basharon Filippos bi-malakout ALLAH w-esm YASOU3 el-MASI7, 2ãmano w-t3ammado rjelon w-neswenon.
W-2ãman Sem3an kamen, w-t3ammad w-dall 7add Filippos, yshouf shou 3am ya3emlo 3ajeyeb 3azeeme, w-ken madhoush.
W-sem3o el-rousl bi-Ourashalim enno el-Samiriyyin 2eblo kalem ALLAH, fa-ba3atoulon Boutros w-You7anna.
W-lamma woslo 3ala el-Samira salloulon 7atta yekhdo el-ROU7 el-2ODOS,
li2anno ma ken el-ROU7 nezl ba3d 3ala 7ada minnon, bass yalle 3emlouh houe enno t3ammado bi-esm el-RAB YASOU3.
7atto 2ideyon 3leyon, w-nezl 3leyon el-ROU7 el-2ODOS.
W-lamma shef Sem3an enno ALLAH 3atahon el-ROU7 el-2ODOS lamma 7atto Boutros w-You7anna 2ideyon 3leyon, 3arad 3leyon masare,
w-2allon: "3toune ana kamen hal-soulta 7atta yenzal el-ROU7 el-2ODOS 3a-kell meen b7ott 2ideyye 3le!"
2allo Boutros: "3ala jhannam enta w-mesriyyetak, li2annak mfakkar enno bel-masare bte7sal 3ala maweheb ALLAH.
Ma fi elak 7ossa bi-3amalna wala nasib, li2anno 2albak eddem ALLAH mish na2e.
Toub 3an sharrak, w-salle w-tlob min el-RAB barke byeghferlak yalle khatar 3ala belak.
Li2anno sheyfak morr metl el-3al2am w-3el2an bi-shbek el-khatiyye."
Jewab Sem3an: "tlob min el-RAB kermele 7atta ma ysirle shi min yalle zakarto."
W-min ba3d ma shehdo w-a3lano kalem el-RAB, rej3o Boutros w-You7anna 3ala Ourashalim w-henne 3am bibashro diya3 ktire bel-Samira.
W-malèk el-RAB 7eke ma3 Filippos w-2allo: "2oum rou7 3al-jnoub, 3al-tari2 yalle btenzal fiya min Ourashalim 3a-Ghazza, hayde tari2 me2fiyye."
2am Filippos w-ra7. W-bel-tari2 lta2a bi-rejjel min el-7abashe, wazir min bayn kheddem Kendaka maliket el-7abash, w-wakeel kell amwela. Ken raye7 3a-Ourashalim ta-ye3bad ALLAH,
w-ken reji3 w-2e3id bi-markabto 3am yo2ra el-nabe Ashe3ya.
2al el-ROU7 la-Filippos: 2arrib w-l7a2 hayde el-markabe."
Rakad sawba Filippos w-sem3 el-rejjel 3am yo2ra el-nabe Ashe3ya, 2allo: "3am tefham shou 3am to2ra?"
Jewab: "keef badde efham w-ma 7ada byeshra7le?" W-trajja Filippos enno yetla3 w-ye2'3od ma3o.
W-ken el-ma2ta3 yalle 3am yo2rih min el-kteb bi2oul: "metl el-na3je akhadouh lal-zab7, metl 7amal sekit bayn 2iden yalle 3am yedba7ouh hek ma 3am yefta7 temmo.
Zallouh w-akhadoulo 7a'2o. 7ayeto khtafit 3an el-ard, meen bye2dar ykhabbir 3an sleelto?"
2al el-rejjel la-Filippos: "khabberne meen bye3ne el-nabe bi-hal-kalem? Bye2sod 7alo aw shakhs tene?"
W-ballash Filippos min hal-ma2ta3 bel-kteb ybashro bi-YASOU3.
W-lamma ken ba3don 3al-tari2 woslo 3ala matra7 fiyo may, w-2al el-rejjel la-Filippos: "hon fi may, shou byemna3 enno et3ammad?"
Jewabo Filippos: "bte2dar tet3ammad eza kent bit2ãmen min kell 2albak." 2al el-rejjel: "b2ãmen bi-enno YASOU3 el-MASI7 houe 2eben ALLAH."
Min ba3da 2amar bi-enno tou2af el-markabe, w-nezl houe w-Filippos 3al-may, w-3ammado Filippos.
W-lamma tol3o min el-may khataf ROU7 el-RAB Filippos, w-ghab 3an nazar el-rejjel, w-ra7 bi-tari2o fer7an.
W-Filippos le2a 7alo sar bi-Ashdoud, w-min ba3da meshe houe w-3am bibasher bel-moudon kella 7atta wossil 3ala Kaysariyya.
Bi-khsous Shawol, 2albo ken melyen bel-tehdid wel-te2til la-tlemiz el-RAB. Ra7 la-3and ra2is el-kahane
W-talab minno raseyel la-majeme3 el-Shem, la-yekmosh el-rjel wel-neswen yalle bile2iyon honik teb3in lal-RAB w-bijeebon 3ala Ourashalim.
W-lamma ken 3am bi2arreb min el-Shem, toli3 faj2a 7awlo nour 2awe min el-sama,
wa2a3 Shawol 3al-ard, w-sem3 sawt 3am bi2ello: "Shawol, Shawol, leysh 3am tettehedne?"
2allo Shawol: "enta meen, ya RAB?" Jewabo el-sawt: "ana YASOU3 yalle enta 3am tettehdo. [Sa3b 3lek enno t2ewemne."
2al houe w-mayyit ra3be w-khayif: "ya RAB, shou baddak a3mil?" 2allo el-RAB:] "2oum w-fout 3al-madine, w-honik byen2allak shou lezim ta3mil."
W-bennesbe la-rfe2 Shawol, we2fo me7tarin 3am yesma3o el-sawt w-ma 3am bishoufo 7ada.
We2f Shawol 3al-ard w-fata7 3youno w-ma ken 3am ye2sha3 shi. Akhadouh bi-2ido 3al-Shem.
W-be2e tlet tiyem a3ma ma byekol wala byeshrab.
W-ken fi bel-Shem telmiz esmo 7ananiyya. Nedeh el-RAB bi-rou2ya: "ya 7ananiyya!" Jewabo: "na3am, ya RAB!"
2allo el-RAB: "2oum w-rou7 3al-sheri3 el-ma3rouf bel-Mousta2im, w-s2al bi-beyt Yahouza 3an rejjel min Tarsous esmo Shawol. W-houe halla2 3am bisalle,
ra7 yshouf bel-rou2ya rejjel esmo 7ananiyya feyit w-3am bi7ott 2idey 3le w-se3eta bisir ye2sha3 min jdid."
Jewabo 7ananiyya: "ya RAB, khabbaroune nes ktar addeysh 2eze hal-rejjel 2eddisik bi-Ourashalim.
W-houe hon halla2 w-3endo soulta min rou2asa el-kahane enno yekmosh kell meen byed3e bi-esmak."
2allo el-RAB: "rou7, li2anno ana na'2ayto rasoul ele bye7mol esme lal-oumam wel-moulouk w-wled Isra2il.
W-ra7 farjih addeysh lezim yet7ammal ãlem kermel esme."

Ra7 7ananiyya w-fet 3al-beyt w-7att 2idey 3ala Shawol w-2al: "ya khayye Shawol, ba3atne la-3andak el-RAB YASOU3 yalle zaharlak enta w-3al-tari2 yalle jeet minna, 7atta terja3 te2sha3 w-tentele min el-ROU7 el-2ODOS."
Se3eta nezl min 3youno shi byeshbah el-2eshre, w-reje3 ye2sha3, 2am w-t3ammad. W-min ba3da akal, w-rej3etlo el-2ouwwe.
W-be2e Shawol kamm yawm ma3 el-tlemiz bel-Shem,
min ba3da ballash bi-ser3a ybasher bel-majame3 bi-enno YASOU3 houe 2eben ALLAH.

W-keno yalle 3am yesma3ouh 3am yet3ajjabo w-y2oulo: "mish hal-rejjel ken bi-Ourashalim w-3am yedtehed kell meen byed3e bi-hal-esm? W-houe ma eja la-hon ella la-7atta yekmeshon w-yrajje3on la-rou2asa el-kahane?"
Bass Shawol kenit 3am tzeed 2ouwwto bel-tebshir, 7atta 7ayyar 32oul el-Yahoud yalle keno bel-Shem bi-7ejajo el-2awiye 3ala enno YASOU3 houe el-MASI7.
Ba3d fatra 7atto el-Yahoud khotta ta-ye2etlouh,
wossil khabara la-3ando. W-keno 3am bira2bo bweb el-madine leyl nhar ta-ye2etlouh,
w-akhadouh el-tlemiz bel-leyl w-dandalouh min el-sour bi-salle.
W-lamma wossil Shawol 3ala Ourashalim jarrab yendamm lal-tlemiz. W-keno kellon khayfin minno w-mish msadd2in enno houe telmiz.
W-jebo Barnaba la-3and el-rousl w-khabbaron keef shef Shawol el-RAB bel-tari2 w-7ekeh el-RAB, w-keef bashar bi-jer2a bi-esm YASOU3 bel-Shem.
W-sar yrou7 w-yeje ma3 el-tlemiz bi-Ourashalim, ybasher bi-jer2a bi-esm el-RAB.
W-ken ye7ke el-Yahoud yalle bye7ko Younene w-yjedelon, fa-jarrabo ye2etlouh.
W-lamma 3erfo el-ekhwe bi-hal-shi, nazzalouh 3a-Kaysariyya w-ba3atouh min honik 3a-Tarsous.
W-ballash ysir fi salem bel-knise bi-kell el-Yahoudiye wel-Jaleel wel-Samira. W-kenit 3am tenma w-temshe bi-khawf el-RAB, w-tetketar bi-2ouwwet el-ROU7 el-2ODOS.
W-ken Boutros yzour kell el-matare7, w-eja la-3and el-ekhwe el-2eddisin el-2e3din bi-Loudda,
w-lta2a honik bi-rejjel esmo Inyas, w-ken mkarsa7 neyim bel-farshe min tmen snin.
2allo Boutros: "ya Inyas, shafek YASOU3 el-MASI7, 2oum w-ratteb fareshtak bi-2idak." 2am deghre.
W-shefo kell sekken Loudda w-Sharon, w-rej3o kellon lal-RAB.
W-ken fi bi-Yafa telmize esma Tabitha, bel-Youneniyye Dourkas, ye3ne ghazele, t2adde kell wa2eta bel-a3mel el-sal7a w-mouse3adet el-me7tejin.
Merdet bi-haydak el-wa2et w-metit. Ghassalouwa w-7attouwa bel-gherfe el-fo2.
W-li2anno Loudda 2aribe min Yafa, 3erfo el-tlemiz enno Boutros fiya, fa-ba3ato la-3ando rejjelen ta-y2ouloulo: "ta3a la-3anna w-ma tet2akhar."

2am Boutros bi-ser3a w-reje3 ma3on 3ala Yafa. W-lamma wossil talla3ouh 3ala el-gherfe el-fo2, w-sta2balouh el-araml henne w-3am yebko w-saro yfarjouh el-2omsan wel-tyeb yalle khayyateta Dourkas lamma kenit ba3da 3ayshe ma3on.
Talla3 Boutros el-nes kellon, w-raka3 w-salla, w-min ba3da eltafat lal-mayyte w-2al: "Tabitha, 2oume!" Fata7et 3youna, w-lamma shefit Boutros 2a3adet.
Madd 2ido la-ela w-2awwama, w-ba3den neda el-ekhwe el-2eddisin wel-araml w-jeba la-3andon 3ayshe.
Ntashar el-khabar bi-Yafa kella, w-2ãman bel-RAB 3adad kbir min el-nes.
W-be2e Boutros kaza yawm bi-Yafa 3end debbegh esmo Sem3an.
W-ken fi bi-Kaysariyya rejjel esmo Kornilyos, dabet min el-fer2a el-Italiyye bel-jeysh.
Ken ta2e bikhaf ALLAH houe w-kell ahl beyto, w-bise3id el-sha3b bi-karam, w-bidewem 3al-sala la-ALLAH.
W-shef sawb el-se3a el-tlete bi-rou2ya wad7a malèk ALLAH feyit la-3ando 3am binedih: "ya Kornilyos!"
Ettalla3 3le bi-khawf w-2al: "na3am, ya Rab?" 2allo el-malèk: "tol3it salawetak w-a3melak el-kheyriyye la-3and ALLAH, w-tzakkarak.
B3at halla2 rjel 3ala Yafa w-jeeb Sem3an yalle byen2al 3anno Boutros.
Houe nezil 3end debbegh esmo Sem3an w-beyto 3ala shatt el-ba7r."
W-lamma fall el-malèk yalle ken 3am ye7kih, ba3at wara tnen min kheddemo w-wara jende ta2e min yalle 3endo,
W-khabbaron bi-kell shi sar, w-ba3aton 3a-Yafa.
Meshyo tene yawm. W-lamma 2arrabo min Yafa, toli3 Boutros 3al-sat7 3al-dohr ta-ysalle,
w-je3 w-ken baddo yekol. W-lamma ballasho y7addroulo el-2akl fet bi-ghayboube,
w-shef el-sama maftou7a, w-shi byeshbah sha2fet 2mesh kbire ma3'2oude bi-trafa el-arb3a 3am tenzal 3al-ard.
W-ken fi 3leya kell shi fi 7ayawenet btemshe w-zawe7if w-3safeer.
W-eja sawt y2ello: "ya Boutros, 2oum dba7 w-kol."
2al Boutros: "la2 ya RAB! Ma akalet bi-7ayete 2akl nejs aw mamnou3."
2allo el-sawt marra tenye: "yalle tahharo ALLAH ma te3tebro enta nejs!"
W-sar hal-shi tlet marrat, min ba3da toli3 hal-shi deghre 3al-sama.
W-lamma ken Boutros me7tar 3am yes2al 7alo shou bte3ne hal-rou2ya yalle shefa, keno el-rjel yalle ba3aton Kornilyos 3am yes2alo 3an beyt Sem3an w-we2fo 3al-beb
W-sa2alo: "hon 2e3id Sem3an yalle bisammouh Boutros?"
Ken Boutros ba3do 3am bifakker bel-rou2ya, 2allo el-ROU7: "hon fi tlet rjel 3am yetolbouk,
2oum w-nzal la-3andon w-rou7 ma3on w-ma tkhaf, li2anno ana ba3atton."
Nezl Boutros w-2allon: "Ana houe yalle 3am tetolbouh. Leysh jeeto?"
Jewabouh: "ba3atna el-dabet Kornilyos, w-houe rejjel sale7 bikhaf ALLAH w-byesh'had 3ala fadlo kell el-Yahoud, li2anno malèk taher talab minno enno yjeebak 3ala beyto ta-yesma3 shou 3endak t2ello."
3azamon Boutros la-3ando. W-tene yawm, 2am w-ra7 ma3on w-refa2o ba3d el-ekhwe min Yafa,
wossil 3a-Kaysariyya bel-yawm el-tene. W-ken Kornilyos nateron ma3 yalle 3azamon min 2raybino w-asdika2o el-2rab.
W-lamma fet Boutros, sta2balo Kornilyos w-wa2a3 3al-ard w-raka3 eddemo.
2awwamo Boutros w-2allo: "2oum, ana bashar metlak!"
W-fet houe w-3am ye7kiyon, w-le2a ktir nes mjamma3in,
2allon: "bta3erfo enno el-Yahoude ma bi7e2ello ye2'3od ma3 ajnabe, aw yfout beyto. Bass ALLAH farjene enno ma lezim e7sob 7ada min el-nes nejs aw ghayr taher.
W-lamma 3azamtoune jeet bidoun ma e3terid. W-bes2alkon: leysh 3azamtoune?"
2al Kornilyos: "kent min arba3 tiyem 3am salle bi-beyte 3al-se3a tlete ba3d el-dohr, sheft rejjel lebis tyeb bitlamme3 we2if eddeme
w-2alle: "ya Kornilyos! Sem3 ALLAH salawetak w-zakar a3melak el-kheyriyye,
b3at 3a-Yafa, w-nede Sem3an yalle bisammouh Boutros, w-houe nezil bi-beyt Sem3an el-debbegh 3ala shatt el-ba7r."
Ba3atto deghre, w-enta 3emlt mni7 ennak jeet. Ne7na halla2 kellna eddem ALLAH natrin nesma3 kell shi 2amarak yeh el-RAB."
2al Boutros: "bshouf enno ALLAH bel-7a2i2a ma bifaddel 7ada 3ala 7ada,
yalle bikhaf ALLAH, shou ma ken 2aslo, w-bya3mil el-kheyr bikoun ma2boul 3endo.
Ba3at kelmto la-wled Isra2il ta-ye3lon injil el-salem bi-YASOU3 el-MASI7 yalle houe RAB el-3alam kello.
W-ento bta3erfo shou sar bel-Yahoudiye kella, eza ballashna min el-Jaleel min ba3d el-ma3moudiyye yalle neda fiya You7anna,
W-keef masa7 ALLAH YASOU3 el-Nassire bel-ROU7 el-2ODOS wel-edra, w-meshe bi-kell el-matare7 3am ya3mil el-kheyr w-yeshfe kell yalle stawla 3leyon eblees, li2anno ALLAH ken ma3o.
W-ne7na shouhoud 3ala kell shi 3emlo min el-kheyr bi-bled el-Yahoud w-bi-Ourashalim. W-houe yalle salabouh w-2atalouh.
Bass ALLAH 2awwamo bel-yawm el-telit w-khalleh yezhar,
mish la-kell el-sha3b, bass lal-shouhoud yalle khtaron ALLAH min abl, ye3ne elna ne7na yalle akalna w-shrebna ma3o min ba3d 2iyemto min el-mawt.
W-wassana enno nbasher el-sha3b w-nesh'had enno ALLAH khalleh ydeen el-3ayshin wel-mawta.
W-la-elo byesh'hado kell el-anbiya bi-enno kell meen bi2ãmen fih, bi-esmo, btenghafar khatayah."
W-lamma ken Boutros 3am ye7ke, nezl el-ROU7 el-2ODOS 3ala kell yalle 3am yesma3o kalemo.
T3ajjabo ahl el-khatn, yalle keno mref2in Boutros, lamma shefo enno ALLAH 3ata maweheb el-ROU7 el-2ODOS lal-nes el-mish Yahoud kamen,
li2anno sem3ouwon 3am ye7ko bi-loughat ghayr lougheton w-ysabb7o ALLAH. 2al Boutros:
"Haydol el-nes n3atalon el-ROU7 el-2ODOS metlna ne7na, meen bye2dar yemna3 3annon may el-ma3moudiyye?"
W-2amaron enno yet3ammado bi-esm YASOU3 el-MASI7. W-3azamouh ydall 3endon kamm yawm.
W-sem3o el-rousl wel-ekhwe bel-Yahoudiye enno el-mish Yahoud kamen 2eblo kalem ALLAH.
W-lamma toli3 Boutros 3ala Ourashalim, ze3lo minno ahl el-khatn w-2aloulo:
"Ro7t 3end nes mish makhtounin w-akalt ma3on!"
Khabbaron Boutros bi-kell shi sar ma3o, w-2al:
ana w-3am salle bi-Yafa, sheft ana w-bi-ghayboube rou2ya, w-ken shi metl sha2fet 2mesh kbire ma3'2oude bi-trafa el-arb3a nezlit min el-sama 7atta wosslit la-3ande.
W-ettalla3it fiya mni7, w-sheft 3leya 7ayawenet btemshe w-zawe7if w-3safeer,
w-sme3t sawt 3am bi2elle: ya Boutros, 2oum dba7 w-kol!
2elet: la2, ya RAB! Ma akalet bi-7ayete 2akl nejs aw mamnou3!
Jewabne el-sawt marra tenye min el-sama: yalle tahharo ALLAH ma te3tebro enta nejs.
W-sar hal-shi tlet marrat, w-min ba3da toli3 hal-shi deghre 3al-sama.
W-bi haydik el-se3a we2fo tlet rjel eddem beb el-beyt yalle kent fih, w-ken ba3aton la-3ande 7ada min Kaysariyya.
2amarne el-ROU7 enno rou7 ma3on bidoun ma etraddad. Refa2oune hal-ekhwe el-sitte 3ala Kaysariyya, w-fetna 3a-beyt Kornilyos,
w-khabbarna keef shef el-malèk we2if bi-beyto w-2allo: b3at nes 3ala Yafa, w-jeeb Sem3an yalle bisammouh Boutros,
houe bi2ellak 7ake bto7sal min khilelo 3al-khalãs enta w-kell ahl beytak.
W-lamma ballashet e7ke, nezl el-ROU7 el-2ODOS 3leyon metl ma nezl 3leyna ne7na bel-awwal.
W-tzakkaret yalle 2alo el-RAB: 3ammad You7anna bel-may, bass ento btet3ammado bel-ROU7 el-2ODOS.
Eza 3ata ALLAH hal-ashkhas yalle 3atana yeh la-elna ne7na lamma 2ãmanna bel-RAB YASOU3 el-MASI7, meen bkoun ana ta-2ou2af bi-wejj ALLAH?"
W-lamma sem3o el-mawjoudin hal-7ake, re2o w-majjado ALLAH w-2alo: "an3am ALLAH, fa-ezan, 3al-mish Yahoud kamen bel-tawbe ta-yo7salo 3al-7ayet!"
Bass el-mou2minin yalle tshattato lamma edtahadouwon min ba3d mawt Estefanos, nta2alo la-Finikya w-2obros w-Antakya, w-keno ma 3am bibashro 7ada bi-injil ALLAH ella el-Yahoud.
Bass kamm wa7ad min hal-mou2minin yalle min 2obros w-Kayrin ejo 3ala Antakya w-saro ye7ko kamen ma3 yalle bye7ko Younene w-ybashrouwon bel-RAB YASOU3.
W-kenit 2id el-RAB ma3on, w-2ãmano ktar minnon w-rej3o lal-RAB.
Wossil el-khabar la-kniset Ourashalim, w-ba3ato Barnaba la-Antakya.
W-lamma eja w-shef ne3met ALLAH fer7 w-shajja3on kellon 3al-thabet bel-RAB min kell 2albon.
W-ken Barnaba rejjel sale7, melyen min el-ROU7 el-2ODOS wel-imen, w-ndamm lal-RAB nes ktir.
W-ra7 Barnaba 3a-Tarsous ta-yfattish 3an Shawol,
w-lamma le2eh jebo 3ala Antakya. W-be2yo sene kemle 3am yejtem3o ma3 jame3et el-knise, w-3allamo nes ktir. Bi-Antakya, tsammo el-tlemiz awwal marra bel-masi7iyyin.
Bi-haydik el-iyem, nezlo kamm wa7ad min el-anbiya min Ourashalim 3ala Antakya.
Eja wa7ad minnon w-esmo Agapos w-tnabba bi-wa7e min el-ROU7 enno maje3a 3azeeme ra7 t3emm el-ard kella, w-hiye yalle saret 3ala iyem el-2aysar Klodyos.
Se3eta 2arraro el-tlemiz enno yeb3ato, kell wa7ad bi-7asab edrto, mouse3ade lal-ekhwe yalle bel-Yahoudiye.
W-3emlo hal-shi, w-ba3ato mouse3adeton la-shyoukh el-knise ma3 Barnaba w-Shawol.
Bi-haydak el-wa2et sar el-malik Hirodos yedtehed rjel el-knise.
W-2atal bi-7add el-seyf Ya3koub khayy You7anna.
W-lamma shef enno hal-shi byorde el-Yahoud, kamash Boutros, w-ken hal-shi bi-iyem el-Fateer.
Min ba3d ma kamasho 7atto bel-7abs w-sallamo la-arba3 fera2 la-ye7ersouh, kell fer2a arba3 jnoud. W-ken newe y7ãkmo eddem el-sha3b min ba3d 3id el-fos7,
kermel hek khalleh bel-7abs. W-kenit el-knise 3am bitsalle la-ALLAH kell el-wa2et kermelo.
W-ken Boutros, bel-leyle yalle m2arrar fiya Hirodos enno tene yawm y7ãkmo eddem el-sha3b, neyim bayn 7arasen. W-ken mrabbat bi-jnazeer, w-3al-beb fi jnoud 3am ye7erso el-7abs.
W-zahar malèk el-RAB faj2a, w-shara2 nour jouwwet el-7abs. W-darab el-malèk Boutros 3ala janbo, w-wa3eh w-2allo: "2oum 3al sari3!" W-nfakko el-jnazeer 3an 2idey.
W-2allo el-malèk: "shedd zennarak w-rbot sandalak" W-hek 3eml. Min ba3da 2allo: "Lbos tyebak w-l7a2ne."
Dahar w-le7'2o, w-houe mish 3erif enno yalle 3am ya3emlo el-malèk ken shi 7a2i2e, ken mfakkaro rou2ya.
2ata3o 3al-7aras el-awwal wel-tene, w-woslo 3al-beb el-7adid yalle bi-wejj el-madine, w-nfata7 la-wa7do. W-daharo w-2ata3o tari2 wa7ad, w-tarako el-malèk bi-se3eta.
We3e Boutros 3a-7alo w-2al: "halla2 t2akkadit enno el-RAB ba3at malèko, w-khallasne min 2id Hirodos w-min kell yalle keno el-Yahoud natrin ennon ya3emlouh fiyye."
Min ba3da fakkar shwey w-ra7 3ala beyt Maryam emm You7anna yalle esmo Mercos. W-ken fi honik jame3a kbire 3am bitsalle.
Da2 Boutros 3al-beb min barra, ejet khadme esma Rawda ta-tesma3 w-ta3rif meen fi wara el-beb.
W-lamma 3erft sawt Boutros rakadet la-jouwwa bidoun ma tefta7 el-beb 2add ma kenit fer7ane, w-khabbareton enno Boutros 3al-beb.
2aloula: "3am t'halewse!" Asarret 3ala kalema, 2aloula: "hayda malèko!"
W-sar Boutros yde2 3al-beb ta-fata7oulo, w-lamma shefouh ndahasho.
Sakkaton bi-ishara min 2ido w-khabbaron keef talla3o el-RAB min el-7abs. W-2allon: "khabbro Ya3koub wel-ekhwe bi-yalle sar." Min ba3da dahar w-ra7 3ala matra7 tene.
Wel-sob7 khafo el-7aras ktir w-sa2alo 7alon: "shou sar bi-Boutros?"
W-lamma talabo Hirodos w-ma le2eh, sa2al el-7aras w-2amar yen2atalo. Min ba3da nezl min el-Yahoudiye 3a-Kaysariyya w-be2e fiya.

W-ken Hirodos ghodben 3ala ahl Sour w-Sayda. Fa-ettafa2o bayn ba3don w-ejo la-3ando, min ba3d ma jebo Blastos, wakeel el-malik, la-meyleton, w-talabo el-salem li2anno bledon btettekil meddiyyan 3ala mamlekto.
W-bel-yawm el-mou7addad lal-lika2 lebs Hirodos tyebo ka-malik w-2a3ad 3al-3arsh w-sar ye7ke ma3 el-sha3b.
Sar el-sha3b yesrokh: "hayda sawt Ileh mish sawt 2ensen!"
Fa-darabo malèk el-RAB deghre li2anno ma majjad ALLAH. W-akalo el-doud w-met.
W-ken kalem ALLAH 3am yenteshir w-yethmor.
W-reje3 Barnaba w-Shawol min Ourashalim min ba3d ma kammalo khedmeton, ma3 You7anna yalle esmo Mercos.
W-ken fi bi-kniset Antakya anbiya w-mou3allimin henne: Barnaba w-Sham3oun yalle esmo Nijar, w-Loukyos el-Kayrini, w-Manayen, w-houe sadee2 el-malik Hirodos min henne w-zghar, w-Shawol.
W-lamma keno 3am yekhedmo el-RAB w-ysoumo 2allon el-ROU7 el-2ODOS: "khassesoule Barnaba w-Shawol la-3amal d3iton elo."
Samo w-sallo, min ba3da 7atto 2ideyon 3leyon w-fallalouwon.
Ba3aton el-ROU7 el-2ODOS, fa-nezlo 3ala Saloukya w-min honik sefaro bel-ba7r 3ala 2obros.
Lamma woslo 3ala Salamis basharo bi-kalem ALLAH bi-majeme3 el-Yahoud, w-ken 3am bise3edon You7anna.
2ata3o el-jazire kella la-7add madinet Bafos. W-le2o fiya se7ir Yahoude byedde3e el-noubouwe bel-kezb w-esmo Baryashou3,
Min 7ashyet Sarjyos Boulos 7akem el-jazire. W-ken hayda rejjel 3endo 7ekme, ba3at wara Barnaba w-Shawol w-talab minnon enno yesma3 kalem ALLAH.
Bass "3alim" el-se7ir, w-hayda ma3na esmo, 3ãradon w-3eml kell shi kermel ma y2ãmen el-7akem.
Ntala Shawol, w-esmo kamen Boulos, ntala min el-ROU7 el-2ODOS, w-ettalla3 3al-se7ir
w-2allo: "ya 2eben eblees, ya 3adouw kell kheyr, enta el-melyen bi-kell khabsane w-ghesh! Ma ra7 twa'2if te3wij tor2at el-RAB el-jelse?
Ra7 tedorbak 2id el-RAB, w-ra7 tsir a3ma ma fik tshouf nour el-shams la-wa2et." W-ejet 3a-3youno deghre ghashewe sawda, w-sar ydour 7awl 7alo 3am yetrajja 7ada y2oudo bi-2ido.
W-2ãman el-7akem lamma shef shou sar, w-ndahash min ta3lim el-RAB.
Min ba3da ab7ar Boulos w-rfe2o min Bafos 3ala Barja bi-Bamfilya, w-tarakon You7anna w-reje3 3ala Ourashalim.
Bass henne ra7o min Barja 3a-Antakya bi-Bisidya. W-feto 3al-majma3 yawm el-sabt w-2a3ado.
Min ba3d ma n2ara fasl min shari3et Moussa w-ketob el-anbiya, ba3atoulon rou2asa el-majma3 y2ouloulon: "ya ekhwe, eza ken 3endkon shi badkon tou3azo fih el-sha3b, 7kou."
2am Boulos w-3eml ishara bi-2ido w-2al: "ya wled Isra2il, ento yalle bte3bado ALLAH, sma3o:
Ileh hal-sha3b, sha3b Isra2il, khtar bayyetna w-3alla min 2imet hal-sha3b lamma ken gharib bi-ard Masr. Min ba3da dahharon min Masr bi-2ouwwto.
W-t7ammal kell shi minnon la-meddit arb3een sene bel-barriye.
W-dammar sab3 oumam bi-ard Ken3an w-warraton arda,
w-be2e hal-shi arba3 miyye w-khamseen sene. Min ba3da jeb 2oudat la-7add 3ahd el-nabe Samou2il.
Min ba3da talabo min ALLAH malik, 3atahon Shawol 2eben Kays, min 3ashiret Benyamin, meddit arb3een sene.
Ba3den 3azalo w-7att Daoud malik 3leyon w-shehedlo, 2al: l2it Daoud 2eben Yassa rejjel byorde 2albe, w-ra7 ya3mil kell shi badde yeh.
W-ba3at ALLAH min sleelet Daoud 7asab el-wa3d YASOU3 moukhallis la-sha3b Isra2il.
W-abl ma yeje YASOU3, neda You7anna kell sha3b Isra2il bi-ma3moudiyyet el-tawbe.
W-2al houe w-3am ykhallis 3amalo: mfakkrin enno ana houe? La2! Houe byeje ba3d minne, w-ana ma best7e2 7atta enno erbotlo sandalo.
W-kaffa 7ake, 2al: ya ekhewte, ya wled Ibrahim, wel-mawjoudin ma3kon min yalle bye3bado ALLAH, la-elna ba3at ALLAH kelmet el-khalãs.
La-ahl Ourashalim w-rou2ase2on 3erfo el-MASI7, w-la henne fehmo kalem el-anbiya bi-kell yawm sabt, fa-7a'2a2o hal-kalem lamma 7akamo 3le.
W-ma3 ennon ma le2o jerm byest7e2 enno ymout bi-sababo, talabo min Bilatos enno ye2etlo.
W-min ba3d ma 7a'2a2o kell shi katabo el-anbiya 3anno, nazzalouh 3an el-salib w-7attouh bel-2abr.
Bass ALLAH 2awwamo min el-mawt,
w-zahar 3eddit marrat la-yalle tel3o ma3o min el-Jaleel 3a-Ourashalim. W-henne halla2 shouhoud elo eddem el-sha3b.
W-ne7na minbasherkon bi-enno yalle wa3ad ALLAH fih bayyetna
t7a'2a2 kermelna, ne7na wledon, lamma 2awwam YASOU3 min el-mawt, metl ma eja bel-mazmour el-tene: enta 2ebne, w-ana liom waladtak.
W-enno ykoun ALLAH 2awwamo min el-mawt w-ma ye2dar 3le el-fased, hal-shi maktoub lamma 2al: ra7 a3tikon el-baraket el-m2addase el-akide yalle wa3adet fiya Daoud.
Kermel hek 2al bi-mazmour tene: ma ra7 tetrok 2ouddousak yshouf el-fased.
Bass Daoud, min ba3d ma 3eml 7asab iradet ALLAH bi-iyemo, met w-ndafan 7add bayyeto, w-shef el-fased.
Bass yalle 2awwamo ALLAH, ma shef el-fased.
3rafo, ya ekhewte, enno ne7na bi-YASOU3 minbasherkon bi-ghefran el-khataya,
w-yalle bi2ãmen fih byetbarrar min kell shi ma edrit shari3et Moussa enno tbarrero minno.
Ntebho ta-ma ysir fikon yalle nktab bi-ketob el-anbiya:
"Ettalla3o, ento yalle 3am tetmaskharo! T3ajjabo w-hlako. Ana ba3mil bi-iyemkon 3amal, eza khabbarkon 7ada 3anno ma ra7 tsadd2ouh."
W-lamma keno Boulos w-Barnaba dahrin min el-majma3, talabo minnon enno ykhabrouwon bi-hal-eshya nhar el-sabt el-jeye.
W-ba3d el-ejtime3 le7'2ouwon ktir min el-Yahoud w-yalle saro Yahoud w-yalle bye3bado ALLAH, 7ekyouwon w-shajja3ouwon 3ala el-thabet bi-ne3met ALLAH.
W-nhar el-sabt yalle min ba3do, tjamma3o ahl el-madine ta-yesma3o kalem el-RAB.
W-lamma shefo el-Yahoud el-nes mjamma3in, ntalo ghire w-saro yreddo 3a-kalem Boulos bel-msabbet.

Se3eta Boulos w-Barnaba 2aloulon bi-jer2a: "ken lezim nbasherkon ento awwal shi bi-kelmet ALLAH, bass rafadtouwa, w-7akamto 3a-7alkon ennkon ma btest7e'2o el-7ayet el-abadiyye. Kermel hek 3am netwajjah halla2 lal-mish Yahoud.
Wel-RAB wassana, 2al: "3melt minnak nour lal-oumam, ta-te7mol el-khalãs la-ekher el-dene."
W-lamma sem3o el-mish Yahoud shou 2al Boulos fer7o w-majjado kalem el RAB. W-2ãmano kell yalle khtaron ALLAH lal-7ayet el-abadiyye.
W-ntashar kalem el RAB bi-haydik el-bled kella.
Bass el-Yahoud 7arrado woujaha el-madine wel-neswen el-shourafa yalle keno ye3bado ALLAH, w-edtahado Boulos w-Barnaba w-sha7atouwon min honik.
Se3eta nafado 3annon ghabret erjreyon w-nta2alo la-Aykounya.
Wel-tlemiz keno melyenin min el-fara7 w-min el-ROU7 el-2ODOS.
W-feto Boulos w-Barnaba metl el-3ade 3a-majma3 el-Yahoud bi-Aykounya w-7ekyo 7ake khalla ktar min el-Yahoud wel-Youneniyyin y2ãmno.
Bass el-Yahoud yalle rafado enno y2ãmno 7arrado el-mish Yahoud 3al-ekhwe w-naza3o 2loubon.
Bass Boulos w-Barnaba be2yo honik medde tawile 3am ye7ko bi-jer2a 3an el-RAB. W-ken el-RAB 3am ysabbit kalemon 3an ne3emto bi-3ajeyeb keno 3am ya3mlouwa.
W-n2asamo ahl el-madine, nosson ken ma3 el-Yahoud wel-be2yin ma3 el-rasouleyn.
W-lamma 2arraro el-Yahoud wel-mish Yahoud, w-ma3on rou2ase2on, enno yhino el-rasouleyn w-yerejmouwon,
7asso bi-hal-shi w-harabo 3ala Listra w-Darba wel-moudon el-2aribe bi-wileyet Likounya,
w-saro ybashro honik.
W-ken bi-Listra fi rejjel d3if khel2 mkarsa7, ma meshe wala marra bi-7ayeto.
W-lamma ken 3am yesma3 la-kalem Boulos, ettalla3 fih Boulos w-shef fih imen bikhawwlo yenshafa,
2allo bi-sawt 3ale: "2oum, w2af 3a-ejreyk!" 2am yemshe.
W-lamma shefo el-nes shou 3eml Boulos, sarakho bi-lougheton el-Likouniyye: "saro el-ãliha metl el-bashar w-nezlo 3leyna!"
W-sammo Barnaba Zayos, w-Boulos Harmes li2anno houe yalle ken 3am ye7ke.
W-Kehen Zayos, yalle ken ma3bado 3end madkhal el-madine, jeb thiran w-akalil min zhour 7atton 3al-bweb, li2anno ken baddo y2addim zabi7a ma3 el-nes.
W-lamma sem3o Barnaba w-Boulos bi-hal-shi khazza2o tyebon w-rakado y2oulo lal-nes:
"Shou 3am ta3emlo, ya nes? ne7na bashar d3af metlkon, jeena nbasherkon bi-enno teterko hal-ãliha w-terja3o la-ALLAH el-7ayy yalle khala2 el-sama wel-ard wel-ba7r w-kell shi fiya.
Sama7 la-kell el-oumam bel-3ousour el-madye temshe bi-tari2a,
bass ken 3am bibarhen enno houe masdar kell kheyr: nazzal el-shete min el-sama w-3ata thimar bi-mawsama, w-3atakon 2akl w-malla 2loubkon fara7."
W-min ba3d el-7ake yalle 7ekyouh, ma edro el-rasouleyn enno yemna3o el-nes y2addmo zabi7a elon ella min ba3d jehd ktir.
W-eja kamm wa7ad min el-Yahoud min Antakya w-Aykounya w-jarrabo yekhdo el-nes la-meyleton, w-rajamo Boulos w-jarrouh la-barrat el-madine w-fakkarouh met.
W-lamma tjamma3o el-tlemiz 7awlo, 2am w-fet 3al-madine. W-tene yawm toli3 ma3 Barnaba 3a-Darba.
Boulos w Barnaba basharo bi-Darba w-Kaspa w-reb7o tlemiz ktir. W-min ba3da rej3o 3ala Listra, w-ba3den 3a-Aykounya w-Antakya,
ta-yshajj3o el-tlemiz 3al-thabet bi-imenon, w-y2ouloulon: "la-bodd min enno net7ammal masa3eb ktire ta-nfout 3a-malakout ALLAH."
W-khtaro shyoukh mas2oulin bi-kell knise, w-keno ysallo w-ysoumo w-ysallmouwon lal-RAB yalle 2ãmano fih.
W-2ata3o el-rasouleyn Basidya 7atta weslo 3a-Bamfilya.
W-basharo bi-kalem ALLAH bi-Barja. Min ba3da nezlo 3a-Attaliya,
w-min honik sefaro bel-ba7r 3ala Antakya yalle fallo minna, w-ne3met ALLAH mref2eton bi-sabab el-3amal yalle 3emlouh.
