W-lamma woslo 3ala Antakya jama3o el knise, w-khabbaro bi-kell shi 3emlo ALLAH 3ala 2ideyon, w-keef fata7 beb el-imen lal-mish Yahoud.
W-be2yo shwey honik ma3 el-tlemiz.
Nezlo jame3a min el-Yahoudiye w-saro y3allmo el-ekhwe, w-y2oulo: "ma fi elkon khalãs ella eza nkhatanto 3ala shari3et Moussa."
W-sar fi baynon w-bayn Boulos w-Barnaba khilef w-jidel 2awe. W-ettafa2o enno yotla3o Boulos w-Barnaba w-ghayron min el-mou2minin 3ala Ourashalim ta-yraj3o el-rousl wel-shyoukh bi-hal-shaghle.
Min ba3d ma wadda3eton el-knise 2ata3o Finikya wel-Samira henne w-3am bikhabbro keef rej3o el-mish Yahoud la-ALLAH, w-keno el-ekhwe mabsoutin ktir bi-hal-akhbar.
W-lamma woslo 3ala Ourashalim sta2baleton el-knise wel-rousl wel-shyoukh bi-7arara, w-khabbarouwon bi-kell shi 3emlo ALLAH 3ala 2ideyon.
Fa-2amo kamm wa7ad min el-mou2minin yalle keno abl ferrisiyyin w-2alo: "lezim enno el-mish Yahoud yenkhatano w-yemsho 7asab shari3et Moussa."
W-jtama3o el-rousl wel-shyoukh ta-yetshewaro bi-hal-shaghle.
Min ba3d jidel tawil 2am Boutros w-2allon: "ya ekhwe, bta3erfo enno ALLAH khtarne min baynetkon min zamen 7atta yesma3o el-mish Yahoud kalem el-injil min temme w-y2ãmno.
W-ALLAH yalle bya3rif shou fi bel-2loub, barhan enno rade 3annon, w-3atahon el-ROU7 el-2ODOS metl ma 3atana yeh elna,
w-ma farra2 baynetna w-bayneton bi-shi. Houe tahhar 2loubon bel-imen.
Leysh 3am bitjarrbo ALLAH halla2 bi-ennkon 3am t7otto 3ala ra2bet el-tlemiz neer ma edro bayyetna w-ne7na ma edrna ne7emlo?
Khassatan enno ne7na min2ãmen enno khalãsna bi-ne3met el-RAB YASOU3 metl ma henne kamen ra7 yle2o el-khalãs."
Sakato el-mejtem3in kellon w-tsamma3o la-Barnaba w-Boulos lamma khabbarouwon 3an el-3ajeyeb yalle 3emela ALLAH 3ala 2ideyon eddem el-mish Yahoud.
Min ba3d ma khallaso kalemon, 2al Ya3koub: "sma3oule, ya ekhwe:
khabbarkon Sem3an keef htamm ALLAH bel-awwal enno yekhod min bayn el-oumam sha3b 3a-esmo.
W-hayda biwefi2 kalem el-anbiya bel-ketob el-m2addase:
"ra7 erja3 ba3den, w-3ammir khaymet Daoud el-mhaddame: salli7 shou be2e minna w-2awwema
ta-yfattsho be2e el-nes 3an el-RAB w-yfattsho 3anno kamen kell el-shou3oub yalle bye7emlo esme. Hayda yalle bi2oulo el-RAB yalle 3eml kell hal-shi,
w-khalleh ma3rouf min zamen."
Kermel hek bshouf enno ma nta'2el 3ala yalle rej3o la-ALLAH w-henne mish Yahoud,
w-nekteblon enno ma ya3emlo zabeye7 el-asnam el-nejse w-ma yezno w-ma yeklo 7ayawenet makhnou2a wala-dammon.
Li2anno shari3et Moussa min zamen btet3allam bi-kell madine w-bye2rouwa kell sabt bel-majeme3."

W-ettafa2o el-rousl wel-shyoukh wel-knise kella 3ala ikhtiyar rejjelen minnon ta-yeb3atouwon 3a-Antakya ma3 Barnaba w-Boulos. Khtaro Yahouza yalle esmo Barsaba, w-Sila, w-ken elon 2imeton bayn el-ekhwe,
w-sallamouwon hal-risele: "min ekhwetkon el-rousl wel-shyoukh lal-ekhwe yalle keno mish Yahoud w-rej3o la-ALLAH bi-Antakya w-Souriya w-Kilikya, ALLAH ma3kon:
sme3na enno fi nes ejo la-3andkon bidoun ma netlob minnon, za3ajoukon w-za3za3o afkarkon.
Kermel hek ettafa2na nekhtar rejjelen neb3atelkon yehon ma3 el-7abiben Barnaba w-Boulos,
rejjelen karraso 7ayeton la-khedmet RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Ba3atnehon w-henne Yahouza w-Sila ta-y2ouloulkon wejj-la-wejj yalle 3am nektebelkon yeh.
Wel-ROU7 el-2ODOS w-ne7na 2arrarna enno ma n7ammelkon 7eml t2il ella yalle la-bodd minno, w-houe
enno ma ta3emlo zabeye7 el-asnam el-nejse w-ma tezno w-ma teklo 7ayawenet makhnou2a wala-dammon. W-eza ntabahto w-7arasto 7alkon min hal-shi, bitkouno 3am ta3emlo mni7. W-ALLAH bikoun ma3kon."
Fallo w-nezlo 3ala Antakya, w-ba3ato wara jame3et el-mou2minin w-sallamouwon el-risele.
W-lamma 2eryouwa fer7o ktir bi-yalle eja fiya min teshji3.
W-Yahouza w-Sila, yalle keno henne kamen anbiya, 2alo wa3za tawile shajja3o fiya el-ekhwe.
Min ba3d ma be2yo wa2et bi-Antakya, tarakouwon el-ekhwe bi-salem w-tarakouwon yrou7o la-3and yalle ba3atouwon.
Bass Sila shef enno lezim yeb2a honik, fa-reje3 Yahouza wa7do.
W-2a3ado Boulos w-Barnaba bi-Antakya, y3allmo w-ybashro bi-kalem el-RAB w-ma3on ktar ghayron.
Min ba3d kamm yawm, 2al Boulos la-Barnaba: "ta3a nerja3 ta-netfa2ad el-ekhwe bi-kell madine basharna fiya bi-kalem el-RAB, w-nettamman 3annon."
W-Barnaba ken 7abeb enno yrefe2on You7anna el-moula2ab bi-Mercos,
bass Boulos ma ken baddo yref2ouh el-ashkhas yalle tarakouwon bi-Bamfilya w-ma sherakouwon bel-khedme.
Se3eta khtalafo w-ba3den ftara2o. Akhad Barnaba Mercos w-sefaro bel-ba7r 3ala 2obros.
W-Boulos, na'2a Sila ta-ykoun ma3o w-toli3 min Antakya, min ba3d ma sallamouh el-ekhwe la-ne3met el-RAB.
2ata3 Souriya w-Kilikya houe w-3am bi2awwe imen el-kaneyes.
W-wossil Boulos 3ala Darba w-Listra. W-ken fi bi-Listra telmiz esmo Timothawos, emmo Yahoudiye mou2mine w-bayyo Younene.
W-keno el-ekhwe bi-Listra w-Aykounya m2addrino ktir.
W-arad Boulos enno yekhdo ma3o, fa-khatano li2anno kell el-Yahoud honik keno ya3erfo enno bayyo Younene.
W-lamma keno yemer2o bel-moudon, keno ywasslo lal-mou2minin honik wassaya el-rousl wel-shyoukh bi-Ourashalim w-ywassouwon enno ytabb2ouwa
w-kenit el-kaneyes 3am tenma bel-imen w-3am yzeed 3adada yawm ba3d yawm.
2ata3o manate2 Firijiyya w-Ghalatya, li2anno el-ROU7 el-2ODOS mana3on min el-tebshir bi-kalem ALLAH bi-Ãsia.
Lamma 2arrabo min Misiyya jarrabo yfouto 3a-Bithiniyya, bass ROU7 YASOU3 ma sama7lon.
Kermel hek 2ata3o Misiyya w-nezlo 3ala Tarwas.
W-bel-leyl shef Boulos rou2ya, rejjel Makdoune we2if 3am yetrajjeh w-y2ello: "ta3a la-3anna 3a-Makdouniyye w-se3edna!"
W-lamma shef Boulos hal-rou2ya, 2arrarna nsefir deghre 3a-Makdouniyye, li2anno kenna m2akkadin enno ALLAH baddo yena nbashir honik.
Rkebna el-safine min Tarwas ray7in sawb Samoutrakya, w-tene yawm re7na 3a-Neyapolis
w-min honik 3a-Filippi w-hiye akbar madine bi-wileyet Makdouniyye, w-mosta3mara Roumaniyye, w-b2ina kamm yawm fiya.
W-nhar el-sabt tlo3na min el-madine 3ala 7affit el-nahr, metwa2'3in enno nle2e honik matra7 Yahoude ta-nsalle. 2a3adna ne7ke ma3 el-neswen el-mejtem3in honik.
W-ken fi bayneton mara 3am tesma3elna esma Lidya min madinet Thiyatira, bitbee3 el-ourjouwen w-bte3bad ALLAH. W-fata7 ALLAH 2alba la-tesma3 la-kalem Boulos.
W-lamma t3ammadet hiye w-ahl beyta, 2aletelna hiye w-3am tetrajjena: "ta3o 3a-beyte, w-b2ou fih eza kento bte3tebroune mou2mine bel-RAB." Se3eta jabaretna ne2bal 3azeemeta.
W-fi marra kenna ray7in 3al-sala, lta2eyna bi-khadme fiya rou7 3arafe, w-kenit 3am terba7 min hal-shi ktir masare w-ta3tiyon la-asyeda.
W-le7'2et Boulos w-le7'2etna, hiye w-3am tesrokh: "hal-rjel kheddem ALLAH, 3am bibashroukon bi-tari2 el-khalãs!"
W-tkarrar hal-shi 3eddit iyem la-7add ma 3assab Boulos, w-ltafat sawba w-2al lal-rou7: "be2emrak bi-esm YASOU3 el-MASI7 enno tedhar minna." W-dahar minna bi-se3et el-se3a.
W-lamma shefo rou2ase2a enno da3 2amalon min kasb el-masare, kamasho Boulos w-Sila w-jarrouwon 3ala se7it el-madine 3end el-2oudat,
w-2addamouwon lal-7ekkem w-2alo: "hal-rejjelen 3am yezra3o el-fawda bi-madinetna, w-henne Yahoud
3am bibashro bi-ta3alim ma mne2dar ne2bala aw nemshe fiya li2anno ne7na Roumaniyyin."
W-hejo el-nes 3leyon, w-khazza2o el-7ekkem tyeb Boulos w-Sila w-2amaro enno yenjalado.
Jaladouwon ktir w-7attouwon bel-7abs, w-wasso el-sejjen bi-enno yshaddid el-7irase 3leyon.
W-lamma wosslit hal-wassiye lal-sejjen, 7atton bel-7abs jouwwa jouwwa, w-7att ejreyon bi-2alib min khashab ta-ma yeherbo.
W-bi-noss el-leyl keno Boulos w-Sila 3am bisallo w-ysabb7o ALLAH, wel-m7abees 3am yesma3o,
sar fi faj2a zelzel kbir hazz kell el-7abs, w-nfata7et el-bweb kella, w-nfakket jnazeer el-m7abees kellon.
We3e el-sejjen min nawmo, w-shef bweb el-7abs maftou7a, fakkar enno el-m7abees harabo. Akhad seyfo ta-ye2tol 7alo,
nedeh Boulos bi-sawt 3ale, 2allo: "ou3a te2ze 7alak. Ne7na hon kellna!"
W-talab el-sejjen daw w-fet la-jouwwet el-7abs w-raka3 3ala ejren Boulos w-Sila houe w-3am yerjof.
Min ba3da talla3on w-2al: "ya sayyide, shou lezim a3mil ta-le2e el-khalãs?"
2aloulo: "2ãmen bel-RAB YASOU3 bitle2e el-khalãs enta w-ahl beytak."
W-basharouh houe w-kell ahl beyto bi-kalem el-RAB.
W-akhadon bi-haydik el-se3a min el-leyl w-ghassal jrou7on w-t3ammad houe w-kell ahl beyto.
Min ba3da 3azamon 3ala beyto w-ta3mehon. W-fer7 houe w-ahl beyto, li2anno 2ãman bi-ALLAH.
W-lamma toli3 el-daw ba3ato el-7ekkem 7aras ta-y2oulo lal-sejjen: "flot el-rejjelen!"
W-na2al el-sejjen hal-kalem la-Boulos, 2al: "2amaro el-7ekkem bi-enno yefeltoukon, dharo w-rou7o bi-salem!"
2al Boulos lal-7aras: "jaladouna eddem el-kell bidoun mou7ekame, w-ne7na Roumaniyyin, w-7attouna bel-7abs, w-henne halla2 baddon ydahhrouna bel-serr. La2, badde yejo el-7ekkem bi-zeton w-ydahhrouna."
Na2alo el-7aras hal-kalem lal-7ekkem. W-lamma 3erfo enno Boulos w-Sila Roumaniyyin khafo.
W-ejo la-3andon ta-ye3tezro, min ba3da talla3ouwon w-talabo minnon yfello min el-madine.
W-lamma daharo min el-7abs ra7o 3ala beyt Lidya, w-shefo el-ekhwe w-shajja3ouwon, w-min ba3da fallo.
Mara2o 3ala Amfipolis w-Apolonya w-woslo 3ala Tasalouniki, w-ken fiya majma3 lal-Yahoud.
Fet Boulos 3al-majma3 metl el-3ade, w-jedalon tlet sboute, 3a-ases el-ketob el-m2addase,
sar yeshra7a w-ybayyenlon keef ken lezim el-MASI7 yet2allam w-y2oum min el-mawt, 2al: "YASOU3 yalle 3am basherkon fih houe el-MASI7."
2tana3 kamm wa7ad minnon w-saro ma3 Boulos w-Sila, w-ma3on ktar min el-Youneniyyin yalle bye3bado ALLAH, w-3adad kbir min el-sayyidet el-fadilet.
Mele el-7asad 2loub el-Yahoud, w-jama3o rjel ashrar w-d3af 7ammaso el-nes w-zara3o el-fawda bel-madine. Min ba3da ejo 3ala beyt Yasoun ta-yetolbo Boulos w-Sila ta-ysalmouwon lal-sha3b el-mjamma3.
Ma le2ouwon. Akhado Yasoun w-ba3d el-ekhwe la-7ekkem el-madine henne w-3am yeserkho: "Hal-ashkhas yalle 3emlo fetne wayn ma ken henne halla2 hon
bi-diyafet Yasoun, w-kellon 3am ykhelfo 2awemer el-2aysar, w-3am y2oulo: "fi malik tene esmo YASOU3."
Stafazzo bi-hal-kalem kell el-sha3b wel-7ekkem.
W-talabo min Yasoun wel-be2yin daribe, dafa3ouha w-min ba3da falatouwon.
W-bel-leyl el-ekhwe ba3ato bi-ser3a Boulos w-Sila 3ala Birya, w-lamma woslo la-3andon, feto 3a-majma3 el-Yahoud.
W-keno hal-ashkhas metsem7in aktar min yalle bi-Tasalouniki, sem3o la-kalem ALLAH bi-raghbe 2awiye, w-saro yef7aso el-ketob el-m2addase kell yawm ta-yshoufo eza ta3alim Boulos w-Sila sa7i7a.
W-2ãman ktar minnon, w-2ãman min el-Youneniyyin neswen sharifet w-3adad kbir min el rjel.
W-lamma 3erfo el-Yahoud bi-Tasalouniki enno Boulos 3am ybasher bi-kalem ALLAH bi-Birya, ejo la-honik w-saro y7arrdo el-nes w-yestafezzouwon.
Se3eta talabo el-ekhwe deghre min Boulos yrou7 bi-ittijeh el-ba7r, w-be2yo Sila w-Timothawos wa2et tawil bi-Birya.
W-bennesbe la-yalle refa2o Boulos, wassalouh 3a-Atina, w-henne rej3o li2anno Boulos wassa Sila w-Timothawos enno yel7a2ouh bi-asra3 wa2et moumkin.
W-lamma ken Boulos bi-Atina natir Sila w-Timothawos, 3assab lamma shef el-madine melyene bel-asnam.
W-sar yne2ish el-Yahoud wel-met3abdin la-ALLAH bel-majma3, w-yalle byelta2a fiyon kell yawm bi-se7it el-madine.

W-keno el-falesfe el-Abikoriyyin wel-Riwakiyyin 3am yjedlouh, w-2alo: "shou baddo hal-therthar y2ellna?" W-fi minnon 2alo: "3am bibasher bi-2ãliha gharibe", li2anno Boulos ken 3am bibasher bi-YASOU3 wel-2iyeme.
W-akhado Boulos 3ala majles el-madine bi-Aryoupagos w-2aloulo: "badna na3rif 3an hal-mazhab el-jdid yalle 3am bitbasher fih,
li2anno ta3alimo gharibe, awwal marra mnesma3a, w-min7ebb na3ref shou bte3ne."
W-keno kell el-Atiniyyin wel-ajeneb el-3ayshin bayneton y7ebbo bi-aw2at faraghon ye7ko aw yesma3o el-akhbar el-jdide.
W-we2f Boulos bi-noss el-majles w-2al: "ya ahl Atina! Ana sheyif enno ento aktar nes bikhafo w-bye3bado el-ãliha.
Li2anno ana w-3am bebrom bi-madinetkon w-3am bittalla3 3ala ma3ebedkon l2it mazba7 maktoub 3le: lal-ileh el-majhoul. Hayda yalle 3am te3badouh w-ma bta3erfouh houe yalle 3am basherkon fih.
Houe ALLAH khale2 el-kawn w-kell shi fi, w-houe RAB el-sama wel-ard ma byeskon bi-ma3ebed 3ammareta 2iden el-bashar,
W-ma btekhedmo 2iden bashariyye, metl shi wa7ad me7tej la-shi, li2anno houe yalle bya3te kell el-bashar el-7ayet w-nasmet el-7ayet w-kell shi.
Khala2 kell el-bashar min 2asl wa7ad, w-khallehon yesekno 3ala wejj el-ard kella, w-7addadlon el-wa2et wel-maken yalle lezim yesekno fih,
7atta yfattsho 3anno barke bi7esso bi-woujoudo w-bile2ouh, w-houe 2aslan mish b3id 3an kell wa7ad minna.
Ne7na bi-wasteto min3ish w-mnet7arrak w-mnenwejid. W-ne7na kamen wledo, metl ma 2al she3ir min shou3ara2kon.
W-ma zel ne7na wled ALLAH, ma lezim nfakkir enno ALLAH houe shakl 3emlo el-2ensen min dahab aw fodda aw 7ajar bi-fanno w-shatarto.
W-eza ken ALLAH ghadd nazaro 3an jahlna bel-made, houe halla2 3am yed3e el-nes kellon wayn ma keno lal-tawbe,
li2anno 7addad el-nhar yalle 3a7 ydeen fih el-3alam kello bel-3adl bi-wastet rejjel khtaro, w-barhan la-kell el-nes enno houe khtaro lamma 2awwamo min el-mawt!"
W-lamma sem3ouh 3am yezkor 2iyemet el-mawta etda77ako 3le, w-2aloulo: "mneb2a mnesma3 minnak 3an hal-shi marra tenye."
Se3eta fall Boulos min bayneton,
bass fi minnon saro ma3o w-2ãmano, w-minnon Diyonisyos el-Aryopagi, wa7ad min majles el-madine, w-mara esma Damaris w-ghayron.
Min ba3da tarak Boulos Atina w-eja 3ala Korentos.
Le2a Yahoude min ahl el-Bount esmo Akila eja mish min zamen min Italya houe w-marto Preskilla, li2anno el-2aysar Klodyos 2amar kell el-Yahoud yfello min Roma. Fa-eja Boulos la-3andon,
w-sar yeshteghil 3endon, li2anno ken yeshteghil shaghleton, w-hiye sina3et el-khiyam.
W-ken bi-kell sabt yjedel el-Yahoud wel-Youneniyyin bel-majma3 ta-yjarrib ye2na3on.
W-lamma woslo Sila w-Timothawos min Makdouniyye, sar kell hamm Boulos el-tebshir bi-kelmet ALLAH, w-ken 3am yesh'had eddem el-Yahoud bi-enno YASOU3 houe el-MASI7.
Bass keno y3ardouh w-ysebbouh. Fa-nafad tyebo w-2allon: "dammkon 3ala raskon, ana bari2 minkon. Ra7 rou7 min liom w-raye7 la-3and ghayrkon min el-shou3oub."
W-nta2al min honik 3a-beyt 7add el-majma3 seken fih rejjel mish Yahoude bye3bad ALLAH esmo Tityos Yostos.
W-2ãman Krisbos ra2is el-majma3 bel-RAB, houe w-kell ahl beyto. W-keno ktar min ahl Korentos 3am yesma3o kalem Boulos, w-y2ãmno w-yet3ammado.
W-2al el-RAB la-Boulos bel-leyl bi-rou2ya: "ma tkhaf! 7ki w-ma teskot,
ana ma3ak, w-ma 7ada bye2zik. 3ende sha3b kbir bi-hal-madine."
Be2e honik sene w-sitt tesh'hor y3allim el-nes kalem ALLAH.
W-lamma sar Galyon 7akem 3ala Akha2ya, tjamma3o el-Yahoud kellon w-hajamo 3ala Boulos w-akhadouh 3al-ma7kame,
w-2alo: "hal-rejjel 3am bijarrib ye2na3 el-nes enno ye3bado ALLAH 3ibede bitkhelif el-shari3a."
W-ken Boulos baddo ye7ke, bass Galyon 2al lal-Yahoud: "ya Yahoud: law ken el-mawdou3 fiyo jarime aw jineye, kent sme3t shakwekon metl ma el-7a2 bi2oul.
Bass bi-ma enno el-mawdou3 houe jidel bel-alfaz wel-aseme w-bi-shari3etkon, dabbro ento hal-shi, li2anno ma badde koun 2ãde 3an hal-shaghle."
W-sha7aton min el-ma7kame.
Se3eta kamasho kellon Sostanis ra2is el-majma3 w-darabouh eddem el-ma7kame, w-Galyon ma htamm.
W-be2e Boulos fatra bi-Korentos, w-ba3den wadda3 el-ekhwe w-sefar bel-ba7r 3ala Souriya, w-ma3o Preskilla w-Akilla, w-7ala2 raso bi-Kankhariyya li2anno ken 3endo nedr.
W-lamma woslo 3a-Afasos, ftara2 3annon w-fet 3al-majma3 ta-yjedel el-Yahoud.
W-talabo minno enno ydall ma3on aktar bass 3tazar,
w-2allon lamma wadda3on: "ra7 erja3 la-3andkon eza ALLAH rad." W-sefar bel-ba7r min Afasos,
w-nezl bi-Kaysariyya, w-minna toli3 3ala Ourashalim w-sallam 3al-knise, w-ba3den nezl 3a-Antakya.
Min ba3d ma 2a3ad fiya shwey, toli3 w-meshe bi-Ghalatya w-Firijiyya houe w-3am yshajji3 el-tlemiz.
W-eja 3a-Afasos Yahoude esmo Apolos, min ahl el-Eskandariyya, msa'2af, bya3rif yeshra7 el-ketob el-m2addase.
T3allam ta3alim el-RAB, fa-t7ammas w-sar ye7ke bi-7ames w-y3allim ta3lim mazbout bi-khsous YASOU3. Ma3 enno ma ken ya3rif ella ma3moudiyyet You7anna.
W-lamma ballash ye7ke bi-jer2a bel-majma3, sem3ouh Preskilla w-Akilla, akhadouh 3ala beyton w-shara7oulo ta3lim ALLAH shar7 da2i2.
Min ba3da 2arrar ysefir 3a-Akha2ya, w-shajja3ouh el-ekhwe w-katabo risele lal-tlemiz honik 7atta yesta2eblouh mni7. W-lamma wossil 3a-Akha2ya se3ad bi-ne3met ALLAH el-mou2minin ktir,
li2anno ken bi-2ouwwet 7ejajo 3am bisakkit el-Yahoud eddem el-kell w-ybarhenlon min el-ketob el-m2addase enno YASOU3 houe el-MASI7.
W-lamma ken Apolos bi-Korentos, wossil Boulos 3a-Afasos, min ba3d ma 2ata3 noss el-bled, w-le2a fiya shweyit tlemiz.
Sa2alon: "akhadto el-ROU7 el-2ODOS lamma 2ãmanto?" 2alo: "la2, w-ma sme3na 7atta bi-woujoud el-ROU7 el-2ODOS."
2al Boulos: "ayya ma3moudiyye t3ammadto?" 2alo: "ma3moudiyyet You7anna."
2allon Boulos: "3ammad You7anna ma3moudiyyet el-tawbe, da3a el-nes lal-imen bi-yalle byeje min ba3do, ye3ne YASOU3."
W-lamma sem3o hal-kalem, t3ammado bi-esm el-RAB YASOU3.
7att Boulos 2idey 3leyon, w-nezl 3leyon el-ROU7 el-2ODOS w-saro ye7ko bi-loughat ghayr lougheton w-yetnabbo.
W-keno shi tna3shar rejjel.
W-fet Boulos 3al-majma3 w-sar ye7ke bi-jer2a 3an malakout ALLAH meddit tlet tesh'hor, yjedil el-mawjoudin w-yjarrib ye2na3on

fi minnon ma 2tana3o w-rafado enno y2ãmno 7atta enno saro ye7ko bel-3atel 3an ta3lim el-RAB 3end el-jame3a kella. W-tarakon Boulos w-akhad el-tlemiz 3a-janab w-sar ye7ke ma3on kell yawm bi-madraset Tirannos.
W-be2e hek meddit senteyn, 7atta sem3o kell sekken Ãsia min Yahoud w-Youneniyyin kalem el-RAB.
W-ken ALLAH 3am ya3mil 3ala 2id Boulos 3ajeyeb 3azeeme,
7atta saro el-nes yekhdo la-mardahon kell shi lamas jesmo metl ma7arim aw mrawil, w-keno yenshafo, w-tedhar minnon el-arwe7 el-sherreera.

W-jarrab kamm wa7ad min el-Yahoud el-metna'2lin yalle 3am yesh7ato el-arwe7 el-sherreera ennon yestakhedmo esm el-RAB YASOU3, w-keno y2oulo lal-arwe7 el-sherreera: "be2emrik bi-esm YASOU3 yalle 3am bibasher fih Boulos."
W-ken fi la-wa7ad min rou2asa kahanet el-Yahoud, w-esmo Sakawa, sab3 wled bya3emlo hal-shaghle.
Jewabon el-rou7 el-sherreer: "Ana ba3rif YASOU3, w-ba3rif Boulos. Bass ento meen bitkouno?"
W-hajam 3leyon el-rejjel yalle fiyo el-ROU7 el-sherreera w-edr 3leyon kellon w-ghalabon, fa-harabo min el-beyt 3eryenin mjarra7in.
W-sem3o ahl Afasos kellon, min Yahoud w-Youneniyyin, bi-yalle sar, w-khafo ktir. W-t3azzam esm el-RAB YASOU3.
W-ejo ktar min el-mou2minin ta-ye3terfo w-y2erro bi-yalle 3am ya3emlouh min a3mel el-se7r.
W-jama3 ktir min el-mousha3wizin ketebon w-7ara2ouwa eddem 3youn el-nes kellon. W-7asabo taman hal-ketob, w-toli3 khamseen alf 2ot3a min el-fodda.
W-hek ken kalem el-RAB 3am yenteshir w-ye2wa bel-nfous.
Min ba3d hal-a7deth 2arrar Boulos enno yemro2 bi-Makdouniyye w-Akha2ya, houe w-bi-tari2o 3a-Ourashalim, w-2al: "min ba3d ma e2'3od hon, lezim rou7 3a-Roma kamen."
W-ba3at 3a-Makdouniyye tnen min yalle bise3douh w-henne Timothawos w-Arestos. Bass houe, t2akhkhar medde bi-Ãsia.
W-sar bi-haydak el-wa2et fetne kbire hadafa ta3lim el-RAB,
li2anno sayegh esmo Dimetriyos ken 3am ya3mil hayekel min fodda bitmathel haykal el-ãliha Artamis, w-keno yalle 3am ya3emlouwon 3am yerba7o min hal-shi masare ktir.
Jama3on kellon w-2allon: "bta3erfo, ya ekhwe, hal-sina3a khalletna nkoun ghaneya w-n3ish ktir mni7.
W-ento shefto w-sme3to kif anna3 hayda el-esmo Boulos w-sa7ar ktir min el-nes hon bi-Afasos w-bi-ktir min manate2 Ãsia w-2allon enno el-ãliha yalle bta3mela el-2iden hiye mish ãliha.

W-hayda khatar bikhalliyon yestakheffo bi-sina3etna, w-kamen bikhalliyon ye7te2ro hal-ãliha el-3azeeme Artamis w-bihadded 3azameta enno tenhãr, w-hiye yalle bye3bada kell el-nes bi-Ãsia w-bel-3alam kello!"
W-lamma sem3o el-mawjoudin hal-7ake ghodbo ktir w-saro yeserkho: "el-3azame la-Artamis, Ilehet Afasos!"
W-sar fi fawda bel-madine kella. W-hajamo fard marra 3ala Gayos w-Arestarkhos, w-henne Makdouniyyin biref2o Boulos bi-safaro, w-jarrouwon 3ala mal3ab el-madine.
W-arad Boulos enno ywejih el-nes, bass mana3ouh el-tlemiz.
W-rou2asa Ãsia, w-keno asdika2o, ba3atoulo nes yetrajjouh enno ma yet3arrad la-khatar el-raw7a 3al-mal3ab.
W-sar fi ktir fawda, w-keno fi nes 3am ynedo bi-shi, w-nes ghayron 3am binedo bi-shi tene, w-aktaron mish 3arfin leysh jtama3o.
Wel-Yahoud talabo min Eskandar yetdakhkhal, fa-3eml ishara bi-2ido enno baddo ye7ke el-sha3b.
W-lamma 3erfouh enno Yahoude saro ysarrkho bi-sawt wa7ad shi se3ten: "el-3azame la-Artamis, Ilehet Afasos!"
Min ba3da edr moustashar 7akem el-madine yrawwe2 el-nes lamma 2allon: "Ya ahl Afasos! Ma 7ada byejhal enno madinet Afasos bte7ros haykal Artamis el-3azeeme wel-sanam yalle habat min el-sama.
Ma fi khilef bi-hal-shi, kermel hek lezim trou2o w-ma tetsarra3o.
Jebto hal-rejjelen, w-ma 7ada minnon ntahak 7ermit Artamis Ilehetna aw jaddaf 3leya.
W-eza ken la-Dimetriyos w-ahl sina3to shakwa 3ala 7ada, fi 2oudat w-7ekkem khalliyon yrou7o la-3andon.
W-eza ken elkon da3wa tenye, fa-el-7ekm fiya bikoun bi-jalse 2anouniyye,
ta-ma yettehmouna enno 3am na3mil fetne min yalle sar liom. Kermel hek ma 3anna 3ezr eza tjamma3na hon."
W-min ba3d ma 2al hal-7ake fallal el-nes.
W-lamma re2o el-nes bi-Afasos ba3at Boulos wara el-tlemiz, w-wadda3on bi-kelmet teshji3 w-sefar 3ala Makdouniyye.
W-meshe bi-haydik el-manta2a houe w-3am yshajji3 bi-kalemo ktar min jame3et el-mou2minin. Min ba3da eja 3al-Younen.
W-be2e honik tlet tesh'hor. W-lamma ken 3am bi7addir 7alo ta-ysefir bel-ba7r 3ala Souriya, t2ãmaro el-Yahoud la-2atlo, fa-2arrar enno yerja3 min-tari2 Makdouniyye.
W-refa2ouh Soubattaros 2eben Berros min ahl Birya w-Arastarkhos w-Sakondos min ahl Tasalouniki, w-Gayos min ahl Darba, w-Timothawos w-Tikhikos w-Torofimos.
W-saba2ouna 3a-Tarwas w-natarouna honik.
Bass ne7na sefarna bel-ba7r min Filippi ba3d 3id el-Fateer, w-l7e2nehon min ba3d khams tiyem 3ala Tarwas, w-b2ina fiya sab3 tiyem.
W-yawm el-a7ad jtama3na ta-ne7tefil bi-3asha el-RAB, w-sar Boulos you3az el-mawjoudin. W-tawwal bel-7ake la-noss el-leyl, li2anno ken baddo ysefir tene yawm.
W-ken fi bel-gherfe el-fo2 yalle jtama3na fiya 2nadil ktire.
W-ken fi sabe esmo Aftikhos 2e3id 3al-shebbek. Ne3s, w-ken Boulos 3am yestarsel bel-7ake, w-ghefe Aftikhos, fa-wa2a3 min el-tabe2 el-telit la-ta7t w-7emlouh mayyit.
Nezl Boulos w-2arrab minno w-ghamaro, w-2al: "ma tkhafo, ba3do 3ayish."
W-toli3 3al-gherfe el-fo2 w-sha2af el-khebz w-akal. W-7ekehon ktir lal-sobo7 w-fall.
W-jebo el-sabe w-ken 3ayish, w-t3azzo ktir fih.
W-ne7na ro7na 3al-safine, w-tlo3na 3a-Assous ta-nekhod Boulos ma3na min honik metl ma talab minna, li2anno ken baddo ysefir la-honik bel-barr.
W-lamma le7e2na 3ala Assous, talla3neh 3al-safine w-jebneh 3a-Mitilina.
W-min honik sefarna bel-ba7r bel-yawm el-tene, w-wsolna eddem Khiyos. W-mshina bel-yawm el-telit 7add Samous, min ba3da wsolna bel-yawm el-rabe3 3a-Militos
li2anno Boulos 2arrar ne2ta3 Afasos bel-ba7r ta-ma yet2akhkhar bi-Ãsia bi-ma enno ken mesta3jil yousal 3a-Ourashalim bel-yawm el-khamseen.
W-ba3at Boulos min Militos wara shyoukh kniset Afasos.
Lamma ejo la-3ando, 2allon: "bta3erfo keef 3esht ma3kon kell hal-medde yalle b2it fiya baynetkon, min awwal yawm jeet fih 3ala Ãsia.
Kent ekhdom el-RAB bi-kell tawado3 w-bi-ktir min el-dmou3, t7ammalet kell el-mashekil yalle sabbabouha ele 7yal el-Yahoud.
W-ma hamalet shi bifeedkon, kent ou3az, w-3allemkon bel-matare7 el-3amme w-bel-byout.
W-talabet min el-Yahoud wel-Youneniyyin enno yerja3o la-ALLAH w-y2ãmno bi-RABNA YASOU3.
W-ana liom raye7 3a-Ourashalim li2anno el-ROU7 el-2ODOS baddo hek, w-ma ba3rif shou ra7 ysir ma3e honik.
Bass el-ROU7 el-2ODOS ken 3am bi7azzerne bi-kell madine enno el-jnazeer wel-3azebet natretne.
Bass ana ma be7sob enno 7ayete ela 2ime 3ende, ma zelne 3am ba3mel sheghle w-3am kammil el-3amal yalle tsallamto min el-RAB YASOU3, w-3am nede bi-injil ne3met ALLAH.
W-ana ba3rif ennkon ma ra7 tshoufo wejje min ba3d liom, ento yalle mshit baynetkon kellkon 3am bashir bi-malakout ALLAH.
Kermel hek besh'had liom eddemkon enno ana bari2 min dammkon kellkon,
li2anno ma hamalet wejbe enno khabberkon iradet ALLAH kella.
S'haro 3ala 7alkon w-3al-r3iyye yalle 7attkon el-ROU7 el-2ODOS fiya matarne ta-ter3o kniset ALLAH yalle rebe7a bi-dammo.
W-ana ba3rif enno el-dyeb el-khatfe ra7 tfout baynetkon min ba3d ma rou7 w-ma teshfa2 3al-r3iyye,
W-ra7 yeje baynetkon nes bikazzbo ta-ydayy3o el-tlemiz w-ta-yel7a2ouwon.
Ntebho w-tzakkaro enno ana bi-dmou3e nasa7et kell wa7ad minkon, leyl w-nhar, meddit tlet snin.
W-halla2 bsallemkon la-ALLAH w-la-kelmet ne3emto, houe el-edir y2awwikon w-ya3tikon el-werte ma3 kell el-2eddisin.
Ma shtahet wala yawm foddet 7ada aw dahabo aw tyebo,
ento bta3erfo enno bi-2ideyye shtaghalet w-akhadet yalle mne7tajlo ana w-rfe2e.
W-farjeytkon bi-kell shi keef lezim nse3id el-d3af bel-ta3ab wel-3amal, ne7na w-metzakrin kalem el-RAB YASOU3: "el-3ata2 byetberak aktar min el-akhd."
W-lamma khatam Boulos kalemo, raka3 ma3on kellon w-salla.
W-bekyo ktir w-ghamarouh w-bawwasouh.
W-aktar shaghle za33aleton lamma 2allon: "ma ra7 tshoufo wejje min ba3d liom." Min ba3da wadda3ouh w-refa2ouh 3al-safine.
Min ba3d ma wadda3nehon, ro7na bel-ba7r sawb Kous, w-bel-yawm el-tene wsolna 3a-Roudos, w-min honik 3a-Batara.
W-l2ina honik safine msefra 3a-Finikya, rkebneha w-mshina,
w-lamma bayyanet 2obros 3leyna tarakneha 3al-shmel, w-re7na sawb Souriya. Nzelna 3a-Sour, 7atta tfadde el-safine 7mouleta.
W-l2ina el-tlemiz honik, w-b2ina 3endon sab3 tiyem. W-keno 3am bi2oulo la-Boulos, bi-wa7e min el-ROU7, enno ma yotla3 3a-Ourashalim.
W-lamma kholis el-wa2et yalle b2ina fih ma3on, falleyna w-mshina bel-tari2, w-meshyo ma3na kellon, neswen w-wled, la-barrat el-madine, ta-ywadd3ouna, w-raka3na 3al-shatt w-sallayna.
Ba3den wadda3na ba3dna, w-tlo3na 3al-safine, w-rej3o henne 3ala byouton.
W-min Sour wsolna bi-ekher el-safra 3ala Batoulamayis, sallamna 3al-ekhwe honik w-b2ina 3endon yawm wa7ad.
W-ro7na tene yawm 3a-Kaysariyya. W-fetna 3a-beyt Filippos el-moubashir w-houe wa7ad min el-sab3a w-nzelna 3endo,
w-ken 3endo arba3 banet 3azara byetnabbo.
Min ba3d 3eddit iyem b2ina fiyon, wossil min el-Yahoudiye nabe esmo Agapos.
Eja la-3anna w-akhad zennar Boulos w-rabat fih ejrey w-2idey w-2al: "bi2oul el-ROU7 el-2ODOS: sa7ib hal-zennar ra7 yrabbtouh el-Yahoud hek bi-Ourashalim w-ysallmouh la-2iden el-wathaniye."
W-lamma sme3na hal-7ake, serna ne7na w-kell el-mawjoudin netrajja Boulos enno ma yotla3 3a-Ourashalim.
Jewabna Boulos: "leysh 3am tebko w-twajj3oule 2albe? Ana mist3edd mish bass lal-jnazeer, mist3edd mout bi-Ourashalim kermel el-RAB YASOU3."
W-lamma ma edrna ne2na3o, sakatna w-2elna: "metl ma baddo el-RAB."
Min ba3d hal-shi bi-iyem 7addarna 7alna lal-safar w-tlo3na 3a-Ourashalim.
W-refa2na kamm wa7ad min el-tlemiz min Kaysariyya, w-nazzalouna bi-beyt Manasoun el-2obrose, w-houe telmiz 2adeem.
W-lamma wsolna 3a-Ourashalim sta2balouna el-ekhwe bi-fara7.
W-fet ma3na Boulos tene yawm la-3and Ya3koub, w-keno el-shyoukh kellon mawjoudin.
Sallam 3leyon Boulos w-khabbaron bel-tefsil kell shi 3emlo ALLAH 3ala 2idey bayn be2e el-shou3oub.
W-lamma sem3ouh, majjado ALLAH w-2alo la-Boulos: "enta sheyif, ya khayyna, keef oulouf min el-Yahoud 2ãmano w-kellon ba3don met3asbin la-shari3et Moussa.
W-henne sem3o ennak 3am bit3allim el-Yahoud el-3ayshin bayn be2e el-shou3oub enno yeterko shari3et Moussa, w-3am twassiyon enno ma yekhetno wledon w-ma yel7a2o ta2aleedna.
Shou lezim na3mil? Li2annon halla2 akid ra7 ya3erfo ennak jeet.
3mol yalle ra7 n2ellak yeh: 3enna arba3 rjel 3endon nedr.
Khedon w-rou7 3al-haykal w-enta sherik ma3on bel-tot'hir w-dfa3 3leyon ta-ye7el2o rason, hek bifakker kell el-sha3b enno yalle sem3ouh 3annak mish sa7i7, w-ennak meshe metlon 7asab shari3et Moussa.
W-bennesbe la-yalle bi2ãmno w-henne mish Yahoud, katabnelon shou ra2eyna, enno ma ya3emlo zabeye7 el-asnam el-nejse w-ma yezno w-ma yeklo 7ayawenet makhnou2a wala-dammon.
Akhad Boulos el-rjel el-arb3a tene yawm, w-ettahhar ma3on w-fet 3al-haykal w-3ayyan el-maw3ad yalle btokhlas fih iyem el-touhour 7atta y2addim fih el-2erben 3an kell wa7ad minnon.
W-lamma kenit ra7 tokhlas iyem el-touhour el-sab3a, shefo el-Yahoud el-Ãsiawiyyin Boulos bel-haykal. Fa-7arrado el-sha3b 3le, w-kamashouh,

W-sarakho: "se3douna, ya wled Isra2il! Hayda houe el-rejjel yalle 3am bi3allim el-nes wayn ma ken ta3lim dodd sha3bna w-dodd shari3etna w-dodd hal-haykal, 7atta enno jeb kamm Younene 3al-haykal, w-dannas hal-matra7 el-m2addas!"
2alo hal-shi li2annon shefo Torofimos el-Afasose ma3 Boulos bel-madine, w-fakkaro enno Boulos jebo 3al-haykal!
W-hejet el-madine kella, w-tjamma3o el-nes 3ala Boulos w-kamashouh w-jarrouh la-barrat el-haykal, w-sakkaro el-bweb deghre.
W-lamma keno 3am bijarrbo ye2etlouh, sem3 ka2ed el-7amiye el-Roumaniyye enno fi fawda bi-kell Ourashalim,
Jeb bi-ser3a jnoud w-debbat w-eja deghre la-3andon. W-lamma shefo el-ka2ed w-jnoudo wa'2afo enno yedorbo Boulos.
2arrab minno el-ka2ed w-kamasho w-2amar bi-enno yenrabat bi-janzeeren. Min ba3da sa2al 3anno ta-ya3rif meen houe w-shou 3eml,
saro minnon y2oulo shi, w-minnon y2oulo shi tene. W-lamma ma edr ma3 kell hal-dajje enno yefham shou sar, 2amar jnoudo bi-ennon yekhdo Boulos 3al-2al3a.
W-lamma woslo 3al-daraj, 7emlouh el-jnoud ta-ma ye2etlo el-sha3b.
Li2annon keno le7'2ino w-3am bisarrkho: "e2telo!"
W-lamma ken Boulos jouwwet el-2al3a, 2al la-ka2ed el-7amiye: "btesma7le 2ellak shi?" 2allo el-ka2ed: "enta bta3rif el-lougha el-Youneniyye?
Fa-ezan enta el-Masre yalle 3eml fetne min medde w-talla3 ma3o arba3-talef rejjel y2etlo bel-sa7ra?"
2allo Boulos: "ana Yahoude w-mouwaten Roumane min Tarsous bi-Kilikya, madine ma3roufe ktir. Bitmanna minnak tesma7le e7ke el-sha3b."
Sama7lo, w-we2f Boulos 3al-daraj w-3eml ishara bi-2ido lal-sha3b. W-lamma sakato, 7ekehon Boulos bel-3ebrane, 2al:
"Ya ekhewte w-bayyete, sma3o yalle ra7 2oulo halla2 ta-defi3 3an 7ale!"
W-lamma sem3ouh 3am ye7ke ma3on bel-3ebrane, re2o, w-2allon Boulos:

"ana rejjel Yahoude khle2et bi-Tarsous bi-Kilikya, bass 3esht hon bi-hal-madine w-t3allamit bi-madraset Gamla2il shari3et bayyetna 3al-2ousoul, w-kent ghar 3ala khedmet ALLAH metl ma ento kellkon bitgharo 3leya bi-hal-iyem.
W-edtahadet ta3lim YASOU3 lal-mawt, w-kamasht el-rjel wel-neswen w-zattayton bel-7abs.

W-3an-hayda el-shi byesh'hadle ra2is el-kahane w-shyoukh el-sha3b kellon. Akhadet minnon raseyel la-ekhwetna el-Yahoud bel-Shem, w-ro7et la-honik ta-ekmosh kell yalle bi-2ãmno bi-hayda el-mazhab, w-ekhedon 3a-Ourashalim ta-7esebon.
W-marra ana w-raye7 3al-Shem, shara2 faj2a 3leyye 3al-dohr nour 2awe min el-sama,
wa2a3et 3al-ard, w-sme3t sawt bi2elle: Shawol, Shawol, leysh 3am tedtehedne?
Jewabto: enta meen ya RAB? 2al: ana YASOU3 el-Nassire yalle 3am tedtehdo.
W-keno yalle ma3e 3am bishoufo el-nour w-ma 3am yesma3o sawt el-shakhs yalle 3am ye7kine.
2elt: shou ba3mil, ya RAB? 2alle el-RAB: 2oum w-rou7 3al-Shem, w-honik bi2ouloulak shou lezim ta3mil.
W-kent fa2adet basare min 2ouwwet el-nour, w-akhadoune rfe2e 3al-Shem.
W-ken fi honik rejjel ta2e metmassik bel-shari3a esmo 7ananiyya, w-keno kell el-Yahoud m2addrino ktir bel-Shem.
Eja la-3ande w-2alle: ya khayye Shawol, badde yek terja3 te2sha3. W-sert e2sha3 w-shefto elo bi-se3et el-se3a.
2alle: Ileh bayyetna khtarak ta-ta3rif iradto w-tshouf 2ebno el-barr w-tesma3o 3am ye7kik.
W-enta ra7 tesh'had eddem kell el-nes bi-yalle shefto w-sme3to.
W-halla2, shou ba3dak natir? 2oum w-t3ammad w-ettahhar min khatayak w-d3i bi-esmo.
Min ba3da rje3t 3a-Ourashalim. W-lamma kent 3am salle bel-haykal, wa2a3et bi-ghayboube,
w-sheft el-RAB 3am bi2elle: 3ajjil fell min Ourashalim, li2anno el-sha3b hon ma ra7 ye2balo shahedtak ele.
2eltello: henne bya3erfo mni7 ya RAB, enno kent fout 3al-majeme3 w-ekmosh yalle bi2ãmno fik w-ejledon,
w-enno kent mawjoud lamma 2atal el-sha3b Estefanos shahidak w-kent ana rade bi-2atlo, w-khalleyt tyeb yalle 2atalouh ma3e.
2alle el-RAB: ra7 eb3atak 3a-matra7 b3id, la-3and el-shou3oub el-mish Yahoud."
W-keno 3am yetsamma3o la-Boulos la-7add ma 2al hal-kalimet, w-sarakho bi-a3la sawton: "m7ou hal-rejjel 3an wejj el-ard! Ma byeste7e2 el-7ayet."
W-saro ysarrkho, w-ykebbo tyebon, w-ytayyro el-trab bel-hawa.
Se3eta 2amar ka2ed el-7aras rjelo enno yekhdo Boulos 3al-2al3a w-yes2alouh ta7t el-darb, leysh 3am bisarkho el-Yahoud 3le kell hal-sarikh.
W-lamma maddadouh w-rabatouh ta-yejeldouh, 2al lal-dabet el-we2if 7addo: "bi7e'2elkon tejeldo mouwaten Roumane bidoun ma t7akmouh?"
W-lamma sem3 el-dabet hal-7ake, rakad la-3and el-ka2ed w-2allo: "shou 3am ta3mil? Hayda el-rejjel Roumane!"
W-eja el-ka2ed la-3and Boulos w-2allo: "2elle: enta Roumane?" 2allo: "na3am."
2al el-ka2ed: "ana dafa3et masare ktir ta-edert 7solt 3a-hal-jensiyye." 2al Boulos: "bass ana khle2et Roumane."
W-se3eta traja3o 3anno kell yalle keno baddon yestajewbouh. W-khaf el-ka2ed lamma 3eref enno Roumane w-enno rabbatouh bel-jnazeer.

W-arad el-ka2ed tene yawm enno ya3rif 7a2i2et el-2ossa yalle tahamo fiya el-Yahoud Boulos, fakkallo el-jnazeer, w-2amar rou2asa el-kahane w-kell majles el-Yahoud enno yejtem3o, min ba3da nazzal Boulos w-jebo 3al-majles.
Ltafat Boulos 3al-majles w-2al: "ya ekhwe, khadamet ALLAH w-dameere ktir merte7 la-7add liom."
Fa-2amar 7ananiyya, ra2is el-kahane, mse3dino yedorbo Boulos 3ala temmo.
2allo Boulos: "ALLAH ra7 yedorbak, ya hal-7ayt el-mbayyad! Enta jeye t7akemne bi-7asab el-shari3a, w-3am te2mor endarab w-hek enta 3am tkhalif el-shari3a?"
2alo el-mawjoudin la-Boulos: "enta 3am tsebb ra2is kahanet ALLAH!"
2al Boulos: "ma kent 3erif, ya ekhewte, enno houe ra2is el-kahane. El-ketob el-m2addase bit2oul: "ma tel3an ra2is sha3bak."

W-ken Boulos bya3rif enno fi bayneton Saddoukiyyin w-fi ghayron Ferrisiyyin, se3eta 2al 3a-sawt 3ale lal-majles: "ya ekhewte, ana Ferrise 2eben Ferrise. W-ana halla2 3am bit7akam li2anno b2ãmen bi-2iyemet el-mawta."
W-lamma 2al hal-shi, sar fi khilef bayn el-Ferrisiyyin wel-Saddoukiyyin w-n2asam el-majles,
li2anno el-Saddoukiyyin ma bi2ãmno bi-2iyemet el-mawta w-bi-woujoud el-maleyke wel-arwe7, baynama el-Ferrisiyyin bi2ãmno bi-hayda kello.
W-3elyet el-aswat, w-2amo kamm wa7ad min mou3allimi el-shari3a w-henne Ferrisiyyin w-saro ye7tajjo bi-2ouwwe w-2alo: "ma 3am nle2e jerm 3a-hal-rejjel. Yemken 7ekeh rou7 aw malek."
W-kebir el-khilef la-daraje khaf el-ka2ed enno ykhazz2o Boulos tekhzi2, fa-2amar jnoudo bi-ennon yenzalo la-3ando w-yjeebouh min bayneton, w-yekhdouh 3al-2al3a.
W-bel-leyle el-tenye zahar el-RAB la-Boulos w-2allo: tshajja3! Metl ma shahadtelle bi-Ourashalim, hek lezim tesh'hadle bi-Roma."
W-lamma toli3 el-sobo7 t2ãmaro el-Yahoud, w-7alafo ennon ma yeklo wala yeshrabo la-7add ma ye2etlo Boulos.
W-keno el-met2ãmrin aktar min arb3een.
Ejo la-3and rou2asa el-kahane wel-shyoukh w-2alo: "7alafna ma ndou2 shi la-7add ma ne2tol Boulos.
Tlebo ento wel-majles min ka2ed el-7aras enno yeb3at Boulos la-3andkon, bi-7ejjit enno badkon t3eedo el-nazar bi-2adiyyto, w-ne7na mist3eddin ne2etlo houe w-jeye la-3andkon."
W-sem3 2eben ekht Boulos bel-7ile, ra7 3al-2al3a w-eja la-3and Boulos w-khabbaro kell shi.
Se3eta ba3at Boulos wara wa7ad min el-debbat w-2allo: "khod hal-shabb la-3and el-ka2ed, li2anno 3endo shi baddo y2ello yeh."
Akhado el-dabet la-3and el-ka2ed w-2al: "da3ene el-ma7bous Boulos w-talab enno jeeb hal-shabb la-3andak, li2anno 3endo shi baddo y2ellak yeh."
Masak el-ka2ed bi-2ido w-akhado 3a-janab w-sa2alo: "shou 3endak? Khabberne."
2allo: "ettafa2o el-Yahoud 3ala ennon yetolbo minnak enno tnazzil Boulos boukra 3al-majles bi-7ejjet ennon baddon y3eedo el-nazar bi-2adiyyto.
Ma tsadde2on, li2anno aktar min arb3een rejjel Yahoude t2ãmaro sawa 3le, w-7alafo ennon ma yeklo wala yeshrabo la-7add ma ye2etlouh. W-henne halla2 mist3eddin w-jehzin, natrin ennak testajeblon."
2al el-ka2ed lal-shabb: "ma t2oul la-7ada ennak khabbartne bi-hal-shi." W-fallalo min 3endo.
Min ba3da ba3at el-ka2ed wara tnen min debbato w-2allon: "7addro miteyn jende ta-yrou7o el-se3a tes3a bel-leyl 3a-Kaysariyya, w-ma3on sab3een feris w-miteyn msalla7 bel-rme7.
W-7addro la-Boulos 7san ye7emlo la-3and el-7ekem Felix bidoun ma ysorlo shi."
W-katab lal-7akem risele bi2oul fiya:
"min Klodyos Lisyas la-sa7ib el-3ezze Felix, beb3atlak saleme:
kamasho el-Yahoud hal-rejjel w-keno ra7 ye2etlouh. W-lamma 3reft enno houe Roumane, rakadet la-3ando ma3 jnoude w-khallasto.
W-7abbeyt a3ref bi-shou 3am yettehmouh, jebto 3ala majleson,
W-tbayyanle ennon 3am yettehmouh bi-khsous shari3eton, w-enno ma fi shi min yalle 3am yettehmouh fih byestawjeb el-mawt aw el-7abs.
Min ba3da sme3t ennon 3emlo khotta ta-ye2etlouh, w-ba3atto la-3andkon deghre, w-elt la-a3de2o enno yerfa3oulak el-da3wa bi-2adiyyto."
W-naffazo el-jnoud 2awemir el-ka2ed, w-akhado Boulos bel-leyl 3a-Antipatris.
W-tene yawm rej3o el-jnoud 3al-2al3a w-tarako el-fersen ykaffo tari2on ma3 Boulos.
W-lamma woslo el-fersen 3a-Kaysariyya, akhado Boulos la-3and el-7akem w-sallamouh el-risele.
2ereha w-sa2al Boulos 3an el-wileye yalle byenteme ela. W-lamma 3eref enno houe min Kilikya,
2allo: "ra7 esma3lak lamma byousalo a3de2ak." W-2amar jnoudo bi-ennon ye7erso Boulos bi-2asr Hirodos.
Min ba3d khams tiyem, nezl ra2is el-kahane 7ananiyya 3a-Kaysariyya w-ma3o kamm sheykh w-mou7ame esmo Tartoullos, w-tshakko 3a-Boulos lal-7akem.
W-lamma ba3at el-7akem warah, sar Tartoullos yettehmo, w-y2oul: "ya sa7ib el-3ezze Felix: byerja3 el-fadl la-7esn tedbirak bel-salem yalle 3enna, wel-isla7 yalle n3amal la-kheyr bledna.
W-ne7na mneshkrak bi-kell wa2et w-kell matra7.
Ma badde tawwil 3lek el-7ake, bass bitmanna tekhedna bi-7elmak w-tesma3elna shwey:
sehfna enno hal-rejjel bishakkel khatar 3leyna, 3am ya3mil fetne bayn el-Yahoud bel-3alam kello, w-3amil 7alo za3eem 3al-Nassara.
W-jarrab ydannis el-haykal, kermel hek kamashneh. W-lamma ken badna n7akmo 7asab shari3etna,
eja el-ka2ed Lisyas w-shelo bel-2ouwwe min 2ideyna,
w-2amar a3de2o bi-enno yerfa3o shakwehon elak, w-enta eza sa2alto 3an kell hal-eshya, ra7 ta3ref kell el-ma3rife bi-yalle 3am nettehmo fih."
Wefa2o el-Yahoud 3a-yalle 2alo Tartoullos w-2alo enna mazbouta.
Min ba3da 3ata el-7akem ishara la-Boulos w-2allo ye7ke, 2al: "ba3rif ennak 3am te7kom hal-bled min 3eddit snin, kermel hek 3am defi3 3an 7ale w-ana mtamman.
Enta edir tet2akkad enno ana tlo3t 3a-Ourashalim lal-3ibede min 2a2all min tna3shar yawm.
W-ma shefoune el-Yahoud bel-haykal wala bel-majeme3 wala bel-madine 3am jedil 7ada, aw 7arrid jame3a,
W-ma bye2daro ythabtoulak enno yalle 3am yettehmoune fih halla2 mazbout.
Bass be3terif enno ana be3bad Ileh bayyetna 3al-mazhab yalle bi2oulo enno houe bed3a, w-be3terif enno b2ãmen bi-kell shi eja bel-shari3a w-ketob el-anbiya,
w-natir min ALLAH nafs el-shi yalle henne natrino, ye3ne 2iyemet el-abrar wel-ashrar.
Ye3ne ana metlon ba3mil kell jehde ta-tkoun deyman niyyte tayybe eddem ALLAH wel-nes.
W-jeet min ba3d 3eddit snin, 3am be7mol el-tabarrou3at la-sha3be, w-2addim el-2arabin
w-shefoune bel-haykal jame3a min Yahoud Ãsia, w-kent ettahharet, w-ma ken ma3e jame3a wala 3melt fetne.
W-ken lezim yejo la-3andak w-yettehmoune, eza ken 3endon shi yeshkoune fih.
Khalle el-mawjoudin hon y2ouloulak ayya jerm shefouh 3leyye, lamma w2eft bel-majles,
ella hal-kelme yalle nadeyt fiya w-ana bayneton: ento 3am bit7akmoune liom li2anno b2ãmen bi-2iyemet el-mawta."
W-ken Felix semi3 ktir mni7 3an mazhab el-RAB, fa-rafa3 el-jalse w-2al: "lamma yousal el-ka2ed Lisyas la-hon, bishouf shou lezim ya3mil bi-da3wetkon"
W-2amar wa7ad min el-debbat enno ye7ros Boulos, w-enno ykoun 3endo shweyit 7orriyye, w-ma yemna3 7ada min as7abo enno yekhedmouh aw yzourouh.
W-ba3d kamm yawm eja Felix w-ma3o marto Dorosilla w-kenit Yahoudiye, fa-ba3at wara Boulos w-seme3lo kalemo 3an el-imen bi-YASOU3 el-MASI7.
W-lamma 7eke Boulos 3an el-sala7 wel-3effe w-yawm el-deynoune, nra3ab Felix w-2allo: "rou7 halla2 w-wa2et ysorle beb3at warak marra tenye."
W-ken Felix natir enno ya3tih Boulos masare, kermel hek ken 3am yeb3at warah kaza marra w-ye7ke ma3o.
Min ba3d senteyn eja min ba3do Borkyos Fastos 7akem. W-ken Felix baddo yorde el-Yahoud, fa-tarak Boulos bel-7abs.
W-lamma wossil Fastos min ba3d tlet tiyem 3al-wileye, toli3 min Kaysariyya 3a-Ourashalim.
W-3aradoulo rou2asa el-kahane w-zou3ama el-Yahoud da3wehon 3ala Boulos, w-talabo minno
enno yen2ol Boulos 3a-Ourashalim. W-7addaroulo khotta bel-tari2 ta-ye2etlouh.
Jewabon Fastos enno Boulos ra7 yeb2a ma7bous bi-Kaysariyya, w-enno houe ra7 yerja3 3a-Kaysariyya 2ariban.
W-2al: "khalle zou3ame2kon yenzalo ma3e 3a-Kaysariyya w-eza ken hal-rejjel gholtan, khalliyon yettehmouh.
W-be2e Fastos 3endon mish aktar min tmene aw 3ashr tiyem, min ba3da nezl 3a-Kaysariyya. W-tene yawm 2a3ad bel-ma7kame, w-2amar yjeeboulo Boulos,
w-lamma eja tjamma3o el-Yahoud el-jeyin min Ourashalim 7awlo w-ettahamouh bi-jarayem ktire bass ma edro ysabbtouwa.
W-defa3 Boulos 3an 7alo w-2al: "ma ghlotit bi-shi la eddem shari3et el-Yahoud wala eddem el-haykal wala eddem el-2aysar."
W-ken Fastos baddo yorde el-Yahoud, 2al la-Boulos: "bte2bal totla3 3a-Ourashalim, w-tet7akam honik 3ende 3ala hal-eshya?"
Jewab Boulos: "Ana bi-ma7kamet el-2aysar, w-bi-ma7kamet el-2aysar lezim et7akam. Enta bta3rif ktir mni7 enno ma 2zit el-Yahoud bi-shi.

W-eza thabat enno ghlotit, aw rtakabit yalle byestawjeb el-mawt, ana ma ra7 et'harrab min el-mawt. Bass eza ken yalle 3am yettehmoune fih kezb, ma 7ada bye2dar ysallemne elon. W-lal-2aysar berfa3 da3weye."
Tshewar Fastos w-mse3dino w-rej3 jewab: "rafa3et da3wek lal-2aysar, ye3ne la-3and el-2aysar ra7 trou7."
W-ba3d 3eddet iyem, eja el-malik Agripas w-Barnika 3a-Kaysariyya ta-ysallmo 3ala Fastos.
W-lamma ken sar elon medde honik, 3arad Fastos 3al-malik 2adiyyet Boulos 2al: "hon fi rejjel tarako Felix bel-7abs.
Lamma kent bi-Ourashalim tshakko 3ende rou2asa el-kahane w-shyoukh el-Yahoud w-talabo e7kom 3le.
Fa-2eltellon: min 3adet el-Rouman enno ma ysallmo 7ada lal-mawt, abl ma ywejih mettehmino w-yensama7lo yredd 3ala da3wehon.
W-lamma ejo la-hon, tene yawm 2a3adet bel-ma7kame bidoun ma dayyi3 wa2et, w-2amaret yjeeboule el-rejjel.
W-3arado yalle mettehmino da3wehon, w-ma zakaro wala jarime min el-naw3 yalle kent metwa2a3a,
bass ken fi baynon w-bayno jidel bi-eshya btet3alla2 bi-diyeneton, w-bi-rejjel met esmo YASOU3, w-Boulos bi2oul enno hal-rejjel ba3do 3ayish.
T7ayyaret shou badde a3mil, w-sa2alet Boulos eza baddo yotla3 3a-Ourashalim ta-yet7akam fiya.
Bass Boulos rafa3 da3weh la-jalelit el-2aysar, w-tarako houe y2arrir. W-2amaret enno yeb2a ma7bous 7atta eb3ato lal-2aysar."
Fa-2al Agripas la-Fastos: "ya reyt be2dar esma3 hal-rejjel." Jewabo Fastos: "boukra btesma3o."
W-tene yawm, ejo Agripas w-Barnika bi-fakhame 3azeeme w-feto 3a-ka3et el-mestem3in w-tjamma3o 7awlon el-rou2asa w-woujaha el-madine. 2amar Fastos yjeebo Boulos, w-eja.

Fa-2al Fastos: "ya hal-malik Agripas, w-ya kell el-mawjoudin ma3na, hal-rejjel yalle sheyfino tshakka 3le el-sha3b el-Yahoude kello eddeme bi-Ourashalim w-hon, w-keno 3am yesarrkho: lezim ma yentarak 3ayish.
Bass ana, ma l2ito 3eml shi byestawjeb el-mawt, w-houe rafa3 da3wah la-jalelit el-2aysar, w-2arraret enno eb3ato la-3ando,
w-ana ma 3ende ethbet akid eketbo la-jalelto. Fa-jebto la-3andkon, w-la-3endak khsouse ya hal-malik Agripas, 7atta eza sa2altouh 3an 2adiyyto ysir 3ende shi eketbo.
Li2anno min el-ghabewe bi-nazare enno eb3at ma7bous bidoun ma waddi7 el-teham yalle 3le."
Se3eta 2al Agripas la-Boulos: "mnesma7lak etdefi3 3an 7alak." 3eml Boulos ishara bi-2ido w-2al ta-ydefi3 3an 7alo:
"ya hal-malik Agripas! Ana mabsout enno defi3 3an 7ale liom eddemak, w-redd 3ala kell shi byettehmoune fih el-Yahoud,
khsouse ennak semi3 ktir mni7 3an ta2aleed el-Yahoud w-moujedaleton. W-bitmanna enno tefta7 2albak la-kaleme.
Bya3erfo kell el-Yahoud keef kenit 7ayete min ana w-zghir, w-keef etrabbeyt w-3esht bayn sha3be bi-Ourashalim.
Henne bya3erfo min zamen, w-eza baddon fiyon ykouno shouhoud enno ana l7e2et el-mazeheb el-aktar shi mshaddade bi-diyenetna, w-3esht ferrise.
W-ana halla2 3am bit7akam li2anno natir yalle wa3ado ALLAH la-bayyetna,
w-yalle 2abeyel wled Isra2il el-tna3sh natrin enno yet7a'2a2, henne w-3am ye3bado ALLAH leyl nhar. Bi-sabab hayda el-raja, ya hal-malik, 3am yettehmoune el-Yahoud.
Leysh ma bitsadd2o enno ALLAH bi2awwem el-mawta?
W-ana, kent mfakkar enno lezim 2ewem esm YASOU3 el-Nassire bi-kell jehde.
W-hayda yalle 3melto bi-Ourashalim, w-7abaset bi-tafwid min rou2asa el-kahane 3adad kbir min el-2eddisin, w-lamma keno yen2etlo kent mwefa2 3ala 2atlon.
W-ktir aw2at kent 3am 3azzebon bi-kell majma3 ta-ejberon yenekro imenon. W-zedit na2emte 3leyon 7atta sert eje 3leyon bel-moudon yalle barrat el-Yahoudiye.
Sefart 3al-Shem w-bi-2ide fi soultet tefwid min rou2asa el-kahane.
W-bel-tari2 3al-dohr, sheft, ya hal-malik, nour min el-sama a2wa min shou3a3 el-shams 3am yeshro2 min 7awle w-7awl el-msefrin ma3e.
W-wa2a3na kellna 3al-ard, w-sme3t sawt 3am bi2elle bel-3ebrane: Shawol! Shawol! Leysh 3am tedtehedne? Sa3be 3lek enno t2ewemne.
2eltello: enta meen ya RAB? 2al el-RAB: ana YASOU3 yalle enta 3am tedtehdo.
2oum w-w2af 3a-ejreyk li2anno zahartellak ta-a3mil minnak khadim ele w-shehid 3ala hal-rou2ya yalle shefetne fiya, w-3ala ghayra min el-rou2a yalle ra7 ezharlak fiya.
Ra7 khallsak min sha3b Isra2il w-min be2e el-shou3oub yalle beb3atak la-3andon
ta-tfatte7 3younon w-yerja3o min el-3atme lal-nour, w-min soultan el-shaytan la-ALLAH, w-yo7salo bi-imenon fiyye 3a-ghofran el-khataya w-yourato ma3 el-2eddisin.
W-min haydik el-se3a, ya hal-malik Agripas, ma 2ewamet el-rou2ya el-samawiyye,
w-basharet ahl el-Shem awwal shi, w-min ba3da ahl Ourashalim w-bled el-Yahoudiye kella, w-min ba3da be2e el-oumam, nadeyt bel-tawbe wel-roujou3 la-ALLAH, w-enno ya3emlo a3mel bitdell 3al-tawbe.
Kermel hek kamashoune el-Yahoud w-ana bel-haykal, w-jarrabo ye2etloune,
bass ALLAH se3adne la-7add liom, ta-esh'hadlo eddem el-zghir wel-kbir, w-ma 2oul ella yalle tnabba fih Moussa wel-anbiya,
enno el-MASI7 ken lezim yet2allam w-ykoun awwal meen bi2oum min el-mawt w-ybasher el-Yahoud w-be2e el-shou3oub bi-nour el-khalãs."
W-lamma ken Boulos 3am bidefi3 3an 7alo bi-hal-kalem, sarakh Fastos bi-sawt 3ale: "enta majnoun, ya Boulos! 2add ma ntalet min el-3elm fa2adit 3a2letak!"
Jewabo Boulos: "keef bkoun majnoun, ya sa7ib el-3ezze Fastos, w-ana 3am e7ke el-7a2i2a wel-mazbout?
El-malik yalle 3am e7kih halla2 bi-kell sara7a bya3rif kell hal-eshya, w-be3te2id enno ma byekhfa 3le shi, li2anno hal-eshya ma saret bel-mekhfe.
Bit2ãmen bel-anbiya, ya hal-malik Agripas? Ana ba3rif ennak bit2ãmen fiyon."
2al Agripas la-Boulos: "hal-2add bi-ser3a baddak ta3melne Masi7e?"
Jewabo Boulos: "bi-ser3a aw mish bi-ser3a, bitrajja min ALLAH elak w-la-kell yalle 3am yesma3oune liom ennon ysiro metle, bas bidoun hal-jnazeer."
2am el-malik wel-7akem w-Barnika wel-2a3din ma3on,
w-2alo la-ba3don henne w-fellin: "ma 3eml hal-rejjel shi byestawjeb el-mawt aw el-7abs."
W-2al Agripas la-Fastos: "ken fina neflot hal-rejjel law ma rafa3 da3weh lal-2aysar."
W-lamma ettafa2na w-2arrarna enno nsefir bel-ba7r 3a-Italya, sallamo Boulos wel-ma7bousin la-dabet min el-katibe el-Embratoriyye esmo Youlyos.
Rkebna safine min Adramit w-re7na sawb shawate2 Ãsia, w-sefarna bel-ba7r ma3 Arestarkhos w-houe Makdoune min Tasalouniki,
w-wsolna bel-yawm el-tene 3a-Sayda. W-bayyan Youlyos addeysh bi7ebbo la-Boulos, fa-sama7lo enno yrou7 la-3and asdika2o ta-yse3douh.
Min ba3da sefarna min honik bi-mouwazet 2obros li2anno el-ree7 kenit bi-3aksna.
Min ba3d ma 2ata3na el-ba7r bi-Kilikya w-Bamfilya nzelna bi-mina Mira bi-Likya.
W-le2a el-ka2ed Youlyos safine min el-Eskandariyya msefra 3a-Italya, tlo3na 3leya.

W-meshyet fina el-safine 3a-mahla 3eddit iyem, la-7add ma 2arrabna min ba3d jehd kbir min madinet Kanidos. W-mana3etna el-ree7 enno nenzal fiya, w-kaffeyna safarna w-serna 7add jaziret Krit 3end ras Salmouna.
W-wsolna min ba3d ma 2ata3neh bi-sou3oube la-matra7 esmo "el-Mawene2 el-Sal7a" 7add madinet Lisa2iya.
W-hek mara2 3leyna wa2et tawil la-daraje enno 2ata3et fatrit sawm el-Yahoud bel-khareef w-ne7na ba3dna bel-ba7r w-sar el-safar bel-ba7r khotir. Sar Boulos ynabbehon
2al: "ya rfe2e, bshouf enno el-safar min hon fiyo khatar w-khsara kbire mish bass 3al-safine w-7mouleta, fi khatar kamen 3ala arwe7na."
Bass el-dabet 2tana3 bi-kalem el-koubtan w-sa7ib el-safine aktar min ma 2tana3 bi-kalem Boulos.

W-ken el-mina ma byoslo7 enno n2adde fasl el-shete fih, fa-2arraret el-aktariyye enno lezim yfello minno, 3ala 2amal enno yousalo 3a-Fenix, w-houe mina bi-jaziret Krit bi-wejj el-jnoub el-gharbe wel-shmel el-gharbe, w-hek bi2addo fasl el-shete fih.
W-lamma nassamet ree7 jnoubiyye khafife, fakkaro enno talabon t7a'2a2, w-rafa3o el-merseye w-meshyo bi-mouwazet shatt Krit.
Bass min ba3d wa2et ejet ree7 3asfe shar2iyye shmeliyye esma Orokliyon min meylet el-jazire
w-darabet el-safine. W-lamma el-safine ma edrit t2ewema, saret el-safine bi-wejj el-ree7.
W-7tamayna min el-ree7 lamma mara2na bi-mouwazet jazire zghire esma Kawda, w-ederna bi-sou3oube enno nkhallis el-shakhtoura yalle bitnajjina.

W-lamma rafa3o el-shakhtoura 3al-safine akhado 7azaron, w-shaddouwa bel-7bel. W-khafo tfout el-safine bi-raml met7arrek bi-se7il Libya, fa-nazzalo el-marasi yalle bit3awwim el-safine w-tarako el-mawj ymashshe el-safine.
W-2ewyet el-3asfe bel-yawm el-tene, w-saro ykebbo el-7moule bel-ba7r.
W-bel-yawm el-telit akhado aweyil el-safine w-kabbouwon bel-ba7r.
W-mara2 iyem ktire ma shefna fiya el-shams wala el-njoum, w-be2yet el-ree7 3am te3sof 7atta 2ata3na kell 2amal enno ennajje.
W-keno rjel el-safine sarlon zamen ma akalo, we2f Boulos bayneton w-2allon: "ya rfe2e, ken lezim tesma3oule, w-ma tsefro min Krit, kento se3eta khallasto 7alkon min hal-akhtar wel-khsarat.
W-halla2 betlob minkon tetshajja3o, li2anno ma 7ada minkon ra7 yekhsar 7ayeto, bass el-safine wa7da ra7 tetkassar.
Bi-hal-leyle ejene malèk min Ilehe yalle be3bado
w-2alle: "ma tkhaf, ya Boulos! La-bodd ennak trou7 la-3and el-2aysar. W-ALLAH 3atak 7ayet la-kell el-msefrin ma3ak."
Kermel hek tshajja3o ya rfe2 li2anno boutha2 bi-ALLAH, w-ra7 ysir metl ma 2alle el-malèk.
W-la-bodd enno yekhedna el-mawj 3a-shi jazire."
W-bel-leyle el-arba3-ta3sh lamma kenna day3in bi-ba7r Adriya, fakkaro el-ba7ara bi-noss el-leyl ennon 3am bi2arrbo min el-yebse.
W-lamma 2aso ghem2 el-ba7r, le2ouh khamsa-w-tleteen mitr, w-rej3o 2asouh ba3d masefe 2asire, le2ouh shi khamsa-w-3eshreen mitr,
Fa-khafo enno tfout el-safine bel-skhour, se3eta kabbo min wara el-safine arba3 marasi w-nataro tlou3 el-daw bi-feregh el-sabr.
W-jarrabo el-ba7ara ennon yeherbo min el-safine, w-nazzalo el-shakhtoura 3al-ba7r 3amlin 7alon enno baddon ykebbo el-marasi min el-safine min eddem.
Se3eta 2al Boulos lal-dabet w-jnoudo: "eza hal-ba7ara ma ra7 yeb2o bel-safine, ma bitnajjo."
Fa-2ata3o el-jnoud 7bel el-shakhtoura w-tarakouha tou2a3 bel-may.
W-2arrab tlou3 el-daw, fa-talab minnon Boulos ennon yeklo shi, w-2al: "mara2 halla2 arba3-ta3shar yawm w-ento natrin saymin ma 3am teklo shi.
Betlob minkon teklo ta-tnajjo, w-ma ra7 tou2a3 sha3ra we7de min raskon."
W-lamma 2al hal-shi, akhad khebz w-shakar ALLAH eddem 3younon kellon, min ba3da sha2afo w-ballash yekol.
Se3eta tshajja3o kellon w-akalo.
W-ken 3adadna bel-safine miteyn w-sitta-w-sab3een nafs.
Min ba3d ma sheb3o, saro ykebbo el-2am7 bel-ba7r ta-ykhaffefo 3an el-safine.
W-lamma toli3 el-daw ma edro el-ba7ara ya3erfo 3ala ayya ard woslo. Bass shefo el-shatt khaleej zghir, w-2arraro enno yedefsho el-safine 3al-shatt eza edrin.
Rafa3o el-marasi w-tarakouwa tou2a3 bel-ba7r, w-fakko bi-nafs el-wa2et el-7bel yalle bterbot daffit el-safine, min ba3da rafa3o el-shre3 el-zghir w-ra7o sawb el-shatt.
Bass el-safine fetit bi-talle min el-raml bayn el-may, w-3el2it fiya el-safine min eddem, w-ma ba2a edrit tet7arrak. W-tkassaret el-safine min wara min ketrit el-mawj.
W-2arraro el-jnoud enno ye2etlo el-ma7bousin ta-ma yeherbo sbe7a 3al-shatt.
Bass el-dabet arad enno ykhallis Boulos, w-mana3on min hal-shi, w-2amar yalle bya3erfo sbe7a enno ye2ta3o abl ghayron 3al-yebse,
w-enno yel7a2ouwon el-be2yin, 3al-lwe7 aw 3ala 7outam el-safine. W-hek woslo kellon 3al-yebse selmin.
W-lamma najjeyna, 3refna enno el-jazire esma Malta.
W-farjouna ahla el-Barbar 3atfe nedra, w-ra7abo fina w-walla3o el-nar li2anno ken fi shete w-bard.
W-lamam ken Boulos 3am yejma3 7atab w-ykebba bel-nar, tol3it 3a-ketr el-shawb 7ayye w-3el2it bi-2ido.
W-lamma shefo el-ahele el-7ayye 3el2a bi-2id Boulos, 2alo la-ba3don: "akid hal-rejjel mejrem, li2anno el-3adl ma ra7 yeterko y3ish 7atta walaw najja min el-ba7r."
Bass Boulos nafad el-7ayye bel-nar bidoun ma yserlo shi.
W-fakkaro enno ra7 ywarrim aw you2a3 mayyit deghre, w-lamma nataro ktir w-shefo enno ma sarlo shi, tghayyar ra2yon fih w-2alo: "hayda Ileh!"
W-ken fi 7add hal-matra7 mazra3a la-Popliyos 7akem el-jazire, fa-karramna w-ra7ab fina meddit tlet tiyem.
W-ken bayy Popliyos ma7moum w-ma3o es'hel w-neyim bel-takht, fet Boulos 3ala gherefto w-salla w-7att 2idey 3le w-shafeh.
W-lamma sar hal-shi, ejo la-3ando be2e el-marda bel-jazire w-shafehon.
W-karramouna ktir, w-3atouna abl ma nfell kell shi 3eyzino.
Min ba3d tlet tesh'hor, rkebna safine min el-Eskandariyya, 3leya rasmit "el-Ilehayn el-Tawm", w-kenit hal-safine bi-fasl el-shete bel-jazire.
Nzelna 3ala madinet Sarakousa w-b2ina fiya tlet tiyem.
Min ba3da mshina min honik bi-mouwazet el-shatt w-wsolna 3a-madinet Righyon. W-habbet 3leyna bel-yawm el-tene ree7 jnoubiyye, w-wsolna bel-yawm el-telit 3ala madinet Botyolli,
l2ina ba3d el-ekhwe honik, talabo minna neb2a 3endon sab3 tiyem. W-hek wsolna 3a-Roma.
W-sem3o el-ekhwe bi-Roma enno wsolna, fa-tel3o yle2ouna 3ala se7it madinet Apiyyos. W-lamma shefon Boulos shakar ALLAH w-tshajja3.
W-lamma wsolna 3a-Roma, 3atet el-soultat el-2ezn la-Boulos enno yeskon wa7do ma3 el-jende yalle bye7erso.

Min ba3d tlet tiyem ba3at Boulos wara rou2asa el-Yahoud la-3ando, w-lamma jtama3o 2allon: "ya ekhwe, ana ma ghlotit bi-shi ma3 sha3bna w-ta2aleed bayyetna, roughm hal-shi 7abasoune el-Yahoud bi-Ourashalim w-sallamoune la-2ideyn el-Roumaniyyin.
Daraso 2adiyyte, w-ken baddon yefeltoune li2anno ma fi jerm 3leyye byestawjeb el-mawt.
Bass el-Yahoud 3tarado, w-dtarreyt enno erfa3 da3weye lal-2aysar, mish li2anno badde ettehim sha3be bi-shi.
Kermel hek talabet enno shoufkon w-e7kikon, w-ana be7mol hal-jnazeer kermel raja Isra2il."
2aloulo: "ma wossellna kteb bikhessak min el-Yahoudiye, w-ma ejena 7ada min el-ekhwe min honik, ta-ykhabbrouna shi 3annak w-ma 7ada 7eke 3annak bel-3atel.
Bass min7ebb nesma3 ra2yak, li2anno mna3rif enno el-nes wayn ma ken 3am tenkor hal-mazhab."

W-twe3ado 3ala yawm yejo fih 3ala beyt Boulos w-ykoun 3adadon aktar. W-sar Boulos ye7kiyon min el-sob7 lal-leyl, houe w-3am yesh'had la-malakout ALLAH, w-yjarreb ye2na3on bi-riselet YASOU3 3ala ases shari3et Moussa w-ketob el-anbiya.
Fi minnon 2tana3o bi-kalemo w-fi minnon rafadouh.
W-abl ma yfello min 3endo w-ma keno mettef2in, 2allon Boulos hal-kelme: "sade2 el-ROU7 el-2ODOS lamma 2al la-bayyetkon 3a-lsen el-nabe Ashe3ya:
Rou7 la-3and hal-sha3b w-2ello: shou ma sme3to ma ra7 tefhamo. W-mahma ettalla3to ma ra7 tshoufo.
T7ajjar 2alb hal-sha3b w-saddo dineyon w-ghammado 3younon ta-ma yesma3o bi-dineyon w-yshoufo bi-3younon w-yefhamo bi-2loubon w-ytoubo, w-eshfiyon.
3rafo enno ALLAH ba3at khalãso hayda lal-shou3oub el-tenye el-mish Yahoud w-henne ra7 yesma3oulo."
W-lamma 2al hal-kalem, tel3o el-Yahoud min 3endo w-henne bi-jidel kbir.
W-be2e Boulos senteyn kemleen bel-beyt yalle sta2jaro, w-yesta2bel kell yalle yzourouh,
w-ybasher bi-malakout ALLAH houe w-3am ye3lon bi-kell jer2a w-7orriyye ta3limo bel-RAB YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Min Boulos khadim el-MASI7 YASOU3, yalle ejeto da3we min ALLAH ta-ykoun rasoul, w-tna'2a lal-tebshir bi-injil ALLAH,
yalle ken wa3ad fih bi-wastet anbiye2o bel-ketob el-m2addase,
yalle 7eke fih 3an 2ebno yalle welid min sleelet Daoud 7asab el-tabi3a el-bashariyye,
w-bel-ROU7 el-2ODOS tbayyan enno 2eben ALLAH bi-2ouwwet 2iyemto min el-mawt, w-houe RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7,
yalle bi-wasteto 7solt 3al-ne3me wel-risele, la-majd esmo, ta-ehde el-oumam lal-imen wel-ta3a,
w-ento kamen min bayneton, da3ekon ALLAH ta-tkouno la-YASOU3 el-MASI7,
la-kell yalle bi7ebbon ALLAH bi-Roma, el-mad3ouwwin la-ykouno 2eddisin: elkon el-ne3me wel-salem min ALLAH bayyna w-min RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Abl kell shi beshkor Ilehe YASOU3 el-MASI7 kermelkon kellkon, li2anno imenkon ntashar khabaro bel-3alam kello.
W-ALLAH yalle be3bado bi-rou7e 7asab injil 2ebno byesh'hadle enno 3am bezkerkon bi-kell wa2et.
W-bes2al ALLAH bi-salawate enno ysorle, eza ALLAH rad, enno eje la-3andkon.
W-ana meshte2 enno shoufkon ta-sherekkon bi-mawhabe rou7iyye t2awwikon,
w-kamen ta-nshajji3 ba3dna, ana w-3endkon, bel-imen el-moushtarak bayne w-baynkon.
W-ma bekhfe 3leykon, ya ekhewte, enno 2arraret marrat ktire enno eje la-3andkon ta-yethmor 3amale 3endkon metl ma athmar 3end be2e el-oumam, bass la-7add halla2 ken fi shi 3am yemna3ne.
3leyye dayn la-kell el-nes, min Youneniyye w-ghayr Youneniyyin, w-min el-m3allamin wel-jehhel.
Kermel hek berghab enno basherkon kamen, ento yalle bi-Roma.
W-ana ma beste7e bi-injil el-MASI7, houe 2ouwwet ALLAH la-khalãs kell meen 2ãman, lal-Yahoude awwal shi w-min ba3da lal-Younene,
li2anno bi-hal-injil a3lan ALLAH keef byetbarrar el-2ensen: min imen la-imen, metl ma 2al el-kteb: "el-barr bel-imen bi3ish."
Fa-ghadab ALLAH mou3lan min el-sama 3al-kefr wel-sharr yalle bya3mlouh el-nes, w-bi7otto el-7a2 ta7t ra7met el-zolm,
li2anno yalle ma bye2daro el-bashar ennon ya3erfouh 3an ALLAH khalleh ALLAH ktir wade7 la-elon.
Fa-min bideyet el-3alam, yalle ma byenshef min sifat ALLAH, ye3ne 2ederto al-azaliyye w-oulouhto, el-3ou2oul 3am bishoufouh min khilel makhlou2ato, w-la-hal-sabab ma ba2a 3endon 3ezr,
3erfo ALLAH, w-ma majjadouh wala shakarouh ka-Ileh, bel-3aks da3o bi-afkaron el-batle wel-ghabewe 3emyetlon 2albon.
Fakkaro 7alon ennon 7oukama, saro jehhel,
W-stabdalo majd ALLAH el-abade bi-soura bitmassel el-2ensen el-fene wel-3safeer w-yalle byemsho 3al-arb3a w-yalle byez7afo.
Kermel hek sallamon ALLAH bi-shahawet 2loubon lal-najase ta-y7a'2ro jesmon bi-jesmon.
W-baddalo 7a2i2et ALLAH bel-batel w-3abado el-makhlou2 w-khadamouh badal el-khale2, yetberak lal-abad, ãmin.
Kermel hek sallamon ALLAH lal-shahawet yalle bitkhajjil, neswenon badal ma yesta3mlo jesmon bi-tari2a tabi3iyye, saro yesta3mlouh bi-tari2a mkhalfe lal-tabi3a,
W-kamen el-rjel tarako el-3ale2a ma3 el-mara w-sar 3endon shahwe 3ala ba3d. El-rejjel tfe7ash ma3 el-rejjel 7atta st7a'2o ennon yet2ãsaso bi-shakhson el-2asãs el-3adel la-in7irafon.
W-li2annon rafado ennon ye7tefzo bi-ma3rifet ALLAH, sallamon ALLAH la-fased 3ou2oulon, w-ra7o ya3emlo el-eshya el-3atle.
W-ntalo bi-kell anwe3 el-khatiyye wel-sharr wel-tama3 wel-fased, w-fadet nfouson 7asad w-2atl w-khisam w-kezb w-fased.
Henne thertharin w-nemmemin, a3de2 ALLAH, shettemin metkabrin met3ajerfin byekhla2o el-sharr w-byenkro ahlon.
Bidoun fehm wala wafa wala 7anen wala ra7me,
w-ma3 ennon bya3erfo enno ALLAH 7akam bel-mawt 3a-yalle bya3mil metl hal-a3mel, ma mtana3o enno ya3emlouwa, bel-3aks byordo kamen 3an yalle bya3mil hal-a3mel.
Kermel hek ma 3endak 3ezr meen ma kent, enta yalle bitdeen el-ãkharin w-bta3mil a3melon, li2annak lamma bitdeenon bitdeen 7alak.
W-ne7na mna3rif enno ALLAH bideen bel-3adl yalle bya3mil metl hal-a3mel.
W-enta, yalle bideen yalle bya3emlouwa w-bta3mil metlon, mfakkar ennak ra7 teflat min deynounet ALLAH?
Aw ennak 3am te7te2ir ra7mto w-tibto, w-toul belo, w-enta mish 3arif enno ALLAH baddo bi-ra7mto y2oudak lal-tawbe?
Bass bi-2asewet 2albak w-3nedak bitjamme3 la-nafsak ghadab la-yawm el-ghadab, wa2et yalle btenkeshef deynounet ALLAH el-3adle,
w-bi7aseb kell wa7ad 7asab a3melo,
w-bitkoun el-7ayet el-abadiyye la-yalle biwãzbo 3al-3amal el-sale7 w-byes3o lal-majd wel-karame wel-khouloud,
aw bikoun el-ghadab wel-sakht lal-metmarrdin yalle byerefdo el-7a2 w-byel7a2o el-batel.
Wel-weyl wel-3azèb la-kell 2ensen bya3mil el-sharr min el-Yahoud awwal shi w-min ba3da el-Youneniyyin,
wel-majd wel-karame wel-salem la-kell meen bya3mil el-kheyr min el-Yahoud awwal shi w-min ba3da el-Youneniyyin,
li2anno ALLAH ma biseyer 7ada.
W-yalle khetyo w-ma 3endon shari3a, bidoun shari3a bile2o el-halek. W-yalle khetyo w-3endon shari3et Moussa, bi-shari3et Moussa byendeno.
Mish yalle byesma3o kalem el-shari3a henne el-abrar 3end ALLAH, yalle byemsho 3al-shari3a henne yalle byetbarraro.
Ye3ne el-mish Yahoud, yalle ma 3endon shari3a, eza 3emlo bel-tabi3a yalle bte2mor fih el-shari3a, keno shari3a la-7alon, ma3 enno ma 3endon shari3a.
W-bikouno barhano enno yalle bte2mor fih el-shari3a maktoub bi-2loubon w-btesh'hadlon damayeron w-afkaron, w-hiye marra btettehemon w-marra bitdefe3 3annon.
W-ra7 yezhar hayda kello, metl ma 3am basherkon fih, yawm yalle bideen ALLAH bel-MASI7 YASOU3 khafeya el-2loub.
W-enta, yalle bitsamme 7alak Yahoude, w-btettekil 3al-shari3a, w-bteftekhir bi-ALLAH
w-bta3rif iradto, w-bitmayyiz shou houe el-afdal bi-yalle t3allamto min el-shari3a,
w-bte3te2id ennak ka2ed lal-3emyen w-nour la-yalle bel-3atme
w-mou2addeb lal-aghbiya w-mou3allim lal-bousata, li2anno elak bel-shari3a kell el-ma3rife wel-7a2i2a.
Enta, yalle bit3allim ghayrak, ma bit3allim 7alak? Bitnede: ma tesro2, w-enta btesro2?
Bit2oul: ma tezne, w-btezne? Bte7te2ir el-asnam w-btesro2 hayekelon?
Bteftekhir bel-shari3a w-bit'hin ALLAH bi-moukhaliftak la-shari3to?
El-kteb bi2oul: "bi-sababkon byestahino el-nes bi-esm ALLAH bayn el-oumam."
Eza btemshe 3al-shari3a ken khatnak byenfa3, bass eza khelafet el-shari3a sert metl yalle mish makhtounin.
W-eza keno yalle mish makhtounin byemsho 3al-shari3a, ma bye3teberon ALLAH makhtounin?
W-yalle byemshe 3al-shari3a, w-houe mish makhtoun bel-jesm, ma bye7kom 3lek enta el-Yahoude yalle bitkhelef el-shari3a w-3endak a7kem el-shari3a wel-khatn?
El-Yahoude mish yalle bikoun Yahoude bel-zaher, wala el-khatn houe yalle byezhar bel-jesm,
el-Yahoude houe el-Yahoude min jouwwa, wel-khatn houe khatn el-2alb bel-Rou7 mish bi-7rouf el-shari3a. Hayda houe el-2ensen yalle byenmada7 min ALLAH mish min el-bashar.
Fa-ezan shou elo fadl el-Yahoude? W-shou el-feyde min el-khatn?
El-feyde kbire min kell el-jehhat. Wel-ahamm enno kalem ALLAH n7att amene bayn 2ideyon.
Shou ra7 ysir eza el-ba3d minnon ma 2ãmano? 3adam imenon ra7 y3attil amenet ALLAH?
Akid la2! W-ra7 ykoun ALLAH sade2 wel-2ensen kezzeb. Wel-kteb bi2oul: "betbayyen sade2 eza 7kit, w-bitkoun mountaser eza 7ekamouk."
W-eza zolmna baddo ythabbit sala7 ALLAH, shou min2oul? Enno ALLAH zalamna eza nazzal ghadabo 3leyna? W-ana hon 3am be7ke ka-2ensen.
Akid la2! Wa-ella keef bideen ALLAH el-3alam?
W-eza kezbe ana bizeed zouhour sod2 ALLAH kermel majdo, leysh bye7kom 3leyye ALLAH metl ma bye7kom 3al-khate?
W-leysh ma mna3mil el-sharr ta-yeje minno el-kheyr, metl ma el-ba3d byeftero 3leyna, w-bi2awwlouna hal-shi? Hal-ashkhas 2asãson 3adel.
Fa-ezan, shou? Ne7na el-Yahoud afdal 3end ALLAH min el-Youneniyyin? La2, li2anno el-Yahoud wel-Youneniyyin, metl ma 2elt abl, khad3in kellon la-soultan el-khatiyye.
Wel-kteb bi2oul: "ma fi 7ada barr, ma 7ada
ma fi 7ada byefham, ma fi 7ada byetlob ALLAH.
Dã3o kellon w-ntaza3o sawa. Ma fi 7ada bya3mil el-kheyr, ma 7ada.
Zla3imon 2bour maftou7a, w-lseneton adawet lal-7ile. Samm el-7ayyet 3a-shfefon
w-temmon melyen la3ne w-mroura.
Ejreyon bterkod la-safk el-damm,
3a-tor2aton el-kharab wel-damãr.
Tari2 el-salem ma bya3erfouh,
wala makhafet ALLAH eddem 3younon."
W-ne7na mna3rif enno kell shi bit2oulo el-shari3a bit2oulo la-yalle henne ta7t 7ekm el-shari3a, ta-yeskot kell 2ensen w-ysir el-3alam kello ta7t 7ekm ALLAH.
W-ma 7ada ra7 yetbarrar eddem ALLAH li2anno ken meshe 3al-shari3a, li2anno el-shari3a n3amalit ta-tdell 3al-khatiyye.
Bass halla2 tbayyan keef bibarrer ALLAH el-bashar bidoun el-shari3a, metl ma btesh'hadlo el-shari3a wel-anbiya.
Houe bibarreron bel-imen bi-YASOU3 el-MASI7: w-ma fi far2 bayn el-bashar.
Henne kellon khotyo w-na2eson majd ALLAH.
Bass ALLAH 3atahon el-tebrir bi-ne3mto bel-MASI7 YASOU3 yalle fadehon
w-yalle ALLAH 2addamo ta-ykaffir bi-dammo 3an kell yalle bi2ãmno fih. W-ALLAH 3eml hal-shi ta-ybayyen berro. W-eza ken ghadd el-nazar bi-sabro 3an el-khataya el-madye,
houe bel-zaman el-7ader bibayyen berro ta-ykoun barr w-moubarrer la-yalle bi2ãmno bi-YASOU3 el-MASI7.
W-ma zel hek, ba3d fina neftekhir? La2, ma fi majel lal-fakhr. W-bi-shou badna neftekhir? Bel-a3mel? La2, mneftekhir bel-imen.
Ne7na mne3te2id enno el-2ensen byetbarrar bel-imen, mish bi-totbi2 el-shari3a?
Tekhmin ALLAH Ileh el-Yahoud wa7don? Mish houe Ileh be2e el-oumam kamen? Mbala, houe Ileh be2e el-oumam.
Li2anno ALLAH wa7ad, bibarrer el-Yahoud bel-imen, metl ma bibarrer ghayr el-Yahoud bel-imen.
Ye3ne 3am nelghe el-shari3a bel-imen? Akid la2, 3am nthabbet el-shari3a.
W-shou min2oul 3an Ibrahim bayyna bel-sleele w-3an yalle sar ma3o?
Law enno ALLAH barraro la-a3melo ken bi7e2ello enno yeftekhir, bass mish eddem ALLAH.
Wel-kteb bi2oul: "2ãman Ibrahim bi-kalem ALLAH, w-barraro la-imeno."
Yalle byeshteghil, ma bitkoun ejerto men7a, li2anno byest7e2 ejerto.
Bass yalle ma byeshteghil, bi2ãmen bi-ALLAH yalle bibarrer el-khate, w-ALLAH bibarrero la-imeno.
W-hek bihallel Daoud houe w-3am yemda7 sa3adet el-2ensen yalle barraro ALLAH mish 3ala ases a3melo:
"Niyyel yalle enghafaret znoubon w-tkhabbet khatayahon!
Niyyel yalle khatayah ma bi7esebon 3leya el-RAB!"
Hal-touba hayde, kenit lal-makhtounin wa7don, aw lal-mish makhtounin kamen? Ne7na min2oul: enno ALLAH barrar Ibrahim la-imeno.
Bass aymata sar hal-shi? Abl el-khatn aw ba3do? Abl el-khatn w-mish ba3do.
Min ba3da nkhatan ka-3aleme w-borhan 3ala enno ALLAH barraro la-imeno abl khatno, w-sar Ibrahim bayy la-kell yalle barraron ALLAH la-imenon yalle henne mish makhtounin,
w-bayy lal-makhtounin yalle ma byektefo bel-khatn, byetmassalo bi-bayyna Ibrahim bi-imeno abl ma yenkhatan.
Wel-wa3d yalle wa3ado ALLAH la-Ibrahim w-la-sleelto bi-enno yourat el-3alam ma ken 3ala ases el-shari3a, ken 3ala ases imeno yalle barraro.
W-law kenit el-werte bass la-ahl el-shari3a, ken el-imen ma elo lzoum wel-wa3d batel,
li2anno el-shari3a bitsabbeb ghadab ALLAH, w-matra7 yalle ma fi el-shari3a ma fi ta3adde 3al-shari3a.
Wel-werte asesa el-imen 7atta tkoun men7a min ALLAH w-yeb2a el-wa3d meshe 3ala sleelet Ibrahim kella, mish 3ala ahl el-shari3a wa7don, 3a-yalle bi2ãmno imen Ibrahim kamen. W-houe bayy la-elna kelna,
metl ma bi2oul el-kteb: "khalleytak tkoun bayy la-oumam ktire." W-houe bayy la-elna 3end yalle 2ãman fih Ibrahim, ye3ne 3end ALLAH yalle bi2awwem el-mawta w-yalle binede el-mish mawjoud lal-woujoud.
W-2ãman Ibrahim bi-raja matra7 yalle ma ken fi raja, w-sar bayy la-oumam ktire metl ma 2al el-kteb: "hek bitkoun sleeltak."
W-ken Ibrahim 3omro shi miyyet sene, w-ma do3if imeno wa2et yalle shef enno jesmo mawwit w-enno ra7m marto Sara met kamen.
W-ma shakk bi-wa3d ALLAH, bel-3aks 2awwa imeno w-majjad ALLAH
w-2ãman bi-enno ALLAH edir enno youfe bi-wa3do.
W-bi-sabab hal-imen barraro ALLAH.
Wel-kteb ma 2al: "barraro ALLAH" kermelo houe la-7alo,
barraro kermelna ne7na kamen, ne7na yalle mnetbarrar bi-imenna bi-ALLAH yalle 2awwam RABNA YASOU3 min el-mawt,
w-ken aslamo lal-mawt lal-tekfir 3an khatayana w-2awwamo ta-ybarrerna.
W-lamma barrarna ALLAH bel-imen serna bi-salem ma3o bi-RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7,
w-bi-wasteto kamen, w-3ala ases el-imen wsolna la-hal-ne3me yalle ne7na sebtin fiya w-3am neftekhir 3ala raja el-mousherake bi-majd ALLAH,
w-mish bass hek, ne7na mneftekhir bel-shedde li2anno mna3rif enno el-shedde bitwallid el-sabr,
wel-sabr emti7an elna, wel-emti7an biwallid el-raja,
w-rajena ma bikhib, li2anno ALLAH sakab ma7abbto bi-2loubna bel-ROU7 el-2ODOS yalle 3atana yeh.
W-lamma kenna d3af, met el-MASI7 kermel el-khatyeen bel-wa2et yalle 7addado ALLAH.
W-alil ta-ymout 7ada kermel 2ensen barr, bimout kermel 2ensen sale7, w-yemken fi 7ada byestarje enno ymout kermel el-sale7.
Bass ALLAH barhan 3an ma7abbto elna bi-enno el-MASI7 met kermelna w-ne7na kenna ba3dna khatyeen.
W-addeysh ma halla2, min ba3d ma tbarrarna bi-dammo, ra7 nle2e bi-wasteto el-khalãs min ghadab ALLAH.
W-eza ken ALLAH sala7na bi-mawt 2ebno w-ne7na kenna a3de2o, addeysh ra7 nle2e el-khalãs bi-7ayeto w-ne7na metsal7in ma3o.
Bass ne7na mneftekhir bi-ALLAH wel-fadl la-RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7 yalle bi-wasteto tsala7na halla2 ma3o.
Wel-khatiyye ejet 3al-3alam min khilel 2ensen wa7ad, w-bel-khatiyye eja el-mawt. W-eja el-mawt 3ala kell el-bashar li2annon kellon khetyo.
Wel-khatiyye kenit bel-3alam abl shari3et Moussa, bass matra7 yalle ma fi shari3a, ma bten7asab el-khatiyye khatiyye.
Bass el-mawt tsallat 3al-bashar min iyem Ãdam la-iyem Moussa, 7atta 3a-yalle ma khetyo metl khatiyyet Ãdam. W-ken Ãdam soura la-yalle ra7 yejo min ba3do.

Bass mawhabet ALLAH ghayr khatiyyet Ãdam. W-eza ken el-mawt tsallat 3al-bashar bi-khatiyyet 2ensen wa7ad, addeysh ma ra7 tensakab 3leyon ne3met ALLAH w-mawhabto, bi-ne3met 2ensen wa7ad houe YASOU3 el-MASI7.
W-fi far2 bel-natije bayn mawhabet ALLAH w-bayn khatiyyet 2ensen wa7ad. Fa-khatiyyet 2ensen wa7ad khallet el-bashar ymouto, bass mawhabet ALLAH min ba3d ktir min el-khataya, barraret el-bashar.
W-eza ken el-mawt tsallat 3al-bashar bi-khatiyyet 2ensen wa7ad, addeysh ma ra7 tetsallat el-7ayet bi-wa7ad w-houe YASOU3 el-MASI7 3a-yalle byen3atalon fayd el-ne3me w-maweheb el-berr.
Metl ma enno khatiyyet 2ensen wa7ad khallet el-bashar kellon ymouto, kamen berr 2ensen wa7ad bibarrer el-bashar kellon w-bten3atalon el-7ayet.
W-metl ma bi-3esyen 2ensen wa7ad saro el-bashar khatyeen, kamen bi-ta3et 2ensen wa7ad bisiro el-bashar abrar.
W-lamma ejet el-shari3a ketrit el-khatiyye, bass matra7 ma ketrit el-khatiyye fadet ne3met ALLAH,
7atta enno metl ma tsallatet el-khatiyye bel-mawt, hek kamen ra7 tetsallat el-ne3me yalle bitbarrerna bi-RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7 lal-7ayet el-abadiyye.
Shou min2oul? Mneb2a bel-khatiyye 7atta tektar ne3met ALLAH?
Akid la2! Ne7na yalle metna 3an el-khatiyye keef mneb2a ba3d fiya?
Ma bta3erfo enno ne7na lamma t3ammadna ta-nette7id bi-YASOU3 el-MASI7 t3ammadna ta-nmout ma3o,
w-ndafanna ma3o bel-ma3moudiyye w-sherakneh bi-mawto, 7atta metl ma 2awwamo el-Ãb bi-edrto el-majide min el-mawt, nemshe ne7na kamen bi-7ayet jdide?
W-eza kenna etta7adna fih bi-mawt byeshbah mawto, kamen ra7 nette7id fih bi-2iyemto.
W-ne7na mna3rif enno el-2ensen el-3ati2 yalle fina nsalab ma3 el-MASI7 7atta yenma7a soultan el-khatiyye min ajsemna, w-ma min3oud 3abeed lal-khatiyye,
li2anno yalle met t7arrar min el-khatiyye.
W-eza kenna metna ma3 el-MASI7, ne7na min2ãmen bi-enno ra7 n3ish ma3o.
W-mna3rif enno el-MASI7 min ba3d ma 2awwamo ALLAH min el-mawt, ma ra7 ymout marra tenye w-ma ra7 ykoun lal-mawt soultan 3le,
li2anno bi-mawto met 3an el-khatiyye marra we7de, w-bi-7ayeto bi3ish la-ALLAH.
W-7sebo ento kamen ennkon mawta 3an el-khatiyye, w-a7ye2 la-ALLAH bel-MASI7 YASOU3 RABNA.
W-ma tkhallo el-khatiyye tetsallat 3a-jesmkon el-fene w-tkhallikon ettee3o shahaweto,
w-ma ta3mlo min jesmkon sle7 lal-sharr kermel el-khatiyye, bel-3aks kouno la-ALLAH a7ye2 2amo min el-mawt, w-khallo jesmkon ykoun sle7 lal-kheyr kermel ALLAH,
w-ma bikoun lal-khatiyye soultan 3leykon min ba3d halla2. Ento mish bi-7ekm el-shari3a, ento bi-7ekm ne3met ALLAH.
Ye3ne shou? Mnokhte li2anno ne7na bi-7ekm el-ne3me mish bi-7ekm el-shari3a? Akid la2!

Ma bta3erfo ennkon eza khalleyto 7alkon tkouno 3abeed bitee3o la-7ada, serto 3abeed la-yalle 3am bittee3ouwon: aw bitkouno 3abeed lal-khatiyye yalle bitwadde lal-mawt, aw 3abeed lal-ta3a yalle bitwadde lal-berr.
Bass neshkor ALLAH! Ma3 ennkon kento 3abeed lal-khatiyye, ata3to bi-kell 2loubkon el-ta3alim yalle tsallamtouwa,
w-t7arrarto min el-khatiyye w-serto 3abeed lal-berr.

W-ana hon 3am e7ke ka-2ensen, kermel do3fkon el-bashare. W-metl ma khalleyto ajsemkon ykouno 3abeed lal-da3ara wel-sharr bi-khedmet el-sharr, kamen khallo halla2 ajsemkon 3abeed lal-berr bi-khedmet el-2adese.
W-lamma kento 3abeed lal-khatiyye, kento a7rar mish meltezmin bel-berr.
W-ayya thamar 7melto bi-haydak el-wa2et min el-a3mel yalle btekhjalo minna halla2, w-niheyeton el-mawt?
Bass halla2, min ba3d ma t7arrarto min el-khatiyye w-serto 3abeed la-ALLAH, serto bte7mlo thamar el-2adese, w-niheyto el-7ayet el-abadiyye,
li2anno ejret el-khatiyye hiye el-mawt, bass mawhabet ALLAH, hiye el-7ayet el-abadiyye bel-MASI7 YASOU3 RABNA.
Ento bta3erfo ya ekhewte, w-ana 3am e7ke jame3a bta3rif el-shari3a, enno ma fi soulta lal-shari3a 3al-2ensen ella houe w-3ayish.
Wel-mara el-metzawje bterbeta el-shari3a bel-rejjel ma zel 3ayish, w-eza met zawja t7arrarit min el-shari3a.
W-eza saret la-rejjel tene w-zawja 3ayish, bitkoun zenye. Bass eza met zawja t7arrarit min el-shari3a, w-ma bitkoun zenye eza saret la-rejjel tene.
W-hek ento ya ekhewte, metto 3an el-shari3a bi-jesm el-MASI7 ta-tsiro la-7ada tene, la-yalle 2am min el-mawt, w-te7mlo thamar la-ALLAH.
W-lamma kenna 3ayshin 7asab tabi3etna el-bashariyye, kenit el-mouyoul el-sherreera 3am tef3al bi-jesmna min khilel el-shari3a ta-tethmor lal-mawt.
Bass halla2 t7arrarna min el-shari3a, li2anno metna 3an yalle ken ykabbelna, 7atta ne3bad ALLAH bi-nizam el-rou7 el-jdid, mish bi-nizam el-7arf el-3ati2.
W-shou min2oul? Enno el-shari3a khatiyye? Akid la2! Bass ana ma 3reft el-khatiyye ella min wara el-shari3a. W-law ma 2aletle: "ma teshtehe!", ma kent 3reft el-shahwe.
Bass el-khatiyye staghallit hal-wassiye ta-twa33e fiyye kell shi esmo shahwe, li2anno el-khatiyye bidoun shari3a mayyte.
Kent 3ayish min abl bidoun shari3a, w-lamma ejet el-wassiye, 3eshit el-khatiyye w-mett ana.
Ye3ne el-wassiye yalle hadafa el-7ayet, wassaletne lal-mawt,
li2anno el-khatiyye 3emlit min el-wassiye 7ejje, ta-tekhda3ne w-2ataletne.
El-shari3a zeta, fa-ezan, m2addase, wel-wassiye, m2addase w-3adle w-sal7a.

Tekhmin yalle houe sale7 sar sabab la-mawte? Akid la2! Bass el-khatiyye 7atta tbayyen enna khatiyye, sta3malit yalle houe sale7 7atta tjeble el-mawt, w-hek bitkoun el-khatiyye bi-wastet el-wassiye woslit la-ekher 7doud el-khatiyye.
W-ne7na mna3rif enno el-shari3a rou7iyye, bass ana 2ensen nbe3 3abd lal-khatiyye:
ma befham shou 3am ba3mil, li2anno yalle badde yeh ma ba3mlo, w-yalle bekraho ba3mlo.
Lamma ba3mil yalle ma badde a3mlo, bkoun mwefe2 enno el-shari3a mni7a.
W-ma bkoun ana yalle 3am ba3mil yalle ma badde a3mlo, hayde el-khatiyye yalle sèkne fiyye,
li2anno ba3rif enno el-kheyr ma byeskon fiyye, ye3ne bi-jesme. W-iradet el-kheyr 7adra fiyye, bass 3amal el-kheyr la2.
Wel-kheyr yalle badde yeh ma ba3mlo, wel-sharr yalle ma badde yeh ba3mlo.
W-eza kent 3am ba3mil yalle ma badde yeh, mish ana yalle ba3mlo, hayde el-khatiyye yalle sèkne fiyye.
W-hek ble2e enno ana khadi3 hal-shari3a, badde a3mil el-kheyr bass el-sharr yalle sèken fiyye byesba2ne.
W-ana bi-a3me2 kayene befra7 bi-shari3et ALLAH,
bass b7ess bi-shari3a tenye bi-jesme bit2ewem shari3et 3a2le w-betkhalline a3mil 7asab shari3et el-khatiyye yalle hiye bi-jesme.
Ya weyle shou ana ta3ees! Meen bikhallesne min jesme el-mawwit hayda?
El-shokr la-ALLAH bi-RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7. Fa-ana bel-3a2l khadi3 la-shari3et ALLAH, w-bel-jesm la-shari3et el-khatiyye.
Ye3ne ma fi-7ekm min ba3d halla2 3a-yalle henne bel-MASI7 YASOU3,
li2anno shari3et el-ROU7 yalle bta3tina el-7ayet bel-MASI7 YASOU3 7arraretak min shari3et el-khatiyye wel-mawt.
W-yalle ma edrit el-shari3a ta3mlo, li2anno el-jesm da33afa, 7a'2a2o ALLAH lamma ba3at 2ebno bi-jesm byeshbah jesmna el-khate, ta-ykaffir 3an el-khatiyye, w-7akam 3al-khatiyye yalle bel-jesm
ta-ytemm fina yalle btes3alo el-shari3a, ne7na el-3ayshin metl ma baddo el-rou7 mish metl ma baddo el-jesm.
W-yalle 3ayshin metl ma baddo el-jesm, byehtammo bi-oumour el-jesm, w-yalle 3ayshin metl ma baddo el-rou7, byehtammo bi-oumour el-rou7.
El-ehtimem bel-jesm mawt, wel-ehtimem bel-rou7 houe 7ayet w-salem,
li2anno el-ehtimem bel-jesm houe tamarrod 3ala ALLAH, w-houe mish khadi3 la-shari3et ALLAH wala bye2dar enno yokhda3la.
W-yalle 3ayshin metl ma baddo el-jesm ma bye2daro ennon yordo ALLAH.
Bass ento mish 3ayshin metl ma baddo el-jesm, 3ayshin metl ma baddo el-rou7, li2anno ROU7 ALLAH byeskon fikon. W-yalle ma bikoun fih ROU7 el-MASI7, houe mish min el-MASI7.
W-eza ken el-MASI7 fikon, w-ajsemkon ra7 tmout bi-sabab el-khatiyye, bikoun el-rou7 7ayet elkon li2anno ALLAH barrarkon.
W-eza ken ROU7 ALLAH yalle 2awwam YASOU3 min el-mawt byeskon fikon, bikoun yalle 2awwam YASOU3 el-MASI7 min el-mawt bya3te 7ayet la-ajsemkon el-fenye bi-ROU7OU yalle byeskon fikon.
Ye3ne, ya ekhewte, el-jesm ma elo fadl 3leyna ta-n3ish metl ma baddo el-jesm.
W-eza 3eshto 7ayet el-jesm bitmouto, w-eza mawatto bel-rou7 a3mel el-jesm, bit3isho.
W-yalle bi2oudon ROU7 ALLAH henne kellon wled ALLAH,
li2anno el-rou7 yalle akhadtouh ma byesta3bedkon w-bireddkon lal-khawf, bel-3aks bya3melkon wled ALLAH w-bi-hayda el-rou7 mnesrokh la-ALLAH: "Abba, ya bayyna."
W-hayda el-rou7 byesh'had ma3 arwe7na enno ne7na wled ALLAH.
W-eza ne7na wled ALLAH, ye3ne mnourat kamen: mnourat ALLAH w-minsherik el-MASI7 bel-werte, minsherko bi-ãlemo ta-nsherko kamen bi-majdo.
W-bshouf enno ãlemna bi-hal-dene ma bten2ãs bel-majd yalle ra7 yezhar fina.
Wel-khali2a natra bi-feregh el-sabr zouhour wled ALLAH.
W-ma ken khoudou3a lal-batel bi-iradeta, ken bi-iradet yalle khadda3a. W-ma3 hal-shi be2ila el-raja
bi-enna hiye zeta ra7 tet7arrar min 3ouboudiyyet el-fased ta-tsherek wled ALLAH bi-7orriyyeton w-majdon.
W-ne7na mna3rif enno el-khali2a kella 3am bit3enn w-tetmakhad la-liom, metl el-mara yalle 3am bitwallid.
Mish bass hiye, ne7na kamen yalle ma3na bakouret el-Rou7 3am n3enn bi-2albna natrin min ALLAH el-tabanne w-eftide2 ajsemna.
Li2anno khalãsna 7solna 3le bel-raja. Bass el-raja yalle minshoufo eddem 3younna ma bikoun raja, w-keef byetrajja el-2ensen el-shi yalle bishoufo?
W-eza kenna mnetrajja yalle ma minshoufo, fa-bel-sabr mnentro.
W-byeje el-ROU7 kamen yesh2ol do3fna. W-ne7na ma mna3rif keef nsalle metl ma lezim, bass el-ROU7 byetshaffa3elna eddem ALLAH w-bi3enn 3annet fo2 el-wasf.
W-ALLAH yalle bishouf shou fi bel-2loub bya3rif shou baddo el-rou7, w-keef enno byeshfa3 lal-2eddisin 7asab iradto.
W-ne7na mna3rif enno kell el-eshya bitsir la-kheyr yalle bi7ebbo ALLAH, yalle henne mad3ouwwin 7asab 2asdo.
W-yalle saba2 w-na'2ehon, saba2 w-3ayyanon ta-ykouno 3ala souret 2ebno 7atta ykoun el-2eben bekr la-ekhwe ktar.
Wel-ashkhas yalle saba2 w-3ayyanon, da3ehon kamen, w-yalle da3ehon barraron kamen, w-yalle barraron majjadon kamen.
W-min ba3d hayda kello, shou min2oul? Eza ken ALLAH ma3na, meen bikoun doddna?
ALLAH yalle ma tbekhal 3leyna bi-2ebno, w-sallamo lal-mawt kermelna kellna, keef ma baddo ya3tina ma3o kell shi?
Meen yalle byettehem yalle na'2ehon ALLAH, w-ALLAH houe yalle barraron?
W-meen bye2dar enno ye7kom 3leyon? Wel-MASI7 YASOU3 houe yalle met, w-2am, w-houe 3an yameen ALLAH byetshaffa3elna.
W-meen byofsolna 3an ma7abbet el-MASI7? El-shedde aw el-di2a aw el-edtihad aw el-jou3 aw el-3oure aw el-khatar aw el-seyf?
El-kteb bi2oul: "kermelak ne7na min3ãne el-mawt kell el-nhar, w-bi3amlouna metl el-ghanam yalle ekhdinon 3al-dab7."
Bass ba3d kell hal-msayeb ra7 nontosir bi-yalle 7abbna.
W-ana m2akkad enno la el-mawt wala el-7ayet, wala el-maleyke wala rou2asa el-maleyke, wala el-7ader wala el-mousta2bal,
Wala 2ouwwet el-ard wala 2ouwwet el-sama, wala shi bel-khali2a kella bye2dar enno yofsolna 3an ma7abbet ALLAH bel-MASI7 YASOU3 RABNA.
3am 2oul el-7a2i2a bel-MASI7 w-ma 3am kazzeb. Dameere byesh'hadle bel-ROU7 el-2ODOS
enno ana 7azin ktir w-bi-2albe alam deyim,
w-enno bitmanna law kent ana bi-zete ma7roum w-monfosil 3an el-MASI7 kermel ekhewte yalle bel-sleele.
Henne wled Isra2il yalle 3eml minnon ALLAH wledo, w-elon el-majd wel-3ouhoud wel-shari3a wel-3ibede wel-wou3oud,
w-minnon keno el-bayyet w-eja el-MASI7 ka-2ensen, w-houe fo2 el-kell, Ileh moubarak lal-abad. Ãmin.
W-ma b2oul enno wa3d ALLAH kheb, mish kell wled Isra2il henne Isra2il,
wala kell yalle min sleelet Ibrahim henne wled Ibrahim. 2al ALLAH la-Ibrahim: "bi-Is7ak bikoun elak sleele."
W-mish wled el-sleele henne wled ALLAH, wled el-wa3d henne yalle bye7sebon ALLAH sleelet Ibrahim.
W-kalem el-wa3d houe hayda: "ra7 erja3 bi-metl hal-wa2et, w-bikoun la-Sara 2eben."
W-hayda mish kell shi, kamen Raf2a 7eblit min rejjel wa7ad, min bayyna Is7ak,
w-abl ma youlado el-sabyen w-ya3mlo kheyr aw sharr, w-la-7atta ydall tedbir ALLAH 2ayem 3a-ases enno houe na'2a mish 3a-ases el-a3mel,
2al ALLAH la-Raf2a: "el-sabe el-akbar ra7 yekhdom el-azghar",
metl ma n2al bel-kteb: "7abbeyt Ya3koub w-krehet 3eeso."
W-shou min2oul? Ma32oul ykoun ALLAH zalem? Akid la2!
2al ALLAH la-Moussa: "ber7am yalle ber7amo, w-beshfa2 3ala yalle badde eshfa2 3le."
W-hal-shi ma byerja3 la-iradet el-2ensen wala la-jehdo, bass la-ra7met ALLAH wa7da.
W-bel-kteb 2al ALLAH la-Fer3on: "rafa3tak ta-bayyen edrte fik w-ta-el-nes ye7ko bi-esme bi-kell el-ard."
W-ALLAH byer7am yalle baddo yeh w-bi2asse 2alb yalle baddo yeh.
W-bi2elle 7ada minkon: "leysh biloumna ALLAH? Meen bye2dar enno y2ewem iradto?"
