Bjeweb: meen enta ya hal-2ensen 7atta te3torid 3ala ALLAH? Ma3'2oul t2oul el-jable la-yalle jabala: leysh hek 3meltne?
Tekhmin el-khezzef ma elo soulta 3al-fekhkhar, ta-ya3mil min jablet el-fekhkhar nafsa wa3a elo 2ime, w-wa3a tene rkhees?
W-nafs el-shi ALLAH, lamma arad enno ybayyen ghadabo w-ye3lon ederto, t7ammal bi-sabr kbir yalle byest7e'2o ghadabo, w-ma 3ed na2eson ella el-mawt
metl ma arad enno ye3lon fayd majdo bi-yalle baddo yer7amon w-yalle kenn m7addaron lal-majd,
ye3ne ne7na yalle da3ehon mish min bayn el-Yahoud wa7don, min bayn be2e el-shou3oub kamen.
W-ALLAH 2al bi-kteb Housha3: "yalle ma ken sha3be ra7 sammih sha3be, w-yalle ma kenit 7abibte ra7 sammiha 7abibte,
w-matra7 ma n2allon: ento mish sha3be, ra7 sammihon wled ALLAH el-7ayy."
W-byektob Ashe3ya bi-kalemo 3an Isra2il: "W-eza keno wled Isra2il 2add raml el-ba7r, fa-yalle byeb2o minnon ra7 yle2o el-khalãs,
li2anno el-RAB baddo y7a'2i2 kelmto 3al-3alam, te7'2i2 kemil, w-bi-wa2et sari3.
W-bi-hayda tnabba Ashe3ya, 2al: law ma enno RAB el-jounoud khallelna sleele, kenna serna metl Sadoum w-tshabbahna bi-3amoura."
W-shou min2oul? Min2oul enno el-oumam, yalle ma se3yo ta-ye7salo 3al-tebrir, tbarraro bass 3ala ases el-imen,
w-wled Isra2il yalle se3yo la-shari3a gheyeta el-tebrir ma edro woslo la-gheyet el-shari3a.
W-leysh? Li2annon se3yo la-hal-tebrir 3a-ases el-a3mel yalle btefroda el-shari3a mish 3a-ases el-imen, w-nsadamo bi-7ajar el-3athra,
metl ma bi2oul el-kteb: "badde 7ott bi-Sehyoun 7ajar 3athra bi-tari2 el-sha3b w-sakhra tfarkish, w-yalle bi2ãmen fih ma bikhib 2amalo."
W-addeysh bitmanna min kell 2albe ya ekhewte enno wled Isra2il yle2o el-khalãs, w-addeysh bsalle la-ALLAH kermelon.
W-ana besh'hadlon enno 3endon ghiret ALLAH, bass bidoun ma3rife sa7i7a,
li2annon ma 3erfo keef bibarrer ALLAH el-bashar w-se3yo lal-tebrir 3ala tari2eton, ma keno khad3in la-tari2et ALLAH bel-tebrir,
w-hiye enno gheyet el-shari3a houe el-MASI7 yalle fih byetbarrar kell meen bi2ãmen.
W-katab Moussa keef byetbarrar el-2ensen bel-shari3a w-2al: "yalle bitabbi2 el-shari3a bi3ish fiya."
W-3an el-tebrir yalle houe min el-imen 2al: "ma t2oul bi-2albak: meen byetla3 3al-sama? (ye3ne ta-ykhalle el-MASI7 yenzal la-3anna).
Aw meen byenzal 3al-hewwe? (ye3ne ta-khalle el-MASI7 yetla3 min bayn el-mawta)."
W-yalle n2al houe hal-shi: "el-kelme 2aribe minnak, 3a-temmak w-bi-2albak", ye3ne kelmet el-imen yalle minbasher fiya.
W-eza shahadet bi-temmak enno YASOU3 RAB, w-2ãmanet bi-2albak enno ALLAH 2awwamo min el-mawt, akhadet el-khalãs.
Fa-el-imen bel-2alb biwassil lal-berr, wel-shahede bel-temm bitwassil lal-khalãs.
Wel-kteb bi2oul: "yalle bi2ãmen fih ma bikhib 2amalo."
W-ma fi far2 bayn el-Yahoude wel-mish Yahoude, li2anno ALLAH RABBON kellon, bimalle min kheyrato kell wa7ad byetloba minno.
Wel-kteb bi2oul: "kell meen byed3e bi-esm el-RAB bile2e el-khalãs."
Bass keef byed3o w-ma 2ãmano fih? W-keef bi2ãmno w-ma sem3o fih? W-keef byesma3o fih w-ma basharon 7ada?
W-keef bibashrouwon w-ma ba3aton ALLAH? Wel-kteb bi2oul: "ma ajmal ejren el-moubashirin bel-kheyr."
Bass mish kellon 2eblo el-injil. Mish Ashe3ya 2al: "ya RAB, meen 2ãman bi-yalle sem3ouh minna?"
Fa-ezan el-imen byeje min el-sama3, wel-sama3 houe min el-tebshir bel-MASI7.
Bass ana b2oul: ma sem3o? Mbala, sem3o, wel-kteb bi2oul: "lal-ard kella wossil sawton, w-la-ekher el-3alam wossil kalemon."
Bass b2oul kamen: wled Isra2il ma fehmo? 2al Moussa min abl: "bitgharo min sha3b ma bikoun sha3be, w-bkhallikon tgharo min sha3b houe mish sha3b."
W-Ashe3ya bi2oul bi-jer2a: "le2youne yalle ma keno 3am bifattsho 3leyye, w-kashafet 7ale la-yalle ma keno 3am yetolboune."
Bass bi2oul 3an wled Isra2il: "maddeyt 2ideyye kell el-nhar la-sha3b metmarrid 3aneed."
Bass b2oul: awlkon ALLAH rafad sha3bo? Akid la2! Ana kamen Isra2ile, min sleelet Ibrahim w-2abilet Benyamin.
Ma rafad ALLAH sha3bo yalle na'2eh min abl. W-ento bta3erfo shou 2al el-kteb 3an Eliyya lamma tshakka 3a-wled Isra2il la-ALLAH, w-2al:
"ya RAB, 2atalo anbiye2ak w-hadamo kell mazeb7ak w-b2it ana wa7de, w-henne baddon ye2etloune."
W-shou 2allo sawt ALLAH? 2allo: "ana khalleyt la-ele sab3-talef rejjel ma ta3ajo rekbeton eddem el-Ba3l."
W-bel-wa2et el-7ader kamen ba2iyye min el-nes khtaron ALLAH bel-ne3me.
W-eza ken el-ekhtiyar bel-ne3me, fa-ezan houe mish bel-a3mel, wa-ella ma kenit be2yet el-ne3me ne3me.
W-shou ba3d? Yalle keno 3am yetolbouh wled Isra2il w-ma 3am yekhdouh, akhadouh yalle na'2ehon ALLAH. Wel-be2yin 2esyet 2loubon,
metl ma eja bel-kteb: "3atahon ALLAH 3a2l balid w-3youn ma bte2sha3 w-dinen ma btesma3 la-7add liom."
W-2al Daoud: "teb2a maweyedon fakh elon w-shabake w-7ajar 3athra w-2asãs.
3younon tghabbish w-ma ye2sha3o, w-yeb2a dahron men7ene kell el-wa2et."
W-ana b2oul: tekhmin el-Yahoud da3aso da3se khalleton yese2to lal-abad? La2! Bass bi-sa2teton sar el-khalãs lal-mish Yahoud 7atta ygharo wled Isra2il.
W-eza kenit sa2teton ghena lal-3alam w-nou2sanon ghena la-be2e el-shou3oub, fa-keef bikoun el-ghena ghena bass yektemlo?
W-halla2 b2oul lal-mish Yahoud minkon: ma zelne rasoul la-ghayr el-Yahoud, ana fakhour bi-riselte
barke bkhalle yalle henne min la7me ygharo, w-bkhallis el-ba3d minnon.
W-eza ken rafdon wassal la-mousala7et el-3alam ma3 ALLAH, fa-ma bikoun 2ouboulon ella 7ayet ba3d mawt?
W-eza kenit el-khameere m2addase, el-3ajeen kello m2addas. W-eza ken el-2asl m2addas, el-ghsoun m2addase kamen.
W-eza n2ata3it ba3d el-ghsoun, w-kent enta zeytoune barriye w-ta33amouk ta-tsherik el-ghsoun el-be2ye bi-2asl el-shajra w-thamara,
ma tshouf 7alak 3al-ghsoun yalle n2ata3it. W-keef bitshouf 7alak w-enta ma bte7mol el-2asl, bel-3aks el-2asl houe yalle bye7emlak?
Bass bit2oul: "n2ata3it haydik el-ghsoun 7atta etta33am ana!"
Tayyib! Hiye n2ata3it li2anno ma bit2ãmen, w-enta be2e li2annak bit2ãmen, fa-badal ma tetkabbar, khaf Rabbak.
W-eza ALLAH ma khalla el-ghsoun el-tabi3iyye mfakkar enno ra7 ykahllik elak kamen?
W-hayda houe lotf ALLAH w-2asewto 3a-yalle sa2ato, wel-lotf elak eza barhanet ennak ahl la-hal-lotf, wa-ella bten2eti3 enta kamen.
Bass henne, eza saro y2ãmno ra7 yta33emon ALLAH, li2anno ALLAH edir yta33emon marra tenye.
W-eza ken ALLAH 2ata3ak min zeytoune barriye btenteme ela bi-tabi3tak, w-ta33amak 3ala 3aks tabi3tak bi-zeytoune mni7a, fa-keef yalle henne ghsoun asliyye ma ra7 yta33emon ALLAH bel-zeytoune?
W-ana ma badde, ya ekhewte, enno tejhalo hal-serr ta-ma tfakkro 7alkon 3endkon 7ekme, wel-serr houe enno jez2 min wled Isra2il n3ama 2albon la-7add ma ykouno el-mish Yahoud 2ãmano.
W-hek bile2e kell wled Isra2il el-khalãs, metl ma nkatab bel-kteb: "min Sehyoun byeje el-moukhallis w-bisheel el-koufr 3an wled Ya3koub.
W-bikoun hayda 3ahde elon wa2et bem7ilon khatayahon."
Wel-Yahoud, bennesbe lal-bishara henne a3de2 ALLAH, w-hal-shi la-masla7etkon. W-bennesbe la-ekhtiyar ALLAH, henne a7ebbe2o kermel el-bayyet.
W-ALLAH ma byetraja3 3an mawehbo w-da3wto.
W-metl ma ento 3sito ALLAH min abl w-ra7amkon halla2 bi-sabab 3esyenon,
Hek henne 3aso ALLAH halla2 ta-yer7amon metl ma ra7amkon,
li2anno ALLAH 7abas el-bashar kellon bel-3esyen 7atta yer7amon kellon.
Ma-fi a3ma2 min ghena ALLAH w-7ekemto w-3elmo! W-ma as3ab enno na3rif a7kemo w-nefham tourou2o?
Wel-kteb bi2oul: "Meen yalle 3eref fekr el-RAB, aw meen yalle ken moustasharo?
W-meen yalle 3atah shi bel-awwal 7atta yreddelo yeh?"
Fa-kell shi minno w-bi-wasteto w-elo. Elo el-majd lal-abad. Ãmin.
Kermel hek bitrajjekon, ya ekhewte, bi-7anen ALLAH enno t2addmo 7alkon zabi7a, kella 7ayet, m2addase, ma2boule min ALLAH. W-hayde hiye 3ibedetkon el-rou7iyye.
W-ma tetshabbaho bi-yalle mawjoud bi-hal-dene, tghayyaro bi-tejdid 3ou2oulkon ta-ta3erfo iradet ALLAH: shou houe el-sale7, w-shou houe el-ma2boul, w-shou houe el-kemil.
W-bwasse kell wa7ad minkon bi-fadl el-ne3me yalle n3atetle enno ma ye3tebir 7alo aktar min ma byeswa. W-ykoun mawzoun tijeh nafso, kell wa7ad 7asab ma ALLAH 3atah imen.
W-metl ma 3enna a2sãm ktire bi-jesm wa7ad, w-la-kell 3odow 3amalo el-khas fih,
hek ne7na bi-ketritna jesm wa7ad bel-MASI7, w-kell wa7ad houe 3odow lal-tene,
w-3enna maweheb btekhtelif 7asab el-ne3me yalle n3atetelna: yalle 3endo mawhabet el-noubouwe khallih yetnabba 7asab el-imen,
w-yalle 3endo mawhabet el-khedme khallih yekhdom, w-yalle 3endo mawhabet el-ta3lim khallih y3allim,
w-yalle 3endo mawhabet el-wa3z khallih you3az, w-yalle bya3te khallih ya3te bi-karam, w-yalle houe ra2is khallih ykoun ra2is mni7, w-yalle byer7am khallih yer7am bi-fara7.
W-khalle el-ma7abbe tkoun bidoun khabsane. Tjannabo el-sharr w-tmassako bel-kheyr.
W-7ebbo ba3dkon ka-ekhwe, kell wa7ad yshouf el-be2yin afdal minno,
shteghlo kermel el-RAB bi-hemme ma btebrod w-bi-rou7 meltehbe.
Fra7o bel-raja, w-wa2et el-di2 tawwlo belkon, w-khallikon mdewmin 3al-sala.
Se3do el-ekhwe el-2eddisin 3end 7ajeton, w-dewmo 3ala diyafet el-ghouraba.
Berko yalle byedtehdoukon, berko w-ma tel3ano.
Fra7o ma3 el-fer7anin w-bkou ma3 yalle 3am yebko.
Kouno mettef2in, ma tetkabbaro, bel-3aks twada3o. Ma tfakkro 7alkon 3endkon 7ekme.
Ma treddo 3al-sharr bel-sharr, w-htammo bi-3amal el-kheyr eddem kell el-nes.
Tselamo ma3 kell el-nes eza moumkin, 2add ma fikon.
Ma tente2mo la-nafskon ya a7ebba, treko hal-shi la-ghadab ALLAH. El-kteb bi2oul: "ana yalle bente2im, bi2oul el-RAB, w-ana yalle b2ãses."
Bass: "eza je3 3adouwwak ta3mih, w-eza 3otsh s2ih, li2annak bi-3amalak hayda btejma3 3ala raso jamr nar."
Ma tkhalle el-sharr yeghelbak, enta ghlob el-sharr bel-kheyr.
Khallo kell ensen yokhda3 la-as7ab el-soulta, ma fi soulta ella min 3end ALLAH, wel-soulta el-mawjoude hiye min tedbiro.
W-yalle bi3ared el-soulta bi3ared tedbir ALLAH, w-byest7e2 yet2ãsas.
Wel-7ekkem ma bikhafo min yalle bya3emlo el-kheyr, bikhafo min yalle bya3mil el-sharr. Enta baddak enno ma tkhaf min el-soulta? 3mol el-kheyr byordo 3annak.

Wel-soulta bi-khedmet ALLAH la-kheyrak. Bass khaf eza 3melt el-sharr, li2anno el-soulta ma bte7mol el-seyf kermel ma shi. W-eza 2ãsasetak, bikoun li2anna bi-khedmet ALLAH ta-tnazzil ghadabo 3a-yalle bya3emlo el-sharr.
Kermel hek la-bodd min el-khoudou3 lal-soulta, mish bass li2anno minkhaf min ghadab ALLAH, kermel el-dameer kamen.
W-kermel hek ento btedfa3o el-darayib. W-as7ab el-soulta byekhedmo ALLAH lamma bidewmo 3al-khedme.
Fa-3tou kell wa7ad 7a'2o: el-daribe la-meen elo el-daribe, wel-jezye la-meen elo el-jezye, wel-i7tiram wel-tekrim la-yalle byest7e2 el-tekrim.
Ma ykoun la-7ada minkon 3ala 7ada dayn ella ma7abbet ba3dkon la-ba3d, w-yalle bi7ebb ghayro bitabbi2 el-shari3a.
Wel-wassaya yalle bit2oul: "ma tezne, ma te2tol, ma tesro2, ma teshtehe" w-ghayra min el-wassaya, btetlakhas bi-hal-wassiye: "7ebb 2aribak metl ma bit7ebb 7alak."
W-yalle bi7ebb 2aribo ma bye2ze 7ada, fa-el-ma7abbe hiye el-shari3a bi-akmal 7aleta.
W-ento bta3erfo bi-ayya wa2et ne7na: ejet el-se3a ta-t2oumo min el-nawm, fa-el-khalãs halla2 a2rab elna min ma ken yawm 2ãmanna.
Kholis el-leyl w-eja el-nhar. Khallina neshla7 a3mel el-zalam w-ne7mol sle7 el-nour.
Ta-neslok el-soulouk yalle bili2 bel-nhar: la-3arbade wala sekr, wala fjour wala fe7sh, wala khilef wala 7asad.
Tsalla7o bel-RAB YASOU3 el-MASI7, w-ma tensheghlo bel-jesm ta-tshabb3o shahaweto.
2balo baynetkon yalle d3if bi-imeno w-ma te7ekmo 3ala 2arã2o.
Fi nes bifakkro enno fiyon yeklo min kell shi, w-fi nes d3af bel-imen, ma byeklo ella khodra.
W-yalle byekol min kell shi ma ye7te2ir yalle ma byekol metlo, w-yalle ma byekol min kell shi ma ydeen yalle byekol min kell shi, li2anno hayda kamen ma2boul 3end ALLAH.
W-meen enta 7atta tdeen khadim ghayrak? Houe bi-3ayn sayyido byes2ot aw byethbat bi-khedmto. W-ra7 yethbat li2anno el-RAB edir ythabto.
W-fi nes bifaddlo yawm 3ala yawm, w-fi nes el-iyem kella metl ba3da bennesbe elon. W-mish mashkal enno yethbat kell wa7ad 3ala ra2yo.

Li2anno yalle bira3e yawm bidoun be2e el-iyem bira3ih kermel ALLAH, w-yalle byekol min kell shi byekol kermel ALLAH li2anno byeshkor ALLAH, w-yalle ma byekol min kell shi ma byekol kermel ALLAH w-byeshkor ALLAH.
Ma fi 7ada bi3ish kermel 7alo, w-ma fi 7ada bimout kermel 7alo.
Eza 3eshna min3ish lal-RAB, w-eza metna minmout lal-RAB. Ye3ne eza metna aw 3eshna, ne7na lal-RAB.
Wel-MASI7 met w-reje3 lal-7ayet ta-ykoun RAB el-mayytin wel-tayybin.
Fa-keef enta bitdeen khayyak? W-keef bte7te2ir khayyak? Ne7na kellna ra7 nou2af eddem ma7kamet ALLAH,
wel-kteb bi2oul: "ana el-7ayet, bi2oul el-RAB, la-ele bterka3 kell rekbe, w-kell lsen bisabbe7 ALLAH."
Fa-ezan, kell wa7ad minna ra7 y2addim la-ALLAH 7seb 3an 7alo.
Ma ba2a ne7kom 3ala ba3dna, w-a7sanelkon enno te7ekmo bi-enno ma ykoun 7ada 7ajar 3athra la-khayyo aw ykhallih yshekk,
w-ana 3arif w-me2teni3 bel-RAB YASOU3 enno ma fi shi nejs bi-7add zeto, bass bikoun nejs la-yalle bye3tebro nejs.
W-eza 3am tza33el khayyak kermel 2akle bit7ebba, ma bitkoun 3ayish 3ishet el-ma7abbe. Ma tkhalle 2aklak ykoun sabab halek la-yalle met el-MASI7 kermelo,
w-ma t7awwil el-kheyr la-kalem 3atel.
Malakout ALLAH mish 2akl w-sherb, houe 3adl w-salem w-fara7 bel-ROU7 el-2ODOS.
W-yalle khadam el-MASI7 metl hal-khedme byorde ALLAH w-byen2abal min el-nes.
Khallina nes3a la-kell shi fiyo el-salem w-la-kell shi bikhallina nebne ba3dna.
Ma tehdom 3amal ALLAH kermel el-2akl. Kell shi taher, bass el-sharr ennak tkoun bi-yalle 3am teklo 7ajar 3athra la-khayyak,
a7sanlak ma tekol la7m w-ma teshrab nbeed w-ma tekol shi bikhalle khayyak yshekk.
W-7tefez bi-yalle bit2ãmen fih baynak w-bayn ALLAH. Niyyel yalle ma bye7kom 3ala 7alo bel-shi yalle bishoufo mni7.
Bass yalle bishakkek bi-yalle 3am yeklo, bikoun ma7koum 3le li2anno ma 3am ya3mil hal-shi 3an imen. W-kell shi ma bikoun 3an imen houe khatiyye.
W-ne7na el-2weya bel-imen lezim net7ammal do3f el-d3af, w-ma netlob yalle byorde nafsna,
khalle kell wa7ad minna ya3mil yalle byorde khayyo kermel el-kheyr wel-benyen.
Wel-MASI7 ma talab yalle byorde nafso, bel-3aks metl ma nkatab bel-kteb: "yalle ahenouk, ihenèton wa2a3it 3leyye."
W-kell shi eja min abl bel-ketob el-m2addase, eja la-y3allemna keef minle2e el-raja bi-kell shi fiyo sabr w-ta3ziye bi-hal-ketob.
Ileh el-sabr wel-ta3ziye bya3tikon tkouno 3a-ra2y wa7ad bayn ba3dkon metl ma 3allamna el-MASI7 YASOU3,
ta-tmajjdo ALLAH bayy RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7 bi-2alb wa7ad w-lsen wa7ad.
2balo ba3dkon la-majd ALLAH metl ma 2ebelkon el-MASI7.
W-ana b2elkon enno el-MASI7 sar khadim el-Yahoud ta-ybayyen enno ALLAH sade2 w-byouwfe bi-yalle wa3ad fih el-bayyet.
Wel-mish Yahoud bimajjdo ALLAH 3ala ra7emto, metl ma nkatab bel-kteb: "kermel hek badde emda7 fik bayn el-oumam, w-rattel la-esmak."
W-maktoub kamen: "fra7e ya oumam ma3 sha3b ALLAH!"
W-kamen: "sabb7e el-RAB ya kell el-oumam! Majjde ya kell el-shou3oub!"
W-2al Ashe3ya: "ra7 yetla3 wa7ad min sleelet Yassa, w-y2oum yetra'2as el-oumam wel-shou3oub y7otto thi2aton fih."
Ileh el-raja yeghmerkon bel-fara7 wel-salem bel-imen, 7atta yektar rajekon bi-edrit el-ROU7 el-2ODOS!
W-ana 3ala thi2a, ya ekhewte, bi-ennkon melyenin kheyr w-ma3rife, edrin tensa7o ba3dkon.
Bass katabtelkon bi-ba3d el-eshya bi-jer2a kbire ta-nabbehkon 3leya, w-hal-shi kermel el-ne3me yalle 3atane yeha ALLAH
7atta koun khadim el-MASI7 YASOU3 3end el-mish Yahoud, w-kehen injil ALLAH, w-ysiro el-mish Yahoud 2erben ma2boul 3end ALLAH m2addas bel-ROU7 el-2ODOS.
W-bi7e'2elle, kermel hek, enno eftekhir bel-MASI7 YASOU3 bi-khedmte la-ALLAH,
li2anno ma bestarje e7ke ella bi-yalle 3emlo el-MASI7 3ala 2ideyye ta-khalle el-mish Yahoud ytee3o ALLAH, bel-2awl wel-fe3l
w-bi-2ouwwet el-3ajeyeb w-bi-edrit ROU7 ALLAH. Kammalet el-tebshir bel-MASI7 min Ourashalim w-yalle 7awla ta-wsolit la-Lirikoun.
W-kent 7arees enno ma basher matra7 ma sem3o el-nes bi-esm el-MASI7, ta-ma ebne 3ala ases ghayre,
w-3melt bi-yalle nkatab bel-kteb: "yalle ma basharon 7ada fih ra7 yshoufo, w-yalle ma sem3o fih ra7 yefhamo."
W-hayda yalle mana3ne aktar min marra enno eje la-3andkon.
Bass halla2 ma ba2a 3ende shi ykhalline eb2a bi-hal-manate2, w-ana min kamm sene meshte2 eje la-3andkon,
fa-ana bitmanna emro2 shoufkon ana w-raye7 3a-Espanya w-ra7 tse3doune ta-kammil safare la-honik, min ba3d ma etmatta3 walaw shwey bi-shawfetkon.
Bass halla2 ana raye7 3ala Ourashalim ta-ekhdom el-ekhwe el-2eddisin,
li2anno kaneyes Makdouniyye w-Akha2ya 7abbo ysherko bi-mouse3adet el-fou2ara el-2eddisin yalle bi-Ourashalim.
Henne hek 7abbo w-hayda dayn 3leyon, li2anno el-mish Yahoud sherakouwon bi-kheyraton el-rou7iyye, w-lezim henne yekhedmouwon bi-kheyraton el-mediyye.
W-min ba3d ma ekhlas min hal-shaghle w-sallemon el-mouse3ada, ra7 emro2 la-3andkon ana w-raye7 3a-Espanya.
W-ba3rif enno eza jeet la-3andkon beje bi-kell baraket el-MASI7.
Kermel hek betlob minkon, ya ekhewte, bi-esm RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7 w-bi-ma7abbet el-ROU7, enno tkef7o w-tsallo la-ALLAH kermele,
ta-ykhallesne min hal-koffar yalle bel-Yahoudiye w-tkoun khedmte bi-Ourashalim ma2boule 3end el-ekhwe el-2eddisin,
w-eje la-3andkon mabsout eza ALLAH rad, w-erte7 3endkon.
Ileh el-salem ykoun ma3kon kellkon. Ãmin.
Bwassikon bi-ekhetna Fibya, khãdmit kniset Kankhariyya.
T2abbalouwa bel-RAB 2ouboul bili2 bel-ekhwe el-2eddisin, w-se3douwa bi-kell shi bit3ouzo minkon, li2anna se3adit ktar min el-ekhwe w-se3adetne ana kamen.
Sallmo 3ala Briskilla w-Akila, yalle bise3doune bi-khedmet el-MASI7 YASOU3,
yalle 3arrado 7ayeton lal-mawt kermele, w-mish ana wa7de yalle beshkoron, kell kaneyes el-mou2minin min el-oumam byeshkrouwon kamen.
Sallmo kamen 3al-knise yalle btejteme3 bi-beyton. Sallmo 3al-7abib Apinitos, awwal meen htada bi-Asia lal-MASI7.
Sallmo 3ala Maryam yalle te3bit ktir bi-khedmetkon.
Sallmo 3ala Andronikos w-Youniyas, 2raybine w-yalle keno ma3e bel-7abs, w-henne mash'hourin bayn el-rousl, w-henne 2ãmano bel-MASI7 abl minne.
Sallmo 3ala Ampliyatos 7abibe bel-RAB,
w-3ala Orpanos rfi2na bi-khedmet el-MASI7, w-3al-7abib Estakhis.
Sallmo 3ala Apolos yalle barhan 3an thabeto bel-MASI7. Sallmo 3ala ahl beyt Aristopolos
sallmo 3ala Hirodyoun 2arabte. Sallmo 3a-yalle bi2ãmno bel-RAB min ahl beyt Narkissos.
Sallmo 3ala Trivinia w-Trivosa yalle te3bo bi-khedmet el-RAB. Sallmo 3ala Barsis el-ma7boube yalle te3bit ktir bi-khedmet el-RAB.
Sallmo 3ala Rofos el-moukhtar bel-RAB, w-3a-emmo yalle hiye metl emme.
Sallmo 3ala Asinikritos w-Faligon w-Armis w-Petropas w-Armas w-3ala el-ekhwe yalle ma3on.
Sallmo 3ala Filologos w-Julya w-Niryos w-ekhto, w-3ala Olimpas w-kell el-ekhwe el-2eddisin yalle ma3on.
Sallmo 3ala ba3dkon bi-bawse m2addase. Kaneyes el-MASI7 kella bitsallem 3leykon.
W-bwassikon w-bitrajjekon, ya ekhewte, enno tentebho min yalle bya3mlo in2isamet, w-byorfdo el-ta3alim yalle akhadtouwa. Khallikon b3ad 3annon,
li2anno yalle metlon ma byekhedmo el-MASI7 RABNA, bass byekhedmo btounon, w-byekhda3o yalle 2albon tayyib bi-7ake ma3soul.
Kell el-nes sem3o bi-ta3etkon, w-kermel hek ana befra7 fikon. Bass badde ykoun 3endkon 7ekme bi-yalle houe kheyr, w-tkouno abriya min kell sharr.
W-Ileh el-salem ra7 yed3as eblees, 3an-2arib, ta7t ejreykon. Ne3met RABNA YASOU3 tkoun ma3kon.
Bisallem 3leykon Timothawos yalle 3am bise3edne w-2raybine Loukyos w-Yasoun w-Sousipatros.
W-ana Tartyos, ketib hal-risele, bsallem 3leykon bel-RAB.
W-bisallem 3leykon Gayos yalle sta2balne w-st2abal el-knise kella. Bisallem 3leykon Arastos, ameen sandou2 el-madine, w-khayyna Koratos.
Ne3met RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7 ma3kon kellkon. Ãmin.
El-majd la-ALLAH el-edir ythabbetkon bel-enjil yalle 3am basher fih w-nede bi-YASOU3 el-MASI7 bi-7asab e3len el-serr yalle be2e maktoum lal-abad
w-zahar halla2 bi-yalle katabouh el-anbiya w-3erfeto kell el-shou3oub, metl ma 2amar ALLAH el-azale, 7atta ytee3o w-y2ãmno.
El-majd la-ALLAH el-7akeem wa7do, bi-YASOU3 el-MASI7 lal-abad. Ãmin.
Min Boulos yalle ALLAH arad enno yed3ih la-ykoun rasoul el-MASI7 YASOU3, w-min el-akh Sostanis,
lal-Knise bi-Korentos, la-yalle 2addason ALLAH bel-MASI7 YASOU3 w-da3ahon ta-ykouno 2eddisin ma3 kell yalle binedo wayn ma-ken bi-esm RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7, Rabbon w-Rabbna.
Elkon el-ne3me wel-salem min ALLAH bayyna w-min el-RAB YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Beshkor Ilehe kermelkon 3ala toul 3al-ne3me yalle 3atakon yeha bel-MASI7 YASOU3,
fa-serto bi-wasteto aghniya bi-kell shi, bi-fann el-kalem w-anwe3 el-ma3rife.
3ala 2add ma trassakhet fikon shahedet el-MASI7,
7atta serto mish bi-7aje la-wala mawhabe, ento w-natrin zouhour RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7,
w-houe yalle bye7fazkon thebtin 7atta el-niheye 7atta ma ykoun 3leykon lawm bi-yawm RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7.
ALLAH yalle da3ekon tsherko 2ebno YASOU3 el-MASI7 RABNA, houe ameen.
Bitrajjekon ya ekhewte, bi-esm RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7, enno tkouno kellkon mettef2in bel-ra2y w-enno ma ykoun baynkon khilef, bel-3aks kouno mettef2in, w-3endkon rou7 wa7ad w-fekr wa7ad.
W-ahl beyt Khoulwa khabbaroune ya ekhewte enno fi baynetkon khilef,
ye3ne kell wa7ad minkon bi2oul "ana ma3 Boulos" w-"ana ma3 Apolos" w-"ana ma3 Boutros" w-"ana ma3 el-MASI7."
Tekhmin el-MASI7 n2asam? Tekhmin Boulos houe yalle nsalab kermelkon? Aw bi-esm Boulos t3ammadto?
Beshkor ALLAH enno ma 3ammadet 7ada minkon ghayr Krisbos w-Gayos,
w-ma bye2dar 7ada y2oul ennkon bi-esme t3ammadto.
Mbala, 3ammadet kamen 3eylet Estefanas. W-ma 3ada hal-ashkhas, ma bezkor enno 3ammadet 7ada.
Wel-MASI7 ma ba3atne ta-3ammed, ba3atne la-e3lon el-injil bidoun ma ettekel 3ala 7ekmet el-kalem ta-ma yef2od mawt el-MASI7 3al-salib 2ouwwto.
El-tebshir bel-salib "fiya shi min el-jnoun" bi-nazar yalle ray7in 3al-halek. Bass bi-nazarna ne7na wled el-khalãs, hiye edrit ALLAH.
El-kteb bi2oul: "ra7 em7e 7ekmet ahl el-7ekme, w-ra7 dammir fehm yalle byefhamo."
Wayn 2ebn el-7ekme? W-wayn 3alem el-shari3a? W-wayn el-moujedil bi-hal-3asr? Mish ALLAH khalla 7ekmet el-3alam tkoun jahele?
Lamma kenit 7ekmet ALLAH enno ma ya3erfouh 3an tari2 el-7ekme, arad ALLAH enno ykhallis el-mou2minin fih "bi-jnoun" el-injil.
W-eza keno el-Yahoud 3am yetolbo el-3ajeyeb, wel-Youneniyyin 3am bifattsho 3an el-7ekme,
ne7na minnede bel-MASI7 masloub, w-hal-shi shakk lal-Yahoud w-jnoun bi-nazar el-wathaniye.
Bass la-yalle da3ehon ALLAH min el-Yahoud wel-Youneniyyin, el-MASI7 houe edrit w-7ekmet ALLAH.
W-yalle bibayyen enno jnoun min ALLAH houe aktar 7ekme min 7ekmet el-nes, w-yalle bibayyen do3f min ALLAH houe a2wa min 2ouwwet el-nes.
Tzakkaro ya ekhewte keef kento lamma da3ekon ALLAH, w-ma ken fikon ktir min ahl el-7ekme, wala min el-2weya aw el-noubala.
Bass ALLAH khtar yalle bye3tebro el-3alam jnoun ta-ykhajjel ahl el-7ekme, w-yalle bye3tebro el-3alam do3f ta-ykhajjel el-2weya.
W-khtar ALLAH yalle bye7te2ro el-3alam w-bye3tebrouh ma shi, ta-yem7e el-mawjoud,
7atta ma 7ada yshouf 7alo eddem ALLAH.
Bass ento, bi-fadl ALLAH sar elkon bel-MASI7 YASOU3 7ekme w-tebrir w-2adese w-khalãs,
metl ma 2al el-kteb: "yalle baddo yeftekhir, khallih yeftekhir bel-RAB."
W-ana, lamma jeet la-3andkon ya ekhewte, ma jeet bi-fann el-kalem aw el-7ekme ta-basherkon bi-serr ALLAH,
w-2arraret ma a3ref shi, w-ana baynetkon, ella YASOU3 el-MASI7, w-a3erfo masloub.
W-kent jeye la-3andkon d3if w-khayef,
w-ta-e7ke ma3kon w-basher, ma sta3malit el-7ekme yalle bte2na3, 3abbaret min khilel ROU7 ALLAH w-2ouwwto,
7atta yet2assas imenkon 3ala edrit ALLAH, mish 3ala 7ekmet el-bashar.
Bass ne7na 3enna 7ekmetna, 3am ne7ke fiya bayn el-nadjin, w-hal-7ekme manna min hal-3alam, wala hiye 7ekmet rou2asa hal-3alam, yalle massiron el-zawel,
Ne7na 3am ne7ke bi-7ekmet ALLAH el-serriyye el-maktoume yalle 7addara ALLAH abl el-zaman kermel majdna,
w-ma 3erefa 7ada min rou2asa hal-3alam, w-law 3erfouwa ma keno salabo RAB el-majd.
Bass metl ma bi2oul el-kteb: "hayda yalle ma fi wala 3ayn shefeto wala dayne sem3et fih wala khatar 3a-bel 7ada min el-bashar, ALLAH 7addaro la-yalle bi7ebbouh."
W-kashafelna yeh bel-ROU7, li2anno el-ROU7 byef7as kell shi 7atta a3me2 ALLAH.
W-meen bya3rif shou fi bel-2ensen ghayr el-rou7 yalle bel-2ensen? W-nafs el-shi ma fi 7ada bya3rif shou fi bi-ALLAH ghayr ROU7 ALLAH.
W-ne7na ma akhadna rou7 hal-3alam, akhadna el-ROU7 yalle ba3ato ALLAH ta-na3rif addeysh ALLAH 3atana maweheb.
Wel-maweheb hayde, mish 3am ne7ke 3annon bi-kalem min el-7ekme el-bashariyye, 3am ne7ke bi-kalem ma2khoud min el-ROU7 el-2ODOS, w-mneshra7 el-oumour el-rou7aniyye bi-kalem rou7ane.
2ensen el-ard ma bye2bal yalle houe min ROU7 ALLAH li2anno bye3tebro jnoun, w-ma bye2dar yefhamo li2anno el-7ekm 3a-hal-shi baddo 7ess rou7ane.
Wel-2ensen el-rou7ane, bye7kom bi-kell shi w-ma 7ada bye7kom 3le.
Wel-kteb bi2oul: "meen yalle 3eref fekr el-RAB, w-meen bye2dar y3allmo?" Bass ne7na, 3enna fekr el-MASI7.
Ana min jehhte, ya ekhewte, ma edert e7kikon ka-nes rou7aniyyin, 7kitkon ka-bashar w-ka-atfal bel-MASI7.
Ta3meytkon 7aleeb mish 2akl 2ase, li2anno ma kento edrin wala halla2 ento edrin.
Lamma bikoun fi baynetkon 7asad w-khilef, mish bitkouno ba3dkon min la7m w-damm w-3am bit3isho ka-bashar?
Lamma wa7ad minkon bi2oul: "ana ma3 Boulos", w-ghayro "ana ma3 Apolos", ma bitkouno ba3dkon 3am bit3isho ka-bashar?
Meen houe Apolos? W-meen houe Boulos? Henne khadmeyn min khilelon 2ãmanto 3a-2add ma a3tahon el-RAB.
Ana zara3t w-Apolos sa2a, bass ALLAH houe yalle ken 3am binamme.
Yalle zara3 ma houe shi, wala yalle sa2a, el-2ime la-ALLAH yalle binamme.
Yalle zara3 w-yalle sa2a metl ba3don, bass kell wa7ad minnon byekhod ejrto 3a-2add ma shtaghal.
W-ne7na kellna 3am neshteghil ma3 ALLAH, w-ento 7a2l ALLAH w-benyen ALLAH.
W-ana, bel-ne3me yalle 3atane hiye ALLAH, ka-me3marje shater bi-shaghlto, 7atteyt el-ases w-ghayre bi3ammer 3le. Khalle kell wa7ad yshouf keef baddo y3ammer 3le,
ma 7ada bye2dar y7ott ases ghayr el-ases yalle 7atto ALLAH, ye3ne YASOU3 el-MASI7.
W-eza 7ada 3ammar hal-ases bi-dahab aw bi-fodda aw bi-7jara karime aw bi-khashab aw bi-2ash aw bi-tebn,
ra7 ybayyen sheghlo yawm el-RAB, li2anno el-nar bi-haydak el-yawm ra7 tekeshfo w-temte7in 2imet sheghl kell wa7ad.
Fa-yalle 3ammar w-dall sheghlo, ra7 yekhod ejerto,
w-yalle 7tara2 sheghlo byekhsar ejerto. Houe ra7 yle2e el-khalãs, bass bikoun metl yalle mara2 bel-nar w-khallas 7alo.
Ma bta3erfo ennkon haykal ALLAH, w-enno ROU7 ALLAH byeskon fikon?
W-yalle hadam haykal ALLAH hadamo ALLAH, li2anno haykal ALLAH m2addas, w-houe ento.
Kermel hek, ma 7ada yekhda3 nafso. Eza 7ada minkon mfakkar 7alo min ahl el-7ekme bi-hal-3alam, baddo ykoun jehil ta-ykoun min ahl el-7ekme,
li2anno 7ekmet hal-3alam jahl bi-nazar ALLAH. Wel-kteb bi2oul: "ALLAH byekmosh ahl el-7ekme bi-khabsaneton."
W-bi2oul kamen: "bya3rif el-RAB afkar ahl el-7ekme, w-bya3rif enna batle."
Fa-ma yeftekhir 7ada bel-nes, li2anno kell shi houe elkon,
eza ken Boulos aw Apolos aw Boutros aw el-3alam aw el-7ayet aw el-mawt aw el-7ader aw el-mousta2bal: kell shi elkon,
w-ento lal-MASI7, wel-MASI7 la-ALLAH.
Khalle el-nes te3teberna kheddem lal-MASI7 w-woukala 3a-asrar ALLAH.
Wel-matloub min el-woukala enno ykoun kell wa7ad minnon ameen.
W-ana ma bihemne ktir enno tdeenoune ento aw ayya ma7kame bashariyye, ana ma bdeen 7ale,
w-dameere ma bi2annebne bi-shi, bass hal-shi ma bibarrerne, li2anno el-RAB houe yalle bideen.
Ma te7ekmo 3ala 7ada abl el-wa2et, 7atta yeje el-RAB ynawwir yalle khtafa bel-3atme w-yekshof naweya el-2loub, w-byekhod kell wa7ad 7a'2o bel-madee7 min ALLAH.
W-ana kermelkon, ya ekhewte, sert ana w-Apolos matal ta-tet3allamo minna "enno t7afzo 3al-2ousoul", bi-7asab el-maktoub. 7atta ma 7ada minkon yentefikh bel-kebriya w-yet7azzab ma3 wa7ad dodd el-tene.
Li2anno meen yalle bimayyzak 3an ghayrak? W-shou yalle elak w-ma akhadto min ALLAH? W-eza kent akhadto, leysh bteftekhir ka2annak ma akhadto?
W-halla2 ento shbe3to w-ghtanayto! Serto moulouk bidounna! W-ya reytkon kento bel-fe3l moulouk 7atta nsherekkon bel-moulk!
W-ana bshouf enno, ne7na el-rousl, ALLAH 7attna ekher el-nes metl el-ma7koum 3leyon bel-mawt, li2anno serna ferje lal-3alam, w-lal-maleyke wel-bashar.
Ne7na mjaneen kermel el-MASI7 w-ento 7ekama bel-MASI7. Ne7na d3af w-ento 2weya. Ento moukarramin w-ne7na mou7ta2arin.
W-ba3dna la-halla2 3am njou3 w-no3tash w-3am bishall7ouna tyebna w-yedorbouna w-ysharrdouna,
w-3am neshteghil bi-2ideyna w-net3ab ta-n3ish. Bisebbouna w-minberekon, byedtehdouna w-mnet7ammal,
bye7ko 3anna bel-3atel w-minredd bel-mni7. Serna metl zbelit el-3alam.
Mish 3am ektob hal-shi ta-khajjelkon, bass ta-ensa7kon ka2annkon wlede yalle b7ebbon.
W-law ken 3endkon bel-MASI7 3ashr-talef mourshed, ma 3endkon bayyet ktar, li2anno ana waladtkon bel-MASI7 YASOU3 bel-injil yalle 7melto la-elkon.
W-betlob minkon tetmetalo fiyye.

Kermel hek ba3attelkon Timothawos, 2ebne el-7abib el-ameen bel-RAB, w-houe bizakkerkon bel-mabedi2 yalle ana meshe 3leyon bi-7ayete ma3 el-MASI7 YASOU3, metl ma 3am 3allemon wayn ma ken, bi-kell el-kaneyes.
Fakkar kamm wa7ad minkon enno ma ra7 eje halla2 la-3andkon w-ntafakho min el-kebriya,
Bass ra7 eje 2ariban eza ALLAH rad, w-se3eta ba3rif mish bass shou 2alo hal-metkabbrin, ra7 a3rif kamen shou 3am ya3emlo.
W-malakout ALLAH ma bikoun bel-7ake, bikoun bel-fe3l.
Shou bitfaddlo? Enno eje la-3andkon bel-3asa aw bel-ma7abbe w-rou7 el-wade3a?
Ntashar wayn ma ken khabar enno 3endkon zena, w-enno ma fi metlo 7atta 3end el-wathaniye: enno fi wa7ad minkon 3am bi3asher zawjet bayyo.
W-ento manfoukhin min el-kebriya! Badel ma tebko 3a-7alkon la-7add ma tsheelo min baynetkon yalle 3eml hal-shi.
Bass ana, ghayib 3ankon bel-jesm w-7ader bel-rou7, w-7akamet 3ala yalle 3eml hal-shi ka2anne 7ader.
W-lamma btejtem3o, w-ana ma3kon bel-rou7, bi-esm RABNA YASOU3 w-edrto,
sallmo hal-rejjel lal-shaytan, 7atta jesmo yrou7 3al-halek, w-rou7o tle2e el-khalãs bi-yawm el-RAB.
Ma bisir ennkon teftekhro! Ma bta3erfo enno shweyyit khameere bitkhammer el-3ajeen kello?
Kermel hek naddfo 7alkon min el-khameere el-3ati2a ta-tsiro 3ajeen jdid li2annkon fateer ma fiyo khameer, w-hayda 7amal fos7na ndaba7, w-houe el-MASI7.
Ta3o n3ayyed, mish bel-khameeree el-3ati2a wala bi-khameeret el-sharr wel-fased, n3ayyed bi-fateer el-na2awe wel-7a2.
Kent katabtelkon bi-riselte enno ma tet3ãto ma3 yalle byezno.
W-ma bo2sod yalle byezno bi-hal-3alam aw el-fejreen aw el-serra2in aw yalle bye3bado el-awthen, wa-ella bitsiro majbourin tedharo min el-3alam!
Bass halla2 b2elkon ma tet3ãto ma3 yalle byedde3e enno houe khayy w-houe byezne aw bye3bad awthen aw bisebb aw byeskar aw byesro2. Ma te2e3do ma3o aw ma3 yalle metlo 3al-2akl.
Ma3'2oul deen yalle barrat el-knise? Mish lezim ento tdeeno yalle jouwwa?
Li2anno yalle barra bideenon ALLAH. Wel-kteb bi2oul: "sheelo el-fesid min baynetkon."
Eza ken la-7ada minkon da3wa 3ala 7ada min el-ekhwe, keef byestarje enno y7akmo 3end el-zalmeen, mish 3end el-ekhwe el-2eddisin?
Ma bta3erfo enno el-ekhwe el-2eddisin henne yalle ra7 ydeeno el-3alam? W-eza kento ra7 tdeeno el-3alam, mish lezim tkouno edrin te7ekmo bel-2adaya el-basita?
Ma bta3erfo enno ne7na ra7 ndeen el-maleyke? Kermel hek lezim na3rif ne7kom bi-2adaya hal-dene.
W-eza sar fi khilef baynetkon 3ala hal-2adaya, ma3'2oul t7otto a2all el-nes bel-knise enno ye7ekmo 3leyon?
3am 2oul hal-shi ta-tekhjalo. Tekhmin ma fi baynetkon 7ada 3endo 7ekme bye2dar enno ye7kom bayn khayy w-khayyo,
fa-ma byeshke khayyo la-yalle ma bi2ãmno?
Ento bte7ekmo 3a-ba3d, w-hayda 3ayb! Mish a7sanelkon tet7ammalo el-zolm? Mish a7sanelkon tet7ammalo enno ye7ermoukon min yalle elkon?
Badl ma tozelmo w-te7ermo, 7atta ekhwetkon!
Ma bta3erfo enno el-zalmeen ma byourato malakout ALLAH? Ma tekhda3o 7alkon, li2anno la yalle byezno wala yalle bye3bado el-awthen wala yalle 3endon shouzouz jense
wala el-serre2in wala el-tammi3in wala yalle byeskaro aw bisebbo wala el-nehbin byourato malakout ALLAH.
El-ba3d minkon ken hek, bass tghassalto, w-t2addasto, w-tbarrarto bi-esm el-RAB YASOU3 el-MASI7 w-bi-ROU7 Ilehna.
Fi meen bi2oul: "kell shi masme7le", bass mish kell shi byenfa3. "Kell shi masme7le", bass ma be2bal bi-enno yesta3bedne ayya shi.
El-2akl lal-batn, wel-batn lal-2akl, w-ALLAH ra7 ydammir el-tnen sawa. Bass jesm el-2ensen houe mish lal-zena, houe lal-RAB wel-RAB lal-jesm.
W-ALLAH yalle 2awwam el-RAB min el-mawt ra7 y2awwemna ne7na kamen bi-edrto.
Ma bta3erfo enno ajsemkon hiye min domn el-MASI7? Ma32oul ekhod jesm el-MASI7 w-a3mil minno jez2 min jesm mara zenye? Akid la2!
Ma bta3erfo enno yalle byette7id bi-mara zenye bisir houe w-yeha jesm wa7ad? El-kteb bi2oul: "bisiro el-tnen jesm wa7ad."
Bass yalle byette7id bel-RAB bisir rou7 wa7ad houe w-yeh.
Hrebo min el-zena, fa-kell khatiyye bya3mela el-2ensen bitdall barrat jesmo. Bass yalle byezne byokhte dodd jesmo.
Ma bta3erfo enno ajsemkon hiye haykal el-ROU7 el-2ODOS yalle fikon w-yalle akhadtouh min ALLAH? Fa-ento ma temelko zetkon, ento la-ALLAH.
Houe shtarakon w-dafa3 el-taman. Kermel hek majjdo ALLAH bi-ajsemkon.
Bi-khsous yalle katabtoule 3anno b2oul, a7sanlo lal-rejjel enno ma y2arrib min mara.
Bass, 7atta netjannab el-zena, khalle ykoun la-kell rejjel marto w-la-kell mara zawja,
wel-zawj ya3te marto 7a'2a, wel-mara ta3te zawja 7a'2o.
Ma fi soulta lal-mara 3ala jesma, el-soulta la-zawja. W-nafs el-shi el-zawj ma elo soulta 3ala jesmo, el-soulta la-marto.

Ma 7ada minkon ye7rom el-tene minno ella eza ettafa2to ma3 ba3d w-la-wa2et m3ayyan, 7atta tetfaddo lal-sala. Min ba3da rja3o lal-7ayet el-zawjiyye el-3adiyye ta-ma t3ouzo dabt el-nafs, w-tou2a3o bi-tajribet eblees.
B2elkon hal-shi w-ma asde e2morkon, asde ensa7kon,
W-ana bitmanna law keno kell el-nes metle. Bass la-kell 2ensen mawhabe khãssa min ALLAH, fi nes 3endon mawhabe m3ayyane w-ghayr nes 3endon mawhabe tenye.
W-b2oul la-yalle mish metzawjin wel-araml enno a7sanlon yeb2o metle.
Bass eza keno mish edrin yedbato nafson, khalliyon yetzawwajo. Fa-el-zawej afdal min el-ta7arro2 bel-shahwe.
W-bwasse el-metzawjin, w-hal-wassiye min el-RAB mish minne, enno ma tetrok el-mara zawja,
W-eza taraketo, khalliya teb2a bidoun zawj aw khalliya tsale7 zawja, wel-zawj ma ytalle2 marto.
Bass el-be2yin, b2ellon ana w-mish el-RAB: eza ken la-khayy mou2min mara mish mou2mine badda t3ish ma3o, ma ytalle2a.
W-eza ken la-mara mou2mine zawj mish mou2min baddo y3ish ma3a, ma ettal2o.
El-zawj yalle mish mou2min byet2addas bi-marto el-mou2mine, wel-mara yalle mish mou2mine btet2addas bi-zawja el-mou2min, wa-ella keno wledkon ashrar, ma3 ennon m2addasin.

W-eza el-mish mou2min aw el-mish mou2mine baddon yeterko ba3d khalliyon yefter2o, fa-bi-metl hal-7ale ma bikoun el-mou2min aw el-mou2mine marboutin bel-zawej, li2anno ALLAH baddo yekon t3isho bi-salem.
W-shou 3arrafik ente ya hal-mara el-mou2mine ennik ra7 te2dare tkhalse zawjik? W-keef bta3rif ya hal-rejjel el-mou2min ennak ra7 te2dar tkhallis zawjtak?
Khalle kell wa7ad minkon y3ish bi-7ayeto 2add ma ALLAH 3atah w-metl ma ken lamma ALLAH da3eh, w-hayde wassiyte lal-kaneyes kella.
Yalle da3eh ALLAH w-houe makhtoun, ma yjarreb ykhabbe khatno, w-yalle da3eh el-RAB w-houe mish makhtoun, ma yekhton 7alo.
El-khatn mish shi w-3adam el-khatn mish shi, el-shi enno ne7faz wassaya ALLAH.
Kermel hek khalle kell wa7ad yeb2a metl ma ken lamma ALLAH da3eh.
W-eza kent 3abd lamma ALLAH da3ek, ma tehtamm. Bass eza kent bte2dar tsir 7orr, lezim testaghnem el-forsa.
W-yalle el-RAB da3eh w-houe 3abd, bikoun lal-RAB 7orr, w-nafs el-shi yalle el-MASI7 da3eh w-houe 7orr, bikoun lal-MASI7 3abd.
W-ALLAH shtarakon w-dafa3 el-taman, fa-ma tsiro 3abeed lal-nes.
Khalle kell wa7ad minkon yeb2a, ya ekhewte, eddem ALLAH metl ma ken lamma da3eh.
El-mish metzawjin ma 3ende elon wassiye min el-RAB, bass ba3te ra2ye metl rejjel ra7met el-RAB khallet el-nes toutha2 fih,
bi-sabab el-di2 el-mawjoud 7aliyyan, khalle el-2ensen yeb2a metl ma houe.
Eza enta metzawwej bi-mara? Ma tetlob el-infisal 3anna. Eza enta mish metzawwej bi-mara? Ma tetlob el-zawej bi-mara,
w-eza tzawwajet, ma bitkoun 3melt shi ghalat, bass yalle byetzawwajo byesh2o ktir bi-7ayeton, w-ana badde jannebon el-3azèb.
B2elkon, ya ekhewte, enno el-wa2et 3am yo2sar. Khalle yalle 3endon neswen ykouno ka2anno ma 3endon,
w-yalle byebko ka2annon ma 3am yebko, w-yalle byefra7o ka2annon ma 3am yefra7o, w-yalle byeshtero ka2annon ma byemelko,
w-yalle byet3ato oumour hal-3alam ka2annon ma 3am yet3ato, li2anno hal-3alam raye7 3al-zawel.
Badde yekon tkouno bidoun hamm. El-mish metzawwej yehtamm bi-oumour el-RAB w-keef baddo yorde el-RAB,
Wel-metzawwej yehtamm bi-oumour el-3alam w-keef baddo yorde marto,

w-houe ma2soum. W-nafs el-shi el-3adra wel-mara yalle ma ela zawj yehtammo bi-oumour el-RAB w-keef baddon yet2addaso jasadan w-rou7an, wel-metzawwje tehtam bi-oumour el-3alam w-keef badda torde zawja.
3am 2oul hal-shi la-masla7etkon, mish ta-7ammelkon kouyoud, bass ta-ta3erfo shou el-mni7 w-tekhedmo el-RAB bidoun taraddod.
Eza 7ada shef enno mish edir ysoun khatibto w-enno la-bodd min el-zawej khallih yetzawwaja eza baddo w-ma bikoun 3am yeghlat.
Bass yalle me2teni3 bi-2albo, w-ken mish medtar, w-ken 7orr bi-ekhtiyaro, w-2arrar bi-2albo enno ysoun khatibto, bikoun 3am ya3mil mni7.
Fa-ezan, yalle byetzawwaj khatibto bya3mil mni7, w-yalle ma byetzawwaja bikoun a7san.
Btertebet el-mara bi-shari3et el-zawej kell shi w-zawja tayyib, w-eza met, rej3et 7orra fiya tetzawwaj yalle badda yeh, 3a-shart ykoun zawej bel-RAB.
Bass bi-ra2ye bitkoun mabsouta aktar eza be2yit bala zawej, w-be3te2id enno ana kamen fiyye ROU7 ALLAH.
Bennesbe la-zabeye7 el-awthen, sa7i7 enno kellna 3enna el-ma3rife bass el-ma3rife btenfokh el-shakhs, wel-ma7abbe btebne.
W-yalle mfakkar 7alo bya3rif shi, houe ma bya3rif ba3d keef lezim ya3rif.
Bass yalle bi7ebb ALLAH, ALLAH bya3erfo.
W-bi-khsous el-2akl min zabeye7 el-asnam, ne7na mna3rif enno ma fi asnam, w-enno ma fi Ileh ella ALLAH el-wa7ad.
W-7atta law keno el-nes bi2oulo enno bel-sama aw 3al-ard fi Ãliha, w-fi ktir Ãliha w-arbeb,
ne7na 3enna Ileh wa7ad w-houe el-Ãb yalle kell shi minno w-la-elo mnerja3, w-RAB wa7ad houe YASOU3 el-MASI7 yalle kell shi bi-wasteto w-ne7na kamen mawjoudin bi-wasteto.
Bass mish el-kell bya3rif hal-7a2i2a, fi nes t3awwado 3al-awthen la-liom, w-byeklo el-zabeye7 ka2anna mazbout zabeye7 lal-awthen, w-dameeron byetlawwath li2anno d3if,
bass el-2akl ma bi2arrebna min ALLAH, w-eza ma akalna ma mnekhsar shi, w-eza akalna ma mnerba7 shi.
Bass lezim tentebho ta-ma tkoun 7orriyetkon hayde 7ajar 3athra lal-d3af.
W-eza shefak 7ada, enta yalle 3endak el-ma3rife, 3am tekol bi-haykal el-awthen, ma bitshoufo ra7 yetshajja3, eza ken dameero d3if, w-yekol min zabeye7 el-awthen?
W-bitkoun ma3reftak enta sabab la-halek hal-d3if, w-houe khayy elak met el-MASI7 kermelo.
W-hek bitkouno khtito tijeh el-MASI7 lamma btokhto la-ekhwetkon w-btejra7o dameeron el-d3if.
W-eza ken el-2akl sabab la-sou2out khayye, ma ra7 ekol el-la7m abadan ta-ma koun sabab la-sou2out khayye.
Mish ana 7orr? Mish ana rasoul? Mish ana sheft YASOU3 RABNA? Mish ento thamaret 3amale bel-RAB?
W-eza ma kent rasoul la-ghayrkon, ana rasoul elkon li2annkon ento khatm riselte bel-RAB?
W-hayda jawebe la-yalle byettehmoune:
ma elna 7a2 nekol w-neshrab?
Ma elna 7a2 metl be2e el-rousl w-ekhwet el-RAB w-Boutros enno nemshe ma3 zawje mou2mine?
Aw ana w-Barnaba wa7edna ma bi7e'2elna ella enno neshteghil?
Meen bi7areb 3a-nafe2to el-khãssa? Meen byezra3 karm w-ma byekol min thamaro? Meen byer3a atee3 w-ma byekol min labano?
Awlkon ana 3am e7ke li2anne bashar? Mish el-shari3a bit2oul hek kamen?
Eja bi-shari3et Moussa: "ma tsakker temm el-tawr 3al-baydar houe w-3am yedros el-7boub." Awlkon ALLAH byehtamm bel-thiran?
Ma 2al hal-shi bel-fe3l kermelna? Mbala, kermelna katab hal-shi w-bye3ne: yalle byefla7o el-ard w-yalle byet7ano el-7ouboub 3endon 2amal enno yekhdo 7osseton min el-ghallé.
W-eza kenna zara3na fikon el-kheyrat el-rou7iyye, ktir 3leyna enno no7sod min kheyratkon el-meddiyye?
W-eza ken la-ghayrna 7a2 3leykon, mish ne7na a7a2? Bass ne7na ma sta3malna hal-7a2, bel-3aks t7ammalna kell shi ta-ma n7ott ayya meni3 eddem el-tebshir bel-MASI7.
Ma bta3erfo enno yalle byekhdom el-haykal byekol min ta2dimet el-haykal, w-enno yalle byekhdom el-mazba7 byekhod 7ossa min el-zabeye7?
W-hek 2amar el-RAB la-yalle bye3elno el-injil bi-enno y3isho min el-injil.
Bass ana, ma sta3malet ayya 7a2 min hal-7ou2ou2, wala 3am bektob hal-shi halla2 ta-etlob shi. W-ana bfaddil enno mout 3ala enno ye7remne 7ada min hal-fakhr.
W-eza basharet, ma ele fakhr, li2anno el-tebshir daroura nfaradet 3leyye, w-ya weyle eza ma basharet.
W-eza kent 3am basher bi-iradte, ken ele el-7a2 bel-ejra. Bass eza kent ma 3am basher bi-iradte, w-ana 3am naffez wassiye ntalabet minne,
Shou hiyye ejerte? Ejerte hiye enno basher min doun shrout w-etnezal 3an 7a'2e yalle byeje min khedmet el-injil.
Ana rejjel 7orr 3end el-nes, bass khalleyt 7ale koun 3abd la-kell el-nes 7atta erba7 el-aktariyye.
W-sert lal-Yahoud Yahoude la-erba7 el-Yahoud, w-sert la-ahl el-shari3a min ahl el-shari3a - w-law kent mish khãdi3 lal-shari3a - ta-erba7 ahl el-shari3a,
w-sert la-yalle bidoun shari3a metl yalle bidoun shari3a ta-erba7 yalle henne bidoun shari3a, ma3 enno 3ende shari3a min ALLAH bi-khoudou3e la-shari3et el-MASI7,
w-seret lal-d3af d3if ta-erba7 el-d3af, w-sert lal-nes kellon kell shi ta-khallis el-ba3d minnon bi-7ayalla tari2a.
3am ba3mil hal-shi kello kermel el-injil 7atta sir sharik bi-kheyrata.
Ma bta3erfo enno yalle byetseba2o bel-rakd byeshterko kellon bel-saba2, w-bass wa7ad minnon byerba7? Kermel hek rkedo ento metlo 7atta terba7o.
W-yalle byetseba2 byedbat nafso bi-kell shi kermel eklil bizoul, bass ne7na, eklilna ma bizoul.
W-ana ma berkod metl yalle ma bya3rif el-hadaf, wala bedrob box metl yalle 3am yedrob el-hawa,
bel-3aks be2sa 3ala jesme w-besta3ebdo 7atta ma koun khesran, min ba3d ma basharet ghayre.
Ma badde tejhalo, ya ekhewte, enno bayyetna keno kellon ta7t ra7met el-ghaym, w-kellon 2ata3o el-ba7r,
w-kellon t3ammado bel-ghaym w-bel-ba7r, ta ysiro la-Moussa,
w-kellon akalo 2akl wa7ad elo ramz rou7e,
w-kellon keno 3am yeshrabo sharab wa7ad elo ramz rou7e min sakhra rou7iyye bitrefe2on, w-hal-sakhra hiye el-MASI7.
W-ma3 hal-shi, aktariyyeton ma ken ALLAH rade 3annon, w-wa2a3o mawta bel-sa7ra.
Sar hal-shi kello ta-ykoun elna matal, fa-ma neshtehe el-sharr metl ma shtahouh henne,
w-ma te3bado el-awthen metl ma 3abadouwa el-ba3d minnon, li2anno el-kteb bi2oul: "2a3ad el-sha3b yekol w-yeshrab, min ba3da 2amo yel3abo."
W-ma nestaslem lal-zena metl ma staslam el-ba3d minnon, w-met minnon tleta-w-3eshreen alf bi-yawm wa7ad,
w-ma njarreb el-MASI7 metl ma jarrabouh el-ba3d minnon, w-3a2asouwon el-7ayyet.
W-ma tsher3o ento metl ma shera3 el-ba3d minnon, w-dammaron malèk el-mawt.
W-sar ma3on hal-shi kello 7atta ykoun tenbih, w-houe maktoub ta-ykoun matal elna ne7na li2anno 3am n3ish bi-zaman sar 3a-ekher.
Yalle mfakkar 7alo samid khallih yentebeh min enno you2a3.
Ma fi tajribe fo2 edrit el-2ensen, li2anno ALLAH sade2, ma byesma7 enno tetjarrabo aktar min edretkon, bel-3aks bya3tikon ma3 el-tajribe waseele lal-khalãs minna wel-edra enno tet7ammalouwa.
Kermel hek hrebo, ya a7ebbe2e, min 3ibedet el-awthen.
3am be7kikon metl ma be7ke nes elon waznon, fa-7kemo ento bi-yalle 3am 2oulo:
Kes el-barake yalle 3am minbereka, mish hiye mousherake bi-damm el-MASI7? Wel-khebz yalle mneshe2fo, mish houe mousherake bi-jesm el-MASI7?
W-ne7na, el-ktar, jesm wa7ad li2anno fi khebz wa7ad, w-ne7na kelna mneshterek bi-hal-khebz el-wa7ad.
Ettalla3o 3ala wled Isra2il: mish yalle 3am yeklo el-zabeye7 henne shouraka el-mazba7?
W-shou be2sod bi-kaleme hayda? Enno el-wathan houe shi bi-7add zeto, w-la-zabi7et el-wathan 2ime?
La2, li2anno zabeye7 el-wathaniye henne zabeye7 lal-shyateen mish la-ALLAH. W-ana ma badde tkouno shouraka el-shyateen.
Ma bte2daro teshrabo kes el-RAB w-kes el-shyateen, aw teshterko bi-meydet el-RAB w-meydet el-shyateen.
Tekhmin 3am njarreb el-RAB ta nkhallih yghar? Shou ne7na a2wa minno?
"Kell shi masmou7", bass mish kell shi bifeed. "Kell shi masmou7", bass mish kell shi byebne.
Ma 7ada yetlob yalle bihemmo elo wa7do, yetlob yalle bihemm ghayro kamen.
Kelo min el-la7m yalle byenbè3 bel-sou2 w-ma tes2alo 3an shi bass ta-treyy7o dameerkon.
El-kteb bi2oul: "el-ard w-kell shi 3leya lal-RAB."
Eza 3azamkon wathane w-2belto 3azeemto, kelo yalle bi2addmo elkon w-ma tes2alo 3an shi ta-treyy7o dameerkon.
Bass eza 2alkon 7ada: "hayda el-2akl min zabeye7 el-awthen", ma teklo minno, kermel yalle khabbarkon w-kermel el-dameer.
W-ma be3ne dameerkon ento, be3ne dameer ghayrkon. W-leysh dameer ghayre baddo ykabbil 7orriyte?
W-eza akalet 2akl w-shakaret ALLAH 3le, leysh badde enlèm bi-yalle 3am beshkor ALLAH 3le?
W-eza akalto aw shrebto, aw shou ma 3melto, 3melo kell shi la-majd ALLAH.
Ma tkouno 7ajar 3athra lal-Yahoud aw ghayr el-Yahoud wala la-kniset ALLAH,
kouno metle, ana bjarreb orde kell el-nes bi-kell shi 3am ba3emlo, w-ma bfattish 3a-masla7te el-khãssa, hamme enno ktar min el-nes yle2o el-khalãs.
Tmetalo fiyye metl ma ana betmetal bel-MASI7.
Bhannikon li2annkon 3am tezekroune deyman w-3am bit7afzo 3ala el-ta2aleed metl ma sallamtkon yeha.
Bass badde ta3erfo enno el-MASI7 ras kell rejjel, wel-rejjel ras el-mara, w-ALLAH ras el-MASI7.
W-kell rejjel bisalle aw byetnabba, houe w-lebis 3a-raso shi, biheen raso, ye3ne el-MASI7,
W-kell mara bitsalle aw btetnabba hiye w-mish lebse 3a-rasa bit'heen rasa, ye3ne el-rejjel, ka2anna 7el2a sha3rat rasa.
W-eza kenit el-mara manna mghattiye rasa, a7sanla t2oss sha3ra, bass eza ken 3ayb 3al-mara t2oss sha3ra aw te7el2o, khalliha tghatte rasa.
Mish lezim el-rejjel yghatte raso li2anno houe souret ALLAH w-bye3kos majdo, wel-mara bte3kos majd el-rejjel.
Wel-rejjel mish min el-mara, el-mara min el-rejjel,
w-ALLAH ma khala2 el-rejjel kermel el-mara, khala2 el-mara kermel el-rejjel.
Kermel hek lezim el-mara tghatte rasa ka-3alemet el-khoudou3, kermel el-maleyke.
W-ma3 el-RAB, ma bitkoun el-mara bidoun el-rejjel, wala el-rejjel bidoun el-mara.
Sa7i7 enno el-mara n2akhadit min el-rejjel, bass el-rejjel bitwalldo el-mara, w-kell shi min ALLAH.
Kermel hek 7kemo ento: byeswa el-mara tsalle la-ALLAH hiye w-rasa mkashaf?
Ma bit3allemkon el-tabi3a nafsa enno 3ayb el-rejjel ytawwil sha3ro,
bass mish fakhr el-mara enno ettawwil sha3ra? Li2anno ALLAH 3ataha el-sha3r ta-tetghatta fih.
W-eza 7ada baddo y3ared, hal-shi mish min 3adetna wala min 3adet kaneyes ALLAH.
Bi-khsous el-wassaya el-be2yin, ana ma bhannikon, li2anno ejtima3etkon 3am ydorro aktar ma 3am yenfa3o.
Awwal shi, wosselle enno lamma 3am tejtemi3 knisetkon 3am tekhtelfo bayn ba3d. W-ana bsadde2 hal-shi shwey,
li2anno la-bodd min ennkon tekhtelfo ta-na3rif meen yalle baynetkon ba3do 3a-imeno.
W-ento ma 3am teklo 3asha el-RAB lamma btejtem3o,
kell wa7ad minkon 3am yekol la-wa7do, w-bisir wa7ad 3am bijou3 wel-tene 3am yeskar.
Ma 3endkon byout ta-teklo fiya w-teshrabo? Aw ennkon 3am testkheffo bi-kniset ALLAH w-bit'heeno el-fou2ara? Fa-shou badde 2elkon? Bhannikon? La2, ana ma bhannikon bi-hal-shi.
Ana min el-RAB tsallamet yalle sallamto elkon, w-houe enno el-RAB YASOU3, bel-leyle yalle sallam fiya 7alo, akhad khebz
w-shakar w-sha2af el-khebz w-2al: "hayda jesme, houe kermelkon. Teb2o 3melo hal-shi w-tzakkaroune."
W-kamen akhad el-kes min ba3d el-3asha w-2al: "hal-kes hiye el-3ahd el-jdid bi-damme. Kell ma shrebto min hal-kes, 3melo hal-shi w-tzakkaroune."
W-ento kell ma akalto hal-khebz w-shrebto hal-kes bitkhabbro bi-mawt el-RAB 7atta yeje.
W-yalle byekol khebz el-RAB aw-byeshrab keso bidoun este7'2a2 bikoun mezneb eddem jesm el-RAB w-dammo.
Kell wa7ad yef7as dameero, w-ba3den byekol min hal-khebz w-byeshrab min hal-kes,
li2anno yalle byekol w-byeshrab bidoun ma yshouf fiyon jesm el-RAB, byekol w-byeshrab el-7ekm 3ala nafso.
Kermel hek ketro baynetkon el-marda wel-d3af w-met el-ba3d minkon.
W-law kenna 3am n7akem 7alna min abl, ma ken n7akam 3leyna.
Bass el-RAB bye7kom 3leyna w-bi2addebna ta-ma ydeenna ma3 be2e el-3alam.
W-lamma btejtem3o ya ekhewte ta-teklo el-3asha, ntero ba3dkon.
W-eza ken 7ada minkon jou3an khallih yekol bi-beyto, ta-ma ykoun ejtime3kon sabab lal-7ekm 3leykon. W-bennesbe lal-eshya el-tenye, amma beje la-3andkon be7ke fiya.
W-bi-khsous el-maweheb el-rou7iyye, ya ekhewte, ma badde tejhalo 7a2i2eta.
Bta3erfo ennkon, lamma kento wathaniye, kento tenjarro la-3and el-awthen el-khers bi-tahawwour.
Bass halla2 3rafo enno ma fi 7ada eza alhamo ROU7 ALLAH bi2oul enno YASOU3 mal3oun min ALLAH, wala 7ada bye2dar y2oul enno YASOU3 RAB ella bi-elhem min el-ROU7 el-2ODOS.
Fa-el-maweheb el-rou7iyye 3ala anwe3, bass el-ROU7 yalle bya3tya wa7ad.
Wel-khedme 3ala anwe3, bass el-RAB wa7ad.
Wel-a3mel 3ala anwe3, bass ALLAH, yalle bya3mil kell shi bel-kell, wa7ad.
Kell wa7ad byen3ata mawhabe bitkhalle el-ROU7 ybayyen fiya kermel el-kheyr el-3am.
Wa7ad byen3ata min el-ROU7 kalem el-7ekme, w-ghayro kalem el-ma3rife.
Wel-ROU7 el-wa7ad nafso bya3te nes el-imen, w-bya3te ghayron mawhabet el-shife2,
w-ghayron el-edra enno ya3emlo 3ajeyeb, w-ghayron enno yetnabbo, w-ghayron temyiz el-arwe7, w-ghayron enno ye7ko bi-3eddit loughat, w-ghayron enno ytarjmouwa.
W-hayda kello bya3emlo el-ROU7 el-wa7ad nafso w-biwazzi3 mawehbo 3ala kell wa7ad metl ma baddo.
W-metl ma el-jesm wa7ad w-elo a2sãm ktire hiye 3ala ketrita jesm wa7ad, hek el-MASI7.
Fa-ne7na kellna, eza kenna Yahoud aw ghayr Yahoud, 3abeed aw a7rar, t3ammadna bi-ROU7 wa7ad ta-nkoun jesm wa7ad, w-shrebna min ROU7 wa7ad.
Wel-jesm mish 2osm wa7ad, houe a2sãm ktire.
W-law 2alet el-ejr: "ana mish 2id, fa-ezan ana mish min el-jesm?
W-law 2alet el-dayne: "ana mish 3ayn, fa-ezan ana mish min el-jesm", awlkon bitbattel tkoun 2osm min el-jesm?
W-law ken el-jesm kello 3ayn, wayn el-sama3? W-law ken el-jesm kello dayne, wayn el-shamm?
Bass ALLAH 3eml kell 2osm bel-jesm metl ma baddo.
W-law keno kellon 2osm wa7ad, wayn el-jesm?
Bass el-a2sãm el-ktire wel-jesm wa7ad.
W-ma bte2dar el-3ayn t2oul lal-2id: "ana mish bi-7aje elik." Wala el-ras lal-ejren: "ana mish bi-7aje elkon!"
W-yalle mne7esbo ad3af a2sãm el-jesm houe aktar shi elo 3aze,
w-yalle mne7esbo a2alla karame houe yalle minkarrmo aktar, w-yalle mneste7e fih houe yalle mne7termo aktar.
Li2anno el-a2sãm el-mhemme, mish bi-7aje lal-i7tiram. Bass ALLAH 3eml el-jesm bi-tari2a bta3te karame lal-a2sãm yalle ma ela karame,
7atta el-jesm ma yen2osem 3a-zeto, w-nkhalle el-a2sãm kellon yehtammo bi-ba3don.
W-eza t2allam 2osm t2allamit ma3o kell el-a2sãm, w-eza tkarram 2osm fer7et ma3o be2e el-a2sãm.
W-ento jesm el-MASI7, w-kell wa7ad minkon 3odow minno.

W-ALLAH 3eml bel-knise el-rousl awwal shi wel-anbiya tene shi wel-mou3allimin telit shi, min ba3da 3ata el-be2yin el-edra enno ya3emlo 3ajeyeb w-maweheb el-shife2 w-enno yse3do ghayron wel-tedbir wel-7ake bi-3eddit loughat.
Tekhmin kellon rousl aw kellon anbiya aw kellon mou3allimin aw kellon bya3emlo 3ajeyeb.
W-kellon 3endon mawhabet el-shife2 aw kellon bye7ko bi-3eddit loughat aw kellon bitarejmo?
Kermel hek tma7o bel-maweheb el-3azeeme, w-ana ra7 ersemelkon tari2a afdal bi-ktir.
Law 7kit bi-loughat el-nes wel-maleyke, w-ma ken 3ende ma7abbe, ana mish ella n7as bitonn aw sanj birenn.
W-law 3atane ALLAH etnabba w-kent 3arif kell serr w-kell 3elm, w-ken 3ende el-imen el-kemil ta-en2ol fih el-jbel, w-ma ken 3ende ma7abbe, ana ma shi.
W-law 3tit kell mesriyyete w-sallamet jesme ta-ye7er2oune, w-ma 3ende ma7abbe, mish ra7 yetla3le shi.
El-ma7abbe btesbor w-2alba tayyib, el-ma7abbe ma bta3rif el-7asad wala bitshouf 7ala wala btetkabbar.
El-ma7abbe ma tetsarraf ghalat, w-ma btetlob shi ela, w-ma btoghdab w-ma bitzonn bi-7ada.
El-ma7abbe ma btefra7 bel-zolm, btefra7 bel-7a2.
El-ma7abbe betsemi7 kell shi, w-bitsaddi2 kell shi, w-btetrajja kell shi, w-btesbor 3ala kell shi.
El-ma7abbe ma btes2ot abadan. Bass el-noubouwet bibattlo wel-loughat bimouto. Wel-ma3rife kamen bitbattil,
li2anno ma3rifetna na2sa w-noubouwetna na2sa.
W-lamma byeje el-kemil bizoul el-na2is.
Lamma kent tofl, kent e7ke metl el-tofl w-metl el-tofl kent efham, w-metl el-tofl kent fakkir, w-lamma sert rejjel, taraket yalle houe lal-tofl.
W-yalle 3am nshoufo liom houe soura mghabbshe bi-mreye, bass bi-haydak el-yawm ra7 nshouf wejj bi-wejj. Wel-yawm ba3rif shwey, bass bi-haydak el-yawm ra7 a3rif kell shi metl ma ALLAH bya3refne.
W-halla2 byeb2a el-imen wel-raja wel-ma7abbe, w-a3zam hal-tlete hiye el-ma7abbe.
Tlebo awwal shi el-ma7abbe, w-tma7o lal-maweheb el-rou7iyye, w-aktar shi mawhabet el-noubouwe.
W-yalle bye7ke bi-3eddit loughat ma bye7ke el-nes, bye7ke ALLAH, li2anno ma fi 7ada byefham kalemo, w-houe bi2oul bel-ROU7 eshya ghãmda.
Bass yalle byetnabba, bye7ke el-nes 7ake byebne w-bishajji3 w-bi3azze.
Yalle bye7ke bi-3eddit loughat byebne 7alo, bass yalle byetnabba byebne el-knise.

Badde yekon te7ko kellkon bi-3eddit loughat, bass bfaddel tetnabbo, li2anno yalle byetnabba a3zam min yalle bye7ke 3eddit loughat, ella eza ken 3am bitarjem yalle 3am bi2oulo 7atta tefhamo el-knise, w-yebnya.
W-eza jeet la-3andkon, ya ekhewte, w-7kitkon bi-3eddit loughat, keef bfeedkon eza ma 7kitkon bi-wa7e aw ma3rife aw noubouwe aw ta3lim.
Hek kamen 2ãlet el-3azf el-yebse metl el-nay wel-3oud, eza ma tayla3o naghmet moumayyaze, keef mna3rif sawt el-nay min sawt el-3oud?
W-eza talla3 el-bou2 sawt mshawwash, meen bi7addir 7alo lal-7arb?
W-nafs el-shi ento, eza nata2 lsenkon bi-kalem mish mafhoum, keef 7ada ra7 ya3rif yalle 3am bit2oulouh? Ma birou7 kalemkon bel-hawa?
Fi bel-3alam loughat ktire wala we7de minna bidoun ma3na,
w-eza ma ba3rif ma3na el-kelmet, bkoun metl el-ajnabe bi-nazar yalle 3am be7kih, w-bikoun yalle 3am ye7kine metl el-ajnabe bi-nazare.
Bass ento yalle kamen btetma7o lal-maweheb el-rou7iyye, tlobo ya3tikon hiye ALLAH ta-tebno el-knise.
Kermel hek yalle bye7ke bi-3eddit loughat yetlob min ALLAH mawhabet enno yfassera,
li2anno eza salleyt bi-loughat, rou7e bitsalle w-3a2le ma byestafeed bi-shi.
W-shou ba3mil? Bsalle bi-rou7e w-bsalle bi-3a2le kamen. W-brannem bi-rou7e w-brannem bi-3a2le kamen.
W-eza kent ma 3am teshkor ALLAH ella bel-rou7, keef baddak yalle 3am yesma3 w-ma 3endo khebra enno yjewib "ãmin" 3lek, w-houe ma bya3rif shou 3am bit2oul?
Enta bta3rif teshkor mni7, bass ghayrak ma stafed shi ta-yebne 7alo.
Beshkor ALLAH enno 3am be7ke bi-loughat ktire aktar minkon kellkon,
bass bel-knise bfaddel enno 2oul khams kelmet mafhoume b3allim fiya el-nes 3ala enno 2oul 3ashr-talef kelme bi-3eddit loughat.
Ma tkouno ya ekhewte atfal bi-tefkirkon, kouno atfal bel-sharr w-reshdin bel-tefkir.
2alet el-shari3a: "2al el-RAB: ra7 e7ke hal-sha3b bi-alsine gharibe w-bi-shfef gharibe, w-ma3 hayda w-kello ma byesma3oule."
Wel-loughat mish 3ajibe lal-mou2minin, el-loughat 3ajibe lal-mish mou2minin. Bass mawhabet el-noubouwe hiye lal-mou2minin, mish lal-ma bi2ãmno.
W-law jtama3et el-knise kella w-7eke kell wa7ad fiya bi-loughat, w-feto moustami3in ma 3endon khebra aw mish mou2minin, ma bi2oulo ennkon mjaneen?
Bass law tnabbo kellon, w-fet la-3andon 7ada ma 3endo khebra ta-yesma3 aw gher mou2min, kellon ra7 ysher3ouh w-ye7ekmo 3le,
w-bass tenkeshef khafeya 2albo, ra7 yesjod w-ye3bad ALLAH w-y2oul: ALLAH 7a2i2atan baynetkon.
W-shou ba3d, ya ekhewte? Lamma btejtem3o w-kell wa7ad minkon jeyib ma3o mazmour aw ta3lim aw wa7e aw risele bi-3eddit loughat aw tarjame la-hal-loughat, khallo ykoun kell shi lal-benyen.
W-eza 7kito bi-3eddit loughat, khallo tnen aw tlete bel-ktir ye7ko, kell wa7ad bi-dawro, w-khallo ykoun baynetkon meen ytarjem.
W-eza ken ma fi mtarjem, khallo yalle 3am ye7ke yeskot w-ye7ke ma3 7alo w-ma3 ALLAH.
W-yalle byetnabbo, khallo tnen aw tlete minnon ye7ko, wel-bey2in ye7ekmo.
W-eza 7ada ghayron min el-mawjoudin ejeh wa7e min ALLAH, khallo yalle 3am ye7ke yeskot,
li2anno kellkon fikon tetnabbo, wa7ad wara el-tene, ta-yet3allamo kell el-mawjoudin w-yetshajja3o.
W-arwe7 el-anbiya khãd3a la-yalle byetnabbo,
w-ALLAH mish Ileh fawda, houe Ileh el-salem. W-metl ma byesekto el-neswen bi-kell kaneyes el-ekhwe el-2eddisin,
khallo neswenkon yesekto bel-kaneyes, li2anno mish masmou7 enno ye7ko. Masmou7 yekhda3o metl ma bit2oul el-shari3a.
Bass eza 7abbo yet3allamo shi, khalliyon yes2alo azwejon bel-beyt, li2anno ma byeswa enno el-mara te7ke bel-knise.
Tekhmin min 3endkon ntala2et kelmet ALLAH, aw wosslit la-elkon wa7edkon?
Eza fi 7ada mfakkar 7alo nabe aw sa7ib mawhabe rou7iyye, khallih ya3rif enno yalle 3am beketbo elkon houe wassiyet el-RAB,
w-eza tjehal hal-shi, tjehalouh.
Tma7o fa-ezan, ya ekhewte, bi-mawhebet el-noubouwe w-ma temna3o 7ada enno ye7ke bi-3eddit loughat.
W-khallo kell shi ysir bi-laye2a w-nizam.
Bzakkerkon, ya ekhewte, bel-injil yalle 7melto elkon w-2beltouh w-ba3dkon thebtin 3le,
w-bi-wasteto ra7 tle2o el-khalãs eza 7feztouh metl ma bashartkon fih, wa-ella bitkouno 2ãmanto batel.
Sallametkon abl kell shi yalle stalamto ana, w-houe enno el-MASI7 met kermel khatayana metl ma maktoub bel-ketob,
w-enno ndafan w-2am bel-yawm el-telit metl ma nkatab bel-ketob,
w-enno zahar la-Boutros w-min ba3da lal-rousl el-tna3sh,
min ba3da zahar la-aktar min khams-miyyet shakhs sawa, aghlabon ba3don tayybin wel-ba3d minnon meto,
min ba3da zahar la-Ya3koub, w-min ba3da la-kell el-rousl,
7atta zaharle ekher shi ana kamen ka2anne tofl jahadeto emmo.
Ana a2alla wa7ad bayn el-rousl, w-ma best7e2 enno etsamma rasoul li2anno edtahadet kniset ALLAH,
w-bass bi-ne3met ALLAH rje3et sert yalle serto, w-ne3emto 3leyye ma ra7et di3an, t3ebt aktar minnon kellon, w-mish ana yalle t3ebt, hayde ne3met ALLAH yalle ma3e.
3a kell 7al, eza kent ana aw keno henne, hayda yalle minbasher fih w-hayda yalle 2ãmanto fih.
W-bi-ma enno 3am minbasher bi-enno el-MASI7 2am min el-mawt, keef ba3d fi baynetkon nes bi2oulo enno el-mawta ma bi2oumo?
Eza keno el-mawta ma bi2oumo, el-MASI7 ma 2am kamen.
W-eza ken el-MASI7 ma 2am, tebshirna batel w-imenkon batel,
W-minkoun shouhoud el-zour 3ala ALLAH, li2anno sh'hedna 3ala ALLAH enno 2awwam el-MASI7 w-houe ma 2awwamo, eza keno el-mawta ma bi2oumo.
W-eza keno ma bi2oumo, el-MASI7 ma 2am kamen.
W-eza ken el-MASI7 ma 2am, imenkon batel w-ento ba3dkon bi-khatayakon.
W-nafs el-shi bikouno yalle meto bel-MASI7 ra7o 3al-halek.
W-eza ken rajena bel-MASI7 ma7sour bi-hal-7ayet, ne7na ash2a el-nes kella.
Bass el-7a2i2a hiye enno el-MASI7 2am min el-mawt w-houe awwal el-2aymin min nawmit el-mawt.
Wel-mawt ken 3ala 2id 2ensen, w-3ala 2id 2ensen bitkoun 2iyemet el-mawta.
W-metl ma bimouto kell el-nes bi-Ãdam, hek bel-MASI7 ra7 y3isho,
bass kell wa7ad 7asab retebto. Wel-MASI7 awwal shi li2anno el-bekr, min ba3da yalle henne lal-MASI7 lamma yeje.
W-bitkoun el-niheye lamma bisallem el-MASI7 el-moulk la-ALLAH el-Ãb min ba3d ma ydammir kell ri2ase w-kell soulta w-2ouwwe.
W-la-bodd enno yemlok 7atta 7yott kell a3de2o ta7t ejrey.
Wel-mawt ekher 3adouw bidammro.
Wel-kteb bi2oul enno ALLAH "akhda3 kell shi ta7t ejrey." Lamma bi2oul: "akhda3 kell shi", akid ALLAH el-Ãb stathna yalle khalla kell shi yokhda3 lal-MASI7.
W-lamma kell shi byokhda3 lal-2eben, byokhda3 houe nafso la-ALLAH yalle khalla kell shi yokhda3 elo, w-bikoun ALLAH el-kell bel-kell.
W-eza keno el-mawta ma bi2oumo, shou ra7 ya3emlo yalle 3am yet3ammado kermel el-mawta? Leysh 3am yet3ammado kermelon?
W-leysh 3am net3arrad ne7na lal-khatar bi-kell wa2et?
W-ana 3am mout kell yawm. B2oul hal-shi, ya ekhewte, li2anno bshouf 7ale fikon bel-MASI7 YASOU3 RABNA.
W-eza kent 7erabet el-w7oush bi-Afasos la-gheye bashariyye, shou bestafeed? W-eza keno el-mawta ma bi2oumo, khallina n2oul ma3 yalle bi2oulo: "ta3o nekol w-neshrab, li2anno boukra ra7 nmout."
Ma tkhallo 7ada yekhda3kon: "el-3eshre el-3atle btenza3 el-akhle2 el-mni7a."
Rja3o la-wa3eykon w-ma tokhto, li2anno fi baynetkon meen byejhal ALLAH ktir. B2oul hal-shi ta-khajjelkon.
W-byes2al 7ada minkon: "keef bi2oumo el-mawta, w-bi-ayya jesm byerja3o?"
Ya jehil! Yalle btezra3ouh ma bi3ish ella eza met.
W-yalle btezra3ouh houe moujarrad 7abbit 2am7 mathalan, aw ghayra min el-7boub, mish jesm el-nabte metl ma ra7 ykoun,
w-ALLAH bya3tya el-jesm yalle birido, w-la-kell 7abbe jesm khas fiya.
Wel-ajsem mish kella metl ba3d, w-lal-2ensen jesm w-lal-7ayawen jesm tene, w lal-3asfour jesm w-lal-samak jesm tene.
W-fi-ajsem samawiyye w-ajsem ardiyye. El-ajsem el-samawiyye ela wahja, wel-ajsem el-ardiyye ela wahj tene.
El-shams ela wahj wel-2amar elo wahj tene, w-lal-noujoum wahja, w-kell nejme btekhtelif bi-wahja 3an el-tenye.
W-zet el-shi bennesbe la-2iyemet el-mawta: byendafan el-jesm mayyit w-bi2oum bala fased.
Byendafan bidoun karame w-bi2oum bi-majd. Byendafan bi-do3f w-bi2oum bi-2ouwwe.
Byendafan jesm bashare w-bi2oum jesm rou7ane. W-eza ken fi jesm bashare, fi kamen jesm rou7ane.
El-kteb bi2oul "ken Ãdam el-2ensen el-awwal nafs fiya 7ayet", w-ken Ãdam el-akhir rou7 bta3te 7ayet.
Bass yalle zahar awwal shi houe el-bashare, wel-rou7ane eja min ba3do.
El-2ensen el-awwal min el-trab w-min el-ard, wel-ensen el-tene min el-sama.
Ahl el-ard byeshbaho el-arde, w-ahl el-sama byeshbaho el-samewe.
W-metl ma lbesna souret el-arde, hek ra7 nelbos souret el-samewe.
B2elkon, ya ekhewte, enno el-la7m wel-damm ma bye2daro enno yourato malakout ALLAH, wala bye2dar el-mawt enno yourat 3adam el-fased.
W-sma3o hal-serr: ma minmout kellna, bass mnetghayyar kellna,
bi-la7za w-lam7et 3ayn, 3a-sawt el-bou2 el-akhir, li2anno sawt el-bou2 ra7 ye3la, bi2oumo el-mawta lebsin 3adam el-fased w-ne7na ra7 netghayyar.
Fa-la-bodd enno hayda el-mayyit yelbos yalle ma bimout, w-hayda el-mawwit enno yelbos yalle ma bizoul.
W-lamma yelbos hayda el-mayyit yalle ma bimout, w-yelbos hayda el-mawwit yalle ma bizoul, se3eta byet7'a2a2 2awl el-kteb: "el-intisar bala3 el-mawt."
Fa-wayn intisarak ya mawt? W-wayna ya mawt shawektak?
W-shawket el-mawt hiye el-khatiyye, w-2ouwwet el-khatiyye hiye el-shari3a.
Kermel hek, el-shokr la-ALLAH yalle 3atana el-intisar bi-RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Kouno, ya ekhewte el-a7ebba, thebtin reskhin, mejtehdin bi-3amal el-RAB bi-kell wa2et, 3erfin enno jehedkon bel-RAB ma birou7 di3an.
W-bi-khsous jam3 el-tabarrou3at lal-ekhwe el-2eddisin, 3rafo ento kamen bi-yalle wasseyt fih el-kaneyes bi-Ghalatya.
W-houe enno ye7tefez kell wa7ad minkon, bi-awwal yawm min el-ousbou3, bi-yalle bye2dar ywaffro min el-masare, 7atta jam3 el-tabarrou3at ma ysir yawm yalle ra7 eje la-3andkon.
W-lamam beje, ra7 eb3at yalle ento bitna'2ouwon ta-yekhdo yalle 2addamtouh 3a-Ourashalim w-ra7 a3tiyon raseyel minne.
W-eza la-bodd enno rou7 ana kamen, birou7o ma3e.
Ra7 eje la-3andkon min ba3d ma emro2 bi-Makdouniyye, li2anno ra7 emro2 fiya.
W-yemken ra7 eb2a w-shatte 3endkon 7atta tse3doune kammil safare.
Hal-marra ma badde shoufkon mar2it tari2, 7abeb e2'3od 3endkon wa2et tawil bi-2ezn ALLAH.
W-ra7 eb2a hon bi-Afasos lal-yawm el-khamseen,
li2anno ALLAH fata7le beb wesi3 lal-tebshir, ma3 enno el-khousoum ktar.
W-eza ejekon Timothawos, khallo belo mettammin, li2anno 3am yeshteghil metle lal-RAB.
W-ma 7ada yestalshi2 fih, w-sahloulo tari2 el-raj3a la-3ande bi-salem, li2anno ana wel-ekhwe natrino.
W-bi-khsous khayyna Apolos, talabet minno 3eddit marrat enno yrou7 la-3andkon ma3 el-ekhwe, bass rafad enno yeje la-3andkon bel-wa2et el-7ader, w-ra7 yrou7 lamma btesma7lo el-fersa.
Kouno we3yin, thbato bel-imen, jehdo jihed el-rjel, kouno 2weya,
3melo kell shi bi-ma7abbe.
Ento bta3erfo enno 3aylet Estefanas henne awwal meen 2ãmano bel-MASI7 bi-Akha2ya, w-enno karraso 7alon la-khedmet el-ekhwe el-2eddisin. Kermel hek betlob minkon, ya ekhewte,
ennou tesma3oulon w-tesma3o la-kell yalle byeshteghlo w-byet3abo ma3on.
Farra7ne maji2 Estefanas w-Fartonatos w-Akha2ikos, li2annon 3abbo el-faragh bi-ghiyebkon,
w-rayya7oule 2albe w-2albkon. W-3rafo keef tkarrmo yalle metlon.
Bisallmo 3leykon kaneyes Ãsia, w-bisallmo 3leykon ktir bel-RAB Akila w-Briskilla wel-knise yalle btejtemi3 bi-beyton.
W-bisallmo 3leykon el-ekhwe kellon. Sallmo 3ala ba3dkon bi-bawse m2addase.
Hayda el-salem bi-khatt 2ide ana Boulos.
Yalle ma bi7ebb el-RAB houe ta7t la3nit ALLAH! "Maranata": ta3a ya RAB.
Ne3met el-RAB YASOU3 tkoun ma3kon.
W-ma7abbte elkon kellkon bel-MASI7 YASOU3.
Min Boulos rasoul el-MASI7 YASOU3 bi-iradet ALLAH, w-min el-akh Timothawos, la-kniset ALLAH bi-Korentos, la-kell el-ekhwe el-2eddisin bi-Akha2ya kella.
Elkon el-ne3me wel-salem min ALLAH bayyna w-min el-RAB YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Yetberak ALLAH bayy RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7, el-Ãb el-ra7eem w-ILEH kell ta3ziye,
Houe yalle bi3azzina bi-kell msibe ta-ne2dar ne7na bel-ta3ziye yalle akhadneha min ALLAH enno n3azze ghayrna bi-kell msibe.
W-metl ma elna nasib kbir min ãlem el-MASI7, kamen elna bel-MASI7 nasib kbir min el-ta3ziye.
W-eza kenna bi-di2a, hal-shi bikoun kermel ta3ziyetkon w-khalãskon, w-eza t3azzayna bikoun kermel ta3ziyetkon yalle bta3tina el-edra enno net7ammal el-ãlem yalle 3am net7ammala.
W-rajena fikon thebit li2anno mna3rif ennkon 3am bitsherkouna bel-ta3ziye metl ma bitsherkouna bel-ãlem.
Ma badna, ya ekhewte, enno ma ta3erfo bel-msayeb yalle nezlit 3leyna bi-Ãsia, w-kenit t2ile ktir w-fo2 edretna enno net7ammala la-daraje enno y2esna min el-7ayet,
w-7asseyna enno ma7koum 3leyna bel-mawt, ta-ma nettekil 3ala 7alna, ta-nettekil 3ala ALLAH yalle bi-2awwem el-mawta.
W-houe yalle khallasna min hal-mawt w-ra7 ykhallesna minno. Mbala, 3enna raja enno ra7 ykhallisna kamen.
Ra7 tse3douna ento bi-salawatkon, w-eza ALLAH berakna kermel salawet ktir min el-nes, fa-ktir min el-nes ra7 yeshekro ALLAH kermelna.

W-yalle mneftekhir fih houe shahedet dameerna. W-houe byesh'hadelna bi-enno souloukna bi-hal-3alam, w-khsouse baynetkon, houe soulouk basata w-ta2wa, w-hal-shi bi-ne3met ALLAH mish bi-7ekmet el-bashar.
W-ne7na ma mnektebelkon ella yalle bte2rouh w-btefhamouh, w-raje2e enno tefhamo mni7
yalle 3am tefhamouh halla2 shwey, w-houe enno bi-yawm RABNA YASOU3 ra7 teftekhro fina metl ma ne7na ra7 neftekhir fikon.
Kent 3ala thi2a bi-hal-shi kello lamma 2arraret sefir la-3andkon awwal shi 7atta testafeedo aktar,
w-ra7 emro2 la-3andkon bi-tari2e 3a-Makdouniyye, min ba3da berja3 min Makdouniyye la-3andkon, w-hek bitse3doune sefir 3al-Yahoudiye.
Awlkon lamma 2arraret hal-shi kent 3am estkheff bi-hal-mashrou3? Aw hal-2arar ken 2arar bashare, ta-ykoun fiyye eh w-la2 bi-nafs el-wa2et?
ALLAH byesh'had enno kalemna elkon ma ken eh w-la2,
li2anno YASOU3 el-MASI7 2eben ALLAH yalle basharna fih baynetkon, ana w-Selwanos w-Timothawos, ma ken eh w-la2, ken kello eh.
Houe "el-eh" la-kell wou3oud ALLAH. Kermel hek min2oul "ãmin" bel-MASI7 YASOU3 ekraman la-majd ALLAH.
Bass ALLAH houe yalle bithabbetna ne7na w-ento bel-MASI7, w-houe yalle na'2ena
w-khatamna bi-khatmo w-3atana Rou7o ra3boun bi-2loubna.
W-ALLAH byesh'had 3leyye enno ma jeet 3a-Korentos li2anno shfe2t 3leykon,
li2anno ne7na ma badna netsallat 3ala imenkon, ne7na mneshteghel ma3kon kermel fara7kon, li2annkon thebtin 3al-imen.
Kermel hek 2arraret enno ma erja3 la-3andkon, ta-ma sabbebelkon el-7ezn marra tenye.
Li2anno eza 7azzanetkon, meen bifarre7ne ghayr yalle 7azzanton?
W-3am ektebelkon hal-risele 7atta bass 2ousal ma yejine el-7ezn min yalle ken lezim efra7 fiyon. W-ana 3ala thi2a fikon kelkon, enno fara7e houe fara7kon kellkon.
Katabtelkon w-2albe melyen ka2ãbe w-hamm w-3youne kellon dmou3, mish ta-te7zano, bel-3aks ta-ta3erfo addeysh ana b7ebbkon.
W-yalle ken sabab lal-7ezn ma khallene e7zan ana wa7de, 7azzankon kellkon, 3al-alile shwey, ta-ma koun 3am zeeda.
W-hal-rejjel byekfih enno aktariyetkon wabbakhouh.
W-halla2 a7sanelkon enno tsem7ouh w-tshaj3ouh, ta-ma yeghra2 bel-7ezn.
W-bwassikon enno t7ebbouh ba3d aktar.
W-katabtelkon ta-ekhteberkon w-shouf eza bittee3oune bi-kell shi.
Yalle ento bitsem7ouh, bsem7o ana kamen, li2anno eza ana kamen sema7to bkoun sema7to kermelkon eddem el-MASI7,
ta-ma yetghallab 3leyna el-shaytan, w-ne7na ma mna3reflo naweyeh mni7.
Wsolt 3ala Terwas ta-basher bel-MASI7, wel-RAB fata7le beb lal-khedme.
Bass 2le2et ktir li2anno ma sheft Titos khayye, se3eta wadda3et el-ekhwe w-sefaret 3ala Makdouniyye.
El-shokr la-ALLAH yalle byekhedna bi-mawkeb el-MASI7 el-mountaser el-deyem, w-byenshor fina wayn ma ken 3otr ma3refto.
Ne7na ree7et el-MASI7 el-tayybe, el-tal3a la-3and ALLAH, bayn yalle ray7in 3a-tari2 el-khalãs, w-yalle ray7in 3a-tari2 el-halek.
Hal-ree7a, la-yalle ray7in 3al-halek, ree7et mawt bitmawwet, w-la-yalle ray7in 3a-tari2 el-khalãs ree7et 7ayet bta3te 7ayet. W-meen awlkon edir ya3mil hal-shi?
Ne7na ma mintejir, metl ktar min el-nes, bi-kalem ALLAH, ne7na mne7ke bel-MASI7 bi-kell sod2, kalem rousl ALLAH eddem ALLAH.
Awlkon rje3na nemda7 7alna aw ne7na bi-7aje, metl ba3d el-nes, la-raseyel tawsiye minkon aw elkon?
Ento bi-zetkon riseletna, maktoube bi-2loubna, bya3erfouwa w-bye2rouwa kell el-nes.
Mbala, tbayyan ennkon riselet el-MASI7 yalle ejet bi-wastetna, w-ma katabneha bi-7ebr, katabneha bi-ROU7 ALLAH el-7ayy, mish 3a-lwe7 min 7ajar, katabneha 3a-lwe7 min la7m w-damm, ye3ne bi-2loubkon.
Hayde thi2atna bel-MASI7 3end ALLAH,
mish li2anna edrin nedde3e shi ka2anno minna, edritna min ALLAH.
Houe yalle 3atana nsir kheddem el-3ahd el-jdid, 3ahd el-ROU7 mish 3ahd el-7arf, li2anno el-7arf bimawwet wel-ROU7 bya3te 7ayet.

Eza kenit khedmet el-mawt el-ma7foura 7roufa bi-lwe7 min 7ajar n3atet bel-majd, 7atta enno wled Isra2il ma edro yettalla3o 3ala wejj Moussa bi-sabab el-majd yalle ken bi-wejjo, ma3 enno hal-majd zeyil,
keef khedmet el-ROU7 ma badda tekhod majda!
W-eza khedmet el-shi yalle wassal el-nes 3al-deynoune akhadet majda, keef khedmet el-shi yalle biwasselon 3al-tebrir?
Li2anno el-shi yalle ken bel-mãde ekhid majd, zel eddem el-majd yalle fo2 el-wasf.
W-eza yalle ra7 yzoul akhad majd, addeysh bikoun majd yalle ra7 yeb2a 3a-toul?
W-li2anno 3enna hal-raja, ne7na mnetsarraf bi-jer2a.
Ne7na mish metl Moussa yalle ken 3am bi7ott ghata 3ala wejjo 7atta wled Isra2il ma yshoufo niheyet el-majd yalle ra7 yzoul.
Bass 3emyet 2loubon. W-ba3do hayda el-ghata la-liom ma7tout lamma ye2ro el-3ahd el-2adeem, w-ma bisheelo ella el-MASI7.
Mbala, la-liom ba3do el-ghata 3a-2loubon lamma ye2ro shari3et Moussa,
w-ma byenshel ella bass yerja3o lal-RAB.
Li2anno el-RAB houe el-ROU7, w-matra7 ma bikoun ROU7 el-RAB, bitkoun el-7orriyye.
W-ne7na kellna mne3kos souret majd el-RAB bi-wjouh makshoufe, w-mnet7awwal la-haydik el-soura zeta, w-hiye bitzeed majd fo2 majd, bi-fadl el-RAB yalle houe el-ROU7.
W-ma zel ALLAH bi-ra7emto 3atana hal-khedme, ma nkhalle hemmetna tebrod,
w-khallina nerfod el-asalib el-mekhfiyye w-yalle bitkhajjil, w-ma netsarraf metl el-me7telin w-ma nzawwer kalem ALLAH, bel-3aks nbayyen el-7a2i2a w-hek mnen2abal min dameer kell 2ensen eddem ALLAH.
W-eza ken injilna ma7joub, bikoun ma7joub 3an el-ray7in 3al-halek,
3an el-mish mou2minin yalle Ileh hal-3alam a3ma 2loubon 7atta ma yshoufo el-nour yalle bidawwilon, nour el-tebshir bi-majd el-MASI7 yalle houe souret ALLAH.
Ne7na ma minbasher bi-7alna, minbasher bi-YASOU3 el-MASI7 RAB, w-ne7na kheddem elkon kermel el-MASI7.
W-ALLAH yalle 2al: "khalle el-nour yeshro2 min el-3atme" houe yalle dawwa nouro bi-2loubna ta-teshro2 ma3rifet majd ALLAH, el-majd yalle 3ala wejj YASOU3 el-MASI7.
W-ne7na wa3a min fekhkhar bte7mol hal-kanz, ta-yezhar enno el-edra el-fo2 el-tabi3a hiye min ALLAH mish minna.
Bidey2ouna ktir min kell el-meylet w-ma mnenhãr, mne7tar bi-2amerna bass ma mni2as,
byedtehdouna bass ma byetkhalla 3anna ALLAH, mnou2a3 bel-mashekil w-ma minmout,
mne7mol bi-ajsemna bi-kell wa2et ãlem mawt YASOU3 ta-tezhar 7ayeto kamen bi-ajsemna.
W-kell shi ne7na tayybin, mnetsallam lal-mawt kermel YASOU3 ta-tezhar bi-ajsemna el-mawwite 7ayet YASOU3 kamen.
Fa-el-mawt byeshteghil fina wel-7ayet bteshteghil fikon.
W-maktoub bel-kteb: "7kit li2anno 2ãmanet." W-ne7na kamen bi-rou7 hal-imen yalle 3enna yeh mne7ke li2anno min2ãmen,
3erfin enno ALLAH yalle 2awwam el-RAB YASOU3 min el-mawt ra7 y2awwemna ne7na kamen ma3 YASOU3 w-ykhallina ne7na w-ento bayn 2idey,
w-hayda kello kermelkon. Fa-kell ma ketrit el-ne3me, byektar majd ALLAH.
Kermel hek ma btebrod hemmetna. Ma3 enno el-2ensen el-mbayyen fina byen7all, bass el-2ensen el-dèkhile byetjaddad yawm ba3d yawm.
W-hal shweyyit 3azèb el-mwa'2at yalle mnet3azzabon halla2 bi7adderelna majd abade ma elo 7doud,
li2anno ma mnettalla3 3al-eshya yalle minshoufa, mnettala3 3al-eshya yalle ma minshoufa. W-yalle minshoufo houe mwa'2at, bass yalle ma minshoufo houe lal-abad.
W-ne7na mna3rif enno eza nhadam beytna 3al-ard, 3enna bel-sama beyt abade m3ammaro ALLAH mish min 2iden bashar.
W-addeysh mneshte2 nelbos fo2 beytna el-arde, beytna el-samewe,
li2anno lamma mnelebso ma minkoun bala tyeb.

W-ma zelna bi-hal-khayme el-ardiyye, ra7 ndall n3enn metl yalle 7amel shi t2il, mish li2anno badna neshla7 ajsemna el-ardiyye, bass li2anno badna nelbos faw2a ajsemna el-samawiyye 7atta tebla3 el-7ayet kell shi zeyil fina.
W-ALLAH houe yalle 7addarna la-hal-massir w-3atana ra3boun el-ROU7.
Kermel hek ne7na deyman 3a-thi2a, w-mna3rif enno ma zelna sèknin bi-hal-jesm, ne7na mhajjarin 3an el-RAB,
li2anno meshyin bi-imenna mish bi-yalle minshoufo.
W-ne7na weth2in, w-minfaddel enno nehjor hal-jesm la-neskon ma3 el-RAB.
W-eza kenna sèknin aw mhajjarin, mnetma7 norde el-RAB,
Li2anno la-bodd enno nezhar kellna eddem ma7kamet el-MASI7 ta-yekhod kell wa7ad 7asab yalle 3emlo lamma ken bi-hal-jesm, enn ken kheyr aw sharr.
W-ne7na mne2na3 el-nes li2anno mna3rif nkhaf el-RAB. W-ALLAH bya3refna ktir mni7, w-bitmanna enno ta3erfouna ento kamen bi-damayerkon kamen mni7.
W-ne7na ma badna nkabbir bi-7alna eddemkon, badna na3tikon sabab ta-tshoufo 7alkon fina, tijeh yalle bishoufo 7alon bel-mazaher mish bi-naweya el-2loub.
W-eza kenna mjaneen minkoun mjaneen kermel ALLAH, w-eza kenna mawzounin, hal-shi bikoun kermelkon.
W-ma7abbet el-MASI7 bitsayter 3leyna, li2anno fhemna enno wa7ad met kermel kell el-nes, fa-kell el-nes sherakouh bi-mawto.
W-houe met kermelon kellon 7atta el-3ayshin ma ba2a y3isho kermel 7alon, y3isho kermel yalle met w-2am kermelon.
Kermel hek ne7na ma mna3rif 7adan min ba3d liom ma3rife bashariyye. W-eza kenna shi yawm 3refna el-MASI7 ma3rife bashariyye, halla2 ma ba2a na3erfo hek.
W-eza ken 7ada mette7id bel-MASI7, bisir khali2a jdide: ra7 el-3ati2 w-sar kell shi jdid.
W-hayda kello min ALLAH yalle sala7na bel-MASI7 w-sallamna khedmet el-mousala7a,
ye3ne ALLAH sala7 el-3alam ma3 7alo bel-MASI7 w-ma 7esabon 3ala khatayahon, w-3atana ne3lon hal-mousala7a.
W-ne7na soufara el-MASI7, w-ka2anno ALLAH nafso byou3az min khilelna. W-ne7na mnetrajjekon bi-esm el-MASI7 enno tetsala7o ma3 ALLAH,
li2anno yalle ma 3eref el-khatiyye 7ammalo ALLAH el-khatiyye kermelna ta-nsir bi-wasteto abrar 3end ALLAH.
Fa-ezan, bi-3amalna sawa ma3 ALLAH mnetlob enno ne3met ALLAH yalle 2beltouwa ma trou7 di3an.
Li2anno bi2oul: "bi-wa2et el-rida stajabtellak, w-bi-yawm el-khalãs se3adtak." W-hayda houe halla2 wa2et rida ALLAH, w-hayda houe halla2 yawm el-khalãs.
Ma badna nkoun 7ajar 3athra la-7ada ta-ma tkoun khedmetna fiya 3youb,
bel-3aks badna yshoufouna kheddem ALLAH bi-saberna bel-di2a wel-2elle wel-sha2a
wel-jald wel-7abs wel-edtirab wel-ta3ab wel-sahar wel-sawm,
bel-tahara wel-ma3rife w-toul el-bel wel-lotf w-rou7 el-2adese wel-ma7abbe el-sãd2a,
bel-kalem el-sãde2 w-edrit ALLAH w-sle7 el-7a2 bel-houjoum w-bel-dife3,
bel-karame wel-i7ti2ar, bel-seet el-3atel wel-seet el-mni7. Bye7esbouna el-nes kezzebin w-ne7na sad2in,
majhoulin w-ne7na ma3roufin, mayytin w-ne7na 3ayshin, ma7koum 3leyna w-mish 3am ye2tlouna,
ma7zounin w-ne7na deyman fer7anin, fou2ara w-mneghne ktar min el-nes, ma 3anna shi w-ne7na mnemlok kell shi.
Kallamnekon bi-sara7a, ya ahl Korentos, w-fata7nelkon 2loubna.
Sa7i7 ennkon mdeya2in, bass mish bi-sababna, el-di2a bi-2loubkon.
Be7kikon metl ka2annkon wlede. 3emlouna metl ma 3am min3emelkon, w-fta7o ento kamen 2loubkon elna.
Ma tetteslo ma3 el-mish mou2minin bi-neer wa7ad. Shou yalle byejma3 bayn el-kheyr wel-sharr? W-shou fi 3ale2a bayn el-nour wel-3atme?
W-wayn fi ta7alof bayn el-MASI7 w-eblees? W-ayya mousherake fi bayn el-mou2min wel-mish mou2min?
W-ayya ettife2 bayn haykal ALLAH wel-awthen? Ne7na haykal ALLAH el-7ayy. Hek 2al ALLAH: "ra7 eskon bayneton w-emshe ma3on, w-bkoun Ilehon w-bikouno sha3be.
Kermel hek tla3o min bayneton w-trekouwon, bi2oul el-RAB. Ma telemso yalle houe nejs, w-ana bi2balkon
w-bkoun elkon bayy w-bitkouno ele wlede, bi2oul el-RAB el-2adeer."
Hayde el-wou3oud 3atana hiye ALLAH, ya ekhewte, khallina ntahher 7alna min kell shi bidannes el-jesm wel-rou7, ne7na w-3am nes3a lal-2adese el-kemle bi-khawf ALLAH.
Treko la-elna matra7 bi-2loubkon, ne7na ma 2zina 7ada wala khada3na 7ada.
Ma b2oul hal-shi 7atta deenkon, li2anno 2eltelkon min abl ennkon bi-2loubna 3al-7ayet wel-mawt.
W-ana thi2ate kbire fikon w-fakhour ktir fikon. W-roughm kell el-mashekil, 2albe melyen ta3ziye w-fara7.
W-lamma wselna 3ala Makdouniyye ma rta7na, kenit el-mashekil 3am teje min kell meyle: sira3 min barra w-khawf min jouwwa.
Bass ALLAH yalle bi3azze el-metwad3in 3azzena lamma eja Titos,
mish bass li2anno eja, bass kamen li2anno ento 3azzaytouh. W-zed fara7e lamma khabbarna 3an shaw2kon w-7eznkon w-ghiretkon 3leyye.
W-eza kent 7azzanetkon bi-riselte, ana mish nedmen enno katabta. W-eza kent ndemet, lamma sheft enna 7azzanetkon la7za,
ana halla2 fer7an, mish li2anno 7azzanetkon, bass li2anno 7eznkon khallekon ettoubo. W-houe 7ezn min ALLAH, w-hek ma ejekon minna ne7na wala ayya khsara.
Li2anno el-7ezn yalle min ALLAH biwadde la-tawbe fiya khalãs w-ma fi nadam 3leya, baynama el-7ezn yalle byeje min el-dene biwadde lal-mawt.
Ettalla3o keef wadda hal-7ezn yalle min ALLAH la-ehtimemkon fina, w-la-e3tizarkon w-estenkarkon w-khawfkon w-shaw2kon w-ghiretkon w-2asãskon! W-barhanto bi-kell shi ennkon abrar min kell shi sar.
Ana ma katabtelkon bi-sabab el-zalem wala bi-sabab el-mazloum, bass katabtelkon ta-tshoufo addeysh ento btehtammo fina eddem ALLAH,
w-hek kenit ta3ziyetkon ta3ziye elna. W-ziyede 3an hayda kello fre7na ktir bi-fara7 Titos, li2anno akhad rou7 fikon kellkon.
W-eza kent bayyantello addeysh bshouf 7ale fikon, ma beste7e enno bayyen hal-shi. Li2anno metl ma kenna sad2in ma3kon bi-kell shi, hek kenna sad2in lamma shefna 7alna fikon eddem Titos.
W-bizeed 2albo ma7abbe elkon, kell ma byetzakkar ta3etkon kellkon w-keef 2beltouh bi-khawf w-i7tiram.
W-ana befra7 enno ykoun 3ende thi2a fikon bi-kell shi.
Badna nkhabberkon, ya ekhewte, bi-yalle 3emleto ne3met ALLAH bi-kaneyes Makdouniyye.
Ma3 enno mara2 3leyon mashekil ktir, fer7o fara7 3azeem w-t7awwal fe2ron la-ghina w-karam.
W-besh'had ennon tbarra3o 2add ma fiyon, w-aktar bi-ktir kamen, w-minnon la-7alon,
w-talabo minna w-asarro enno nkhalliyon yeshterko bi-mouse3adet el-ekhwe el-2eddisin.
W-3emlo aktar min ma kenna mnetmanna, karraso 7alon lal-RAB awwal shi, w-min ba3da la-elna bi-iradet ALLAH.
W-talabna min Titos enno ytammem 3endkon hal-3amal el-moubarak metl ma ballash fih.
W-metl ma ennkon btetmayyazo bi-kell shi: bel-imen wel-fasa7a wel-ma3rife wel-7amès wel-ma7abbe elna, w-ya reyt btetmayyazo kamen bi-hal-3amal el-moubarak.
W-ma b2oul hal-shi ka2anno 3am e2merkon, b2oulo ta-ekhtebir bi-ghiret ghayrkon sod2 ma7abbetkon.
W-ento bta3erfo ne3met RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7: keef fta2ar kermelkon, w-houe el-ghane, ta-teghteno ento bi-fa2ro.
Hayda ra2ye bi-hal-mawdou3, li2anno hal-shi kheyr elkon, w-ento yalle kento el-sene el-madye mish bass awwal meen ballash bi-hal-3amal, kento awwal meen 2arrar ya3emlo.
Kammlo halla2 3amal el-kheyr ta-tkouno kammaltouh 3ala 2add ma 7abbeyto ta3mlouh.
Li2anno lamma byezhar el-7amès lal-mouse3ade, bye2bal ALLAH min el-2ensen el-ta2dime 3a-2add el-shi yalle bikoun 3endo, mish 3a-2add el-shi yalle ma bikoun 3endo.
Ma 2asde enno tkouno bi-di2a w-ykoun ghayrkon merte7, bass 2asde ykoun fi baynetkon mousewet,
hek yalle bifaddel 3annkon liom bi3awwed 3an yalle na2is 3end ghayrkon, w-yalle bifaddel 3annon kamen y3awwed 3an yalle na2eskon, w-bisir fi mousewet.
El-kteb bi2oul: "yalle akhad ktir ma fedl 3anno shi, w-yalle akhad alil ma ne2so shi."
El-shokr la-ALLAH yalle khalla Titos yehtamm hal-2add fikon,
mish bass 3eml yalle talabneh minno, kamen eja la-3andkon minno la-7alo min ketrit ma bighar 3leykon.
W-ba3atelna ma3o el-akh yalle btemda7o el-kaneyes kella la-sheghlo bi-khedmet el-injil.
W-hayda mish kell shi, el-kaneyes khtareto rfi2 elna bel-safar kermel hal-3amal el-moubarak yalle 3am na3emlo la-majd el-RAB bi-7asab raghbetna.
W-ma badna 7ada yente2edna 3al-tari2a yalle 3am nehtamm fiya bi-khsous hal-mouse3ade el-kbire min el-masare,
li2anno hadafna nkoun nazihin, mish bass bi-nazar el-RAB, bi-nazar el-nes kamen.
W-ba3atna ma3on khayyna yalle khtabarneh w-l2ina 3endo ghire bi-ktir min el-eshya, w-halla2 ghirto zedit la-thi2ato el-kbire fikon.
W-bennesbe la-Titos houe rfi2e w-mouse3de 3endkon, wel-khayyen yalle mref2ino, henne rousl el-kaneyes w-bi-wasteton byetmajjad el-MASI7.
Barehnoulon eddem el-Kaneyes 3an ma7abbetkon w-enno ma3na 7a2 nshouf 7alna fikon.
Bi-khsous mouse3adet el-ekhwe el-2eddisin, mish daroure ektebelkon 3anna,
li2anno ba3rif raghbetkon w-beftekhir fiya 3end el-Makdouniyyin w-b2ellon enno ekhwetna bi-Akha2ya keno mist3eddin la-hal-khedme min el-sene el-madye. W-ghiretkon 7ammaset nes ktir,
