bass ba3atelkon el-ekhwe 7atta shawfit 7alna fikon bi-hal-shi ma tkoun batle, w-ta-tkouno mist3eddin metl ma 2elt.
Bkhaf yeje ma3e kamm wa7ad min el-Makdouniyyin w-yle2oukon mish mist3eddin, se3eta ne7na, 7atta ma 2oul ento, ra7 nekhjal bi-thi2atna fikon.
Kermel hek sheft daroure enno etlob min el-ekhwe yesba2oune la-3andkon ta-ynazzmo yalle wa3adto fih min mouse3ade, ta-ykoun m7addar bi-karam mish 3an bekhl.
W-tzakkaro enno yalle byezra3 alil byo7sod alil, w-yalle byezra3 ktir byo7sod ktir.
Khalle kell wa7ad ya3te yalle metl ma 2albo bi2ello, bidoun 2asaf wala ghasb 3anno, li2anno ALLAH bi7ebb yalle bya3te bi-fara7.
W-ALLAH edir ya3tikon kell ne3me, ta-ykoun elkon deyman bi-kell shi yalle byekfe 7ajetkon w-btezdedo bi-kell 3amal sale7,
metl ma n2al bel-kteb: "wazza3 bi-ketra 3al-fou2ara, karamo deyim lal-abad."
W-ALLAH yalle byerzo2 el-mzeri3 zar3 w-khebz ta-yekol ra7 yerze2kon zar3 w-ykattir, 7atta karamkon yzeed.
W-bteghteno bi-kell shi, ta-yekmal karamkon, w-ysir bi-wastetna shokr la-ALLAH.
Li2anno ento w-3am ta3emlo hal-khedme el-m2addase mish bass 3am bitse3do el-ekhwe el-2eddisin, 3am tkhallouwon yeshkro ALLAH w-ykattro kamen.
W-hal-khedme borhan 3ala imenkon, ra7 ymajjdo ALLAH 3ala ta3etkon w-i3tirafkon bi-injil el-MASI7 w-3ala karamkon bi-mouse3adeton w-mouse3adet el-kell.
W-bisalloulkon w-bi3abbro 3an 3atfeton tijehkon, kermel ne3met ALLAH yalle ejet 3leykon bi-ketra.
Neshkor ALLAH 3a-yalle 3atana yeh, w-houe fo2 el-wasf.
Ana Boulos betlob minkon bi-7anen el-MASI7 w-tibto, ana el-metwadi3 bass koun baynetkon wel-jari2 3leykon bass koun b3id,
bitrajjekon, ma tejbroune, w-ana 3endkon, esta3mil el-jer2a yalle 3am fakkir esta3mela ma3 yalle mfakkrin enno souloukna soulouk bashare w-bass.
Sa7i7, ne7na min3ish 7ayet bashariyye, bass ma minkefi7 kife7 bashare.
Sle7 kife7na mish bashare, Ilehe edir yehdoum el-7ousoun:
mnehdom el-nazariyyet el-ghalat w-kell 7ajiz byou2af bi-wejj ma3rifet ALLAH, w-mneljom kell fekr w-minkhallih yokhda3 la-ta3et el-MASI7.
W-ne7na mist3eddin n2ãses kell 3osyan lamma tsir ta3etkon kemle.
Wèjho el-7a2i2a. Eza 7ada bye3te2id enno byenteme lal-MASI7, khallih yetzakkar enno metl ma houe byenteme lal-MASI7, ne7na kamen lal-MASI7.
W-ma bekhjal enno sheft 7ale aktar min el-lzoum bel-soulta yalle 3atana hiye el-RAB kermel benyenkon mish kermel hademkon.
Ana ma badde bayyen ka2anne 3am khawwefkon bi-raseyle.
Fi kamm 7ada minkon 3am bi2oulo: "raseyel Boulos 2asye w-3aneefe, bass lamma byeje, bikoun d3if w-kalemo sakhif."
Yalle 3am ye7ke hal-7ake khallih ya3rif enno yalle mneketbo bi-raseyelna w-ne7na ghaybin mna3emlo ne7na w-hon.
Ne7na ma mnestarje nsewe 7alna aw netshabbah bi-nes bi3azzmo 7alon, hol bala fehm! Bi2iso 7alon 3ala 7alon, w-bishabbho 7alon bi-7alon.
Bass ne7na, ma minshouf 7alna fo2 el-lzoum, minshouf 7alna 3a-2add el-7doud yalle rasamelna hiye ALLAH ka-2ã3de, khalletna nousal la-3andkon.
Ma mnetkhatta 7doudna, ka2anno ma wsolna la-3andkon, li2anno ne7na fe3lan wsolna la-3andkon w-ma3na injil el-MASI7.
W-ma mnetkhatta hal-7oudoud w-minshouf 7alna bi-a3mel ghayrna, bass mnetmanna yzeed imenkon w-hek bisir fi majel aktar la-3amalkon bel-7oudoud yalle elna,
7atta ne7mol el-injil la-ab3ad min bledkon, w-ma nshouf 7alna bi-yalle 3emlo ghayrna bi-7oudoud 3amalo.
Wel-kteb bi2oul: "yalle baddo yshouf 7alo, khallih yshouf 7alo bel-RAB",
Li2anno el-ma2boul 3end el-RAB, mish yalle byemda7 7alo, houe yalle byemda7o el-RAB.
Ya reytkon btet7ammaloune, w-law 7kit metl el-ghabe. Eh, t7ammaloune!
Ana bghar 3leykon ghiret ALLAH li2anno khattabetkon la-rejjel wa7ad w-houe el-MASI7, ta-2addimkon elo 3adra tãhra.
Bass bkhaf tzough afkarkon 3an el-sod2 wel-amene lal-MASI7, metl 7awwa yalle aghweta el-7ayye bi-7ileta.
Law ejekon 7ada ta-ybasherkon bi-YASOU3 tene ghayr yalle basharnekon fih, aw ye3rod 3leykon rou7 ghayr yalle akhadtouh, w-injil ghayr yalle akhadtouh, kento t7ammalto hal-shi ktir mni7.
W-ma be3te2id enno ana a2all min hawdik "el-rousl el-kbar!"
Eza el-fasa7a na2setne, mish na2setne el-ma3rife. W-hayda yalle bayyantelkon yeh bi-kell shi.
Awlkon ana ghlotit lamma basharetkon bidoun ma ekhod minkon shi w-tnezalet ta-ento te3lo?
Fi kaneyes ghayrkon zalamton w-akhadet minnon taman khedmetkon.
W-ma ta'2alet 3ala 7ada minkon lamma kent bi-7aje w-ana baynetkon, fa-el-ekhwe yalle ejo min Makdouniyye se3adoune. W-hek hamme enno ma ta'2el 3leykon bi-shi w-hayda ra7 ydall hamme.
Bi-7a2 el-MASI7 yalle fiyye, ma ra7 7ada yekhod minne hal-fakhr bi-bled Akha2ya.
W-leysh? li2anno ma b7ebbkon? ALLAH bya3rif addeysh b7ebbkon.
W-yalle 3am ba3emlo halla2 ra7 a3emlo 7atta e2ta3 el-tari2 3a-yalle 3am bijarrbo yshoufo 7alon enno 3am ya3emlo metl ma ne7na 3am na3mil.
Henne rousl kezzebin w-3am yekhda3oukon, lebsin tyeb rousl el-MASI7.
Ma testagherbo, el-shaytan nafso byetnakkar bi-tyeb malek el-nour,
w-mish alil enno ybayyno kheddemo bi-tyeb el-kheddem el-sal7in. Hal-ashkhas 2asãson 3ala 2add a3melon.
Berja3 b2oul: ma 7ada yfakkerne jehil, wa-ella 2baloune ka-jehil ta-ykoun ele shi shouf 7ale fih.
Yalle 3am 2oulo hon houe mish min 3end el-RAB, 3am 2oulo ka-jehil 3endo el-jer2a enno yshouf 7alo.
Bass ma zel ktar minkon 3am yeftekhro iftikhar bashare, ana kamen badde eftekhir.
W-ento ahl el-7ekme btet7ammalo el-jehhel bi-fara7.
Mbala, btet7ammalo yalle byesta3bedkon w-byenhabkon w-byeslebkon w-byetkabbar 3leykon w-byedrobkon.
Shou hal-khajal! Shou kenna d3af bi-hal-shi. Yalle byetbeho fih - w-kaleme kalem jehil - bitbeha fih ana kamen.
Eza keno 3ebraniyyin, ana kamen 3ebrane, aw Isra2iliyyin, ana kamen Isra2ile, aw min sleelet Ibrahim, ana min sleelet Ibrahim.
W-eza keno kheddem el-MASI7 - b2oul hal-shi metl el-ghabe - ana aktar minnon: bel-ta3ab aktar minnon, bel-7bouse aktar, bel-jald t7ammalt aktar minnon bi-ktir w-t3arradet lal-mawt 3eddit marrat,
jaladoune el-Yahoud khams marrat tes3a w-tleteen jalde.
W-daraboune el-Roumaniyyin bel-3ese tlet marrat, w-rajamoune el-nes marra we7de, w-nkasaret fiyye el-safine tlet marrat, w-2addeyt nhar w-leyle bi-noss el-ba7r.
Sefaret ktir w-t3arradet la-khatar el-anhar wel-lsous, w-la-khatar el-Yahoud w-ghayr el-Yahoud, w-khatar el-moudon, w-khatar el-sa7ra, w-khatar el-ba7r, w-khatar el-ekhwe el-kezzebin.
3aneyt el-kadd, wel-ta3ab, wel-sahar el-deyim, wel-jou3, wel-3atash, wel-sawm el-ktir, wel-bard, wel-te3reye.
W-hayda kello ma 3ada yalle bit7ammalo kell yawm min ehtimeme bi-kell el-kaneyes.
Meen byed3af w-ana ma bed3af ma3o, w-meen byou2a3 bel-khatiyye w-ana ma be7tere2 min el-7ezn 3le.
W-eza ken la-bodd min enno eftekhir, ana beftekhir bi-do3fe.
W-ALLAH bayy RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7 - wel-majd elo lal-abad - bya3rif enno ma 3am kazzeb,
w-enno wele el-malik el-7aris bel-Shem 2amar bi-7iraset el-madine ta-yekmeshne.
Bass el-ekhwe 7attoune bi-sallé w-dandaloune min ta2a maftou7a bel-sour, w-hek, falatet min 2idey.
W-eza ken la-bodd enno eftekhir, ma3 enno ma fi feyde min hal-shi, ra7 e7kikon 3an el-rou2a yalle ejoune min el-RAB.
Ba3rif rejjel mou2min bel-MASI7 nkhataf min arba3-ta3shar sene lal-sama el-telte. Nkhataf bi-jesmo? Ma ba3rif. Aw bidoun jesmo? Ma ba3rif. ALLAH bya3rif.
Bass yalle ba3erfo enno hal-rejjel nkhataf 3al-ferdaws: bi-jesmo aw mish bi-jesmo? Ma ba3rif. ALLAH bya3rif.
Ba3rif enno nkhataf 3al-ferdaws w-honik sem3 kalem ma bye2dar 2ensen enno y2oulo w-ma bi7e'2ello y2oulo.
Bass hal-rejjel beftekhir fih, bass ana ma beftekhir ella bi-do3fe.
W-law badde eftekhir mish ra7 koun jehil, li2anno b2oul el-7a2. Bass ma ra7 eftekhir ta-ma yfakker 7ada enno ana aktar min ma houe sheyefne aw sèm3o minne.
W-ta-ma entefekh bel-kebriya min 3azamet el-wa7e, n7att bi-jesme shawke w-ka2anna mab3oute min el-shaytan ta-yedrobne 7atta-ma etkabbar.
W-salleyt tlet marrat la-ALLAH 7atta yekheda 3anne,
2alle: "btekfik ne3emte. Bel-do3f edrte btektemil." Kermel hek ana beftekhir rade w-fer7an bi-do3fe 7atta toghmorne 2ouwwet el-MASI7.
W-kermel hek ana borda bi-yalle bit7ammalo min el-do3f wel-ihene wel-di2a wel-edtihad wel-sha2a kermel el-MASI7, li2anno lamma koun d3if bkoun 2awe.
Ka2anno sert majnoun, w-ento jabartoune enno koun hek. W-ken min 7a'2e 3leykon enno tkarmoune, w-ana mish a2all min "el-rousl el-kbar", 7atta law kent ma shi.
El-3alemet 3ala enne rasoul bayyanta bi-kell sabr baynetkon: min 3ajeyeb w-a3mel kher2a.
Bi-shou kento ghayr 3an be2e el-kaneyes ella bi-enno ma ta'2alet 3leykon bi-shi? Sem7oune 3a-hal-ghalta!

Ana mist3edd eje la-3andkon lal-marra el-telte, w-ma ra7 ta'2el 3leykon li2anno ana badde yekon ento, ma badde shou btemelko. Mish el-wled yalle lezim ysammdo masare la-ahlon, el-ahl henne yalle bisammdo masare la-wledon.
W-ana bda77e bi-kell shi 3ende bi-kell tibet khater, w-bda77e bi-7ayete kermelkon. Ra7 t7ebboune a2all lamma ana b7ebbkon ktir?
Mazbout, ana ma ta'2alet 3leykon bi-shi, bass ma kent me7tel aw 7talet 3leykon?
Awlkon tolo3le shi minkon bi-wastet 7ada min yalle ba3atton la-3andkon?
Lamma talabet min Titos yrou7 la-3andkon w-ba3atet ma3o haydak el-akh, tekhmin Titos akhad minkon shi? Mish shtaghalna bel-rou7 nafso? Mish mshina el-tari2 nafso?
Yemken mfakkrin enno 3am mintawwel bel-dife3 3an 7alna eddemkon. Ne7na mne7ke eddem ALLAH bel-MASI7, w-hayda kello ya a7ebba la-benyenkon.

W-ana bkhaf, eza jeet la-3andkon, enno shoufkon serto ghayr ma b7ebb enno tkounouh, w-enno tshoufoune sert ghayr ma bit7ebbo enno koun. Bkhaf enno ykoun baynetkon khilef w-7asad w-ghadab w-mashekil w-tejri7 w-namime w-kebriya w-balbale.
Bkhaf, eza jeet la-3andkon marra tenye, enno yzellne Ilehe eddemkon, se3eta bebke 3ala ktar min yalle khetyo min abl w-ma nedmo 3ala yalle 3emlouh min da3ara w-zena w-foujour.
W-halla2 ana jeye la-3andkon marra telte. Wel-kteb bi2oul: "ma fi 7ekm bi-2adiyye ella bi-shahedet shehden aw tlete."
Lamma jeet tene marra 2elt la-yalle khetyo min abl w-lal-be2yin, w-halla2 b2oul nafs el-shi ana w-ghayib: eza rje3t la-3andkon ma ra7 eshfa2 3ala 7ada,
ma zelkon 3am tetolbo borhan 3ala enno el-MASI7 bye7ke fiyye. El-MASI7 mish d3if tijehkon, bel-3aks houe 2awe baynetkon.
W-ma3 enno nsalab bi-do3fo, houe halla2 7ayy bi-edrit ALLAH. W-ne7na kamen d3af fih, bass tijehkon ra7 nkoun bi-edrit ALLAH 3ayshin ma3o.
Khtebro w-7ãsbo 7alkon ta-tshoufo eza ento metmasskin bi-imenkon. Ma bta3erfo 7alkon enno YASOU3 el-MASI7 fikon? Ella eza tbayyan ennkon feshlin.
Bass ne7na mnetmanna ta3erfo enno ne7na mish feshlin.
Minsalle la-ALLAH enno ma ta3emlo sharr, mish ta-yezhar enno ne7na nej7in, bass ta-ta3erfo ento shou el-kheyr 7atta law bayyanna ne7na ka2anno feshlin.
W-ne7na ma mne2dar 3ala mou2ewamet el-7a2, ne7na mnekhdom el-7a2.
W-addeysh mnefra7 lamma minkoun ne7na d3af w-ento 2weya, w-yalle 3am minsalle kermelo houe enno tkouno kemleen.
Bektebelkon w-ana ghayib ta-ma 3emelkon bi-2asewe w-ana 7ader, 7asab el-soulta yalle 3atane hiye el-RAB kermel el-benyen mish el-hadm.
W-halla2 ya ekhewte, fra7o w-s3ouh lal-kamèl, w-tshajja3o w-kouno 3ala ra2y wa7ad w-3isho bi-salem, w-ILEH el-ma7abbe wel-salem ykoun ma3kon.
Sallmo 3ala ba3d bi-bawse m2addase. Bisallmo 3leykon kell el-ekhwe el-2eddisin.
Ne3met RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7 w-ma7abbet ALLAH w-shariket el-ROU7 el-2ODOS tkoun ma3kon kellkon.
Minne ana Boulos, yalle houe rasoul mish min 2ebal el-nes wala bi-iradet 2ensen, rasoul bi-da3we min YASOU3 el-MASI7 w-ALLAH el-Ãb yalle 2awwamo min el-mawt,
w-min kell el-ekhwe yalle ma3e, la-kaneyes Ghalatya.
Elkon el-ne3me wel-salem min ALLAH bayyna w-min el-RAB YASOU3 el-MASI7,
yalle da77a bi-7alo kermel khatayana ta-ykhallisna min hal-3alam el-sherreer, 7asab iradet Ilehna w-bayyna,
elo el-majd lal-abad. Ãmin.
Bestaghreb keef bi-hal-ser3a tarakto yalle da3ekon bi-ne3met el-MASI7 w-l7e2to injil tene?
W-ma fi "injil tene", fi jame3a bta3mil balbale baynetkon w-bitjarreb tghayyir injil el-MASI7.
W-law basharnekon ne7na aw basharkon malèk min el-sama bi-injil ghayr yalle basharnekon fih, khallih ykoun mal3oun.
2elnelkon abl w-berja3 b2oul halla2: eza basharkon 7ada bi-injil ghayr yalle 2beltouh minna, bikoun mal3oun.
Awlkon ana 3am esta3tef el-nes? La2, 3am esta3tef ALLAH. Tekhmin 3am betlob rida el-nes? Law kent la-liom 3am betlob rida el-nes, ma kent khadim lal-MASI7.
3rafo, ya ekhewte, enno el-injil yalle basharetkon fih mish jeye min el-nes.
Ana ma akhadto min 2ensen, akhadto 3an wa7e min YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Sme3to bi-2osste el-madye lamma kent Yahoude w-keef kent edtehed kniset ALLAH bidoun ra7me w-kent 3am jarrib dammera
w-keef kent metfawwe2 bel-dyene el-Yahoudiye 3a-ktar min el-Yahoud yalle henne min jeele w-kent ghayyour aktar minnon 3a-ta2aleed bayyetna.
Bass ALLAH bi-ne3emto khtarne w-ana bi-batn emme w-da3ane la-khedemto.
W-lamma arad ALLAH enno ye3lon 2ebno fiyye ana, w-rou7 basher fih bayn el-mish Yahoud, ma stasharet ashkhas min la7m w-damm
wala tlo3t 3ala Ourashalim ta-shouf yalle keno rousl able, ro7t deghre 3ala bled el-3arab w-min ba3da rje3t 3al-Shem.
W-ba3d tlet snin tlo3t 3ala Ourashalim ta-shouf Boutros, w-b2it 3endo khams-ta3shar nhar,
w-ma sheft ghayro min el-rousl ella Ya3koub khayye bel-RAB.
W-byesh'had ALLAH enno ma 3am kazzeb bi-hal-shi yalle 3am beketbo elkon.
Min ba3da sefaret 3ala bled Souriya w-Kilikya,
w-ma ken wejje ma3rouf 3end kaneyes el-MASI7 bel-Yahoudiye,
w-sem3o enno "yalle ken yedtehedna houe halla2 3am ybasher bel-imen yalle ken baddo ydammro",
Kermel hek, majjado ALLAH kermele.
W-min ba3d arba3-ta3shar sene, tlo3t marra tenye 3ala Ourashalim ma3 Barnaba w-akhadet ma3e Titos,
w-kenit tal3te bi-wa7e. W-3aradet 3al-mou2minin el-kbar w-mish 3ala ghayron, el-injil yalle 3am be3elno lal-mish Yahoud, ta-ma koun basharet bel-mãde aw 3am basher halla2 3al-fade.
Fa-ma jabaro mraf2e Titos, w-houe Younene, enno yenkhetin,
ma3 enno fi ekhwe kezzebin feto baynetna ta-yetjassaso 3ala 7orriyyetna yalle 3enna yeha bel-MASI7 YASOU3, barke hek byesta3ebdouna.
W-ma staslamna elon aw kenna khad3in walaw la7za, 7atta n7afiz 3ala 7a2i2et el-injil metl ma 3reftouh.
Bass yalle keno ye3tebro 7alon min akbar el-mou2minin - w-ma fi far2 shou ma ykouno li2anno ALLAH ma bifaddel 7ada 3ala 7ada - ma zedo shi,
bel-3aks shefo enno ALLAH na'2ene ta-basher el-mish makhtounin metl ma na'2a Boutros ta-ybasher el-makhtounin,
li2anno yalle 3eml Boutros rasoul lal-Yahoud, 3emelne rasoul la-ghayr el-Yahoud,

w-lamma Ya3koub w-Boutros w-You7anna, yalle bye3tebrouwon 3oumada el-knise, 3erfo bel-ne3me yalle 3atane hiye ALLAH, maddoule 2idon el-yameen ele w-la-Barnaba ka-3aleme 3al-ettife2 w-ro7na ne7na 3end el-mish Yahoud w-henne 3end el-Yahoud.
W-kell shi talabouh minna enno netzakkar el-fou2ara, w-hayda yalle s3it kermelo min kell jehde.
W-lamma eja Boutros 3ala Antakya, 2ewamto wejj la-wejj li2anno ken byest7e2 el-lawm.
W-abl ma yeje ashkhas min 3end Ya3koub, ken Boutros 3am yekol ma3 el-mish Yahoud. W-lamma weslo tjannabon w-nfasal 3anon li2anno ken khayef min ahl el-khatn.
W-meshyo ma3o be2e el-Yahoud bel-mnefa2a, 7atta enno Barnaba nafso njarr ma3on.

W-lamma sheft ennon mish 3am yemsho jelis ma3 7a2i2et el-injil, 2elt la-Boutros eddemon kellon: "eza kent enta el-Yahoude 3am bit3ish metl el-ghayr Yahoud mish metl el-Yahoud, keef btelzom el-mish Yahoud enno y3isho metl el-Yahoud?"
Ne7na Yahoud bel-wilede mish oumamiyyin khatyeen metl ma bi2oulo 3annon.

Bass ne7na mna3rif enno ALLAH ma bibarrer el-2ensen li2anno bi3ish 7asab el-shari3a, bibarrero li2anno bi2ãmen bi-YASOU3 el-MASI7. Kermel hek 2ãmanna bel-MASI7 YASOU3 ta-ybarrerna el-imen bel-MASI7, mish el-3amal 7asab el-shari3a. Wel-2ensen ma byetbarrar li2anno byemshe 7asab el-shari3a.
Bass eza kenna ne7na w-3am nes3a lal-tebrir bel-MASI7 l2ina 7alna kamen min el-khatyeen, hal-shi bye3ne enno el-MASI7 khadim lal-khatiyye? Akid la2.
Bass eza rje3t 3ammir yalle hadamto, sert mkhalif lal-shari3a,
li2anno bel-shari3a mett 3an el-shari3a ta-3ish la-ALLAH.
Ma3 el-MASI7 nsalabet, w-mish ana el-3ayish, hayda el-MASI7 3ayish fiyye. W-eza kent 3am 3ish halla2 bel-jesm. 7ayete hiyye bel-imen bi-2eben ALLAH yalle 7abbne w-da77a bi-7alo kermele.
W-keef ma3'2oul 3attl ne3met ALLAH? W-law ken el-2ensen byetbarrar bel-shari3a, ken mawt el-MASI7 ra7 di3an?
Ya ahl Ghalatya el-aghbiya! Meen yalle sa7ar 32oulkon, ento yalle nrasam el-MASI7 eddem 3younkon masloub?
Bes2alkon sou2al wa7ad: tekhmin n3atalkon ROU7 ALLAH li2annkon meshyin 3al-shari3a, aw li2annkon bit2ãmno bel-injil?
Hal-2add ento aghbiya? Min ba3d ma ballashto bel-rou7 3am bitkammlo bel-jesm?
Ye3ne tajerebkon ra7o di3an? W-keef bikouno di3an?
Tekhmin yalle bya3tikon el-ROU7 el-2ODOS w-bya3mil el-3ajeyeb baynetkon, 3am ya3mil hal-shi li2annkon meshyin 3al-shari3a, aw li2annkon bit2ãmno bel-injil?
Hek "2ãman Ibrahim bi-ALLAH, w-barraro ALLAH la-imeno."
Fa-ezan, ahl el-imen henne wled Ibrahim el-7a2i2iyyin.
W-shef el-kteb min abl enno ALLAH ra7 ybarrir el-mish Yahoud bel-imen, fa-bashar Ibrahim w-2allo: "fik biberek ALLAH kell el-oumam."
Kermel hek ahl el-imen moubarakin ma3 Ibrahim el-mou2min.
Bass yalle meshyin 3a-mabda2 el-shari3a, henne mal3ounin kellon. El-kteb bi2oul: "mal3oun yalle ma bidewim 3al-3amal bi-kell yalle nkatab bi-kteb el-shari3a!"
W-wade7 enno ma 7ada byetbarrar 3end ALLAH bel-shari3a, li2anno "el-mbarrar bel-imen bi3ish",
bass mabda2 el-shari3a ma byeje min el-imen, li2anno "yalle meshe 3al wassaya bi3ish bel-wassaya."
Wel-MASI7 7arrarna min la3net el-shari3a bi-enno sar la3ne kermelna, wel-kteb bi2oul: "mal3oun kell meen met m3alla2 3ala khashabe."
W-hayda yalle 3emlo el-MASI7 ta-tousal baraket Ibrahim lal-mish Yahoud, ta-bel-imen no7sal 3al-ROU7 yalle nwa3adna fih.
Khedo, ya ekhewte, matal bashare: ma bye2dar 7ada enno yelghe 3ahd 2ensen aw yzeed 3le eza ken msabbat w-sa7i7,
w-keef bi-wa3d ALLAH la-Ibrahim w-sleelto? Houe ma bi2oul: "la-sleylo" bel-jam3, bi2oul "la-sleelto" bel-moufrad, ye3ne el-MASI7.
W-yalle badde 2oulo houe enno el-shari3a yalle ejet min ba3d arba3-miyye w-tleteen sene ma bte2dar telghe wa3d ALLAH.
Law kenit wertit ALLAH mertekze 3al-shari3a, shou elo fadl el-wa3d, bass ALLAH 3ata el-werte la-Ibrahim 3a-ases enno fi wa3d.
Eza hek, leysh fi shari3a? Nzedit bi-sabab el-3esyan 7atta teje el-sleele yalle kermela ALLAH 3eml wa3d. Hal-shari3a a3lanouwa el-maleyke 3ala 2id waseet,
el-waseet bye3ne aktar min shakhs. W-ALLAH wa7ad.
Ye3ne el-shari3a dodd w3oud ALLAH? Akid la2! W-law 3ata ALLAH shari3a edra ta3te 7ayet, ken el-tebrir 7a2i2atan bisir 3a-mabda2 el-shari3a.
Bass el-kteb 7abas kell shi ta7t soultan el-khatiyye, 7atta yekhdo el-mou2minin el-wa3d bi-sabab imenon bi-YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Abl ma yeje el-imen, kenna ma7bousin ta7t ra7met el-shari3a 7atta yen3alan el-imen yalle kenna natrino.
Wel-shari3a kenit mou3allim elna la-wa2et eja el-MASI7 7atta netbarrar bel-imen.
W-lamma eja el-imen, t7arrarna min soultet hal-mou3allim.
W-ento kellkon wled ALLAH bel-imen bel-MASI7 YASOU3,
Li2annkon t3ammadto kellkon bel-MASI7 w-lbesto el-MASI7,
w-ma-fi far2 halla2 bayn Yahoude w-mish Yahoude, bayn 3abd w-7orr, bayn rejjel w-mara, ento kellkon wa7ad bel-MASI7 YASOU3.
W-eza kento lal-MASI7 ye3ne ento min sleelet Ibrahim w-elkon el-werte bi-7asab el-wa3d.
W-b2oul kamen enno ma fi far2 bayn yalle byourat w-bayn el-3abd eza ken ba3do 2aser, ma3 enno houe el-sayyid 3a-kell shi.
Bass byeb2a ta7t wisayet el-awsiya wel-woukala lal-wa2et yalle 7addado bayyo.
W-hek ne7na kamen: wa2et kenna 2asrin, kenna 3abeed la-mabade2 el-3alam.
W-lamma tamm el-zaman, ba3at ALLAH 2ebno mawloud min mara, w-3ash khadi3 lal-shari3a,
ta-yefde el-khad3in lal-shari3a, 7atta nsir ne7na wled ALLAH.
Wel-dalil 3ala ennkon wledo houe enno ba3at ROU7 2ebno la-2loubna ynede: "Bayye, ya Bayye."
Ye3ne min halla2 w-raye7 enta mish 3abd, enta 2eben, w-eza kent 2eben, enta warith bi-ne3met ALLAH.
Lamma kento ma bta3erfo ALLAH, kento 3abeed la-ãliha, w-hiye bel-7a2i2a mish ãliha.
Bass halla2, min ba3d ma 3refto ALLAH, aw bel-a7ra ALLAH 3erefkon, keef bterja3o la-3ibedet mabade2 el-3alam el-d3ife wel-7a2ira, ka2anno 3a-belkon te3badouwa min jdid?
3am te7fazo el-iyem wel-shouhour wel-fsoul wel-snin!
Bkhaf enno ykoun ta3abe ra7 di3an kermelkon.
Betrajjekon ya ekhewte tsiro metle, li2anno sert metlkon. Ento ma zalamtoune bi-shi,
bass bta3erfo enno kent mareed lamma basharetkon awwal marra,
wel-marad yalle bi-jesme ken metl tajribe elkon, bass ento ma 7ta2artoune wala krehtoune, bel-3aks, 2beltoune ka2anne malèk ALLAH, aw ka2anne el-MASI7 YASOU3.
Wayn haydak el-fara7? Ana besh'had enno, law kento bte2daro, kento shelto 3younkon w-3titoune hiye.
Tekhmin halla2 sert 3adouw elkon li2anno 2eltelkon el-7a2i2a?
W-eza keno el-be2yin bigharo 3leykon, ghireton ma fiya sod2. Henne baddon ybay3doukon 3anne ta-tsiro tgharo 3leyon.
Shou mni7a hal-ghire eza kenit 3an 7esn niyye. W-hal-shi biso77 deyman, mish bass lamma koun 7ader baynetkon.
Ya wlede yalle 3am bitwajja3 fiyon marra tenye metl waja3 el-wilede 7atta tekhla2 fikon souret el-MASI7,
addeysh bitmanna law kent 3endkon halla2 ta-ghayyir lahejte, li2anno ana me7tar fikon.
2ouloule, ento yalle bit7ebbo tkouno ta7t soultet el-shari3a: ma 3am tesma3o shou bit2oul el-shari3a?
Bi2oul el-kteb: ken la-Ibrahim waladen, wa7ad min el-khãdme wel-tene min el-mara el-7orra.
Bass yalle ken min el-khãdme welid 7asab el-jesm el-bashare, w-yalle min el-7orra welid bi-2ouwwet wa3d ALLAH.
W-bi-hal-shi fi ramz, li2anno hal-neswen el-tnen byeremzo la-3ahden. We7de minnon Hajar min jabal Sina bitjeeb wled lal-3ouboudiyye,
w-jabal Sina bi-bled el-3arab, w-Hajar bte3ne Ourashalim el-7aliyye yalle hiye w-wleda bel-3ouboudiyye.
W-Ourashalim el-samawiyye hiye 7orra w-hiye emmna,
wel-kteb bi2oul: "fra7e ya hal-mara yalle ma bitjeeb wled. Hallele w-zaleghte ente yalle ma 3refte ãlem el-wilede! Wled el-mahjoura aktar min wled yalle 3enda zawj."
W-ento, ya ekhewte, wled el-wa3d metl Is7ak.
W-metl ma ken el-mawloud 7asab el-jesm el-bashare 3am yedtehed el-mawloud 7asab el-rou7, liom kamen hek.
Bass shou bi2oul el-kteb? Bi2oul: "Sh7at el-khãdme w-2ebna, li2anno 2eben el-khãdme ma ra7 yourat ma3 2eben el-7orra."
W-ne7na, ya ekhewte, mish wled el-khãdme, ne7na wled el-7orra.
El-MASI7 7arrarna ta-nkoun a7rar. Ye3ne khallikon thebtin, w-ma terja3o tokhda3o la-neer el-3ouboudiyye.
W-ana Boulos b2elkon: eza nkhatanto, el-MASI7 ma bi3oud yfeedkon bi-shi.
W-besh'had marra tenye la-kell meen nkhatan bi-enno majbour ytabbi2 el-shari3a kella.
W-yalle baddon yetbarraro bel-shari3a, 3am ybay3do 3an el-MASI7 w-yen7ermo min el-ne3me.
Bass ne7na, mnentor bi-raja enno ybarrerna ALLAH bel-imen bi-2ouwwet el-ROU7.
Li2anno bennesbe lal-MASI7 YASOU3 la el-khatn wala 3adam el-khatn byenfa3 bi-shi, bass el-mouhemm houe el-imen yalle byeshteghil 3an ma7abbe.
Kento bel-awwal meshyin mni7, meen khallekon ma ettee3o el-7a2?
Hal-fekra ma kenit min ALLAH yalle da3ekon.
Shweyyit khameer bikhammer el-3ajeen kello.
W-3ende thi2a bel-RAB ennkon ma ra7 te2balo ra2y tene. W-yalle bi7ott el-balbale baynetkon ra7 yet7esab, meen ma ken.
W-ana, ya ekhewte law kent bnede bel-khatn, leysh fa-ezan ba3dne 3am 3ene el-edtihad la-liom, mish ken el-salib ma bi3oud yshakkek 7ada?
Ya reyt yalle 3am bi7otto el-balbale baynetkon bye2ta3o jesmon!
Ento, ya ekhewte, da3ekon ALLAH ta-tkouno a7rar, bass ma tkhallo hal-7orriyye tkoun 7ejje btorde shahawet el-jesm, bel-3aks khdemo ba3dkon bel-ma7abbe.
El-shari3a kella btektemil bi-wassiye we7de: "7ebb 2aribak metl ma bit7ebb 7alak."
Bass eza kento 3am tefterso w-teklo ba3dkon, ntebho enno ma yefne wa7ad minkon el-tene.
W-b2elkon: mshou tari2 el-rou7 w-ma tshabb3o shahawet el-jesm.
Yalle byeshtehih el-jesm 3aks yalle byeshtehih el-rou7, w-yalle byeshtehih el-rou7 3aks el-jesm. Kell wa7ad minnon bi2awem el-tene 7atta ma ta3emlo yalle badkon yeh.
Eza kento meshyin 7asab el-rou7, ento mish ta7t soultet el-shari3a.
W-a3mel el-jesm ma3roufe: el-zena, wel-da3ara, wel-foujour
w-3ibedet el-awthen, wel-se7r, wel-3adewe, wel-enshi2a2, wel-ghire, wel-ghadab, wel-tama3, wel-khilef, wel-ta3assob
Wel-7asad, wel-sekr, wel-3arbade, w-kell shi byeshbahon. W-bnabbehkon halla2, metl ma nabbahetkon min abl, enno yalle bya3emlo hal-a3mel ma byourato malakout ALLAH.
Bass thamar el-ROU7 houe el-ma7abbe wel-fara7 wel-salam wel-sabr wel-lotf wel-sala7 wel-amene
wel-wade3a wel-3effe. W-ma fi shari3a btemna3 metl hal-eshya.
W-yalle saro ma3 el-MASI7 YASOU3 salabo jesmon bi-kell shi fi min mouyoul w-shahawet.
Eza kenna min3ish 7asab el-rou7, khallina kamen nemshe tari2 el-rou7,
w-ma netkabbar wala net7adda wala ne7sod ba3dna.
Ya ekhewte, eza 7ada minkon gholit, se3douh ento el-rou7iyyin bi-rou7 el-wade3a. W-ntebeh la-7alak ta-ma tet3arrad enta kamen lal-tajribe.
Se3do ba3dkon bel 7eml el-t2il, w-hek btemsho 7asab shari3et el-MASI7.
W-yalle mfakkar 7alo shi mhemm, w-houe bel-7a2i2a ma shi, 3am yekhda3 7alo.
Khalle kell wa7ad y7esib 7alo 3ala 3amalo, ta-yshouf 7alo bi-yalle 3emlo houe mish bi-yalle ghayro 3emlo,
li2anno kell wa7ad lezim ye7mol 7emlo.
W-yalle t3allam kalem ALLAH, khallih ysherik yalle 3allamo bi-kell kheyrato.
Ou3a tenkhed3o: ALLAH ma byenda7ak 3le, w-yalle byezra3o el-2ensen ra7 yo7sdo:
yalle byezra3 kermel jesmo ra7 yo7sod min el-jesm fased, w-yalle byezra3 kermel el-rou7 byo7sod min el-rou7 el-7ayet el-abadiyye.
W-ma nmell min 3amal el-kheyr, eza ma staslamna eja 2atf el-zar3 bi-wa2to.
W-ma zel 3enna wa2et, khallina na3mil mni7 ma3 kell el-nes, w-khsouse ma3 ekhwetna bel-imen.
Shoufo el-7rouf yalle 3am bekteba bi-2ide shou kbire.
Hal-ashkhas yalle baddon yshoufo 7alon bi-jesmon henne yalle byeferdo 3leykon el-khatn, w-hadafon yeherbo min el-edtihad kermel salib el-MASI7,
li2anno yalle makhtounin henne bi-zeton ma byemsho 7asab el-shari3a, bass baddon enkon tenkhetno ta-yshoufo 7alon bi-jesmkon.
Bass ana ma beftekhir ella bi-salib RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7. Bi-shakhso sar el-3alam masloub bennesbe ele, w-sert ana masloub bennesbe lal-3alam.
La el-khatn wala 3adam el-khatn byenfa3 el-2ensen, yalle byenfa3o houe enno ykoun khali2a jdide.
Wel-salem wel-ra7me la-yalle byemsho bi-hayda el-tari2, w-la-Isra2il ALLAH.
Ma 7ada ynaghesle 7ayete min ba3d halla2, li2anno be7mol bi-jesme 3alemet YASOU3.
Ne3met RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7, tkoun ma3 rou7kon, ya ekhewte. Ãmin.
Min Boulos, rasoul el-MASI7 YASOU3 bi-iradet ALLAH, lal-ekhwe el-2eddisin yalle bi-Afasos, el-mou2minin bel-MASI7 YASOU3.
Elkon el-ne3me wel-salem min ALLAH bayyna w-min el-RAB YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Yetberak ALLAH bayy RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7, berakna bel-MASI7 kell barake rou7iyye w-samawiyye,
w-na'2ena abl te2sis el-3alam ta-nkoun 3endo 2eddisin ma fina 3ayb bel-ma7abbe,
w-ken min zamen 2arrar enno yetbannena bi-YASOU3 el-MASI7 min ba3d ma shef enno hal-shi mni7,
ta-neshkor ne3emto yalle 3atana hiye bi-2ebno el-7abib.
W-bi-dammo fadena, ye3ne khatayana nghafaro, min ketr ghena ne3emto
yalle dafa2a 3leyna bi-kell shi fiya min 7ekme w-ma3rife,
w-kashafelna 3an iradto yalle 2arrar bi-nafso enno y7a'2e2a,
lamma btektemil el-azmine, se3eta byejma3 bel-MASI7 kell shi, enn ken bel-sama aw 3al-ard.
W-ALLAH yalle bya3mil kell shi 7asab iradto, khtarna, 7asab tedbiro, bel-MASI7
ta-nmajjdo, ne7na yalle 7attayna rajena min zamen bel-MASI7.
W-ento kamen, lamma sme3to kalem el-7a2, ye3ne injil khalaskon, w-2ãmanto, nkhatamto bel-ROU7 el-2ODOS el-maw3oudin fih,
hal-ROU7 yalle houe ra3boun wertetna, lal-wa2et yalle fih ALLAH byefdina ta-nsabb7o w-nmajjdo.
Kermel hek, lamma sme3t bi-imenkon bel-RAB YASOU3 w-bi-ma7abbetkon la-kell el-ekhwe el-2eddisin,
sert eshkor ALLAH kermelkon w-bezkerkon bi-salate
w-betlob min Ileh RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7, el-Ãb bayy el-majd, enno ya3tikon rou7 7ekme wel-wa7e ta-tsiro ta3erfouh kell el-ma3rife,
w-enno ynawwir 2loubkon ta-ta3erfo 3ala ayya raja 3am yed3ikon w-ayya majd ra7 tourato ma3 el-2eddisin
w-ayya 2ouwwe 3azeeme fo2 el-tabi3a 3am teshteghil kermelna ne7na el-mou2minin w-hiye edrit ALLAH w-jabarouto
yalle azhara bel-MASI7 lamma 2awwamo min el-mawt w-7atto 3a-yameeno bel-sama,
fo2 kell ri2ase w-soultan w-2ouwwe w-siyede, fo2 kell esm byetsamma, mish bass bi-hal-3alam, 7atta bel-3alam el-jeye kamen,
w-khalla kell shi ta7t ejrey w-7atto fo2 kell shi, ras lal-knise
yalle hiye jesmo w-kmelto, w-houe yalle bimalle el-kell bel-kell.
Bel-mãde kento mawta bi-znoubkon w-khatayakon
yalle kento 3am ta3mlouwa bi-7asab touro2 hal-3alam, khad3in la-ra2is el-2ouwwet el-sherreera bel-fada, ye3ne el-rou7 yalle byet7akkam halla2 bel-metmarrdin 3ala ALLAH.
W-kenna ne7na kellna min hal-ashkhas 3eyshin bi-shahawet jesmna le7'2in raghabeto w-mouyoulo, kermel hek kenna bi-tabi3etna wled el-ghadab metl be2e el-nes.
Bass ALLAH min ketrit ra7emto w-ma7abbto elna
3atana el-7ayet ma3 el-MASI7 min ba3d ma kenna mawta bi-znoubna. W-ne3met ALLAH 3atetkon el-khalãs,
w-2awwamna ma3 el-MASI7 YASOU3 w-3atana matra7 bel-sama,
ta-ybayyen lal-ajyel el-jeye ghena ne3emto el-fo2 el-tabi3a bi-7aneno 3leyna min khilel el-MASI7 YASOU3.
Ye3ne bi-ne3met ALLAH akhadto el-khalãs bi-wastet el-imen. W-hal-shi mish minkon, houe mawhabe min ALLAH,
wel-a3mel ma ela fadl ta-ma 7ada yeftekhir.
Ne7na khali2et ALLAH, nkhala2na bel-MASI7 YASOU3 lal-a3mel el-sal7a yalle 7addara ALLAH elna min abl ta-nmereson.
Tzakkaro ento yalle ken aslkon mish Yahoude, enno el-Yahoud, yalle bye3tebro 7alon makhtounin bi-jesmon, bisammoukon el-mish makhtounin.
W-tzakkaro ennkon kento yawmeta bidoun el-MASI7, b3ad 3an ra3iyyet Isra2il, ghouraba 3an 3ouhoud ALLAH w-wa3do, ma 3endkon raja wala Ileh bi-hal-3alam.
Bass halla2, bel-MASI7 YASOU3 serto 2rab bi-damm el-MASI7 min ba3d ma kento b3ad.
El-MASI7 houe salemna, 3eml min el-Yahoud wel-mish Yahoud sha3b wa7ad w-haddam el-7ajez yalle byefsol baynon,
ye3ne el-3adewe, w-leghe shari3et Moussa w-a7kema w-wassayaha ta-yekhlo2 bi-shakhso min hal-jame3ten, min ba3d ma 7att el-salem bayneton, 2ensen wa7ad jdid
w-ta-ysale7on ma3 ALLAH bi-salibo, 2atal el-3adewe w-3emelon jesm wa7ad.
Eja w-basharkon bel-salem ento yalle kento b3ad, metl ma bashar bel-salem yalle keno 2rab,
li2anno bi-wasteto, sar fina nousal la-3and el-Ãb bel-rou7 el-wa7ad.
W-hek min liom ento mish ghouraba aw dyouf, ento ma3 el-2eddisin r3iyye we7de w-min ahl beyt ALLAH,
nbanayto 3a-ases el-rousl wel-anbiya, w-7ajar el-zewye houe el-MASI7 YASOU3 nafso,
li2anno 3le houe mashdoud el-bena kello ta-ye3la w-ykoun haykal m2addas bel-RAB,
w-bi-wasteto ento kamen mabniyyin sawa ta-tsiro beyt ALLAH bel-rou7.
Kermel hek ana Boulos sajin el-MASI7 YASOU3 kermelkon, ento ya hal-mish Yahoud.
Akid sme3to bel-ne3me yalle 3atane hiye ALLAH kermelkon,
Keef kashafle serr tedbiro bi-wastet el-wa7e metl ma katabtelkon bi-ikhtisar min abl.
W-fikon eza 2rito hal-shi ta3erfo keef befham serr el-MASI7,
hal-serr yalle ma kashafo ALLAH la-7ada min el-bashar bel-ajyel el-madye w-kashafo halla2 bel-rou7 la-rouslo w-anbiye2o el-2eddisin,
w-houe enno el-mish Yahoud ra7 ysherko el-Yahoud bel-werte wel-jesm wel-wa3d yalle wa3ado ALLAH bi-wastet el-injil
w-ana sert khadim ALLAH 7asab ne3emto yalle 3atane hiye bi-fe3l edrto.
Ele ana azghar el-mou2minin kellon 3atane ALLAH hal-ne3me ta-basher el-mish Yahoud bi-ghena el-MASI7 yalle ma elo 7doud,
w-ta-bayyen la-kell el-nes tedbir hal-serr yalle dall maktoum toul el-wa2et bi-ALLAH yalle khala2 kell shi.
7atta bi-wastet el-knise tet3arraf el-ri2aset wel-soultat bel-sama 3ala 7ekmet ALLAH el-metnaww3a.
W-ken hal-shi 7asab el-tedbir el-azale yalle 7a'2a2o ALLAH bi-RABNA el-MASI7 YASOU3.
W-eza 2ãmanna fih minsir nestarje n2arrib min ALLAH w-kellna thi2a.
Kermel hek betlob minkon enno ma tkhallo hemmetkon tebrod bi-sabab el-di2a yalle 3am 3eniya kermelkon, hiye majd elkon.
Kermel hek ana berka3 eddem el-Ãb,
yalle minno kell Oubouwwe bel-sama wel-ard,
w-betlob minno ya3tikon, 7asab ghena majdo, enno tet2awwo bi-ROU7O, ta-ye2wa fikon el-2ensen el-dèkhile,
w-enno yeskon el-MASI7 bi-2loubkon bel-imen, 7atta eza t2assalto w-trassakhto bel-ma7abbe,
ysir fikon tefhamo ma3 kell el-2eddisin shou houe el-3ard wel-toul wel-3louw wel-ghem2,
w-ta3erfo ma7abbet el-MASI7 yalle hiye fo2 kell ma3rife, 7atta tentelo bi-kell mel2 ALLAH.
ALLAH el-edir bi-2ouwwto yalle bteshteghil fina enno ya3mil aktar bi-ktir min yalle mnetolbo aw mnetsawwaro,
elo el-majd bel-knise w-bel-MASI7 YASOU3 3ala mada kell el-ajyel wel-douhour. Ãmin.
Betlob minkon, ana el-sajin bel-RAB, enno t3isho 3ishe bitli2 bel-da3we yalle da3akon ALLAH ela,
w-enno tkouno metwad3in w-loutafa w-sabourin. T7ammalo ba3dkon bi-ma7abbe,
w-7ãfzo 3ala we7det el-rou7 bel-salem yalle byerbetkon bi-ba3d.
Ento jesm wa7ad w-rou7 wa7ad, metl ma da3akon ALLAH la-raja wa7ad.
W-elkon RAB wa7ad w-imen wa7ad w-ma3moudiyye we7de
w-Ileh wa7ad, bayy el-kell w-fo2 el-kell, byeshteghil fiyon kellon w-houe sèkin fiyon kellon.
La-kell wa7ad minna nasibo min el-ne3me 7asab ma 3atah el-MASI7,
el-kteb bi2oul: "lamma toli3 la-fo2 akhad ma3o m7abis ktir w-farra2 3ataya 3al-nes."
Wel-ma2soud bi-kelmet "toli3" enno nezl awwal shi la-ka3b el-ard.
W-yalle nezl houe nafso yalle toli3 la-fo2 el-sama ta-ymalle kell shi,
w-houe yalle 3ata el-ba3d enno ykouno rousl wel-ba3d anbiya wel-ba3d ybashro wel-ba3d kahane w-mou3allimin.
Ta-y7addir el-ekhwe el-2eddisin lal-khedme kermel benyen jesm el-MASI7,
7atta nousal kellna la-we7det el-imen w-ma3rifet 2eben ALLAH, lal-2ensen el-kemil, la-kamèl el-MASI7,
ta-ma ndall atfal 3am ye2defon el-mawj w-tetmeyal fiyon el-ree7 fa-byekhda3ouwon el-nes w-byekhdouwon 3al-halek,
bel-3aks mne3lon el-7a2 3an ma7abbe w-mnenma bi-kell shi sawb el-MASI7 yalle houe el-ras:

yalle minno houe, el-jesm kello byekhod el-tamesok wel-we7de, bi-fadl kell el-mafasel yalle 3am yet3ewano, 7atta eza kell jez2 3eml sheghlo el-khãs fih, kebr el-jesm kello w-tkammal benyeno bel-ma7abbe.
B2elkon w-betlob minkon bi-esm el-RAB enno ma t3isho min liom w-raye7 3ishet el-wathaniye yalle bifakkro afkar batle,

Lamma fa2ado kell 7ess staslamo lal-foujour, w-nghamaso bi-kell najese bi-faj3ane ma bteshba3.
Bass ento mish hek t3allamto shou houe el-MASI7,
eza kento sme3to fih w-sme3to ta3lim moutabi2 lal-7a2i2a yalle bi-YASOU3.
Shla7o el-2ensen el-3ati2 yalle naza3eto el-shahawet el-khed3a,
w-tjaddado bel-rou7 wel-3a2l,
w-lbeso el-2ensen el-jdid yalle khala2o ALLAH 3ala sourto bel-berr w-2adeset el-7a2.
Kermel hek ma tkazzbo, w-khalle kell wa7ad minkon ye7ke kalem el-sod2 ma3 2aribo li2anno kellna jesm wa7ad, kell wa7ad lal-tene.
W-eza ghdebto ma tekhto w-ma teghrob el-shams 3ala ghadabkon.
Ma ta3to la-eblees matra7.
Yalle ken 3am yesro2 ywa'2if el-ser2a, w-yrou7 yet3ab w-ya3mil el-kheyr bi-2idey ta-ykoun edir yse3id el-me7tejin.
Ma tetla3 kelmet sharr min temmkon, bel-3aks kell kelme sal7a lal-benyen 3end el-7aje w-bitfeed yalle 3am yesma3o.
Ma tza33lo ROU7 ALLAH el-2ouddous yalle nkhatamto fih la-yawm el-khalãs.
Tkhallaso min kell 7e2d w-na2me w-ghadab w-sarikh w-msabbet w-kell el-shourour,
w-3èmlo ba3dkon bi-lotf w-bi-ra7me w-ghfero la-ba3dkon metl ma ghafar ALLAH elkon bel-MASI7.
Tmetalo bi-ALLAH metl el-wled el-a7ebba,
w-3isho bel-ma7abbe metl el-MASI7 yalle 7abbna w-da77a bi-7alo kermelna 2erben w-zabi7a la-ALLAH ri7eta tayybe.
W-bennesbe lal-zena wel-foujour bi-kell anwe3on, ma bili2 bel-2eddisin 7atta yenzakar esmon.
Ou3a el-tafeha aw el-sakhafe aw el-tmeskhor, hal-shi ma bili2 fikon, bel-3aks sabb7o w-shkero ALLAH.
Ento bta3erfo enno yalle byezne aw el-fejir, aw 3abbid el-awthen, ma byourat malakout el-MASI7 w-ALLAH.
Ma yekhda3kon 7ada bel-kalem el-batel, li2anno hal-shi bisabbeb ghadab ALLAH 3ala wled el-3esyan.
Ye3ne ma tetshterko ma3on bi-shi.
Mberi7 kento bel-3atme, w-liom ento nour bel-RAB. 3isho 3ishet wled el-nour,
el-nour bijeeb el sala7 wel-ta2wa wel-7a2.
W-hek t3allamo yalle byorde el-RAB,
w-ma teshterko bi-a3mel el-3atme el-batle, wel-a7san enno tekeshfouwa.
Li2anno yalle bya3emlouh bel-mekhfe mnekhjal 7atta nezekro.
Bass kell yalle nkashaf zahar bel-nour,
w-kell yalle zahar houe nour. W-kermel hek n2al: "w3a ya hal-neyim w-2oum min el-mawt, bidawwe 3lek el-MASI7"
Ntebho ktir keef badkon t3isho, 3ishet ahl el-7ekme mish 3ishet el-jouhala,
w-stafeedo min el-wa2et el-7ader, li2anno hal-iyem kella sharr.
Ma tkouno aghbiya, fhamo shou hiye iradet el-RAB.
Ma teskaro bel-nbeed, li2anno ketrit el-nbeed niheyto el-taysh, mallo 7alkon min el-ROU7
w-t7edatho 3an el-mazamir wel-anashid wel-tretil el-rou7iyye. Rattlo w-sabb7o el-RAB min kell 2albkon
shkero ALLAH el-Ãb shokr deyim 3ala kell shi, bi-esm RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Khda3o la-ba3dkon metl ma btokhda3o lal-MASI7.
Ya neswen, khda3o la-azwejkon metl ma btokhda3o lal-RAB,
Li2anno el-rejjel ras el-mara metl ma el-MASI7 houe ras el-knise, w-houe moukhallis el-knise w-hiye jesmo.
W-metl ma btokhda3 el-knise lal-MASI7, khalle el-neswen yokhda3o la-azwejon bi-kell shi.
Ya rjel, 7ebbo neswenkon metl ma 7abb el-MASI7 el-knise w-da77a bi-7alo kermela,
ta-y2addesa w-ytahhera bel-may yalle bitnaddif w-bel-kelme,
w-2addama la-nafso knise majide ma fiya 3ayb wala taja3eed aw shi min hayda, m2addase ma fiya 3ayb.
W-kermel hek lezim el-rjel y7ebbo neswenon metl ma bi7ebbo ajsemon. Yalle bi7ebb marto bi7ebb 7alo.
Ma fi 7ada byebghod jesmo, bel-3aks bighazzih w-byehtamm fih metl ma el-MASI7 byehtamm bel-knise.
W-ne7na min domn jesm el-MASI7.
"W-kermel hek byetrok el-rejjel bayyo w-emmo w-byette7id bi-marto w-bisiro el-tnen jesm wa7ad."
Hal-serr 3azeem, bo2sod serr el-MASI7 wel-knise.
Khalle kell wa7ad minkon y7ebb marto metl ma bi7ebb 7alo, w-khalle el-mara te7terim zawja.
Ento el-wled, tee3o ahlkon eddem el-RAB, hal-shi ktir mni7.
"Karrem bayyak w-emmak", hayde awwal wassiye, fi ba3d minna wa3d bi2oul:
"ta-to7sal 3al-kheyr w-ta-ettoul iyemak 3al-ard."
W-ento ya bayyet, ma tkhallo wledkon yotla3 khel2on, rabbouwon 7asab wassaya el-RAB w-tehzibo.
Ya 3abeed, tee3o asyedkon bi-hal-dene bi-khawf w-rahbe w-2alb na2e metl ma bittee3o el-MASI7,
Mish bass lamma bikouno 3am bira2boukon, metl yalle baddo yorde el-nes, tee3ouwon min kell 2loubkon ka-kheddem lal-MASI7 bya3emlo 7asab iradet ALLAH.
W-khalle tkoun khedmetkon elon sad2a ka2annkon 3am tekhedmo el-RAB mish el-nes,
3erfin enno el-RAB bikefi2 kell 2ensen, eza ken 3abd aw 7orr, 3ala a3melo el-sal7a.
W-ento ya asyed, 3emlo 3abeedkon el-mou3emale nafsa w-tjannabo el-tehdid, 3erfin enno sayyidon houe sayyidkon bel-sama w-enno ma biseyer 7ada.
W-bel-ekher b2oul t2awwo bel-RAB w-bi-edrto el-3azeeme.
Tsalla7o bi-sle7 ALLAH el-kemil ta-te2daro t2ewmo 7iyal eblees.
Ne7na ma min7areb a3de2 min la7m w-damm, min7areb as7ab el-ri2ase wel-soultan wel-siyede bi-hal-3alam, 3alam el-3atme wel-arwe7 el-sherreera yalle bel-fada.
Kermel hek 7melo sle7 ALLAH el-kemil ta-te2daro t2ewmo bi-yawm el-sharr w-tethbato min ba3d ma tentesro 3a-kell shi.
La-hal-sabab thbato metmaskin bel-7a2, lebsin der3 el-esti2ame,
lbeso bi-ejreykon el-7amès bi-e3len injil el-salem.
W-7melo el-imen ters bi-kell wa2et, li2anno bi-wasteto bte2daro tetfo kell s'houmit el-sherreer el-wel3ane.
W-lbeso khouzet el-khalãs w-7melo seyf el-ROU7 yalle houe kalem ALLAH.
Sallo bi-kell wa2et bel-rou7 w-tlebo min ALLAH w-ntebho la-hal-shi, dewmo 3al-sala la-kell el-ekhwe el-2eddisin
w-ele ana kamen, 7atta eza fata7et temme ta-e7ke, yelhemne ALLAH shou badde 2oul, ta-e3lon bi-jer2a serr el-injil
yalle ana safir elo mrabbat bel-jnazeer. W-tleboule koun jari2 enno e3lon 3anno metl ma lezim.
Yeb2a ykhabberkon 3anne Tikhikos khayye el-7abib w-mouse3ide el-ameen bi-khedmet el-RAB.
Ba3attelkon yeh khsouse ta-ykhabberkon 3anna w-y3azze 2loubkon.
Wel-salem wel-ma7abbe ma3 el-imen lal-ekhwe min ALLAH el-Ãb w-min el-RAB YASOU3 el-MASI7.
El-ne3me tkoun ma3 kell yalle bi7ebbo RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7 7obb ma bizoul.
Min Boulos w-Timothawos, kheddem el-MASI7 YASOU3, la-kell el-ekhwe el-2eddisin bi-Filippi, yalle bel-MASI7 YASOU3, ma3 mtarinon w-shmemseton.
Elkon el-ne3me wel-salem min ALLAH bayyna w-min RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Beshkor Ilehe kell ma zakartkon
w-d3itelkon kellkon bi-fara7 bi-kell salawete
li2anno sheraktoune bi-khedmet el-injil min awwal yawm la-halla2.
Ana 3a-thi2a enno yalle ballash fikon 3amal sale7 ra7 ykammlo la-yawm el-MASI7 YASOU3.
W-min 7a'2e o3tof 3leykon kellkon, li2anno ento deyman bi-2albe, w-kellkon shourake2e bi-ne3met ALLAH, enn ken bel-7abs aw bel-dife3 3an el-injil.
W-ALLAH byesh'had addeysh b7ennelkon kellkon 7anen el-MASI7 YASOU3.
W-salate kermelkon hiye: enno tzeed ma7abbetkon ghem2 bel-ma3rife wel-fahm,
ta-tna'2o el-afdal w-tsiro at'har ma fi 3leykon lawm bi-yawm el-MASI7,
melyenin min thamar el-berr bi-YASOU3 el-MASI7, la-majd ALLAH w-shokro.
W-badde yekon, ya ekhewte, ta3erfo enno yalle sar ma3e se3ad 3ala entishar el-injil
7atta enno khabar woujoude bel-7abs kermel el-MASI7 ntashar bi-dar el-7akem w-kell el-matare7 el-tenye,
w-ktar min el-ekhwe tshajja3o bel-RAB min wara el-jnazeer, w-zedit jer2eton 3al-tebshir bi-kelmet ALLAH bidoun khawf.
Ma fi shakk enno fi minnon 3am bibashro bel-MASI7 3an 7asad w-mounefase, w-minnon bibashro 3an niyye tayybe.
Hol btedfa3on el-ma7abbe, 3erfin enno ALLAH khallene defi3 3an el-injil.
W-hawdik byedfa3on el-ta7azzob fa-ma bibashro bel-MASI7 3an sod2, mfakkrin enno bi-hal-shi ra7 yzeedo min ta3abe ana w-bel-7abs.
Bass ma bihemne, ma zel el-tebshir bel-MASI7 3am bisir bi-kell el-a7wel, eza ken 3an ekhlas aw 3an ghayr ekhlas. Bel-3aks hal-shi bi-farre7ne, w-khsouse
li2anno ba3rif enno hal-shi la-khalãse bi-fadl salawetkon w-mouse3adet ROU7 YASOU3 el-MASI7.
W-kell yalle bitmanneh w-betrajjeh enno ma ekhjal abadan, w-koun halla2 w-bi-kell wa2et jari2 bel-3amal bi-kell kayene la-majd el-MASI7, enn 3esht aw mett.
El-7ayet bennesbe ele hiye el-MASI7, wel-mawt reb7.
Bass eza kent bi-7ayete ba3mil 3amal mouthmer, ma ba3rif shou badde na'2e
w-ana me7tar bayn shaghlten: b7ebb etrok hal-7ayet ta-koun ma3 el-MASI7, w-hal-shi houe el-afdal,
bass eza b2it baynetkon hayda shi daroure ktir elkon.
W-3ende thi2a enno ra7 eb2a baynetkon kellkon kermel el-ta2addom taba3kon w-fara7kon bel-imen,
w-7oudoure baynetkon marra tenye bikhallikon teftekhro aktar bel-MASI7 YASOU3.

El-mouhem halla2 houe enno tkoun 7ayetkon bitli2 bi-injil el-MASI7, 7atta shouf eza jeet la-3andkon, aw esma3 eza kent ghayib, ennkon thebtin bi-rou7 wa7ad w-bitjehdo bi-2alb wa7ad kermel el-imen bel-injil.
Ma tkhafo min a3de2kon bi-shi. Hal-shi borhan 3ala halekon w-3ala khalãskon w-hayda bi-fadl ALLAH,
li2anno 3atakon ne3met enno tet2allamo kermel el-MASI7, w-ma tektefo bel-imen fih,
mjehdin el-jihed nafso yalle sheftoune 3am jehdo, w-halla2 3am tesma3o enno ba3dne 3am jehdo.
Eza ken 3endkon ta3ziye bel-MASI7, wel-ma7abbe 3am t2awwikon, w-eza ken fi mousherake bel-rou7, w-7anen w-ra7me baynetkon,
khallo fara7e yektemil bi-enno tkouno 3ala ra2y wa7ad w-ma7abbe we7de w-2alb wa7ad w-fekr wa7ad,
ma ta3emlo shi 3an mounefase aw tashewof, bel-3aks, twada3o, w-kell wa7ad yshouf ghayro afdal minno,
w-yehtamm bi-masla7et ghayro, mish bi-masla7to el-khãssa.
Kouno 3ala fekr el-MASI7 YASOU3:
yalle, ma3 enno tabi3to ilehiyye, ma 3tabar mousaweto la-ALLAH ghanime,
bel-3aks tjarrad min zeto w-akhad shakl el-3abd, 7atta sar metl el-bashar, w-zahar bi-shakl 2ensen
w-twada3, w-atã3 7atta el-mawt, el-mawt 3al-salib.
Kermel hek ALLAH 3alleh ktir w-3atah esm fo2 kell esm
7atta la-esm YASOU3 terka3 kell rekbe bel-sama wel-ard w-ta7t el-ard
w-yesh'had kell 2ensen enno YASOU3 el-MASI7 houe el-RAB ta-yetmajjad ALLAH el-Ãb.
Kermel hek, metl ma kento ettee3o deyman, ya a7ebbe2e, tee3oune halla2 bi-ghyebe aktar min wa2et kent 7ader ma3kon, w-shteghlo la-khalãskon bi-khawf w-i7tiram,
li2anno ALLAH houe yalle bi7ott fikon el-raghbe enno ta3emlo metl ma houe baddo.
W-3melo kell shi bidoun t2ef2of wala khilefet,
7atta tkouno at'har ma fi 3leykon lawm w-wled ALLAH bidoun 3ayb bi-jeel fesid, bitdawwo fih metl el-njoum bel-sama,
7amleen kelmet el-7ayet, w-hek beftekhir bi-yawm el-MASI7 enno ma shtaghalit w-ma t3ebet 3al-fade.
7atta law badde 2addim damme 2erben 3ala zabi7et imenkon w-khedemto, ra7 efra7 w-hallel ma3kon kelkon,
w-ento kamen fra7o w-hallelo ma3e.
Bit2ammal bel-RAB YASOU3 enno eb3atelkon Timothawos 2ariban 7atta a3rif 3annkon w-ettamman 3leykon.
Ma 3ende 7ada metlo yehtamm bi-sod2 fikon,
li2anno kellon rekdin wara masale7on el-khãssa w-mish wara YASOU3 el-MASI7.
W-ento bta3erfo enno 3endo khebra w-bta3erfo keef khadam el-injil ma3e, metl el-2eben ma3 bayyo.
Bitmanna eb3atelkon yeh lamma a3rif 7ale wayn ra7 sir.
W-3ende thi2a bel-RAB enno eje la-3andkon ana kamen 3an 2arib.
W-sheft enno lezim eb3atelkon Abfroditos, khayye w-mouse3de w-rfi2e bel-jihed, hayda yalle ba3ttouh ento la-3ande ta-yse3edne,
w-houe meshta2elkon kellkon w-3etl hamm li2annkon sme3to bi-marado.
Ken mareed ktir w-ken ra7 ymout, bass ALLAH shef2 3le w-3leyye ana kamen, ta-ma yzeed 7ezne aktar.
Hayda yalle khallene 3ajjel w-eb3ato la-3andkon, 7atta eza sheftouh, terja3o tefra7o w-ana y2ell 7ezne
2balouh ka-khayy bel-RAB bi-kell fara7 w-karrmo amtelo,
li2anno ken ra7 ymout kermel el-MASI7 w-khãtar bi-7ayeto ta-ykammel yalle ento ma ederto ta3emlouh.
W-halla2, ya ekhewte, fra7o bel-RAB. Ma byez3ejne ektebelkon bel-eshya nafsa, hal-shi mni7 elkon.
Ntebho min el-kleb, min yalle byeshteghlo sheghl 3atel, ntebho min yalle bishawwho el-jesm,
ne7na ahl el-khatn el-7a2i2e li2anno mne3bad ALLAH bel-rou7 w-mneftekhir bel-MASI7 YASOU3 w-ma mnettekil 3a-yalle houe bashare,
ma3 enno min 7a'2e enno ettekil ana kamen 3a-yalle houe bashare. W-eza 7ada fakkar enno min 7a'2o yettekil 3a-yalle houe bashare, ana a7a2 minno
li2anno ana khatanoune lamma ken 3omre tmen tiyem, w-ana min sleelet Isra2il, min 2abilet Benyamin, 3ebrane min el-3ebraniyyin. W-bennesbe lal-shari3a ana ferrise,
w-bennesbe lal-ghire ana edtahadet el-knise, w-bennesbe lal-ta2wa 7asab el-shari3a ana bidoun lawm.
Bass kell hal-eshya yalle kent shoufon reb7, liom sert e3teberon khsara kermel el-MASI7,
7atta enno kell shi bshoufo khsara kermel el-reb7 el-a3zam, w-houe ma3rifet el-MASI7 YASOU3 Rabbe. Kermelo khseret kell shi w-be3tebir kell shi zbele ta-erba7 el-MASI7
w-ette7id fih, w-hek ma bitbarrar bel-shari3a, bitbarrar bel-imen bel-MASI7, w-hayda el-tebrir yalle bya3tih ALLAH 3ala ases el-imen.
W-hek bsir a3rif el-MASI7 w-ba3rif el-2ouwwe yalle tjallet bi-2iyemto w-bsherko bi-ãlemo w-bitshabbah fih bi-mawto,
3ala raja enno ana kamen 2oum min el-mawt.
W-ma bedde3e enno 7solt 3a-kell shi aw wsolt lal-kamèl, bass bes3a la-hal-shi barke bousallo li2anno el-MASI7 YASOU3 woselle.
Ya ekhewte, ma be3teber enno wsolt, bass bihemmne shi wa7ad w-houe enno ensa yalle waraye w-emshe sawb yalle eddeme.
Ta-el7a2 el-hadaf, w-ekhod el-jeyze yalle ALLAH 3am yed3ina ela bel-MASI7 YASOU3 ta-nekheda bel-sama.
W-ne7na kellna, yalle meshyin sawb el-kamèl, 3leyna enno nkoun min hal-ra2y. W-eza ken elkon ra2y tene, ALLAH kamen ra7 yekshefelkon yeh.
Bass halla2, khallina netmassak bi-sod2 bi-yalle 7solna 3le.
Tmattalo fiyye, ya ekhewte, w-ettalla3o 3ala yalle 3am yemsho metlna.
2eltelkon 3eddit marrat, w-berja3 b2oul halla2 wel-dmou3 bi-3youne, enno fi nes ktir 3am bi3isho ka2annon a3de2 la-salib el-MASI7.
Hal-ashkhas niheyeton el-halek, w-ilehon bi-batnon, w-majdon bi-3aron, w-ma fi bi-rason ella hmoum el-dene.
Bass ne7na, watanna bel-sama w-min el-sama mnentor bi-shaw2 moukhallisna el-RAB YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Houe yalle ra7 yghayyir jesmna el-ta3ees, w-ya3emlo metl jesmo yalle kello majd, 7asab 2ouwwto yalle bitkhallih ykhaddi3 kell shi elo.
Fa-ezan, ya ekhewte yalle b7ebbon w-beshta2lon w-henne fara7e w-eklile, thbato 3ala kell hal-shi bel-RAB, ya a7ebbe2e.
Betlob min Afoudiyya w-Santikha enno ykouno 3ala fekr wa7ad bel-RAB.
W-enta, ya rfi2e el-ameen, badde yek tse3edon li2annon jehado ma3e bi-khedmet el-injil, henne w-Eklimandos w-be2e yalle se3adoune w-asamiyon maktoube bi-kteb el-7ayet.
Fra7o deyman bel-RAB, w-b2elkon kamen: fra7o.
Khalle sabrkon ysir ma3rouf 3end kell el-nes. El-RAB ra7 yeje 2ariban.
Ma te3talo hamm shi, tlebo shou ma 3ezto min ALLAH bel-sala wel-trejje wel-shokr,
w-salem ALLAH, yalle el-3a2l ma bye2dar yousallo, ye7faz 2loubkon w-afkarkon bel-MASI7 YASOU3.
W-bel-ekher, ya ekhewte, htammo bi-kell shi houe 7a2 w-shareef w-3adil w-taher, w-byen7abb, w-sem3to tayybe, w-bi-kell shi fiyo fadile w-byest7e2 el-mad7,
w-mshouh 3ala kell yalle t3allamtouh w-sme3touh minne w-akhadtouh 3anne w-sheftouh fiyye, w-Ileh el-salem ykoun ma3kon.
Fre7t ktir bel-RAB lamma sheft ennkon rje3to akhiran tbayyno ehtimemkon fiyye. Sa7i7 enno hal-shi ken fikon, bass ma ejetkon el-fersa min abl enno t3abbro 3anno.
W-ma b2oul hal-shi li2anno ana bi-7aje, t3allamet enno ektefe bi-yalle 3ende.
Ana ba3rif 3ish bel-di2a, metl ma ba3rif 3ish merte7, w-bi-kell el-zrouf, khtabaret el-shaba3 wel-jou3, wel-faraj wel-di2a,
w-ana edir et7ammal kell shi bi-yalle bi2awwine.
W-ma3 hayda w-kello 3melto mni7 enno tsherkoune bi-me7ente.
W-ento bta3erfo, ya ahl Filippi, enno, lamma ballashet bel-tebshir, wel-bideye kenit bi-Makdouniyye, wala knise sheraketne bi-7seb el-akhd wel-3ata ella ento wa7dkon.
7atta lamma kent bi-Tasalouniki ba3attoule marra w-marteyn yalle 7tajtello.
B2oul hal-shi mish li2anno berghab bel-hadeya, bass li2anno badde shouf el-reb7 3am yzeed bi-7sebkon.
3ende halla2 kell shi ana bi-7aje elo, w-ziyede. Sert mba7ba7 min ba3d yalle ba3attoule yeh ma3 Apafroditos, hol metl 3otr ree7to tayybe, w-zabi7a bye2bala ALLAH w-byefra7 fiya.
W-ALLAH byouwfe 7ajetkon kella 7asab gheneh el-3azeem bel-MASI7 YASOU3.
El-majd la-ALLAH bayyna la-abad el-douhour. Ãmin.
Sallmo 3ala kell el-ekhwe el-2eddisin bel-MASI7 YASOU3. Bisallmo 3leykon el-ekhwe yalle ma3e.
Bisallmo 3leykon kell el-ekhwe el-2eddisin hon, w-khsousan yalle henne min 7eshyet el-2aysar.
W-ne3met el-RAB YASOU3 el-MASI7 tkoun ma3 rou7kon.
Min Boulos Rasoul el-MASI7 YASOU3 bi-iradet ALLAH w-min khayyna Timothawos
lal-2eddisin yalle bi-Colossi, el-ekhwe el-mou2minin bel-MASI7. Elkon el-ne3me wel-salem min ALLAH bayyna.
Mneshkor ALLAH bayy RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7, kell ma sallayna kermelkon,
3ala yalle wossilna 3an imenkon bel-MASI7 YASOU3 w-ma7abbetkon la-kell el-ekhwe el-2eddisin
kermel el-raja yalle 7addaro ALLAH elkon bel-sama, el-raja yalle sme3to fih min abl, bi-kelmet el-7a2, ye3ne bel-injil
yalle wossilkon metl ma wossil lal-3alam kello, w-sar yethmor w-yenteshir fih metl ma 3am yethmor w-yenteshir baynetkon min wa2et ma sme3to bi-ne3met ALLAH w-3reftouwa kell el-ma3rife.
W-hal shi t3allamtouh min Abafras, rfi2na el-7abib bel-khedme la-ALLAH wel-khadim el-ameen lal-MASI7 3endkon.
W-houe yalle khabbarna addeysh el-ROU7 el-2ODOS 7atit fikon ma7abbe.
Kermel hek minsalle bi-kell wa2et kermelkon, min wa2et ma sme3na hal-shi 3annkon, w-mnes2al ALLAH enno ymallikon bi-ma3rifet iradto, w-bel-7ekme wel-fehm el-rou7e,
7atta t3isho bi-7ayetkon metl ma bili2 lal-RAB w-byordih kell el-rida w-btethemro kell 3amal sale7 w-btekbaro bi-ma3rifet ALLAH,
w-edrto yalle kella majd, ta3tikon kell shi fi 2ouwwe, ta-tet7ammalo bi-fara7 kell shi bi-kell thabet w-sabr,
w-teshekro el-Ãb li2anno 3atakon el-7a2 ennkon tourato bi-malakout el-nour ma3 el-2eddisin.
Houe yalle khallasna min soultet el-zalam w-na2alna la-malakout 2ebno el-7abib,
yalle fadena, ye3ne ghafarelna el-khataya.
Houe souret ALLAH yalle ma byenshef bel-3ayn, el-mawloud abl kell el-khali2a.
Bi-wasteto khala2 ALLAH kell shi bel-sama w-3al-ard, yalle byenshef w-yalle ma byenshef: enn keno as7ab 3arsh aw siyede aw ri2ase aw soulta. Bi-wasteto w-kermelo khala2 ALLAH kell shi.
Ken abl kell shi w-bi-wasteto byetkawwan kell shi.
Houe ras el-jesm, ye3ne ras el-knise, w-houe el-bideye w-awwal el-2eymin min bayn el-mawta, ta-ykoun el-awwal bi-kell shi,
li2anno ALLAH arad enno ykoun 7ader bi-kell oulouhto bi-2ebno.
W-enno ysale7 bi-wasteto kell shi 3al-ard w-bel-sama, w-bi-dammo 3ala el-salib t7a'2a2 el-salem.
Min abl kento ghouraba 3an ALLAH w-a3de2 elo bi-afkarkon w-a3melkon el-3atle,
bass halla2 sala7kon bi-jesm el-MASI7 el-bashare, lamma sallamo lal-mawt ta-tou2afo eddemo 2eddisin bidoun zanb wala lawm,
7atta tethbato bel-imen reskhin mish mza3za3in wala btet7awwalo 3an raja el-injil yalle sme3to fih w-wossil la-kell khali2a ta7t el-sama, w-sert ana Boulos khadim elo.
W-ana halla2 befra7 bel-ãlem yalle b3aniya kermelkon, ta-kammil bi-jesme yalle ba3do na2is min ãlam el-MASI7 kermel jesmo yalle houe el-knise
yalle sert khadim ela bi-tedbir min ALLAH kermelkon, w-bkhalle kelmet ALLAH ma3roufe kell el-ma3rife,
w-hiye el-serr yalle katamo ALLAH toul el-douhour wel-ajyel w-kashafo halla2 la-2eddisino
yalle arad ALLAH elon enno ya3erfo addeysh ken hal-serr ghane w-kello majd 3end el-mish Yahoud, ye3ne enno el-MASI7 fikon w-houe raja el-majd.
Hal-serr yalle 3am minbasher fih kell el-nes w-min3allemon bi-kell 7ekme ta-nkhalle kell 2ensen kemil bel-MASI7.
W-kermel hek bet3ab w-bjehid bi-fadl edrto yalle bteshteghil fiyye bi-2ouwwe.
W-b7ebb ennkon ta3erfo addeysh ena bjehid kermelkon w-kermel yalle henne bi-Lawdikiyya w-kermel el-be2yin yalle ma shefo wejje,
ta-tet2awwa 2loubon w-tekbar el-ma7abbe bayneton, w-hek byousalo la-a3la daraje min el-fahm el-kemil bi-kell shi fi ghena, w-bikhalliyon ya3erfo serr ALLAH, ye3ne el-MASI7,
yalle mkhazzane fih kell knouz el-7ekme wel-ma3rife.
B2oul hal-shi ta-ma yekhda3kon 7ada bel-kalem el-ma3soul.
Ma3 enno ana ghayib 3annkon bi-jesme, ana ma3kon bel-rou7, befra7 bi-yalle 3am shoufo fikon min nizam w-thabet bel-imen bel-MASI7.
Kammlo tari2kon ma3 el-RAB YASOU3 el-MASI7 metl ma ballashto,
m2assalin reskhin fih, thebtin bel-imen yalle t3allamtouh, w-3am teshekro ALLAH min kell 2albkon.
Ou3a 7ada y2assir 3leykon bel-falsafe wel-ghourour el-batel, el-2eyim 3ala ta2aleed el-bashar w-mabede2 el-3alam, mish 3ala el-MASI7.
Li2anno bel-MASI7, ka-bashar, bit7ell el-oulouha bi-kell oulouhiyyeta,
w-fih btousalo lal-kamèl. Houe ras kell ri2ase rou7aniyye w-soulta.
W-bel-MASI7 ken khatnkon khatn, mish bi-2iden bashariyye, ken khatn shel jesm el-khataya el-bashare, w-hayda houe khatn el-MASI7.
Ento lamma t3ammadto bel-MASI7 ndafanto ma3o w-2emto ma3o kamen, li2annkon 2ãmanto bi-edrit ALLAH yalle 2awwamo min el-mawt.
Kento mawta bi-khatayakon w-bi-kawnkon mish makhtounin bel-jesm, w-3atakon ALLAH el-7ayet ma3 el-MASI7 w-ghafar kell khatayana.
W-ma7a el-sakk yalle a7kemo doddna w-shelo 3anna w-masmaro 3al-salib,
w-shel as7ab el-ri2ase wel-soulta w-fada7on eddem el-kell, w-jarron warah bi-mawkab salibo el-mountaser.
Ma 7ada ye7kom 3leykon bi-khsous el-2akl wel-sherb aw bi-khsous el-a3yed wel-sboute,
hayda kello manno ella khyel yalle ra7 ysir, baynama el-7a2i2a hiye bel-MASI7.
W-ma tkhallo 7ada ye7remkon min el-intisar bi-sabab nes 3endon lezzit el-tawado3 wel-ta3abbod lal-maleyke w-rou2a bishoufouha, w-mentefkhin bel-kebriya w-tefkir bashare batel,
mish metmasskin bel-ras, w-houe yalle minno byet2awwa el-jesm kello w-byetmesak bel-awsal wel-mafasel ta-yenma metl ma birid ALLAH.
W-ma zelkon metto ma3 el-MASI7 w-tkhallasto min mabede2 el-3alam, leysh ba3dkon ka2annkon 3ayshin bel-3alam? Leysh 3am tokhda3o la-metl hal-a7kem:
"ma telmos, ma tdou2, ma tekhod",
w-hiye kella eshya bitzoul ne7na w-3am nesta3melon? Hayde a7kem w-ta3alim bashariyye,
ela zawaher el-7ekme bi-ma enno fiya 3ibedet el-zet w-khoushou3 w-2ahr lal-jesm, bass ma ela 2ime bi-dabt shahawet el-jesm.
W-eza kento 2emto ma3 el-MASI7, tlobo el-eshya yalle bel-sama matra7 ma el-MASI7 2e3id 3an yameen ALLAH.
Htammo bel-eshya yalle bel-sama, mish bel-eshya yalle 3al-ard,
li2annkon metto w-7ayetkon mkhabbeye ma3 el-MASI7 bi-ALLAH.
Lamma yezhar el-MASI7 yalle houe 7ayetkon, btezharo ento kamen ma3o bi-majdo.
Mawwto, fa-ezan, yalle houe ardawe fikon metl el-zena, wel-najese, wel-mouyoul, wel-shahwe el-khabise, wel-foujour, w-3ibedet el-awthen,
w-hayde eshya bitjeeb ghadab ALLAH 3ala wled el-3esyan.
Hek kento abl lamma kento 3eyshin fiya.
Bass halla2 tkhallaso min kell shi fiyo ghadab w-na2me w-khabsane w-tejdeef. Ma t2oulo kalem 3atel,
w-ma tkazzbo 3ala ba3dkon, li2annkon shala7to el-2ensen el-3ati2 w-kell a3melo,
w-lbesto el-2ensen el-jdid yalle byetjaddad bel-ma3rife 3ala souret yalle khala2o.
Se3eta ma bi3oud fi Yahoude aw mish Yahoude, wala makhtoun aw mish makhtoun, wala 3ajame aw barbare, wala 3abd aw 7orr, bisir fi el-MASI7 yalle houe el-kell bel-kell.
Ento yalle khtaron ALLAH w-2addason w-7abbon, lbeso 3awatef el-7anen wel-ra7me wel-tawado3 wel-wade3a wel-sabr.
T7ammalo ba3dkon, w-sem7o ba3dkon eza ken 7ada mshakka el-tene. Li2anno metl ma el-RAB sema7kon, sem7o ento kamen.
W-lbeso fo2 hayda kello el-ma7abbe, hiye bitsheddkon 3al-kamèl.
W-khalle yemlok 3ala 2loubkon salem el-MASI7, hal-salem yalle da3ekon ALLAH elo ta-tsiro jesm wa7ad. W-shkero ALLAH.
Khalle kelmet el-MASI7 tenzal 3a-2loubkon bi-kell gheneha ta-t3allmo w-tnabbho ba3dkon bi-kell 7ekme. Rattlo el-mazamir wel-tasebi7 wel-aneshid el-rou7iyye w-shkero ALLAH min kell 2albkon.
W-shou ma elto aw 3melto, khallih ykoun bi-esm el-RAB YASOU3, w-shkero bi-wasteto ALLAH el-Ãb.
Ya neswen, khda3o la-azwejkon metl ma bili2 bel-RAB.
Ya rjel, 7ebbo neswenkon w-ma tkouno 2esyin 3leyon.
Ya wled, tee3o ahlkon bi-kell shi li2anno hayda byorde el-RAB.
Ya bayyet, ma tza33lo wledkon ta-ma yi2aso.
Ya 3abeed, tee3o bi-kell shi asyedkon bi-hal-dene, mish bass lamma bikouno 3am bira2boukon metl yalle 3am yorde el-nes, tee3o bi-na2awet el-2alb w-khawf el-RAB.
W-shou ma 3melto 3melouh min kell 2loubkon ka2anno lal-RAB mish lal-nes,
3erfin enno el-RAB ra7 ykefikon w-ywarretkon malakouto, li2annkon 3am tekhedmo el-RAB el-MASI7.
Bass yalle bya3mil el-sharr ra7 yet7asab 3a-3amalo, bidoun mouseyara.
Ya asyed, 3èmlo 3abeedkon bel-3adl wel-mousawat 3erfin enno ento kamen 3endkon sayyid bel-sama.
Dewmo 3al-sala w-s'haro ento w-3am bitsallo w-shkero ALLAH.
W-sallo kermelna kamen ta-yefta7elna ALLAH beb lal-kalem 7atta nbasher bi-serr el-MASI7. W-kermelo ana bel-7abs,
7atta e3elno metl ma lezim e7ke 3anno.
Tsarrafo bi-7ekme eddem yalle henne barrat el-knise, w-stafeedo min el-wa2et yalle ma3kon.
Khalle ykoun kalemkon deyman latif, ta-ta3erfo keef lezim tjewbo kell wa7ad bi-wa7do.
Ra7 ykhabberkon 3anne Tikhikos, khayye el-7abib w-mouse3ide el-ameen w-rfi2e bi-khedmet el-RAB.
Ba3attelkon yeh khsouse ta-ykhabberkon 3anna w-y3azze 2loubkon,
w-ba3atet ma3o Onisimos, khayyna el-ameen el-7abib, w-houe wa7ad minkon. W-henne bikhabroukon bi-kell yalle 3am bisir 3enna.
Bisallem 3leykon Aristarkhos rfi2e bel-7abs, w-Mercos 2eben 3amm Barnaba, w-houe yalle talabet minkon testa2eblouh eza eja la-3andkon,
w-Yashou3 yalle bisammouh Yostos, w-henne wa7don min el-Yahoud yalle shtaghalo ma3e kermel malakout ALLAH, w-se3adoune.
Bisallem 3leykon Abafras, w-houe kamen wa7ad minkon w-khadim lal-MASI7 YASOU3, ba3do 3am bikefi7 bel-sala kermelkon, ta-tethbato bel-kamèl w-ta3emlo kell shi baddo yeh ALLAH.
W-ana besh'hadlo bi-enno 3am yet3ab ktir bel-sheghl kermelkon w-kermel yalle bi-Lawdikiyya w-Hirapolis.
W-bisallem 3leykon Lou2a el-Tabib el-7abib w-Dimas.
Sallmo 3al-ekhwe yalle bi-Lawdikiyya w-3ala Nimfa wel-knise yalle 3am tejtemi3 bi-beyta.
W-min ba3d ma te2ro hal-risele, b3atouwa la-kniset Lawdikiyya ta-te2raha, w-jeebo riselte yalle bi-Lawdikiyya w-2rouha ento kamen.
2oulo la-Arkhippos: "deer belak 3al-khedme yalle 2belta min el-RAB w-khdom mni7."
Hal-salem bi-khatt 2ide ana Boulos. Ma tenso enne mrabbat bel-jnazeer. W-ne3met ALLAH tkoun ma3kon.
Min Boulos w-Silwanos w-Timothawos la-kniset Tasalouniki yalle henne la-ALLAH el-Ãb wel-RAB YASOU3 el-MASI7. Elkon el-ne3me wel-salem.
Mneshkor ALLAH kell wa2et kermelkon kellkon w-mnezkerkon deyman bi-salawetna,
Mnezkor eddem Ilehna w-bayyna nashat imenkon w-ta3ab ma7abbetkon w-thabetkon 3al-raja, bi-RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Mna3rif, ya ekhewte, a7ebbe2 ALLAH, enno ALLAH khtarkon,
li2anno el-injil 7melneh elkon, mish bass bel-kalem, 7melneh bi-2ouwwet ALLAH, wel-ROU7 el-2ODOS, wel-i3ti2ad el-kemil. W-ento bta3erfo keef kenna baynetkon kermel kheyrkon,
keef tmattalto fina w-bel-RAB w-t3azzabto ktir, w-ma3 hayda w-kello 2belto kalem ALLAH bi-fara7 min el-ROU7 el-2ODOS,
w-serto matal la-kell el-mou2minin bi-Makdouniyye w-Akha2ya,
li2anno kelmet el-RAB ntala2it min 3endkon, mish la-Makdouniyye w-bled Akha2ya wa7don, w-ntashar khabar imenkon bi-ALLAH bi-kell matra7 w-ma ba2a fi lzoum ne7ke 3anno.
Henne bikhabbro keef 2beltouna lamma jeena la-3andkon, w-keef rje3to la-ALLAH w-tarakto el-awthen ta-te3bado ALLAH el-7ayy el-7a2i2e,
w-tentro ta-yeje 2ebno min el-sama, w-houe yalle 2awwamo ALLAH min el-mawt, YASOU3, yalle binajjina min ghadab ALLAH el-jeye.
W-bta3erfo, ya ekhewte, enno majyetna la-3andkon ma kenit batle,
roughm enno t3azzabna w-sabbouna bi-Filippi, metl ma bta3erfo, ken 3enna el-jer2a wel-thi2a min Ilehna enno ne7kikon bi-injil ALLAH w-nkefi7 bi-wejj el-mou3arada el-2awiye.
W-ne7na ma mnou3az 3an dalal wala 3an najese wala 3an i7tiyel,
ne7na mne7ke kalem ka-ashkhas khtabaron ALLAH w-2ammanon 3al-injil, mish ta-norde el-nes, ta-norde ALLAH yalle byekhtebir 2loubna.
Ma bayyanna wala marra enno kalemna ma3soul, metl ma bta3erfo, wala azharna tama3, ALLAH byesh'had,
wala talabna el-majd min el-nes, mish minkon wala min ghayrkon,
ma3 enno ken elna 7a2 nefrod 7alna 3leykon li2anno ne7na rousl el-MASI7. Bass ne7na 7anneyna 3leykon 7anen el-emm 3ala wleda,
la-daraje enno tmannayna law mensherekkon bi-7ayetna, mish bi-injil ALLAH wa7do, li2annkon serto a7ebbe2na.
W-ento btezekro, ya ekhewte, jehdna w-ta3abna, lamma kenna nbasherkon bi-injil ALLAH w-ne7na 3am neshteghil bel-leyl wel-nhar ta-ma nta'2el 3ala 7ada minkon.
W-ento shouhoud w-ALLAH shehid kamen keef 3emalnekon, ento el-mou2minin, mou3amale sharife 3adle ma fiya lawm.
Kenna elkon metl bayy la-wledo metl ma bta3erfo,
wa3aznekon w-shajja3nekon w-talabna minkon kelkon enno t3isho 3ishe bitli2 bi-ALLAH yalle byed3ikon la-malakouto w-majdo.

Kermel hek ne7na mneshkor ALLAH deyman li2annkon, lamma 2belto kelmet ALLAH yalle sme3touha minna, 2beltouha mish ka2anna kelme min el-bashar, 2beltouha ka2anna fe3lan kelmet ALLAH yalle 3am tef3al fikon ento el-mou2minin.
W-serto, ya ekhewte, tetmetalo bi-kaneyes ALLAH bel-MASI7 YASOU3, el-kaneyes yalle bel-Yahoudiye, li2anno t7ammalto min yalle henne minkon w-fikon, zet yalle t7ammalouh henne min el-Yahoud
yalle 2atalo el-RAB YASOU3 wel-anbiya w-edtahadouna, w-yalle ma baddon yordo ALLAH w-bi3ado kell el-nes,
w-byemna3ouna min tebshir be2e el-nes el-mish Yahoud ta-yle2o el-khalãs. W-khatayahon bi-kell marra bitzeed 3an el-7doud, kermel hek byenzal 3leyon bel-niheye ghadab ALLAH.
Bass min meyle tenye, ne7na, ya ekhewte, li2anno b3edna 3annkon wa2et tawil, bel-wejj mish bel-2alb, serna meshte2in aktar enno nshouf wejjkon.
Kermel hek 7abbeyna neje la-3andkon, w-khsousan ana Boulos, marra w-marteyn bass el-shaytan mana3na.
Meen ra7 ykoun rajena w-fara7na w-eklil fakherna eddem RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7 lamma yeje? Mish ento?
Mbala, ento majdna w-fara7na.
W-lamma ma ba2a 3enna sabr, faddalna neb2a wa7edna bi-Atina,
w-ba3atna Timothawos khayyna, yalle 3am yekhdom ALLAH bi-injil el-MASI7, ta-yshajje3kon w-y2awwe imenkon,
ta-ma yetza3za3 7ada minkon bi-sabab hal-me7an, w-ento bta3erfo enno el-me7an nasibna.
W-lamma kenna 3endkon, 2elnelkon enno 3enna me7an ktir ra7 n3ene minna, w-hayda yalle sar metl ma bta3erfo.
W-kermel hek lamma ma 3ad fine ontor, ba3atet ettaman 3an imenkon, li2anno kheft enno ykoun el-mjarrib jarrabkon se3eta birou7 ta3abna di3an.
W-halla2 reje3elna Timothawos min 3endkon w-basharna bi-imenkon w-ma7abbetkon w-2allna ennkon btezekrouna bel-kheyr deyman w-bteshte2o tshoufouna metl ma ne7na mneshte2 nshoufkon,
w-hek imenkon khallena ne2wa 3al-me7an yalle 3am n3ishon, ya ekhewte,
w-halla2, bass shefnekon thebtin bel-RAB, serna n7ebb el-7ayet.
Fa-addeysh badna neshkor ALLAH kermelkon 3ala kell hal-fara7 yalle 3am nefra7o fikon eddem Ilehna?
W-addeysh mnetlob min ALLAH leyl nhar enno nshouf wejjkon w-nkammil yalle ba3do na2is bi-imenkon.
Mnetmanna ysahhel ALLAH bayyna w-RABNA YASOU3 tari2na ta-neje la-3andkon,
w-enno yzeed el-RAB ma7abbetkon la-ba3dkon w-la-kell el-nes 3ala 2add ma7abbetna elkon,
w-enno y2awwe 2loubkon ta-tkouno bi-2adese ma fiya lawm, eddem Ilehna w-bayyna, lamma yeje RABNA YASOU3 ma3 kell 2eddisino. Ãmin.
W-halla2, mnetlob minkon, ya ekhewte, w-mnetrajjekon bel-RAB YASOU3 enno tenmo bi-masiretkon ma3 el-RAB metl ma t3allamto minna t3isho ta-tordo ALLAH.
Ento bta3erfo el-wassaya yalle wassaynekon fiya min el-RAB YASOU3.
W-shou hiye iradet ALLAH ghayr enno tkouno 2eddisin, w-temna3o 7alkon 3an el-zena,
w-bya3rif kell wa7ad minkon keef ye7ros jesmo bel-2adese wel-karame,
w-ma te2wa 3le el-shahwe metl el-wathaniye yalle ma bya3erfo ALLAH,
w-ma 7ada yet3adda 3ala khayyo aw yestghello bi-shi. Li2anno el-RAB houe yalle byente2im bi-hal-eshya kella, metl ma 2elnelkon min abl w-anzarnekon,
ALLAH da3ena mish lal-najese, da3ena lal-2adese.
W-yalle byerfod hal-ta3lim ma byerfod 2ensen, byerfod ALLAH yalle bya3tikon ROU7O el-2OUDDOUS.
W-ma fi lzoum enno nektebelkon 3an el-ma7abbe el-akhawiyye, li2annkon t3allamto min ALLAH enno t7ebbo ba3dkon.
Bi-hal-tari2a ento 3am bit3emlo kell el-ekhwe bi-Makdouniyye kella. Bass mnetlob minkon, ya ekhewte, enno hal-shi yzeed fikon aktar w-aktar,
w-enno tshoufo keef badkon tdallo rey2in w-tehtammo bi-yalle bye3nikon w-t3isho min 3ara2 jbeenkon metl ma wassaynekon.
Se3eta bikoun seetkon mni7 tijeh yalle henne barrat el-knise w-ma bitkouno bi-7aje la-7ada.
W-ma badna, ya ekhewte, enno tejhalo massir el-mawta ta-ma te7zano metl yalle ma 3endon raja.
Eza kenna min2ãmen enno YASOU3 met w-min ba3da 2am, kamen min2ãmen enno yalle meto bi-YASOU3, ra7 yen2elon ALLAH la-3ando ma3 YASOU3.
W-min2elkon yalle 2alo el-RAB, w-houe enno ne7na el-ba3dna 3ayshin, el-be2yin la-maji2 el-RAB, mish ra7 nesba2 yalle meto ablna,
li2anno el-RAB nafso ra7 yenzal min el-sama lamma ye2mor w-lamma ra2is el-maleyke yenfokh bi-bou2 ALLAH, bi2oumo awwal shi yalle meto bel-MASI7,
w-min ba3da mnenkhotif ma3on 3al-ghaym, ne7na yalle minkoun ba3dna tayybin, ta-nle2e el-RAB bel-jaw, w-hek minkoun ma3 el-RAB lal-abad.
Shajj3o ba3dkon bi-hal-kalem.
W-bennesbe lal-azmine wel-aw2at, ma fi lzoum, ya ekhewte, enno nektebelkon 3anna,
li2ankon bta3erfo mni7 enno yawm el-RAB byeje metl el-loss bel-leyl.
Lamma bi2oulo el-nes: fi salem w-amen, bifeje2on el-halek faj2a metl ma alam el-wilede bifeje2 el-7eble, se3eta ma bye2daro yeflto minno.
Bass ento, ya ekhewte, mish 3ayshin bel-3atme 7atta yfeje2kon haydak el-yawm metl el-loss,
li2annkon kellkon wled el-nour w-wled el-nhar. W-ne7na mish min el-leyl wala min el-3atme.
Ma minnem metl be2e el-nes, mnes'har w-mindall we3yin.
El-neymin, bel-leyl binemo, wel-sekranin, bel-leyl byeskaro.
Bass ne7na wled el-nhar khallina nkoun we3yin, lebsin der3 el-imen wel-ma7abbe w-khouzet raja el-khalãs,
li2anno ALLAH ma baddo ynazzil 3leyna ghadabo, baddo ya3tina el-khalãs bi-RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Yalle met kermelna ta-n3ish kellna ma3o, enn kenna sohranin bel-7ayet aw neymin bel-mawt.
Kermel hek se3do w-shajj3o ba3dkon metl ma 3am ta3emlo halla2.
W-mnetlob minkon, ya ekhewte, enno tkarrmo yalle 3am yet3abo baynetkon w-3am yehtammo fikon bel-RAB w-3am yereshdoukon,
w-te7termouwon kell el-i7tiram wel-ma7abbe kermel yalle 3am ya3emlouh. 3isho bi-salem bayn ba3dkon.
W-mnetlob minkon, ya ekhewte, enno tensa7o el-keslenin w-tshajj3o el-khayfin w-tse3do el-d3af w-ettawlo belkon 3ala kell el-nes.
W-ma 7ada yredd el-sharr bel-sharr, bel-3aks 3melo deyman el-kheyr, la-ba3dkon w-la-kell el-nes.
Fra7o deyman,
Dewmo 3al-sala,
shkero ALLAH 3ala kell shi, hayde iradet ALLAH elkon bel-MASI7 YASOU3.
Ma twa'2fo 3amal el-ROU7,
ma testalesh2o bel-noubouwet,
khtebro kell shi w-tmassako bel-mni7,
w-tjannabo kell sharr.
W-Ileh el-salem nafso y2addeskon bi-kell shi w-ye7fazkon mnazzahin bidoun lawm, selmin bel-rou7 wel-nafs wel-jesm, lamma byeje RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7.
W-yalle da3akon ameen byouwfe bi-wa3do.
Sallo kermelna, ya ekhewte.
Sallmo 3ala kell el-ekhwe bi-bawse m2addase.
Betlob minkon bi-esm el-RAB enno ten2ara hal-risele 3ala kell el-ekhwe.
Ne3met RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7 tkoun ma3kon.
Min Boulos w-Silwanos w-Timothawos la-kniset Tasalouniki yalle hiye kniset ALLAH bayyna wel-RAB YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Elkon el-ne3me wel-salem min ALLAH bayyna w-min el-RAB YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Lezim neshkor ALLAH bi-kell wa2et kermelkon, ya ekhewte. W-hayda 7a2 li2anno imenkon 3am yenma ktir w-ma7abbetkon la-ba3dkon el-ba3d 3am tzeed baynetkon kelkon,
7atta serna neftekhir fikon bi-kaneyes ALLAH 3ala saberkon w-imenkon roughm kell yalle 3am tet7ammalouh min el-edtihad wel-di2a.
W-hal-shi bidell 3ala 7ekm ALLAH el-3adel, wel-hadaf minno enno tsiro test7e'2o malakout ALLAH, yalle kermelo 3am tet3azzabo.
W-ALLAH 3adel li2anno 3am yjeze bel-di2a yalle 3am bidey2oukon,
w-3am ykefikon, 3a-yalle 3am tet7ammalouh halla2, bel-ra7a, metl ma ra7 ykefina elna, lamma yezhar el-RAB YASOU3 min el-sama ma3 maleyket jabarouto.
Bi-nar wel3ane ta-yente2im min yalle ma bya3erfo ALLAH w-min yalle ma bitee3o injil RABNA YASOU3.
W-ra7 ykoun asãson el-3azèb el-abade, b3ad 3an wejj el-RAB w-edrto yalle kella majd,
lamma byeje bi-haydak el-yawm ta-yetmajjad bi-2eddisino w-yendehsho eddemo kell el-mou2minin, w-ento kamen, li2annkon sadda2to shahedetna.
Kermel hek minsalle bi-kell wa2et kermelkon, w-mnetlob min Ilehna ykhallikon test7e'2o enno yed3ikon w-bi-edrto t7a'2e2o kell el-mni7 yalle bit7ebbo ta3emlouh, w-ydall imenkon 3a-wahjo.
Ta-yetmajjad fikon esm RABNA YASOU3 w-tetmajjado ento fih bi-fadl ne3met Ilehna wel-RAB YASOU3 el-MASI7.
W-bi-khsous maji2 RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7 w-keef ra7 netjamma3 kellna 7awlo, mnetlob minkon ya ekhewte
enno ma tetza3za3o bi-ser3a bi-afkarkon w-ma tkhafo min noubouwe aw 2awl aw risele mzawwara bi-esmna bit2oul enno yawm el-RAB eja.
Ma tkahllo 7ada yekhda3kon bi-shakl min el-ashkel, yawm el-RAB ma byeje ella min ba3d ma yenteshir el-kefr w-yezhar el-2ensen el-metmarrid, 2eben el-halek,
wel-3adouw yalle ra7 yet7adda kell meen esmo ileh aw ma3boud, w-ye2'3od bi-haykal ALLAH w-ya3mil 7alo ALLAH.
Ma btetzakkaro enno lamma kent ba3dne 3endkon 2eltelkon hal-shi 3eddit marrat?
W-ento halla2 bta3erfo shou yalle mish mkhallih yezhar bi-wa2to.
Wel-tamarrod halla2 3am yeshteghil bel-mekhfe, ka2anno serr, w-byekfe enno yekhtefe yalle men3o ybayyen
7atta yenfada7 el-metmarrid w-ydammro el-RAB YASOU3 bi-nafkha min temmo w-yem7ih bi-wahj maji2o.
W-bikoun maji2 el-metmarrid 3ala 2add edrit el-shaytan enno ya3mil 3ajeyeb mzayyafe,
w-enno yekhda3 bi-7iyal el-sharr el-ashkhas yalle ray7in 3al-halek, li2annon rafado ma7abbet el-7a2 yalle bya3tiyon el-khalãs.
Kermel hek byeb3atlon ALLAH 2ouwwet tekhda3on 7atta ysadd2o el-kezb,
w-se3eta bideen kell yalle rafado y2ãmno bel-7a2 w-le7'2o el-batel.
Bass ne7na lezim neshkor ALLAH bi-kell wa2et kermelkon, ya ekhewte, ya a7ebbe2 el-RAB, li2anno ALLAH khtarkon min el-bideye ta-ykhalleskon bel-2adese yalle bya3tiya el-ROU7 w-bel-imen bel-7a2.
La-hal-shi da3ekon ALLAH bel-injil yalle 7melneh elkon ta-te7salo 3a-majd RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Kermel hek thbato, ya ekhewte, w-7afzo 3al-ta3alim yalle akhadtouwa 3anna, bel-7ake aw bel-mouresale.
W-RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7 nafso w-ALLAH el-Ãb yalle 7abbna w-3atana bi-ne3mto ra7a abadiyye w-raja deyim,
y2awwe 2loubkon w-ythabbeta bi-kell kheyr 3am ta3emlouh aw t2oulouh.
W-bel-ekher, ya ekhewte, sallo kermelna 7atta yenteshir kalem el-RAB bi-ser3a w-yetmajjad metl ma byetmajjad 3endkon.
W-sallo kamen 7atta ynajjina ALLAH min el-nes el-3atlin el-ashrar, li2anno mish kell el-nes bi2ãmno.
Bass el-RAB ameen, w-houe ra7 y2awwikon w-ye7fazkon min el-sherreer.
W-3enna kell el-thi2a bel-RAB ennkon 3am ta3emlo yalle wassaynekon fih w-ra7 tdallkon ta3emlo.
Wel-RAB yehde 2loubkon 3a-ma7abbet ALLAH w-3al-thabet yalle bya3tikon yeh el-MASI7.
W-minwassikon, ya ekhewte, bi-esm el-RAB YASOU3 el-MASI7 enno tetjannabo kell khayy 3ayish 3ishet el-fawda, w-mish meshe 3al-ta3alim yalle akhadtouwa minna.
Ento bta3erfo keef lezim tetmattalo fina. Ne7na ma kenna fawdawiyye lamma kenna baynetkon,
wala akhadna el-khebz min 7ada, bel-3aks shtaghalna leyl nhar w-t3ebna 7atta ma nta'2el 3ala 7ada minkon,
mish li2anno ma elna 7a2 bi-hal-shi, bass ta-nkoun elkon matal tetmattalo fih.
W-lamma kenna 3endkon 3ataynekon hal-wassiye: "yalle ma baddo yeshteghil, ma bi7e'2ello yekol."
3am n2oul hek li2anno sme3na enno baynetkon fi nes 3ayshin keef ma ken, ma 3endon sheghel, 3am yelteho bi-eshya ma btenfa3.
Hal-ashkhas minwassiyon w-mnetrajjehon bel-RAB YASOU3 enno yeshteghlo 3a-mahlon w-yeklo min khebzon.
W-ento, ya ekhewte, ma tkhallo hemmetkon tebrod bi-3amal el-kheyr.
W-eza ken fi baynetkon 7ada ma bitee3 kalemna bi-hal-risele, ntebhoulo w-tjannabouh barke byekhjal.
W-ma t3ãmlouh metl 3adouw, bel-3aks nsa7ouh ka2anno khayy.
W-RAB el-salem nafso ya3tikon el-salem bi-kell wa2et w-bi-kell el-a7wel. El-RAB ykoun ma3kon kellkon.
Hal-salem katabto bi-khatt 2ide ana Boulos. Hayde 3alemte bi-kell raseyle, enno ana bektob hek.
Ne3met RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7 tkoun ma3kon kellkon.
Min Boulos rasoul el-MASI7 YASOU3 bi-2amr min ALLAH moukhallisna wel-MASI7 YASOU3 rajena,
la-Timothawos 2ebne bel-imen. El-ne3me wel-ra7me wel-salem min ALLAH el-Ãb w-min el-MASI7 YASOU3 RABNA.
Talabt minnak, ana w-raye7 3ala Makdouniyya, enno teb2a bi-Afasos ta-twasse el-nes enno ma y3allmo ta3alim bitkhelif ta3alimna,
w-ma yesma3o lal-khourafet wel-sleelet yalle ma ela niheye, li2anno hal-shi bijeeb el-khilefet w-ma byekhdom tedbir ALLAH el-mabne 3al-imen.
W-hadaf hal-wassiye houe el-ma7abbe el-sadra 3an 2alb taher w-dameer na2e w-imen sade2,
w-hayde fadayel bay3ado el-nes 3anna w-saro ye7ko 7ake batel,
w-ya3emlo 7alon mou3allimi el-shari3a w-henne ma byefhamo yalle 3am bi2oulouh w-yalle 3am bi2akkdouh.
W-ne7na mna3rif enno el-shari3a mni7a la-yalle bitabbi2a ka-shari3a,
li2anno mna3rif enno el-shari3a manna lal-abrar, hiye lal-3asyeen wel-metmarrdin, lal-foujjar wel-khatyeen, lal-ashrar wel-nejsin, la-yalle 2atalo bayyeton w-emmeton, w-2atalo el-nes,
la-yalle byezno w-yalle 3endon shouzouz jense, la-tejjar el-3abeed wel-kezzebin w-yalle bye7elfo bel-kezb, w-la-kell yalle bikhelfo el-ta3lim el-mazbout
yalle byettaba2 ma3 injil ALLAH el-moubarak, elo el-majd, hal-injil yalle n7att amene bayn 2ideyye.
Beshkor el-MASI7 YASOU3 RABNA yalle 2awwene w-3tabarne ameen, w-da3ane la-khedemto,
ana yalle jaddafet 3le w-edtahadto w-shatamto min abl, bass ALLAH ra7amne li2anno kent 3am a3mil hal-shi 3an jahl w-ma kent ba3d mou2min,
bass ne3met RABNA wel-imen wel-ma7abbe yalle bel-MASI7 YASOU3 fado 3leyye.
Hal-kelme sad2a w-btest7e2 enno el-kell ye2balouwa 2ouboul kemil, lamma bit2oul enno el-MASI7 YASOU3 eja 3al-3alam ta-ykhallis el-khatyeen, w-ana awwalon.
Bass el-MASI7 YASOU3 ra7amne ta-ybayyen toulet belo fiyye ana bel-awwal w-ya3mil minne matal la-yalle ra7 y2ãmno fih kermel el-7ayet el-abadiyye.
W-lal-Malik el-azale, el-Ileh el-Wa7ad yalle ma byenshef wala byefna, kell ekram w-majd la-abad el-abidin. Ãmin.
Bsallmak, ya Timothawos 2ebne, hal-wassiye 7asab el-noubouwet yalle n2alo 3annak min abl, ta-teb2a testalhemon enta w-3am tkefi7 kife7ak el-rou7e
bel-imen wel-dameer el-na2e yalle ba3d el-nes rafadouwon, w-nkasaret fiyon safinet el-imen.
Min bayn hal-ashkhas Himinayos wel-Eskandar yalle sallamton lal-shaytan ta-yet3allamo enno ma yjaddfo.
Abl kell shi betlob minkon enno tsallo w-tetolbo w-tetrajjo w-teshkro ALLAH kermel kell el-nes,
w-kermel el-moulouk w-as7ab el-soulta, ta-n3ish el-7ayet 3a-rawa2 bi-kell ta2wa w-karame, w-belna merte7.
Kawn hal-shi mni7 w-ma2boul 3end ALLAH moukhallisna
yalle baddo ykhallis kell el-nes ta-yousalo la-ma3rifet el-7a2,
li2anno ALLAH wa7ad, wel-waseet bayn ALLAH wel-nes wa7ad houe el-MASI7 YASOU3 el-2ensen
yalle 2addam nafso fedye la-kell el-nes. Wel-shahede 3ala hal-shi tammet bi-wa2ta,
w-la-ela 3emelne ALLAH moubasher w-rasoul w-mou3allim lal-mish Yahoud bel-imen wel-7a2, 3am 2oul el-7a2 w-ma 3am kazzeb.
W-badde enno el-rjel ysallo wayn ma ken, w-y3allo 2ideyon na2iyye sawb el-sama bidoun ghadab wala khilef.
W-badde enno telbos el-mara tyeb fiya 7eshme w-enno tetzayyan bel-7aya wel-razene, mish bel-sha3r el-majdoul wel dahab aw el-loulou aw el-tyeb el-fekhra,
khalliya tetzayyan bel-a3mel el-sal7a yalle bitli2 bi-neswen 2arraro y3isho bi-ta2wa ALLAH,
w-khalle el-mara tesma3 el-ta3lim bi-samt w-khoudou3,
w-ma besma7 lal-mara enno t3allim aw tetsallat 3al-rejjel, matloub minna tdall sekte,
li2anno Ãdam khala2o ALLAH awwal shi w-ba3den khala2 7awwa.
W-7awwa hiye yalle nkhada3et min el-sherreer, mish Ãdam yalle nkhada3, w-7awwa hiye yalle t3addet 3al-wassiye.
Bass el-khalãs ra7 yejiya min el-oumoume, eza thabatet 3al-imen wel-ma7abbe wel-2adese wel-rasane.
Sad2a el-kelme yalle bit2oul enno yalle bi7ebb ya3mil motran bikoun meshtehe ya3mil shi mni7.
El-motran lezim ykoun bidoun 3ayb, mzawwaj mara we7de, 2anou3 rasin me7teshim medyaf, w-edir y3allim,
ma ykoun sakarje wala mashkalje, bel-3aks baddo ykoun latif, ma byekhtelif ma3 7ada w-ma bi7ebb el-masare,
bya3rif ydeer beyto, w-wledo bitee3ouh w-bye7termouh bi-kell shi.
W-yalle ma bya3rif ydeer beyto, keef baddo yehtamm bi-kniset ALLAH?
W-lezim ma ykoun el-motran mebtede2 bel-imen ta-ma ysayter 3le el-kebriya w-yentehe ma7koum 3le metl eblees.
W-lezim kamen enno yalle henne barrat el-knise yesh'hadoulo shahede mni7a, 7atta ma you2a3 bi-fakh eblees aw 7ada ye7ke 3anno bel-3atel.
W-lezim ykouno el-shamemse kamen rasinin, mish bi-lseneyn, wala moudminin 3a-sherb el-nbeed, wala le7'2in el-reb7 el-rkhis.
W-y7afzo 3ala serr el-imen bi-dameer na2e.
W-lezim nekhteberon bel-awwal, w-eza keno bidoun 3ayb se3eta biballsho khedmeton ka-shamemse.
Wel-neswen kamen lezim ykounou razinin, mish nemmemin, mentebhin 3endon amene bi-kell shi.
Wel-shamemse lezim ykoun kell wa7ad minnon mzawwaj mara we7de, w-3am birabbo wledon w-ydeero byouton mni7
w-hek yalle byekhedmo mni7 byousalo 3a-markaz 3ale w-bisir 3endon thi2a kbire bel-imen bel-MASI7 YASOU3.
3am ekteblak hal-risele 3a-2amal enno eje la-3andak bi-a2rab wa2et.
W-eza t2akharet, lezim ta3ref keef tetsarraf bi-beyt ALLAH, ye3ne kniset ALLAH el-7ayy, 3amoud el-7a2 w-aseso.
W-ma fi khilef enno serr el-ta2wa 3azeem: "yalle zahar bel-jesm w-tbarrar bel-rou7, w-shefouh el-maleyke, w-tbashar fih bel-oumam, w-tãman fih bel-3alam w-rafa3o ALLAH bel-majd."
Bi2oul el-rou7 bi-sara7a enno fi nes bi-ekher hal-iyem ra7 yekefro bel-imen, w-yel7a2o arwe7 btekhda3 w-ta3alim shaytaniyye
w-yettekhado bi-khabsanet nes kezzebin n7arafet damayeron w-metit,
3am binedo bel-imtine3 3an el-zawej w-3an anwe3 min el-2akl khala2a ALLAH ta-yalle 2ãmano w-3erfo el-7a2 yeklouwon w-yeshekrouh ALLAH 3leya.
Kell shi khala2o ALLAH mni7, ma fi shi lezim nerofdo, bel-3aks lezim ne2bal kell shi minno w-neshkro,
li2anno kalem ALLAH wel-sala bi2addso kell shi.
W-enta eza 3tit hal-wassaya lal-ekhwe bitkoun khadim sale7 lal-MASI7 YASOU3, mghazza bi-kalem el-imen w-bel-ta3lim el-sa7i7 yalle meshe 3le.
Tjannab el-khourafet el-sakhife w-7keyet el-kbar bel-3omr w-marrin nafsak 3al-ta2wa,
W-eza kenit el-riyada el-jasadiyye btenfa3 bi-shi, fa-el-ta2wa btenfa3 bi-kell shi li2anno fiya el-wa3d bel-7ayet el-7adra wel-7ayet el-jeye.
W-hayde kelme sad2a btest7e2 ten2abal w-tetsadda2.
W-ne7na 3am nkefi7 w-net3ab, li2anno 7attayna rajena bi-ALLAH el-7ayy yalle houe moukhallis el-nes kella, w-aktar shi moukhallis yalle 2ãmano.
Hayda el-shi yalle baddak twasse fih w-t3allmo.
Ma tkhalle 7ada yestakhef bi-zoghr 3omrak, w-koun matal la-yalle 2ãmano, matal bel-tasarrof wel-ma7abbe wel-imen wel-3effe.
Dewim 3al-2raye wel-wa3z wel-ta3lim ta-kent ana jeet.
Ma tehmol el-mawhabe yalle fik, hayde n3atetlak bel-noubouwe lamma 7atto jame3a min el-shyoukh 2ideyon 3lek.
Fakker bi-hal-eshya w-karris nafsak ela 7atta yezhar naje7ak la-kell el-nes.
Ntebeh la-7alak w-la-ta3limak w-dewim 3ala hal-shi, w-eza 3melt hek bitkhallis nafsak w-noufous yalle 3am yesma3oulak.
Ma twabbekh el-kbir bel-3omr, baddak tou3azo bi-lotf ka2anno bayyak, w-3amil el-shabeb ka2annon ekhwe elak,
wel-neswen el-kbar bel-3omr ka2annon emmèt, wel-sabaya 3èmelon bi-kell 3effe ka2annon khayyet.
Karrem el-araml yalle henne araml 3an sa7i7.
W-eza ken shi armale 3enda wled aw a7fed, khalliyon yet3allamo awwal shi enno y3amlo ahl beyton bi-ta2wa w-enno youwfo yalle 3leyon la-ahlon, w-hal-shi byorde ALLAH.
El-armale 3an sa7i7, hiye yalle bitkoun 3ayshe wa7da, rajeha bi-ALLAH, bitsalle w-btetrajja leyl nhar.
Wel-armale yalle staslamet lal-malazzet hiye mayyte 7atta law kenit 3ayshe.
Wassiyon bi-hal-shi 7atta ma yenlemo.
W-yalle ma byehtamm bi-2raybino, w-khsousan ahl beyto, bikoun nakar el-imen w-hayda el-shi aswa2 min yalle ma bi2ãmno.
Ma tsajjel mara bi-sejjel el-araml ella eza sar 3omra sitteen sene w-eza kenit mzawwaje rejjel wa7ad,
w-mash'hedla bel-a3mel el-sal7a, w-bi-enno rabbet wleda tarbiye mni7a, w-sta2balet el-ghouraba, w-ghassalet ejren el-ekhwe el-2eddisin, w-se3adet el-mankoubin, w-3emlt kell 3amal sale7.
