W-bennesbe lal-araml el-zghar bel-3omr ma tsajjelon bi-sejjel el-araml, li2annon eza 7abbo yetzawwajo yemken yestaghno 3an el-MASI7.
Se3eta ra7 yekesro wa3don el-awwal, w-yest7e'2o el-2asãs.
3ada enno ra7 yet3awwado 3a-2ellit el-sheghl wel-tana2ol min beyt la-beyt, w-yet3allamo el-latlate kamen w-yshaghlo 7alon bi-yalle ma bye3niyon w-ye7ko shi tali3 shi nezil.
Kermel hek b7ebb enno el-araml el-zghar bel-3omr yetzawwajo w-yjeebo wled w-yehtammo bi-byouton w-hek ma byeb2a lal-khasm ayya ma2khaz 3leyna,
w-khsousan enno fi minnon dã3o w-le7'2o el-shaytan.
W-eza shi mara min yalle 2ãmano 3enda araml bayn 2raybina, khalliya tse3edon w-ma tetrekon 3al-knise 7atta te2dar el-knise enno tse3ed yalle henne araml 3an sa7i7.
Wel-shyoukh yalle 3am bideero el-knise mni7, byest7e'2o nkarremon marteyn, w-khsouse yalle byet3abo bel-tebshir wel-ta3lim.
Wel-kteb bi2oul: "ma tsakker temm el-tawr 3al-baydar houe w-3am yedros el-7boub." W-bi2oul kamen: "el-shaghghil byest7e2 yekhod 2ejerto."
Ma te2bal el-shakwa dodd sheykh ella bi-shahedet shehden aw tlete.
W-yalle bya3emlo khatiyye wabbekhon eddem el-kell 7atta ykhafo el-be2yin.
W-betlob minnak eddem ALLAH wel-MASI7 YASOU3 wel-maleyke el-moukhtarin enno t7afez 3ala hal-wassaya bidoun ta7ayyoz w-bidoun ma tfaddel nes 3a-nes.
Ma testarra3 bi-7att 2idak 3ala 7ada w-ma tkoun shrik bi-khataya ghayrak, w-khalle nafsak na2e.
W-min liom w-raye7 ma ba2a teshrab may 3al-7ell, shrab shweyit nbeed kermel me3edtak w-amradak.
Fi nes bitbayyen khatayahon abl el-mou7akame, w-minnon bitbayyen min ba3d el-mou7akame.
W-hek el-a3mel el-sal7a bitbayyen minna la-7ala eza sal7a, w-yalle mish wad7a mish moumkin enno tdall mekhfiyye.

Kell yalle henne ta7t neer el-3ouboudiyye lezim ye3tebro asyedon byest7e'2o kell el-i7tiram, 7atta ma yjaddef 7ada 3a-esm ALLAH w-3al-ta3alim. Wel-3abeed yalle asyedon bi2ãmno, ma yestkheffo fiyon, li2annon ekhweton, lezim yekhedmouwon zyede li2anno yalle 3am yestafeedo min khedmeton henne min yalle 2ãmano w-ALLAH bi7ebbon.
3allim hal-shi w-w3az 3anno,
w-eza ken fi 7ada 3am bi3allim ghayr hek w-ykhelif el-kalem el-sa7i7, kalem RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7, wel-ta3lim el-mouwefe2 lal-ta2wa,
bikoun 2ensen 2albo me3me bel-kebriya w-ma byefham shi, mahwous bel-mshera3a yalle bitjeeb el-7asad wel-khilef wel-tejdeef wel-naweya el-3atle
wel-mshera3a bayn nes fasadet 3ou2oulon w-dayya3o el-7a2 w-7asabo el-ta2wa waseele lal-reb7.
Mazbout, el-ta2wa fiya reb7 3azeem eza ken fiya 2ane3a,
ne7na ma jeena 3al-3alam w-ma3na shi, w-ma mne2dar nfell minno w-ma3na shi.
Byekfina el-2akl wel-lebs.
W-yalle byetolbo el-ghena byou2a3o bel-tajribe wel-fakh w-bi-ktir min el-shahawet el-3amya el-mouderra yalle bitgharre2 el-nes bel-damãr wel-halek.
Li2anno 7obb el-masare 2asl kell sharr, wel-nes yalle staslamo lal-masare zegho 3an el-imen w-ta3ano 7alon bi-awje3 ktire.
W-enta ya rejjel ALLAH, tjannab hayda kello. W-tlob el-tebrir wel-ta2wa wel-imen wel-ma7abbe wel-sabr wel-wade3a.
W-kefi7 mni7 bi-ma3raket el-imen ta-tousal lal-7ayet el-abadiyye yalle ALLAH 3am yed3ik ela w-enta shahadtella a7san shahede eddem shouhoud ktar.
W-bwassik eddem ALLAH yalle bya3te el-7ayet la-kell shi w-eddem el-MASI7 YASOU3 yalle shehed a7san shahede bi-3ahd Bilatos el-Bounti,
ennak te7faz el-wassiye enta w-mnazzah 3an el-3ayb wel-lawm la-yawm zouhour RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Ra7 yezhar bi-wa2to. "Houe el-Sayyid el-moubarak wa7do, Malik el-Moulouk w-RAB el-Arbeb,
wa7do yalle ma bimout, el-sèkin bel-nour yalle ma fina n2arrib minno, houe yalle ma 7ada min el-nes shefo, wala ra7 ye2dar yshoufo, elo el-ekram wel-edra el-abadiyye. Ãmin."
Wasse el-aghniya bi-hal-dene bi-enno ma yetkabbaro w-ma yetteklo 3al-ghena yalle bizoul, yetteklo 3ala ALLAH yalle tkeram 3leyna bi-kell yalle mnetmatta3 fih,
w-enno ya3emlo el-kheyr w-ykouno aghniya bel-a3mel el-sal7a, w-ennon ya3to w-ykouno kerama w-ysherko ghayron bi-kheyraton.
W-hek biwaffro la-nafson rismel sebit lal-mousta2bal, ta-yle2o el-7ayet el-7a2i2iyye.
Ya Timothawos, 7afiz 3al-amene w-tjannab el-7ake el-bala ta3me wel-jadal el-batel yalle byeje 3an ma3rife kèzbe,
hal-ma3rife yalle el-ba3d byedde3o enno byemelkouwa, 7atta zegho 3an el-imen. Wel-ne3me tkoun ma3kon.
Min Boulos rasoul el-MASI7 YASOU3 bi-iradet ALLAH, kermel el-wa3d bel-7ayet yalle hiye bel-MASI7 YASOU3,
la-2ebne el-7abib Timothawos: elak el-ne3me wel-ra7me wel-salem min ALLAH el-Ãb w-min el-MASI7 YASOU3 RABNA.
Beshkor ALLAH yalle be3bado bi-dameer na2e metl ma 3abadouh ajdede, w-ana bezekrak leyl nhar bi-salawate.
Bitzakkar dmou3ak w-bizeed shaw2e ta-shoufak 7atta entele min el-fara7.
W-bitzakkar imenak el-sade2 yalle ken mawjoud bi-2alb sittak Lou2is w-2alb emmak Afnika, w-ana wethi2 enno mawjoud bi-2albak kamen.
Kermel hek bnabbhak enno el-mawhabe yalle 3atak hiye ALLAH, 3a-2ideyye ana, tkhalliya 3a-wahja.
ALLAH ma 3atana rou7 el-khawf, 3atana rou7 el-2ouwwe wel-ma7abbe wel-7ekme.
Ou3a tetste7e ennak tesh'had la-RABNA wala teste7e fiyye ana el-ma7bous kermelo, bel-3aks, sherekne el-3azèb kermel el-injil, w-2awwe 7alak bi-ALLAH
yalle khallasna w-da3ena da3we m2addase, mish bi-fadl a3melna, bi-fadl tedbiro w-ne3emto yalle 3atana hiye bel-MASI7 YASOU3 min el-azal,
w-halla2 kashafelna 3anna bi-zouhour moukhallisna el-MASI7 YASOU3 yalle 7att niheye la-soultan el-mawt w-khalla el-7ayet w-3adam el-fased yesher2o min el-injil
yalle kermelo ana t3ayyanet moubasher w-rasoul w-mou3allim,
w-kermelo kamen 3am et7ammal el-3azèb, yalle ma beste7e fih, li2anno ba3rif 3ala meen ettakalet w-boutha2 bi-enno edir enno y7afezle 3al-amene yalle n7attet bayn 2ideyye la-yawm el-deynoune.
Khalle el-kalem yalle sme3to minne ykoun metl mabda2 elak, w-thbot bel-imen wel-ma7abbe yalle bel-MASI7 YASOU3.
7afiz 3al-amene el-sal7a bi-2ouwwet el-ROU7 el-2ODOS yalle byeskon fina.
Enta bta3rif enno kell yalle bi-Ãsia tkhallo 3anne, w-minnon Fijollos w-Harmogines.
Ra7met ALLAH t7ell 3a-beyt Onisiforos li2anno shajja3ne ktir w-ma sta7a min jnazeere,
w-sar yfattish 3anne lamma wossil 3a-Roma la-7add ma le2ene.
Nshalla el-RAB yen3am 3le bi-enno yle2e ra7me min el-RAB bi-yawm maji2o! W-enta bta3rif mni7 addeysh khadamne lamma kent bi-Aphasos.
W-enta ya 2ebne, koun 2awe bel-ne3me yalle bel-MASI7 YASOU3,
w-yalle sme3to minne eddem shouhoud ktar, sallmo amene la-nes oumana ykouno byest7e'2o y3allmo ghayron.
Sherekne w-t7ammal ma3e el-3azèb metl jende sale7 lal-MASI7 YASOU3.
El-jende ma bye3tal hamm keef baddo y3ish eza baddo yorde yalle jannado.
Wel-msare3je ma byekhod eklil el-nasr ella eza sara3 7asab el-2ousoul.
Wel-felle7 yalle byet3ab lezim ykoun awwal meen byekhod 7ossto min el-ghallé.
Fakker bi-yalle 3am 2oulo, wel-RAB ykhallik tefham kell shi.
W-zkor YASOU3 el-MASI7 yalle 2am min el-mawt w-ken min sleelet Daoud, metl ma ana 3am basher bi-injile
yalle kermelo t7ammalet el-3azèb 7atta t7ammalet etrabbat bel-jnazeer metl mejrem. Bass kelmet ALLAH mish mrabbata.
La-hal-sabab bit7ammal kell shi kermel yalle na'2ehon ALLAH, 7atta ye7salo henne kamen 3al-khalãs yalle bel-MASI7 YASOU3 ma3 el-majd el-abade.
Sad2a el-kelme yalle bit2oul enno: "eza metna ma3o, ra7 n3ish ma3o
w-eza t7ammalna el-3azèb, ra7 nemlok ma3o, w-eza nakarneh, nakarna houe kamen
w-eza kenna kheynin be2e houe ameen li2anno mish moumkin yenkor zeto."
Zakkeron bi-hal-shi w-tlob minnon eddem ALLAH enno ma yetjannabo el-mshera3a yalle ma btenfa3, li2anno bitdammir yalle 3am yesma3ouwa.
W-t3ab jehdak enno tkoun rejjel ma2boul 3end ALLAH w-tkoun shakhs ma byekhjal bi-sheghlo, bi3allim kelmet el-7a2 bidoun mseyara.
W-tjannab el-jadal el-sakhif el-ma elo ta3me, li2anno yalle byetwarrato fih bizeedo kefr,
w-kalemon byenteshir metl el-7ayawenet yalle btor3a. W-min hal-ashkhas Himinayos w-Philitos,
yalle zegho 3an el-7a2 lamma ra7o ynedo enno el-2iyeme tammet, w-hadamo imen ba3d el-nes.
Bass el-ases el-mateen yalle 7atto ALLAH byeb2a thebit w-3le khatm: "enno el-RAB bya3rif yalle henne elo" w-"yalle byezkor esm el-RAB khallih yeb3od 3an el-sharr."
W-bel-beyt el-kbir bitkoun el-awene min dahab w-fodda, fi awene min khashab w-fekhkhar kamen, minnon byesta3mlouwon bel-mounesabet el-kbire w-minnon bel-iyem el-3adiyye.
W-eza tahhar 7ada nafso min kell hal-shourour, sar wa3a elo 2imto, m2addas, bifeed rabb el-beyt, w-jehiz la-kell shi mni7.
Tjannab shahwet el-shabeb w-tlob el-tebrir wel-imen wel-ma7abbe wel-salem ma3 yalle byetolbo el-RAB bi-2alb na2e.
W-b3od 3an el-mshera3a el-sakhife, li2anna bitwallid khne2a metl ma bta3rif.
Khadim el-RAB mish lezim ykheni2, lezim ykoun latif ma3 el-kell, w-edir y3allim w-ytawwil belo,
w-yrabbe el-mkhelfin bi-wade3a, barke ALLAH bya3tiyon el-tawbe w-ma3rifet el-7a2,
w-byerja3o la-wa3yon min ba3d ma yefelto min fakh eblees yalle tabba2 3leyon w-7atton ta7t ra7met iradto.
W-3raf enno bel-iyem el-akhira jeye zaman sa3b,
ra7 ykouno el-nes aneniyyin tammi3in met3ajerfin metkabrin shettemin, ma bitee3o ahlon, nekrin el-jmil fejrin,
ma 3endon ra7me, bala wafa, nemmemin met'hawrin sharisin a3de2 el-kheyr,
kheynin we2'7in, el-kebriya 3emiyon, bifaddlo el-malazzet 3ala ALLAH,
metmaskin bi-mazhar el-ta2wa w-byenekroula 2ouwweta. Nes metl hawde b3od 3annon.
W-fi bayneton nes bifouto 3al-byout bel-serr w-byet7eyalo 3al-neswen el-d3af yalle kellon khataya, w-byenjarro la-kell shi esmo shahwe,
sa7i7 enno byesma3o deyman ta3alim, bass ma bye2daro yousalo abadan la-ma3rifet el-7a2.
W-metl ma Yannis w-Yambaris we2fo bi-wejj Moussa, kamen hal-ashkhas 3am you2afo bi-wejj el-7a2. Henne nes 3ou2oulon fesde ma bitse3 lal-imen,
bass ma bye2daro yetmedo aktar min hek li2anno sakhafeton ra7 tenkeshef la-kell el-nes metl ma nkashafet sakhefet Yannis w-Yambaris.
Bass enta kent mtebe3ne mni7 bi-ta3lime w-3eeshte w-2asde w-imene w-sabre w-ma7abbte w-thabete
w-i7timele el-edtihad wel-3azèb w-kell yalle t7ammalto bi-Antakya w-Aykounya w-Lestra. W-addeysh t7ammalet edtihadet wel-RAB khallasne minna kella.
W-kell yalle baddon y3isho 7ayet el-ta2wa bel-MASI7 YASOU3 henne moudtahadeen.
W-bennesbe lal-ashrar wel-dejjelin, hawde 3am yetmedo bel-sharr w-henne makhdou3in w-3am yekhda3o ghayron.
Bass enta khallik thebit 3a-yalle t3allamto, w-sert akid minno, kawnak 3arif 3a-2id meen t3allamto.
Min enta w-zghir bta3rif el-ketob el-m2addase el-edra enno tzeedak min el-7ekme yalle bitwassil lal-khalãs bel-imen bel-MASI7 YASOU3.
Kell yalle nkatab houe min wa7e ALLAH, bifeed bel-ta3lim wel-tefnid wel-te2wim wel-tes2if bi-ittijeh kell shi mni7,
7atta 2ensen ALLAH ykoun kemil mist3edd la-kell 3amal sale7.
Betlob minnak eddem ALLAH wel-MASI7 YASOU3 yalle ra7 ydeen el-3ayshin wel-mawta, lamma yeje houe w-yeje malakouto
enno tbasher bi-kalem ALLAH w-etdewim 3le bi-wa2to w-bi-ghayr wa2to, w-twabbekh w-tnabbeh w-tou3az w-ettawwil belak enta w-3am t3allim.
Ra7 yeje wa2et ma bi3oudo el-nes yet7ammalo el-ta3lim el-sa7i7, ra7 yel7a2o shahweton w-yjamm3o 7awlon mou3allimin ye7koulon 7ake byordihon,
ra7 ysakkro dineyon 3an el-7a2 w-yesma3o el-khourafet.
Ntebeh bi-kell el-a7wal, w-shterek bel-3azèb w-3ish ka-moubasher w-kammil khedemtak 3al-ekher.
W-ana min jihte sert zabi7a damma 3am yseel, w-se3te 2arrabet.
Kefa7et a7san kife7 w-sert bi-ekher shawt w-7afazet 3al-imen,
w-halla2 naterne eklil el-berr yalle ra7 ykefine fih el-RAB el-diyyen el-3adel yawm el-deynoune, bass mish ele wa7de, la-kell yalle shte2o enno yeje.
Ta3a la-3ande bser3a,
li2anno Dimas tarakne 3a-ketr ma houe m3alla2 bi-hal-dene w-sefar 3ala Tasalouniki, w-sefar Kriskis 3ala Ghalatya w-Titos 3ala Delmatiyya,
w-be2e Lou2a wa7do ma3e. Khod Mercos w-ta3a ma3o li2anno bifeedne ktir bi-khedmet el-RAB.
W-bennesbe la-Tikhikos ba3atto 3a-Afasos.
Jeeb ma3ak enta w-jeye el-mashla7 yalle tarakto bi-Terwas 3end Karpos, w-jeeb el-ketob kamen, w-khsousan makhtoutat el-jeld.
Eskandar el-na77as 2azene ktir, wel-RAB ra7 yjezih 3ala a3melo.
Ntebeh minno enta kamen li2anno 3ãrad kalemna mou3arada 2awiye.
Ma eja 7ada ydefi3 3anne lamma defa3et 3an 7ale la-awwal marra, tarakoune kellon. ALLAH yseme7on!
Bass el-RAB we2f ma3e w-2awwene ta-basher w-kell el-oumam yesma3oune, w-khallasne min nyeb el-asad,
w-ra7 ykallesne el-RAB min kell sharr w-ye7fazne la-malakouto el-samewe. Elo el-majd la-abad el-douhour. Ãmin.
Sallem 3ala Breskila w-Akila w-3ala ahl Onisiforos.
Arastos be2e bi-Korentos, bass Trofimos tarakto mareed bi-Militos.
Ta3a 3al-sari3 abl el-shete. Bisallem 3lek Opolos w-Bodis w-Linos w-Klodya wel-ekhwe kellon.
El-RAB ykoun ma3 rou7ak w-tkoun el-ne3me ma3kon.
Min Boulos khadim ALLAH w-rasoul YASOU3 el-MASI7 kermel yehde yalle khtaron ALLAH lal-imen w-la-ma3rifet el-7a2 yalle byetwefa2 ma3 el-ta2wa
3a-raja el-7ayet el-abadiyye yalle wa3ad ALLAH el-sade2 fiya min el-azal,
w-2al kelmto bel-wa2et el-m7addad bel-tebshir yalle houe amene bayn 2ideyye bi-2amr min ALLAH moukhallisna,
la-Titos 2ebne bel-imen el-moushtarak. Elak el-ne3me wel-salem min ALLAH el-Ãb wel-MASI7 YASOU3 moukhallisna.
Taraktak bi-Krit 7atta tkammil tonzim el-eshya el-be2ye w-tersom shyoukh bi-kell madine metl ma wassaytak,
w-tersom yalle bikoun mnazzah 3an el-lawm, w-mzawwaj mara we7de, w-wledo bi2ãmno, ma byettehemon 7ada bel-taysh wala metmarrdin.
Li2anno el-motran, bi-sifato wakeel ALLAH, lezim ykoun mnazzah 3an el-lawm, mish mitkabber wala ghadoub wala sekkir wala 3aneef wala tem3an bel-reb7 el-rkhis,
lezim ykoun medyaf bi7ebb el-kheyr, razin, 3adel, ta2e, byedbat nafso
byetmassak bel-kalem el-sade2 el-mouwefe2 la-ta3alimna, ta-ykoun edir enno you3az bel-ta3lim el-sa7i7 w-yredd 3al-m3ardin.
Sar fi ktir nes metmarrdin, letletin, dejjelin w-khsouse bayn el-Yahoud,
nes metl hawde lezim tsakkerlon temmon li2anno 3am bikharbo byout bi-kemila lamma 3am bi3allmo yalle mish lezim y3allmouh kermel el-reb7 el-rkhis.
Wa7ad minnon 2al, w-houe el-nabe taba3on: "ahl Krit deyman kezzebin, w-w7oush khabithe, fej3anin w-keslenin."
W-hayde shahede sad2a, kermel hek lezim twabbekhon ktir 7atta ykoun imenon sa7i7,
w-ma yetmassako bi-khourafet Yahoudiye w-wassaya sha3b byerefdo el-7a2.
El-an2iya, kell shi 3endon na2e, bass el-nejsin wel-keffar, ma 3endon shi na2e, 7atta 3ou2oulon w-damayeron nejse.
Byedde3o enno bya3erfo ALLAH, bass henne byenekrouh bi-a3melon. W-henne ashrar metmarrdin mish edrin ya3emlo shi mni7.
Bass enta 7ki bi-yalle byetwefa2 ma3 el-ta3lim el-sa7i7.
3allim el-kbar enno ykouno 2anou3in, 3endon rasane w-razene, byetmatta3o bel-imen wel-ma7abbe wel-sabr.
W-3allim el-neswen el-kbar bel-3omr kamen enno yetsarrafo metl ma bili2 bi-neswen byemsho tari2 el-2adese, mish nemmemin wala moudminin 3al-nbeed, bidello 3al-kheyr,
bi3allmo el-sabaya ma7abbet azwejon w-wledon,
w-bikouno razinin, byetmatta3o bel-3effe bya3erfo ydeero byouton, bitee3o azwejon, 7atta ma 7ada yjaddef 3a-kalem ALLAH.
W-kamen w3az el-shabeb ta-ykouno razinin.
W-koun enta matal elon bel-3amal el-sale7, razin w-mnazzah bi-ta3limak.
W-khalle kalemak ykoun sa7i7 ma fiyo lawm, se3eta byekhjal khasmak w-ma bile2e shi 3atel y2oulo 3anna.
W-3allim el-3abeed enno ytee3o asyedon w-yetolbo ridahon bi-kell shi, w-ma y3andouwon
w-ma yeser2o minnon shi, bel-3aks ybarehno deyman 3an ameneton, 7atta ykarrmo bi-kell shi ta3alim ALLAH moukhallisna.
W-ne3met ALLAH, nab3 el-khalãs la-kell el-bashar, zaharet
ta-t3allimna enno ne2ta3 3ale2etna bel-iba7iyye w-shahawet hal-dene ta-n3ish bi-razene w-sala7 w-ta2wa bi-3asrna hayda,
w-nentor el-yawm el-moubarak yalle mnetrajjeh, yawm zouhour majd Ilehna el-3azeem w-moukhallisna YASOU3 el-MASI7
yalle da77a bi-7alo kermelna 7atta yeftedina min kell sharr w-ytahherna w-ya3mil minna sha3b bikhesso bighar 3al-3amal el-sale7.
Hek 7ki w-w3az w-wabbekh bi-kell soultan 3endak yeh. W-ma tkhalle 7ada yestalshi2 fik.
Zakkir el-mou2minin enno yokhda3o lal-7ekkem w-as7ab el-soulta w-ytee3ouwon w-ykouno mist3eddin la-kell 3amal sale7,
w-ma ysebbo 7ada w-ma ykouno meshkaljiyye, bel-3aks, ykouno loutafa y3emlo kell el-nes bi-kell wade3a.
Ne7na kamen kenna min zamen jehhel, metmarrdin, day3in, 3abeed lal-shahawet w-la-kell anwe3 el-malazzet, 3ayshin 3al-khabsane wel-7asad, makrouhin w-mnekrah ba3dna.
Bass lamma zahar 7anen ALLAH moukhallisna w-ma7abbto lal-bashar,
khallasna, mish kermel ayya 3amal sale7 3melneh, bass li2anno arad bi-ra7emto enno ykhallesna w-yghasselna ghasslet el-miled el-tene la-7ayet jdide bel-ROU7 el-2ODOS
yalle afado ALLAH 3leyna bi-ketra bi-YASOU3 el-MASI7 moukhallisna,
7atta netbarrar bi-ne3met el-MASI7 w-nourat el-7ayet el-abadiyye yalle natrina.
Sad2a hal-kelme, w-badde yek tkoun 7azem bi-hal-eshya ta-yalle 2ãmano bi-ALLAH yehtammo bel-a3mel el-sal7a, li2anno hal-shi mni7 w-moufid lal-nes.
W-bennesbe lal-moujedale el-sakhife wel-eshya el-m3alla2a bel-sleele wel-khilefet wel-moune2ashe 7awl el-shari3a, tjannabon li2anno ma byenfa3o la shi.
W-sa7ib el-harta2a bay3ed 3anno, min ba3d ma t2anezro marra aw marteyn,
W-3raf enno rejjel metl hayda bikoun daye3 w-khãte w-7akem 3ala nafso.
W-lamma eb3at la-3andak Artimas w-Tikhikos 3ajjil w-ta3a la-3ande 3a-Nicopolis li2anno 2arraret eb2a kell el-shete honik.
Se3id 2add ma fik Zinas mou3allim el-shari3a w-Apolos 7atta ysefro w-ma yen2ason shi.
W-3allim jame3etna enno ymerso a3mel sal7a ta-y2ammno el-7ajet el-darouriyye, 7atta ma tkoun 7ayeton bala feyde.
Bisallmo 3lek kell yalle ma3e. Sallem 3ala a7ebbe2na bel-imen. Wel-ne3me tkoun ma3kon kellkon.
Min Boulos el-ma7bous kermel el-MASI7 YASOU3 w-min khayyna Timothawos la-Filimon, yalle min7ebbo w-rfi2na bel-3amal,
w-lal-knise yalle 3am tejteme3 bi-beytak, w-la-ekhetna Apifiyya w-la-rfi2na bel-kife7 Arkhipos.
Elkon el-ne3me wel-salem min ALLAH bayyna w-min el-RAB YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Kell ma zakartak bi-salawete shakaret Ilehe
3a-yalle sme3to 3an imenak w-ma7abbtak lal-RAB YASOU3 w-la-kell el-ekhwe el-2eddisin,
3a-2amal enno mousheraktak bel-imen tef3al fe3la, se3eta bta3rif mni7 mada el-kheyr yalle fik ta3emlo kermel el-MASI7.
W-mada el-fara7 wel-ta3ziye yalle 7asseyton bi-fadl ma7abbtak, ya khayye, li2anno 2loub el-ekhwe el-2eddisin akhado fik rou7.
Kermel hek, w-ma3 enno 3ende kell el-jer2a bel-MASI7 enno e2emrak shou lezim ta3mil,
faddalet enno etrajjek bi-esm el-ma7abbe, ana Boulos el-sheykh el-kbir wel-ma7bous halla2 kermel el-MASI7 YASOU3,
bi-khsous Onisimos yalle sar 2ebne bel-imen, ana w-bel-7abs,
w-houe bel-made ma ken yenfa3ak la-shi, bass liom sar yenfa3ak w-yenfa3ne.
Badde reddellak yeh, 2balo ka2anno sha2fe min 2albe,
w-kent 7abeb khallih hon ma3e ta-yekhdemne badelak enta, ana w-ma7bous kermel el-injil,
bass ma 7abbeyt a3mil shi bidoun mwefa2tak, 7atta el-mni7 yalle baddak ta3emlo ykoun 3an tibet khater mish ghasb 3annak.
W-yemken hal-medde min el-wa2et yalle 3asha Onisimos b3id 3annak, ma kenit ella ta-testarej3o lal-abad,

bass min liom w-raye7 mish ra7 ykoun 3abd, ra7 ykoun afdal min 3abd, ra7 ykoun ka-khayy 7abib bel-MASI7, bi3ezz 3leyye, w-addeysh bel-a7ra ra7 y3ezz 3leyk, enken ka-khayy bel-jesm aw ka-khayy bel-RAB.
W-eza kent bte3teberne shrikak bel-imen, 2balo ka2annak 3am te2balne ele.
W-eza ken gholit bi-7a'2ak aw madyoun elak bi-shi, 7sebon 3leyye.
W-ana Boulos bouwfe bi-kaleme, w-hal-shi katabto bi-khatt 2ide w-ma b2ellak enno enta madyoun ele 7atta bi-nafsak.
Eh, ya khayye, 3mol ma3e hal-kheyr kermel el-RAB w-farre7le 2albe kermel el-MASI7.
W-3ende thi2a, ana w-3am bekteblak, enno ra7 tlabbe talabe, w-m2akkad ennak ra7 ta3mil aktar min yalle 3am betolbo minnak.
W-bi-zet el-wa2et 7adderle beyt, li2anno bitmanna enno salatkon yesma3a ALLAH w-erja3 la-3andkon.
Bisallem 3leykon Abafras el-ma7bous ma3e kermel el-MASI7 YASOU3,
w-Mercos w-Aristarkhos w-Dimas w-Lou2a rife2e bel-tebshir.
Ne3met el-RAB YASOU3 el-MASI7 tkoun ma3 rou7kon.
ALLAH min zamen 7eke ma3 bayyetna bi-wastet el-anbiya marrat ktire w-bi-aktar min tari2a,
w-bi-ekher hal-iyem 7ekena bi-wastet 2ebno yalle 3eml minno warith la-kell shi w-bi-wasteto khala2 el-3alam.
Houe shou3a3 majd ALLAH w-soura 3an jawharo, 3am ye7faz el-kell bi-2ouwwet kelmto. W-houe min ba3d ma tahharna min khatayana 2a3ad 3an yameen Ileh el-majd bel-sama el-3aliye,
w-sar a3zam min el-maleyke bi-2adar ma el-esm yalle werto a3zam min asame el-maleyke kellon.
La-meen min el-maleyke 2al ALLAH bi-yawm min el-iyem: "enta 2ebne w-ana liom jebtak" w-2al kamen: "ra7 koun bayyo w-bikoun houe 2ebne."
W-lamma ba3at 2ebno el-bekr 3al-3alam 2al kamen: "khalle kell maleyket ALLAH yerka3o eddemo."
W-3an el-maleyke 2al ALLAH: "3eml min maleykto ree7 w-min kheddemo lahib nar."
W-2al 3an el-2eben: "3arshak ya ALLAH be2e min abad la-abad, w-sawlajen 7ekmak 3adel.
7abbeyt el-7a2 w-baghadet el-batel, kermel hek masa7ak ALLAH Ilehak bi-zeyt el-fara7 aktar min rfe2ak."
W-2al kamen: "enta ya RAB bel-bideye assaset el-ard, wel-sama sheghl 2ideyk,
hiye bitzoul w-enta bteb2a, w-ra7 tebla kella metl ma byeblo el-tyeb.
Metl el-mashla7 btetwiya w-btetghayyar metl el-tyeb, w-enta enta ma btentehe iyemak."
W-la-meen min el-maleyke 2al ALLAH bi-yawm min el-iyem: "23od 3an yameene 7atta khalle a3de2ak ta7t ejrek?"
Henne kellon arwe7 bi-khedmet ALLAH ba3aton ta-yekhedmo yalle byourato el-khalãs.
Kermel hek lezim nehtamm ktir bel-ta3lim yalle sme3neh ta-ma nen7erif 3anno abadan.
El-kelme yalle 2ala ALLAH 3a-lsen el-maleyke thabat sod2a, w-kell meen khelafa aw t3adda 3leya t2ãsas el-2asãs el-3adel.
W-keef ra7 neflot ne7na eza hamalna metl hal-khalãs el-3azeem? Yalle a3lano el-RAB bi-zeto bel-awwal, w-rej3o sabbatoulna yeh yalle sem3ouh,
w-ALLAH ayyad shahedeton bi-3ajeyeb w-a3mel el-edra, w-bel-maweheb yalle wazza3on el-ROU7 el-2ODOS metl ma houe baddo.
El-3alam el-jeye yalle 3am ne7ke 3anno, ALLAH ma khadda3o lal-maleyke,
fi wa7ad shahad bi-ma2ta3 min el-ketob el-m2addase, 2al: "shou houe el-2ensen ya ALLAH 7atta tezekro? W-shou houe 2eben Ãdam 7atta t7ott 3aynak 3le?
Na'2asto shwey 3an el-maleyke, w-rje3t kallalto bel-majd wel-karame,
W-khalleyt kell shi yokhda3 ta7t ejrey." W-ma zel ALLAH khalla kell shi yokhda3lo, bikoun ma khalla shi mish khado3lo. Ma3 enno halla2 mish sheyfin enno kell shi khado3lo.
Bass hayda yalle tna'2as shwey 3an el-maleyke, houe YASOU3, yalle 3am nshoufo mkallal bel-majd wel-karame li2anno t7ammal ãlem el-mawt, w-hek, bi-ne3met ALLAH de2 el-mawt 3an kell 2ensen.
ALLAH, yalle kermelo ken kell shi w-bi-wasteto kell shi sar, lamma arad enno y7adder nes ktir lal-majd, ken shi mni7 enno ykhalle el-shakhs yalle 3am y2oudon lal-khalãs kemil 3an tari2 el-ãlem,
li2anno el-MASI7 yalle bi2addis wel-ashkhas yalle 3am yet2addaso, tnayneton min 2asl wa7ad, kermel hek ma byeste7e el-MASI7 enno ysammiyon ekhwe,
w-bi2oul: "badde e3lon esmak la-ekhewte w-majjdak bel-jame3a."
Bi2oul kamen: "3ala ALLAH badde ettekil", w-kamen: "ana ma3 el-wled yalle 3atane henne ALLAH."
W-lamma keno el-wled shouraka bel-la7m wel-damm, sherakon YASOU3 kamen bi-tabi3eton hayde la-ydammir bi-mawto yalle bi-2ido soultan el-mawt, ye3ne eblees,
w-y7arrer yalle keno kell 7ayeton bel-3ouboudiyye khayfin min el-mawt.
Ma eja ta-yse3ed el-maleyke, eja ta-yse3ed sleelet Ibrahim.
Kermel hek ken lezim yetshabbah bi-ekhewto bi-kell shi, 7atta ykoun ra2is kahane, ra7oum ameen eddem ALLAH, 7atta ykaffir 3an khataya el-sha3b,
li2anno houe nafso tjarrab bel-ãlem, w-sar edir enno ykhallis el-mjarrabin.
Ya ekhewte el-2eddisin el-meshterkin bi-da3wet ALLAH, t2ammalo YASOU3 rasoul imenna w-ra2is kahanetna,
w-houe ameen la-yalle khtaro, metl ma ken Moussa ameen 3a-beyt ALLAH kello.
Bass YASOU3 byest7e2 majd a3zam min majd Moussa metl ma yalle 3ammar el-beyt, 2imto akbar min el-beyt yalle 3ammaro.
Akid, kell beyt elo meen y3ammro, w-ALLAH houe yalle 3ammar kell shi.
W-ken Moussa ameen 3a-beyt ALLAH kello, kawno khadim, ta-yesh'had 3a-yalle ra7 ye3elno ALLAH.
Bass el-MASI7, houe ameen 3a-beyt ALLAH, kawno 2eben ALLAH, w-ne7na beyto, eza b2ina 3al-thi2a wel-raja yalle mneftekhir fih.
Kermel hek, metl ma bi2oul el-ROU7 el-2ODOS: "liom, eza sme3to sawt ALLAH,
ma t2asso 2loubkon metl ma 3melto yawm el-3esyen, yawm el-tajribe bel-sa7ra,
matra7 ma jarraboune bayyetkon w-khtabaroune w-shefo a3mele meddit arb3een sene.
Kermel hek ghdobet 3ala haydak el-jeel w-2elt: 2loubon be2yet 3amya w-ma fehmo tari2te abadan,
w-bel-ekher 7alafet ana w-ghodban w-2elt enno hawde ma bifouto 3a-malakout rã7te ana."
Ntebho, ya ekhewte, enno ma ykoun fi baynetkon 7ada 2albo khabees w-2ellit imeno tkhallih yekfor bi-ALLAH el-7ayy,
shajj3o ba3dkon kell yawm, ma zel ba3dna 3am n2oul "liom" yalle bye7ke 3anno el-kteb, ta-ma tekhda3 el-khatiyye 7ada minkon w-ye2sa 2albo.
Ne7na kellna shouraka el-MASI7 eza tmassakna lal-niheye bel-thi2a yalle kenit 3enna bel-bideye.
Wel-kteb bi2oul: "liom, eza sme3to sawt ALLAH ma t2asso 2loubkon metl ma 3melto bi-yawm el-3esyen."
Meen henne yalle tmarrado 3le min ba3d ma sem3o sawto? Mish henne kell yalle talla3on Moussa min Masr?
W-3ala meen ghodib ALLAH meddit arb3een sene? Mish 3a-yalle khetyo w-meto bel-sa7ra?
W-la-meen 7alaf ALLAH "enno ma yfouto 3a-malakout ra7to?" Mish yalle metmarrdin 3le?
W-minshouf enno ma edro yfouto min 2ellit imenon.
Ma zel ba3do elna wa3d el-fawte 3al-rã7a el-Ilehiyye, badna nentebih barke 7ada minkon t2khar ta-fet.
Ne7na sme3na el-tebshir metl ma sem3ouh henne, bass el-kalem yalle sem3ouh ma nafa3on li2anno ma ken 3endon imen.
Bass ne7na el-mou2minin ra7 nfout 3al-rã7a el-Ilehiyye. W-houe yalle 2al: "7alafet ana w-ghodben enno ma yfouto 3a-malakout ra7te ana", ma3 enno a3mel ALLAH n3amalet min wa2et te2sis el-3alam.
W-2al lamma 7eke 3an el-yawm el-sebi3: "rte7 ALLAH bel-yawm el-sebi3 min kell a3melo."
W-2al kamen: "ma ra7 yfouto 3a-malakout rã7te."
W-eza keno yalle sem3o el-tebshir awwal shi ma feto 3al-rã7a el-Ilehiyye li2anno khetyo, el-be2yin ra7 yfouto.
Kermel hek reje3 ALLAH 7addad yawm houe "liom" lamma 2al 3a-lsen Daoud, min ba3d ma mara2 zaman tawil 3a-yalle ken 2alo min zamen: "liom, eza sme3to sawt ALLAH ma t2asso 2loubkon."
W-law ken Yashou3 fawwaton 3a-rã7et ALLAH, ma ken ALLAH reje3 7eke 3an yawm tene.
W-be2e la-sha3b ALLAH rã7a metl rã7et ALLAH bel-yawm el-sebi3,
li2anno yalle bifout 3a-rã7et ALLAH byerte7 min a3melo metl ma rte7 ALLAH min a3melo.
Khallina na3mil kell jehdna kermel nfout 3a-hal-rã7a ta-ma you2a3 7ada bi-metl hal-3esyen.
W-kelmet ALLAH kella 7ayet w-hiye fe3l, bit2oss aktar min seyf elo 7addeyn, btekhro2 ghem2 el-nafs wel-rou7 wel-mafasel w-nkha3 el-3dam, w-èdra tmayyiz bayn shou bifakker el-2alb w-shou byenwe.
Ma 7ada bye2dar yetkhabba 3an ALLAH, w-kell shi makshouf eddem 3youno w-elo houe badna n2addim el-7seb.
Khallina netmassak bi-imenna, li2anno 3enna bi-YASOU3 2eben ALLAH ra2is kahane 3azeem 2ata3 bi-kell el-sama.
Li2anno ma 3enna ra2is kahane mish edir yeshfa2 3ala do3fna, w-houe yalle khada3 metlna la-kell tajribe ma 3ada el-khatiyye.
Khallina n2arrib bi-thi2a 3a-3arsh el-ne3me ta-nekhod el-ra7me w-nle2e el-ne3me yalle bitse3edna wa2et el-7aje.
Kell ra2is kahane ken yetna'2a min bayn el-nes w-yet3ayyan kermel el-nes la-khedmet ALLAH, ta-y2addim el-2arabin wel-zabeye7 takfiran 3an el-khataya.
W-ykoun edir yo3tof 3al-jehhel wel-men7erfin li2anno houe nafso lebis el-do3f el-bashare,
w-ken lezim kamen ykaffir 3an khatayah houe metl ma bikaffir 3an khataya el-sha3b.
W-ma 7ada bye2dar y7ott 7alo bi-martabet ra2is kahane, ella eza ALLAH byed3ih metl ma da3a Haroun.
W-kamen el-MASI7 ma 7att 7alo bi-hal-martabe, bass ALLAH 2allo: "enta 2ebne w-min halla2 w-raye7 ana bayyak."
W-2allo bi-matra7 tene: "enta kehen lal-abad 3ala darajet Malkisade2."
W-houe yalle bi-iyem 7ayeto el-bashariyye 3al-ard, salla w-trajja w-sarakh bi-2ouwwe w-beke dmou3 la-ALLAH el-edir enno ykhallso min el-mawt, w-ALLAH sem3 minno li2anno ken ta2e.
W-kawno houe el-2eben, t3allam el-ta3a, min el-3azèb yalle t3azzabo.
W-lamma wossil 3al-kamèl sar masdar khalãs abade la-kell yalle ra7 ytee3ouh,
li2anno ALLAH sammeh ra2is kahane 3a-tari2et Malkisade2.
W-bi-khsous hal-mawdou3 3ende 7ake ktir, bass tefsiro sa3b li2anno serto ettawwlo ta-tefhamo,
ken 3endkon el-wa2et el-kefe ta-tsiro mou3allimin, bass ba3dkon bi-7aje la-meen y3allemkon el-mabede2 el-asesiyye la-kalem ALLAH. Ba3dkon bi-7aje la-laban, li2annkon mish edrin teklo 2akl 2awe.
W-yalle byekol laban bikoun tofl ma 3endo khebra bi-khsous el-tebrir.
El-2akl el-2awe houe lal-nadjin yalle rawwado 7aweson bel-moumerase el-sa7i7a 3al-temyiz bayn el-kheyr wel-sharr.
Ta3o ta-netrok el-mabede2 el-awwaliyye bel-kalem 3an el-MASI7, w-n3alle sawb yalle houe akmal, bidoun ma nerja3 lal-mabede2 el-awwaliyye, metl el-tawbe 3an el-a3mel el-mayyte, wel-imen bi-ALLAH,
w-tou2ous el-ma3moudiyye, w-7att el-2iden, w-2iyemet el-mawta, wel-deynoune el-abadiyye.
W-hayda el-shi yalle 3am na3emlo eza ALLAH rad.
Yalle tnawwaro honik marra w-de2o el-mawhabe el-samawiyye w-saro min shouraka el-ROU7 el-2ODOS,
w-de2o kelmet ALLAH el-tayybe w-2ouwwet el-3alam bel-zaman el-jeye,
w-ma3 hayda w-kello sa2ato, mousta7il yetjaddado tene marra w-yerja3o ytoubo li2anno ra7 yosolbo 2eben ALLAH marra tenye w-y3arrdouh lal-3ar.
El-ard yalle sherbet min el-shete el-nezil 3leya 3eddit marrat, w-farrakhet zar3 stafedo minno yalle fala7ouwa, ra7 tekhod el-barake min ALLAH.
Bass eza farrakhet shawk w-3ellay2, bitkoun ma bteswa, badda la3ne w-niheyeta el-7ari2.
Bass bennesbe elkon, ento el-7abeyeb, 7atta law 7kina ma3kon hek, ne7na 3a-thi2a enno ento bi-7ale afdal w-adman lal-khalãs.
Li2anno ALLAH mish zalem 7atta yensa yalle 3meltouh w-yalle azhartouh min el-ma7abbe kermel esmo lamma khadamto el-ekhwe el-2eddisin w-ba3dkon 3am tekhedmouwon.
Bass ne7na min7ebb law kell wa7ad minkon ybayyen enno 3endo hal-ghire lal-ekher 7atta yet7a'2a2 rajekon.
Ye3ne ma tetkesalo, bel-3aks, tmetalo bi-yalle bi2ãmno w-byesobro, li2anno ra7 yourato yalle wa3ad fih ALLAH.
Lamma wa3ad ALLAH Ibrahim 7alaf bi-esmo, li2anno ma 3endo shi a3zam 7atta ye7lof fih,
2al: "ra7 berkak w-ra7 a3tik sleele kbire ktir."
W-hek natar Ibrahim w-tawwal belo 7atta akhad yalle nwa3ad fih.
Wel-nes bye7elfo bi-yalle houe a3zam minnon, wel-7elfen bisabbetlon kalemon w-bi7ott 7add la-kell khilef.
W-kamen ALLAH, lamma arad enno y2akkid la-yalle ra7 yourato el-wa3d enno 2araro ma ra7 yetghayyar, sabbat kalemo bel-7elfen.
W-hek wa3adna w-7alaf, w-henne shaghlteyn sebtin, w-mousta7il enno ykazzeb ALLAH fiyon, w-shajja3na ktir enno netmassak bel-raja yalle t7addarelna, ne7na yalle ltaja2na elo.
W-hal-raja houe bennesbe elna merseye ameene thebte btekhro2 el-sitar.
Matra7 ma YASOU3 saba2na w-fet kermelna, w-sar ra2is kahane lal-abad 3ala tari2et Malkisade2.
W-Malkisade2 yalle zakarneh ken malik 3a-madinet Sãlim w-kehen ALLAH yalle fo2 el-kell, ra7 ta-yle2e Ibrahim el-reji3 mountaser 3al-moulouk w-berako,
w-Ibrahim 3ata el-3eshr min kell shi. W-tefsir esmo, min jehha bye3ne malik el-3adl, w-min jehha tenye malik Sãlim, ye3ne malik el-salem.
Ma 3endo bayy wala emm wala sleele, wala 7ada bye7ke 3an bideyet iyemo wala 3an niheyet 7ayeto. Bass, metl 2eben ALLAH, byeb2a kehen lal-abad.
Shoufo ma-a3zamo! Ibrahim nafso, w-houe bayy el-bayyet, 3atah el-3eshr min khiret el-ghaneyem.
W-ne7na mna3rif enno shari3et Moussa bitwasse yalle bisiro kahane min sleelet Lawi, ennon yekhdo el-3eshr min el-sha3b, ye3ne min ekhweton, yalle henne min sleelet Ibrahim.
Bass Malkisade2 yalle mish min sleelet Lawi, akhad el-3eshr min Ibrahim w-berak yalle ALLAH 3atah el-wou3oud.
W-ma fi khilef bi-enno el-akbar houe yalle biberek el-azghar.
3ada enno yalle 3am yekhdo el-3eshr hon, henne bashar bimouto, bass honik, houe 2ensen mash'hedlo enno 7ayy.
W-fina n2oul enno Lawi bi-zeto, yalle byekhod el-3eshr, 3ata el-3eshr la-Malkisade2 min khilel Ibrahim,
li2anno ken mawjoud bi-shakl min el-ashkel, min abl ma yekhla2, bi-bayyo Ibrahim lamma eja Malkisade2 ta-yle2ih.

W-law ken el-kamèl t7a'2a2 bel-kahnout el-Lawi, w-houe ases el-shari3a yalle tsallama el-sha3b, ma ken ba3d fi lzoum enno yet3ayyan kehen tene 3ala tari2et Malkisade2. Wel-kteb ma 2al 3ala tari2et Haroun.
Li2anno bass yetghayyar el-kahnout, la-bodd min teghyir el-shari3a kamen.
W-yalle byen2al 3anno hal-shi, ye3ne el-MASI7, eja min 2abile tenye, ma 7ada min hal-2abile ken min kheddem el-mazba7.
Wade7 enno RABNA 2aslo el-bashare eja min Yahouza, w-ma zakar Moussa hal-2abile bi-kalemo 3an el-kahane.
W-yalle biwadde7 hal-shi aktar, houe enno el-kehen el-tene yalle byeshbah Malkisade2 ma t3ayyan,
3ala ases intime2o la-sleele bashariyye, t3ayyan 3a-ases el-2ouwwe yalle btenba3 min 7ayet ma ela niheye.
Wel-kteb yalle shehedlo 2al: "enta kehen lal-abad 3ala tari2et Malkisade2."
W-hek betlet wassiyet el-kahnout el-seb2a bi-sabab do3fa w-2ellit feydeta,
li2anno shari3et Moussa ma 7a'2a2et el-kamèl bi-shi, w-kermel hek, ALLAH 7att ases jdid bi2arrebna minno, w-2addamelna raja afdal.
W-hal-shi ma sar bidoun 7elfen min ALLAH. Li2anno el-Lawiyyin saro kahane bidoun 7elfen,
bass YASOU3 sar kehen bi-7elfen min ALLAH yalle 2allo: "7alaf el-RAB, w-ma ra7 yendam, enno enta kehen lal-abad."
W-hek sar YASOU3 kafeel la-3ahd afdal min el-3ahd el-awwal.
Wel-kahane hawdik ken fi minnon ktir, li2anno el-mawt ken yemna3on enno yeb2o 3a-toul.
Bass YASOU3 yalle byeb2a lal-abad, kahnouto ma bizoul.
W-houe edir ykhallis yalle byet2arrabo bi-wasteto min ALLAH khalãs kemil, li2anno 7ayy be2e ta-yeshfa3lon.
Ye3ne YASOU3 houe ra2is el-kahane yalle binesebna, houe 2ouddous bari2 ma fiyo 3ayb w-ma byeshbah el-khatyeen, t3alla la-fo2 el-sama.
W-houe 3aks rou2asa el-kahane, mish bi-7aje y2addim el-zabeye7 kell yawm ta-ykaffir 3an khatayah bel-awwal, w-ba3den 3an khataya el-sha3b, li2anno 3eml hal-shi marra we7de, lamma 2addam 7alo.
W-shari3et Moussa bit3ayyen min el-bashar el-d3af rou2asa kahane, bass min ba3d el-shari3a, el-7elfen bya3mil min el-2eben ra2is kahane kemil lal-abad.
Kell yalle badde 2oulo bi-hal-mawdou3 houe enno sar 3enna ra2is kahane 3azeem, 2e3id 3an yameen 3arsh ALLAH bel-sama,
w-sar khadim la-2ods el-a2des wel-khayme el-7a2i2iyye yalle 3emela el-RAB mish el-2ensen.
W-kell ra2is kahane ken yet3ayyan ta-y2addim el-2arabin wel-zabeye7, fa-la-bodd enno ra2is kahanetna, houe kamen, ykoun 3endo shi y2addmo.
W-law ken YASOU3 3a-hal-ard, ma ken t3ayyan kehen, li2anno fi meen y2addim el-2arabin 7asab el-shari3a.
Bass hawde byekhedmo el-soura wel-ramz la-yalle bel-sama. W-lamma eja Moussa baddo ya3mil el-khayme, aw7alo ALLAH, 2allo: "ntebeh, baddak ta3mil kell shi 3al-shakl yalle farjaytak yeh 3al-jabal."
Bass el-MASI7 7osil 3a-khedme afdal min yalle ablo bi-2adar ma houe el-waseet la-3ahd jdid afdal min el-3ahd el-awwal, li2anno 2ayem 3ala ases wou3oud afdal.
W-law ken el-3ahd el-awwal ma fiyo 3ayb, ma ken fi lzoum la-3ahd tene.
W-ALLAH biloum sha3bo lamma bi2oul: "bi2oul el-RAB: ra7 teje iyem ba3mil ma3 wled Isra2il w-wled Yahouza 3ahd jdid,
mish metl el-3ahd yalle 3melto ma3 bayyeton lamma akhadton bi-2ideyon ta-talle3on min ard Masr, w-ma be2yo 3ala 3ahde, kermel hek hamalton ana el-RAB.
W-hayda houe el-3ahd yalle ba3emlo ma3 Isra2il bel-iyem el-jeye, bi2oul el-RAB: ra7 khalle shari3te bi-3ou2oulon w-ekteba bi-2loubon, w-bkoun Ilehon w-bikouno sha3be.
W-ma 7ada ra7 y3allim 2eben watano wala 7ada ra7 y3allim khayyo w-y2ello: 3raf el-RAB, li2anno ra7 ya3erfoune kellon min zghiron la-kbiron,
ra7 eghferlon znoubon w-ma ra7 ezkor khatayahon min ba3d liom."
W-ALLAH bi-kalemo 3an "3ahd jdid" khalla el-3ahd el-awwal ysir 2adeem, w-kell shi bass ye3ta2 w-yekbar bisir 2arib min el-zawel.
El-3ahd el-awwal ken fiyo tou2ous la-3ibedet ALLAH w-lal-2ods el-ardé.
W-ken fi bel-khayme 2ouda, hiye awwal 2ouda esma el-2ods, w-ken fiya el-manara wel-meyde w-khebz el-2erben.
W-ken fi wara el-sitar el-tene 2ouda esma 2ods el-a2des,
w-fiya el-mabkhara el-mdahhabe w-tabout el-3ahd el-madhoun kello bel-dahab, w-fi jarret dahab fiya el-mann w-3asa Haroun yalle farrakhet w-law7teyn wassaya el-3ahd.
W-ken fo2 el-tabout tnen karoubin el-majd bighatto ghata el-keffara. Bass halla2 mish wa2et enno ne7ke 3an hal-eshya bel-tefsil.
W-bi-ma enno kell shi ken mrattab bi-hayda el-shakl, keno el-kahane yfouto 3a-awwal 2ouda bi-kell wa2et w-ymerso tou2ous el-3ibede.
Bass ra2is el-kahane el-wa7eed yalle bfout 3al-2ouda el-tenye marra bel-sene, w-ma bifout ella ma ykoun ma3o el-damm yalle bi2addmo ka-tekfir 3an khatayah w-3an khataya el-sha3b w-jahlo.
W-bi-hal-shi hayda, el-ROU7 el-2ODOS bidell enno el-tari2 la-2ods el-a2des kenit ba3da mish maftou7a, ma zel awwal khayme 2ayme.
W-hal-tertib hayda houe ramz lal-zaman el-7ader, wa2et keno ba3don 3am bi2addmo 2arabin w-zabaye7 ma bye2daro ykhallo el-kehen kemil min jehhit el-dameer.
W-hiye tou2ous bashariyye 2ayme 3al-2akl wel-sherb w-asalib el-ghassil, w-kenit mafrouda lal-wa2et yalle bisalle7 ALLAH fih kell shi.
Bass el-MASI7 eja ra2is kahane lal-kheyrat el-mousta2baliyye w-min khilel khayme a3zam w-akmal min haydik el-khayme el-awle, mish ma3moule bi-2iden el-bashar, ye3ne ma btenteme la-hal-khali2a,
w-fet 3a-2ods el-a2des marra we7de, 7amel dammo houe mish damm el-tyous wel-3joul, w-jabelna el-khalãs el-abade.
W-eza ken rash damm el-tyous wel-thiran w-rmed el-3joul bi2addes el-mnajjasin w-bitahher jesmon,
keef damm el-MASI7 yalle 2addam 7alo la-ALLAH bel-ROU7 el-azale 2erben ma fiyo 3ayb, addeysh ma ra7 ytahher dameerna min el-a3mel el-mayyte ta-ne3bad ALLAH el-7ayy.
Kermel hek houe el-waseet la-3ahd jdid, 7atta bi-wasteto el-mad3ouwwin yourato el-werte el-abadiyye el-maw3oudin fiya, li2anno met w-kaffar 3an el-moukhelafet yalle 3emela el-sha3b bel-3ahd el-awwal.
Fa-matra7 yalle bikoun fi wassiye lezim nsabbet mawt el-mwasse,
li2anno el-wassiye marhoune bi-mawt el-mwasse, ma ela 2ime eza el-mwasse ba3do 3ayish.
Kermel hek tkarras el-3ahd el-awwal kamen bel-damm.
W-Moussa, min ba3d ma 2ere eddem el-sha3b kell wassaya el-shari3a, akhad damm el-3joul wel-tyous, w-ma3o may w-souf a7mar w-zoufa, w-rasho 3ala kteb el-shari3a w-3ala el-sha3b kello
w-2al: "hayda houe damm el-3ahd yalle ALLAH wassakon te7fazouh."
W-kamen rash el-damm 3al-khayme w-3a-kell adawet el-3ibede.
Li2anno el-shari3a bitwasse enno lezim ntahher kell shi bel-damm, w-ma fi ghofran bidoun bazl damm.
Eza yalle houe ramz lal-eshya el-samawiyye lezim yettahhar bel-zabeye7, la-bodd min tot'hir el-eshya el-samewiyye nafsa bi-zabeye7 afdal min haydik el-zabeye7,
li2anno el-MASI7 ma fet 3a-2ods 3emlouh 2iden el-bashar, houe ramz lal-2ods el-7a2i2e, fet 3al-sama bi-zeta ta-you2af halla2 eddem wejj ALLAH kermelna,
mish li2anno ra7 y2addim 7alo 3eddit marrat metl ma bifout ra2is el-kahane 3a-2ods el-a2des kell sene bi-damm mish dammo,
wa-ella ken lezim yet2allam marrat ktire min wa2et te2sis el-3alam. Bass zahar halla2 marra we7de lamma ktamal el-zaman ta-yem7e el-khatiyye w-y2addim 7alo zabi7a la-ALLAH.
W-metl ma el-bashar massiron enno ymouto marra we7de, w-min ba3da fi el-deynoune,
kamen el-MASI7 2addam 7alo marra we7de ta-yem7e khataya nes ktar. W-ra7 yezhar marra tenye, mish kermel el-khatiyye, bass kermel ykhallis yalle natrino.

W-bi-ma enno el-shari3a fi bi-2alba el-fekra el-mzaghara 3an el-kheyrat el-mousta2baliyye, mish 3an el-7a2i2a metl ma hiye, ma bte2dar abadan enna bel-zabeye7 yalle 3am yet2addamo henne zeton min sene la-sene, tkhalle yalle bi-wasteta 3am bi2arrbo sawb ALLAH ennon ysiro kemleen.
Wa-ella ma ken ba3d fi lzoum enno ndall n2addimon. Li2anno yalle 3am bimerso hal-3ibede, law ysiro an2iya marra we7de, ma be2e bi-dameeron ayya shou3our bel-khatiyye,
bel-mou2abel, el-zabeye7 3am bizakkro el-nes bi-khatayahon min sene la-sene,
li2anno damm el-thiran wel-tyous ma bye2daro enno yem7o el-khataya.
Kermel hek 2al el-MASI7 la-ALLAH lamma eja 3al-3alam: "ma ken baddak zabi7a wala 2erben, bass 3titne jesm bashare,
wel-7ayawenet yalle keno yendaba7o w-yen7ara2o eddemak ka-tekfir 3an el-khataya, ma 2belt fiyon,
se3eta 2eltellak: ana jeye ya ALLAH 7atta a3mil metl ma baddak, w-metl ma maktoub 3anne bel-kteb."
W-houe 2al bel-awwal: "zabeye7 w-2arabin w-7ayawenet ma7rou2in ka-tekfir 3an el-khataya ma 2belt fiyon wala fre7t fiyon", ma3 enno keno yet2addamo 7asab el-shari3a.
Min ba3da 2al: "ana jeye ta-a3mil metl ma baddak", w-hek bikoun leghe ta2s el-3ibede el-awwal ta-ysabbet el-tene.
W-ne7na bi-iradet ALLAH t2addasna bi-jesm YASOU3 el-MASI7 yalle 2addamo 2erben marra we7de.
Min zamen ken el-kehen el-Yahoude you2af kell yawm eddem el-mazba7 w-ymeris tou2ous el-3ibede w-y2addim el-zabeye7 nafsa marrat ktire, ma3 enna ma bte2dar enno tem7e el-khataya.
Bass el-MASI7, 2addam lal-abad zabi7a we7de 3an el-khataya, w-min ba3da 2a3ad 3an yameen ALLAH,
w-houe halla2 natir enno y7ott ALLAH a3de2o ta7t ejrey,
li2anno bi-2erben wa7ad khalla yalle 2addason ysiro kemleen lal-abad.
Wel-ROU7 el-2ODOS bi-zeto byesh'hadelna bi-hal-7a2i2a. 2al:
"hayda houe el-3ahd yalle ra7 a3emlo ma3on bel-iyem el-jeye, bi2oul el-RAB: badde 7ott shari3te jouwwet 2loubon w-ekteba bi-3ou2oulon
w-ma ra7 ezkor khatayahon wala moukhelafeton min ba3d liom."
Matra7 ma byenghafaro el-khataya wel-moukhelafet, ma byeb2a fi 7aje n2addim 2erben kermel el-khatiyye.
W-ne7na 3a-thi2a, ya ekhewte, bi-enno sar fina nfout 3a-2ods el-a2des bi-damm YASOU3,
yalle fata7elna tari2 jdide kella 7ayet min khilel el-sitar, yalle houe jesmo,
w-ma zel 3enna kehen 3azeem 3ala beyt ALLAH,
khallina n2arrib bi-2alb sade2 w-imen kemil, w-2loubna mtahhara min sou2 el-niyye w-ajsemna mghassale bi-may na2iyye,
w-ndall 3al-raja yalle min2ãmen fih imen ma byetza3za3, li2anno ALLAH yalle wa3adna houe ameen,
w-ndeer belna 3a-ba3d, w-n7ammis ba3dna 3al-ma7abbe wel-a3mel el-sal7a.
W-ma ten2et3o 3an el-ejtime3 metl ma t3awwad el-ba3d minkon ennon ya3emlo, bel-3aks shajj3o ba3dkon, bi-2adar ma bitshoufo enno yawm el-RAB sar 2arib.
W-eza khtina 3an 2asd, min ba3d ma sarelna enno na3rif el-7a2, mish ra7 yeb2a fi zabi7a tkaffir 3an el-khataya,
w-ma byeb2alna ella el-natra el-rahibe la-yawm el-deynoune w-lahib nar yeshwe el-metmarrdin.
Yalle bikhelif shari3et Moussa bimout bidoun shafa2a bi-shahedet shehdeyn aw tlete,
awlkon addeysh lezim yet3e2ab yalle byed3as 3a-2eben ALLAH w-bye3tebir enno el-3ahd yalle t2addas bi-wasteto houe nejs w-bihin rou7 el-ne3me?
Ne7na mna3rif yalle 2al: "el-inti2am ele w-ana yalle b2ãses." W-2al kamen: "el-RAB ra7 ydeen sha3bo."
Rahibe el-wa2'3a bayn 2iden ALLAH el-7ayy.
Tzakkaro el-iyem el-madye w-addeysh kefa7to w-t7ammalto 3azèb min ba3d ma dawwa 3leykon nour el-imen,
w-keef min jiha saro yhinoukon w-ydey2oukon, w-min jiha tenye serto shouraka la-yalle 3emalouwon zet el-mou3amale.
W-keef sherakto el-ma7bousin bi-3azèbon w-t7ammalto w-fre7to lamma nahabo amwelkon, kawnkon 3erfin enno 3endkon tharwe afdal w-ma bitzoul.
Ma tetkhallo 3an thi2atkon, li2anno moukefa2et hal-thi2a ra7 tkoun 3azeeme.
Ento bi-7aje lal-sabr 7atta ta3emlo metl ma ALLAH baddo w-te7salo 3ala wa3do.
"3an 2arib, 3an 2arib ktir, yalle jeye byousal w-ma ra7 yet2akhar.
Yalle byetbarrar bel-imen bi3ish bel-imen, bass eza traja3 ma ra7 koun rade 3le."
Ne7na mish ahl el-tarajo3 wel-halek, ne7na ahl el-imen wel-khalãs.
El-imen houe el-thi2a bi-enno yalle 3am netrajjeh, ra7 yet7a'2a2, wel-i2tine3 bi-enno yalle ma minshoufo akid mawjoud,
w-bi-fadl hal-imen ALLAH shehed lal-2oudama.
Bel-imen mna3rif enno ALLAH khala2 el-kawn bi-kelme minno, w-enno yalle byenshef tkawwan min yalle ma byenshef.
Bel-imen 2addam Habeel la-ALLAH zabi7a afdal min zabi7et Kayeen, w-bel-imen shahadlo ALLAH enno houe min el-abrar lamma 2ebl el-2erben yalle 2addamo, w-bel-imen be2e Habeel ye7ke min ba3d mawto.
Bel-imen na2al ALLAH Akhnoukh la-3ando bidoun ma yshouf el-mawt, w-ma 3ed 7ada shefo li2anno ALLAH akhado la-3ando. Wel-kteb shehedlo abl ma yente2el bi-enno ALLAH ken rade 3le,
w-bidoun el-imen mousta7il norde ALLAH, li2anno yalle baddo yet2arrab min ALLAH lezim y2ãmen bi-enno ALLAH mawjoud w-enno ra7 ykefe2 yalle byet2arrabo minno.
Bel-imen Nou7 shef eshya ktire ma kenit minshefe, khaf ALLAH, w-3eml safine ta-ykhallis beyto, w-hek, 7akam 3al-3alam, w-bel-imen werit el-tebrir min el-imen.
Bel-imen labba Ibrahim da3wet ALLAH w-tarak watano w-ra7 3a-ard tenye wa3ado ALLAH enno yourata, ra7 w-mish 3arif 7alo wayn raye7.
W-bel-imen nezl bel-ard el-maw3oud fiya ka2anno nezl 3a-ard gharibe, w-2a3ad bel-khiyam ma3 Is7ak w-Ya3koub yalle keno shouraka bel-wa3d zeto,
li2anno ken natir el-madine yalle asesa thebit w-yalle ALLAH mhandasa w-m3ammara.
Bel-imen Sara n3atala enno tjeeb wled ma3 enna kenit 2ata3et 3omr el-7abal, li2anno 3tabaret enno yalle wa3ad ameen,
w-hek jebit min Ibrahim, yalle jesmo ken sar 3a-ekher, sleele ma bten3add, 2add njoum el-sama w-2add el-raml yalle 3a-shatt el-ba7r.
Bel-imen meto kell hal-ashkhas bidoun ma yshoufo wa3ad ALLAH elon t7a'2a2, bass shefouh w-sallamo 3le min b3id. W-3tarafo bi-ennon ghouraba 3a-hal-ard w-mer2in fiya mar2a,
w-yalle bi2oulo hek 7ake bibarehno ennon 3am yfattsho 3an watan.
W-law ba3don 3am bifakkro bel-watan yalle tarakouh, ken 3endon el-wa2et ennon yerja3oulo.
Bass keno meshte2in la-watan afdal minno, ye3ne lal-watan el-samewe. Kermel hek ma byeste7e ALLAH enno ykoun Ilehon, li2anno 7addarlon madine.
Bel-imen 2addam Ibrahim 2ebno el-wa7eed Is7ak zabi7a lamma mta7ano ALLAH, 2addamo w-houe yalle 3atah ALLAH el-wa3d
w-2allo: "bi-wastet Is7ak ra7 ykoun 3endak sleele."
W-2ãman Ibrahim enno ALLAH edir enno y2awwem el-mawta. Kermel hek reje3lo 2ebno Is7ak 7atta ykoun ramz.
Bel-imen Is7ak berak Ya3koub w-3eeso la-kheyrat el-mousta2bal.
W-bel-imen Ya3koub berak, abl ma ymout, wled Youssef w-sajad la-ALLAH houe w-metteke 3al-3asa.
W-bel-imen Youssef ettakal 3a-wa3d ALLAH bi-enno wled Isra2il ra7 yedharo min Masr w-wassahon wayn yedefno 3damo.
W-bel-imen emmo w-bayyo la-Moussa khabbouh tlet tesh'hor min ba3d ma khel2, li2annon shefouh tofl 7elo w-ma khafo min 2amr el-malik.
Bel-imen rafad Moussa, min ba3d ma kebr, enno ykoun 2eben bent Fer3on,
w-faddal enno ysherek sha3b ALLAH 3azèbo min el-tamatto3 el-mwa'2at bi-lezzit el-khatiyye,
w-3tabar enno 3ar el-MASI7 aghna min knouz Masr, li2anno ken 3am yetma7 bel-moukefa2a.
Bel-imen tarak Moussa Masr bidoun ma ykhaf min ghadab el-malik, w-dall 3a-2araro ka2anno sheyif 7addo yalle ma bishoufo 7ada.
Bel-imen 3eml el-fos7 w-rash el-damm, 7atta malèk el-mawt ma yde2 bi-ayy sabe bekr min wled Isra2il.
Bel-imen wled Isra2il 2ata3o el-ba7r el-a7mar ka2anno ard yebse, w-lamma ejo el-Masriyyin baddon ye2ta3ouh gher2o.
Bel-imen wa2a3o aswar Ari7a min ba3d ma wled Isra2il baramo 7awla sab3 tiyem.
Bel-imen Ra7ãb el-mara el-zenye ma n2atalet ma3 el-metmarrdin, li2anno sta2balet el-jasousen.
W-shou badde 2oul ba3d? El-wa2et ma byesma7le khabber 3an Jed3on w-Barak w-Shamshoun w-Yafta7 w-Daoud w-Samou2il wel-anbiya.
Yalle bel-imen ntasaro 3al-mamelek w-7akamo 7ekm 3adel w-akhado yalle wa3ad fih ALLAH w-sakkaro tmem el-2soude
w-taffo lahib el-nar el-meltehbe w-tkhallaso min el-2atl bel-seyf w-tghallabo 3al-do3f w-saro abtal bel-7arb w-hazamo jouyoush el-ghouraba,
w-ba3d el-neswen shefo mawtehon 2amo min el-mawt w-rej3oulon. W-ktar t7ammalo el-te3zib w-rafado el-khalãs 3a-2amal enno ra7 y2oumo 3a-7ayet afdal,
w-ktar t7ammalo el-tmeskhor wel-jald, wel-terbit bel-jnazeer wel-7abs.
W-nrajamo bel-7jar w-ennasharo bel-minshar w-meto 2atl bel-seyf w-tsharrado lebsin jloud el-ghanam wel-me3ze ma7roumin ma2hourin mazloumin,
li2anno el-3alam ma byest7e2on, ettaysharo bel-barare wel-jbel wel-maghewer w-kouhouf el-ard.
W-hawde kellon ma 7oslo 3al-wa3d ma3 ennon n3arafo bi-imenon,
li2anno ALLAH 7addarelna massir afdal min massiron w-arad enno ma ysiro kemleen bidounna.
Bass ne7na el-m7awatin bi-3adad kbir min el-shouhoud, ta3o ta-nsheel kell te2l w-kell khatiyye m7asretna, w-nerkod bi-kell 2ouwwetna bi-hal-saba2 el-ma3roud 3leyna,
ne7na w-3am nettalla3 3a-ra2ed imenna w-mkammlo, YASOU3 yalle t7ammal el-salib w-ma htamm bi-hal-mawte el-mouhine li2anno fakkar bel-fara7 yalle natro, w-2a3ad 3an yameen 3arsh ALLAH.
T2ammalo fih mni7 w-shoufo addeysh t7ammal hal-mou3emale el-2assye min el-khatyeen 7atta ma tiy2aso w-nfouskon ted3af.
Ento bi-sira3kon dodd el-khatiyye, ba3d ma kefa7to 7atta el-mawt.
Tekhmin nsito el-kalem yalle n2allkon ka2annkon wledo: "ma testkheff, ya 2ebne, min enno el-RAB yhazzbak wala tiy2as eza wabbakhak,
li2anno el-RAB bihazzeb yalle bi7ebbo w-byejlod kell wa7ad bisir 2ebno."
T7ammalo tehzib el-RAB, yalle 3am bi3amelkon metl wledo, w-ayya 2eben bayyo ma bihazzbo?
W-eza ma t'hazzabto, metl kell el-wled yalle t'hazzabo, bitkouno thamaret el-zena mish wled shar3iyyin.
Bayyetna 3al-ard keno yhazzbouna w-kenna nkhaf minnon, keef bel-a7ra lamma mnokhda3 la-bayyna bel-rou7 ta-n3ish el-7ayet el-afdal?
Henne keno yhazzbouna la-wa2et 2asir w-metl ma henne baddon, bass ALLAH bihazzebna kermelna 7atta nsherko bi-2adesto.
Akid kell tehzib bisir bi-wa2to, bijeeb el-7ezn, mish el-fara7. Bass ba3den bijeeb la-yalle trawwado 3le, el-tebrir wel-salem.
Sheddo 2ideykon el-mertkhiyye w-rkebkon el-d3ife,
w-sahhlo eddem ejreykon tor2at jelse tkhalle el-a3raj yenshafa mish yetfarkash.
Fattsho 3an el-salem ma3 kell el-nes w-3isho 7ayet el-2adese li2anno bidoun el-2adese ma 7ada bye2dar yshouf el-RAB.
Ntebho min enno 7ada minkon yen7aram min ne3met ALLAH, 7atta ma yfarrekh fikon 3er2 morr yjeeb el-2ala2 w-yefsod el-jame3a,
w-7atta ma ykoun 7ada minkon fejir aw mestahter metl 3eeso yalle be3 boukouriyyto bi-2akle we7de.
W-bta3erfo mni7 enno lamma arad min ba3d hal-shi enno yestarje3 el-barake, nrafad w-ma le2a tari2a tkhalle bayyo yghayyir ra2yo, ma3 enno talab el-barake houe w-3am yebke.
W-ento ma kento 2rab min jabal fikon telemsouh, min nar wel3ane w-3atme w-dabab w-3asfe,
w-sawt bou2 w-sawt 7ake khalla el-sem3ino enno ma ba2a yzeed wala kelme,
li2anno ma edro yet7ammalo hal-enzar: "7atta el-wa7sh law da2 bel-jabal lezim terejmouh."
Ken el-manzar rahib 7atta enno Moussa 2al: "ana mar3oub 3am berjof min el-khawf."
Bass halla2 ento 2rab min jabal Sehyoun, min madinet ALLAH el-7ayy, min Ourashalim el-samewiyye wel-oulouf min el-maleyke yalle bi-7aflet 3id,
min jame3et el-abkar yalle asamiyon maktoube bel-sama, min ALLAH yalle ra7 ydeen el-kell, min arwe7 el-abrar yalle saro kemleen,
min YASOU3 waseet el-3ahd el-jdid, min dammo el-marshoush yalle bye7ke 7ake afdal min damm Habeel.
Ou3a ma tesma3o yalle 3am ye7kikon. Eza yalle rafado yesma3o yalle 3am ye7kihon 3a-hal-ard ma falato min el-2asãs, keef ne7na mneflot eza rafadna yalle 3am ye7kina min el-sama?
Lamma 7eke min zamen, sawto zalzal el-ard, bass halla2 wa3adna w-2al: "ra7 zalzel el-sama, mish el-ard wa7da, marra tenye."
Lamma 2al "marra tenye", hayda dalil 3ala zawel el-eshya el-mza3za3a li2anna makhlou2a 7atta ma yeb2a ghayr el-eshya yalle ma btetza3za3.
W-ma zel sar 3enna malakout ma byetza3za3, ta3o ta-ne3bad ALLAH w-nekhedmo w-neshkro bi-tari2a btordih, fiya ta2wa w-khoushou3,
li2anno Ilehna nar ãkle.
7afzo 3al-ma7abbe el-akhawiyye,
w-ma tenso tmerso el-diyafe, li2anno fi nes henne w-3am ymersouwa stadafo el-maleyke bidoun ma ya3erfo.
Htammo bel-ma7bousin ka2annkon ma7bousin ma3on, w-t3atafo ma3 el-m3azzabin ka2annkon ento kamen m3azzabin bi-jesmkon.
7ãfzo kellkon 3a-karamet el-zawej, wel-mzawwajin ykhallo frashon ndeef min el-danas, li2anno ALLAH ra7 ydeen el-fejrin w-yalle byezno.
Ma tkhallo 7obb el-masare ydeerkon w-2na3o bi-yalle 3endkon. 2al ALLAH: "mish ra7 eterkak wala etkhalla 3annak abadan."
Ye3na sar fina n2oul bi-kell thi2a w-jer2a: "ma zel el-RAB 3am yse3edne ma ra7 khaf, w-shou bye2dar el-2ensen ya3mil fiyye?"
Dallo zkero el-rou2asa taba3kon yalle 3allamoukon kalem ALLAH, w-tmattalo bi-7ayeton w-mawton w-bi-imenon.
YASOU3 houe houe, mberi7 w-liom w-lal-abad.
Ou3a tenkhed3o w-tel7a2o el-ta3alim el-gharibe, a7sanelkon tesendo 2loubkon bel-ne3me, mish bel-2akl yalle ma byenfa3 7atta yalle 3am yeklouh.
Ne7na 3enna mazba7 ma bi7e2 lal-kahane yalle 3am yekhedmo bi-khaymet el-3ahd enno yeklo minno,
li2anno el-7ayawenet yalle ra2is el-kahane ken ye7mol dammon w-yfout fiyon 3a-2ods el-a2des ta-ykaffir 3an el-khatiyye, keno yedba7ouwon barrat el-matra7 yalle 2e3id fih el-sha3b,
kermel hek met YASOU3 barrat el-madine ta-y2addis el-sha3b bi-dammo.
Khallina netla3 barrat el-madine w-nrou7 la-3ando w-ne7mol el-3ar ma3o.
Li2anno ma 3enna hon 3al-ard madine bteb2a, ne7na 3younna 3a-madinet el-mousta2bal.
Khallina n2addim bi-kell wa2et la-ALLAH bi-wastet el-MASI7 2erben el-shokr, yalle byetla3 min shfef yalle 3am ye3terfo bi-esmo.
Ma tenso 3amal el-kheyr wel-mousherake bi-kell shi, li2anno ALLAH bi7ebb yet2addamlo metl hal-2erben.
Tee3o el-rou2asa taba3kon, li2anno 3am yes'haro 3ala nfouskon sahar yalle ra7 y2addim 7seb 3an hal-shi, se3eta bya3emlo 3amalon bi-fara7, bidoun 7asra, li2anna el-7asra ma bitfeedkon bi-shi.
Sallo kermelna, ne7na weth2in enno dameerna na2e, w-min7ebb enno netsarraf mni7 bi-kell shi.
Betlob minkon hal-shi bi-el7a7, 7atta ALLAH yrajje3ne la-3andkon bi-asra3 wa2et.
W-betlob min Ileh el-salem yalle 2awwam RABNA YASOU3, ra3i el-khwerif el-3azeem, min el-mawt bi-damm el-3ahd el-abade,
enno y7adderkon mni7, ta-tsiro ta3emlo metl ma houe baddo, w-enno ya3mil fina kellna yalle byordih 7asab YASOU3 el-MASI7 elo el-majd lal-abad, ãmin.
W-betlob minkon, ya ekhewte, enno tet7ammalo riselte hayde, li2anno katabta bi-ikhtisar.
B7ebb ta3erfo enno khayyna Timothawos dahar min el-7abs. Eza eja la-3ande 3an 2arib, ra7 eje la-3andkon ma3o ta-shoufkon.
Sallmo 3ala kell rou2asa taba3kon w-3ala kell el-ekhwe el-2eddisin. Bisallmo 3leykon el-ekhwe yalle bi-Italya.
El-ne3me tkoun ma3kon kellkon.
Min Ya3koub khadim ALLAH wel-RAB YASOU3 el-MASI7 lal-mou2minin el-mshattatin min 2abeyel wled Isra2il el-tna3sh. Salem.
Fra7o ktir, ya ekhewte, lamma btou2a3o bi-moukhtalaf anwe3 el-me7an.
Ento bta3erfo enno lamma hal-me7an tekhtebir imenkon byoulad el-sabr.
Khalle el-sabr yshajje3kon 3a-3amal el-kheyr 7atta tsiro kemleen min kell el-nawe7e, bidoun ayy lawm.
W-eza ken 7ada minkon na2seto el-7ekme, khallih yetloba min ALLAH, se3eta byekheda, li2anno ALLAH bya3te bi-karam w-ma biloum.
W-khalle yetloba bi-imen ma fiyo shakk, li2anno yalle bishekk byeshbah mawj el-ba7r eza akhadeto el-ree7 w-jebeto bitfawwro.
W-ma yeftekir metl hal-shakhs enno ra7 yo7sal 3a-shi min el-RAB,
li2anno houe 2ensen ra2yo ma2soum mraddad bi-kell shi bya3emlo.
Khalle el-khayy el-meskin yeftekhir lamma byet3alla,
wel-ghane lamma byetnazzal, li2anno el-ghane metl zahr el-3eshb bizoul:
bteshro2 el-shams bi-7arareta w-byeebas el-3eshb, w-biherr zahro w-birou7 jamelo. Nafs el-shi byedbal el-ghane lamma ykoun mettekhad bi-a3melo.
Niyyel yalle byesbor 3al-me7ne, li2anno eza mtou7in byekhod eklil el-7ayet yalle el-RAB wa3ad fih yalle bi7ebbouh.
W-eza wa2a3 7ada bi-me7ne, ma y2oul: "hayde me7ne min ALLAH!" Li2anno ALLAH ma byemte7no el-sharr w-ma byemte7en 7ada bel-sharr,
bass el-shahwe btemte7en el-2ensen lamma bteghrih.
Wel-shahwe eza 7eblet waladit el-khatiyye, wel-khatiyye eza nodjit waladet el-mawt.
Ma tenkhed3o, ya ekhewte el-a7ebba,
kell 3atiyye sal7a w-kell mawhabe kemle btenzal min fo2, min 3end bayy el-nour. W-houe yalle ma byetghayyar wala byebrom wala bikebb 3atmet khyelo
arad enno youladna bi-kelmet el-7a2 ta-nkoun bakoura la-khaley2o.
3rafo hal-shi, ya ekhewte el-a7ebba, khalle kell wa7ad minkon ykoun jehiz enno yesma3 mish deghre ye7ke, mish deghre yeghdab,
li2anno ghadab el-2ensen ma bya3mil el-sa7 3end ALLAH.
Rfedo kell danas w-kell shi be2e min el-sharr, w-t2abbalo bi-wade3a el-kalem yalle ALLAH 3am yezra3o fikon, el-edir enno ykhallis nfouskon.
Bass ma tektefo bi-same3 kalem ALLAH bidoun el-3amal fih se3eta btekhda3o nfouskon.
Yalle byesma3 el-kalem w-ma bya3mil fih bikoun metl yalle 3am yettalla3 bel-mreye 3ala souret wejjo,
byettalla3 3ala 7alo w-byemshe, w-ba3den byensa deghre keef ken.
Bass yalle byettalla3 bel-shari3a el-kemle, shari3et el-7orriyye, w-bidewim 3leya, mish byesma3 w-byensa, w-bya3mil fiya, niyyelo bi-yalle 3am ya3emlo.
W-yalle mfakkar 7alo metdayyen w-houe ma bisoun lseno, khada3 nafso w-ken deeno batel.
El-deen el-taher el-na2e 3end ALLAH bayyna houre enno yehtamm el-2ensen bel-yatema wel-araml bi-di2eton, w-enno ysoun nafso min danas el-3alam.
W-ma zelkon, ya ekhewte, mou2minin bi-RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7 elo el-majd, ma tseyro 7ada.
Eza fet 3a-majma3kon ghane fi bi-esba3o khatim min dahab w-tyebo t2ile, w-min ba3da fet fa2ir tyebo 3ati2a,
w-ltafatto la-sa7ib el-tyeb el-t2ile w-2eltoulo: "23od enta hon bel-noss", w-2elto lal-fa2ir: "w2af enta honik", aw "23od hon 3a-ejreyna",
ma bitkouno mayyazto 7ada 3an el-tene w-7akamto 3leyon w-kenit afkarkon 3atle?
Sma3o, ya ekhewte el-a7ebba: mish ALLAH khtar fou2ara hal-3alam ta-ykouno aghniya bel-imen w-yourato el-malakout yalle wa3ad fih yalle bi7ebbouh?
W-ento bte7te2ro el-fou2ara! W-meen yalle byezlemkon w-byekhedkon 3al-ma7ekem, mish el-aghniya?
Mish henne yalle 3am bijaddfo 3ala el-esm el-mni7 yalle tsammayto 3le?
Eza tsarrafto 7asab shari3et el-shara2e3 yalle nkatabet bel-kteb, w-hiye: "7ebb 2aribak metl ma bit7ebb nafsak", bitkouno 3melto mni7.
Bass eza seyarto 7ada bta3emlo khatiyye w-bte7kom el-shari3a 3leykon 7ekma 3ala yalle bikhelfouwa.
W-yalle bi3ish 7asab el-shari3a kella w-byehmol wassiye we7de minna bikoun khelaf el-shari3a kella,
li2anno yalle 2al: "ma tezne", 2al kamen: "ma te2tol." W-eza 2atalet w-ma znit, kent moukhelif lal-shari3a.
Kermel hek 7kou w-3melo metl yalle ra7 ydeenon ALLAH bi-shari3et el-7orriyye,
li2anno el-deynoune ma bter7am yalle ma byer7am, wel-ra7me btentosir 3al-deynoune.
Shou byenfa3 el-2ensen, ya ekhewte, enno yedde3e el-imen bidoun a3mel? Hal-imen ma3'2oul ye2dar ykhallso?
Eza ken fi baynetkon khayy 3eryen aw ekht 3eryene ma 3endon 2akl,
shou byenfa3 t2ouloulon: "rou7o bi-salem! etdaffo w-shba3o", eza kento ma 3am ta3touwon shi min yalle bye7tej elo el-jesm?
Nafs el-shi el-imen, bidoun a3mel bikoun bi-7add zeto mayyit.
W-yemken 7ada minkon 2al: "enta 3endak imen w-ana 3ende a3mel", fa-b2ello: "farjine keef bikoun imenak bidoun a3mel, w-ana bfarjik keef bikoun imene bi-a3mele."
Enta bit2ãmen enno ALLAH wa7ad? 3am ta3mil mni7. Kamen el-shyateen bi2ãmno fih w-byenre3bo.
Ya jehel, baddak ta3rif keef bikoun el-imen bala feyde bidoun a3mel?
Ettalla3 3ala bayyna Ibrahim, mish ALLAH barraro bel-a3mel lamma 2addam 2ebno Is7ak 3al-mazba7?
Enta bitshouf enno imeno refa2 a3melo, w-sar imeno kemil bel-a3mel,
W-hek t7a'2a2 kalem el-kteb: "2ãman Ibrahim bi-ALLAH w-barraro ALLAH la-imeno w-sammeh sadee2 ALLAH."
Sheyfin, fa-ezan, enno el-2ensen byetbarrar bel-a3mel mish bass bi-imeno.
W-hek Ra7ãb el-zenye: mish ALLAH barrara kermel a3mela lamma sta2balet el-rasouleyn w-fallaleton min tari2 tenye?
Metl ma el-jesm bidoun rou7 mayyit, kamen el-imen bidoun a3mel mayyit.
Ya ekhewte, lezim enno ma yektaro baynetkon el-mou3allimin. Ento bta3erfo ayya deynoune ra7 nekhod ne7na el-mou3allimin.
W-addeysh ktar el-khataya yalle mna3mela kellna. Eza ken 7ada ma byokhte bi-lseno, bikoun kemil edir yedbat jesmo kello.
Shoufo el-kheyl mathalan, lamma nsakkerlon temmon ta-ytee3ouna, mnedbat kell jesmon.
Wel-sefon 3ala dakhameta w-2ouwwet el-ree7 yalle btekheda, bitmashshiya daffe zghire matra7 ma baddo el-koubtan.
W-hek kamen el-lsen, sa7i7 enno zghir bass byeftekhir bi-a3mel kbire. Shoufo addeysh zghire el-nar yalle bte7ro2 ghãbe kbire!
Wel-lsen nar, w-houe min bayn a2sam el-jesm 3alam min el-shourour binajjis el-jesm bi-kemlo w-bye7ro2 majra el-tabi3a kella bi-nar hiye min nar jhannam.
W-bye2dar el-2ensen enno ysayter 3al-w7oush wel-3safeer wel-samak wel-7ayawenet yalle byez7afo,
bass el-lsen ma bye2dar el-2ensen enno ysayter 3le. Houe sharr ma byendabat, melyen samm bimawwit,
bel-lsen minberik RABNA w-bayyna w-bel-lsen mnel3an el-nes el-makhlou2in 3ala souret ALLAH.
Min temm wa7ad btetla3 el-barake wel-la3ne, w-ma lezim hek ysir, ya ekhewte.
Ma3'2oul yfajjir el-nab3 may 7elwe w-mel7a min nafs el-matra7?
Ma3'2oul ta3te el-teene, ya ekhewte, zeytoun aw el-karme teen? W-nafs el-shi el-nab3 el-meli7 ma bitalle3 may 7elwe.
Yalle mfakkar enno 3endo 7ekme w-zaka, khallih ybarhen 3an 7ekmto w-wade3to bi-a3melo el-mni7a.
Bass eza ken bi-2loubkon mararet el-7asad wel-khne2a, ma tetkabbaro w-ma tkazzbo 3al-7a2i2a.
Metl hek 7ekme ma btenzal min fo2, hayde 7ekme dounyawiyye bashariyye shaytaniyye.
Li2anno matra7 ma bikoun el-7asad wel-kne2a, honik bikoun el-2ala2 w-kell anwe3 el-sharr.
Bass el-7ekme el-nezle min fo2 hiye tahra abl kell shi, w-mouselme metsem7a wadi3a kella ra7me w-a3mel sal7a, ma fiya mouseyara wala kezb.
Wel-tebrir houe thamaret yalle byezra3o el-salem bi-salem.
Min wayn jeye el-kne2a wel-khilef baynetkon? Mish min shahwetkon yalle 3am bit7areb jesmkon?
Bteshteho w-ma bto7salo 3a-yalle shtaheytouh w-se3eta bte2etlo. Bte7esdo w-ma bte2daro tekhdo w-se3eta btekhtelfo w-btet2etalo. Ento ma7roumin li2annkon ma 3am tetolbo,
w-eza talabto ma btekhdo li2annkon ma 3am ta3erfo tetolbo bi-ma enno badkon tshabb3o shahwetkon.
Ya kheynin, ma bta3erfo enno ma7abbet el-3alam 3adewe la-ALLAH? Yalle baddo y7ebb el-3alam bikoun 3adouw ALLAH.
Mfakkrin enno yalle 2alo el-kteb batel, w-houe enno el-rou7 yalle afado ALLAH 3leyna kello ghire?
Bass byen3om 3leyna bi-a3zam ne3me. Fa-el-kteb bi2oul: "biredd ALLAH el-metkabrin w-byen3om 3al-metwad3in."
Kouno khad3in la-ALLAH w-2ewmo eblees ta-yehrob minkon.
2arrbo min ALLAH ta-y2arreb minkon. Ghasslo 2ideykon, ya khatyeen, w-tahher 2albak ya meen ra2yo ma2soum.
7zano 3ala fa2rkon w-bkou. 7atta yen2elib de7ekkon beke w-fara7kon ghamm.
Twada3o eddem el-RAB byerfa3kon el-RAB.

Ma te7ko 3an ba3dkon bel-3atel, ya ekhewte, li2anno yalle bye7ke bel-3atel 3ala khayyo aw bideen khayyo bikoun 3am ye7ke bel-3atel 3al-shari3a - 3am bideen el-shari3a. Eza kent 3am bitdeen el-shari3a, enta ma 3am temshe 7asab el-shari3a, enta 3am bitdeena.
Shakhs wa7ad houe yalle bye7kom w-bideen, w-houe yalle bye2dar ykhallis w-ma ykhallina nmout. Fa-meen enta ta-tdeen 2aribak?
W-ento yalle bit2oulo: "ra7 nrou7 liom aw boukra 3ala hal-madine aw haydik, w-mneb2a sene mintejir w-mnerba7",
ento ma bta3erfo shi 3an boukra. Shou hiye 7ayetkon? Ento boukhar byezhar shwey w-min ba3da byekhtefe.
Kermel hek lezim t2oulo: "eza ALLAH rad, min3ish w-mna3mil hek aw hek!"
Bass halla2 ento 3am tetkabbaro w-tshoufo 7alkon, w-hayda sharr.
Yalle bya3rif ya3mil el-kheyr w-ma bya3emlo byokhte.
Ya aghniya, bkou w-ndebo 3al-msayeb yalle ra7 tenzal 3leykon.
Amwelkon fesdet w-tyebkon akala el-3ett.
Dahabkon w-foddetkon msaddeye wel-sede byesh'had 3leykon w-byekol ajsemkon metl el-nar. 3am bitkhazzno lal-iyem el-akhira,
w-ma3ashèt el-3emmel yalle shtaghalo bi-7ou2oulkon w-yalle sara2touwa minnon sawta 3am ye3la, w-sarikh el-3emmel wossil la-RAB el-jnoud.
3eshto 3al-ard bel-bazkh wel-taraf w-shabba3to 2loubkon metl 3ejl msamman la-yawm el-zab7.
7akamto 3al-baree2 w-2ataltouh w-houe ma 3am bi2awemkon.
Fa-sbero, ya ekhewte, la-7add ma yeje el-RAB. Ettalla3o keef byesbor el-felle7 houe w-natir thamar el-ard el-ghale, w-bidall natir 7atta tenzal awwal shatwe w-yenzal el-shete el-m2akhar.
Sbero ento kamen w-2awwo 2loubkon, li2anno maji2 el-RAB 2arib.
Ma tbarebro 3ala ba3dkon, ya ekhewte, ta-ma ydeenkon ALLAH. El-dayyen we2if 3al-beb.
Tmattalo, ya ekhewte, bel-anbiya yalle basharo bi-esm el-RAB w-t3azzabo w-sabaro.
Niyyel yalle byesebro. Sme3to bi-sabr Ayyoub w-shefto keef kefa2o el-RAB. W-houe kello ra7me.
W-abl kell shi, ya ekhewte, ma te7elfo bel-sama wala bel-ard wala bi-ayy shi tene. Khalle tkoun el-eh taba3kon eh wel-la2 la2, ta-ma tet2ãsaso.
Fi 7ada baynetkon ze3len? Khallih ysalle! Fi 7ada mabsout? Khallih ysabbe7 ALLAH!
Fi 7ada mareed? Khallih yjeeb shyoukh el-knise ta-ysallo 3le w-yedhanouh bel-zeyt bi-esm el-RAB.
El-sala ma3 el-imen bitkhallis el-mareed, wel-RAB byeshfih. W-eza ken 3eml khatiyye byeghferlo yeha.
3terfo la-ba3dkon bi-khatayakon, w-sallo kermel ba3dkon 7atta teshfo. Salat el-abrar 3enda 2ouwwe 3azeeme.
Ken Eliyya 2ensen metlna metlo bi-kell shi w-salla bi-7arara 7atta ma yenzal el-shete, w-ma nezl el-shete 3al-ard meddit tlet snin w-sitt tesh'hor.
Min ba3da reje3 ysalle, w-shattet el-sama w-talla3et el-ard kheyr.
Ya ekhewte, eza zegh 7ada minkon 3an el-7a2 w-7ada raddo,
khallih ya3rif enno yalle biredd khãte 3an daya3o bikhallis nafs min el-mawt w-bikhabbe khataya ktire.
Min Boutros, rasoul YASOU3 el-MASI7, lal-mekhtarin el-metgharbin el-mshattatin bi-Bentos w-Ghalatya w-Kapadokya w-Ãsia w-Bithinya,
la-yalle khtaron ALLAH el-Ãb bi-sebe2 3elmo w-2addason bel-ROU7 ta-ytee3o YASOU3 el-MASI7 w-yettahharo bi-rash dammo. Elkon el-ne3me wel-salem.
Yetberak ALLAH bayy RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7 li2anno ra7mto 3leyna kenit 3azeeme, waladna bi-2iyemet YASOU3 el-MASI7 min el-mawt wilede tenye la-raja 7ayy
w-la-werte ma btefsod w-ma btetdannas w-ma bitzoul, ma7fouza elkon bel-sama,
ento yalle bel-imen bte7reskon edrit ALLAH la-khalãs ra7 yenkeshif bel-yawm el-akhir,
btefra7o fih, ma3 enno la-bodd enno te7zano shwey bi-yalle 3am bisir ma3kon halla2 min anwe3 el-me7an
yalle btemte7en iminkon metl ma btemte7en el-nar el-dahab, w-houe athman min el-dahab yalle bizoul, se3eta byest7e2 el-madi7 wel-majd wel-ekram yawm zouhour YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Ento bet7ebbouh w-ma sheftouh, w-bit2ãmno fih w-ma 3am bitshoufouh halla2, fa-btefra7o fara7 kbir ma byenwasaf,
weth2in enno ra7 tousalo la-hadaf imenkon w-houe khalãs nfouskon.
3an hal-khalãs fattasho el-anbiya w-nabbasho, w-tnabbo 3an el-ne3me yalle akhadtouwa.
W-jarrabo ya3erfo aymata w-keef bteje hal-ne3me 3leyon w-yalle 7eke 3anna ROU7 el-MASI7, lamma shahad min abl bi-ãlem el-MASI7 w-bel-majd yalle byeje min ba3da.

W-nkashaflon enno kermelkon, mish kermelon, keno kheddem lal-eshya yalle a3lanouwa halla2 el-ashkhas yalle basharoukon fiya, bi-2ouwwet el-ROU7 el-2ODOS el-nezil min el-sama, w-hal-eshya el-maleyke byetmanno enno yshoufouwa.
Kermel hek 7addro 3ou2oulkon w-ntebho w-khallo kell rajekon bel-ne3me yalle btejikon 3end zouhour YASOU3 el-MASI7.
W-ka-wled moutee3in, ma tetba3o shahawetkon yalle tbe3touwa lamma kento bel-jahl,
bass kouno 2eddisin bi-kell shi 3am ta3emlouh, li2anno ALLAH yalle da3ekon houe 2ouddous.
Wel-kteb bi2oul: "kouno 2eddisin li2anno ana 2ouddous."
W-eza kento bitsammo ALLAH bayy, w-houe yalle bideen kell wa7ad 7asab a3melo, bidoun mouseyara, fa-3isho bi-makhefto, kell shi w-ento bel-gherbe 3ala hal-ard,
w-3rafo enno shtarakon bi-souloukkon el-batel yalle wrethtouh 3an bayyetkon, mish bel-fodda aw el-dahab yalle bizoul,
shtarakon bi-damm karim, damm el-7amal yalle ma fiyo 3ayb wala danas, damm el-MASI7.
W-ken ALLAH khtaro abl te2sis el-3alam, min ba3da zahar kermelkon bel-azmine el-akhira,
w-houe yalle khallekon t2ãmno bi-ALLAH yalle 2awwamo min el-mawt w-3atah el-majd, w-sar ALLAH hadaf imenkon w-rajekon.
W-halla2, min ba3d ma tahharto nfouskon bel-tã3a lal-7a2 w-serto t7ebbo ekhwetkon 7obb sade2, 7ebbo ba3dkon 7obb na2e min kell 2albkon.
Ento wledto wilede tenye, mish min zar3 bizoul, min zar3 ma bizoul, w-houe kelmet ALLAH el-kella 7ayet wel-be2ye.
Wel-kteb bi2oul: "kell 2ensen metl 3eshb w-kell majdo metl zahr el-3eshb. El-3eshb byeybas w-zahro byou2a3,
w-kalem ALLAH byeb2a lal-abad." W-hayda houe el-kalem yalle basharnekon fih.
Bay3do 3ankon kell khabsane w-i7tiyel w-kezb w-7asad w-namime,
w-metl el-atfal el-khel2anin jdid rghabo bel-laban el-rou7e el-sãfé, 7atta tekbaro fih sawb el-khalãs.
Eza de2to addeysh el-RAB tayyib, metl ma bi2oul el-kteb.
2arrbo min el-RAB, houe el-7ajar el-7ayy el-marfoud 3end el-nes, el-moukhtar, el-ghale 3end ALLAH.
W-ento kamen 7jara 7ayye bi-bine2 la-beyt rou7e, fa-kouno kahane w-2addmo zabeye7 rou7iyye bye2bala ALLAH bi-YASOU3 el-MASI7.
El-kteb bi2oul: "ra7 7ott bi-Sehyoun 7ajar zewye ghale moukhtar, w-yalle bi2ãmen fih ma bikheeb."
Houe ghale elkon ento el-mou2minin. Bass lal-mish mou2minin, houe "el-7ajar yalle rafado el-me3marjiyye w-sar ras el-zewye",
w-houe "7ajar 3athra w-sakhra bitwa'2e3." W-henne byetfarkasho li2annon ma bi2ãmno bi-kelmet ALLAH: hayda houe massiron!
Bass ento sleele moukhtara w-kahnout moulouke w-oumme m2addase w-sha3b akhado ALLAH ta-ye3lon fadaylo, w-houe yalle da3ekon min el-3atme la-nouro el-3ajib.
W-ento ma kento sha3b min abl, bass liom serto sha3b ALLAH. Kento bidoun ra7met ALLAH, w-halla2 7solto 3leya.
Betlob minkon, ya a7ebbe2e, w-ento dyouf ghouraba bi-hal-3alam, mten3o 3an shahawet el-jesm, yalle bit7areb el-nafs.
W-khalle souloukkon bayn el-oumam ykoun mni7 7atta eza ettahamoukon bi ennkon ashrar, ettalla3o 3ala a3melkon el-sal7a w-majjado ALLAH lamma byetfa2adon.
Khda3o, ekraman lal-RAB, la-kell soulta bashariyye: lal-malik li2anno houe el-7akem el-a3la,
w-lal-7ekkem li2annon henne moufawwadin minno la-2asãs el-ashrar w-moukefa2et el-mne7,
li2anno iradet ALLAH hiye enno tsakkto bi-a3melkon el-sal7a jahl el-aghbiya.
Kouno a7rar, bass ma tkouno metl yalle bya3emlo min el-7orriyye ghata lal-sharr, bel-3aks kouno 3abeed la-ALLAH.
Karrmo kell el-nes, 7ebbo el-ekhwe, ette2o ALLAH, karrmo el-malik.
Ya hal-kheddem, khda3o la-asyedkon bi-kell rahbe, eza keno sal7in loutafa aw 2assyeen.
Ne3me ennkon ta3erfo iradet ALLAH se3eta btet7ammalo el-3azèb wel-zolm.
Ayya fadl elkon eza khtito w-sabarto 3al-2asãs yalle btest7e2ouh, bass eza 3melto el-kheyr w-sabarto 3al-3azèb, btekhdo el-ne3me min ALLAH.
W-la-metl hal-shi da3ekon ALLAH, wel-MASI7 t2allam kermelkon w-3eml min nafso matal ta-temsho 3ala khoutah.
Houe ma rtakab khatiyye w-ma 3eref temmo el-i7tiyel.
Ma radd 3al-msabbet bi-msabbet. T2allam w-ma haddad 7ada, bel-3aks sallam 7alo lal-dayyen el-3adel,
w-houe yalle 7eml khatayana bi-jesmo 3al-khashabe 7atta nmout 3an el-khatiyye w-n3ish lal-7a2. W-houe yalle bi-jrou7o nshafayto.
Kento khwerif dãy3a w-rje3to halla2 la-ra3i nfouskon w-7aresa.
W-hek ento ya neswen, khda3o la-azwejkon, 7atta eza ken fi bayneton meen byerfod el-imen bi-kalem ALLAH, yenjezbo la-souloukkon bidoun el-7aje lal-kalem,
lamma yshoufo bi-souloukkon 3effe w-ta2wa.
Ma tkoun zinetkon kherijiyye bel-sha3r we-dahab wel-anãka bel-lebs,
khalliya tkoun dekhliyye bi-yalle mawjoud jouwwet el-2alb metl zinet nafs wadi3a moutma2enne ma bitzoul, w-tamana 3end ALLAH 3azeem.
Hek keno el-neswen el-2eddissin el-metteklin 3ala ALLAH yetzayyano min 2adeem bi-enno yokhda3o la-azwejon,
metl Sara yalle kenit ettee3 Ibrahim w-tsammih sayyida. W-ento halla2 baneta eza tsarrafto mni7 bidoun ma tkhafo min shi.
W-ento ya hal-rjel, 3isho ma3 neswenkon 3erfin enno el-mara ad3af min el-rejjel, w-karrmouwon li2annon shouraka ma3kon bi-wertet ne3met el-7ayet, fa-ma fi shi byou2af bi-wejj salawatkon.
W-halla2, kouno mwa77adin bel-ra2y w-ykoun 3endkon 3atf w-7obb w-ra7me w-tawado3.
Ma treddo 3al-sharr bel-sharr w-3al msabbet bel-msabbet, bel-3aks bèrko ta-tourato el-barake, li2annkon la-hal-shi nda3ayto.
El-kteb bi2oul: "yalle baddo y7ebb el-7ayet w-yshouf iyem 7elwe, khallih yedbat lseno 3an el-sharr w-temmo 3an el-i7tiyel bel-7ake,
w-khallih yebte3ed 3an el-sharr w-ya3mil el-kheyr w-yetlob el-salem w-yes3a elo,
li2anno 3ayn el-RAB 3al-abrar w-daynto btesma3 salaton. Bass wejjo byebermo 3an yalle bya3emlo el-sharr."
Meen bye2dar ye2zikon eza kento mehtammin bi-3amal el-kheyr?
W-law t2allamto kermel el-7a2, niyyelkon! Ma tkhafo min 7ada w-ma tedterbo,
bel-3aks, 3bado el-MASI7 bi-2loubkon w-karrmouh ka-RAB, w-kouno bi-kell wa2et mist3eddin lal-radd 3ala kell meen byetlob minkon dalil 3al-raja yalle fikon.
W-khalle ykoun hal-shi bi-wade3a w-i7tiram, w-7ãfzo 3ala salemet dameerkon, 7atta eza 3emaloukon mish mni7, byekhjalo el-ashkhas yalle 3am yente2do souloukkon bel-MASI7.
Fa-afdal enno tet2allamo w-ento 3am ta3emlo el-kheyr, eza ken hal-shi iradet ALLAH, min enno tet2allamo w-ento 3am ta3emlo el-sharr.
Wel-MASI7 nafso met marra we7de kermel el-khataya. Met w-houe el-barr bi-sabab el-ashrar ta-y2arrebkon la-ALLAH. Met bel-jesm, bass ALLAH 3atah el-7ayet bel-ROU7,
w-ntala2 bi-hal-ROU7 ybasher el-arwe7 el-ma7bouse
yalle tmarradet min zamen, lamma ALLAH tawwal belo bi-iyem Nou7, yalle 3eml el-safine, w-najja bel-may 3adad alil, ye3ne tmen ashkhas,
w-ken hayda ramz lal-ma3moudiyye yalle bitnajjikon halla2, mish bi-izelet wasakh el-jesm, bitnajjikon bi-3ahd sade2 el-niyye ma3 ALLAH bi-2iyemet YASOU3 el-MASI7
yalle toli3 3al-sama w-houe 3an yameen ALLAH btokhda3lo el-maleyke wel-2ouwwèt w-as7ab el-soultan.
W-eza ken el-MASI7 t2allam bel-jesm, khallo hal-3ebra tkoun sle7kon, w-hiye enno yalle byet2allam bel-jesm ma byertekib khatiyye
w-bi3ish be2e 3omro 7asab iradet ALLAH, mish bel-shahawet el-bashariyye.
Bikaffe el-wa2et yalle 2addaytouh bi-mouseyaret el-oumam, 3ayshin bel-da3ara wel-shahwe wel-sekr wel-khale3a wel-3arbade w-3ibedet el-awthen el-mamnou3a.
W-henne halla2 mestagherbin minkon keef ma btenjarro ma3on bi-majra el-khale3a zeta fa-bihinoukon,
bass ra7 yet7esabo 3end ALLAH el-mist3edd enno ydeen el-3ayshin wel-mawta.
Kermel hek basharna bel-injil el-mawta kamen, 7atta yendeno metl bashar 3asho bel-jesm w-hek bi3isho 3end ALLAH bel-rou7.
W-halla2 2arrabet niheyet kell shi kermel hek t3a'2alo w-s'haro w-sallo.
W-khalle el-ma7abbe tkoun 2awiye baynetkon abl kell shi, li2anno el-ma7abbe bitkhabbe khataya ktire.
Stadeefo ba3dkon mni7 bidoun t2ef2of,
w-khalle y7ott kell wa7ad minkon mawhabto bi-khedmet el-ãkharin, ka-woukala sal7in 3ala maweheb ALLAH el-metnaw3a.

Eza 7ada minkon 7eke, khallih ye7ke kalem ALLAH, w-eza khadam khallih yekhdom bi-yalle byouhabo ALLAH min edra, 7atta yetmajjad ALLAH bi-kell shi bi-YASOU3 el-MASI7, elo el-majd wel-3ezze la-abad el-douhour. Ãmin.
Ya a7ebbe2e, ma tet3ajjabo, lamma ysir ma3kon me7ne bittahherkon bi-nara la-emti7ankon, ka2anno shi gharib sar ma3kon,
bel-3aks fra7o li2anno 3am bitsherko el-MASI7 bi-ãlemo, 7atta eza tjalla majdo fre7to w-hallalto.
Niyyelkon eza sabboulkon kermel esm el-MASI7, li2anno ROU7 el-majd, ROU7 ALLAH, byenzal 3leykon.
Ma 7ada minkon yet2allam ka2anno mejrem aw loss aw sherreer aw moutataffel,
bass eza t2allam li2anno masi7e, ma yekhjal w-ymajjed ALLAH bi-hal-esm.
Sar el-wa2et yalle fih bitballish el-deynoune bi-ahl beyt ALLAH. W-eza ballashit fina, keef ra7 tkoun niheyet yalle byerefdo injil ALLAH?
El-kteb bi2oul: "eza keno el-abrar bile2o el-khalãs ba3d jehd, fa-shou houe massir el-kefir el-khãte?"
W-yalle byet2allamo metl ma arad elon ALLAH, khalliyon ya3emlo el-kheyr w-ysallmo nfouson lal-khale2 el-ameen.
W-bennesbe lal-shyoukh yalle baynetkon betlob minnon, ana el-sheykh metlon wel-shehid la-ãlem el-MASI7 w-shrik el-majd yalle ra7 yezhar 2ariban,
enno yer3o r3iyyet ALLAH yalle bi-3ineyeton w-ye7ersouwa 3an tibet khater mish ka2annon majbourin, metl ma ALLAH baddo, bi-7amese, mish ta-yerba7o shi rkhis.
W-ma tetsallato 3ala yalle henne bi-3ineyetkon, bel-3aks kouno matal lal-r3iyye.
Lamma byezhar ra3i el-re3yen btekhdo eklil min el-majd ma byedbal.
Kermel hek ento el-shabeb, khda3o lal-shyoukh w-lbeso kellkon tawb el-tawado3 bi-mou3amalet ba3dkon la-ba3d, li2anno ALLAH byou2af dodd el-metkabbrin w-byen3am 3al-metwad3in.
Twada3o ta7t 2id ALLAH el-èdra, ta-yerfa3kon lamma yeje el-wa2et.
W-kebbo kell hammkon 3le w-houe byehtamm fikon.
Kouno mentebhin w-s'haro, li2anno 3adouwwkon eblees 3am yebrom metl el-asad yalle 3am bisee7 w-yalle 3am bifattesh 3an farise elo.
Thbato bi-imenkon w-2ewmo, 3erfin enno ekhwetkon el-mou2minin bel-3alam kello 3am yet7ammalo el-ãlem zeta.
W-Ileh kell ne3me, el-Ileh yalle da3ekon la-majdo el-abade bel-MASI7 YASOU3, houe yalle bya3melkon kemleen, min ba3d ma t2allamto shwey, bithabbetkon w-bi2awwikon w-bikhallikon mrassakhin.
Elo el-majd lal-abad. Ãmin.
3am bektebelkon hal-risele el-moukhtasara bi-khatt 2id Silwanos, houe bennesbe ele khayy ameen, 7atta shajje3kon fiya w-esh'had enno hayde hiye ne3met ALLAH el-7a2i2iyye, fa-thbato fiya.
Kniset Babel, w-hiye metlkon moukhtara min ALLAH, bitsallem 3leykon. W-bisallem 3leykon Mercos 2ebne.
Sallmo, ba3dkon 3ala ba3d, bi-bawset el-ma7abbe. El-salem elkon kellkon, ento yalle bel-MASI7.
Min Sem3an Boutros, khadim YASOU3 el-MASI7 w-rasoulo, la-yalle 7oslo bi-fadl Ilehna w-moukhallisna YASOU3 el-MASI7 3ala-imen ghale metl imenna:
elkon el-ne3me wel-salem min khilel ma3rifetkon ALLAH w-RABNA YASOU3.
3atetna edrto el-Ilehiyye kell yalle houe lal-7ayet wel-ta2wa bi-fadl ma3rifet yalle da3ena bi-majdo w-3ezzto,
w-3atana el-wou3oud el-ghaliye wel-3azeeme, 7atta tebte3do bi-hal-dene 3an fased el-shahwe w-tsiro shouraka el-tabi3a el-Ilehiyye.
W-la-hal-shi 3melo jehedkon ta-tzeedo el-fadile la-imenkon, wel-ma3rife la-fadiletkon,
wel-3effe la-ma3rifetkon, wel-sabr la-3effetkon, wel-ta2wa la-sabrkon,
wel-oukhouwwe la-ta2wekon, wel-ma7abbe la-oukhouwwetkon.
W-eza kenit fikon hal-fadayel w-kenit bi-ketra, khalletkon tkouno nef3in mouthmirin bi-ma3rifet RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7.
W-yalle ma 3endo hal-fadayel bikoun a3ma ma bye2sha3 mni7, w-bikoun nese enno ettahhar min khatayah el-madye.
3melo kell jehedkon, ya ekhewte, enno tsabbto da3wet ALLAH w-ikhtiyaro elkon. Eza 3melto hek ma btou2a3o abadan.
Hek byenfata7elkon beb el-doukhoul wesi3 lal-malakout el-abade, malakout RABNA w-moukhallisna YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Kermel hek ra7 zakkerkon bi-hal-eshya bi-kell wa2et, 7atta law kento bta3erfouwa w-thebtin bel-7a2i2a yalle 3endkon.
W-bshouf enno min el-3adl, ma zelne bi-hal-beyt el-jasade, enno thir 7amesetkon bi-hal-tezkir,
w-ana ba3rif enno ra7 etrok hal-beyt 3an 2arib, metl ma azharle RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Fa-ra7 a3mil jehde enno tetzakkaro hal-eshya bi-kell wa2et min ba3d ma ana fell.
W-ne7na ma ettaba3na khourafet moulaffa2a lamma khabbarnekon 3an 2ouwwet RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7 w-3an maji2o, li2anna bi-3younna shefna 3azamto.
Houe akhad min ALLAH el-Ãb ekram w-majd lamma eja min ALLAH sawt y2oul: "hayda houe 2ebne el-7abib yalle rdeet 3anno",
sme3na ne7na hal-sawt jeye min el-sama, w-kenna ma3o 3al-jabal el-m2addas.
W-t2akkadna min kalem el-anbiya, w-ento bta3erfo mni7 eza sme3to hal-kalem ka2anno srej bidawwe bi-matra7 3atme, ta-yetla3 el-nhar w-teshro2 nejmet el-sob7 bi-2loubkon.
W-3rafo abl kell shi enno ma 7ada bye2dar enno yfassir min 3endo noubouwe bel-ketob el-m2addase,
li2anno ma fi abadan noubouwe ejet bi-iradet 2ensen, bass el-ROU7 el-2ODOS dafa3 ba3d el-nes enno ye7ko bi-kalem min 3end ALLAH.

W-metl ma zahar bel-sha3b min zamen anbiya kezzebin, ra7 yezhar baynetkon mou3allimin kezzebin byekhter3o el-mazeheb el-mouhlike w-byenekro el-RAB yalle ftadehon, w-bikhallo nfouson trou7 3al-halek el-sari3.
W-ktar min el-nes ra7 yel7a2o foujouron w-bikouno sabab la-tejdeef el-nes 3ala mazhab el-7a2i2a.
W-henne bi-tama3on bizayyfo el-kalem w-bitejro fikon. Bass el-7ekm 3leyon min 2adeem el-zamen ma byebtol w-halekon ma bitghammedlo 3ayn.
ALLAH ma shafa2 3al-maleyke yalle khotyo, bel-3aks 7atton bel-ja7eem ma7al ma henne mrabbatin bel-3atme la-yawm el-deynoune,
w-ma shafa2 3al-3alam el-2adeem, bel-3aks jeb el-toufan 3ala 3alam el-ashrar ma 3ada tmen ashkhas min baynon Nou7 yalle neda bel-sala7.
W-dammar ALLAH el-madinten Sadoum w-3amoura w-saret kharab w-7awwalon la rmed ka-3ebra la-meen ra7 yeje min ba3don min el-ashrar,
w-khallas Lout el-barr yalle ghodib min el-fejjar el-meshyin bi-tari2 el-da3ara,
w-ken hal-rejjel el-barr 3ayish bayneton byesma3 w-bishouf sharron yawm ba3d yawm, w-btet2allam nafso el-sal7a.
Wel-RAB bya3rif keef ykhallis el-at2iya min me7neton w-ykhalle el-ashrar yet2ãsaso yawm el-deynoune,
w-khassatan yalle byetba3o shahawet el-jesm el-danise w-byestahino bi-siyedet ALLAH. Addeyshon we2'7in w-mkabbarin! Ma bikhafo yheeno el-makhlou2at el-samawiyye el-majide,
ma3 enno el-maleyke, w-henne a3zam minnon bel-2ouwwe wel-edra ma bideenouwon bi-kelme mouhine 3end el-RAB.
W-hawdik henne metl el-7ayawenet yalle ma 3endon 3a2l el-ma3moulin bi-tabi3eton ta-yestãdouwa w-ta-yrou7o 3al-halek, biheeno yalle byejhalouh. Ra7 yrou7o 3al-halek metlon
w-ra7 yetãsaso li2annon zalmin. Mfakkrin el-lezze hiye enno yestaselmo lal-foujour bi-3ezz el-nhar. Mnekhjal fiyon eza 2a3ado ma3kon 3al-waleyem w-henne mabsoutin enno yekhda3oukon.
Hal-ashkhas elon 3youn melyene bel-foujour, ma bteshba3 min el-khatiyye, byekhda3o el-nfous el-d3ife, w-2loubon m3awwade 3al-tama3. Henne wled el-la3ne.
Tarako el-tari2 el-jelis w-faddalo yemsho bi-tari2 Bal3am 2eben Ba3our yalle njazab la-moukefa2et el-ashrar,
w-le2a el-tewbikh la-3esyano, lamma 7eke 7mar bi-sawt bashare w-wa'2af hal-nabe 3an ghabewto.
Hal-nes yanabi3 bidoun may w-ghyoum bitmashiya ree7 el-3asfe, w-la-elon 7addar ALLAH a3me2 el-3atme.
Bye7ko 7ake mdakhkham sakhif, w-byekhda3o bi-shahawet el-jesm wel-da3ara el-ashkhas yalle tkhallaso min yalle bi3isho bel-khatiyye.
Byouw3douwon bel-7orriyye w-henne 3abeed lal-fased, li2anno yalle byeghlob el-2ensen byesta3bdo.
W-yalle najjo min fased el-3alam, min ba3d ma 3erfo RABNA w-moukhallisna YASOU3 el-MASI7, min ba3da rej3o wa2a3o bi-fakh el-fased w-nghalabo, saret 7aleton aswa2 min abl,
w-ken a7sanlon enno ma ya3erfo tari2 el-sala7 min enno ya3erfouh w-ba3den yerja3o 3an el-wassiye el-m2addase yalle tsallamouwa.
W-byesdo2 fiyon el-matal yalle bi2oul: "reje3 el-kalb yestafregh", "wel-khanzire yalle tnaddafet rej3et tetmarragh bel-wa7l."
