Hayde risele tenye bektebelkon hiye, ya a7ebbe2e, 7atta zakkerkon bi-hal-eshya, w-7atta thir el-afkar el-na2iyye bi-3ou2oulkon.
Tzakkaro el-7ake yalle eja 3ala lsen el-anbiya el-2eddisin w-shou wassaloulkon el-rousl min wassaya RABNA w-moukhallisna.
W-abl kell shi lezim ta3erfo enno ra7 yeje bi ekher el-iyem nes moustahz2in, bitmashiyon shahaweton
w-bi2oulo: "wayn el-wa3ad bel-maji2? Wledna meto w-be2e kell shi min awwal el-khali2a 3ala 7alo!"
Henne byetjehalo 3an 2asd enno ALLAH bi-kelme minno khala2 el-sama, wel-ard tkawwanet min el-may w-bel-may,
w-fiya ghere2 el-3alam el-2adeem bel-may w-ra7 3al-halek.
Bass el-sama wel-ard bi-iyemna hayde, be2yet lal-nar bi-kelmet ALLAH zeta la-yawm el-deynoune w-halek el-ashrar.
Ba3d fi shi ma lezim tejhalouh ya a7ebbe2e, w-houe enno yawm wa7ad 3end el-RAB metl alf sene, w-enno alf sene metl yawm wa7ad.
Wel-RAB ma byet2akhar bi-te72i2 wa3do, metl ma byettehmouh el-ba3d minnon, bass bitawwel belo 3leykon li2anno ma baddo 7ada yrou7 3al-halek, baddo kellon ytoubo.
Bass yawm el-RAB ra7 yeje metl ma byeje el-loss, w-bitzoul el-sama bi-haydak el-yawm bi-sawt 2awe w-bitdoub el-3anaser bel-nar w-btet7ekam el-ard wel-a3mel yalle fiya.
W-eza kenit hal-eshya kella ra7 tekhlas, fa-keef lezim ento tkouno? Mish lezim temsho bi-tari2 el-2adese wel-ta2wa,
w-tentro w-testa3jlo maji2 yawm ALLAH? Lamma btelteheb el-sama w-bitzoul w-bitdoub el-3anaser bel-nar.
Bass ne7na ra7 nentor, metl ma wa3ad ALLAH, sama jdide w-ard jdide byeskon fiya el-3adl.
3melo jehedkon ya a7ebbe2e, ento w-natrin hayda el-yawm, enno yle2ikon ALLAH bi-salem, bidoun 3ayb fikon wala lawm 3leykon.
W-3tebro sabr RABNA fersa la-khalãskon, metl ma katabelkon bi-hal-shi khayyna el-7abib Boulos, 3ala 2add ma 3atah ALLAH 7ekme,
metl bi-kell raseylo yalle 7eke fiya 3an hal-eshya, w-waradet fiya eshya ghamda bi7arrefa el-jehhel w-d3af el-nfous, metl ma bya3emlo bi-be2e el-ketob el-m2addase, kermel halek nfouson.
Bass ento, ya a7ebbe2e, khabbarnekon bi-hal-shi, kermel hek ntebho ta-ma tekhda3kon akhta2 el-mertaddin w-tekhsaro thabetkon.
W-kbaro bel-ne3me w-bi-ma3rifet RABNA w-moukhallisna YASOU3 el-MASI7, elo el-majd halla2 w-lal-abad. Ãmin.
Yalle ken min el-bideye, yalle sme3neh w-shefneh bi-3younna, yalle t2ammalneh w-lamaseto 2ideyna min kelmet el-7ayet,
wel-7ayet zaharet w-shefneha w-halla2 mnesh'hadla w-minbasherkon bel-7ayet el-abadiyye yalle kenit 3end el-Ãb w-nkashafet elna,
yalle shefneh w-sme3neh minbasherkon fih ta-tkouno ento kamen shourake2na, metl ma ne7na shouraka el-Ãb w-2ebno YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Mnektebelkon bi-hal-shi ta-ykoun fara7na kemil.
W-hal-boushra yalle sme3neha minno mne7melkon yeha w-hiye enno ALLAH nour ma fiyo 3atme.
W-eza 2elna enno ne7na bi-sharake ma3o, w-ne7na meshyin bel-3atme, minkoun kezzebin w-ma mna3mil el-mazbout.
Bass eza mshina bel-nour, metl ma houe bel-nour, minkoun bi-sharake ma3 ba3dna, w-damm 3ebno YASOU3 bitahherna min kell khatiyye.
Eza 2elna enno ne7na bidoun khatiyye khada3na 7alna w-ma ken el-7a2 fina.
Bass eza 3tarafna bi-khatayana, houe ameen w-3adel, byeghferelna khatayana w-bitahherna min kell sharr.
Eza 2elna enno ma khtina, 3melneh kezzeb w-ma bitkoun kelmto fina.
Ya wlede, 3am ektebelkon bi-hal-eshya ta-ma tokhto. Eza khote 7ada minna, 3enna YASOU3 el-MASI7 el-barr shafi3 3end el-Ãb.
Houe bikaffir 3an khatayana, mish bass 3an khatayana, 3an khataya el-3alam kello.
Eza 3melna bi-wassayah minkoun m2akkadin enno mna3erfo.
W-yalle bi2oul: "ana ba3erfo" w-ma meshe 7asab wasayah bikoun kezzeb wel-7a2i2a manna fih.
W-yalle byemshe 7asab kalemo btektemil fih ma7abbet ALLAH 7a2i2atan. Bi-hal-shi minkoun m2akkadin enno ne7na bi-ALLAH.
W-yalle bi2oul enno houe thebit bi-ALLAH, lezim y3ish metl el-MASI7.
Ma bektebelkon, ya a7ebbe2e, 3an wassiye jdide, bektebelkon 3an wassiye 2adeeme kenit elkon min el-bideye. W-hal-wassiye el-2adeeme hiyye el-kalem yalle sme3touh.
W-roughm hal-shi bektebelkon wassiye jdide bibayyen sod2a bel-MASI7, li2anno el-3atme fallet wel-nour el-7a2 3am yeshro2.
Yalle bi2oul enno houe bel-nour w-houe byekrah khayyo, bikoun la-halla2 bel-3atme.
W-yalle bi7ebb khayyo bikoun thebet bel-nour, w-ma byetfarkash bel-nour.
Bass yalle byekrah khayyo bikoun bel-3atme, w-bel-3atme byemshe w-ma bya3rif tari2o, li2anno el-3atme a3met 3youno.
3am ektebelkon ya wlede el-zghar, li2anno ALLAH ghafar khatayakon bi-fadl esm el-MASI7.
3am ektebelkon ya bayyet, li2annkon bta3erfo yalle ken min el-bideye. 3am ektebelkon ya shabeb, li2annkon ghalabto el-sherreer.

3am ektebelkon ya wlede el-zghar, li2annkon bta3erfo el-Ãb. Katabtelkon ya bayyet, li2annkon bta3erfo yalle ken min el-bideye. Katabtelkon ya shabeb li2annkon 2weya, li2anno kelmet ALLAH thebte fikon, w-li2annkon ghalabto el-sherreer.
Ma t7ebbo el-3alam w-yalle bel-3alam. Yalle bi7ebb el-3alam ma bitkoun ma7abbet el-Ãb fih.
Li2anno kell el-mawjoud bel-3alam, min shahawet el-jesm w-shahawet el-3ayn w-majd el-7ayet ma bikouno min el-Ãb, bikouno min el-3alam.
El-3alam bizoul w-ma3o bitzoul shahaweto, bass yalle byemshe 7asab iradet ALLAH, byethbat lal-abad.
Ya wlede el-zghar, ejet el-se3a el-akhira. Sme3to enno masi7 dejjel ra7 yeje, w-fi hon halla2 ktar mousa7a dejjelin. W-min hal-shi mna3rif enno el-se3a el-akhira ejet.
Tel3o min baynetna w-ma keno minna, w-law keno minna keno be2yo ma3na. Bass tel3o minna ta-ybayyen ennon ma keno kellon minna.
Bass ento, akhadto mas7a min el-2ouddous, wel-kell 3endo el-ma3rife.
W-ana 3am ektebelkon mish li2annkon btejhalo el-7a2i2a, bass li2annkon bta3erfouwa w-bta3erfo enno ma fi kezbe btetla3 3an el-7a2i2a.
Meen houe el-kezzeb ella yalle byenkor enno YASOU3 houe el-MASI7. Hayda houe el-masi7 el-dejjel yalle byenkor el-Ãb wel-2eben sawa.
Yalle byenkor el-2eben ma bikoun elo el-Ãb, w-yalle bye3terif bel-2eben bikoun elo el-Ãb.
Bass ento, khalle yethbat fikon el-kalem yalle sme3touh min el-bideye. W-eza thabat fikon yalle sme3touh min el-bideye, thabatto bel-2eben wel-Ãb.
W-hayda yalle nwa3adna fih, ye3ne el-7ayet el-abadiyye
3am ektebelkon 3an hal-shi w-be2sod el-ashkhas yalle 3am bijarrbo ydayy3oukon.
Bass ento, el-mas7a yalle akhadtouwa minno thebte fikon, w-mish bi-7aje la-meen y3allemkon, li2anno mase7to bit3allemkon kell shi, w-hiye 7a2 mish batel. Thbato bel-MASI7, metl ma 3allametkon.
Mbala ya wlede, thbato fih 7atta eza zahar el-MASI7 kenna 3ala thi2a w-ma ra7 nekhjal min bo3dna 3anno lamma yeje.
W-eza kento bta3erfo enno el-MASI7 barr, 3rafo enno yalle byemshe bel-7a2 bikoun mawloud min ALLAH.
Ettalla3o addeysh 7abbna el-Ãb 7atta tsammeyna wled ALLAH, w-ne7na fe3lan wledo. Eza ken el-3alam ma bya3rifna, bikoun li2anno ma bya3rif ALLAH.
Ya a7ebbe2e, ne7na halla2 wled ALLAH. W-ma nkashafelna ba3d shou ra7 nkoun. Ne7na mna3rif enno el-MASI7 lamma ra7 yezhar ra7 nkoun metlo li2anna ra7 nshoufo metl ma houe.
W-yalle 3endo hal-raja bel-MASI7 bikoun tahhar nafso metl ma el-MASI7 taher.
Yalle byokhte bya3mil sharr, li2anno el-khatiyye sharr.
Bta3erfo enno el-MASI7 zahar ta-yem7e el-khataya w-houe yalle ma 3endo khatiyye.
Yalle byethbat fih ma byokhte, w-yalle byokhte ma bikoun la shefo wala 3erfo.
Ya wlede ma ydayye3kon 7ada: yalle bya3mil el-kheyr bikoun sale7 metl ma el-MASI7 sale7.
W-yalle bya3mil el-khatiyye bikoun min eblees, li2anno eblees khãte min el-bideye. Bass 2eben ALLAH zahar ta-ydammir a3mel eblees.
Kell mawloud min ALLAH ma bya3mil el-khatiyye li2anno zar3 ALLAH thebit fih: ma bye2dar enno ya3mil el-khatiyye w-houe min ALLAH.
Bi-hal-shi mna3rif wled ALLAH min wled eblees. W-yalle ma bya3mil el-kheyr ma bikoun min ALLAH, w-yalle ma bi7ebb khayyo ma bikoun min ALLAH.
El-wassiye yalle sme3touwa min el-bideye hiye enno n7ebb ba3dna,
mish nkoun metl Kayeen yalle ken min el-sherreer w-2atal khayyo. W-leysh 2atalo? Li2anno a3melo kenit sherreera w-a3mel khayyo kenit sal7a.
Ma tet3ajjabo, ya ekhewte, eza baghadkon el-3alam.
Ne7na mna3rif enna nta2alna min el-mawt lal-7ayet li2anno min7ebb ekhwetna. Yalle ma bi7ebb byeb2a bel-mawt.
Yalle byebghod khayyo bikoun 2etil w-ento bta3erfo enno el-2etil ma btethbat el-7ayet el-abadiyye fih.
W-ne7na 3refna el-ma7abbe lamma da77a el-MASI7 bi-nafso kermelna, w-lezim ne7na nda77e bi-nfousna kermel ekhwetna.
Yalle 3endo kheyrat el-3alam w-bishouf khayyo me7tej w-bisakker 2albo bi-wejjo, keef badda tethbat ma7abbet ALLAH fih.
Ya wlede, ma tkoun ma7abbetna bel-kalem aw bel-lsen, tkoun bel-3amal wel-7a2.
Min hal-shi mna3rif enno ne7na min el-7a2 w-btettamman 2loubna eddem ALLAH
eza wabbakhetna 2loubna, li2anno ALLAH a3zam min 2loubna w-houe bya3rif kell shi.
Eza kenit 2loubna ma 3am bitwabbekhna ya a7ebbe2e, ykoun 3enna thi2a bi-ALLAH
enno nekhod minno kell yalle mnetolbo li2anno 3am ne7faz wassayah w-3am na3mil yalle byordih.
W-wassiyto hiye enno n2ãmen bi-esm 2ebno YASOU3 el-MASI7, w-enno n7ebb ba3dna metl ma wassana.
W-yalle byemshe bi-wassaya ALLAH byethbat bi-ALLAH w-byethbat ALLAH fih. W-mna3ref enno ALLAH thebit fina min el-ROU7 yalle 3atana yeh.
Ya a7ebbe2e, ma tsad2o kell rou7, bass mte7no el-arwe7 ta-tshoufo eza hiye min ALLAH, li2anno ktar min el-anbiya el-kezzebin ejo 3al-3alam.
W-ento bta3erfo ROU7 ALLAH min hal-shi: kell rou7 bye3terif bi-YASOU3 el-MASI7 enno eja bel-jesm bikoun min ALLAH,
w-kell rou7 ma bye3terif bi-YASOU3 ma bikoun min ALLAH, bikoun houe rou7 el-masi7 el-dejjel yalle sme3to enno ra7 yeje, w-houe halla2 bel-3alam.
Ya wlede, ento min ALLAH w-ghalabto el-anbiya el-kezzebin, li2anno ALLAH yalle fikon a2wa min eblees yalle bel-3alam.
Henne bye7ko bi-kalem el-3alam, w-byesma3lon el-3alam li2annon min el-3alam.
Ne7na min ALLAH, w-yalle bya3rif ALLAH byesma3elna, w-yalle ma bikoun min ALLAH ma byesma3elna. Min hal-shi mna3rif rou7 el-7a2 min rou7 el-kezb.
Khallina n7ebb ba3dna, ya a7ebbe2e, li2anno el-ma7abbe min ALLAH w-kell wa7ad bi7ebb houe mawloud min ALLAH w-bya3rif ALLAH
w-yalle ma bi7ebb ma bya3rif ALLAH, li2anno ALLAH ma7abbe.
W-ALLAH azhar ma7abbto elna bi-enno ba3at 2ebno el-wa7eed lal-3alam ta-nekhod minno el-7ayet.
Hayde hiye el-ma7abbe. Ne7na ma 7abbeyna ALLAH, houe yalle 7abbna w-ba3at 2ebno ta-ykaffir 3an khatayana.
W-eza ken ALLAH, ya a7ebbe2e, 7abbna hal-7obb, lezim ne7na kamen n7ebb ba3dna.
Ma 7ada shef ALLAH. Eza 7abbeyna ba3dna byethbat ALLAH fina w-btekmal ma7abbto fina.
W-ne7na mna3rif enna mnethbat bi-ALLAH w-enno ALLAH byethbat fina min enno 3atana ROU7O.
W-ne7na shefna w-mnesh'had enno el-Ãb ba3at 2ebno moukhallis lal-3alam.
Yalle bye3terif bi-enno YASOU3 houe 2eben ALLAH byethbat ALLAH fih w-byethbat houe bi-ALLAH.
Ne7na mna3rif ma7abbet ALLAH elna w-min2ãmen fiya. ALLAH ma7abbe. Yalle byethbat bel-ma7abbe byethbat bi-ALLAH w-byethbat ALLAH fih.
Wel-ma7abbe btektemil fina lamma ykoun 3enna thi2a bi-yawm el-deynoune, w-ne7na bi-hal-3alam metl ma el-MASI7 bel-3alam.
Bel-ma7abbe ma fi khawf, el-ma7abbe el-kemle btenfe kell khawf, li2anno el-khawf houe min el-2asãs, w-yalle bikoun kemil bel-ma7abbe ma bikhaf.
Lezim n7ebb li2anno ALLAH 7abbna bel-awwal.
Eza 7ada bi2oul: "ana b7ebb ALLAH" w-houe byekrah khayyo bikoun kezzeb li2anno yalle ma bi7ebb khayyo w-houe sheyfo, ma bye2dar y7ebb ALLAH w-houe mish sheyfo.
Wassiyet el-MASI7 elna hiye: yalle bi7ebb ALLAH bi7ebb khayyo kamen.
Yalle bi2ãmen enno YASOU3 houe el-MASI7, houe mawloud min ALLAH, w-yalle bi7ebb el-bayy bi7ebb el-mawloud minno.
W-ne7na mna3rif enna min7ebb wled ALLAH eza kenna min7ebb ALLAH w-mna3mil bi-wassayah,
li2anno ma7abbet ALLAH hiye bi-enno na3mil bi-wassayah. W-wassayah mish t2ile.
Yalle byoulad min ALLAH byeghlob el-3alam. W-imenna houe intisarna 3al-3alam.
Meen yalle ra7 yeghlob el-3alam ella yalle 2ãman bi-enno YASOU3 houe 2eben ALLAH?
Hayda yalle eja houe YASOU3 el-MASI7, eja bi-may w-damm, ma eja bass bel-may, eja bel-may wel-damm. Wel-ROU7 houe yalle byesh'had, li2anno el-ROU7 houe el-7a2.
W-yalle byesh'hado henne tlete.
El-ROU7 wel-may wel-damm, w-hal-tlete henne wa7ad.
Eza kenna mne2bal shahedet el-nes, fa-shahedet ALLAH a3zam. W-hayde hiye shahedet ALLAH yalle sheheda la-2ebno:
yalle bi2ãmen bi-2eben ALLAH, elo hal-shahede. W-yalle ma bisadde2 ALLAH 3eml min ALLAH kezzeb, li2anno ma bi2ãmen bel-shahede yalle sheheda la-2ebno.
W-hal-shahede hiye enno ALLAH 3atana el-7ayet el-abadiyye, w-enno hal-7ayet hiye bi-2ebno
w-yalle bikoun elo el-2eben, elo el-7ayet. W-yalle ma bikoun elo 2eben ALLAH, ma bitkoun elo el-7ayet.
3am ektebelkon 3an hal-shi ta-ta3erfo enno el-7ayet el-abadiyye elkon, ento yalle bit2ãmno bi-esm 2eben ALLAH.
Wel-thi2a yalle 3enna yeha bi-ALLAH hiye enno eza talabna shi mwefi2 la-iradto byestajeeb la-elna.
W-eza kenna mna3rif enno byestajeeb elna bi-kell yalle mnetolbo minno, fa-ne7na mna3rif enno ra7 nekhod kell yalle mnetolbo minno.

W-eza 7ada shef khayyo 3am yertekeb khatiyye ma bitwadde lal-mawt, lezim ysalle la-ALLAH w-hek bya3te khayyo el-7ayet. Hal-shi byezbat 3ala yalle khatayahon ma bitwadde lal-mawt. Bass fi khataya bitwadde lal-mawt, w-ma betlob el-sala kermela.
Kell 3esyan khatiyye, bass fi khataya ma bitwadde lal-mawt.
Mna3rif enno yalle byoulad min ALLAH ma byokhte, li2anno el-mawloud min ALLAH bye7mih ALLAH w-ma bye2zih el-sherreer.
Mna3rif enno ne7na min ALLAH, w-enno el-3alam kello ta7t soultan el-sherreer.
Mna3rif enno 2eben ALLAH eja w-enno 3atana fehm na3ref fih el-7a2. W-ne7na bel-7a2, bi-2ebno YASOU3 el-MASI7. Hayda houe el-Ileh el-7a2 wel-7ayet el-abadiyye.
Fa-ya wlede, tjannabo el-asnam!
Minne, ana el-sheykh, lal-sayyide el-moukhtara min ALLAH la-wleda yalle b7ebbon bel-7a2, mish ana wa7de, kell yalle bya3erfo el-7a2,
li2anno el-7a2 thebit fina w-byeb2a ma3na lal-abad.
Elna el-ne3me wel-ra7me wel-salem min ALLAH el-Ãb w-min YASOU3 el-MASI7 2ebn el-Ãb bel-7a2 w-bel-ma7abbe.
Addeysh farra7ne enno shouf kamm wa7ad min wledik meshyin bel-7a2 metl ma wassana el-Ãb.
Betlob minnik halla2, ya hal-sayyide, enno n7ebb ba3dna el-ba3d. W-hayde mish wassiye jdide bekteba elik, hayde wassiye kenit elna min el-bideye.
Wel-ma7abbe manna ella enno nemshe 3ala tari2 wassayah, w-hal-wassiye metl ma sme3touwa min el-bideye hiye enno temsho bel-ma7abbe.
W-bel-3alam fi ktir moudallilin, w-fi bayneton nes ma bye3terfo bi-maji2 YASOU3 el-MASI7 bel-jesm. Hayda houe el-moudallel wel-masi7 el-dejjel.
Ntebho, ta-ma tekhsaro thamaret a3melna, 7atta tekhdo moukefa2a kemle.
Yalle byetmeda w-ma byethbat 3ala ta3lim el-MASI7, ma bikoun ALLAH ma3o. W-yalle byethbat 3ala ta3lim el-MASI7, el-Ãb wel-2eben sawa bikouno ma3o.
Eza ejekon 7ada bi-ghayr hal-ta3lim ma te2balouh 3endkon w-ma t2ouloulo: el-salem ma3ak.
W-yalle bisallem 3le bikoun sherak bi-a3melo el-3atle.
3ende ktir eshya ektebelkon 3anna, bass ma b7ebb enno ykoun bi-7ebr 3ala wara2, li2anno bitmanna enno eje la-3andkon w-e7kikon bi-hal-eshya wejj bi-wejj ta-ykoun fara7na kemil.
Bisallmo 3leyke wled ekhtik el-ma7boube min ALLAH.
Minne ana el-sheykh la-Gayos el-7abib yalle b7ebbo bel-7a2.
Ya hal-7abib, bitmanna ennak tkoun bi-kheyr bi-kell shi, bi-so77it el-jesm metl ma enta bi-so77it el-rou7.
Addeysh farra7ne enno ejo ba3d el-ekhwe w-shehdoulak ennak metmassek bel-7a2 w-3am temshe bel-7a2.
W-ma fi shi bifarre7ne aktar min enno esma3 enno wlede meshyin bel-7a2.
Ya hal-7abib, enta ameen bi-kell yalle 3am ta3emlo kermel el-ekhwe, 7atta law keno ghouraba,
w-henne shehdoulak eddem el-knise bel-ma7abbe. W-ktir mni7 enno tse3edon 3ala mouteba3et safaron metl ma bili2 bel-RAB.
Li2annon sefaro kermel esm el-MASI7 w-ma 2eblo shi min el-mish mou2minin.
W-lezim ne7na nesta2bel metl hal-ashkhas 7atta nkoun shourake2on bel-3amal lal-7a2.
Katabet kelme lal-knise, bass Dyotriphos yalle bi7ebb enno ykoun ra2is fiyon, ma 2ebelna.

W-lamam ra7 eje ra7 khabberkon shou 3am ya3mil w-keef 3am bye7ke 3anna kalem 3atel w-ykattir 7ake. W-houe ma byektefe bi-hal-shi, kamen byerfod enno ye2bal el-ekhwe w-byemna3 yalle baddon ye2balouwon w-3am yesh7aton min el-knise.
Ya hal-7abib, ma tetba3 el-sharr. Tba3 el-kheyr. Yalle bya3mil el-kheyr houe min ALLAH, w-yalle bya3mil el-sharr, ma shef ALLAH.
W-bennesbe la-Dimitriyos, kell wa7ad byesh'hadlo, w-byesh'hadlo el-7a2 nafso. W-ne7na kamen mnesh'hadlo, w-enta bta3rif enno shahedetna sad2a.
3ende ktir eshya badde ekteblak yeha, bass ma badde ykoun bi-2alam w-7ebr,
w-bitmanna enno shoufak 3an 2arib w-ne7ke wejj bi-wejj.
El-salem ma3ak. Bisallmo 3lek a7ebbe2ak. Sallem enta 3ala kell wa7ad min el-a7ebba bi-esmo.
Min Yahouza khadim YASOU3 el-MASI7 w-khayye Ya3koub la-yalle da3ehon ALLAH el-Ãb w-7abbon w-7afazon la-YASOU3 el-MASI7.
Elkon el-ra7me wel-salem wel-ma7abbe.
3ende shaw2 kbir, ya a7ebbe2e, enno ektebelkon bi-khsous khalãsna el-moushtarak, min ba3d ma 7asseyt bi-darouret teshji3kon 3ala el-jihed kermel el-imen yalle tsallamouh el-2eddisin bel-kemil,
li2anno fi nes ejo la-3anna, w-henne ashrar 3am bi7awwlo ne3met Ilehna la-foujour w-3am yenekro Sayyidna w-RABNA el-wa7ad YASOU3 el-MASI7, w-2asãson maktoub min zamen.
W-ma3 ennkon bta3erfo hal-shi ktir mni7, badde enno tetzakkaro keef el-RAB, min ba3d ma khallas sha3bo min ard Masr, ahlak el-mish mou2minin bayneton,
w-keef enno, lamma tkhallo kamm wa7ad min el-maleyke 3an matra7on w-tarako matra7on, khallehon la-yawm el-deynoune el-3azeem bi-2ouyoud abadiyye bi-a3me2 el-3atme.
W-nafs el-shi Sadoum w-3amoura wel-moudon el-7adda t7ammalo 3azèb el-nar el-abadiyye lamma staslamo lal-da3ara wel-shahawet el-jasadiyye yalle bitkhelif el-tabi3a, w-keno 3ebra la-ghayron.
W-zet el-shi, hal-ashkhas, bi-halwaseton, bidannso el-jesm, w-bye7te2ro siyedet ALLAH, w-bihino el-makhlou2at el-samewiyye el-majide,
ma3 enno Mikha2il ra2is el-maleyke, lamma t2ãtal ma3 eblees w-jedalo bi-mas2alet jesm Moussa el-mayyit, ma tjarra2 enno ydeen eblees bi-kelme mouhine, 2allo: "khalle ALLAH y7esbak!"
W-hawdik el-ashkhas bihino yalle byejhalouh, wel-shi yalle bya3erfouh bel-gharize houe metl ma3rifet el-7ayawenet yalle ma 3enda 3a2l w-bi-sababo ray7in 3al-halek.
Ya weylon! Meshyo metl Kayeen w-staslamo lal-daya3 metl Bal3am tama3an bel-reb7 w-meto bi-tamarredon metl ma met Koura7.

Mnekhjal fiyon bi-waleyem el-ekhwe, byetlazzazo kellon bidoun ma yeste7o, w-bishabb3o faja3on. Henne metl ghyoum ma fiya may bitmashiya el-ree7. Henne metl ashjar khareef ma fiya thamar, metit marteyn w-nshelit min jouzoura.
Henne metl mawj el-ba7r el-heyje, btekshof 3an 3aron. Metl njoum day3a, massira el-abade a3me2 el-3atme.
W-tnabba 3annon Akhnoukh el-bayy el-sebi3 min ba3d Ãdam lamma 2al: "ettalla3o! Eja el-RAB ma3 oulouf 2eddisih
ta-y7esib kell el-bashar w-ydeen el-ashrar kellon 3ala kell sharr 3emlouh w-kell kelme 3atle 2alouwa 3le hal-ashkhas el-khatyeen el-fejjar."
Henne bibarebro w-byeshteko w-byetba3o shahaweton w-bye7ko kalem ma elo ma3na w-biseyro el-nes 3an masla7a.
Tzakkaro, ya a7ebbe2e, yalle tnabba 3anno rousl RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7,
lamma 2alo: "ra7 yeje bi-ekher el-zamen moustahzi2in byetba3o shahaweton el-sherreera."
Henne yalle bisabbebo el-in2isam, byel7a2o gharizeton w-ma fiyon rou7.
Bass ento ya a7ebbe2e, bnou 7alkon 3ala imenkon el-m2addas, w-sallo bel-ROU7 el-2ODOS
w-7mou 7alkon bi-ma7abbet ALLAH w-ntero ra7met RABNA YASOU3 el-MASI7 kermel el-7ayet el-abadiyye.
R7amo el-mraddadin,
w-khallso el-be2yin w-najjouwon min el-nar, w-r7amo el-be2yin ento w-3am bikhafo ALLAH, bass bghodo 7atta el-tawb yalle jesmon dannaso.
Lal-edir enno ye7mikon min enno tou2a3o w-ywa2efkon eddem majdo fer7anin, ma fi lawm 3leykon,
lal-Ileh el-wa7ad moukhallisna bi-YASOU3 el-MASI7 RABNA, el-majd wel-jalel wel-2ouwwe wel-soultan, abl kell zamen w-halla2 w-lal-abad. Ãmin.
Hayda yalle a3lano YASOU3 el-MASI7 bi-mawhabe min ALLAH w-kashaf la-yalle bye3badouh shou baddo ysir 3an 2arib, kermel hek ba3at malèko ta-ykhabber khadmo You7anna,
w-shehed 3ala kelmet ALLAH w-3ala shahedet YASOU3 el-MASI7 bi-kell yalle shefo.
Niyyel yalle bye2ra w-niyyel yalle byesma3o hal-kalem el-nabawe, w-niyyel yalle bitabb2ouha, li2anno eja el-wa2et.
Min You7anna lal-kaneyes el-sab3a bi-Ãsia. Elkon el-ne3me wel-salem min yalle houe halla2 w-yalle ken w-yalle ra7 yeje, w-min el-arwe7 el-sab3a yalle eddem 3arsho,
w-min YASOU3 el-MASI7 el-shehid el-ameen w-awwal meen 2am min el-mawt w-malik moulouk el-ard: houe yalle 7abbna w-7arrarna bi-dammo min khatayana,
w-3eml minna malakout w-kahane la-ALLAH bayyo, elo el-majd wel-edra la-abad el-douhour. Ãmin.
Layko keef jeye bel-ghayme! Ra7 yshoufo el-kell, 7atta yalle ta3anouh, w-ra7 tebke 3le kell 2abeyel el-ard. Eh, ãmin.
Bi2oul el-RAB el-ILEH: "ana houe el-alèf wel-ye2." Houe el-mawjoud halla2 w-yalle ken w-yalle ra7 yeje el-edir 3a-kell shi.
Ana You7anna, khayykon w-shrikkon bel-me7ne wel-malakout wel-thabet bi-YASOU3, kent bi-jaziret Batmos 3am ekhdom kelmet ALLAH w-esh'had la-YASOU3,
khtatafne el-ROU7 bi-yawm el-RAB, w-sme3t waraye sawt 2awe metl sawt el-bou2
3am bi2oul: "ktob yalle 3am bitshoufo bel-kteb w-b3ato lal-kaneyes el-sab3a bi-Afasos w-Smirna w-Barghamos w-Tyatira w-Sardis w-Filadelfia w-Lawdikiyya."
W-ltafatet ta-shouf el-sawt yalle 3am ye7kine, sheft sab3 sham3adenet min dahab
m7ãwta yalle byeshbah 2eben 2ensen, w-houe lebis tawb tawil la-7add el-ejren, w-7awl sadro zennar min dahab,
w-ken sha3r raso abyad metl el-souf el-abyad aw metl el-talj, w-3youno metl she3let el-nar,
ejrey metl n7as mlamma3 mna'2a bi-atoun el-nar, w-sawto metl sawt may ghazira.
W-ken fi bi-2ido el-yameen sab3 kawekeb, w-bi-temmo seyf 7ãdd msannan min el-meylten, w-wejjo metl el-shams lamma bteshro2 bi-2ouwwe.
W-lamma shefto wa2a3et 3a-ejrey metl el-mayyit, la2atne bi-2ido el-yameen w-2al: "ma tkhaf, ana el-awwal wel-akhir,
ana el-7ayy! Kent mayyit, w-halla2 ana 7ayy la-abad el-douhour. Ma3e mfati7 el-mawt w-3alam el-mawta.
Ktob yalle shefto, w-yalle ra7 ykoun halla2, w-yalle ra7 ykoun ba3den.

W-bennesbe la-serr el-kawekeb el-sab3a yalle sheyefa 3ala yameene w-sham3adenet el-dahab el-sab3a, el-kawekeb el-sab3a henne maleyket el-kaneyes el-sab3a, wel-sham3adenet el-sab3a henne el-kaneyes el-sab3a."
Ktob la-malèk kniset Afasos: "hek bi2oul yalle ma3o bi-yameeno el-kawekeb el-sab3a w-byemshe bayn sham3adenet el-dahab el-sab3a:
ana ba3rif a3melak w-jehdak w-toul belak, w-ba3rif ennak ma bit7ebb el-ashrar, w-ennak khtabaret yalle 3amlin 7alon rousl w-henne mish rousl, w-l2iton kezzebin.
Enta tawil el-bel, kefa7et kermel esme w-ma t3ebet.
Bass be3tab 3lek li2annak taraket ma7abbtak el-awle.
Tzakkar min wayn wa2a3t w-toub w-rja3 la-a3melak el-madye, w-eza ma ra7 ettoub ra7 eje la-3andak w-ekhod sham3adenak min matra7o.
Bass yalle byeshfa3 fik ennak btekrah a3mel el-Nokolawiyyin 2add ma ana bekraha."
W-yalle 3endo dinen, khallih yesma3 yalle bi2oulo el-ROU7 lal-kaneyes: "ra7 khalle el-mountaser yekol min shajret el-7ayet bi-ferdaws ALLAH."
Ktob la-malèk kniset Smirna: "hek bi2oul el-awwal wel-akhir, yalle met w-reje3 lal-7ayet:
ana ba3rif el-di2a wel-fa2r yalle enta fiyon, ma3 ennak ghane. W-ba3rif shou 3am yeftero 3lek el-ashkhas yalle 3amlin 7alon Yahoud w-henne mish Yahoud, henne teb3in lal-shaytan.
Ma tkhaf min el-3azèb yalle natrak, eblees ra7 yzett el-ba3d minkon bel-7abs ta-yemte7enkon, w-btet7ammalo el-di2a 3ashr tiyem. Koun ameen la-7add el-mawt, w-ana ba3tik eklil el-7ayet."
Yalle 3endo dinen, khallih yesma3 shou bi2oul el-ROU7 lal-kaneyes: "el-mawt el-tene ma ra7 ye2ze el-mountaser."
Ktob la-malèk kniset Barghamos: "hek bi2oul sa7ib el-seyf el-msannan min el-meylten:
ana ba3rif ennak sèkin matra7 ma fi 3arsh el-shaytan. Btetmassak bi-esme w-ma nakaret imenak fiyye 7atta bi-iyem Antipas shehde el-ameen yalle met 2atl 3endkon matra7 ma byeskon el-shaytan.
Bass be3tab 3lek li2anno fi ma3ak ashkhas byetmassako bi-ta3alim Bal3am yalle 3allam Balak keef ywa2e3 wled Isra2il bi-fakh el-khatiyye, w-enno yeklo min zabeye7 el-asnam w-yezno,
w-fi ma3ak nes byetba3o ta3alim el-Nokolawiyyin yalle bekraho.
Ghayyir souloukak wa-ella ra7 eje la-3andak 3al-sari3 w-7arib doddon bi-seyf kelmte."
Yalle 3endo dinen, khallih yesma3 shou bi2oul el-ROU7 lal-kaneyes: "ra7 a3te el-mountaser el-mann el-mekhfe w-7ajra zghire bayda man2oush 3leya esm jdid ma bya3erfo ella yalle byekhdo."
Ktob la-malèk kniset Tyatira: "hek bi2oul 2eben ALLAH yalle 3youno metl she3let el-nar w-ejrey metl el-n7as el-mlamma3:
Ana ba3rif a3melak w-addeysh 3endak ma7abbe w-imen w-khedme w-sabr, w-ba3rif enno a3melak el-akhira aktar min a3melak el-awle.
Bass be3tab 3lek li2annak 3am tet7ammal el-mara Izabel yalle 3amle 7ala nabiyye w-3am tekhda3 yalle bye3badoune, w-t3allemon ennon yezno w-yeklo min zabeye7 el-asnam.
3tita wa2et ta-ettoub bass rafadet enno ettoub 3an zeneha.
Kermel hek ra7 kebba bi-frash el-ãlem, w-yalle 3am yezno ma3a ra7 7otton bi-di2a kbire, eza ma ze7o 3an el-a3mel yalle 3allameton henne.
W-ra7 e2tol wleda 2atl, w-hek bya3erfo el-kaneyes kellon enno ana bef7as el-afkar wel-naweya w-ba3te kell wa7ad minkon 7asab a3melo.
W-ento yalle bi-Tyatira, yalle ma btetba3o hal-ta3lim wala bta3erfo yalle bisammouh el-ba3d asrar el-shaytan, b2elkon: ana ma b7ott 3leykon 7eml t2il tene.
Bass 7tefzo bi-yalle 3endkon 7atta eje.
W-yalle byentosir w-bidewim 3ala khedemte lal-niheye, ba3tih soultan 3al-oumam,
metl ma ana akhadet hal-soultan min bayye, bye7kemon bi-3asa min 7adid, metl wa3a el-fekhkhar byetkassaro.
W-ba3tih kamen nejmet el-sob7."
Yalle 3endo dinen, khallih yesma3 shou bi2oul el-ROU7 lal-kaneyes.
Ktob la-malèk kniset Sardis: "hek bi2oul sa7ib arwe7 ALLAH el-sab3a wel-kawekeb el-sab3a: ana ba3rif a3melak. Bitbayyen ennak 3ayish bass enta mayyit.
S'har w-rajji3 el-7ayet la-yalle be2e abl ma ymout. Ana ma sheft a3melak kemle bi-3youn Ilehe.
Tzakkar yalle t3allamto w-keef 2belto, w-3mol fih w-ghayyir souloukak. W-eza ma kent sohran ra7 eje la-3andak metl el-loss, ma bta3rif bi-ayya se3a bfej2ak.
Bass fi nes ma3ak bi-Sardis ma wassakho tyebon, byest7e'2o enno yemsho ma3e bi-tyeb bayda.
El-mountaser ra7 yelbos tawb abyad, w-ma yenma7a esmo min kteb el-7ayet, w-ra7 ykoun ma3rouf eddem bayye w-maleykto."
Yalle 3endo dinen, khallih yesma3 shou bi2oul el-ROU7 lal-kaneyes.
Ktob la-malèk kniset Filadelfia: "hek bi2oul el-2ouddous el-7a2i2e yalle ma3o mefte7 Daoud, eza fata7 ma 7ada bisakker, w-eza sakkar ma 7ada byefta7:
ana ba3rif a3melak. Fata7tellak beb ma bye2dar 7ada ysakkro, li2anno roughm do3f 2ouwwtak 7fozt kelmte w-ma nakaret esme.
W-yalle henne min 3alam el-shaytan, w-3amlin 7alon Yahoud w-3am bikazzbo, ra7 khalliyon yejo w-yerka3o 3a-ejreyk w-ya3erfo enno 7abbeytak.
W-li2annak sabart metl ma wassaytak, ra7 e7mik bi-se3et el-me7ne yalle ra7 tsib el-3alam kello ta-temte7en sekken el-ard.
Ra7 eje 3a-bakkir, 7tofiz bi-yalle 3endak yeh ta-ma yekhod 7ada eklilak minnak.

Ra7 khalle el-mountaser 3amoud bi-haykal Ilehe, ma byedhar minno abadan. W-ektob 3le esm Ilehe w-esm madinet Ilehe Ourashalim el-jdide yalle btenzal min el-sama min 3end Ilehe, w-bektob esme el-jdid."
W-yalle 3endo dinen, khallih yesma3 shou bi2oul el-ROU7 lal-kaneyes.
Ktob la-malèk kniset Lawdikiyya: "hek bi2oul el-Ãmin, el-shehid el-ameen el-sade2, ras khali2et ALLAH:
ana ba3rif a3melak, w-ba3rif ennak mish berid wala sokhn, w-ya reytak kent berid aw sokhn!
Ra7 estaferghak min temme li2annak fetir, mish sokhn wala berid.
Bit2oul: "ana ghane, sert ghane w-manne bi-7aje la-shi." Bass enta ma bta3rif addeyshak m3attar fa2ir, 3eryen w-a3ma.
Bensa7ak teshtere minne dahab msaffa bel-nar ta-tsir ghane, w-tyeb bayda btelbesa ta-tkhabbe 3oryak el-mou3ib, w-ke7l ta-tka77el fih 3younak w-te2sha3.
Ana bwabbikh w-bhazzib yalle b7ebbon, kermel hek koun sokhn w-ghayyir souloukak.
Ana we2if 3al-beb 3am de2, eza sem3 7ada sawte w-fata7 el-beb fetet la-3ando w-t3asheyt ma3o w-t3asha houe ma3e.
El-mountaser ba3tih enno ye2'3od ma3e 3ala 3arshe, metl ma ntasaret ana w-2a3adet ma3 bayye 3ala 3arsho."
Yalle 3endo dinen, khallih yesma3 shou bi2oul el-ROU7 lal-kaneyes.
Min ba3da sheft beb maftou7 bel-sama, w-sme3t el-sawt el-awwal yalle 7ekene min abl ka2anno bou2, 3am bi2oul: "tla3 la-hon 7atta farjik yalle la-bodd enno ysir."
W-deghre khatafne el-ROU7, w-sheft 3arsh bel-sama, w-3al-3arsh wa7ad
wahjo metl wahj el-7jara el-karime, w-7awl el-3arsh 2aws 2oza7 metl lawn el-zmerrod.
W-7awl el-3arsh arb3a-w-3ershreen 3arsh, w-3al-3roush arb3a-w-3ershreen sheykh lebsin tyeb bayda w-3ala rason akalil min dahab.
W-tali3 min el-3arsh bar2 w-aswat w-ra3d, w-wel3ane eddemo sab3 mashe3il hiye arwe7 ALLAH el-sab3a,
w-eddem el-3arsh fi shi byeshbah ba7r mlela metl el-ballour, w-bi-noss el-3arsh w-7awlo arba3 makhlou2at 7ayye elon 3youn min eddem w-min wara:
El-makhlou2 el-7ayy el-awwal byeshbah el-asad, wel-tene byeshbah el-3ejl, wel-telit elo wejj metl wejj el-2ensen, wel-rabe3 byeshbah el-nesr yalle bitir.

W-la-kell wa7ad min hal-makhlou2at el-7ayye el-arb3a sitt jweni7 ela 3youn 7awla w-jouwweta w-bitdalla tsabbi7 leyl nhar: "2ouddous, 2ouddous, 2ouddous el-RAB el-ILEH el-2adeer yalle ken w-halla2 mawjoud w-ra7 yeje."
W-kell marra keno el-makhlou2at el-7ayye el-arb3a 3am bisabb7o tasabi7 el-majd wel-ekram wel-7amd lal-2e3id 3al-3arsh wel-7ayy la-abad el-douhour,
keno 3am yerka3o el-arb3a-w-3ershreen sheykh eddem el-2e3id 3al-3arsh, w-yesejdo lal-7ayy la-abad el-douhour w-yzetto akalilon eddem el-3arsh henne w-3am bi2oulo:
"Ya RABNA w-ILEHNA, elak bili2 el-majd wel-ekram wel-edra li2annak khala2et el-eshya kella, w-bi-iradtak kenit w-nwajadet."
W-sheft bel-2id el-yameen lal-2e3id 3al-3arsh kteb maktoub 3le min jouwwa w-min barra, makhtoum bi-sab3 akhtem,
w-sheft malèk 2awe 3am yenede bi-a3la sawto: "meen bi7e'2ello yefta7 el-kteb w-yfekk akhtemo?"
W-ma edr 7ada bel-sama wala 3al-ard wala ta7t el-ard enno yefta7 el-kteb w-yshouf shou fiyo.
Se3eta bkit ktir li2anno ma nwajad meen bi7e'2ello yefta7 el-kteb w-yshouf shou fiyo.
2alle wa7ad min el-shyoukh: "ma tebke. Ntasar el-asad yalle min 2abilet Yahouza w-sleelet Daoud, w-houe yalle ra7 yefta7 el-kteb w-yfekk akhtemo el-sab3a."
W-sheft bayn el-3arsh wel-makhlou2at el-7ayye el-arb3a w-bayn el-shyoukh 7amal we2if ka2anno mazbou7, elo sab3 2roun w-sab3 3youn hiye arwe7 ALLAH el-sab3a yalle ba3ata 3al-3alam kello.
W-eja el-7amal w-akhad el-kteb min el-2id el-yameen lal-2e3id 3al-3arsh.

W-lamma akhad el-kteb, sajado el-makhlou2at el-7ayye el-arb3a wel-shyoukh el-arb3a-w-3ershreen lal-7amal. W-ken ma3 kell wa7ad minnon 3oud w-keset min dahab melyene bakhour, w-hiye salawet el-2eddisin.
W-keno 3am birattlo nashid jdid w-y2oulo: "enta btest7e2 tekhod el-kteb w-tfek akhtemo! Li2annak nzaba7et w-shtareyt nes la-ALLAH bi-dammak min kell 2abile w-lsen w-sha3b w-oumme,
w-3melt minnon malakout w-kahane la-Ilehna byemelko 3al-ard."
W-etalla3et, fa-sme3t aswat ktir min el-maleyke henne 7awela el-3arsh w-7awl el-makhlou2at el-7ayye el-arb3a wel-shyoukh, w-ken 3adadon bi-mlayeen el-oulouf,
w-keno 3am biratlo bi-a3la sawton: "el-7amal el-mazbou7 byest7e2 enno yen3ata el-edra wel-ghena wel-7ekme wel-2ouwwe wel-ekram, elo el-majd wel-shokran!"
W-sme3t kell khali2a bel-sama wel-ard w-ta7t el-ard w-bel-ba7r wel-kawn kello 3am bit2oul: "lal-2e3id 3al-3arsh w-lal-7amal el-shokran wel-ekram wel-majd wel-2ouwwe la-abad el-douhour."
W-2alo el-makhlou2at el-7ayye el-arb3a: "ãmin!" w-raka3o el-shyoukh w-sajado.
W-sheft el-7amal 3am biffek awwal el-akhtem el-sab3a, w-sme3t wa7ad min el-makhlou2at el-7ayye el-arb3a 3am bi2oul bi-sawt metl el-ra3d: "ta3a!"
Ettalla3et w-sheft 7san abyad, w-yalle rekib 3le 7amel 2aws, w-n3atalo eklil w-dahar mountaser ta-yentesir.
W-lamma fakk el-7amal el-khatm el-tene, sme3t el-makhlou2 el-7ayy el-tene 3am bi2oul: "ta3a!"
W-dahar 7san a7mar, yalle rekbo akhad el-edra enno yesro2 el-salem min el-ard 7atta yet2atalo el-nes, w-n3atalo seyf kbir.
W-lamma fakk el-7amal el-khatm el-telit, sme3t el-makhlou2 el-7ayy el-telit 3am bi2oul: "ta3a!" Ettalla3et w-sheft 7san aswad, w-bi-2id yalle rekib 3le mizen.
W-sme3t sawt ka2anno jeye min bayn el-makhlou2at el-7ayye el-arb3a 3am bi2oul: "kaylet 2am7 bi-dinar, w-tlet akyel sh3ir bi-dinar, bass el-zeyt wel-nbeed ma tde2 fiyon."
W-lamma fakk el-7amal el-khatm el-rabe3, sme3t el-makhlou2 el-7ayy el-rabe3 3am bi2oul: "ta3a!"
W-ettalla3et sheft 7san akhdar lawno behit, w-yalle rekib 3le esmo el-mawt, w-lè7'2o 3alam el-mawta, akhado soultan 3ala reb3 sekken el-ard ta-ye2etlouwon bel-seyf wel-jou3 wel-mawt w-w7oush el-ard.
W-lamma fakk el-7amal el-khatm el-khames, sheft ta7t el-mazba7 nfous el-mazbou7in kermel kelmet ALLAH wel-shahede yalle shehdouwa.
Sarakho bi-sawt 3ale: "aymata, ya hal-Sayyid el-2ouddous el-7a2i2e, ra7 tdeen sekken el-ard w-tente2im minnon la-dammna?"
W-akhad kell wa7ad minnon tawb abyad, w-2aloulon yenetro shwey 7atta yektemil 3adad rfe2on el-kheddem w-ekhweton yalle ra7 yen2atalo metlon.
Min ba3da sheft el-7amal 3am biffek el-khatm el-sedis, w-sar fi zelzel 3azeem, wel-shams swaddit metl tawb el-7ded, wel-2amar kello sar metl el-damm,
w-kawekeb el-fada nezlo 3al-ard metl ma byenzalo thimar el-teene el-fajje eza hazzeta ree7 3asfe,
wel-sama ntawit w-laffet 3a-ba3da, wel-jbel wel-jezor kella ze7it min matra7a,
w-moulouk el-ard w-rou2ase2a wel-2weya wel-aghniya wel-zou3ama wel-3abeed wel-a7rar kellon harabo 3al-maghewer w-bayn skhour el-jbel,
henne w-3am bi2oulo lal-jbel wel-skhour: "w2a3e 3leyna w-khabbina min wejj el-2e3id 3al-3arsh w-min ghadab el-7amal.
Eja yawm ghadabon el-3azeem, fa-min bye2dar yethbat?"
Min ba3d hal-shi sheft arba3 maleyke we2fin 3ala zaweya el-ard el-arb3a, meskin riye7 el-ard el-arb3a ta-ma to3sof ree7 3al-ard el-yebse aw 3al-ba7r aw 3al-shajar.
Min ba3da sheft malèk tene tali3 min el-shar2 7amel khatm ALLAH el-7ayy. W-neda bi-sawt 3ale el-maleyke el-arb3a yalle akhado el-edra enno ykharrbo el-ard el-yebse wel-ba7r.
W-2allon: "ma tkharrbo el-ard el-yebse wel-ba7r wel-shajar abl ma nekhtom yalle bye3bado Ilehna 3ala jbeenon."
W-sme3t enno 3adad el-makhtoumin miyye w-arb3a-arb3een alf min kell 2abeyel wled Isra2il:
tna3shar alf min 2abilet Yahouza, w-tna3shar alf min 2abilet Ra2oubin, w-tna3shar alf min 2abilet Jad,
W-tna3shar alf min 2abilet Ashir, w-tna3shar alf min 2abilet Naftali, w-tna3shar alf min 2abilet Manassa,
W-tna3shar alf min 2abilet Sham3oun, w-tna3shar alf min 2abilet Lawi, w-tna3shar alf min 2abilet Yassaker,
W-tna3shar alf min 2abilet Zabouloun, w-tna3shar alf min 2abilet Youssef, w-tna3shar alf min 2abilet Benyamin,

Min ba3da ettalla3et w-sheft 3adad kbir min el-nes ma byen3add, min kaza balad w-2abile w-sha3b w-lougha, w-keno we2fin eddem el-3arsh w-eddem el-7amal, lebsin tyeb bayda w-7amleen bi-2ideyon aghsan el-nakhl,
henne w-3am bi2oulo bi-sawt 3ale: "el-nasr la-Ilehna el-2e3id 3al-3arsh w-lal-7amal!"
W-keno kell el-maleyke 7awl el-3arsh w-7awl el-shyoukh wel-makhlou2at el-7ayye el-arb3a, wa2a3o 3ala wejjon eddem el-3arsh sejdin la-ALLAH
w-2alo: "ãmin! La-Ilehna el-7amd wel-majd wel-7ekme wel-shokran wel-ekram wel-2ouwwe wel-edra la-abad el-douhour. Ãmin!"
W-2alle wa7ad min el-shyoukh: "meen henne hal-ashkhas el-lebsin el-tyeb el-beed w-min wayn jeyin?"
Jewabto: "enta bta3rif, ya Sayyide." 2alle: "hal-ashkhas henne yalle tel3o min el-di2a el-kbire, ghassalo tyebon w-saret bayda bi-damm el-7amal.
Kermel hek henne eddem 3arsh ALLAH 3am ye3badouh bi-haykalo leyl nhar, wel-2e3id 3al-3arsh 3am ye7miyon bi-khaymto,
la-hal-sabab ma bijou3o wala bye3tasho w-ma ra7 tedrobon el-shams wala el-shawb
li2anno el-7amal yalle bi-noss el-3arsh byer3ahon w-byekhedon 3a-yanabi3 may el-7ayet, w-ALLAH byemsa7 kell dam3a min 3younon."
W-lamma fakk el-7amal el-khatm el-sebi3, sar fi bel-sama houdou2 la-meddit noss se3a.
W-sheft el-maleyke el-sab3a el-we2fin eddem ALLAH, w-n3ata la-kell wa7ad minnon bou2.
W-eja malèk ghayro 7amel mabkhara min dahab w-we2if 3al-mazba7, w-n3atalo bakhour ktir ta-y2addmo ma3 salawet el-2eddisin 3ala mazba7 el-dahab eddem el-3arsh.
W-toli3 min 2id el-malèk dekhan el-bakhour ma3 salawet el-2eddisin eddem ALLAH.
Min ba3da masak el-malèk el-mabkhara w-malleha min nar el-mazba7 w-kabba 3al-ard, fa-3emlt aswat w-r3oud w-bourou2 w-zalzale.
W-7addaro 7alon el-maleyke el-sab3a el-7amleen el-abwe2 el-sab3a 7atta yenefkho fiya.
W-nafakh el-malèk el-awwal bi-bou2o, fa-wa2a3 3al-ard barad w-nar makhloutin bel-damm, w-7tara2 telt el-ard w-telt el-shajar w-kell 3eshb akhdar.
W-nafakh el-malèk el-tene bi-bou2o, w-wa2a3 bel-ba7r shi ka2anno jabal kbir wel3an, w-sar telt el-ba7r damm,
W-meto telt el-makhlou2at yalle bit3ish bel-ba7r, w-tkassar telt el-sefon.
W-nafakh el-malèk el-telit bi-bou2o, w-wa2a3et min el-sama nejme kbire ka2anna she3le min nar w-wa2a3et 3ala telt el-anhar w-3al-yanabi3.
Wel-nejme esma 3al2am. W-saret el-may metl el-3al2am, w-meto ktar min yalle sherbo minna li2anna morra.
W-nafakh el-malèk el-rabe3 bi-bou2o, w-nsab telt el-shams w-telt el-2amar w-telt el-njoum, 7atta 3attam el-telt w-khesro el-nhar wel-leyl telt dawwon.
W-ettalla3et w-sheft w-sme3t nesr tayer bi-noss el-sama 3am bi2oul bi-sawt 3ale: "ya weylon, ya weylon, ya weylon, sekken el-ard lamma ra7 yenfkho el-maleyke el-tlete bel-abwe2 el-be2ye."
W-nafakh el-malèk el-khames bi-bou2o, w-sheft nejme wa2a3et min el-sama 3al-ard, n3atalo mefte7 beer el-hewwe.
W-fata7et el-nejme beer el-hewwe, w-toli3 minna dekhan ka2anno dekhan atoun kbir, w-3attamet el-shams wel-jaww min dekhan el-beer.
W-toli3 min el-dekhan jarad ghatta wejj el-ard, w-n3atalo soultan metl soultan 3a2areb el-ard,
w-n2allo enno ma ye2ze 3eshb el-ard wala ayy shi akhdar wala el-shajar, bass ye2ze el-nes yalle ma fi 3ala jbeenon khatm ALLAH.
W-n2allo ta-ma ye2telon, bass y3azzebon khams tesh'hor bi-3azèb byeshbah 3azèb las3et el-3a2rab.
W-byetolbo el-nes el-mawt bi-haydik el-iyem w-ma bile2ouh, w-ra7 yetmanno enno ymouto wel-mawt byehrob minnon.
W-bayyan el-jarad ka2anno kheyl m7addar lal-ma3rake, 3ala rouson fi shi byeshbah akalil min dahab, w-wejjon metl wejj el-bashar,
3endon sha3r metl sha3r el-neswen, w-snenon metl anyeb el-2soude,
w-sdouron metl drou3 min 7adid, w-sawt jwene7on metl dajjet markabet kheyl ktire ray7a 3al-ma3rake,
w-dnebo fiyon ebar metl dneb el-3a2areb, w-3endon soultan enno ye2zo el-nes meddit khams tesh'hor,
el-malik yalle faw2on houe malèk el-hewwe w-esmo bel-3ebrane Abeddoun w-bel-Younene Apolliyon.
Mara2et el-msibe el-awle w-jeyin el-msibten el-be2yin.
W-nafakh el-malèk el-sedis bel-bou2, w-sme3t sawt toli3 min 2roun mazba7 el-dahab el-arb3a yalle eddem ALLAH.
W-2al el-sawt lal-malèk el-sedis yalle bye7mol el-bou2: "7arrir el-maleyke el-arb3a el-mrabbatin 3ala nahr el-Fourat el-kbir!"
Nfakket jnazeer el-maleyke el-arb3a el-m7addrin 7alon lal-se3a wel-yawm wel-shahr wel-sene 7atta ye2etlo telt el-bashar.
W-sme3t enno 3adad jeysh el-kheyyele miteyn malyoun.
W-sheft bel-rou2ya el-kheyl wel-kheyyele lebsin drou3 min nar, w-min ya2out asfar w-min kabrit. W-kenit rous el-kheyl metl rous el-2soude, min temmon byotla3 nar w-dekhan w-kabrit.
W-meto telt el-bashar bi-sabab hal-msayeb el-tlete, ye3ne el-nar wel-dekhan wel-kabrit yalle tol3o min tmem el-kheyl.
Kenit 2ouwwet el-kheyl jeye min temma w-min dneba, li2anno dneba bteshbah el-7ayyet w-3enda rous bte2ze.

Wel-nes yalle najjo min hal-msayeb, ma rej3o 3an yalle 3emlouh 2ideyon w-dallo yesejdo lal-shyateen w-la-asnam min dahab w-fodda w-n7as w-7ajar w-khashab, ma bte2dar la te2sha3 wala tesma3 wala temshe,
wala rej3o 3an el-2atl wel-se7r wel-zena wel-ser2a.
W-sheft malèk ghayro 2awe nezl min el-sama lebis ghayme, w-3ala raso 2aws 2oza7, w-wejjo metl el-shams w-ejrey metl 3amoudeyn min nar,
bi-2ido kteb zghir maftou7. 7att ejro el-yameen 3al-ba7r wel-shmel 3al-ard el-yebse.
W-sarakh bi-sawt 3azeem metl el-2soude, w-nsama3et aswat el-r3oud el-sab3a.
W-lamma nsama3et 7addaret 7ala ta-tektob w-sme3t sawt min el-sama 3am bi2elle: "ma ten2ol shou 2alet el-r3oud el-sab3a w-ma teketbo!"
Wel-malèk yalle shefto we2if 3al-ba7r wel-ard el-yebse 3alla 2ido el-yameen sawb el-sama
w-7alaf bi-ALLAH el-7ayy la-abad el-douhour, khale2 el-sama w-kell shi fiya wel-yebse wel-ba7r w-kell shi fiya, enno ma ykoun fi te2khir min ba3d halla2.
W-lamma ysir el-wa2et w-yenfokh el-malèk el-sebi3 bi-bou2o, byet7a'2a2 serr ALLAH, metl ma basharo fih keddemo el-anbiya.
Wel-sawt yalle sme3to tali3 min el-sama, 7ekene marra tenye w-2al: "rou7, khod el-kteb yalle fèt7o el-malèk el-we2if 3al-ba7r wel-yebse."
W-ro7t la-3and el-malèk w-2eltello: "3tine el-kteb el-zghir", 2alle: "khedo w-bla3o w-ra7 tle2ih morr bi-batnak, w-ta3mo 7elo metl el-3asal bi-temmak."
W-akhadet el-kteb el-zghir w-bala3to, w-ken ta3mo 7elo metl el-3asal bi-temme, bass min ba3d ma bala3to sar morr bi-batne.
W-n2alle: "lezim tetnabba marra tenye 3ala ktir min el-shou3oub wel-oumam wel-loughat wel-moulouk."
W-3atane wa7ad minnon 3asa metl el-2adeeb w-2alle: "2oum, 2ees haykal ALLAH wel-mazba7 w-3edd el-sejdin fih.
Bass se7it el-haykal el-barra treka ma t2eesa li2anna matrouke lal-oumam, yalle ra7 yed3aso el-madine el-m2addase meddit tnen-w-arb3een shahr.
W-ra7 eb3at shehden min 3ende lebsin mes7, ta-yetnabbo meddit alf w-miteyn-w-sitteen yawm."
Hal-rejjelen el-shehden henne el-zeytounten wel-sham3adenen el-we2fin eddem RAB el-ard.
W-yalle bijarrib ye2ziyon, byetla3 min tmem el-shehden nar btekol a3de2on. Hek lezim enno ymout kell wa7ad bijarrib ye2ziyon.
W-3endon soultan enno ysakkro el-sama, ta-ma yenzal el-shete bi-iyem noubouweton, w-3endon soultan enno ykhallo el-may tsir damm w-enno yedorbo el-ard bi-kaza naw3 min el-msayeb wa2et yalle baddon.
W-lamma y7a'2e2o el-shehden noubouweton byeje el-wa7sh el-tali3 min el-hewwe w-bi7arebon w-byentosir 3leyon w-bye2telon.
W-byeb2a jesmon maztout bi-se7it el-madine el-3azeeme yalle esma, houe ka-ramz, Sadoum aw Masr matra7 ma met Rabbon masloub.
Wel-nes el-jeyin min kaza sha3b w-2abile w-lougha w-balad byettalla3o 3ala jesm el-shehden meddit tlet tiyem w-noss, w-ma byesma7o la-7ada enno y7otton bel-2abr.
W-byeshmato fiyon sekken el-ard w-byefra7o w-byetbedalo el-hadeya, li2anno hal-nabiyyen 3azzabo sekken el-ard ktir.
W-min ba3d ma mara2et el-tlet tiyem wel-noss, fetit fiyon rou7 7ayet min ALLAH w-we2fo 3ala ejreyon. W-khafo ktir el-nes yalle 3am yettalla3o 3leyon,
w-sem3o sawt 3azeem 3am yesrakh fiyon min el-sama: "tla3o la-hon!" w-shefouwon a3de2on tal3in 3al-sama bi-ghayme.
W-sar bi-haydik el-se3a zelzel 2awe, w-tdammar 3eshr el-madine w-met bel-zelzel sab3-talef shakhs, w-nra3abo el-be2yin, w-saro ymajjdo Ileh el-sama.
Mara2et el-msibe el-tenye, w-halla2 el-msibe el-telte jeye 3al-sari3.
W-nafakh el-malèk el-sebi3 bi-bou2o, w-tol3it aswat 3alye bel-sama 3am bit2oul: "malak 3al-3alam RABNA w-MASI7O, ra7 yemlok la-abad el-douhour."
W-raka3o el-shyoukh el-arb3a-w-3ershreen el-2e3din eddem ALLAH 3ala 3roushon w-wa2a3o 3ala wejjon w-sajado la-ALLAH,
w-2alo: "mneshkrak ya hal-RAB el-Ileh el-2adeer el-mawjoud w-yalle ken, li2annak kashafet 3an 2ouwwtak w-malaket.
Ghodbet el-oumam, w-ejet se3et ghadabak w-deynounet el-mawta 7atta tkefe2 kheddemak el-anbiya wel-2eddisin w-yalle bikhafo esmak, zghar w-kbar, w-7atta tem7e yalle keno 3am ye2etlo el-ard."
W-nfata7 haykal ALLAH bel-sama, w-zahar tabout el-3ahd bel-haykal, w-sar fi bar2 w-aswat w-r3oud w-zalezel, w-nezl barad ktir.
W-zaharet 3aleme gharibe bel-sama: mara lebse el-shams, wel-2amar ta7t ejreya, 3ala rasa eklil min tna3shar nejme.
7eble 3am tesrokh min waja3 el-wilede.
W-zaharet bel-sama 3aleme tenye: tennin 3azeem a7mar metl el-nar elo sab3 rous w-3ashr 2roun, 3ala kell ras tej,
jarr bi-danabo telt njoum el-sama w-kabba 3al-ard. W-we2f el-tennin eddem el-mara hiye w-3am tetwajja3 ta-yebla3 tofla lamma bitwalldo.
W-waladet sabe w-houe yalle ra7 ye7kom el-oumam kella bi-3asa min 7adid, bass 2ebna nkhataf la-3and ALLAH w-3arsho,
w-harabet el-mara 3al-sa7ra matra7 ma 7addarla ALLAH malja t3ish fih meddit alf w-miteyn-w-sitteen yawm.
W-sar fi 7arb bel-sama bayn Mikha2il w-maleykto w-bayn el-tennin, w-2etalon el-tennin bi-maleykto,
bass maleyket el-tennin khesro el-ma3rake w-khesro matra7on bel-sama.
W-wa2a3 el-tennin el-3azeem 3al-ard, ye3ne el-7ayye el-2adeeme yalle esma eblees aw el-shaytan, yalle byekhda3 el-dene kella, w-wa2a3o ma3o maleykto.

Min ba3da sme3t sawt 3azeem bel-sama 3am bi2oul: "liom t7a'2a2 el-nasr wel-3ezze wel-moulk la-Ilehna wel-soultan la-MASI7O, li2anno wa2a3 yalle byettehem ekhwetna 3al-ard, byettehemon leyl w-nhar eddem Ilehna.
Ghalabouh bi-damm el-7amal w-bi-shahedeton elo, w-ma faddalo 7ayeton 3al-mawt.
Kermel hek fra7e ya sama w-ento yalle seknin fiya. El-weyl lal-ard el-yebse wel-ba7r. Li2anno eblees nezl la-3andkon w-melyen ghadab li2anno 3arif enno iyemo alile."
W-lamma shef el-tennin enno wa2a3 3al-ard, sar yedtehed el-mara yalle waladet el-2eben el-sabe,
w-n3ata lal-mara jwene7 el-nesr el-3azeem ta-ettir fiyon 3ala matra7a bel-sa7ra, matra7 ma bte7teme meddit zaman w-zamanen w-noss zaman b3id 3an el-7ayye.
W-talla3et el-7ayye min temma may metl el-nahr le7e2 wara el-mara ta-ye7mela w-yekheda ma3o.
Bass el-ard se3adet el-mara, w-fata7et el-ard temma w-bala3et el-nahr yalle talla3o el-tennin min temmo.
W-ghodib el-tennin 3al-mara w-ra7 ta-y7arib sleeleta el-be2ye yalle 3am yemsho 7asab wassaya ALLAH w-ameenin la-shahedet YASOU3,
w-we2f 3a-raml el-ba7r.
W-sheft wa7sh tali3 min el-ba7r, elo sab3 rous w-3ashr 2roun, w-3ala 2rouno fi 3ashr tijen, w-3ala rouso aseme el-tejdeef.
W-hal-wa7sh yalle shefto ken byeshbah el-nemr, w-elo ejren metl ejren el-debb w-temm metl temm el-asad. 3atah el-tennin edrto w-3arsho w-soultan kbir.
W-zahar wa7ad min rous el-wa7sh ka2anno majrou7 w-ra7 ymout fa-nshafa min jer7o el-mawwit, w-t3ajjabet el-ard kella w-meshyet wara el-wa7sh.
W-sajado el-nes lal-tennin li2anno 3ata el-wa7sh soultano, w-sajado lal-wa7sh w-2alo: "meen metl el-wa7sh? Meen bye2dar y7arbo?"
W-n3ata lal-wa7sh temm bye7ke kalem fiyo kebriya w-tejdeef, w-n3atalo soultan enno yeshteghil meddit tneyna-w-arb3een shahr.
W-sar yjaddef 3ala ALLAH, w-jaddaf 3ala esmo w-markazo w-3al-seknin bel-sama.
W-n3atalo el-edra 3ala enno y7arib el-2eddisin w-yeghlebon, metl ma n3atalo soultan 3ala kell 2abile w-sha3b w-lougha w-balad,
w-byesjedlo sekken el-ard kellon, hal-ashkhas yalle asamiyon mish maktoube min bideyet el-3alam bi-kteb el-7ayet, kteb el-7amal el-mazbou7.
Yalle 3endo dinen, khallih yesma3!
Yalle lezim yrou7 3al-7abs ra7 yrou7 3al-7abs, w-yalle lezim yen2atal bel-seyf, ra7 yen2atal bel-seyf. Hon bibayyen sabr el-2eddisin w-imenon.
Min ba3da sheft wa7sh tene tali3 min el-ard, w-elo 2arnen metl 2roun el-kharouf, bass bye7ke metl el-tennin.
Sta3mal kell soultet el-wa7sh el-awwal bi-7oudouro, w-jabar el-ard w-sekkena enno yesejdo lal-wa7sh el-awwal yalle nshafa min jer7o el-mawwit,
w-3eml 3ajeyeb 3azeeme la-daraje nazzal 3al-ard nar min el-sama eddem kell el-nes,

w-khada3 sekken el-ard bi-hal-3ajeyeb yalle n3atalo el-edra enno ya3mila eddem el-wa7sh el-awwal. W-2amar sekken el-ard bi-enno ya3emlo soura lal-wa7sh yalle jara7o el-seyf bass roughm jer7 el-seyf 3ash
w-akhad el-edra 3ala enno yenfokh bi-souret el-wa7sh rou7 ta-ye7ke, w-enno ye2tol kell yalle ma 3am yesejdo la-souret el-wa7sh,
w-enno ykhalle kell el-nes, zghar w-kbar, aghniya w-fou2ara, 3abeed w-a7rar, y7otto 3aleme 3ala 2idon el-yameen aw jbeenon,
hek ma 7ada bye2dar yeshtere aw ybee3 ella eza ken 3endo 3aleme bi-esm el-wa7sh aw bi-3adad esmo.
W-hon la-bodd min el-7ekme: yalle 3endo zaka khallih ye7sob 3adad esm el-wa7sh. Houe 3adad esm 2ensen w-3adado sitt miyye w-sitta-w-sitteen.
W-ettalla3et sheft 7amal 3ala jabal Sehyoun w-ma3o miyye w-arb3a-w-arb3een shakhs, maktoub 3a-jbeenon esmo w-esm bayyo,
w-sme3t sawt min el-sama metl hadir el-may el-ghazira aw metl sawt ra3d 2awe, ka2anna angham bye3zefa la33ibet el-3oud,
3am birannmo ternime jdide eddem el-3arsh w-eddem el-makhlou2at el-7ayye el-arb3a w-eddem el-shyoukh, w-ma 7ada bye2dar yet3allam hal-ternime ella el-miyye w-arb3a-w-arb3een el-moukhallasin bel-ard.
Hal-ashkhas ma khetyo ma3 neswen, w-ma tzawwajo. Hal-ashkhas byel7a2o el-7amal wayn ma ra7, w-le2o el-el-khalãs min bayn el-bashar w-henne bakouret ALLAH wel-7amal.
Wala marra kazzabo, w-ma fiyon 3ayb.
Min ba3da sheft malèk tene 3am bitir bi-noss el-sama, ma3o injil abade 3am bibasher fih sekken el-ard yalle min kaza balad w-2abile w-lougha w-sha3b.
W-ken 3am yesrokh bi-sawt 3ale: "khafo ALLAH w-majjdouh! Ejet se3et el-deynoune, sjedo la-yalle khala2 el-sama wel-ard wel-ba7r wel-yanabi3!"
w-le7'2o malèk ghayro 3am yesrokh: "wa2a3et, wa2a3et Babel el-3azeeme yalle sharrabet el-oumam kella min fawret sakar zeneha!"
W-le7e2 hal-malèken malèk telit 3am yesrokh bi-sawt 3ale: "yalle byesjod lal-wa7sh w-sourto w-maktoub 3ala jbeeno aw 2ido 3alemet el-wa7sh,
la-bodd min enno yeshrab nbeed ghadab ALLAH el-sãfé, w-yet7ammal 3azèb el-nar wel-kabrit eddem el-maleyke el-at'har w-eddem el-7amal,
w-dekhan 3azèbon byetla3 la-abad el-douhour. Yalle byesejdo lal-wa7sh w-sourto w-yalle ma3on 3aleme bi-esm el-wa7sh ma byerte7o la bel-leyl wala bel-nhar.
Hon bibayyen sabr el-2eddisin yalle byetmassako bi-wassaya ALLAH wel-imen bi-YASOU3."

Min ba3da sme3t sawt min el-sama 3am bi2oul: "ktob: niyyel el-mawta yalle bimouto min halla2 w-raye7 mette7din bel-RAB!" W-bijeweb el-ROU7: "mazbout, byerte7o min ta3abon, li2anno el-kheyr yalle 3emlouh birafe2on."
W-ettalla3et sheft ghayme bayda 2e3id 3leya metl 2eben 2ensen w-3ala raso eklil min dahab w-bi-2ido manjal msannan.
Min ba3da dahar min el-haykal malèk ghayro 3am yesrokh bi-sawt 3ale lal-2e3id 3al-ghayme: "khod manjalak w-7sod! Ejet se3et 2atf el-zar3 w-nodij zar3 el-ard!"
Kabb el-2e3id 3al-ghayme manjalo 3al-ard w-2ataf zar3 el-ard.
W-dahar malèk ghayro min el-haykal yalle bel-sama w-ma3o kamen manjal msannan.

Min ba3da dahar min mazba7 el-haykal malèk ghayro 3endo soultan 3al-nar, w-sarakh bel-3ale lal-malèk yalle 7amel el-manjal el-msannan: "khod manjalak el-msannan w-2tof 3ana2id kroum el-ard li2anno el-3enab nodij."
W-kabb el-malèk manjalo 3al-ard w-2ataf min kroum el-ard w-faddeha bi-ma3saret ghadab ALLAH el-3azeeme.
W-nda3aset el-ma3sara barrat el-madine, w-toli3 minna damm wossil 3ala 3louw temm el-kheyl 3ala bo3d shi tlet miyyet kilometre.
Min ba3da sheft bel-sama 3aleme gharibe ra2i3a: sab3 maleyke 7amleen sab3 nakbet, w-hiye el-akhira li2anno fiya byet7a'2a2 ghadab ALLAH.
W-sheft shi byeshbah ba7r min el-ballour el-makhlout bel-nar. W-sheft yalle ghalabo el-wa7sh w-sourto w-3adad esmo we2fin 3ala ba7r min el-ballour, ma3on kennaret ALLAH
w-3am birattlo nashid Moussa khadim ALLAH w-nashid el-7amal w-3am y2oulo: "3azeeme 3ajibe a3melak ya hal-RAB el-Ileh el-2adeer! Jèlse w-mazbouta tor2atak, ya Malik el-oumam!
Meen ma bikhafak, ya RAB? Meen ma bimajjed esmak? Enta wa7dak 2ouddous: kell el-oumam ra7 teje w-tesjod bayn 2ideyk li2anno a7kemak el-3adle zaharet lal-kell."
Min ba3da ettalla3et sheft haykal khaymet el-shahede 3am yenfata7 bel-sama,
w-daharo min el-haykal el-maleyke el-sab3a yalle ma3on el-nakbet el-sab3a, lebsin ketten na2e 3am bilamme3 w-7awl sdouron znenir min dahab.
3ata wa7ad min el-makhlou2at el-7ayye el-arb3a hal-maleyke el-sab3a sab3 keset min dahab melyenin min ghadab ALLAH el-7ayy la-abad el-douhour.
W-ntala el-haykal dekhan min majd ALLAH w-edrto, w-ma 7ada edr yfout 3al-haykal abl ma tsir el-nakbet el-sab3a yalle 7amleena el-maleyke el-sab3a.
W-sme3t sawt 3azeem min el-haykal 3am yesrokh lal-maleyke el-sab3a: "rou7o w-skebo 3al-ard keset ghadab ALLAH el-sab3a."
Ra7 el-malèk el-awwal w-sakab keso 3al-ard, w-zaharet jrou7 mal3oune bitwajje3 nsabo fiya el-nes yalle 3leyon 3alemet el-wa7sh yalle 3am yesejdo la-sourto.
W-sakab el-malèk el-tene keso 3al-ba7r, w-sar el-may metl damm el-mayyit, w-met kell makhlou2 3ayish bel-ba7r.
W-sakab el-malèk el-telit keso 3al-anhar wel-yanabi3, w-saret el-may damm.
W-sme3t malèk el-may 3am bi2oul: "3adel enta bi-a7kemak, ya-hal-2ouddous el-mawjoud w-yalle ken.
Yalle sakabo damm el-2eddisin wel-anbiya, 3titon el-damm ta-yeshrabouh, w-akhado yalle byest7e2ouh!"
W-sme3t sawt min el-mazba7 3am bi2oul: "na3am, ya hal-RAB el-Ileh el-2adeer! A7kemak 3adl w-7a2."
W-sakab el-malèk el-rabe3 keso 3al-shams w-n3atala te7ro2 el-nes,
Fa-7tara2o el-nes min el-7arara el-2awiye w-ma rej3o la-ALLAH ta-ymajjdouh, bel-3aks sabbo esm ALLAH yalle elo soultan 3ala hal-nakbet.
W-sakab el-malèk el-khames keso 3ala 3arsh el-wa7sh, 3attamet mamlakto w-saro el-nes y3addo 3a-lsenon min el-waja3,
bass ma rej3o la-ALLAH 3an a3melon bel-3aks sabbo Ileh el-sama bi-sabab awje3on w-jrou7on.
W-sakab el-malèk el-sedis keso 3ala nahr el-Fourat el-kbir, fa-jaffet mayto 7atta ykoun mamra2 la-moulouk el-shar2.
W-sheft tlet arwe7 sherreera bteshbah el-dafadi3 tal3a min temm el-tennin w-min temm el-wa7sh w-min temm el-nabe el-kezzeb,
w-hiye arwe7 shaytaniyye 3am ta3mil 3ajeyeb w-trou7 la-3and moulouk el-ard kella ta-tejma3on lal-7arb bel-yawm el-3azeem, yawm ALLAH el-2adeer.
Ana jeye metl el-loss! Niyyel yalle byes'har w-bye7ros tyebo ta-ma yemshe 3eryen w-ta-ma yshoufouh el-nes 3eryen.
Jama3ton bel-matra7 yalle esmo bel-3ebrane Harmajaddoun.
W-sakab el-malèk el-sebi3 keso bel-jaww, w-toli3 sawt 3azeem min el-3arsh bel-haykal w-sar y2oul: "kholis kell shi!"
W-sar fi bar2 w-ra3d, w-zelzel 2awe ma shefet el-ard metl 2ouwwto min wa2et ma nwajad el-2ensen 3al-ard.
W-n2asamet el-madine el-3azeeme tlet a2sam w-tdammaret moudon el-oumam. W-tzakkar ALLAH Babel el-3azeeme ta-ysharreba kes bteghle bi-nbeed ghadabo.
W-harabet el-jouzr kella w-khtafet el-jbel,
w-nezl min el-sama 3al-nes barad kbir bi-te2l noss ton, w-sabbo el-nes ALLAH bi-sabab nakbet el-barad hayde li2anna kenit ktir rahibe.
W-ejene wa7ad min el-maleyke el-sab3a yalle ma3on el-keset el-sab3a w-2alle: "ta3a ta-farjik 2asãs el-zenye el-3azeeme el-2e3de 7add el-may el-ktire.
Zenyo ma3a moulouk el-ard, w-sekro sekken el-ard min kes nbeed zeneha."
W-7emelne el-malèk bel-ROU7 3al-sa7ra, sheft mara 2e3de 3ala wa7sh a7mar mghatta bi-aseme el-tejdeef, elo sab3 rous w-3ashr 2roun.
W-kenit el-mara lebse lawn nbeede w-a7mar w-7ãtta dahab w-7jara karime w-loulou, w-bi-2ida kes min dahab melyen min danas zeneha w-sharro,
w-3ala jbeena esm byermoz la-Babel el-3azeeme, emm el-zena w-danas el-ard.
W-sheft el-mara sekrane min damm el-2eddisin w-min damm shouhada YASOU3. W-lamma shefta t3ajjabet ktir.
2alle el-malèk: "leysh t3ajjabet? Ra7 eksheflak serr el-mara wel-wa7sh yalle bye7mela, sa7ib el-sab3 rous wel-3ashr 2roun.

Wel-wa7sh yalle shefto ken w-battal mawjoud. Ra7 yetla3 ba3d shwey min el-hewwe w-ymout. W-ra7 yet3ajjabo sekken el-ard yalle asamiyon mish maktoube min bideyet el-3alam bi-kteb el-7ayet lamma ra7 yshoufo el-wa7sh, li2anno ken w-battal mawjoud w-ra7 yezhar marra tenye.
W-hon la-bodd min el-7ekme wel-fehm: el-rous el-sab3a hiye el-tlel el-sab3a el-2e3de 3leya el-mara. W-hiye kamen sab3 moulouk,
minnon khamse sa2ato, w-wa7ad ba3do 3am yemlok, wel-akhir ma eja ba3d. W-lamma byeje bidall wa2et 2asir.
Wel-wa7sh yalle ken w-battal mawjoud, houe malik temin, ma3 enno houe min el-sab3a, w-birou7 3al-mawt."
W-hal-2roun el-3ashra yalle sheyefa hiye 3ashr moulouk ma malako ba3d, bass ra7 yemelko se3a we7de ma3 el-wa7sh.
Hal-ashkhas ettafa2o 3ala ennon ya3to el-wa7sh 2ouwweton w-soultanon.
W-henne ra7 y7arbo el-7amal, wel-7amal ra7 yeghlebon li2anno houe RAB el-Arbeb w-Malik el-Moulouk, w-fi ma3o el-ma3zoumin wel-moukhtarin wel-mou2minin."
Min ba3da 2alle el-malèk: "hal-may yalle shefta w-sheft el-zenye 2e3de 3leya hiye shou3oub w-ajnes w-bled w-loughat.
Wel-2roun el-3ashra yalle shefta wel-wa7sh ra7 yeboghdo el-zenye w-ye3ezlouwa w-yshall7ouwa tyeba w-yeklo la7ma w-ye7er2ouwa bel-nar,
li2anno ALLAH 7att bi-2loubon enno ynaffzo ra2yo w-yettef2o 3ala enno ya3to el-wa7sh soultan moulkon 7atta yet7a'2a2 kalem ALLAH.
W-hal-mara yalle shefta hiye el-madine el-3azeeme yalle btetsallat 3ala moulouk el-ard."
W-sheft min ba3d hal-shi malèk ghayro nezil min el-sama, 3endo soultan 3azeem, dawwit el-ard min wahjo.
W-sarakh bi-sawt 3ale: "sa2atet, sa2atet Babel el-3azeeme! Saret matra7 lal-shyateen w-la-kell el-arwe7 el-sherreera w-kell el-3safeer el-mish tãhra el-besh3a!
Li2anno el-oumam kella sherbet min fawret nbeed zeneha, w-moulouk el-ard zenyo ma3a, w-tejjar el-3alam ghtano min ketrit gheneha!"
W-sme3t sawt tene min el-sama 3am bi2oul: "dhar min Babel, ya sha3be! Ta-ma tsherek bi-khatayaha w-tedorbak nakbeta.
Khatayaha tkaddaset w-wosslit lal-sama w-ALLAH tzakkar sharra.
3èmlouwa metl ma 3èmaletkon w-reddoula marteyn jaza a3mela w-zeedo marteyn bel-kes yalle sherbeta
3azbouwa w-khallo 7ezna 3ala 2add ma tmajjadet w-tna3amet. Bit2oul bi-2alba: ana hon malike! Mish armale w-ma ra7 shouf el-7ezn.
Kermel hek ra7 tenzal fiya el-nakbet bi-yawm wa7ad: marad bimawwit w-7ezn w-jou3, w-ra7 te7tere2 bel-nar li2anno yalle bideena houe el-RAB el-Ileh el-2adeer."
Ra7 yebke 3leya moulouk el-ard yalle zenyo ma3a w-tna3amo ma3a, w-ra7 yebko lamma ra7 yshoufo dekhan el-nar taba3a el-wel3ane,
w-ra7 you2afo 3ala bo3d minna henne w-khayfin min 3azèba w-3am bi2oulo: "Ya weylik! Ya weylik! Ya hal-madine el-3azeeme, ya Babel el-madine el-2awiye, bi-se3a we7de ejet deynountik!"
W-ra7 yebko 3leya tejjar el-ard w-yenedbouwa, li2anno bda3eton ma ra7 yetle2a meen yeshtriya.
Bda3a min dahab w-fodda w-7jara karime w-loulou w-ketten w-ourjouwen w-7arir w-anwe3 el-3outour w-eshya min el-3aj wel-khashab el-ghale, w-n7as w-7adid w-rkham
w-2erfe w-bakhour w-3otr w-morr w-nbeed w-zeyt w-t7in w-2am7 w-7ayawenet w-ghanam w-kheyl w-3arabet kheyl w-ajsem 3abeed w-nfous bashar.
Bi2oulo el-tejjar: "el-thamar yalle shtaheton nafsik ra7o minnik w-ra7 el-ghena wel-wahj kello, ma ba2a tshoufiyon!"
Hal-tejjar yalle ghtano bi-tijareton min hal-madine ra7 you2afo b3ad minna, khayfin min 3azèba, w-byebko w-byenedbo
w-bi2oulo: "Ya weylik! Ya weylik! Ya hal-madine el-3azeeme! Kenit telbos el-ketten wel-ourjouwen wel-a7mar, w-t7ott dahab w-7jar karime w-loulou!
Bi-se3a we7de kholis kell hal-ghena." W-rebben el-sefon w-rekkeba w-ba7areta w-kell yalle byeshteghlo bel-ba7r we2fo min b3id
w-sarakho, henne w-3am yettalla3o 3ala dekhan el-nar taba3a el-wel3ane: "ayya madine bteshbah hal-madine el-3azeeme!"
W-kabbo el-trab 3a-rouson w-saro yebko w-yenedbo w-yeserkho: "Ya weylik! Ya weylik! Ya hal-madine el-3azeeme! Min thimara ghtano kell as7ab el-sefon bel-ba7r! Bi-se3a we7de rã7 kell shi fiya."
Fra7e ya hal-samawet la-kharaba! Fra7o ya hal-2eddisin wel-rousl wel-anbiya, li2anno ALLAH 2ãsasa 3ala yalle 3emleto fikon."
W-akhad malèk jabbar 7ajar metl 7ajar ta7oun kbir w-kabbo bel-ba7r w-2al: "hek bikebbo Babel el-3azeeme bi-3onf, w-ma ra7 tenwajad min ba3d liom abadan.
Ma ra7 yensama3 fike aswat yalle bighanno w-angham el-3oud wel-nay wel-bou2, w-ma ra7 yetle2a fike sane3, shou ma kenit sina3to, w-ma byensama3 3endik sawt el-ta7oun,
w-ma ra7 ydawwe fike nour el-srej w-ma ra7 yensama3 3endik sawt 3arees w-3arous, li2anno tejjarik keno 3ouzama el-ard w-se7rik khada3 kell el-oumam.
W-bi-hal-madine nshef damm el-anbiya wel-2eddisin w-kell yalle n2atalo 3al-ard."
W-sme3t min ba3d hal-shi sawt 3azeem ka2anno sawt majmou3a kbire min el-nes bel-sama 3am bi2oulo: "Halleluyah! La-Ilehna el-khalãs wel-majd wel-2ouwwe.
A7kemo 7a2 w-3adl. Den el-zenye el-3azeeme yalle afsadet el-ard bi-da3areta, w-nta2am minna la-damm yalle bye3badouh."
W-2alo marra tenye: "Halleluyah! Dekhana 3am yetla3 la-abad el-douhour."
W-raka3o el-shyoukh el-arb3a-w-3ershreen wel-makhlou2at el-7ayye el-arb3a w-sajado la-ALLAH el-2e3id 3al-3arsh w-2alo: "ãmin! Halleluyah!"
W-toli3 min el-3arsh sawt 2al: "sabb7o Ilehna, ya kell yalle bye3badouh w-yalle bikhafouh min zghar w-kbar."
Min ba3da sme3t shi byeshbah sawt majmou3a kbire min el-nes aw hadir may ghazire aw sawt ra3d 2awe 3am bi2oul: "Halleluyah! El-moulk lal-RAB Ilehna el-2adeer!"
Khallina nefra7 w-nhallel! W-khallina nmajjdo li2anno 3ers el-7amal eja wa2to, w-3arouso tzayyanet
w-n3atala enno telbos el-ketten el-abyad el-lammi3." Wel-ketten houe a3mel el-2eddisin el-sal7a.
Min ba3da 2alle el-malèk: "ktob: niyyel el-ma3zoumin 3a-3asha 3ers el-7amal!" W-2al kamen: "hayda kalem ALLAH el-sade2."
Fa-nzelt 3end ejrey ta-esjedlo, 2alle: "ma terka3! Ana khadim metlak w-metl ekhewtak el-ameenin la-shahedet YASOU3. Sjod la-ALLAH! Li2anno shahedet YASOU3 hiye rou7 el-noubouwe."
W-sheft el-sama maftou7a, w-eja faras abyad w-3le shakhs esmo "el-ameen" wel-"sade2", bye7kom w-bi7areb bel-3adl.
3youno metl she3let nar w-3ala raso tijen ktire w-7amel esm maktoub ma bya3erfo 7ada ghayro.
W-lebis tawb mghammas bel-damm, w-esmo kelmet ALLAH.
W-le7'2ino 3ala khyoul bayda jnoud el-sama lebsin ketten abyad na2e,
w-3am yetla3 min temmo seyf msannan ta-yedrob fih el-oumam, bye7kemon bi-3asa min 7adid, w-byo3sor bel-ma3sara nbeed byermoz la-ghadab ALLAH el-2adeer.
W-ken fi esm maktoub 3ala tawbo w-fakhdo: "Malik el-Moulouk w-RAB el-Arbeb."
W-sheft malèl we2if bel-shams 3am yesrokh bi-sawt 3ale la-kell el-3safeer yalle bittir bi-noss el-sama: "ta3o jtem3o bi-3asha ALLAH el-3azeem,
7atta teklo l7oum el-moulouk w-l7oum el-rou2asa w-l7oum el-abtal w-l7oum el-kheyl w-fersena w-l7oum kell el-bashar 3abeed w-a7rar, zghar w-kbar!"
W-sheft el-wa7sh w-moulouk el-ard w-jyoushon 3am yetjamma3o ta-y2etlo el-khiyyel w-jeysho,

W-nkamash el-wa7sh ma3 el-nabe el-kezzeb yalle 3eml el-3ajeyeb bi-7oudour el-wa7sh w-khada3 yalle akhado 3alemet el-wa7sh w-yalle sajado la-sourto. W-kabbo el-wa7sh wel-nabe el-kezzeb henne w-ba3don 3ayshin bi-bou7ayra min nar el-kabrit el-wel3an.
W-meto el-be2yin bel-seyf el-tali3 min temm el-khiyyel, w-sheb3et kell el-3safeer min l7oumon.
Min ba3da sheft malèk nezil min el-sama 7amel bi-2ido mefte7 el-hewwe w-janzeer 3azeem.
Kamash el-tennin, el-7ayye el-2adeeme, ye3ne eblees aw el-shaytan, w-rabbato la-alf sene
w-kabbo bel-hewwe w-2affal 3le w-khatama, ta-ma yerja3 yekhda3 el-oumam, min halla2 ta-yemro2 alf sene, w-min ba3d el-alf sene la-bodd enno yefelto la-wa2et 2asir.

W-sheft 3roush 2a3ado 3leya yalle n3atalon soultet el-7ekm. W-sheft nfous yalle n2atalo kermel el-shahede la-YASOU3 w-kermel kelmet ALLAH w-yalle ma sajado lal-wa7sh wala la-sourto w-ma 7atto 3a-jbeenon aw 2ideyon 3alemet el-wa7sh, kermel hek 3asho w-malako ma3 el-MASI7 alf sene.
Bass be2e el-mawta ma bi3isho abl ma yemro2 alf sene. Hayde hiye el-2iyeme el-awle.
Yetberak w-yet2addas yalle ken elo nasib bel-2iyeme el-awle, fa-ma fi soultan lal-mawt el-tene 3leyon, w-bikouno kahanet ALLAH wel-MASI7 w-byemelko ma3o alf sene.
W-lamma yemro2 alf sene, byenfalat el-shaytan min 7abso,
w-byetla3 la-yekhda3 el-oumam yalle bi-zaweya el-ard el-arb3a, ye3ne Jouj w-Majouj, w-byejma3on lal-ma3rake, w-3adadon 2add 3adad raml el-ba7r.
Tel3o 3ala wejj el-ard w-tjamma3o 7awl majmou3et el-2eddisin wel-madine el-ma7boube, w-nezlit nar min el-sama akaleton.
W-nkabb eblees yalle khada3on bi-bou7ayret el-nar wel-kabrit, matra7 ma ken el-wa7sh wel-nabe el-kezzeb, ta-yet3azzabo kellon bel-nhar wel-leyl la-abad el-douhour.
Min ba3da sheft 3arsh abyad 3azeem, w-sheft el-2e3id 3le, w-houe yalle harabit min eddem wejjo el-ard wel-sama w-ma be2e elon woujoud.
W-sheft el-mawta kbar w-zghar we2fin eddem el-3arsh. W-nfata7et el-ketob, min ba3da nfata7 kteb ghayro houe kteb el-7ayet, w-t2ãsaso el-mawta metl ma 2alo el-ketob, kell wa7ad 3ala a3melo.
W-kabb el-ba7r el-mawta yalle mawjoudin fih, wel-mawt w-3alam el-mawta kabbo el-mawta yalle mawjoudin fih. W-t2ãsas kell wa7ad 3ala a3melo.
W-nkabb el-mawt w-3alam el-mawta bi-bou7ayret el-nar, w-hal-bou7ayra hiye el-mawt el-tene.
W-kell meen ken esmo mish mawjoud bi-kteb el-7ayet nkabb bi-bou7ayret el-nar.
Min ba3da sheft sama jdide w-ard jdide, li2anno el-sama el-awle wel-ard el-awle khtafo, w-ma be2e lal-ba7r woujoud,
w-ana You7anna sheft el-madine el-m2addase, Ourashalim el-jdide, nezle min el-sama min 3end ALLAH, mzayyane metl 3arous jehze tetle2a bi-3areesa.
W-sme3t sawt 3azeem min el-3arsh 3am bi2oul: "hon byeskon ALLAH wel-nes: byeskon ma3on w-bikouno shou3oubo. ALLAH nafso ma3on w-bikoun Ilehon,
byemsa7 kell dam3a btenzal min 3younon. Ma byeb2a fi mawt wala 7ezn wala sarikh wala waja3, li2anno el-eshya el-2adeeme kholsit."
Wel-2e3id 3al-3arsh 2al: "ana ra7 khalle kell shi ysir jdid!" Min ba3da 2alle: "ktob: hal-kelme sad2a w-7a2i2iyye."
W-2alle: "tamm kell shi! Ana el-alèf wel-ye2, el-bideye wel-niheye. Ana ba3te el-3etshan min yenbou3 may el-7ayet bidoun mou2abil.
El-mountaser byourat kell shi, w-bkoun Ileho w-bikoun 2ebne.

Bass el-joubana wel-mish mou2minin wel-w7oush wel-mejrmeen wel-fejjar wel-sa7ara w-3ebbed el-awthen wel-kezzebin kellon, nasibon bel-bou7ayra el-wel3ane bel-nar wel-kabrit. Hayda houe el-mawt el-tene."
W-ejene wa7ad min el-maleyke el-sab3a yalle ma3on el-keset el-sab3a el-melyene bel-nakbet el-sab3a el-akhira w-2alle: "ta3a ta-farjik el-3arous zawjet el-7amal."
7emelne bel-ROU7 3ala jabal 3azeem 3ale ktir w-farjene Ourashalim el-madine el-m2addase nezle min el-sama min 3end ALLAH,
w-majd ALLAH 3leya. W-kenit 3am tsha3she3 metl 7jara karime nedra w-na2iyye metl el-ballour,
w-ela sour 3azeem 3ale elo tna3shar beb w-3al-bweb tna3shar malèk w-aseme maktoube hiye aseme 2abeyel wled Isra2il el-tna3sh:
min el-shar2 tlet bweb, w-min el-shmel tlet bweb, w-min el-jnoub tlet bweb, w-min el-gharb tlet bweb.
W-ken sour el-madine m3ammar 3ala tna3shar ases, 3ala kell wa7ad minna esm min aseme rousl el-7amal el-tna3sh.
Wel-malèk yalle 3am ye7kine ken mesik 2asbe min el-dahab ta-y2ees fiya el-madine w-bweba wel-sour taba3a.
Wel-madine mrabba3a, toula 2add 3arda. 2esa bel-2asbe, w-tol3it aktar min alfen kilometre, el-toul wel-3ard wel-3louw 2add ba3d.
Min ba3da 2es el-sour toli3 miyye w-arb3a-w-arb3een der3 (ye3ne shi sab3een mitr) 7asab 2iyes el-2ensen yalle sta3malo el-malèk.
W-ken el-sour ma3moul min 7jara karime, wel-madine min dahab sãfé metl el-2zez el-na2e.
W-kenit aseset sour el-madine mrassa3a bi-kell anwe3 el-moujawharat. El-ases el-awwal yashab, wel-tene ya2out azra2, wel-telit 3a2i2 abyad, wel-rabe3 zmerrod,
wel-khames 3a2i2 ghemi2, wel-sedis 3a2i2 a7mar, wel-sebi3 zabarjad, wel-temin jaz3, wel-tesi3 ya2out asfar, wel-3ashir 3a2i2 akhdar, wel-7da3sh feyrouz, wel-tna3sh jamasht.
W-kenit el-bweb el-tna3sh tna3shar beb loulou, kell beb minna ma3moul min 7abbet loulou. W-se7it el-madine min dahab sãfé sheffef metl el-2zez.
W-ma sheft haykal bel-madine, li2anno el-RAB el-Ileh el-2adeer wel-7amal henne el-haykal taba3a.
Wel-madine mish bi-7aje la-nour el-shams wel-2amar, li2anno majd ALLAH mnawwera wel-7amal houe 2andila.
Ra7 temshe el-oumam 3ala el-daw taba3a, w-bye7emlo moulouk el-ard majdon la-3anda.
Abadan ma bitsakkir bweba, li2anno ma fiya leyl.
W-bijeeboula majd el-oumam w-karameta,
w-ma bifout 3leya 7ada mish taher, wala yalle bya3emlo a3mel besh3a w-bikazzbo, bifouto 3leya bass yalle asamiyon maktoube bi-kteb el-7ayet, kteb el-7amal.
Min ba3da farjene el-malèk nahr el-7ayet sãfé metl el-ballour byenba3 min 3arsh ALLAH wel-7amal
w-byemshe bi-noss se7it el-madine w-3al-meylten shajret el-7ayet yalle btethmor tna3shar marra, kell shahr marra, w-bteshfe bi-wra2a el-oumam.
Ma fi la3ne min ba3d liom. 3arsh ALLAH wel-7amal byesekno bel-madine, w-byesejdoulo yalle bye3badouh
bishoufo wejjo, w-bikoun esmo 3ala jbeenon.
Ma fi leyl honik, w-ma bye7tejo la-daw 2andil aw shams, li2anno el-RAB el-Ileh houe bikoun nouron, w-byemelko la-abad el-douhour.
W-2alle el-malèk: "hal-kalem sade2 w-7a2i2e wel-RAB el-Ileh yalle byou7e lal-anbiya ba3at malèko ta-yekshof la-yalle bye3badouh shou yalle la-bodd enno ysir 2ariban.
Ana jeye 3an 2arib. Niyyel yalle byemshe 7asab kalem el-anbiya bi-hayda el-kteb."
W-ana You7anna, sme3t w-sheft hal-eshya. W-lamma sme3ta w-shefta, wa2a3et 3a-ejren el-malèk yalle khallene shoufa ta-esjedlo,
2alle: "ma terka3! Ana khadim metlak w-metl ekhewtak el-anbiya w-kell yalle byemsho 7asab kalem hal-kteb. Sjod la-ALLAH."
W-2alle: "ma tektom kalem el-noubouwe yalle bi-hal-kteb, li2anno el-wa2et 2arrab.
El-zalim khallih 3a-zolmo, wel-mish taher khallih hek, wel-sale7 khallih yeb2a sale7, wel-2eddis khallih yeb2a 3a-2adesto."
Ana jeye 3an 2arib w-ma3e el-moukefa2a yalle bkefe fiya kell wa7ad 7asab a3melo.
Ana el-alèf wel-ye2, wel-awwal wel-akhir, wel-bideye wel-niheye."
Niyyel yalle byghasslo tyebon ta-ykoun 3endon soultan 3ala shajret el-7ayet, w-ta-yfouto 3al-madine min bweba.
Bass yalle barrat el-madine, hal-ashkhas henne el-kleb wel-sa7ara wel-fejjar wel-mejrmeen w-yalle bye3bado el-awthen wel-kezzebin w-yalle bi7ebbo el-kezb.
"Ana YASOU3 ba3attelkon malèke ta-yesh'had bi-hal-eshya bel-kaneyes. Ana 2asl Daoud w-sleelto, ana nejmet el-sob7 el-mdawweye."
Bi2oul el-ROU7 wel-3arous: "ta3a!" Yalle sem3 khallih y2oul: "ta3a!" W-yalle 3etshan khallih yeje, w-meen ma baddo khallih yekhod may el-7ayet bidoun mou2abil.
W-ana b7azzir kell yalle 3am yesma3o kalem el-anbiya yalle bi-hal-kteb enno ma yzeedo 3le 7arf, a7san ma yzeed ALLAH 3le min el-nakbet el-mawsoufe bi-hal-kteb.
W-yalle byem7e 7arf min kalem el-anbiya yalle bi-hal-kteb, bye7ermo ALLAH min shajret el-7ayet w-min el-madine el-m2addase, el-mawsoufin bi-hal-kteb.
Bi2oul el-shehid 3an hal-eshya: "na3am, ana jeye 2ariban!" Ãmin. Ta3a, ya hal-RAB YASOU3.
Ne3met el-RAB YASOU3 tkoun ma3kon kellkon. Ãmin.
